65b4(1): bzang mo dang // rol pa'i tshul gyis mnyam sbyor zhing // stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// zhing chen gsod cing phung mdzad pa// ha ha has ni dgyes par mdzad// he he hes ni yum dang rol// hUM hUM hUM gis char
65b5(1): chen 'bebs// phaT phaT phaT kyis za byed che// gzhal yas smug nag chen po ste// 'jig rten stong gsum gyur pa ste// klu chen rgyal po mang po rnams// khyad par chen po'i sku la brgyan// srog chags chen po'i
65b6(1): pags chen yang // tsham ngam chen po na bzar gsol// cir yang sgyur ba'i gzugs chen po// che'o che'o dpal chen po// sangs rgyas sku yang chem chem gsol// srog chags gzhan lta smos ci dgos// 'jigs
66a1(1): byed sku ste cho 'phrul pa// drag shul gsung gi nga ro yi// gsod cing 'thung ba'i tshogs chen po// snying rje mngan sems khrag chen 'thung // gsod cing sbyor ba'i mchod pa la// shin tu dgyes pa chen
66a2(1): por ston// khrag 'thung 'bar ma ma gtogs par// gcig kyang gson par mi mdzad de// de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas na// gsang ba'i rgyu la shin tu dgyes// hUM hUM hUM/ ha ha ha ha ha/ khA hi khA hi khA hi ha ha ha sa/
66a3(1): ru ru rak+ta/ ka ka kar ma/ yo gi ni/ ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu hUM/ rin chen rigs chen yon tan sku// rin chen khrag 'thung chen po ste// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// sti ra che chung gdan la
66a4(1): bzhugs// bdud bzhi steng du brkyang bskum pa// nyon mongs lnga dag tshar gcod cing // mthe'u chung srin lag rtse gnyis kyis// a mr-i ta la sogs pa yi// bdud rtsi zil dngar chen po dag/ dang ba'i sku la rab
66a5(1): brgyan cing // sngo gnag 'jigs pa chen po'i sku// rin chen khros pa'i rgyal mo dang // ma hA su kha'i tshul du 'khril// rnam par thar pa'i zhal gsum gyis// khams gsum ma lus rngub cing gsol// thugs dam
66a6(1): snying rje chen po yis// yon tan dkyil 'khor chen por bsdus// rdo rje b+ha na d+har ldan pa yis// khrag chen po dag 'khrug cing gsol// 'jigs pa'i ral pa gyen du 'khyil// bskal pa'i me dpung chen po'i
66b1(1): dbus// gshog sgra drag pos stong gsum g.yo// rkan sgras yon tan rigs kun brlag/ sprugs pas bsod nams lus 'jig cing // yum chen mo dang mnyam par sbyor// sti ra'i glo snying 'byin cing gsol// dgra
66b2(1): sta tri shUl rgyu 'dren zhags// phyag na bsnams shing khrag 'thung ba// rin chen kun du bzang mo dang // rol pa'i tshul du mnyam sbyor zhing // stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// thams cad thams cad gcod par
66b3(1): mdzad// rol pa chen po'i tshul bzhin du// khrag chen po yang zhal gyis 'jib// ha ha has ni dgyes par mdzad// he he hes ni yum dang rol// hUM hUM hUM gis char chen 'bebs// phaT phaT phaT kyis za byed
66b4(1): che// gzhal yas sngo nag chen por ni// 'jig rten stong gsum gyur pa ste// klu chen rgyal po mang po rnams// khyad par chen po'i sku la brgyan// srog chags chen po'i pags pa yang // tsham ngam chen po'i na bzar
66b5(1): gsol// ci yang sgyur ba'i gzugs can te// che'o che'o dpal chen po// sangs rgyas sku yang chem chem gsol// gzugs khams lha tshogs mang po yang // mgo yi phreng bas rgyan du byas// 'jigs byed sku ste cho
66b6(1): 'phrul ba// drag shul gsung gi nga ro yis// gsod cing 'thung ba'i tshogs chen po// snying rje mngan sems khrag chen 'thung // gsod cing sbyor ba'i mchod pa la// shin tu dgyes pa chen por ston// khrag 'thung
67a1(1): 'bar ba ma gtogs par// gcig kyang gson par mi mdzad de// de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas na// gsad pa'i las la shin tu dgyes// hUM hUM hUM/ ha ha ha ha ha/ khA hi khA hi khA hi/ ha ha ha sa/ ru
67a2(1): ru rak+ta/ ka ka kar ma/ yo gi ni/ ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu hUM/ drag po 'dul ba'i don ched du// dkyil 'khor 'bar ba'i phyogs dag tu// khrag 'thung pad+ma chen po ste// mtshungs pa med pa'i khyad par
67a3(1): mnga'// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// dmar nag 'jigs pa chen po'i sku// pad+ma khros pa'i rgyal mo dang // ma hA su kha'i tshul du 'khril// rnam par thar pa'i zhal gsum gyis// khams gsum ma
67a4(1): lus rngub cing gsol// thugs dam snying rje chen po yis// gsung gi dkyil 'khor chen por bsdus// rdo rje b+han d+har ldan pa yis// khrag chen po yang dkrug cing gsol// 'jigs pa'i ral pa gyen
67a5(1): du 'khyil// bskal pa'i me dpung chen po'i dbus// gshog sgra drag pos stong gsum g.yo// rkan skra drag pos srog chags brgyal// spyugs pas bsod nams lus 'jig cing // yum chen mo dang mnyam par
67a6(1): sbyor// tri shUl rnge'u rdung rgyu 'dren zhags// phyag na bsnams te sha khrag gsol// gzugs khams lha tshogs mang po dag/ dgra bcom byang chub sems dpa' yis// mgo yi phreng bas rgyan du byas// dgongs nges
67b1(1): btsan thabs chen pos myos// 'dod chags bsnyengs pa'i dgongs pa yis// gzugs can bud med lus kun sdud// nga rgyal bsnyengs pa'i mthu yis ni// bsod nams can rnams thams cad gnon// phrag dog
67b2(1): bsnyengs pa'i dgongs pa yis// gzugs kun kun bsdus 'phrog cing sbyor// gti mug bsnyengs pa'i dgongs pa yis// dbye bsal mi mdzad nges pa'i thugs// mchod do mchod do stobs chen po// bdag la
67b3(1): bdag mchod mnyes pa che// khro mo pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// 'jigs pa'i stabs dang gar mdzad pas// mi bzad mkha' 'gro'i klong chen 'byung // stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// zhing bcu gsod cing tshul
67b4(1): bzhin du// dngos la longs spyod chen por mdzad// ha ha has ni dgyes par mdzad// he he hes ni yum dang rol// hUM hUM hUM gis char chen 'bebs// phaT phaT phaT kyis za byed che// zhabs bzhi bdud bzhi sgrol
67b5(1): zhing gnon// gzhal yas dmar nag chen por ni// 'jig rten khams gsum gyur pa ste// klu chen rgyal po mang po rnams// khyad par chen po'i sku la brgyan// srog chags chen po'i pags chen yang // tsham ngam
67b6(1): chen po'i na bzar gsol// cir yang sgyur ba'i gzugs chen te// 'jigs byed skra ste cho 'phrul ba// drag shul gsung gi nga ro yis// gsod cing 'thung ba'i tshogs chen po// snying rje mngan sems khrag chen
68a1(1): 'thung // gsod cing sbyor ba'i mchod pa la// shin tu dgyes pa chen por ston// hUM hUM hUM/ ha ha ha ha ha/ khA hi khA hi khA hi/ ha ha ha sa/ ru ru rak+ta/ ka ka kar ma/ yo gi ni// ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru
68a2(1): lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ drag po'i dngos grub sbyin mdzad pa// dkyil 'khor 'bar ba'i phyogs dag tu// khrag 'thung las kyi sku gsung thugs// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// ljang nag 'jigs pa chen po'i
68a3(1): sku// las kyi rgyal cing khros ma dang // ma hA su kha'i tshul du 'khril// rnam par thar pa'i zhal gsum gyis// khams gsum ma lus rngub cing gsol// thugs dam snying rje chen po yis// stong khams rnam pa mang po
68a4(1): rnams// sku yi dkyil 'khor chen por bsdus// rdo rje b+ha na d+har ldan pa yis// khrag chen po yang 'khrug cing gsol// 'jigs pa'i ral pa 'gyen du 'khyil// bskal pa'i me dpung chen po'i dbus// gshog sgra
68a5(1): drag pos stong gsum g.yo// rkan sgra drag pos srog chags brgyal// sprugs pas bsod nams lus 'jig cing // yum chen mo dang mnyam par sbyor// rgya gram dbyug pa rnge'u chung dang // tri shul zhing chen rgyu zhags
68a6(1): 'dren// tshems rnon sti ra za byed che// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// zhing bcu gsod cing tshul bzhin du// phrin las dkyil 'khor nyid la mchod// ha ha has ni dgyes par mdzad// he he hes ni yum dang
68b1(1): rol// hUM hUM hUM gis char chen 'bebs// phaT phaT phaT kyis za byed che// zhabs bzhi bdud bzhi sgrol zhing gnon// gzhal yas ldang nag chen por ni// 'jig rten khams gsum gyur pa ste// klu chen rgyal po mang
68b2(1): po rnams// khyad par chen po'i sku la brgyan// srog chags chen po'i pags chen yang // tsham ngam chen po'i na bzar gsol// cir yang sgyur ba'i gzugs chen po// che'o che'o dpal chen po// sangs rgyas sku yang
68b3(1): chem chem gsol// srog chags gzhan lta smos ci dgos// 'jigs byed sku ste cho 'phrul ba// drag shul gsung gi nga ro yis// gsod cing 'thung ba'i tshogs chen po// snying rje mngan sems khrag chen dang // gsod
68b4(1): cing sbyor ba'i mchod pa la// shin tu dgyes pa chen por ston// khrag 'thung 'bar ba ma gtogs par// gcig kyang gson par mi mdzad de// de bzhin thugs dam nyid pas na// gsad pa'i las la shin tu
68b5(1): dgyes// hUM hUM hUM/ ha ha ha ha ha/ khA hi khA hi khA hi/ ha ha ha sa/ ru ru rak+ta/ ka ka kar ma/ yo gi ni/ ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru luts+tsha b+h+yo hAM/ sangs rgyas khros pa'i rgyal mo ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// klo
68b6(1): d+hi shwa ri de bzhin rigs// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// khro gnyer spyan gsum mche gtsigs shing // dbu skra muny+dza rgya bcings te// thod rlon mang pos rgyan du byas// spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i
69a1(1): sdong mig can// ser nag gyad gyi 'dor tshul du// b+han+d+ha rak+Shar ldan pa yis// 'khril ba'i tshul gyis gtso la stobs// dur khrod 'bar ba'i me chen dbus// zhabs bzhi brkyang bskum gnon tshul
69a2(1): du// zhing chen gshibs pa'i gdan la bzhugs// rdo rje gshibs pa'i gshog rkyong zhing // srin lag mthe bong rtse gnyis kyis// a mr-i ta la sogs pa lnga// blangs te thugs dam skul bar mdzad// dgyes pas rdo
69a3(1): rje pad+mar 'jog/ rol phyir sta na mchog kyang mdzad// ka la gyi la dgyes pas rol// rdor dbyug tri shUl sti ra za// a a hi hi gad mos 'gengs// thugs dam sku yi dkyil 'khor du// 'jigs rten ji
69a4(1): srid thams cad sdud// khams gsum kun gyi dbang sgyur mdzad// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// pags chen brjid pa'i g.yang gzhi gsol// dpal chen 'bar ba ma gtogs par// kun kyang thal ba bzhin
69a5(1): du rlog/ khros pa'i snying rje g.yos pa na// thabs chen po yang chem chem gsol// zhe sdang chen po'i dgyes chen yang // rol pas dbang du bsdus nas ni// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// zas su srog chags
69a6(1): kun gsol ba// ma hA maM sas sku brgyan cing // zla gam mchod pa chen po yis// khrag 'thung chen po 'dzum par mdzad// yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs ston cing // nyams na rab tu brlag par mdzad// rnal 'byor

69b2(1): ci sod cig dpal gyi yum// choms shig choms shig dpal gyi yum// gtogs shig gtogs shig dpal gyi yum// sregs shig sregs shig dpal gyi yum// chings shig chings shig dpal gyi yum// gnod
69b3(1): par byed pa'i bdud rnams kun// rab tu drongs la tshul bzhin du// khrag 'thung chen po'i zhal du stobs// khrag 'thung 'bar ba ma gtogs par// gcig kyang gson par mi mdzad de// de bzhin thugs dam nyid
69b4(1): pas na// gsad pa'i las la shin tu dgyes// ha ha ha/ khA hi khA hi khA hi/ A ho sarba ta thA ga ta pradz+nyA pa ra mi ta/ sid d+ha rU pe dza/ lo hi ni la sha ta tsa ra na a khi ya me hu b+ho ga yo ka sa ma yo b+ha be/ ta ru la sarba yo
69b5(1): gi ma hA na ra nI/ rak+ta dzA ya/ so khya ma nu bi la si/ ka ba sa ma le ma ku d+ha/ tri shU la rak+Sha b+ho ga yo gi ni/ ma hA sa hu maN+Da la ti la ka ban d+ha na/ a la la ho// rdo rje yum chen rgyal gcig ma// kro d+hi shwa ri dpal gyi

70a1(1): rnams// mnyes byed phyir na sku la 'khril// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// khro gnyer spyan bgrad mche gtsigs shing // dbu skra muny+dza rgya bcings te// thod rlon mang pos rgyan du

71a1(1): la la ho// rin chen khros pa'i rgyal gcig ma// tshad med bzhi yi yon tan can// bkres skom phongs la gter sbyin mdzad// rang bzhin rnal 'byor yid bzhin gter// mi zad mdzod du gyur pas

72b6(1): byas nyid sgrol zhes// dbang phyug rgyal pos rab tu gsungs so// oM pany+tsa rU pe b+hi ta rU pe b+hi ta rU la pad+ma ma ma kro d+hi shwa ri sa ma ya yod b+ha bad/ sarba b+hi sha rU pe sa ma yo gi ni hUM/ b+hi yu li ga tha pad+ma kro d+hi shwa ri sa
73a1(1): ma yo gi ni/ a ha ha ma na sa ma ya yo gi ni// pany+tsa rU pe sid+d+ha hUM/ ta thA ga ta dz+nyA na khA hi hi/ las kyi rigs kyi yum chen mo// sku mdog ldang gnag 'jigs pa'i sku// phyag gnyis gyad kyi

75a1(1): pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi yum chen mo// rnal 'byor ser nag tso rI ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs 'chang ba// khro gnyer sman bgrad mche gtsigs shing // ral pa 'khyil pa'i muny+dza la// thod rlon
75a2(1): tshogs kyis rnam par brgyan// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// mi lpags rlon pa'i g.yang gzhi gsol// sti ra chung ngu mang po'i tshogs// brgyus nas sku yi rgyan du byas// 'jig rten sreg pa'i me

82b1(1): bzhin ma byas de nyid brlag/ mu khA gsod byed snar mgo ring // ser nag gyad kyi 'gying stabs can// zhing chen lag gis gtso la stobs// khro gnyer spyan bgrad zhal gdangs shing // spyan gsum 'jigs pa'i
82b2(1): sdang mig can// gshog tshogs mang po'i rgyan du byas// bka' las 'das pa za byed ma// ma hA rak+tas sku brgyan cing // dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// thod rlon tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan// ye shes

82b4(1): chen gshibs pa'i gdan la bzhugs// bka' las mi 'da' thugs dam skong // srog chags mang po'i snying nas 'dren// bsod nams lus kyang chem chem gsol// b+han d+ha rak+tas zhal du stobs// dbyug pas
82b5(1): klad 'gems rnge'u chung rdung // zhing chen za ba'i mu khA ste// 'jigs su rung ba'i rkan sgra dang // dgyes pa chen po'i spyugs pa yis// se gol snol mar gtogs nas ni// bgegs chen drangs te tshul bzhin

89b3(1): bka' bzhin byed// zhing chen kha TAM 'phen tshul du// lcags sgrog kun 'dzin zangs gris 'debs// thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka'
89b4(1): bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par byos// dbang phyug tshogs kyi bka' nyan ma// 'jigs su rung ba'i sdang mig can// ljang nag gsus 'dzin chags pas 'gying // dbu
89b5(1): gcig phyag drug 'jigs pa'i gzugs// zhing chen glo snying gtso la stobs// sbrang chen mgo yi zhal gdangs shing // sgra dang bcas pas bka' bzhin byed// dril chen sgra sgrogs dung dmar 'thung // kha T+wAM 'phen
89b6(1): cing rnge'u chung za// thod rlon g.yang gzhis rgyan du byas// brkyang bskum rkang gis zhing chen gnon// rnal 'byor yongs kyi bka' bzhin du// stabs glu phyag rgya sngags tshig gis// ci 'dod las de grub par
90a1(1): byos// pho nya rdo rje dbang phyug ma// cir yang 'gyur ba'i gzugs can rnams// 'jigs pa'i gzugs can mang po yis// dam bcas bzhin du las kun byos// de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo'i
90a2(1): sprin// rnam par spros pa bdud btul ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal rdo rje he ru ka khrag 'thung chen po rnams byang chub kyi sems kyi sprin las/ oM ma ha tsit+ta maN+Da la/ kro d+ha ha ha
90a3(1): ha/ he he he/ phaT phaT phaT/ tsa tur yo gI ni hring hring hring / tring tring tring / mring mring mring / kring kring kring / ha ha ha zhes brjod pas rdo rje he ru ka sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa khros pas rngam par gnas so// rat+na he
90a4(1): ru ka sbyin pa'i khro ba mdzad do// chags pa'i he ru ka dang sku dbang gi tshul gyis shin tu khro ba mdzad do// las kyi he ru ka kun du mi mdzad pa med pa'i tshul gyis gdug pa'i khro bo chen po'o// de dag kyang rdo rje
90a5(1): 'dzin ma khro mo dang // rin chen dbyug to ma zhes bya ba'i khro mo dang // pad+ma b+han d+ha 'dzin ma zhes bya ba'i khro mo dang // las kyi dbyug to ma zhes bya ba'i khro mo dang bcas pa rnams brkyang bskum gyi stabs kyis
90a6(1): dpal he ru ka la 'khril nas gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis mnyam pa chen por gnas so// de'i phyi rim na rnal 'byor chen mo dkar mo dang // rnal 'byor chen mo skul byed ma dang / gsod byed ma dang / za byed ma
90b1(1): dang / rnal 'byor ma dang / gtum mo dang / rnal 'byor ma las grub par byed ma dang / rdo rje rigs byed ma dang / dbang sdud chen mo dang / drag po'i cha byad kyis khrag dang keng rus kyi dkyil na zhabs
90b2(1): gnyis thabs dang shes rab kyi tshul du brkyang bskum gyi tshul du gnas so// de'i phyi rim na rdo rje phra men chen mo dang / seng ge mgo chen mo stabs dang ldan ma dang // stag mgo chen mo stabs dang ldan ma dang /
90b3(1): myos byed rta mgo chen mo dang / 'ug pa'i mgo can dang / bya rgod mgo gsod byed stabs chen mo dang / mchu rings mgo can gcod byed chen mo dang / wa'i mgo can skul byed ma'i stabs chen mo dang / rab tu sgra
90b4(1): 'byin gyi mgo can dang / rnam par rab tu sbrus gsod mdzad pa wang mgo can chen mo dang / mi gtong bar za bar byed ma phag gi mgo can zhe sdang chen mo rnams rang rang gi lag cha dang / gdug pa'i mtshon dang
90b5(1): chas nas gnas par mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba las rnam par bsgyur ba'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo ste le'u bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das gtum pa chen mo dang / rnam
90b6(1): par sbyar ba'i tshogs rmongs pa sel ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis dgyes par mdzad de 'di dag phyung bas kun du g.yo ba chen po mdzad do// oM sarba ma ha ka ru Ni kA ya/ ma hA shrI he ru ka sarba kha thaM/ du pa tsa ma hA tsaN+Da hUM
91a1(1): hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ oM ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/ ma hA rat+na he ru ka sarba kha taM d+hu/ pa tsa ma hA tsaN+Da tAM trAM trAM/ phaT phaT phaT/ oM sarba ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ ma hA shrI pad+ma he ru ka sarba kha taM ma d+hu/ hrI hrI hrI hrI hrI/

91a3(1): ha na/ hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM sarba kA ru Ni kA ya/ badz+ra lo tsa na ma hA DA ki ni d+ha ka d+ha ka hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM sarba ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ rat+na lo tsa na DA ki ni/ pa tsa pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM sarba ma hA kA ru Ni kA ya/ ma hA pad+ma
91a4(1): lo tsa na DA ki ni d+ha ha d+ha ha d+hA ha/ hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM sarba ma hA ka ru Ni ka ya/ karma lo tsa na ma hA DA ki ni tshin d+ha tshin d+ha hUM hUM hUM/ trAM trAM haM/ hr-i hr-i hr-i/ ha ha ha/ phaT phaT phaT/ oM ru lu go ri/ oM ru lu tsau ri/ oM ru lu pra
91a5(1): mo hA/ oM ru lu be ta li/ oM ru lu tsaN+Da lI/ oM ru lu g+hasma rI/ oM ru lu sma sha nI/ bin d+ha bin d+ha/ g+hu ma g+hu ma g+hu ma/ ha na ha na ha na/ hUM hUM hUM phaT phaT/ oM tsau ra ka ra sing+ga he he/ oM go ra ka ra byA g+h+ri he he/ oM \u0f7f
91a6(1): ka ka ra sri gla he he/ oM shwa na ka ra gr-i D+ha he he/ oM kAng ka ka ra ka ka phaT phaT/ oM ga ta ka ra pany+tsa ma he he phaT/ hasta ka ra U lu ka he he he/ hri hri hri/ phaT phaT/ ma hA tsa tu ra yo gi ni ha ha ha/ he he he/ hUM hUM hUM/
91b1(1): phaT phaT/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu/ khA hi khA hi khA hi khA hi khA hi khA hi/ phaT

91b4(1): hoHhoHzhes par mdzad do// mngon spyod kyi las kyi sbyor ba sbyor ba chen po mdzad do// gsang ba'i rdo rje'i mdzod nas gsang ba'i yum gyi pad+ma yongs su yangs pa'i nang du sems can gyi tshogs byang chub sems su
91b5(1): mdzad nas mkha' phab ste sras su bskyed par mdzad de mdzad nas dran pa rnyed do// sangs rgyas kyi sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa me dpung bsam gyis mi khyab pa mtshon cha dang dbu dang zhal mang zhing skyi bung zhes byed
91b6(1): pa dngangangs shing gsod par mthong ste smras pa/ rab tu 'jigs pa'i khro bo rnams// shin tu bde ba'i gnas shig gnas// bton pa skal ba rab tu chung // da ni ci mdzad la gor mdzod// lha cig rje cig 'on zhes
92a1(1): smras pa'i tshig gis sems can gyi mtshan ma 'byongs par gyur par mkhyen to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos rab tu spros la gnod long shig/ rje la gus par dam nos la// 'di la
92a2(1): gnas par skal med pas// phyi yi dkyil 'khor sa la 'dug/ ces bka' stsal pas dngangs pa rtas par gyur te/ rdo rje bran mo'i mna' bor nas smras pa/ skyes mchog lha rjes su zhig lags// 'bangs dang
92a3(1): bka' stsal bdag cag nyan// phyi yi gnas su gnas su bgyi// ma sringad bran g.yog 'khor yug rnams// 'jigs pa'i skus ni gzhes su gsol// ci mdzad khyod mkhyen gzhes su gsol// yun du skal ldan
92a4(1): gzhes su gsol// bdag cag 'jig rten skyong ba'i rnams// de ring dam mnos slan chad du// 'khor rnams skyong bar mi bgyid dam// bka' bzhin las kun mi sgrub bam// theg pa 'dzin la mi stong
92a5(1): ngam// bzhugs pa'i dkyil 'khor mi zin na// da lta bzhin du 'jigs pa dang // shi nas dmyal bar shog ces smras te mna' bor ro// de nas khrag 'thung chen pos cang mi gsung bar bzhugs pa las rab tu
92a6(1): gsod byed ma dang / tshangs pa mo dang / gzhon nu mo dang / dbang mo dang / grub mo dang / bskyod chen mo dang / rdo rje ra gdong chen mo dang / mi mo rlag par byed pa chen mo dang / phag mo gsod byed ma dang / gtum
92b1(1): par mdzad ma dang / brlan par mdzad ma dang / phag chen mo dang / nag mo ral pa chen mo dang / rdo rje 'dzin ma chen mo dang / rdo rje nag mo chen mo dang / rdo rje rgan byad chen mo dang / rdo rje yid 'phrog par byed ma
92b2(1): dang / rab tu gcig tu za ba mo dang / rdo rje srin mo'i cha byad chen mo dang / sngo gnag chen mo dang / ljang nag chen mo dang / be con chen mo dang / zhi ba bum sna chen mo dang / las la grub pa mo dang / bka' nyan
92b3(1): par byed ma dang / tsham ngam gyi gzugs dang / drag shul ma dang / nyul ba mor tshul ston ma de dag la sogs pa ma dang sring mo bu mo rnams rab tu gus par bka' nyan te/ rdo rje bran mor bka' nyan te// rdo rje
92b4(1): bran mor dam blangs nas// ci 'dod las rnams bdag cag bgyid// ces mna' bor te 'jigs pa'i gzugs dang / mtshon cha dang / gnas pa'i gzhir bcas te phyi'i snam bu la gnas pa'i las byed par
92b5(1): gnas so// de dag gi dkyil 'khor bsgrub pa bshad de// dkyil 'khor phyi rol gru bzhir bcas// dbus su zla gam rak+tar bcas// bA su ta yi maN+Da la// dri chu rak+ta'i tshom bur bri// hrIHlas dbus su bco
92b6(1): brgyad gzugs// yang na dbu gsum phyag drug pa// thod pa b+han d+ha dmar chen bkang // brgyad dam nyi shu dgu ru ldan// yang na lnga dang ldan pa la// lnga pa'i yi ges byin gyis brlab// zad 'phro phud dang ldan pa
93a1(1): la// u ts+tshaSh+Ta yi sngags kyis bzlas// thod pa dmar blugs btung bya zhing // ming ngam b+h+yo 'am ru lu yis// mngon sum phyin par bos nas ni// kha nas rak+tas rab gtor te// he ru ka yi las rnams
93a2(1): kun// gong nas 'byung ba'i las bzhin bya// sgeg mo na chung de dag la// dbang gi chags pas 'dod spyad de// ta ma la yi phur bus gdab// ci 'dod las rnams grub par sbyin// chags dang gsod dang rgyags
93a3(1): pa che// mnyam pa nyid kyi ting 'dzin gyis// tsau ra ka ra'i 'khor rnams kyang // bzhi yi las la 'jug par ni// ming tsam 'dzin pa'i rnal 'byor pas// bskul na rtse gcig las rnams 'grub// de nas kun du
93a4(1): bzang mo chen mos ming tsam du chos thams cad gnas par mkhyen to// gsang ba sgyu 'phrul chen po 'di bsdu ba chen po mdzad do// de nas sems dpa' rnal 'byor mchog/ kun kyang sems dpa' rnal 'byor
93a5(1): mchog/ chos kun ming tsam rnal 'byor yin// ming tsam rnal 'byor ma yin par// sems dpa' rnal 'byor 'ga' yang med// de nyid dus gsum rang bzhin te// de nyid kun du bzang mo mchog/ sgyu 'phrul dra
93a6(1): ba'i rgyud dag las// sems ma rdo rje de dag las// gsang ba'i nges don gang yang med// ces chos thams cad 'dus pa chen mor mkhyen to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi he ru ka 'dus pa chen mo'i
93b1(1): dkyil 'khor te le'u bcu gnyis pa'o// // a hoHrgyu nyid stong pas 'bras bu mngon sum pa// byin gyis brlab tu med pas byin gyis brlab pas 'grub// sangs rgyas mdzad pa nyid kyang sems can yin zhes
93b2(1): rgyal bas gsungs// de nyid mi mdzad med par shes pa kun gyi nang na rab tu bsngags// chags pa mi gtong chags pa mngon sum dgongs pa yin pas dkyil 'khor gong ma kun gyi ngang // sgrub la dga' bas
93b3(1): bsgrub tu med phyir bsgrubs pas 'grub ces rgyal bas rab tu gsungs// pho mo med phyir pho mo snang la dga' ba spyod brtson rgyal bas 'grub ces bsgrub pa kun gyis gsungs// stong par rtogs la spyod la g.yel
93b4(1): ba rnal 'byor min zhes rgyal bas gsungs// med la gtod cing dge sdig 'chol ba sdig can yin par rab tu gsal// dge sdig yod phyir brtson pas 'grub ces theg pa kun las 'byung // bag dang mi ldan
93b5(1): rang bzhin med par gnas pa la// gtso mchog mi bkur khungs phyin chos la mi brtson sems can yin par mngon sum gsal bar snang // de bas sgyu 'phrul gsang ba mchog 'di bu rnams gang zhig nyan brtson
93b6(1): pas// 'grus pa bslabs pa bag dang ldan pa lobs pa dang por ngo shes bya// skad cig gzugs la 'phangs pa med par gus ldan gsang ba'i sdud pa yin// rdo rje slob dpon mchog la dad pas sangs rgyas ma
94a1(1): lus kun la mchod pa chen po yin// lam la mkhas pas rdo rje slob dpon bkur ba'o// de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang / rnal 'byor dang / rnal 'byor ma rnams rab tu 'dun pa chen po skyes
94a2(1): te// mchod pa chen po bkur stis mchod// dkyil 'khor dang po phun sum tshogs// gnyis pa gsang ba'i mchod pa la// gsum pa rol pa gleng slong ba// khros pa'i sprin las bdud rnams btul// don gcig sku
94a3(1): 'phrul bka' stsal pa// tshogs kyi mchod pa dgyes pa che// dus gsum rtag tu ma byung ba// lam la mkhas pa yin par bsngags// brtson dang ldan pas rab mnyan dang // gsang ba'i sgrub pa 'di bsgrub pa// kun
94a4(1): kyang kun du bzang po yin// bcom ldan 'das rmongs pa sel ba zhes bya ba sgyu 'phrul chen po rdzogs so// /
94b1(1): bod skad du/ gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i bla ma chen po'o// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po ye shes bla ma chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bshad pa'i dus gcig na// sgyu
94b2(1): 'phrul bla ma chen po ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi bla ma ste// rnal 'byor kun gyi gsang mchog bde// gnas gsang ba na bzhugs nas su// snying po bla ma 'di skad bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs

94b4(1): mi lus lus pa med pa thams cad kyang so so ma yin tha mi dad dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin te/ shin tu gsang ba bla ma chen po'i dbyings 'og min gyi gnas mtha' dang dbus med pa na// gzhi tshad med pa'i ye
94b5(1): shes kyi 'khor lo gsal ba la ye shes rin po che 'bar ba'i gzhal las khang nam mkha'i dbyings ltar rgya phyogs bcur yongs su ma chad pa/ yon tan bla ma chen po dpag tu med pas rgyas pa'i phyir gru bzhir gyur
94b6(1): palhag pa'i ye shes rin po che bla ma'i glo 'bur bzhis mdzes pa/ rtse mo phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa thams cad so so ma yin tha mi dad pa'i ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i ye shes bla
95a1(1): mas kun du 'khyil pa/ ye shes bla ma bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang / kha dog la sogs pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i bye brag dang khyad par du gyur pa/ spags pa/ tshad dpag tu med pa/ ye shes
95a2(1): rin po che bla ma'i phreng ba dang / chun 'phyang dang / shar bu'i rgyan dang / gzugs dang sgra dang / dri ro reg bya la sogs pa mi sgrib par gsal bar rang byung la/ gsal ba'i rgyan khyad par can bla mas bklubs pa/
95a3(1): tshad med pa bzhi'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i sgo khyud can/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rta babs dang ldan pa/ phyi dang nang med pa kun yang bla ma chen po nang du gyur pa/ shin tu gsang ba bas khyab bdal ba'i bla ma chen
95a4(1): po'i gzhal yas khang na pha rol tu phyin pa lnga'i khri/ mi 'jigs pa seng ge'i khri dang / stobs glang po che'i khri dang / rdzu 'phrul rta'i khri dang / dbang rma bya'i khri dang / thogs pa med pa nam mkha' lding gi khri dang /
95a5(1): rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor dang / gos pa med pa pad+ma rin po che'i gdan brtsegs pa ni/ ye nas gsang ba bla ma'i phyir// yum gyi gzhal yas phyogs bcur 'bar// ye nas pha rol phyin
95a6(1): pa'i phyir// thogs pa med pa'i khri rkang brtan// rang bzhin ye nas 'od gsal phyir// nyi zla brtsegs pa'i gdan 'bar zhing // gdod nas dri ma med pa'i phyir// rnam par dag pa pad+mo gdan// re ba yid bzhin
95b1(1): skong ba'i phyir// yid bzhin rin chen gter gyi gdan// ma bsags lhun gyis rdzogs pa'i phyir// sna tshogs dkyil 'khor chen po'i rgyan// yon tan chen po'i gdan stengs na// sku mdun dang rgyab med
95b2(1): par thams cad tu zhal bla ma tha le bar gsal zhing mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pas thams cad du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las sna tshogs par snang ba/ thabs dang shes rab kyi
95b3(1): zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs kyi skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa/ ye shes drug gi phyag ye shes rin po che 'bar ba'i phyag rgya can/ sku gsung thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbu gsum dang ldan pa/ bcom
95b4(1): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po bla ma dang / btsun mo dam pa sra ba'i dbyings kyi bla ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi rgyal po bla ma dang / btsun mo dam pa snang ba'i dbyings
95b5(1): kyi bla ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa tshor ba'i rgyal po bla ma dang / btsun mo dam pa mnyen pa'i dbyings kyi bla ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'du shes kyi rgyal po bla ma dang / btsun mo dam pa dro ba'i dbyings kyi
95b6(1): bla ma dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed kyi rgyal po bla ma dang / btsun mo dam pa bskyod pa'i dbyings kyi bla ma la sogs pa ye shes rgyal po stangs dpyal kun kyang mthing ga dang / dkar po dang / ser po dang /
96a1(1): le brgan dang / ljang gu'i mdog bla mar 'tsher ba ste/ gnyis su med par 'khril bas chos kyi dbyings kun tu mtha' yas par bla ma chen po'i spyod pas khyab pa ni 'di lta ste/ dper na til gyi gang
96a2(1): bu'am mngar gyi sgrom bu bzhin kun du bde ba chen pos khyab par bzhugs so// de nas byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong dbang bla ma dang / btsun mo gzigs par bya ba'i bla ma dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje thos dbang
96a3(1): bla ma dang / btsun mo gsan par bya ba'i bla ma dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje snom dbang bla ma dang / btsun mo mnam par bya ba'i bla ma dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje myang dbang bla ma dang / btsun mo myang bar bya ba'i
96a4(1): bla ma dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje sogs shes bla ma dang / btsun mo sgron ma'i bla ma dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje gcod shes bla ma dang / btsun mo gdug pa'i bla ma dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje 'jug shes bla ma
96a5(1): dang / btsun mo char 'bebs bla ma dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje 'dus pa'i bla ma dang / btsun mo rgyas pa'i bla ma dang / 'joms pa chen po rdo rje reg g.yas bla ma dang / btsun mo rtag par ma yin pa'i bla ma dang /
96a6(1): 'joms pa chen po rdo rje reg g.yon bla ma dang / btsun mo chad par ma yin pa'i bla ma dang / 'joms pa chen po rdo rje reg gsang bla ma dang / btsun mo bdag tu ma yin pa'i bla ma dang / 'joms pa chen po rdo rje
96b1(1): reg 'dus bla ma dang / btsun mo mtshan mar ma yin pa'i bla ma dang / de lta bu'i tshogs brjod kyis mi lang ba dang gnyis su med par gsang ba dgyes pa'i dbyings bla ma na zhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs
96b2(1): pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor bla ma de nyid kyi gsang ba bla ma 'di nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yon tan phrin las rdo rje las byung ngo // e ma'o de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid
96b3(1): dbang sgyur dkyil 'khor bla ma'i ngang // ngang nyid rnam dag bde mchog gsang ba'i dbyings// dbyings nyid mnyam sbyor bde mchog rin chen gter// mi zad gter ldan bdud rtsi gsang ba'i bla// bla med byang
96b4(1): chub thig le ya mtshan dkyil 'khor snang // rang snang ba nyid ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan rnam dag snang ba ni// sku gsung thugs yon phrin las sel med pa'i yid bzhin rin chen mi zad par ldan pa rgyan gyi 'khor
96b5(1): lo bla ma rdo rje mchog gi gnas nyid do// rdo rje gsang ba bla ma'i nges don du'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i bla ma las dbyings dang ye shes gsang ba'i bde ba'i bla ma nges pa'i gleng gzhi'i le'u ste
96b6(1): dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das yid byed pa bla ma rdo rje kun tu bzang po thams cad ma lus pa'i tshul rdo rjes btsun mo bya ba mo kun tu bzang mo'i bla ma la 'jug par gyur to// gsang ba'i bla ma'i
97a1(1): tshig 'di ched du brjod do// oM chos kyi chos nyid bya ba'i dbyings// kun du bzang mo bde ba'i yum// ma g.yos rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ni// bdag yin bdag gi spyod yul bas// phyag rgya sna
97a2(1): tshogs so sor gsal// nub phyogs 'og min gnas mchog tu// ma chags pad+ma'i gdan bting ba// dus gsum rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i gnas// rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi la// phyag rgya bzhi dang yang dag
97a3(1): ldan// dbang med skal ngan bsal ba'i phyir// nang gtan phyi rim lcags dang ldan// rgyal ba yongs kyi gsang ba'i chos// sus kyang gting dpag bka' ba ste// kun du bzang po nyid kyis gzigs// hoHde nas
97a4(1): btsun mo bya ba kun du bzang mos gsang ba bla ma'i tshig 'di ched du brjod do// oM sems kyi sems nyid byed pa'i gtso// kun du bzang po rdo rje yid// ye shes brgyad kyi rang bzhin te// shar phyogs mngon dga'
97a5(1): sam yas nas// ni la lta bu'i gter 'byin pa// gsang 'dus 'phrul gyi lde mig gis// rnam par thar pa'i sgo phye ste// byang chub mchog gi nang gtan bkrol// ma chags pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// 'gro don
97a6(1): byang chub sems bskyed de// 'gro lnga skye bzhi dbang du bsdus// sku gsung thugs gnas dbang bskur ro// zhes gleng ngo // de nas bya ba mo kun tu bzang mos gsang ba bla ma'i mchod pa 'di ched du phul lo// oM
97b1(1): rin chen pad+ma'i dkyil 'jam 'di// 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis 'bul lags kyis// bla med 'phrul gyi lde mig ste// dgyes mchog rdo rje gsor nas ni// bdud rtsi char chen dbab tu gsol// zhes ched du gleng
97b2(1): ngo// de nas yang yid byed pa po rdo rje kun du bzang pos bdud rtsi bla ma'i char pas snod bcud kyi 'dzam bu'i gling tshim par bya ba'i phyir gsang ba bla ma'i tshig 'di ched du brjod do// oM rdo rje bla ma'i dgyes rab
97b3(1): 'di// gsor nas bdud rtsi'i char dbab phyir// 'dzum zhing 'khyil ba'i gnas su gsor// mi dmigs bde dang spro ba 'di// kun du bzang mo dbyings su bskyil// zhes ched du gleng ste// gnyis su med pa las
97b4(1): nyid kyi spyod yul thams cad gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bla ma khyad par du sbags pa rdul phra mo snyed 'thon nas sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul chen po bsam gyis mi khyab par mdzad pa ni/ la la ni gsang ba bla ma'i dkyil
97b5(1): 'khor du bzhugs te yan lag thams cad rdo rjer byin gyis rlob/ la la ni 'gro ba drug 'dul ba'i don du thub pa chen po drug tu bzhugs pa 'di lta ste/ lha yi gnas na brgya byin mgon// lha ma yin la thags
97b6(1): zangs ris// mi la bdud 'dul shAkya mgon// yi dwags gnas na kha 'bar bde// byol song seng ge nyid du smra// dmyal ba la ni gshin rje mgon// sku dang cha lugs tshul ston cing // la la lhums zhugs sku la
98a1(1): bltams// la la tshul bsrung rab tu byung // la la bsnyen rdzogs dka' thub byed// la la dam nod 'gro ba sgrol// la la bcu drug chos la btsud// la la mer 'bar chur yang 'brug/ la la nam
98a2(1): mkha' sgra ru 'bar// la la rdo rje brag tu sra// la la gso gsod 'pham rgyal byed// la la bcing sgrol 'gug sgrol byed// la la bdud 'dul ngan song sbyong // la la dkyil 'khor mchod sprin 'khril// kun kyang
98a3(1): chos kyi 'khor lo skor// de ltar rtag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba ni 'di lta ste/ theg pa dang po bcu drug mgon// gnyis pa bzhi yi lha spyod bsrung // gsum pa bcu gnyis nges par bstan// bzhi pa gnyis kyi
98a4(1): lta spyod sbyangs// bzhi pa'i theg pa mdor bsdus na// bla med theg pa'i dbyings su btsud// theg pa bzhi yi nges 'byung la// theg pa gcig gis 'bras bur gnas// kun 'byung dkyil 'khor sgyu 'phrul che// mang
98a5(1): la 'brel bas dra ba'i don// thun mong min pas gsang ba'i don// theg pa'i bcud de snying po'i dbyings// zhes ched du gleng ste/ snod bcud kyi 'jig rten rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gsang bar gnas sgyur ba dang //
98a6(1): phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gsang ba bla ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyi gzigs mos mnyes par gyur to// de nas snod bcud kyi 'jig rten thams cad dang // snyigs ma med par gsang ba bla
98b1(1): ma'i dkyil 'khor du mngon par sangs rgyas nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o rdo rje phung po'i yan lag ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags// skye mched khams rnams mang po kun// byang chub
98b2(1): sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// sa chu can dang mA ma kI// me long gos dkar sgrol ma ste// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// srid gsum ye nas sangs rgyas zhing // thams cad ma lus chos so/
98b3(1): cog/ sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan ma yin// sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan pa'i chos// sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi rnyed do// zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyur to// de nas de bzhin
98b4(1): gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs thams cad kyis ched du brjod pa 'di gsungs so// e ma'o phyogs bcu'i stong khams ye nas dben// srid pa gsum nyid dag pa'i zhing // snyigs ma lnga nyid bde ldan
98b5(1): gnas// phung po lnga nyid mngon sangs rgyas// thams cad mchog gi snying po bas// gzhan du rgyal bas chos mi btsal// nyid las gzhan zhes bya ba'i chos// btsal kyang rgyal bas mi rnyed do// zhes brjod pas
98b6(1): chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to// de nas dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa las ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o ye nas gsang ba'i chos// sna
99a1(1): tshogs snang ba rang bzhin gsang // gsang mchog snying po bla na med// thams cad gsang ba'i dbyings su nges// bla ma mchog gi snying po las// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis su med// ces brjod
99a2(1): pas thams cad dbyings su nges par mkhyen to// de ltar yin na yang 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pas 'gro ba'i rigs bsam gyis mi khyab par smin pa la thugs rje chen po sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i ye shes bskyed pa'i
99a3(1): phyir rdo rje bla ma'i tshig 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o bde gshegs snying po las// rang gi rnam rtog las kyis sprul// sna tshogs lus dang longs spyod dang // gnas dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa'i// bdag dang
99a4(1): bdag gir so sor 'dzin// sus kyang ma bcings bcings med de// bcing bar bya ba yod ma yin// rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin pa yis// nan gyis mkha' la mdud pa bor// bcings med rnam par grol med
99a5(1): pa'i// ye nas lhun rdzogs sangs rgyas chos// bstan phyir spro ba sna tshogs mdzad// spros kyang 'phel 'grib med pa'i dbyings// de ltar yin na yang de ltar ma rtogs pa rnams la// kun rdzob kyi phung po byang chub
99a6(1): kyi sems bla ma'i dkyil 'khor du sems kyi ngo bo bskyed pa'i phyir/ rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di ched du brjod do// stong zhing dben pa'i sems nyid ni// rigs dang kha dog dbyibs med de// ci yang med la cir
99b1(1): yang snang // mi bskyod rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs 'byung // rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyang // sems kyi sgyu 'phrul chen po yin// gcig dang du mar mi dmigs te// mngon shes drug gis thams cad byed// bla
99b2(1): ma'i ting 'dzin chen po yis// dkyil 'khor chen po byed par bstan// rgyu lnga rkyen bzhis bsdus pa la// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor che phra bsgom// bzhi yi rim pa tshul bzhin byed// rgyan dang phyag rgya'i tshul rnams
99b3(1): kun// til 'bru'i nang du ri rab bskyed// sangs rgyas stong gi dkyil 'khor dang // stangs dpyal gnyis kyi phyag rgya yang // ri rab til 'bru'i tshul bzhin du// dpe byad rgyan gyis brgyan spras pa'o// nges pas
99b4(1): bzhi bcu rtsa lnga bsgom// dbyings dang ye shes stangs dpyal gnyis// dkyil 'khor kun gyi byed pa po// hoHgzugs ni rnam par snang mdzad de// yul la kun du bzang mo'o hoH// tshor ba rin chen 'byung ldan
99b5(1): te// yul la khams gsum byams ma'o hoH// 'du shes snang ba mtha' yas te// yul la na bza' dkar mo'o hoH// 'du byed don yod grub pa ste// yul la dam tshig sgrol ma'o hoH// rnam shes rdo rje sems dpa'
99b6(1): ste// yul la yangs pa'i spyan can ma hoH// mig la sa yi snying po ste// yul la dkar mo sgeg chen no hoH// sna la nam mkha'i snying po ste// yul la me tog dpa' phreng ma'o hoH// lce la spyan ras dbang phyug
100a1(1): ste// yul la chos kyi dbyangs can no hoH// rna bar phyag na rdo rje ste// yul la las kyi gar mkhan ma'o hoH// kun 'dus sgrib pa rnam sel te// yul la me tog char 'bebs hoH// kun shes kun tu
100a2(1): bzang po ste// yul la gsal ba'i sgron ma'o hoH// gcod shes byams pa'i bdag nyid de// yul la gdug pa'i sprin 'phro hoH// 'jug shes 'jam dpal gzhon nu ste// yul la tsan+dan char 'bebs so// g.yas
100a3(1): gnyis stobs chen khro bo ste// yul la gdong mo 'jigs tshul hoH// g.yon gnyis gshin rje'i gshed po ste// yul la sder 'phro 'jigs tshul hoH// gsang ba rta mgrin dpa' bo ste// yul la dur khrod bdag mo
100a4(1): hoH// lte bar bdud rtsi 'khyil ba ste// yul la gtum mo 'jigs tshul hoH// rgyud drug 'khor ba'i gnas drug tu// thub drug phyag rgya chen po'o// kun tu sku dang kun du gsung // kun du thugs kyi phyag rgya
100a5(1): yang // lus ngag yid la de bzhin hoH// sems nyid sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste// sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul chen po las// dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu lnga// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nges pa las// snying po'i dkyil 'khor bla
100a6(1): ma yin// zhes brjod pas sems can thams cad mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang dbyer med par dgyes te mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings na bzhugs so// gsang ba'i
100b1(1): snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i bla ma las dbyings dang ye shes gnyis su med pa'i ngang du sems kyi rang bzhin cir yang 'grub pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rang
100b2(1): bzhin gcig dang du mar dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin thams cad kyis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad la nyid kyi che ba'i dkyil 'khor bla ma 'di dbyung bar bzhed nas ched du brjod pa 'di gsungs
100b3(1): so// oM ye shes bla ma rol ba yis// phyogs bzhi dbus dang lngar brtags na// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub// rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// kun 'byung dkyil 'khor chen
100b4(1): por spyod// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas// gru chad bzhis brgyan rdo rje'i khyams// kun du gru bzhi sgo khyud ldan// rol mo sna tshogs sprin phung bzhin// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis kyis brgyan// seng ge
100b5(1): glang chen rta dang khyung // nam mkha' lding gi khri chen la// nyi zla pad+ma rin po che// gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa'i tshul// 'khor lo rgyal po rgyal mo dang // g.yas nas mthong thos mnam pa dang // myong dang
100b6(1): btsun mo tshogs su bcas// gru chad la ni gcod byed dang // snang byed sogs byed 'jug byed rnams// btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas par gnas// bar khyams la ni thub drug dag/ rgyud drug sbyong ba'i phyag rgyar
101a1(1): gnas// de bzhin thig le chen po dag/ mdun dang rgyab tu byed pa dag/ bya ba dag ni gnas par bstan// sgo khyud bzhi la 'joms pa dag/ btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas// rdo rje 'khor
101a2(1): lo rin po che// pad+ma'i ral gri nor bu 'bar// ut+pal klu shing la sogs mtshan// mdzes tshul mnyes pa'i yo byad 'dzin// mthing ga dkar po ser le brgan// ljang gu la sogs sna tshogs mdog/ mnyen lhug
101a3(1): 'khril ldem gzhon tshul can// gsal 'tsher lhun sdug gzi byin 'bar// 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs chen po// 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'khrigs pa ste// mtha' dbus med par khyab pa yi// dkyil 'khor bsam yas
101a4(1): lhun gyis grub hoH/ zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa thams cad du dkyil 'khor bla ma chen po brjod kyis mi lang ba zhing gi rdul rnyed du gsal bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin
101a5(1): gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba bla ma 'di sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las 'di dag phyung ngo // a hoHbde mchog ngo mtshar byang chub sems chen
101a6(1): po// thig le mnyam sbyor sgyu 'phrul bla ma'i dbyings// rnam dag thig le byang chub sems kyis rol// ngo mtshar rmad byung bla ma chen po'i dbyings hoH// dmigs bya dmigs byed mi dmigs gsang ba'i
101b1(1): dbyings// ye shes rang rig dkyil 'khor bla ma bsam mi khyab// mnyam dang mi mnyam kun khyab gsang ba'i dbyings// ye shes kun gsal dkyil 'khor spros med bla ma'i ngang // ho rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig
101b2(1): tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po nges pa'i bla ma chen po las dkyil 'khor spros pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas ye shes rgyal po de btsun mo bla ma'i dbyings dang gnyis su med par gyur nas/ bde ba chen po
101b3(1): byang chub kyi sems rim par gsal ba zhes bya ba'i dgongs pa rtser chib nas ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam pa phyogs bcu dus bzhir dgos par bzhed nas sku gsung thugs bla ma'i dbyings nas 'di dag phyung ngo // dang
101b4(1): po bla ma'i lung bstan pa// mtshon du med pa'i byang chub sems// ye shes snying po gsal ba dang // sgom pa rnam gsum dus gcig rdzogs// byang chub sems kyi thig le la// ma bkag lhun gyis rdzogs pas
101b5(1): na// de ni thig le chen po'i don// de ni de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings// de ni kun du snang ba'i ngang // de ni rgyu yi rim par ldan hoH// gsang ba bla ma'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba bla ma'i nges don las// gsang ba gsung
101b6(1): gi dkyil 'khor grags// b+h+rUM bi shra bi shud d+he badz+ra swA hA/ hUM hUM hUM badz+ra tsit+ta oM// a a a badz+ra pa ta sa ma ya oM// hUM badz+ra d+h+r-i ka/ mAM d+ha tu I shwa ri/ oM dzi na dzi ka/ lAM dwe Sha ra ti/ sA rat+na d+h+r-i ka/ mAM mo ha ra ti/ aMHa
102a1(1): dza lika/ bai ra ga ra ti/ ha prar+d+ha d+h+weka/ taM badz+ra ra ti/ k+Shi hi ra dza ya/ hUM la se sa ma ya thAM/ tAM a gar+b+ha ya/ traM mA le sa ma ya / mAhaha pad+ma bar+tha ma/ TAg tir sa/ !dzaM ku ru pa na s+t+rI/ a nr-i tra ra
102a2(1): ga yA mi/ me d+hA ri Ni swA hA/ dzad+b+ha pa pra be sha/ b+h+r-i ni sa ra ma bA ya swA hA/ hAM puSh+pa a be sha/ b+h+yAM sa rA dzA ya swA hA/ baM d+hA paM suk+Sha Ni/ mAM shrI a raM ga ya swA hA/ hoHgar+b+he tsit+ta/ oM mu ne kr-i swA hA/ oM mra ne hUM dr-I swA hA/ oM mra
102a3(1): ne praM swA hA/ oM mra ne sruM swA hA/ oM mu ne k+ShaM swA hA/ oM mu ne ye swA hA/ hAM ya mAn+ta kr-i ta phaT/ oM ma hA badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kr-i d+hi shwa ri dza la ni hUM phaT/ hUM pradz+nyAn+ta kr-i ta phaT/ oM ma hA rat+na d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/
102a4(1): hUM pad+mAn+ta kr-ita hUM phaT/ oM ma hA pad+ma d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri dza la ni hUM phaT/ oM bi g+h+nAn+ta kr-ita hUM phaT/ oM ma hA karma d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri dza la ni hUM phaT/ oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn/ ma ha ka ru Ni ka dr-i sh+ya hoHsa ma ya
102a5(1): s+t+waM/ dzaHhUM baM hoHoM AMHhUM swA hA/ badz+ra sa ma ya/ badz+ra sa ma ya/ badz+ra sa ma ya/ badz+ra sa ma ya/ badz+ra sa ma ya/ oM A~MHhUM swA hA/ oM ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las rmad po che// skyon bral byang
102a6(1): chub sems chen po// de nyid du ni mnyam sbyor bas// phyag rgya bla mar bdag sbyor cig/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ badz+ra sa ma ya hoHdzaHhUM baM hoHzhes gsungs pas gsung gi dkyil 'khor bla ma chen
102b1(1): pos 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du grags/ rab tu grags// kun tu grags so// grags pas snod bcud kyi 'jig rten thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor bla ma chen pos khyab par gyur to// de nas yang
102b2(1): ye shes rgyal po stangs dpyal dag gnyis su med par rol pa mdzad pa bla ma la thim par gyur te/ de nas ye shes rgyal po de nyid dang byin bsdu ba zhes bya ba 'di sku gsung thugs rdo rje las byung ngo // oM chos
102b3(1): dbyings mnyam pa chen po las// ye shes gsal ba rnam par dag/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes kyis// skye med chos la dbang sgyur shog/ oM ma hA gu h+ya ma shA n+ya ta d+harma dz+nyA na swa b+ha ba At+ma ko&haM/ hUM dag cing
102b4(1): gsal ba'i rang bzhin te// skyon med sems nyid rin po che// me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis// srid pa gsum la dbang sgyur shog/ oM ma hA gu h+ya ma hA A daR+sha dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ s+t+waM khams gsum re
102b5(1): skoslong rgyal po ste// yid bzhin rin chen gter gyi mchog/ mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis// 'gro ba re skong rgyal por shog/ oM ma hA gu h+ya ma hA sa man+ta A be sha dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ aM nyes pa'i skyon
102b6(1): bral dri ma med// skye 'gag med pa'i dngos grub ste// so sor rtog pa'i ye shes kyis// srid gsum nyes dmigs sel bar shog/ oM ma hA gu h+ya ma hA pra ti pra be sha dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ ha dbyings kyi
103a1(1): dkyil 'khor mthar phyin cing // grub pa las kyi bye brag las// bya ba nan tan ye shes kyis// skye 'gro dbyings su sgrol bar shog/ oM ma ha gu h+ya ma hA kr-i ta a nuSh+TA na dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko&haM/
103a2(1): a ni stong dang mi stong gnyis// dbu ma la yang mi gnas shing // stong pa chen po'i ye shes kyis// mi 'gyur dbyings la dbang sgyur shog/ oM ma hA gu h+ya ma hA A be sha shu n+ta tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM
103a3(1): bder gshegs sku yi ngo bo las// mi shigs rdo rje rgyal ba'i gtso// sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan pa yis// rdo rje sku yi gtso bor shog/ oM ma hA gu h+ya sarba ta thA ga ta kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ aM bder
103a4(1): gshegs gsung gi ngo bo las// mi shigs rdo rje chos kyi dbyings// sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan pa yis// rdo rje gsung gi ngo bor shog/ oM ma hA gu h+ya sarba ta thA ga ta bA ka badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ hUM bder
103a5(1): gshegs thugs kyi gtso bo las// mi shigs rdo rje rdo rje'i thugs// sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan pa yis// rdo rje thugs kyi byin rlobs shog/ oM ma hA gu h+ya sarba ta thA ga ta tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko&haM/ sraM mi 'gyur
103a6(1): ba yi zhing khams nas// ma bskyed pa yi 'bras bu lags// ma bsags pa yi longs spyod 'byung // cir yang grub pa'i ye shes kyis// rang dbang thabs kyis sgyur bar shog/ sraM ma hA gu h+ya sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pU
103b1(1): dza badz+ra swa b+ha pa At+ma ko&haM/ zhes gsungs pas gsal la 'bar bas thim par gyur to// e ma ngo mtshar rab 'byam gyi// ngo mtshar ya mtshan gsang ba'i chos// sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das// sna tshogs sgra
103b2(1): rnams dbyings su gsal// gsung gcig yan lag dkyil 'khor ni// bsam gyis mi khyab khyab mchog dbyings// thams cad gsung gi phyag rgya mchog hoH// gsang ba'i snying po nges pa'i bla ma chen po las dkyil
103b3(1): 'khor bsdu ba dang gsang sngags kyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas ye shes rgyal po de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yan lag thams cad dkyil 'khor bla mar lhun gyis grub pa'i dgongs pa rtser
103b4(1): chitshib nas rdo rje bla ma'i tshig 'di ched du gsungs so// sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i// thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgya// gsang ba de nyid nges pa yi// snying po phyag rgya 'da' dka'o// mi bskyod nyi ma'i
103b5(1): dkyil yi ge/ rin chen zla ba'i dkyil yi ge/ lnga gnyis zur du spros pa las// sbyar ba'i phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu// hUM dang muM gnyis rtse sbyar te// 'bru brgyad bsnol nas thugs kar bkan// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam
103b6(1): sbyor ba// bde ba chen po sbyin pa'i rgya// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// hUM bsgreng rtse mor rdo rje 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil cing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru bzhi sbas
104a1(1): nas thugs kar bkan// muM bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lngas las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lha// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i lte dbus na// ston pa rdo rje sems
104a2(1): dpa' dag/ yum mchog yangs ma'i spyan dang ni// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// oM bsgreng rtse mor 'khor lo 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil
104a3(1): cing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// laM bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lngas las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lha// shar gyi
104a4(1): 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs nas// bde gshegs rnam par snang mdzad dag/ yum mchog kun tu bzang mo dang // gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// sna rtse 'bar ba
104a5(1): rin po che// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru sbas bzhi nas thugs kar bkan// maM bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lngas las su 'khril// btud
104a6(1): de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lha// lho phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs nas// bder gshegs rin chen 'byung ldan dag/ yum mchog khams gsum byams ma dang // gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// 'bru
104b1(1): sbas bzhi nas thugs kar bkan// AM bsgreng rtse mor pad+ma 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// paM bsgreng rtse mor dril
104b2(1): gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lngas las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lha// nub phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs nas// bde gshegs snang ba mtha' yas dag/ yum mchog na bza' dkar mo
104b3(1): dang // gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// ha bsgreng rtse mor ral gri 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru bzhi
104b4(1): sbas nas thugs kar bkan// tAM bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lngas las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis lta// byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs nas// bde gshegs don
104b5(1): yod grub pa dang // yum mchog dam tshig sgrol ma dang // gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// rin chen myu gu g.yas phyogs na// sgeg cing 'gying ba g.yon phyogs na/ sa snying dkar po rdo rje'i rigs// yum
104b6(1): mchog dkar mo sgeg chen dang // dkyil 'khor bar khyams shar phyogs na// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// ral gri 'byin pa g.yas phyogs na// phreng ba bgrang ba g.yon phyogs na// dkyil 'khor bar
105a1(1): khyams lho phyogs na// nam snying ser po rin chen rigs// yum mchog dpal gyi phreng ba dang // gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// pad+ma dkar po g.yas phyogs na// pi bang 'gyed pa g.yon
105a2(1): phyogs na// dkyil 'khor bar khyams nub phyogs na// spyan ras le brgan pad+ma rigs// yum mchog chos kyi dbyangs mkhan dang // gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// rdo rje rtse lnga g.yas phyogs na// bar gyi
105a3(1): cod pan g.yon phyogs na// dkyil 'khor bar khyams byang phyogs na// phyag na mthing ga las kyi rigs// yum mchog gar gyi cod pan dang // gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// mdzes pa'i klu shing g.yas
105a4(1): phyogs na// bdug spos 'dren pa g.yon phyogs na// dkyil 'khor bar khyams shar lho na// byams pa dkar ser bder gshegs rigs// yum mchog bdug pa'i sprin 'phro dang // gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du
105a5(1): 'khril// gser gyi 'khor lo g.yas phyogs na// me tog 'thor ba g.yon phyogs na// dkyil 'khor bar khyams lho nub na// sgrib sel dmar ser rin chen rigs// yum mchog me tog char 'bebs
105a6(1): dang // gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// rin chen snye ma g.yas phyogs na// sgron ma 'degs pa g.yon phyogs na// dkyil 'khor bar khyams nub byang na// kun bzang dmar ldang las kyi rigs// yum
105b1(1): mchog gsal ba'i sgron ma dang // gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// ut+pal sngon po g.yas phyogs na// tsan+dan 'thor ba g.yon phyogs na// dkyil 'khor bar khyams byang shar na// 'jam dpal dkar ljang
105b2(1): rdo rje'i rigs// yum mchog tsan+dan char 'bebs dang // gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// thub drug phyag rgya chen po ni// rgyud drug gnas nas 'dren pa ste// gseg par phyag rgya tshul 'dzin pas// sku mdog/
105b3(1): ser pos mi rnams 'dren// pi bang phyag rgya tshul 'dzin pas// sku mdog dkar po lha rnams 'dren// go cha mdung thung phyag rgya yis// sku mdog mthing nag lha min 'dren// rin chen 'bar ba'i phyag rgya yis// sku
105b4(1): mdog sngon po yi dwags 'dren// po ti brtsegs pa'i phyag rgya yis// sku mdog ser nag byol song 'dren// me 'bar chu 'bebs phyag rgya yis// sku mdog sngon po dmyal ba 'dren// sgo bzhi phyag rgya tshul gnas
105b5(1): pa// rdo rje gnod pa g.yas phyogs na// lcags kyu 'phen pa g.yon phyogs na// stobs chen khro bo chen po yang // yum mchog rdo rje lcags kyu dang // gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// nr-i mgo gdengs pa
105b6(1): g.yas phyogs na// zhags pa 'phen pa g.yon phyogs na// khro chen gshin rje gshed po yang // yum mchog rdo rje zhags pa dang // gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'khril// sbrul mgo gdengs pa g.yas phyogs na//
106a1(1): lcags sgrog sdom pa g.yon phyogs na// khro chen rta mgrin dpa' bo yang // wam mchog rdo rje lcags sgrog dang // gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du 'brel// rgya gram gnon pa g.yas phyogs na// dril ba
106a2(1): 'khrol ba g.yon phyogs na// khro chen bdud rtsi 'khril pa yang // yum chog rdo rje dril 'khrol dang // byang gi sgo nas dbyings su 'khril// kun bzang mnyam bzhag ye shes 'gro// yum 'gyur mnyam rdzogs pad+ma'i
106a3(1): dkyil// gnyis med dbyings kyi gsang chen sgo// bde mchog ngo mtshar thugs kyi dkyil// spro bsdu rdo rje thal mo dag/ bskur bas rang sems ye shes gsal// de nyid shes rab thabs su rdzogs// rdzu 'phrul dra
106a4(1): pa nges pa'i bla ma chen pa las cag tu spros pa'i le'u gyi lnga pa la// / de nas pa shes rgyal po de rdo rje bkod pa'i gsang ba'i dam tshig rgyan rnam par zlos pa'i dgongs pa la cig char bzhugs te/ rdo rje
106a5(1): gsang ba'i tshig 'di brjod do// shin tu za ba'i ting 'dzin mchog/ dpe dang tshad du mi gzang zhing // gzhal las phyag rgya la sogs te// mtshan du med la snang bar bsgom// shin tu thabs rnam spangs te// rig
106a6(1): pas rgya khyon tshad med pa// gzhal yas phyag rgya la sogs pa'i// mtshon du med la snang bar bsgom// phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa dang // tshogs chen gnyis las 'grub pa yi// 'dod pa lnga yi yon tan
106b1(1): rnams// nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam rdzogs te// rags dang phra dang 'bring la sogs// ji ltar 'dod pa rang gar bya// tsa ka li dang tshon rtsi dag/ bya dang mi bya med pas na// de la dgag par ma gsungs
106b2(1): so// 'gro don 'tsham pa de bzhin te// sna tshogs mchod pas rgyas par mchod// bdag nyid chen pos mchod pa yis// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes// srid gsum 'gro ba ma lus kun// dga' ba chen
106b3(1): pos tshim pa yin// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dgongs pa yis// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus dang // rigs drug 'gro ba mngon du 'gyur// lus ngag sems dang chos thams cad// gang na'ang yod pa ma yin te// rnam
106b4(1): dag ye shes sbyor ba yis// dbyings la dbyings nyid sgom pa yis// kun byas dbang phyug rig pas 'jug/ de nas dad ldan gus 'jug pa// de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des// rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus// bu
106b5(1): dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig/ rab tu gces dang yid 'thad dbul// snying yang yon gyi mchog yin te// bla ma mnyes phyir gus ldan dbul// dbang phyug longs spyod lngas mchod na// dkyil 'khor thams cad mnyes
106b6(1): pa yin// gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor smos ci dgos// skyon rnams ma lus nges par 'byang // dad ldan brtson 'grus bskyed byas na// phan pa'i dbang nod theg tshad sbyin// des na dbang phyug rgyal po yis// dbang
107a1(1): gi rim pa rnams bstan to// 'gro la phan phyir las rnams sbyin// grub pa sa 'dzin rgyal po sbyin// mi 'gyur rab 'byam bde chen no// gang 'dod rim gyis sbyin par bya// blo dang ldan pas theg
107a2(1): tshad nod// yang na sras kyi dam pa ste// chung ma zos par rdzogs dbang sbyin// sems kyi rnam pa nying gu blud// sgo 'byed bde bas gyen du bskyil// de nas dbang phyug chen po des// mi 'gyur sgron mar sku bskyod
107a3(1): cing // sems kyi thig le sgo phye ste// tshangs pa chen po'i dbyangs bzhed nas// go 'byed rdo rje'i ljags brkyang ste// dad ldan skyes bu dbang bskur ba// rdzogs pa chen po'i bde dbang ni// che mchog gong na med pa
107a4(1): na// gsang ba'i dbu rgyan gyi dbang dang // thabs mkhas byin brlabs che bas na// las rnams kun gyi dbang dang ni// khams gsum dbang du bsdus pas ni// slob dpon zhal chab kyi dbang ngo // hUM thabs
107a5(1): mkhas thugs rje'i byin brlabs kyis// rigs kyi bu mchog dbang bskur phyir// gsang ba'i dbu rgyan 'di bcings pas// rigs kyi bu mchog deng phan chad// 'jig rten che ba kun gyi bla// che ba'i che ba zil
107a6(1): gyis gnon// sangs rgyas che ba'i mchod gnas ni// rnal 'byor chen po khyod nyid yin// oM sarba ta thA ga to gu h+ya badz+ra rat+na ma ku Ta twaM traM/ badz+ra gu h+ya sid d+hi hUM/ hUM thabs mkhas byin brlabs chen po ni// sangs
107b1(1): rgyas kun gyi thugs yin te// byin brlabs chen po rnam bzhi po// dbang bskur gnang phyir gtad pas na// rigs kyi bu mchog deng phan chad// sems can kun la snying brtse phyir// mu stegs rtag chad yan chad
107b2(1): nas// sangs rgyas kun gyi mdzad spyod la// khyod kyis mi bya gcig kyang med// rdo rje sems dpa'i spyod pa yis// sems can kun gyi re ba skong // oM sa ma ya gu h+ya e baM ma ya a/ slob dpon zhal chab kyi dbang
107b3(1): ni khams gsum kun la dbang yid bzhin du sgyur te/ hUM nga ni rgyal ba kun gyi bla// thig le byang chub sems chen po// nga ni khro rgyal kun gyi rje// ye shes rol pa'i 'byung gnas gter// nga ni spyi dpal bla na
107b4(1): med// skyon bral thabs kyi rgyal po yin// sems kyi dkyil nas drangs pa'i chu// khyod kyi lce la phab pa 'di// snying gi dkyil du gzung bar byos// rigs kyi bu khyod deng phan chad// rdo rje sems dpa'i thugs
107b5(1): mchog zung // sangs rgyas kun gyi gtso bo yin// byang chub sems dang mnyam pa'i phyir// sems dpa' kun gyi mchod gnas yin// rigs kyi bu khyod deng phan chad// phyi dang nang dang gsang ba yi// bstan pa phyi/
107b6(1): nang zab mo kun// sems kyi dkyil du bsdus nas kyang // rdo rje lce yis sgo phye ste// bdud rtsi sman mchog dam pa 'dis// dad ldan skyes bu ngoms par byos// sems kyi thig le dkyil 'khor du// zhi khro 'byam
108a1(1): pa'i gter sgoms la// srid pa gsum la dbang sgyur cig/ dbang can thams cad bkol bar byos// skye 'gro kun la snying brtse'i phyir// gdul ba'i phyag rgya 'di yang spyod// dug gsum rtsa ba
108a2(1): gcad par byos// phyi nang snod bcud rnam par dag/ rnam dag chen po nyid kyi lam// byed spyod thabs tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa// 'gro don byang chub sems kyi dbyings// sems kyi chu 'di btung bar byos// rnal
108a3(1): 'byor chen pos dam du zung // hUM de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des// mnyam pa'i don la gzhol ba'i phyir// ye shes rgyal pos 'di skad gsungs// snying gi dkyil du rnam sbyang ba// hUM nyid ring pos mtshams sbyar
108a4(1): te// thams cad bde ba chen po'i dbyings// dge sdig las kyis mi bcos shing // sgom dang sgrub pas mi 'byangs pa'i// rnam dag sems nyid rin chen gter// rdo rje snying po ye shes kyis// khro rgyal kun gyi
108a5(1): gtsor gyur cig/ shrI ma hA su kha badz+ra bo d+hi hUM ho// oM aM/ mi 'gyur pa yi ye shes gnas// ma btsal phyin pas bde ba'i mchog/ ma bltas gsal bas ye shes spyan// gong na med pa'i kun gyi rje// ye shes rang
108a6(1): gnas bdal pa la// mi 'gyur g.yung drung sa thob shog/ oM ma hA gu h+ya bruM dz+nyA na maN+Da la// dz+nyA na gu h+ya sid d+hi swa b+hab+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ gzungs dang ting 'dzin stobs dang mi 'jigs pa// 'gyur ba med pa'i sman
108b1(1): mchog thig le lnga// mtshan mchog rdzogs pa chen pos lus brgyan cing // oM sarba ta thA ga to gu h+ya At+ma a b+hi Shiny+tsa ho ha/ khyung gi gshog pa g.yas g.yon gdengs pa yis// klu rnams zil gyis gnon par byed pa
108b2(1): ltar// srid gsum yon tan mchog tu rdzogs pa yi// sangs rgyas kun la mdzes pa'i cod pan mchog/ mchog tu che bas bdud bzhi zil gyis gnon// oM sarba ta thA ga to ma hA gu h+ya badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa ho// hUM bde ba
108b3(1): chen po'i rang gnas la// yes shes rgyal po stangs dpyal du// 'gyur ba med par longs spyod cing // thabs dang shes rab 'phro 'du yis// skye 'gro sras su 'dzin par shog/ oM sarba ta thA ga to gu h+ya a nu rA ga
108b4(1): ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM// dbyings nas nyi shar mkha' la rdzogs sras 'gyur/ rgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma chen po las rdo rje bkod pa gsang ba dam tshig dang dbang sbyin pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas
108b5(1): bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po des thugs rje chen po gdung ba'i dam tshig lu gu rgyud la snyoms par zhugs nas dam tshig stan chen po'i phrin las mdzad do// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i
108b6(1): sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // zhing bcur ldan pa'i longs spyod la// gsung gi 'phro 'du rnam sbyangs te// lnga yi tshom bu yang dag gsal// sgo lnga byin rlabs 'dren pa'i mchog/ ngo mtshar ngan 'gro thar pa'i
109a1(1): lam// gtsug tu snang mdzad sems dpa' che// skur skyed byin rlabs rmad po che// pho nya mang po'i 'phro 'du yis// zhing bcu gnas nas blangs nas su// nyi zla steng du de bzhag ste// shes pa gsum
109a2(1): po dbyings su bstim// rang rgyud 'khor ba'i sa bon las// ljang gu ni ru 'phang bstod de// ni ljang hUM du gnas bsgyur nas// yas 'dus mas 'dus hUM la 'dus// hUM ni bde gshegs ye shes lnga// dkar la
109a3(1): gsal bar skur bskyed de// bde chen 'od zer 'phro bas brjid// rdo rje sngon po rtse lnga pa// yab yum bcu yi byin rlabs nyid// le brgan hUM ni dbyings su sbyor// kun tu bzang mo bde ba'i mkha'// sangs rgyas
109a4(1): sems can gnyi ga'i yum// rdo rje sems dpa' sangs rgyas gtso// sras su gyur pas bde ba'i mchog/ zhing gyur mchog dang mchog phran rnams// gnas ni kun bzang yum gyi mkha'// sa ni rdo rje sems dpa'i
109a5(1): sa/ mi ldog nyi zla'i gdan stengs su// mkhas pas sku yi phyag rgur bskod// mtshan dang dpe byad yang dag ldan// rtag tu skra mchog g.yung drung sbyin// ho rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// de nas ye shes rgyal po
109a6(1): des// gsang mchog bde ba'i mchod sprin gyis// phyogs bcu'i zhing khams rdul snyed na// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rdul phran snyed// de kun gsang mchog mnyes bya'i phyir// nyid kyi gsang ba'i rgyal mo de// 'dzum
109b1(1): pa'i mdangs kyis dbyings su thim// 'khril nas gsang ba'i dgongs pa mdzad// bcwa brgyad phrag gnyis hUM spros pas// klong du hUM chen gcig tu 'khyil// kha dog rnam bzhi yang dag ldan// rigs bzhi lha mo rnam
109b2(1): spros te// stong khams bkang nas mchod pa byed// la la gsang mchog dbyings su 'khril// la la 'dod lnga'i mchod pa byed// rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang // bla re rgyal mtshan 'phan gdugs dang // rin
109b3(1): chen do shal se mo do// dbyibs legs rin chen phung pos mdzes// bsam rdzogs rin chen sdong po yis// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus mchod// la la 'gro ba re ba skong // la la bdud 'dul ngan song
109b4(1): sbyong // kun kyang gsang ba'i mchod 'bul byed// nyid kyi gsang ba'i rgyal mo dang // gnyis su med par 'khril nas su// 'khril nas ga na'i mchod pa byed// stong khams nyungs 'brur gzhug tshul du// ga na'i
109b5(1): mchod pa chen po yis// thams cad mnyes pa chen por gyur// de nas ye shes rgyal po de nyid kyi gsang ba'i rgyal mo dang / gnyis su med par 'khril nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o bde
109b6(1): gshegs spyod pa'i mchog/ sna tshogs spyod la rang bzhin gsang // ma chags pa yi ngo bo las// chags pa chen po'i spyod pa 'byung // spyod pa chen po rnam gnyis la// rtogs nas chags pas su spyod pa// yang dag
110a1(1): chags pa chen po ste// 'di ni tshangs mchog rgyal po yin// sems kyi spyod pa rnam pa gnyis// zhing bcu mnyes pa'i las bya'o// zhes ched du gsungs so// de lta bus phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de
110a2(1): bzhin gshegs pa'i zhing khams kyis bsdus pa thams cad mnyes pa chen pos thim par gyur to// sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma chen po las thugs rje gdung ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs
110a3(1): pa ye shes rgyal po de mchod pa bla ma'i rgyan bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas 'di skad gsungs so// sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i// dkyil 'khor bla ma dgongs pa'i mchog/ bro gar
110a4(1): 'du 'phro'i phyag rgya yis// 'dzul lam nam mkhar 'gro bar nges// glu tshig sgra yi phyag rgya yis// chos kyi sems dpa'i dngos grub len// bza' dang btung ba'i phyag rgya yis// yid bzhin sems dpa'i dngos
110a5(1): grub len// rgyan dang bgo ba'i phyag rgya yis// 'od 'bar bla ma'i dngos grub len// A li ka li'i phyag rgya yis// thams cad grub cing rdo rje nges// rgyu 'bras dbyings su sbyor shes shing // bla ma'i dgongs pa gang
110a6(1): sbyor ba// rig 'dzin rgyal ba'i zhing du nges// skye ba rnam bzhi rgyud sbyangs nas// mtshan rdzogs sa la gdon mi za// zhes gsungs pas tshogs chen po rnam pa gnyis rdzogs par gyur to// de nas nyid kyi bla ma'i
110b1(1): mdzad spyod la dgyes pa chen pos glu 'di blangs so// oM phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi// ye shes dkyil 'khor thig le che// bsod nams dkyil 'khor sku yi tshogs// snang stong thig le kun du rdzogs// ho//
110b2(1): oM rdo rje bsod nams thig le che// rdo rje ye shes dkyil 'khor ldan// rdo rje sgra chen mtha' yas pa// rdo rje rgyal po thig le che// ho/ oM mi dmigs sgyu 'phrul mnyam pa'i dbyings// mtha' yas kun nas sna tshogs
110b3(1): 'phro// mtha' yas kun nas lhun gyis thim// sna tshogs sku gsung thugs chen po// ho// oM sku gsung thugs kyi rdzogs pa che// yon tan phrin las kun tu rdzogs// ye nas lhun rdzogs kun tu bzang // 'dus
110b4(1): pas rdzogs chen thig le che// ho/ oM phyogs bcu 'jig rten rdul snyed du// rgyal ba'i don rnams rdul phran snyed// sprul pa rdul phran bsam yas kyi// skad cig yud la lhun gyis grub// ho/ oM thams cad ma lus
110b5(1): sku gsung thugs// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid che// sku gsung thugs kyi kun tu khyab// sku gsung thugs kyi thig le che// ho/ oM thams cad thig le bla ma'i don// sgyu 'phrul bla ma thig le'i dbyings// dbyings
110b6(1): nyid byang chub sems chen po// snying po bla ma nges pa'i don// thig le gnyis las g.yos pa med// ho/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma chen po las tshogs chen po rnam pa gnyis mnyes pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de
111a1(1): nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes rgyal po de sgyu 'phrul bla ma chen po'i 'jigs pa chen po'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin mngon par 'du mdzad de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag tu lta ba dang / rmongs pa'i
111a2(1): dbang gis gab pa'i gsang ba chen po ni ma rtogs/ sbas pa'i gsang ba la mngon par zhen pas chos mnyam pa nyid kyi don ni phyal bar bor// bram ze'i ngan sngags mang po ni blo'i gdeng du blangs nas snying rje chen
111a3(1): po'i las dang ni bral gnas su ming btags nas zhe sdang sgrol ba'i las ni rgyun du byed/ thabs dang shes rab 'du 'bral med pa'i don ni ma rtogs/ 'dod chags spyod pa'i las dang skad cig tsam yang ma bral//
111a4(1): rang rig pa'i ye shes ni blo la nub/ don dam pa la kun tu gti mug pas ni rgyun du khebs/ sangs rgyas kyi che ba'i yon tan ni ma rtogs/ nga rgyal khengs pa'i dregs pa'i las ni rgyun du byed/ tshad med pa bzhi'i
111a5(1): las dang ni bral/ phrag dog gi tshub mas ni rgyun du khrid de/ bdag tu rmongs pa dang rtog pa la zhen te/ yang dag pa'i mtha' dang bral bas rgyu dang 'bras bu la rmongs te/ srid pa'i sa bon rtsub mos 'phangs nas
111a6(1): mtshams med pa'i sems can dmyal ba rdo rje dmyal ba chen por bskal pa chen po stong phrag drug cur skyes so// de las thar nas nyi tshe ba'i sems can dmyal ba chen por bskal pa chen po drug tu skyes so// las
111b1(1): kyi sgrib pa rtsub mo de las thar te sngon gyi srid pas mtshams sbyar nas yi dgas srin po chen po lus gcig/ mgo bo brgya pa mgo bo sna tshogs pa/ lus brgya pa mgo gcig pa lus dang yan lag mang po 'dug pa
111b2(1): mtshon cha sna tshogs pa thogs shing gdug pa'i rdzu 'phrul mang po ston pas klu'i ris nas 'bras bu che ba man chad dbang du bsdus nas sa bon rtsub mos mang po 'debs so// de nas sngon legs par spyad pa'i
111b3(1): 'bras bus bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyis sku'i dbyibs legs par brgyan pa ye shes phyin ci ma log pa'i spyan gyis gzigs te/ las ngan pa'i srin po de nyon mongs pa'i bag chags sbyang ba dang /
111b4(1): khams gsum gyi sems can bde ba la gzhag pa'i phyir thugs rje chen po'i ye shes skyes nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi bdag po dgyes pa chen po ye shes kyi rgyal po de nyid
111b5(1): 'jigs byed chen po rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor bla ma chen po sprin rnam par spro ba sgyu 'phrul bla ma'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ de bzhin nyid kyi bla ma chen po'i dbyings nas nyid kyi gsang ba'i bdag mo
111b6(1): khro mo'i rgyal mo chen mo mngon du phyung ste/ hi hi zhes dgyes pa'i gzi mdangs kyis pad+ma rgyas par mdzad de/ gnyis su med pa'i dgyes pa chen pos thim nas gsang ba bla ma'i sprin las/ hUM hUM hUM badz+ra dza bi Sha kro d+ha
112a1(1): badz+ra dza la maN+Da la phaT phaT ha la ha la hUM zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad dur khrod bdal ba chen po'i rang bzhin khrag gi rgya mtsho dpa' rlabs 'khrug pa'i dkyil na/ keng
112a2(1): rus chen po ri rab kyi steng na rdo rje me dpung du 'khyil ba'i dbus na 'og rdo rje rgya gram mig mangs ris su bris pa/ phyogs bzhi ngos bzhi 'bar bar khyams gsum rdo rje rin po che'i glo 'bur du mdzes pa/ sgo bzhi
112a3(1): rta babs mu khyud du bcas pa/ rdo rje rin po che rgya gram mthing ga 'bar ba'i rtsig pa dra ba ris su brtsigs pa/ steng yid bzhin gyi rin po che 'bar ba/ rdo rje rgya gram 'bar ba'i bla re mig mangs su bris pa/ rtse mo
112a4(1): dbyibs bla mas 'og min gyi gnas na srid pa'i rtse mo man chad bum pa'i tshul du dbyibs rdo rje rgya gram mig mangs gcig tu 'khyil pa/ ye shes rdo rje rgya gram gyi cho 'phrul bla ma'i 'od 'bar bas phyogs bzhir
112a5(1): 'phros shing 'khrugs pas khams gsum thams cad bdal ba/ rgyal mtshan bla ma chen po dang / ru mtshon bla ma chen pos phyogs bzhi gra bzhi nas bsgreng ba/ gsang ba bla ma'i rtsig pas phyi rim bskor ba/ rdo rje rin
112a6(1): po che'i phyi rol gyi shing ljon pa bla mas phyogs mtshams gtibs pa/ phyi dang nang med pa kun du yang bla ma chen po'i nang du gyur pa/ khams gsum thams cad rdo rje ra ba'i rtsig pa 'chor ba med pa'i gzhal yas
112b1(1): khang na khro bo dang khro mo'i rol pa'i phyag rgya stong gi 'jig rten rdul phra mo snyed 'thon par gyur to// de nas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du 'ur 'ur dang chem chem dang / shig shig dang / thor thor dang /
112b2(1): gtogs shig dang / choms shig dang / sod cig dang / drol zhig dang / sbyongs shig la sogs pas 'jig rten na dbang che zhing dpa' brtul che zhing brtul zhugs can rnams brgyal bar gyur to// de nas dgyes
112b3(1): pa chen pos ye shes rgyal po de nyid dur khrod bla ma chen por dgyes nas khrag gi rgya mtsho'i dkyil keng rus chen po'i ri rab kyi steng na rdo rje me dpung 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na rdo rje ye shes kyi 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi
112b4(1): pa la nyid kyi gsang ba'i rgyal mo dang mchod pa bla ma chen po mdzad de gnyis su med pa'i dbyings nas 'di phyung ngo // hUM badz+ra du tri nan sUr+ya tsan+d+ra pad+ma maN+Da la de ba tiSh+Tha naM zhes brjod pas ye shes rin po che'i 'khor
112b5(1): lo rtsibs bzhi pa 'od 'bar ba'i steng du dur khrod gdug pa'i tshogs seng ge la sogs pa bla ma chen po'i khri btsugs te/ gdan bla ma nyi zla dang pad+ma spel bar bting ba'o// de nas cho 'phrul bla ma chen pos btul
112b6(1): pa/ bsam gtan bla ma chen po sbags pa tshad med pa/ dmigs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i ye shes bla ma chen pos dregs pa thams cad dus gcig tu btul ba'i snam rten bla ma chen po la mtshon pa dang /
113a1(1): dmigs pa'i yul las 'das pa'i phyag rgya bla ma 'od 'bar ba bzhugs pa ni bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po chen po sku mthing nag cir yang 'gyur ba/ rdo rje ljags kyis gsung 'brug stong gi sgra
113a2(1): sgrogs pas stong khams thams cad dus gcig tu 'jig pa/ ye shes me'i thugs kyis snang srid kyi bud shing dus gcig tu bsregs pa/ steng 'og med par kun tu skyi bung zhes byed pa/ dbu dgu phyag bcwa brgyad
113a3(1): pa/ zhabs rnam pa brgyad du gtams pa/ phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa/ dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ spyan 'bar ba nyi shu rtsa bdun mnga' zhing rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje mthing ga
113a4(1): khyung gi gshog pas 'jig rten gyi khams yog par bkab pa/ khros pa'i rgyal mo mthing nag 'bar ba dang gnyis su med par bzhugs so// gnyis su med pa'i dbyings nas shar phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs
113a5(1): stengs la khri dang nyi zla'i steng du ma ha de ba dang / 'dod pa'i lha gan rkyal du brtul ba'i steng du nyid kyi gzugs kyi phung po de bcom ldan 'das bud+d+ha he ru ka/ sku mdog ser nag dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir
113a6(1): gyur pa dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o// phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa'o// bder gshegs khros pa'i rgyal mo dang 'khril ba chen po'i tshul du bzhugs so// lho phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs la
113b1(1): khri dang nyi zla'i gdan stengs su gshin rje gan rkyal du bsgyel ba'i gdan la nyid kyi tshor ba'i phung po las bcom ldan 'das rat+na he ru ka sku mdog sngo nag dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur pa/ mtshon cha sna
113b2(1): tshogs 'dzin pa/ dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che khros pa'i rgyal mo dang 'khril ba chen po'i tshul gyis bzhugs so// nub phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs la khri dang nyi zla'i steng du chu bdag gi rgyal
113b3(1): po dang 'khor lo nag po b+h+r-ing gi ri ti gan rkyal du bsgyel ba'i gdan la nyid kyi 'du shes kyi phung po de bcom ldan 'das pad+ma he ru ka sku mdog dmar nag dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur pa/ mtshon cha sna
113b4(1): tshogs 'dzin pa/ dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o// pad+ma khros pa'i rgyal mo dang 'khril ba'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o// byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs la khri dang nyi zla'i gdan stengs su gnod sbyin stobs
113b5(1): bzangs gan rkyal du bsgyel ba'i gdan la nyid kyi 'du byed kyi phung po de bcom ldan 'das karma he ru ka sku mdog ldang nag dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad par gyur pa/ mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa ste/
113b6(1): dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ las mchog khros pa'i rgyal mo dang 'khril ba chen po'i tshul gyis bzhugs so// de nas dreg pa chen po la sogs pas gdug pa'i sems kyis gtum pa'i rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs
114a1(1): bstan pas mgrin gcig tu 'dug pa'i nga ros gtum pa'i brlang tshig tu smras pa/ zong zong snying rje'i bdag po ci 'di ltar byed dam zhes zer zhing shin tu gtum pas rngam mo// de nas bcom ldan
114a2(1): 'das dgyes pa chen pos ye shes rgyal po de nyid sku gzi brjid chen po'i mdangs su gyur te/ thugs rje chen pos 'dul ba'i thabs kyis sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i gsang sngags bla ma'i rngam pa'i gdangs skad chen po 'di
114a3(1): dag phyung ngo // hUM hUM hUM/ ha ha ha/ khA hi khA hi khA hi/ zhes brjod pas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i gdug pa'i tshogs de dag gi snying dang dbang po kun phyung nas nang grol kun drangs yan lag kun bcad
114a4(1): btubs te sha zos/ khrag 'thungs rus pa kun 'chos so// de nas 'jigs byed chen po de nyid kyis hUM hUM hUM b+h+yo e a ra li dzA dzA zhes brjod pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha' dang bcas pa
114a5(1): yungs 'bru gcig tsam du chud par bsdus so// de nas 'byung po ma rungs pa thams cad kyi rje bo'i yang rje bo// dregs pa chen po la sogs pa'i chung ma 'byung mo thams cad kyi rje mo'i yang rje mo// srin mo chen mo
114a6(1): mi srun mo dang / tshangs ma dang / khro mo dang / dbang mo dang / 'jug sred mo dang / gzhon nu mo dang / dmar po dang / bdud rtsi mo dang / zhi ba mo dang / be chen mo dang / srin mo dang / za ba mo dang / dga' ba mo
114b1(1): dang / ra ro khrag 'thung mo dang / gcig pu spyod ma dang / yid 'phrog ma dang / grub mo dang / rlung mo dang / gsod byed mo dang / me mo dang / phag mo dang / rgan byed mo dang / sna chen mo dang / chu lha mo dang / nag
114b2(1): mo chen mo dang / ra mgo dmar ser chen mo dang / bum sna sngo nag chen mo dang / gsus 'dzin sngo nag chen mo la sogs pa dang / yang bran dang / g.yog dang / yang g.yog la sogs pa 'khor zhing gi rdul kyang
114b3(1): bsdus so// de nas yang dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal po de nyid dgyes pa bla ma'i gsang ba chen po sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mngon par 'du mdzad de sku gsung thugs bla ma las 'di dag phyung
114b4(1): ngongo// oM AHhUM/ badz+ra pad+ma pra be sha pad+ma hUM a la la ho zhes brjod pas 'byung po ma rungs pa thams cad shin tu chags pa'i yid g.yos nas gsang ba rgyas par byas nas khab len gyi rdo la lcags 'du ba'i tshul du
114b5(1): bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po'i sku la mi srun mo la sogs pa brgyad 'khril lo// bcom ldan 'das ser nag chen po'i sku la tshangs ma la sogs pa lnga 'khril lo// bcom ldan 'das sngo nag chen po'i sku la
114b6(1): bdudad rtsi mo la sogs pa lnga 'khril lo// bcom ldan 'das dmar nag chen po'i sku la khrag gis myos ma la sogs pa lnga 'khril lo// bcom ldan 'das ljang nag chen po'i sku la me mo la sogs pa lnga 'khril
115a1(1): lo// de nas dgyes pa chen po de dag gis hUM zhes brjod pas pad+ma'i tshogs bsdus te shin tu bcum par gyur to// de nas dgyes te ha ha zhes brjod pas nyid kyi shes pa'i tshogs rnam par shes pa
115a2(1): brgyad las dkar po la sogs pa brgyad rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas te 'thon par gyur to// 'thon nas kyang 'khor lo 'bar ba'i phyi rol shar phyogs nas 'khor bar khro bo'i gzugs kyis snying rje
115a3(1): 'jigs tshul gyis stan la gnas so// de nas dgyes te he zhes brjod pas nyid kyi shes pa'i yul brgyad las seng gdong chen mo la sogs pa brgyad rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas te 'thon nas yang 'khor
115a4(1): lo 'bar ba'i bar khyams su snying rje 'jigs pa'i tshul gyis stan la shin tu rngam pa'i stabs kyis gnas so// de nas dgyes te phaT ces phyogs bcu'i zhing ma lus par bsgrags pas phyogs bcu'i zhing ma lus pa
115a5(1): na 'gro ba rnams kyi don ma lus par mdzad pa thub pa chen po drug bcom ldan 'das drug 'gro ba rnams kyi don mdzad cing 'gro ba drug 'dul ba dang / yid chos dbyings nas rol te sgor byed nyi zer zhags pa
115a6(1): can la sogs pa brgyad du gyur te// 'bar ba'i bar khyams gsum pa la zhing skam gsher spel ba'i gdan stengs su rang gi lag cha dang shin tu rngam pa'i stabs kyis shar phyogs nas 'khor bar gnas so// de
115b1(1): nas dgyes te phaT ces brjod pas nyid kyi phyin ci log bzhi las rdo rje srings 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi rang rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas nas dkyil 'khor 'bar ba chen po'i sgo bzhir snying rje 'jigs
115b2(1): tshul gyi stan la shin tu rngam pa'i gzugs kyis thabs dang shes rab kyi tshul du gnas so// de nas dgyes pa chen po'i sprin las/ bud+d+ha rol pa'i phyag rgya bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis dus gcig tu phaT ces brjod
115b3(1): pas thams cad khros nas 'byung mo thams cad kyang rang gi gnas su yud tsam gyis phyin par dgye'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung chen po de nyid thugs rje chen pos bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i
115b4(1): dgongs pa cig char zhugs te sku gsung thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo // oM badz+ra a mr-i ta ma hA kro d+hi aM aM zhes brjod pas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung chen po'i
115b5(1): snam logs nas 'thon to// 'dam khu blud de dran pa rnyed do// de nas khrag 'thung chen po de dag kun ya mtshan chen por gyur te cho 'phrul chen po mdzad pa mthong ngo // de dag gi dus su 'jig rten drug na gnas
115b6(1): pa'i dregs pa chen po rnams dus gcig tu btul bar mthong ste/ shin tu zhum zhing breng nas mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ 'bangs su mchi 'bangs su mchi// 'bangs su nan tan ma bgyis na// mgo dang lus kyang
116a1(1): brgyar 'gas shing // snying yang gas shing gtubs gyur cig/ rul myags tshig nas rlag pa dang // dmyal bar lhung nas 'bod par shog/ ces 'bangs su mchi bar rang rang gis dmod btsugs
116a2(1): so// de nas de dag kun dkyil 'khor gyi gdan du bzhag go/ de nas yang de thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ rang rang gi chung ma dang / bu mo dang / rang rang gi ma dang / sring mo rnams dkyil 'khor du
