145a6(1): 'khor thams cad mchod pa yin// nye ba'i dkyil 'khor smos ci dgos// nyes pa thams cad dag par 'gyur// dad brtson brtul zhugs rab rtog nas// phan pa'i dbang sbyin nus pa'i dbang // rim pa bzhin
145b1(1): du sbyin par bya// snying rjes chud ma zos par gzung // yang na thal mo rab bsnol nas// phyag rgya chen po'i 'phang du ni// dkyil 'khor mdzub gang tshad du bya// mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du bya// yang na sa gzhi rab
145b2(1): mnyam la// dkyil 'khor khru gang tshad du bya// yang na lus gang tshad du ste// yang na lus ni gsum gyi tshad// phur bu srad bu tshon phye dang // gos rgyan mdzes pa'i yid 'ong grogs// thig gdab cho ga phun sum
145b3(1): tshogs// mkhas ldan chen pos bsgrims te bya// yang na khru ni bcu drug dang // nyi shu'am nyi shu rtsa lngar bya// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor lnga rnams bsgom// sku gsung thugs ldan gzugs kyang dgod// yang na rgyang
145b4(1): grags dpag tshad tsam// nam mkha'i dbyings ni bsam yas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sna tshogs bsgom// ma mthong rmongs la bstan phyir mtshon// kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga'am// lnga yi tshon gyis bri bar
145b5(1): bya// 'dul ba'i cho ga bzhin du bgyi// ting 'dzin rol mo mtha' yas mchog/ yi ge'am brda'am snying po'am// phyag rgya'am sku gsung thugs ldan par// byin brlabs ya mtshan rmad po che// 'grub 'gyur sangs
145b6(1): rgyas kun gyi dam// sa la sogs la phyag rgyar byas// rnam grol rim pa thob par 'gyur// dag pa'i ye shes kyis sbyangs na// smos ci dgos te de nyid yin// phyogs dus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid che// mi
146a1(1): dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nas// dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang ngo // rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la// 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor bas// phyogs dus kun nas gshegs
146a2(1): pa yi// bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs// nye bar gyur pa'i dam tshig mchog/ dpag bsam shing dang yid bzhin gyi// rin po che dang 'byung ba kun// de dag rdzas yod ma yin te// rang sems bsod
146a3(1): nams brtan pa yin// ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rmad po che// gzhan nas yod 'ongs ma yin te// thabs la brten pa'i shes rab nyid// de lta bu yi ngang du byung // shes rab dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid// thabs kyi phyag
146a4(1): rgyar gyur pa'i phyir// ye shes la ni ye shes rol// ye shes rol pa nyid kyang gsog/ rgyal ba mngon byung skyob pa dang // byin brlabs ston pa'ang de bzhin te// bya byed nus pa'i gzi byin gyis// sgyu ma rdo rje
146a5(1): btsan po mchog/ cho ga lnga ni rdzogs byas shing // yo byad lnga ni rdzogs par ldan// sngags kyi yan lag lnga rdzogs pas// ma nyams 'jug la rab brtson pas// zhag ni sum cu phrag drug gam// bcu gnyis bcu
146a6(1): bzhi bcu drug gis// dbang bsgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub// de tshe bcu drug tshun chad kyis// sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs pa ni// ye shes thig le de nyid la// ye shes thig le nyid snang ba// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha'
146b1(1): las mchog/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i// zhing khams rnam dag bsam las pa// rgya dang bral ba'i gzhal yas khang // 'khor lo'i rgyan dang rol mo'i tshogs// dkyil 'khor ma lus bsam yas
146b2(1): kun// mthong nas nye bar mnyes pa dang // rgya chen gsung las don 'byung ba// mthun pa'i shes rab snang ba'o// gcig dang du mar bral ba yi// mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid// sangs rgyas kyis kyang mi
146b3(1): gzigs te// rang 'byung ye shes gnas med snang // log par rtog brtags rnam dag cing // ye shes dbyings las mi gzhan phyir// thugs rje chen pos 'brel pas na// 'gro drug dus gnas ma lus
146b4(1): sdang // bde ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor na// stangs dpral gnyis sam yang na lnga// byas te dad ldan rab zhugs na// 'dod pa'i yid 'ong mnyam par 'gyur// skal ba mnyam pa'i ye shes de// gnyer na nye bar
146b5(1): 'byung ba yin// sa mtshan chen po 'byung bar nges// dad med khams na phreng bar 'gyur// zhes tshad du brjod do// gsang ba'i snying pa de kho na nyid nges pa las rdo rje bkod pa gsang ba dam tshig gi le'u kye dag
146b6(1): pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos rgyal po sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya las// bde ba
147a1(1): 'bru tshogs gsal ba'i rgyun// rdo rje'i lam nas pad+mor bskyil// rtsa nas bstim zhing dkyil 'khor bskur// nyan byed 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// gsal ba thig le'i ngo bo nyid/ tAM gi phyag rgya'i
147a2(1): tshogs mchog las// rin chen dkyil 'khor gsal sgro thim// gsang ba gsang chen gsang mchog las// gsang ba kun la mnyan par bya// gsang ba'i don nyid brtag pa las// gzhan du smra bar bya ba
147a3(1): yin// gsal ba'i 'khor lo gzhal yas su// gsal ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid// yi ge phreng ba'i tshogs mchog las// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal sgro bstim// oM dus gsum rgyal ba'i sras chen po// sku
147a4(1): gsung thugs kyi rdo rje zung // rgyal ba thams cad mnyes mchod la// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// lag pa'i 'khor lo gzhal yas su// gsal ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid// hUM gi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog
147a5(1): las// las kyi dkyil 'khor gsal spro thim// oM khyod ni rdo rje las yin gyis// las rnams ma lus kun gyis shig/ pho nya mang po'i 'du 'phro kun// khyod kyi dgos pa byed pa yin// smra byed 'khor lo'i gzhal
147a6(1): yas su// gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid// hrI yi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal sgro thim// oM chos kyi bdud rtsi bla med kyis// dad ldan skyes bu ngoms par byos// rab 'bring tha
147b1(1): ma'i blo can la// mthun pa'i gsang bsgrags gzhan du min// bskyod chen 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid// hUM oM swA AMHhA rnams las// dkyil 'khor lnga dang khro phreng bsgom// oM
147b2(1): phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje che// dkyil 'khor kun gyi byed pa po// dkyil 'khor kun gyi sbyin pa spyod// slob dpon mnyes par ma byas shing // dbang rnams thob par ma byas
147b3(1): par// nyan pa la sogs rtsom pa rnams// 'bras bu med cing rlag par 'gyur// dbu rgyan cod pan phreng ba dang // go cha rgyal mtshan phyag rgya dang // gdugs dang bum pa bza' btung dang // snying po lnga yis dbang
147b4(1): bskur na// dus 'di phyin cad rgyal ba'i sras// ngan song thams cad med pa dang // tshe ring bde skyid phun sum tshogs// mtho ris thar pa'i bdag por 'gyur// zhes brjod do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid
147b5(1): nges pa las dbang sbyin pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyal po sbyar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa
147b6(1): 'di brjod do// rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul// byin gyis brlabs dang mngon sum par// rab tu rtogs pa rnam bzhi yis// thams cad mngon rdzogs rgyal po che// yan lag dbang po rnam shes kun// rnam
148a1(1): smin oM du shes par bya// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom// yang na khros pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// gzugs sgra dri ro reg la sogs// rnam smin mAM du shes par bya// yum gyi dkyil 'khor
148a2(1): nyid du bsgom// yang na khro mo'i dkyil 'khor sgom// gos rgyan bza' btung glu dang tshig/ bro gar tshogs kyi sprin phung gis// hUM du shes pas rab spyad na// ngo mtshar 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor mnyes// lha mo klu mo
148a3(1): rigs ngan mo// dbye'am yang na mi dbye bar// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen po// sgrub pa dang ni sgrub chen po// yum gyi pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor spro// sangs rgyas sprin tshogs ma lus
148a4(1): la// dgyes mnyam tshogs kyi sbyin pas bstim// bsgrub pa'i nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor de// dkyil 'khor rdo rje lce yis blang // mkha' 'gro gsal 'bar tshe la sogs// yid bzhin sprin gyi bdag por 'gyur// zhing
148a5(1): 'gyur mchog dang mchog phran rnams// nyi zla'i steng du mkhas pas bzhag/ nga rgyal lag gi 'du byed bsgom// hUM du gyur pas rnam par dag/ dbyings su thim nas phyag rgyar 'bar// skur 'gyur 'od zer 'phro bas
148a6(1): brjid// gtsug tu rnam par rgyal ba sgom// ngo mtshar ngan 'gro thar pa'i thabs// ye shes skye med de bzhin nyid// sgyu mar snang ba mig yor tshul// sbyor sgrol bya ba kun byas kyang // rdul cha tsam yang gos pa
148b1(1): med// snod bcud rgyu rnams dag rtogs shing // mnyam gnyis lhag pa'i mnyam gnyis kyis// dkyil 'khor kun du bzang po'i zhing // byed spyod tshogs chen gnyis gyur nas// yan lag ma nyams yo byad
148b2(1): ldan// cho ga rdzogs par shes pa yis// rnal 'byor tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// nges par legs pa'i dgos pa 'grub// lnga dang lnga yi sbyor ba yis// tshom bu lnga yi lha bkod la// khro bo bcu dang khro mo
148b3(1): bcu// 'khor lo'i tshul du rnam par bsgom// de bzhin rigs dang rdo rje'i rigs// pad+ma'i rigs te sku gsung thugs// khro bo'i tshogs dang ldan pa yi// tshom bu gsum gyi lha rnams bsgom// rigs kyi rigs te
148b4(1): rigs kyi mtsho// thugs kyi thugs te thugs kyi mchog/ khro bo'i tshogs dang ldan pa yi// tshom bu gcig pa'i lha rnams bsgom// khro bo khro mo'i tshogs chen dang // pho nya phyag brnyan bka' nyan tshogs// ci bgyi la
148b5(1): sogs tshogs rnams kyis// dngos grub las rnams rdzogs par byed// rnal 'byor sngags 'chang dngos grub ni// mnyam rdzogs lhun grub dang gnas shing // spyod pa ci la'ang thogs med pa// thams cad ye nas
148b6(1): dbyer med pa'o// rdo rje rigs su thams cad dkyil// 'od 'phro 'bar bar rab tu bsgom// chags med tshul du bstim par bya// gnyis med gyur nas phyag rgya che// yang na sku gsung thugs nyid de// thams cad
149a1(1): ma lus sku gsung zugs// ting 'dzin gsal bar 'od zer 'phro// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du thim// rig 'dzin dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur// dkyil 'khor ma lus 'bar bar
149a2(1): 'grub// nyon mongs sdug bsngal sel bar byed// rdo rje rigs su skye ba'i gnas// sngags 'chang dngos grub yang dag ni// thabs dang shes rab thams cad kyis// dkyil 'khor lnga dang khro phreng bsgom// chags
149a3(1): pa med pa'i tshul gyis su// 'od zer rnam pa mang po 'phro// gnyis su med par bstim par bya// dngos grub mchog gi snying po 'grub// rnal 'byor thabs dang shes rab kyis// de bzhin gshegs dang yum du
149a4(1): bsgom// sems dpa' sems ma nyid du bsgom// so so'i sngags dang phyag rgya dang // ting 'dzin yang dag so sor gsal// gnas dang longs spyod ci bde dang // ma nyams blo ni rab ldan pas// dang po dam
149a5(1): mnos bzhin du bya// le lo sgyid snyom med pa yis// the tshom med par bsgrub byas na// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje gsang mchog dam pa thob// bsgrub pa'i zhag dang tshes grangs ni// rgyud
149a6(1): las smos pa bzhin du bshad// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// zhes de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du gleng ngo // gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi
149b1(1): le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos rol mo'i sprin rnam par spros te/ rgyan bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// sku
149b2(1): 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i// dkyil 'khor brtan pa'i ting nge 'dzin// bro gar phyag rgya'i 'du 'phro yis// 'dzul lam nam mkhar 'gro bar 'gyur// glu tshig sgra yi phyag rgya yis// chos kyi dngos grub thob par
149b3(1): 'gyur// rgyan dang bgo ba'i phyag rgya yis// 'bar ba'i rgyal po thub med 'grub// bza' dang btung ba'i phyag rgya yis// yid bzhin sku dang bdud rtsi 'grub// A li kA li'i phyag rgya yis// thams cad thams cad
149b4(1): 'grub par 'gyur// shes 'jug mtshan nyid 'byor pa'i gzugs// 'bras bu smin byed rgyu dang rkyen// nus mthu can du gang gyur pa// rig 'dzin rgyal ba'i zhing du grags// mi dang lha dang tshangs pa yi// skye ba rnam
149b5(1): dag 'dzin mod kyang // khyad par sa la gnas 'gyur yin// pha rol phyin pa kun tu rdzogs// thabs dang shes rab thabs kyi mchog/ shes rab mchog gi mchog 'gyur ba// sa yi khyad par bcu dang gsum// rgyu
149b6(1): 'bras khyad par lhun gyis rdzogs// mkha' dkyil dag pa'i dbyings nyi zla// ye shes rgyal po stangs dpyal bsgom// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas kun// ma lus par gyi bsgom par 'gyur// dus bzhi
150a1(1): phyogs bcu gang nas kyang // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnyed mi 'gyur// sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te// sangs rgyas gzhan nas ma tshol cig/ dkyil 'khor kun tu rab sbyor bas// dkyil
150a2(1): 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// cho ga lhag gam ma tshang yang // skyon nyid dag ste nyes pa med// ces ched du brjod pas rol mo'i sprin gyis mnyes par gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa
150a3(1): las tshogs bsgrub pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad gcig tu 'dus
150a4(1): nas// dgyes pa chen pos chos thams cad ye nas rdzogs pa chen por lhun gyis grub pa'i dam tshig shin tu gsang ba'i snying po sprin bkod pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di
150a5(1): brjod do// ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs// phyogs rtogs yag dag nyid ma rtogs// 'dul ba dgongs pa gsang ba dang // rang bzhin gsang ba'i don rnams ni// yi ge sgra rtags ming tshogs las// brten
150a6(1): pa'i tshig gis rab mtshon te// khong nas gab sbas don 'byin pa// ston pa rdo rje'i thugs la gnas// dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom// dkyil 'khor
150b1(1): dkyil 'khor las byung ba// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog/ gsang ba'i thig le dkyil 'khor dbyings// 'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum// chen po rigs kyi de bzhin te// byang chub sems ni rdo
150b2(1): rje'i tshogs// dbang po yul dus rig pa rnams// kun du bzang po'i dkyil 'khor la// bdag nyid chen po lhag pa yis// thugs kyi ye shes lngas bltas shing // snying po thig le mnyam sbyor ba// bde ba'i ye
150b3(1): shes rol mo yis// ye shes dgyes la mchod pa dbul// zag pa med pa'i bsod nams kyis// ye shes sgyu mar rang snang ba'i// rol mo dkyil 'khor mtha' yas mchog/ gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi
150b4(1): dbyings// de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i// sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs// ma lus bdag nyid zhal mthong ba'i// dbang sgyur mchog nyid dam pa yin// dkyil
150b5(1): 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor nyid// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// rgyan du dkyil 'khor ma lus thogs// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor las// thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor yongs kyis
150b6(1): 'byung // phyogs dus dkyil 'khor 'dul ba'i mchog/ sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor sgrol ba yis// bya byed med par dkyil 'khor spyod// ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// thos bsam bsgom la mnyam sbyor gyis//
151a1(1): rang byung kun ngom lhun gyis grub// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// 'da' bar mi mdzad dam tshig mchog/ gang zhig 'di la mos 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad
151a2(1): kyis// phyogs dus kun nas thams cad du// dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yi// nye ba'i sras su dgongs par 'gyur// bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du// shin tu sbyangs la rab gnas pa'i// dkyil 'khor ma
151a3(1): lus bsnyen pa yi// 'bras bu gsang chen 'di yin te// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na// 'das dang da ltar byung ba yi// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa// brnyes nas sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs// 'byung dang ma
151a4(1): 'ongs thams cad kun// 'di yis lhun gyis grub par 'gyur// 'di ni gsang chen nges pa yi// 'bras bu lam du 'gyur ba yin// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la// 'di las gsang ba'i nges don
151a5(1): med// btsal kyang rgyal bas mi brnyes so// kun gyi phyag rgya chen po'i mchog/ thos bsam bsgom la rab sbyangs pa'i// shes rab mig ldan rnams kyis gzung // snod ldan ngang tshul bzang la brtan// lus dang
151a6(1): longs spyod gtong la sbyin// gzhan du nam yang sbyin mi bya// rmongs la phyar bas gal te byin// dus min par ni srog zad nas// bsregs dang sbrebs par yun ring gnas// zhes de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de
151b1(1): bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las shin tu gsang ba man ngag gi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid kyi dkyil
151b2(1): 'khor la dgyes pa chen po'i glu 'di blangs so// oM phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi// ye shes dkyil 'khor thig le che// bsod nams dkyil 'khor sku yi tshogs// snang stong thig le kun du rdzogs hoH// oM rdo/
151b3(1): rje bsod nams thig le che// rdo rje ye shes dkyil 'khor ldan// rdo rje sgra chen mtha' yas pa// rdo rje rgyal po thig le che hoH// oM sku gsung thugs kyi rdzogs pa che// yon tan phrin las kun tu rdzogs// ye nas
151b4(1): lhun rdzogs kun tu bzang // 'dus pa'i tshogs chen thig le che hoH// oM mi dmigs sgyu 'phrul mnyam pa'i dbyings// mtha' yas kun nas sna tshogs 'phro// mtha' yas kun nas lhun gyis thim// sna tshogs sku
151b5(1): gsung thugs chen po hoH// oM phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rdul snyed du// rgyal ba'i don rnams rdul phran snyed// sprul pa rdul phran bsam yas kyis// skad cig yud la lhun gyis grub hoH// oM thams cad ma lus sku
151b6(1): gsung thugs// sku gsung thugs kyi bdag nyid che// sku gsung thugs kyis kun tu khyab// sku gsung thugs kyi thig le che hoH// zhes ched du bsgrags so// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las mnyes pa'i
152a1(1): le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid kyis khro bo'i dkyil 'khor du mngon par 'du mdzad do// de ci'i phyir zhe
152a2(1): na/ bdag tu rmongs pa'i rtog pa dang / brtags pa la mngon par zhen pas yang dag pa'i lam dang bral ba dag/ gab pa'i gsang ba ma rtogs par sbas pa'i gsang ba la mngon par 'chel nas// rgyu dang 'bras bu
152a3(1): la rmongs pas srid pa'i sa bon rtsub mos 'phangs nas mtshams med pa'i rab tu tsha ba'i dmyal bar skyes so// de rab tu tsha ba'i sdug bsngal drag pos gdungs pa dang / 'di bas shin tu grang yang ci ma rung snyam
152a4(1): pa'i mod la rab tu sbrebs pa dang // pad+ma ltar gas pa'i sdug bsngal drag po dag gis rab tu nyen pa/ de lta bu'i sdug bsngal rab tu tsha ba la sogs pa brgyad dang / shin tu grang ba la sogs pa brgyad du 'jig
152a5(1): rten gyi khams brgyud cing bskal pa chen po stong phrag bcu gnyis su nyams su myong ngo // de nas rnam par smin pa de zad pa dang yi dwags ltogs pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa dang / 'dod pa'i dngos
152a6(1): po rnams yid du mi 'ong ba dang // gdug cing rtsub pa'i dngos po sna tshogs su gyur pa dang / yong med par yang gyur cing shin tu rid cing skams pa dang / lus dang yan lag dang / dbang po mi 'tsham par gyur pa/
152b1(1): bskal pa chen po drug tu skyes so// de nas las kyi sgrib pa rtsub mo'i rnam par smin pa de khad kyis bsrabs pa dang sngon gyi srid pas mtshams sbyar nas// yi dwags srin po rab tu gdug pa gtum po lus gcig la
152b2(1): mgo brgya pa dang / mgo sna tshogs pa dang / lus brgya la mgo gcig pa dang / lus sna tshogs pa dang / yan lag mang po dang / yan lag sna tshogs pa dang / gdug pa'i lag cha sna tshogs thogs pa dang / 'khor
152b3(1): rab tu mang po dang // 'jigs pa'i gzugs sna tshogs dang / 'jigs pa'i nga ro sgra skad sna tshogs pa sgrogs pa dang / gzugs dang / nga ro dang / dri dang / kha rlangs kyis thams cad skyi bung zhes byed pa dang /
152b4(1): rab tu 'jigs pa'i rlung nag dang / grang ba dang / tsha ba'i dbugs kyis phyogs bcu kun du khams 'khrug par byed pa/ nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhis 'debs par byed pa/ myos shing nyams par byed pa'i mthus klu'i

159b1(1): sha chen// dag pa'i snod bcud mi dor ro// yan lag bcu yi dam tshig ste// ye nas dag mnyam rtogs pas spyad// bsrung zhing bsgrub pa'i dam tshig lnga// rtsa ba yin te rigs med 'gyur// mi spong mi dor lnga
159b2(1): gnyis ni// yan lag dam tshig 'da' dka'o// mnyam la mnyam par sbyor ba yis// mnyam pa'i dam tshig la gnas na// mnyam rdzogs chen po thob 'gyur bas// 'das nas sangs rgyas ma yin no// rtsa ba nyams
159b3(1): pa'i phyal ba dag/ gso la nye bar mi brtson dang // skad cig yud tsam smra mi byed// nyams gyur nyes pa brjod mi lang // rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na// sgrub pa thams cad log par 'gyur// yid du mi 'ong sna
159b4(1): tshogs pa'i// 'bras bu mi 'dod bzhin du 'dud// yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na// 'bras bu med cing ngan song ltung // dam tshig rnams ni rdo rje che// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag nyid yin// rtsa ba'i dam tshig
159b5(1): lnga la ni// gcig la'ang gnyis dang bcu phrag gsum// yan lag dam tshig lnga gnyis la// gcig la'ang bcu phrag gnyis su dbye// dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu na// srid gsum
159b6(1): 'gro ba ji snyed pa// rtog 'dul dam tshig de snyed spro// gzhan yang rgyal mchog kun bzang gi/ thams cad ma lus phyag rgya yi// sgrub byed dam pa ma lus 'grub// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ rgyal ba'i
160a1(1): rigs mchog 'dzin pa de// 'jig rten gtso dang 'khor gyis bkur// dam pa mchog dang dam pa yis// sras dang spyan dgongs byin gyis rlob// bde gshegs nyid kyi yul la bzhugs// 'jigs
160a2(1): med kun du bzang por sbyor// ji bzhin nyid dang 'dul ba'i thabs// ji snyed sdom pa bsam yas pa// ma lus rnam dag lhun gyis grub// nyams na bskangs pas rdzogs pa dang // de la sogs te mtha' yas
160a3(1): mchog/ ces brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la 'dul bar gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dam tshig gi le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan
160a4(1): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen pos lhun gyis grub pa'i dam tshig byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e yi tshogs kyi dkyil
160a5(1): 'khor mchog/ 'bar ba gtum chen rngam pa la// khros pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// sangs rgyas bsod nams sku yang 'jig/ bdud rtsi lnga 'am zas lnga la// mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya// bkug nas rdo rje
160a6(1): phur pas gdab// rdul du byas nas tshogs la dbul// e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas// bcings 'gyur bskyod na phyogs bcur g.yo// myos nas gal te 'tshig par
160b1(1): 'gyur// baM gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'bar ba'i gzi byin lhun chen la// chags pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// rdo rje gsung yang dbang du 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga la// mtshan ma ming du
160b2(1): bcas par byas// rdo rje chags pa'i phur pas gdab// chags pa'i tshogs la thim par dbul// baM gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas// 'gug 'gyur rdo rje'ang phyi bzhin 'brang // ci
160b3(1): 'dod de bzhin 'ong bar 'gyur// ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'bar ba'i 'du 'phro gzi byin la// dga' ba'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// bdud rtsi lnga'am zas
160b4(1): lnga la// mtshan ma'i ming du bcas par bya// yon tan yid bzhin gter du brtag/ nga rgyal dga' 'phro'i phur pas gdab// rdo rje gzi byin 'bar bar 'gyur// ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud
160b5(1): du sbrel bsdams nas// gzi byin 'bar ba'i 'phrul chen 'phro// yid bzhin nam mkha' gang bar 'gyur// ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ gsal ba'i gzi brjid 'tsher ba la// dang ba'i yid kyis mchod
160b6(1): sbyin bya// gtum po rngam po lhan ner 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga la// gtum rngam 'khrug pa'i ngo bor brtag/ lhan ner gsal ba'i phur pas gdab// 'bar ba lhan ne'i tshogs su dbul// ya yi tshogs kyi
161a1(1): dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud du sbrel nas bsdams// 'bar ba ldan ne'i byin gyis khyab// thams cad g.yo ba med par byed// slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs// lhag ma'i mchod sbyin 'dod pa
161a2(1): sbyin// rang gi dam tshig rab bsgrags na// gang 'dod las ni byed par bsgo// sngon tshe dpal chen he ru ka/ shin tu gdug cing gtum bag can// thams cad ma lus 'dul mdzad pa'i// dbang dang byin brlabs
161a3(1): rmad po che// lha chen la sogs dbang bsdus nas// 'khor rnams dbang phyug slas su byas// so so'i las rnams bskos pa de// ji ltar khas blangs dam bcas pa// ma thogs myur du mngon par phyung // dam bcas
161a4(1): bzhin du ma byas na// ji ltar rang gi mnas bor ba'i// sdom byas de las 'da' ma byed// sdom byas de las 'das gyur na// mgo lus snying yang tshal pa bdun// yak+Sha khro bos gtubs par 'gyur// de bas rnal
161a5(1): 'byor sngags 'chang gis// ji ltar bcol ba bzhin du byos// las de mngon du ma byas na// rang gis khas blangs mnas bor bzhin// rul myags tshig nas dmyal bar 'gro// rnal 'byor dam la gnas gyur
161a6(1): pa'i// las rnams yongs su bya ba dang // 'khor rnams bu gcig bzhin du skyongs// phra men ma yang dngos grub thob// bcol ba'i las rnams mngon du byos// zhes bsgo'o// khro bo bsgrub pa'i las kyi gtso bo 'di
161b1(1): yin no// khrag 'thung chen po la sogs pa'i// bro gar glu tshig chen po yis// thams cad thams cad ci 'dod par// thams cad thams cad byed pa yin// mdzod lha chen po la sogs pa'i// bro gar glu tshig chen
161b2(1): pos ni// thams cad kun la za bar byed// rdul ca tsam yang med par byed// 'du bar 'dod na 'du bar byed// 'phel bar 'dod na 'phel bar byed// spos mo chen mo la sogs pa'i// bro gar glu tshig chen pos
161b3(1): ni// lhan ner 'dod na lhan ner byed// rmugs par 'dod na rmugs par byed// seng gdong chen mo la sogs pa'i// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// thams cad kun la za bar byed// rdul cha tsam yang med par
161b4(1): byed// bzhad gdong chen mo la sogs pa'i// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// thams cad kun la 'byin par byed// kun la rab tu nyams par byed// skus dang byi mo bran mo yi// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// spad
161b5(1): cing gtang bar bya ba ste// thams cad thams cad byed pa yin// ljon pa dang ni lcug phran tshal// gdong gcig ma dag me reg drug/ dad pa'i dga' bas chags pa dang // khros pas ka li rab tu bya// zhes brjod
161b6(1): pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis sbyong bar gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las lhun gyis grub pa'i phrin las byin gyis brlabs pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// // de
162a1(1): nas bcom lda 'das dgyes pa chen po'i tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis shin tu rngam pa'i gdangs kyis glu 'di blangs so// hUM gtum chen dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar// 'od zer nyi ma 'bum gyi
162a2(1): gzi// khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba bzhin// mche ba zang yag za byed che hoH// hUM rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong ldir// gtum chen ri rab 'bum bsnyil skad// a a ha la'i gad rgyangs che// dbyug pa'i 'thor rlung
162a3(1): g.yeng ba che hoH/ hUM khro bo shes rab 'od po che// ye shes dkyil 'khor kun du gsal// 'bar ba'i ye shes kun du 'joms// sna tshogs ye shes thig le che hoH// hUM khro bo'i rgyal po sprin chen po// khros pa'i
162a4(1): dkyil 'khor char chen 'bebs// dkyil 'khor yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gter// sna tshogs khros pa'i thig le che hoH// hUM bdud kun gyi ni bdud chen po// bdud kyi bdud de bdud rnams 'joms// 'jigs
162a5(1): pa'i tshogs kyang 'jigs byed pa// 'jigs byed chen po thig le che hoH// rdo rje brag ste sra ba po// rdo rje chu bo sdud pa po// rdo rje me ste kun 'bar che// rdo rje rlung ste 'thor rlung che hoH// zhes ched du glu 'di blangs
162a6(1): so// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khro bo la bstod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la sngags kyi rgyal po brtan
162b1(1): par gzungs/ 'di ched du brjod do// kye kye phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i rang bzhin 'di// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid// gzung 'dzin spros la 'chel ba yi// rnam rtog zhags pas so sor zin// sa rnams khyad
162b2(1): par bkod pa yang // gsang ba'i snying por 'gro ba'i lam// ye shes ngo mtshar rab 'byam kun// don du mi 'gyur yong ma gsungs// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// phyag rgya gsang chen nges pa
162b3(1): 'di// rtogs nas smra bar gang byed pa// de nyid nga yin dbang yang rdzogs// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la// gsang ba 'di las gzhan mi mnga'// sgo dang skur pa zhi ba yi// gsang ba'i snying po de kho
162b4(1): na// nyid de nges pa'i dbyings nas phyung // de ni nges par lung bstan te// sras ni thugs las skyes pa yin// sa rab rig pa 'dzin la gnas// zhes brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbyer med
162b5(1): par dgyes nas dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings sku gsung thugs kyi lhun stug po bkod pa'i rgyan nyid du bzhugs so// 'phags pa rtog pa'i rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i le'u stong phrag brgya pa las mtshan nyid
162b6(1): dang rgyud thams cad kyi lung gi spyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba/ gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i le'u las thams cad ma lus par spros te 'khor lo bskor ba de dag gi 'bras bu'i
163a1(1): mchog go/ gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las mnyes pa dang yongs su gzung ba'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa rdzogs so// // @#// rgya gar skad du/ badz+ra satwa mA yA dza la
163a2(1): gu h+ya sarba A daR+sha nA ma tan+t+ra/ bod skad du/ rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba thams cad kyi me long zhes bya ba'i rgyud// oM rnam par snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo// hUM mi bskyod pa la phyag 'tshal lo/ aM
163a3(1): snang ba mtha' yas la phyag 'tshal lo// de nas dpal ldan rdo rje 'chang // rgyal ba kun gyi gsang ba'i bdag/ kun gyis dbang bskur gter 'dzin pas// dgyes shing spyan gdangs gus bcas pas// rgyal ba
163a4(1): kun la bstod bskor nas// spyan sngar gus 'dug 'di skad gsol// e ma'o sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung // rtog pa kun gyi rgyal po ste// cho ga rgyas par bstan pa'i rgyud// dri med zab mo brtag dka' ba// 'dul

163a6(1): ba'i rgyud de gang phyir bstan// lung ni gang phyir brjod pa nyid// gang phyir spyi zhes bya bar bshad// gsang ba zhes ni ji lta bu// snying po'i don ni ci yi phyir// de kho nyid ces ji ltar brjod// nges pa zhes pa ci yi/
163b1(1): phyir// mtshan 'di gang zag gang la gsungs// mtshan gyi dri ba dris pa'o// thun mong khyad par tshul nyid kyi// ston pa zhes ni ci yi phyir// gnas dang 'khor ni ji lta bu// dus dang sdud pa ji lta bu// mi bskyod pa ni
163b2(1): ji ltar bya// rnam par snang mdzad ji ltar brjod// rin chen 'byung ldan gang gi phyir// snang ba mtha' yas gang gi phyir// don yod grub pa ji lta bu// spyan dang nam mkha'i dbyings ma dang // gos dkar mo dang mA
163b3(1): ma ki// sgrol ma zhes pa gang gi phyir// sa yi snying po ci yi phyir// nam snying spyan ras gzigs dbang dang // phyag na rdo rje gang phyir brjod// sgeg mo phreng dang glu gar ci// byams dang sgrib sel kun bzang
163b4(1): dang // 'jam dpal zhes pa ci yi phyir// dus bzhi bdug spos me tog dang // mar me dri chab gang phyir brjod// rnam rgyal gshin rje gshed po dang // rta mgrin bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ci// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags
163b5(1): sgrog dang // dril bu zhes pa gang phyir brjod// yid dang chos bzang gnyis ci phyir// gtso bos bdag la nges par gsungs// gang phyir thun mong ma yin pa'i// nang dang gsang ba'i gleng gzhi las// ston pa bstan
163b6(1): pa gnas dang 'khor// dus dang sdud pa ji ltar brjod// grags pa thun mong gleng gzhi las// ston pa 'khor gnas dus ji ltar// bstan pa sdud pa ji lta bu// skyes bu chen pos bshad du gsol// 'di ni gleng
164a1(1): gzhi'i dri ba tshigs su bcad pa'o// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// gleng bslang gnyis su ci phyir 'gyur// gang gis gang la gleng bslang zhing // thabs dang 'bras bu ci yin ston// thun mong thun
164a2(1): mong ma yin pa'i// sems lnga ye shes lnga yi rim// gang dang 'brel pa bshad du gsol// 'di ni gleng bslang ba'i tshigs su bcad pa'o// skyes bu chen po ston pa'i gtso// sgyu 'phrul dra bar mnga' brnyes
164a3(1): shing // phun sum tshogs pa chos kyi rje// gzi brjid phung po phun sum tshogs// blta bya gang la ci yi phyir// gang gis rtogs pas ji ltar 'gyur// rtogs dang ma rtogs khyad par ci// rtogs pa'i sgo ni du ru
164a4(1): gsungs// gtan tshigs tshul dang 'bras bu ci// 'di ni lta ba'i dri ba'o// thun mong spyod pa ci yi phyir// thun mong thun mong gang ci'i phyir// shes rab tshogs dang thugs rje dang // rtogs dang phyogs gcig spyod pa

164b1(1): rim gsum gang // lhag pa ting 'dzin zhes bya ba// gnyis la sku gsung thugs sbyor dang // phyi nang gsang ba'i rim pa ci// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor ji lta bu// gang phyir gzugs brnyan zhes brjod

166a6(1): ba// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// cho ga rgyas par dris pa'i mchog/ nyon cig da ni sems dpa' bshad// chos rnams ma lus gnyis med pa'i// rang rig byang chub sems nyid de// tha dad med pa'i
166b1(1): rang bzhin nyid// rdo rje zhes ni bshad pa yin// rang bzhin mtha' thug med pa'i chos// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yis// thugs su chud cing mngon rtogs pa// phyi nang gsang ba'i sems dpar

166b4(1): dang ye shes spyi nyid dang // rdzogs pas rdzogs phyir lung nyid de// bstan pa spyi yi bdag nyid ni// thams cad kun gyi bdag nyid pas// gcig dang du ma mi gnas kyang // so so'i bstan pa rgya mtsho'i rgyud// 'di
166b5(1): ston 'dis ston 'di phyir ston// don kun 'di la yongs rdzogs pas// lung gi spyi zhes bshad pa yin// gang phyir gsang ba zhes bya ba// sku dang gsung thugs bdag nyid de// rang bzhin ye nas ngo bo
166b6(1): dang // thabs dang 'bras bur gyur pa nyid// gsang ba'i don du 'di brjod do// ngang gis dman dang ma spangs dang // dbang dang dam tshig bral ba dang // rang brtags bsgribs pas sa'i khyad par// de dang de
167a1(1): yi dbang gis na// ro myang bral phyir gsang bar bshad// rang bzhin thabs dang 'bras bu yi// chos rnams thig le chen po'i don// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa// ma lus ro gcig dbyer
167a2(1): med pa// ji snyed theg pa'i khyad par dang // bstan pa'i bye brag gnas pa rnams// 'dir 'dus thabs 'dis mtshon pa dang // rtsa bar gyur pa kho na yin// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// byang chub
167a3(1): sems nyid bde ba che// rang 'byung ye shes thog mtha' med// rdo rje sems dpa'i bdag nyid de// rgyal ba'i byin brlabs rab snang ba// bsam gyis mi khyab che ba rnams// 'di las ston pas snying po ste// snying po
167a4(1): dang ni 'od bzhin no// rgyu dang 'bras bu bcud 'dus pas// snying po zhes ni bshad pa yin// gang phyir thams cad byang chub sems// mtha' dbus yongs su ma chad pa// dngos po gsum gyis khyab gyur
167a5(1): yongs su rdzogs pa'i rgyu yin no// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// de bzhin nyid du rdo rjes rig/ bdag dang gzhan don nus pa rdzogs// 'bras bu'i de kho na nyid do// gang phyir dngos gnyis tha
167a6(1): da par// log par brtags pa'i snang ba rnams// mun la snang dang gser 'gyur ltar// ro gcig thabs kyi de kho na// de phyir de kho na zhes brjod// dngos po sna tshogs dbyer med pa'i// tha dad don min don
167b1(1): gcig min// de nyid gsang ba'i nges pa ni// gzhi dang lam dang ngo bo dang // nges pas nges pa gsum du bstan// gang du theg pa bzhi gsungs pa// 'gro ba 'dren phyir ma nges pa// ro gcig theg par nges gnas
167b2(1): pa// nges pa'i theg pa bla na med// rang bzhin ma bcos rang byung las// bya byed ngang gis bral ba yi// sna tshogs sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor 'phrul// rang snang sgyu 'phrul dra ba'o// rang bzhin mtha' dbus med pa
167b3(1): las// rgyu rkyen las kyis so sor 'khrul// de nyid byang chub sems nyid de// mtha' dbus med par mnyam par gnas// de ltar so sor snang ba'i rgyud// nam mkha' dang ris phye ba ltar// rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul dra
167b4(1): ba yi// lam gnyis 'brel bar mngon bsgoms pas// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// bde chen thig le mngon snang ba// 'jug dang grol ba'i lam nyid de// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i lam du brjod// rang
167b5(1): bzhin yongs kyis khyab pa yi// dngos dbang thabs kyis 'brel pa yis// rim pa ji bzhin stobs gyur pas// khyad par thabs kyi sgyu 'phrul yin// thog ma med pa'i rdo rje sems// chos kun rang gi ngo bo
167b6(1): nyid// zab mo bstan pa spyi yi lung // thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud// bskal pa grangs med sngon rol nas// shes rab sbyangs dang snying rje ldan// dad dang brtson 'grus
168a1(1): dam tshig dang // cho gas dag par sbyangs pa yis// dbang po rab kyi spyod yul yin// rdo rje gsang ba'i theg pa 'di// ngo bo nyid dang byin brlabs dang // mtshon dang rdo rjer grub pa ste// rdo rje theg
168a2(1): pa bde ba che// rang bzhin ngan dang dman pa dang // phyin ci log dang mi mos dang // dbang dang dam tshig med pa la// gsang phyir gsang ba'i theg par gsungs// thabs dang bral ba'i slob dpon gyis// snod
168a3(1): dang bral ba'i slob ma la// gsang ba'i snying po bstan gyur na// bdag dag gzhan kun sdug bsngal zhing // sreg dang sgrib par yun rings gnas// sgyu 'phrul dra ba rdo rje me long gi rgyud chen po las mtshan gyi don
168a4(1): gyi bshad pa dang po'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// thun mong ma gyur gsang ba'i don// thun mong ma yin 'khor dag la// phyogs bcu rgyal ba rdo rje 'chang // dkyil 'khor mngon du phyung ba yi// rdo rje
168a5(1): pad+ma 'brel pa yi// byang chub sems kyi dbang bskur nas// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// nyon mongs lha dang shes bya rnams// skad cig yud la bsal byas te// thun mong khyad par gsang ba yi// lam gnyis
168a6(1): nges par ston pas na// ston pa zhes ni brjod pa yin/ de yi gnas mchog bshad bya ba// 'byung dang bzhugs dang rten pa dang // mtshon pa byin gyis brlabs phyir ro// thabs dang lam gyi khyad par gyis// kun
168b1(1): bdag rdo rje 'chang chen nyid// gtsang ma ris dag spangs pa yi// 'og min gnas mchog chen po der// yang dag sangs rgyas der sangs rgyas// skal med skye bo gdul ba'i phyir// sprul pa po ni 'dir sangs
168b2(1): rgyas// sangs rgyas kun gyi bzhugs pa'i gnas// gtsang ma rigs dag rnam spangs pa// 'jig rten las kyis mthar gyur pa// 'og min 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // phyogs bcur rgya yongs ma chad
168b3(1): pa'i// yon tan khyad par spags pa na// gsang ba yum gyi b+ha ga la// bcu gsum sa yi dbang phyug ldan// rdo rje 'chang chen dpag med dang // til 'bru'i tshul du rab tu bzhugs// chos rnams kun gyi de bzhin
168b4(1): nyid// thog ma tha ma dbus med pa'i// rang bzhin don gyi 'og min ni// rgyal ba kun gyi pho brang phyir// 'das dang da ltar ma byon pa'i// rgyal ba kun gyi bsten pa'i gnas// de dag nye bar mtshon pa yi// yid
168b5(1): dang mtshan ma las gyur pa'i// bsgoms dang bris dang byas la sogs// de dang 'dra ba'i gzhal yas khang // rgyal ba sngags dang byin brlabs kyis// der gnas don phyir mtshon pa'i gnas// thun mong thun mong
168b6(1): ma yin pa'i// bsod nams ye shes khyad par can// bsags pa sna tshogs las byung ba'i// rdzogs longs spyod pa chen po ni// gtsang ma ris dag spangs pa yi// 'og min chen po'i gnas mchog na// rigs
169a1(1): bdag phyag rgya lhun grub sku// gcig dang du ma rnam spangs pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyi gzugs te// gdod nas theg mchog mdzod nyid phyir// sgrib pa mtha' spangs gdul bya la// skad cig gcig
169a2(1): gis spang bar mdzad// chos rnams sna tshogs ji snyed pa// dngos po tha dad med phyir zlum// khyab dang spags dang tshad med dang // ye shes bzhi phyir 'khor lo bstan// chos dbyings 'du 'bral med pa'i phyir// mu
169a3(1): khyud zlum por kun nas bskor// sku gsung thugs dang byin brlabs dang // thugs rjes ma khyab med pa'i phyir// yon tan rgyas pa'i dbyibs su bstan// rang 'byung ye shes mtha' bral bas// phyogs bcur 'gro
169a4(1): 'ong mi gnas pa'i// tshad dang bral ba'i sems kyi phyir// gzhi rtsa tshad med 'khor lor bstan// gdod nas byin brlabs ngo bo'i phyir// ma bsags lhun rdzogs mdzod nyid de// 'gro ba re 'dod skong ba'i
169a5(1): phyir// rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // sna tshogs dngos dang dngos med pa'i// chos kun ngo bor rang gnas te// bdag gzhan gzung 'dzin bral ba'i phyir// phyi dang nang bral sgrib pa med// thun mong la
169a6(1): brten thabs kyi 'bras// ye shes thabs kyis 'phags pa nyid// gdul bya'i blo la mngon snang bas// glo bur bzhi ni lhag par mdzes// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// gdul bya'i rim pa mtho dman
169b1(1): kun// stong smon mtshan med 'od gsal 'jug/ de phyir ye shes sgo bzhir shar// thabs mang bsam gyis mi khyab pas// lam brgyad rim par bgrod pa yis// 'bras bu yon tan kun rdzogs pas// rta babs rgyu
169b2(1): 'bras bcu drug bstan// zhen dang spong ba'i lam bral bas// 'dod yon ye shes lnga rol te// bdag mchod kun mnyes las byung bas// 'dod yon lha mos 'khrigs par bstan// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa
169b3(1): yis// ma chags thabs dang ldan pa dang // che ba'i yon tan lhun rdzogs pas// nyi zla pad+ma rin po che// las dang thugs rje smon lam gyis// byang chub sems dpa' mthu bo che// smon lam dbang gis de dag
169b4(1): tu// thos pa rgya mtsho bsag phyir gnas// de tshe dus kyi tha bral yang // ngo bo dus bzhi mnyam pa'i dus// dus kyi mtha' la mngon rtogs pas// thun mong min pa'i dus su bstan// de tshe phyogs bcu rgyal ba
169b5(1): yis// bskal pa bye bar lung bstan pa// 'dul ba'i dus bab gsang ba'i bdag/ lag na rdo rjes bsdu ba mdzad// dus gsum rgyal bas byin brlabs phyir// 'khor gyi nang na skal mchog ldan// gsang ba'i rdo
169b6(1): rje 'chang bsdus nas// 'dul ba'i 'khor la bstan par mdzad// 'das dang ma byon da ltar gyi// sku gsum sku gsung thugs nges pa'i// de bzhin nyid du thabs gang gis// gshegs shing gshegs dang gshegs
170a1(1): gyur pa'i// thar pa gsum dang ye shes dang // pha rol phyin pa drug ldan pa// zhing khams yon tan bsam mi khyab// bye brag brgyad cu kun 'dus pa'i// rgyal ba rgya mtsho kun gyi mtshan// gang phyir rje
170a2(1): rje thugs chud pas// las dang spyod pa dka' thub dang // srid pa'i ri bos mi bskyod pas// de ni mi bskyod mchog tu gsungs// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yis// ji snyed sku gsung thugs snang ba// mos
170a3(1): dang thabs kyi khyad par gyis// rnam par snang phyir snang mdzad mchog/ rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan ni// tshogs rnams 'dus pa'i ngo bo ste// yon tan rin chen ltar 'byung bas// rin chen 'byung bar gsungs pa
170a4(1): yin// dpag tu med pa'i gsung gi sgo// dbang po thabs kyi bye brag gis// don rtags gsung dang yi ge'i sgo// mtha' yas snang phyir mtha' yas mchog/ dpag med thugs rje mdzad pa yi// 'gro 'ong med
170a5(1): pa'i thugs rje yis// 'gro ba skyob pa'i don mdzad pas// don grub ces ni rnam par bstan// rig pa'i rgyal po 'di dag kyang // tha mal lnga nyid gnas dag cing // de las thabs des mngon byas pas// der
170a6(1): dbang sgyur te nyid snang ba// rgyal po nyid du brjod pa yin// steng 'og gnyis las mngon gyur pa'i// sbyor dang 'ju 'dul rlung gi rim// gang de thabs las mngon gyur pa'i// bde ba'i gzugs dang tshor ba
170b1(1): dang // 'du shes dang ni 'du byed dang // rnam shes zag med bde ba'i ros// dbang sbyar ye shes rgyal por bshad// gang phyir snang dang bsgoms dang bris// phyag rgya rtsa bcud thig le'i mdog/ dkar dang dmar
170b2(1): dang ser ba dang // sngo dang ldang dang rims ldan pa'o// rgyal ba kun gyi bde skyid cing // spyod dang de la 'byung ba'i yum// thams cad de las skyed pa lnga// tha mal zhen pa dag pa dang // dbang sgyur rgyal mo lnga rang
170b3(1): bzhin// sra dang gsher dang drod dang bskyod// nam mkha'i khams kyis gang phye ba// steng 'og thabs las mngon gyur pa// yul dang shes pa dbyer med cing // thugs rje shes rab 'brel pa yis// 'khor ba dang
170b4(1): ni mya ngan 'das// gnyis med gzigs pa spyan gyi mchog/ zag med stong pa'i klong chen gyis// skyed dang sdud dang gnas pa'i phyir// mtha' dbus bral ba'i de bzhin nyid// nam mkha'i dbyings zhes gang brjod
170b5(1): pa'o// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// las dang lta ba nyon mongs dang // shes bya'i dri ma mtha' yas pa// rtogs pas sbyong zhing sreg pas na// gos dkar ma ru brjod pa yin// gang phyir las dang ting 'dzin/
170b6(1): dang // ye shes thugs rje bar med chus// gang dag 'khrud dang tshim byed pas// chu ni mA ma ki ru bshad// gang phyir rtogs dang thabs dag dang // ting 'dzin thabs kyi rlung dag gis// bgrod pa med pa'i zhing
171a1(1): khams su// sgrol bas sgrol ma nyid du bshad// snying po rang 'byung ye shes nyid// kun brten gnas dang khyab pa'i phyir// byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin la// sa yi snying por brjod pa yin// rang
171a2(1): byung snying po byang chub sems// nam mkha' lta bur bsam brjod med// mtha' dbus sgro skur gang 'das pa// de ni nam mkha'i snying po nyid// gang phyir thugs rje dpag med pas// 'gro ba chu bo rgal gyi bar// skyo
171a3(1): ba med par gzigs pas na// spyan ras gzigs dbang pad+ma'i gtso// rtogs dang dbyer med rdo rje yis// mtha' yi bdag rtogs mtshan ma dag/ 'joms pas phyag na rdo rje ste// thun mong nyid dang khyad par
171a4(1): gsang ba'i rnam par shes pa gzhi// thun mong yul dang khyad par ni// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba las// mtshon dang rtogs dang bsgoms pa yis// lha mo bzhir ni mngon snang ba// byang chub sems dang
171a5(1): bde ba dang // thabs kyi bde bas rab sgeg pas// lha mo 'di ni sgeg mor bshad// grol dang ma grol 'khor ba yi// phyi nang skra yi bye brag kun// brag ca lta bur brjod mdzad pas// bar chad med pas phreng ba
171a6(1): ma// tshim pa'i ngo bo gang bstan pa// dri dang ldan pa'i khyad par nyid// dbyangs nyid tshim zhing yid bde bas// de nyid rdo rje gi rti ma// ro yis khyab cing gar skur ltar// bde ba chen po bzhi yi gar// khyab dang
171b1(1): mdzes dang tshim pa dang // mi gnas bkrol bas gar mkhan ma// rgyan dang chags pa'i sgra dag dang // yid kyi phreng ba bde ba'i gar// lha mo bzhi yi rang bzhin no// ma rtogs 'gro ba mtha' yas la// rang
171b2(1): bzhin thugs rje mdzad pa yis// yongs la phan 'dogs skyob pa ni// 'di ni byams pa zhes bya'o// rtogs goms mthar phyin khyad par gyis// las dang nyon mongs lta ba'i rim// sel ba 'di ni sgrib
171b3(1): sel lo// thabs dang shes rab gnas rtogs na// gang phyir spong len mi gnas pas// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// dbye ba med pas kun du bzang // bdag dang gzhan du 'dzin baM kun// zag pa med pa'i
171b4(1): shes rab kyis// lta ba'i dra ba gcod pas na// zag med shes rab 'jam dpal sku// dbang po yi ge theg ler bcas// gnas dang rtogs dang bsgoms pa yis// mngon du snang phyir brjod pa yin// dus bzhi
171b5(1): rim pa gnyis brgyad de// de nyid 'grol dang brod skyed dang // spyod yul dag phyir brjod pa ni// dri dang bde bas ngag tshim zhing // yid ldog med pas rdo rje dri// phyi nang khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor la// me tog zig
171b6(1): ler bder bkod pas// rdo rje me tog bla na med// phyi nang sems la gnas bcas pa'i// mun pa bsal phyir shes rab dang // ye shes snang ba bla na med// rdo rje gsal ba'i mar me ma// phyi nang dkyil 'khor ma
172a1(1): lus la// rang 'byung ting 'dzin bde ba yis// thams cad khyab par gnas pa'i phyir// khyab byed rdo rje dri chab ma// de bzhin nyid la dgongs pa yis// 'khor ba'i chos rnams ma lus pa// byang
172a2(1): chub snying por tshar bcad pas// rnam par rgyal ba zhes su brjod// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes ni// gnyis 'dzin rtogs pa'i gnyen po ste// rtogs goms de yis 'joms pas na// ya man+ta kr-ita gshin rje
172a3(1): gshed// gang phyir 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las// thabs dang bcas pa'i rdzu 'phrul las// 'joms dang sgrol bar mdzad pas na// rta mgrin rgyal por de bshad do// 'khor ba'i bdud kyi dug lnga la// ye shes lnga ru
172a4(1): gsal goms pas// gnyis med rtsi ru gang 'khyil ba// sgrib zad bdud rtsi 'khyil par bshad// gang du lus dang bcas pa yi// dbang po yul dang rnam shes reg/ rang rgyud bcad pa'i ye shes nyid// sgo ba rnam
172a5(1): pa bzhi ru gsungs// rang rgyud rtag chad bzlog pa dang // gzungs dang lha dang bde ba dang // thig le rig par bcas pa nyid// gang phyir gnas nas dgug pa dang // gang du'ang 'gro bar mi nus dang // de las
172a6(1): 'da' bar dka' ba dang // bstims nas bde bas dril bu ma// gzung dang 'khyud dang bsdam pa dang // gnyis su med pas bde chen po// rang lus snang srid brtan g.yo la// rtogs dang goms pa'i tshul gyis
172b1(1): sbyar// de dag ma lus dran byed pa// rig pa'i rgyal po kun dbyer med// kun gzhi rdo rje mi phyed pa// kun du bzang por de bshad do// ma lus 'dus byas ma byas chos// ma lus zag med khyab pa'i
172b2(1): dbyings// rtogs dang shes dang gang gyur pa// kun du bzang mor de bshad do// mi shigs thig le bde chen po// ye shes lnga ldan drangs ma'i bcud// rang 'byung lus can kun gnas pa// ston pa rig pa'i
172b3(1): gsung can nyid// d+harma tsakra chos kyi gnas// 'od bzhi e sogs tshul du ni// lus sbas pa yi tshul dag gis// lus can kun la khyab par gnas// rang 'byung thugs kyi bde ba nyid// rgyu ba bral ba'i snying
172b4(1): po ste// bar ma ar+tha byang chub sems// nam mkha'i ye shes thugs kyi klong // ma na ma ta dran rtog yid// rnam shes rgyu ba'i dran rtog rnams// ye shes nam mkha'i gsal 'dod pa// dran rtog rig pa 'khor du
172b5(1): gnas// zag med rnam shes bsam mi khyab// ma lus nam mkha'i ye shes su// bde chen rig pa'i mi rtog par// bsdus te nyams la gnas par mdzad// bde ba chen po ma skyes pa// nam mkha' lta bur mi phyed
172b6(1): pa// nam mkha'i ye shes dbyer med sku// dus gsum kun gyi ngo bor gnas// 'di zhes nye bar bstan pa ni// e sogs bzhi yi tshul gnas te// phyi nang bar khyams gdong bar bcas// gsang ba'i 'og min
173a1(1): rgyan rdzogs pa'o// thig le baM dbyibs spros pa med// brjod med bstan pa bsrung mdzad cing // byin brlabs bde chen mi rtog pa// 'khor la snang bar mdzad pa'o// ma ni ma nu ma ta ste// sdom
173a2(1): byed dran rtog yid kyi dngos// las can rnam shes de dag gis// gsal bar go bar 'khor du brjod// chos rnams kun gyi ngo bo nyid// thig le bcu drug sems lnga'i dngos// mi rtog lhan cig skyes pa'i
173a3(1): don// byin brlabs mngon sum tshul gyis gsal// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// thig le zag med skyes pa'i dus// bsam med lhan cig skyes pa'i tshe// bde ba chen po'i dus su 'dod// shes pa rten
173a4(1): dang brten par bcas// thabs kyi rim pa la brten nas// rlung gis bsdus pa'i don gyis ni// rang rig thabs kyi rgyal por gsal// gang dang gang la gang du ni// gang gis gang tshe gang gsungs pa// brjod
173a5(1): 'byung rtsa bar de gyur pas// gleng gzhi zhes ni bstan pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// dbyer med ye shes gcig gi dang // rdo rje 'chang chen kun bzang las// sna tshogs sku ni rnam par
173a6(1): 'phrul// de tshe rgyal ba thams cad kyang // lha la rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid// lha min ston pa phrag dog rje// mi la thub pa'i dbang po ste// byol song sgra yis 'dul mdzad pa// yi dwags drag pos gdung ba sel// dmyal
173b1(1): ba sdug bsngal chos kyi rgyal// gdul ba'i sbrul sku ngo bor shar// la la lha las 'pho ba dang // la lar lhums zhugs bltam pa dang // dka' thub bdud btul sangs rgyas nas// 'khor lo bskor te mya ngan
173b2(1): 'das// gnas la nges pa yod min te// dmyal ba yi dwags byol song dang // mi dang lha dang lha min te// so so'i gnas te gang yin pa// 'gro ba 'dul ba ston pa'i gnas// lha rnams dang ni mi rnams
173b3(1): dang // lha min yi dwags dud 'gro dang // dmyal ba so so'i 'gro ris dag/ rang rang mos dang las dbang gis// 'dul tshul tha dad dbang gis 'khod// rang rang mos pas phrad pa'i tshe// rang rang brda skad tha
173b4(1): da pas// rtogs dang grol bar gang gyur pa// rang rang ji bzhin ston pa'i dus// bstan pa'i theg pa sna tshogs te// rang rang zhen pa mtha' yas phyir// tshul dang mos pa'i dbang gis na// theg pa sna tshogs
173b5(1): tshul du snang // theg gcig mnyam pa nyid kyi tshul// gnyis dang gsum dang bzhi dang lnga// dgu dang brgyad khri la sogs pa// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i tshul gyis snang // sku dang gsung thugs las dag gis// 'dul
173b6(1): dbang thabs ni sna tshogs kyis// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor// de tshe 'gro ba so so yang // rang gi gzhi rtsa don rig nas// rim pa lnga'am thabs gcig gis// rig 'dzin sangs rgyas sa la gnas// rang rang
174a1(1): cha 'dzin sprul pa'i lus// sar gnas 'khor gyi dang po yis// de dag zhus pa'i rim gsungs pa// blo dang tshig dang yi ger bsdus// rgyud ces bya ba rgyun du grags// sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi
174a2(1): rgyud// lha spyod dkyil 'khor dbang dam par// sgrub pa phrin las lam rim ni// phyi dang nang dang sbas pa ste// rang bzhin gnas dang mngon byed pa// thabs kyi rgyud ni gsum du gsungs// phyogs bcu dus bzhi
174a3(1): mngon rdzogs pa'i// mdo sde 'dul ba mngon pa dang // sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud// bskyed rdzogs thabs rim gang bstan pa// sgyu 'phrul dra bar 'dus pa ste// de ltar grags pa'i chos rnams kun// rtog
174a4(1): pa'i cho ga kun bshad pa'i// rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung gi mchog/ thog ma bar dang mthar dge ba// dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs// rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba
174a5(1): gsang ba me long gi rgyud chen po las gleng gzhi rnam par bshad pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gang zag thabs ni thun mong du// blo yi yul du gang gyur pa// de ni thun mong
174a6(1): yul nyid de// gang zag thabs dang ston pa nyid// de yi spyod yul ma gyur cing // thabs chen gsang ba dang ldan pa// de ni thun mong ma yin pa'o// de nyid skye bo 'khor gnyis don// rnam gnyis tshul du snang bar
174b1(1): mdzad// phung po khams dang skye mched nyid// rgyal ba yab yum sems dpa' dang // sems ma nyid du lhun gyis grub// gsang yul dbang po rnam shes reg/ ma lus 'joms phyir khro bo ste// rtags sogs mtshan
174b2(1): ma las skyes phyir// yum ste las kyis mi gnas bshad// yid chos bzang po bzang mo nyid// chags sogs nyon mongs drug po nyid// thub pa sprul pa drug tu bshad// de nyid phyogs bcu dus bzhi yi// phung po
174b3(1): 'byung ba rnam shes yul// dbang po dus dang lus chos bzhi// mtshan ma nyon mongs yum nyid de// de nyid sems phyir ma skyes pas// lhag pa'i bden gnyis 'brel ba las// byang chub sems lnga rnam par
174b4(1): 'phrul// dngos po snang grags chos thams cad// skye ba med dang 'gag med dang // gnas pa med dang dmigs med dang // 'gro 'ong med pa nyid du snang // bdag phyir ye shes gsal snang yang // gzhan phyir de
174b5(1): dag ma rtogs pas// rang bzhin ngo bo ye nas gsang // shin tu gab sbas gsang ba'i don// de nyid legs par bshad pa'i tshe// ye nas mnyam nyid gsang ba la// ma rig log rtog rkyen dbang gis// 'khor
174b6(1): bapaba'i sdug bsngal de bor snang // de nyid bde gshegs snying po ste// dngos med dngos po'i snying po can// 'gro ba rnams ni smin bya'i phyir// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin las// sprul pa rnams ni rnam par
175a1(1): 'phrul// sku dang gsung thugs sna tshogs kyis// chos kyi 'khor lo rnam par bskor// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag kyang // ston pa 'khor gyis gcig la gcig/ yab dang yum dang gnyis med
175a2(1): dang // gang la gang gis gleng bslang ba// brda dang dgongs pa'i tshig gis te// bstan pa'i tshogs ni snang bar 'gyur// 'phen pa rlung gi sbyor ba yis// thabs des yum la gang bskul bas// gnyis med 'brel
175a3(1): pa'i chags pa'i 'od// sa ya bcu gsum sku gsung thugs// bde chen lha ru gsal byas shing // nam mkha'i ye shes mngon phyung nas// bde ba'i ye shes gsal ba'i ro// skye dang dga' dang gnas pa dang // 'gro
175a4(1): 'ong nyid las shes par 'gyur// gang gis gang la gang bslang bas// gang rkyen dbang gis de dag las// ye shes gsal bar gang snang bas// snang srid lus dang dngos por bcas// nam mkha'i ye shes cir
175a5(1): yang snang // nang gi gleng bslang thabs chen yin// gang phyir thabs kyis shes rab la// chags pa'i glu dang sbyor bas bskul// shes rab thabs la lan bskul ba'ang // sha da pa yi glu gar dang // sngags sbyor ba
175a6(1): yi rim pa yis// phyag rgya bzhi yis mngon sbyar bas// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// rgyu ba rlung gi sbyor ba yis// dgug dang bkug pa'i thabs nyid de// dbab dang gzung dang bskyil ba dang // zlog
175b1(1): dang gzung dang sbyar ba yis// bskyed dang rdzogs dang rdzogs chen po// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// thar thug rim pa las byung ba'i// kun kyang sems lngar snang ba ste// thabs las byung ba'i thig le
175b2(1): dang // shes rab gsang ba'i thig le dang // gnyis med bde ba las byung ba// sems lnga rim par snang bar 'gyur// thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor zhing // sku dang gsung thugs las byung ba// bye brag brgyad
175b3(1): cu kun 'dus pa// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis te// sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lngas// thabs dang rang bzhin 'brel pa yis// 'gro ba kun la rgyas btab pa'o// snod bcud bde ba'i rang bzhin
175b4(1): gyis// ma lus lhan cig skyes par gnas// g.yo ldang smon 'jug gnas mthar phyin// skye ba'i gzhi dang thabs dag dang // skyes nas mthar phyin ye shes lnga// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin nyid// ji lta ba
175b5(1): bzhin rnam par gnas// 'gro ba mos pa'i khyad par gyis// gzugs dang kha dog sngags dang 'od// dkyil 'khor la sogs so sor gnas// gang zag blo dang 'tsham par bstan// rten dang brten can las byung
175b6(1): ba'i// rang 'byung bde chen mi rtog pa// lus med lus la gnas pa yi// khyab pa gnyis med gang ba'i tshul// gang phyir zag med bde ba yi// ting 'dzin bde ba khyad par can// rang bzhin brtags dang snang ba
176a1(1): dang // byin rlob nus pa'i lha yis ni// phyi nang snod bcud sku gsung thugs// ma lus sbyor ba gsum las byung // rtsa dang rlung dang thig le dag/ rim par bsten dang sbyor ba dang // 'phen dang sdud
176a2(1): pa rlung gis te// drangs mar ye shes rlung gis 'jug/ steng dang 'og las byung ba yi// bde ba'i thig le rim pa dag/ drangs snyigs rlung gi khyad par gyis// ji ltar 'dod pa'i 'bras bu nyid// rkyen gyis nus pa
176a3(1): phrad pa ltar// rgyu gcig nus pa so sor snang // 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// lam ni rtsa dang thig le dang // rlung ni phyi nang dwangs snyigs dang // lam dang rgyu ba'i tshul las byung // gang phyir med dang
176a4(1): nus pa med// stongs dang log pa'i nus mthu yis// rang lus 'jig dang sdug bsngal zhing // dbang po ma tshang dman par gyur// gang phyir thun mong thun mong min// sems lnga ye shes lnga bstan pa// rang bzhin
176a5(1): ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan du// gzungs ma rigs la rten bcas pa'i// sems lnga yun ring thung bcas pas// bdag gzhan chos rnams ma lus pa// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes te// dngos po ma yin dngos med
176a6(1): min// bdag gzhan gnyis ka gnyis med min// rang 'byung bde chen sgyu ma nyid// rdo rje brtan po rang snang ba// ye shes sgyu ma lhun gyis grub// rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud chen po
176b1(1): las gleng bslang ba bshad pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// kun gyi shes bya yul bshad pa// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// gcig dang tha dad kun bral ba'i// mtha'
176b2(1): dang dbus med de bzhin nyid// sgro skur kun bral mnyam pa las// rtogs dang ma rtogs khyad par las// sna tshogs chos ni rnam par 'phrul// gzhi dang rtsa ba las 'das pa'i// rang bzhin dbyer med de bzhin
176b3(1): nyid// dngos med dngos po yul 'das la// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi// ngo bo sna tshogs rang snang ba// gnyis med thabs chen rdo rje nyid// e ma'o gnyis med bde chen las// sna tshogs gnas dang
176b4(1): longs spyod dang // rigs dang kha dog tshe tshad dang // bde sdug dbang po bye brag dag/ rang bzhin sna tshogs rnam par 'phrul// sgyu ma chu zla 'ja' tshon ltar// byang chub sems kyi ngo bor gnas// las dang rkyen
176b5(1): gyis gang snang ba// rang rang zhen pa'i tha dad kyis// dbang po khyad par sna tshogs pa'i// rtog pa'i nus pa sna tshogs mthong // rang bzhin gzhi rtsa med pa'i dbyings// lhan cig skyes dang kun brtags pa'i// ma
176b6(1): mthong log zhen brtas pa yis// 'khrul 'khor log pa'i stobs su snang // 'khor ba ma bsal dag pa yi// zhing dang spyod yul longs spyod dang // ting 'dzin dbang stobs rdzu 'phrul dang // mngon shes ye shes
177a1(1): dpag med pa'i// sna tshogs sku dang gsung thugs dang // yon tan phrin las rang snang ba// bdag gzhan lhun gyis grub pa'i don// sna tshogs yid bzhin nor bu ltar// ma bsags lhun gyis grub
177a2(1): pa'i sku// sna tshogs kun dang dbyer med pa'i// kun la yid bzhin mthun par snang // kun kyang rang 'byung byang chub sems// bden pa dbyer med don du snang // gang phyir nam mkha'i rang bzhin ltar// gang la
177a3(1): de ltar snang ba las// yang dag gcig tu gzung du med// ma bcos rang 'byung zhi ba nyid// rnam par dag pa'i snying po ste// 'khor ba nyid na mya ngan 'das// rnam par dag pa'i dbyings su mkhyen// sgo dang skur ba
177a4(1): kun bral ba'i// thams cad rang snang snying po las// sna tshogs ma lus rnam par 'phrul// dngos dang dngos po med min zhing // gang de de nyid yul 'das pa// nam mkha' lta bur dpag med pa// phyogs ris
177a5(1): mtha' dbus rgya dpag med// gang gis gang la khyab pa ltar// mkha' sogs rdul bral 'byung ba'i bcud// zag pa med pa'i snying po nyid// lus can kun gyi dbang po dang // drangs mar 'brel bar gang snang
177a6(1): yang // mthong ba log pa'i stobs kyis sgyur// bdag gzhan med pa'i rang snang yin// ma lus thams cad dbyer med pa'i// thabs dang shes rab bcud lnga'i rgyun// longs spyod thabs su bcas pa nyid// 'gro
177b1(1): ba kun la khyab par gnas// gang yang thabs dang shes rab kyi// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rang bzhin nyid// rang bzhin dbyer med byang chub sems// bde ba chen po'i ngo bo nyid// 'das dang da ltar ma byon gyi// rgyal
177b2(1): ba rig 'dzin mtha' yas dang // ma lus kun gyis rtogs bya ba// phyogs med khyab pa'i ngo bor gnas// gang snang ma lus de bzhin nyid// ma bcos ma byas zhi ba ste// gcig dang du ma las 'das pa// sangs
177b3(1): rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin nyid// mtha' bral nam mkha'i rang bzhin ltar// ma lus gnas pa de dag kyang // rtogs pa'i khyad par dbang po yi// mthong tshul dag dang ma dag gis// rang bzhin yul du ma gyur
177b4(1): pas// phyi nang gsang ba la sogs pa'i// dbang dang man ngag 'brel pa yis// de nyid mthong rtogs don phyir bshad// gang phyir rdo rje slob dpon nyid// yon tan yongs rdzogs nus pa can// dad dang brtson
177b5(1): 'grus brtul zhugs can// shes rab khyad par gang ldan la// dbang dang dam tshig man ngag dang // rgyu rkyen 'brel ba'i nus pa yi// bde ba gsal ba mi rtog pa// thabs kyis phun sum tshogs par
177b6(1): 'gyur// gsang ba'i gsang chen snying po nyid// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub ste// phyi nang bdag gzhan ma lus pa// thams cad dbyer med de bzhin nyid// thabs bral kun la rgyas btab pas// mun pa'i
178a1(1): tshogs su gyur pa yin// mun snang dug dang gser 'gyur rtsi// thabs mkhas rang bzhin nges 'gyur ltar// gang de'i lha spyod ting 'dzin gyis// de ma zag tu de bzhin 'gyur// dbyer med nam
178a2(1): mkha'i rang bzhin du// kha dog dbyibs dang rdzas la sogs// ma lus tha dad med pa ltar// thabs mkhas ma lus de bzhin 'gyur// tha mal pa dang log pa dang // dka' thub can dang rkyen rtogs dang // phyi nang
178a3(1): can dang tha dad can// gtsang sme can dang phyogs rtogs nyid// mnyam nyid lta las gang 'das pa// ngo bo nyid dang thabs dag dang // dbang po la sogs log pa yis// de nyid gnod pa'i stobs su 'gyur// gang
178a4(1): la gang gis zin pa'i nad// thabs dang brtson 'grus lags pa yis// de ltar brtson pa'i khyad par gyis// de nyid ma spangs rnam par dag/ gang phyir de nyid nges pa la// rtogs dang ma rtogs khyad par
178a5(1): gyis// tha dad chos su gang snang ba// dngos la de ltar gnas pa min// rdo rje skye med shes rab ste// me long thabs nyid sna tshogs snang // gnyis med 'brel ba'i mnyam pa nyid// ma lus dbyer med dam par
178a6(1): bshad// de nas rtogs sgo bshad bya ba// gang la gang gi don med pas// lha dang spyod dang lam 'bras dag/ 'di nyid don gnyer gzhan med pa'o// gang gis de dag de don du// tshig dang sngags rdzas
178b1(1): dka' thub kyis// gang bstan de yi byin brlabs kyis// bdag gzhan phan par gang 'dod pa'o// gang las gyur pa de zhig pas// lus sems 'byung ba'i bag la gnas// phyin cad phan gnod chos med
178b2(1): pas// dka' thub 'bad rtsol mi dgos so// gang phyir byed pa'i rgyu bzhi dag/ mnyes dang dag pas bde bya'i phyir// las dang dka' thub drag shul gyis// grol zhing thar bar 'dod par snang // bden bzhi bcu
178b3(1): drug tha dad lam// khams gsum mthong sgom spong tshul gyis// rang don zag pa kun bral nas// rang don nang du mya ngan 'das// rkyen rtogs bag chags sad pa yis// 'byung med bcu gnyis rang brtags
178b4(1): nas// ma rig 'khrul 'khor rgyu 'bras zad// yid bzhin bde ba mchog gi sa// tha dad med pa'i rig pa'i sems// bden brdzun khyad par cir bltas pa// gsal la mi rtog snying po nyid// bdag gzhan nus
178b5(1): pa'i stobs su snang // chos rnams sgyu ma mig yor dang // brag ca chu zla 'dra ba yi// de nyid mtha' dbus bral ba ni// bden gnyis 'brel pa dbu ma'i tshul// rdo rje dam pa gsum bkod de// dngos po sgyu ma las
178b6(1): grol nas// dag pa'i rten 'brel la brten nas// ye shes sgyu ma mngon sum shar// gang phyir las dang bya ba dang // khrus dang gtsang sbra la brten nas// sngags dang phyag rgya'i mthu stobs kyis// sgo gsum rdo rje
179a1(1): 'dzin pa'i sa// de dag las mthun khyad par nyid// de kho na nyid bzhi rtogs nas// las dang ting 'dzin 'brel goms pas// rdo rje 'chang ba'i sa la gnas// ting 'dzin rig pa gtsor byas
179a2(1): nas// sngags dang phyag rgya bsam pa yis// cha lugs ji bzhin mngon sbyar te// goms pas bdag gzhan don grub pa'o// thabs dang grol ba'i khyad par gyis// dbang po yul dang rnam shes dang // snang srid phyi
179a3(1): nang snod bcud kyi// spyod yul ji ltar 'gyur ba kun// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// gsang ba'i thabs kyis rgyas btab pas// ma lus rdo rje nyid du 'gyur// snang srid dpa' bo thabs chen de// rang
179a4(1): bzhin dbyer med dag pa yi// sna tshogs 'phrul pa rang snang bas// ma lus gnyis med ye shes yin// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// thabs dang rig pa gang zin pa// gzhan gyis dor ba'i 'khor ba'i
179a5(1): chos// ye shes bdud rtsi'i ngo bor 'gyur// ma lus gcig dang tha bral ba'i// ji ltar mthun pa'i snying po la// so so'i don ltar mi gnas pas// bskyed pa lha dang gzhal yas dang // rdzogs pa nam mkha'i ye
179a6(1): shes dang // dngos po lhan cig skyes pa ru// snang ba rkyen gyis sgyur ba ltar// ma lus de yi ngo bor 'gyur// de dag bltas pa'i khyad par gyis// rang re'i mos dang bsam pa dang // nus pa'i rim pa cir snang
179b1(1): yang // nam mkha' dang ba'i rang bzhin las// nyi zla gza' skar sprin khu rlangs// rang 'byung rang dwangs 'gyur med ltar// ji ltar snang ba'i chos rnams kun// dngos dbang don las ma g.yos pas// de dag de
179b2(1): ltar nyid snang bas// de nyid nam mkha'i khongs su 'du// de nas gtan tshigs bshad par bya// ma lus 'gro ba thams cad la// byang chub snying pos kun khyab pas// kun gyis mthong goms bya dgos pas// so
179b3(1): so thun mong gtan tshigs dang // thun mong ma yin la sogs pa// rgya mtsho klong dang chu bo ltar// ma lus 'dul shing 'byung ba yin// thun mong bzhi sogs gang yin pa// log lha phyogs 'dzin dgag pa
179b4(1): dang // dngos dbang thabs dang 'brel mtshon phyir// thun mong gtan tshigs brjod pa yin// gang phyir gtan tshigs thams cad kyis// rang las 'phrul phyir me long nyid// ma lus gcig dang tha dad min// gang
179b5(1): gi mtha' las yongs grol te// dbus su gzung med gtan la phebs// gcig dang du ma bral ba'o// rgyu dang rkyen dang 'bras bu ste// thabs de gdod nas dag pa gsum// ma lus rang snang rtogs pa
179b6(1): nyid// mtshan nyid de yi mtshan nyid do// rgyu gcig pa dang yig 'bru'i tshul// byin gyis brlabs dang mngon sum pa// ma lus rtogs pa bzhir shar te// de nyid rtogs pa bzhir snang ngo // ma skyes dang las gang
180a1(1): snang ba// chu dang rlabs bzhin gcig pas na// de dang der gcig dbyer med pas// dngos po lo rgyus nyid kyis shes// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi// rtsa ba chags sdang lnga nyid de// gzhi rtsam
180a2(1): bcos skad cig ma// de nyid rang spyir gang snang ba// rtogs pas spyi dang rang mtshan shes// snod bcud rgyud rnams mtha' yas dang // mnyam gnyis lhag pa'i mnyam gnyis kyis// dngos po snang grags chos
180a3(1): rnams kun// ma bcos de bzhin nyid du gnas// ma lus snying po thig le dang // lnga bdag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis rgyu// sa ya bcu gsum rtsa yan lag/ ro dang gnas skabs kun las grol// dang po gnas dag
180a4(1): gnyis pa gnyis// gsum pa ma lus khyab byed pa// nyams su myong byed gtan tshigs so// thig le gnas dang yig 'bru dang // de yi byin brlabs 'dres pa yis// bde ba chen po mngon du snang // chu las chu
180a5(1): bopo tha dad de// rgya mtsho las ni chu thigs dang // lam dang zhing sa'i 'bras bu ltar// thabs kyi khyad par snang ba yin// dngas ma lnga las gang byung ba// ji snyed lus sems rtsa thig le// khams lnga'i ro dang bcud
180a6(1): snang ba// ye shes chen por gtogs pa yin// gsum dngos brgyad sogs kha dog grangs// gnas pa gang yin de snod de// so so'i bcud kyi khyad par las// byang chub sems nyid gsal bar snang // don dam
180b1(1): kun rdzob dbyer med pa'i// bden bzhi dbyer med dwangs ma nyid// ma lus khyab pa'i tshul gyis snang // thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// thig le gcig dang du ma nyid// bral ba'i ye shes chen po
180b2(1): nyid// gcig dang du ma las grol ba'o// bcud 'dus thig le gnyis ro rgyu// rlung dang gdams ngag rkyen ldan pas// 'bras bu lhan cig skyes par snang // rang la gnas pa thabs kyis gsal// thabs dang shes
180b3(1): rab 'brel ba'i ro// rtsa yig bcas pa bcud 'dus pas// thabs dang rlung gi gdams pa yis// ma lus lhan skyes mngon sum gsal// bde dang stong nyid mi phyed pa// rang rig bde chen ma skyes gzugs// ma
180b4(1): lus 'od dang rnam pa ltar// dbyer med tshul dang rang snang ba'o// bde bas bskyed pa'i rtog pa lnga// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa nyid// ma lus ye shes chen po nyid// ye shes lnga yi rgyas btab pa'o// dbang po snod
180b5(1): bcud bcas pa yis// yab yum 'brel par bcas pa'i bcud// sems lnga'i rgyud du rang snang ba// mnyam pa bzhi yi tshul du gsal// de la sogs pa mtha' yas pa'i// phyi nang gsang ba mthar zug
180b6(1): pa'i// gtan tshigs mtha' yas bshad pa ste// rdo rje me long bshad pa'i rgyud// gang gis rtogs pa de nyid ni// ma lus rang snang sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las rang snang ba// zag med rang 'byung ngang
181a1(1): las 'char// chos rnams 'bras bur lhun rdzogs pa'i// bdag dang gzhan don lhun rdzogs pa// ma bcos ji bzhin dang bzhag las// lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung // gang dag gang la
181a2(1): gang brten pas// lhun gyis grub pas 'bras bu nyid// ma bcos sgyu ma lhun grub nyid// dus bzhi phyogs bcu ma lus par// lhun grub 'bras bur rang snang ba'o// rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me
181a3(1): long gi rgyud chen po las lta ba ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i// spyod pa'i khyad par ma lus pa// 'di dag bshad par bya ba
181a4(1): ste// rang bzhin thabs dang mngon gyur las// spyod pa ma lus bstan pa yin// e ma'o rang rig snying po las// bde sdug gnas dang longs spyod dang // tshe dang kha dog la sogs pa// la lar mngon par chags
181a5(1): pa ste// la lar drag shul zhe sdang spyod// la lar ri bos non pa nyid// la lar ldongs pa'i mun pa nyid// la lar phrag dog snang ba yin// la lar ser sna 'thab rtsod de// la lar 'chal dang bya ba btang // rtsol
181a6(1): dang mi rtsol la sogs pa// de la sogs pa mtha' yas rnyed// chos dbyings mtha' yas mu med pa'i// nam mkha' dbyings ni mtha' yas par// spyod pa'i khyad par de nyid do// rang 'byung thabs kyi spyod pa
181b1(1): nyid// ji ltar bsam zhing brtags pa ltar// rang bzhin dbye ba med pa'i phyir// sgo gsum byed spyod bsam mi khyab// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin gyis// ma lus sangs rgyas gnas gyur kyang // ma
181b2(1): rtogs thabs dang bral ba'i phyir// bde sdug sna tshogs bsam mi khyab// thabs chen dag dang ldan pa la// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal phrag dog chen po dag/ byang chub lam du bde bar
181b3(1): bshad// thabs dang mi ldan skye bo yis// thabs dang bya ba sna tshogs kyis// mdzad spyod dka' ba sna tshogs pa// mi dang lha las thar pa med// dper na dug dang ldan pa la// thabs kyi khyad par ji bzhin
181b4(1): du// rtogs pa'i khyad par ji bzhin du// bde dang sdug bsngal sna tshogs rgyun// rang bzhin gnyis med dag pa las// brtags pa'i bye brag khyad par gyis// mi mthun bde sdug sna tshogs myong // ma
181b5(1): bcos dbyings las g.yos pa med// gang dag thun mong ngo dag las// las dang bya ba sgo nas ni// spyad dang spyod dang spyod 'gyur phyir// 'di skad spyod pas spyod par gsungs// rang bzhin rgyal ba'i spyod pa
181b6(1): yis// chu dang rlabs ltar khyab gyur kyang // spong len bya ba sna tshogs las// spyod pa thabs kyis zin pa med// gang phyir thabs dang shes rab dang // sgra dang rtogs pa sna tshogs kyis// thun mong yul du ma gyur
182a1(1): pa// thun mong ma yin thabs spyod de// la lar thun mong nyid du ste// thar pa dang ni ma thar pa// kun du rgyu dang mu stegs dang // bud med dang ni ma rabs dang // rgyal po dpa' bo dka' thub
182a2(1): can// byis pa la sogs tha dad de// la lar dgod dang drag po dang // gshe dang 'jigs dang zhi ba dang // la lar de bzhin chags chen po// g.yo sgyu spyod dang g.yem par ston// zhi dang rku dang phrag
182a3(1): dog spyod// 'dod dang longs spyod gzir ba dang // glu bro gar dang 'jo sgeg dang // de bzhin 'jigs dang sdigs pa dang // ma rungs pa dang rnam par 'tshe// zhing khams rdzu 'phrul spyod pa dang // ngo mtshar cho
182a4(1): 'phrul du ma dag/ gang dang gang gis mdzad pa dag/ skye bo ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir// mdzad pa mtha' yas rnam par ston// zhi la tshangs dang khro la khro// thar pa na chung mdzes dang rol// gdud dang rmongs dang
182a5(1): ga bsngal ba// rang rang ded dpon mtha' yas pa'i// skra yi rol pa mtha' yas ston// byin gyis brlabs dang rang snang dang // brda dang rig pa ting 'dzin dang // tshig tu chags sdang rmongs pa dang // shin tu
182a6(1): rgyal dang phrag dog dang // 'jam dang dal dang snyan mi snyan// rtsub dang drag dang sbom phra dang // ring thung rol mo lha klu dang // mi dang mi min 'byung po'i sgra// khyim bdag dbang chen legs dpon dang // chags
182b1(1): can gtum po la sogs pa'i// sna tshogs rol pa mtha' yas pa// dag dang ma dag tshul gyis ni// gsung gi rol ba mtha' yas snang // la lar byams dang sdang ba dang // g.yeng dang mi g.yeng rmongs dang
182b2(1): ri// sdud dang mi sdud yal ba dang // grol dang ma grol rno rtul dang // ma rig ye shes la sogs pa// thugs kyi rol ba mtha' yas pa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul gyis snang // mtha' yas dbyer med dam pa
182b3(1): nyid// lung dang rigs pa man ngag gi// tshad ma dag gis gang btsal ba// shes bya khong du chud par 'gyur// de nas chos rnams ma lus pa// bdag gzhan phyi nang dbyer med pa'i// thams cad mkhyen pa'i tshul
182b4(1): gyis snang // mtha' yas dbyer med dam pa nyid// dran dang shes bzhin brtan po yis// dus gsum rgya mtsho gting lta bur// mi g.yo gsal ba'i ngang gyur nas// sgo gsum mnyam par sbyor ba yis// dang po
182b5(1): rtogs pa'i spyod pa ste// de bzhin nyid la gsal brtan te// stong pa shes rab spyod par bshad// de nas phyogs bcu ma lus pa// rang 'byung byang chub sems nyid phyir// gang snang rang rgyud dngos med de// sgyu ma
182b6(1): mig yor brag ca dang // smig rgyu chu bur la sogs pa// gong ma'i stobs dang 'di nyid stobs// mnyam par sbyor bas bsgom par bya// gang la ma bltas mngon byas dang // ting 'dzin rim pa gnyis med
183a1(1): pas// kun la snying rje'i spyod pa dag/ dam pa 'di ni spyad par bya// rang bzhin ched du dmigs pa dang // khyab dang shugs las gang byung ba'i// snying rje'i spyod par rnam par spyad// de nas sgyu ma lta
183a2(1): bu nyid// rang nyid phyogs med snang ba yis// cir yang bskur du rung ba'i phyir// rig pa dbu mar gang gsal ba// nyi zla brtsegs pa'i gdan du 'bar// sa bon gang las thabs cho gas// 'phro 'du zhu nas
183a3(1): mngon gyur pa// rdo rje gsum gyi ngo bor snang // de nyid gcig dang lnga gsum gyis// brtan 'bar mdzes par gsal gyur te// mdun dang gzhan du skabs dag sbyor// gcig dang nges med rim pa dang // 'khor
183a4(1): lo zhes bya bzhi ru gyur// gang gis gang de ma brten par// 'phro 'du bsgoms pa don med de// skyon bral gsal brtan 'dris pa yis// gang bsgoms gsal bar mngon du 'gyur// tha mal zhen rtog zlog pa
183a5(1): dang / lam gyi 'brel par bya ba dang // dngos grub 'bras la myur 'jug pas// rtags kyi lha ni bsgom par bya// de ltar brtan 'gyur gsal ba la// bdag gzhan phyi nang ma lus pa'i// sgo gsum sku
183a6(1): gsung thugs gsal bas// thun mong spyod pa rnam bcad la// sgo gsum mnyam bzhag rjes thob med// gang gis de ltar gsal bya'i phyir// phyogs gcig spyod pa brtsam par bya// de nas rtsa ba goms pa
183b1(1): dang // bslab bya khyad par mthar phyin ltar// gang de rim par bstan 'phel phyir// yan lag spros pa rnam par bsgom// lhag pa bcu gcig dgur ldan pa'i// gcig las rgyas bsdus phye ba yis// 'khor lo'i rtsa
183b2(1): ba lha dag kyang // yab yum gnas dgod gsal bar bsgom// de dag lhag pa'i lha dgu dag/ yan lag tshul du spros te bsgom// 'dul ba gnyis kyi rang bzhin gyis// mdzes pa'i tshul dang gdug pa
183b3(1): 'dul// lha dang zhal phyag dbu grangs kyang // rtsa ba yan lag spros tshul gyis// dkyil 'khor grangs dang gang sbyar ba'i// rim par spros shing bsgom par bya// grangs dang grangs med tshul dag gis// dpag tshad
183b4(1): rgya grags mkha' dbyings su// zhi dang khro la sogs pa yi// sangs rgyas sprin tshogs sna tshogs bsgom// dang po'i bar dang tha ma'i bar// rig pa'i ting 'dzin gsal brtan nas// sku gsung thugs dang ldan pa
183b5(1): yi// tshom bu rim par bsgom par bya// dgon pa'i rim pa'am nags tshal dang // chu 'gram ri rtse dur khrod dang // skyon bral yon tan rdzogs pa ste// dgra dang phyogs mtshams skyon med pa'i// brtag pa'i rim pa
183b6(1): ldan pa yis// shis dang 'thad pa'i sa phyogs su// gzhal yas rim brtsegs mdzes ldan pa// rgyan dang bcas pa ldan byas la// ting 'dzin mnyam pa'i shes rab thabs// mi ldan gong ma'i 'od
184a1(1): kyis spyad// bdag dang gzhan gyi nus pa yis// mnyam nas tshogs la 'jug par bya// yo byad lnga ldan thogs med par// cho ga'i rim pa ji bzhin brtsam// bro glu gar dang ting 'dzin bcas// bar
184a2(1): chatshad med par bsgrub par bya// gal te 'dod pa ma rdzogs par// sgyu ma'i lus de ma brtan na// yid kyis rdo rje gsum gsal bas// rnam par smin pa'i rig 'dzin de// phyin cad 'jigs bral khyung bzhin no// de
184a3(1): bas 'brel pa'i spyod ldan na// dbang skur zag med sa thob ste// brgya dang stong sogs 'jig bral zhing // gling dang 'jig rten brgya stong du// 'dul ba'i cho 'phrul mtha' yas snang // 'jigs pa med cing mi
184a4(1): ldogs// dpa' bo rdzogs pa'i rnal 'byor pas// gzhan don spyod pa'i khyad par dag/ 'dul ba'i dbang ni sna tshogs kyis// rnam par brtse ba sna tshogs spro// 'di ni rgyal ba thams cad kyi// shes rab phyi yi spyod
184a5(1): pa ste// cho ga rgyas par bstan pa yin// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// nang du 'jug pa'i rim pa yi// spyod pa'i khyad par cho ga dag/ de nas rim pa 'di dag bshad// lus can 'gro ba thams cad la// tsakra
184a6(1): bzhi dang sku gsung thugs// spor dang 'bar ma 'khyil pa dang // 'brel dang ma 'brel khug pa dang // 'dzin dang 'dzag dang gnas pa dang // de bzhin khyab dang 'khrul pa'i rtsa// gang du rgyu dang gnas 'dzin
184b1(1): pas// rtsa zhes de la mngon bshad de// de dag rgyu dang lam 'bras dang // thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas// bde ba chen po skyed par byed// gong dang 'og gi rang bzhin las// spyi dang khyad par kha sbyor
184b2(1): 'byung // sa bon khyab byed 'khor lo yis// thams cad khyab cing 'dzag pa'i rtsa// dwangs snyigs rlung dang 'brel pa yis// gang de pho mo'i bcud rkyen gyis// zag dang zag med bde ba skyed// lus kun khyab par
184b3(1): gnas pa nyid// dwangs ma thur gyi rlung dang 'grogs// gang na sgra sbyor 'khor lo can// des kyang kun khyab rgyu ba can// 'khrul zhing 'khor bas 'khor lo ste// gsung gi 'khor lo ngag gi rten// rdzogs dang ma
184b4(1): rdzogs gang mi gsal// sgra sbyor dag dang ma dag gyur// bde dang snyan dang mi snyan dang // bya dang dri za bung ba dang // chags pa'i sgra ni sna tshogs byed// mdog dmar lus khyab klu la sogs// u tha'i rlung dang
184b5(1): 'grogs te gnas// d+harma tsakra srog gi rten// ma lus gzhi rtsa kun gyi srog/ rtsa bzhi yan lag brgyad dang ldan// dngas ma lnga 'dus kun gyi gtso// phyi rim rin chen sul mang 'dra// mi shigs thig le bde chen
184b6(1): po// rin chen phung po za ma tog/ sna tshogs ye shes lnga yi bdag/ thung ngu a yi rang bzhin can// srog gi rlung dang 'grogs te gnas// phyi rim pad+ma 'dab brgyad de// chos nyid ye shes yon tan dang // rang rgyud
185a1(1): bzhi la yan lag brgyad// thun mong phyi yi rim pa yin// 'di la rtsa gsum rim pa ste// zag pa'i rtsa dang mngon shes rtsa// chos nyid rim pa gsum du gnas// rlung yang gcig gam gnyis yin
185a2(1): te// de las bye brag dpag med pa'o// gnas pa dang ni rgyu ba'i rlung // gnas pa srog dang ye shes te// rgyu ba bzhi ni mngon par brjod// phyi nang can dang gyen zur can// de re'ang dwangs snyigs khyad par
185a3(1): gyis// rim pa brgyad du mngon snang yin// gnyid dang 'gro ba'i sa bon gyis// chags sdang dran rtog kun gyi gzhi// gang du gnas dang gnas ma yin// rgyu zhing 'pho ba rlung gis te// bde dang sdug bsngal ji snyed
185a4(1): pa// myong zhing skyed par byed pa yin// 'di ni gnas dang mi gnas kyis// srog dbang dran pa dbang sgyur bas// gnas dang 'pho ba pha rol dag/ gnas pa srog gi rlung can no// gang du 'khrul pa 'dzed pa
185a5(1): ni// ma lus 'gyed cing spro ba yi// gyen zur 'dzeg cing 'gengs 'byung ba'i// sgo gnyis lus kun khyab pa'i rtsa// drug cu rtsa bzhi snying po can// phyi rim bzhi yi rgyun du 'khyil// dbus nas 'khyil ba thig le'i
185a6(1): rtsa// 'phen pa bde ba'i rlung dang 'grogs// gang du'ang 'khrul cing sprul pa'i phyir// sprul pa'i 'khor lo shes rab nyid// de 'og gru gsum 'bar ba'i rtsa// gyen du 'bar dang thur du 'phro// 'od kyis 'bar ba'i
185b1(1): sa bon can// rtse mo'i 'og mas reg pa'i khams// gtum mo ste 'og 'bar ba'i rtsa// skyes bu chags pa slong ba ltar// 'di dag bde ba bskyed pa ste// gnas sa tshad dang bcas par gnas// de 'og g.yo ba rlung
185b2(1): gi rten// 'byed dang 'dzums pa'i las can nyid// de dang de gnyis gang ldan pas// lus kyi dngas snyigs 'dis 'byed pa// bye brag brgyad cu rtsa gnyis rtsa// 'dus pas sku gsung thugs yin te// lte ba thur du
185b3(1): 'dzag pa'i rtsa// rtsa gsum 'dom pa'i bde ba'i gnad// rgyu ba rlung ni thig le'i rten// 'gyed cing 'dud pa g.yas g.yon te// bcu drug 'dus pa'i srog rtse gong // rtsa gsum mgrin par 'dus pa ni// sgra sbyor
185b4(1): 'khor lo ngag gi gnad// de nas dngas ma'i thig le la// ma lus 'dus pa'i tshul du gnas// rig pa'i rtsa la bcud 'dus pas// thogs med gsal ba'i mngon shes 'byung // phyi rol zag pa'i rtsa nyid
185b5(1): la// bde ba chen po'i bcud 'dus pas// bde chen nyams nyid skye bar 'gyur// chos nyid thig le mi g.yo ba// dngas ma 'dus pa'i bcud thim pas// ye shes lnga dang ldan pa yi// zag med ye shes bde ba
