304a6(1): do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khro bo'i rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin rnam par spros pa'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos dkyil 'khor
304b1(1): tshogs chen po 'di dag dam tshig gis grub par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i khro bo khrag 'thung chen po btsun mo dang bcas pa'i tshogs de dag gi sku dang gsung thugs rdo rje rngam pa las gsung gi dkyil
304b2(1): 'khor 'di dag phyung ngo // // oM ta thA ga ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TaM ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TaM ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM rat+na ma hA shrI
304b3(1): he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAM ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAM ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM karma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAM ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM
304b4(1): phaT/ oM ta thA ga ta ma hA kro d+he shwa ri dza la ni sarba duSh+TAM hUM phaT/ oM ma hA badz+ra d+hA ra ma hA kro d+he shwa ri dz+wa la ni hUM phaT/ oM ma hA sUr+ya rat+na ma hA kro d+he shwa ri bi d+ha ma hUM phaT/ oM hri ma ha swa ra swa ta ma hA pad+ma kro d+he shwa ri khA
304b5(1): hihe hUM phaT/ oM sarba a mo g+ha ma hA kro d+he shwa ri bi shwa hUM phaT/ badz+ra go ri ya/ badz+ra tsau ri sa/ badz+ra pra mo he ha/ badz+ra be ta lI haH/ badz+ra tsaN+Da lI ha/ badz+ra puk+ka sI haH/ badz+ra g+ham+ba rI ha/ badz+ra swa shA nI ya/ badz+ra siM ha ma?
304b6(1): khIkhA he/ badz+ra b+ha g+ha mu khI he/ badz+ra sr-i gla mu khI he/ badz+ra shra nA mu khI he/ badz+ra g+h+r-i D+ha mu khI he/ badz+ra kAng+ka mu khI he/ badz+ra kha ga mu khI he/ badz+ra u lU ka mu khI he/ badz+ra Ar+ya te dza te da dzaHbadz+ra a ma ka hUM/ badz+ra lo ka baM/ badz+ra
305a1(1): b+ha shrI pa la ya ba to hoH/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+ho b+h+yo/ b+ho b+h+yo/ b+ho b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo/ ru lu ru lu hAM/ e h+ye hi yA na ya dzaHtrUM baM ho raM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa
305a2(1): ma ya hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya phaT// oM khro la khros pas zhi mdzad pa// thugs rjes khros dpal rngam pa'i tshogs// 'bar ba'i byin brlabs rmad po che// de nyid du ni bdag la stsol// oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma yas+t+waM/
305a3(1): oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya ho/ a li u le/ ta li ta pa ti/ daMSh+TaM/ go nA ro/ tri kha raM yo gi nI khA hi hoH/ hUM ha he phaT ces brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad tshig rab tu tshig kun du tshig go/ 'bar
305a4(1): rab tu 'bar kun tu 'bar ro// thams cad du 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs kyis gang rab tu gang kun tu rab tu gang bar gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khro bo'i tshogs chen po
305a5(1): gsung gi dkyil 'khor spros pa'i le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa khro bo chen po'i byin brlabs phyag rgya 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa
305a6(1): 'di brjod do// dbang po'i yul de rig pa'i rnams// thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur cing // mnyam pa'i ngang nyid rtogs gsal na// thams cad bde ba chen po'i rgya// bskyod chen 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// khro
305b1(1): bopo khro mo thams cad kun// gsal zhing 'od zer 'phro bsgoms na// bskul bskyod thams cad phyag rgya yin// zla med chen pos de skad gsungs// yan lag snying po rtse lnga rtse dgu bcu gcig tu// las rnams so
305b2(1): sor rab tu bsgom// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i zhabs// rtag tu rdo rje 'bar bar 'gyur// thabs chen re re bskyod na ni// pad+ma chags med re re 'byung // rdo rje pad+ma de 'byor na// sems can thams cad bla
305b3(1): na med// byang chub zhing du skye bar 'gyur// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor lha rnams kyang // khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bsgom byas te// dbu yi dkyil 'khor bskul bskyod na// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad
305b4(1): g.yo// lag gi 'du byed bskyod byas na// rig 'dzin zhing khams thams cad g.yo// rkang pa'i stabs chen gnan mchongs na// sdug bsngal mi bzad thams cad dang // bdud dang log 'dren thams cad
305b5(1): gnon// yan lag thams cad bsgral bsigs na// ba spu bu ga re re nas// khro bo grangs med rdul snyed 'phro// de dag sprul pa grangs med kyis// phyogs bcu khams mang rdul snyed du// khro bo'i don rnams rdul
305b6(1): phran snyed// thugs rjes gdul zhing dbyings su bstim// thams cad khro bo'i dkyil 'khor dang // khro mo'i dkyil 'khor rab tu 'dus// thams cad rdo rje'i brag stengs dang // me ri'i dkyil 'khor rab tu
306a1(1): 'bar// 'di ni spyi rgya chen po yin// steng gi bgegs rnams 'dul ba'i phyir// rdo rje 'khor lo ni mgo gdengs// 'og gi 'jig rten bgegs 'dul ba'i// rdo rje zong gshol rje sbar dang // rdo rje
306a2(1): gtun chen dril bu'o// shar gyi bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni// rdo rje rab tu 'bar ba dang // sti ra chen po'i dbyug pa'o// lho yi bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni// rin chen mi mgo'i dbyug pa dang // gshin rje chen
306a3(1): po'i rkang bzung ba'o// nub kyi bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni// sbrul dang sti ra'i dbyug pa dang // khyung chen gshog gis rab tu rdebs// rgya mtsho che rnams rked par gtub// byang gi bgegs rnams 'dul ba
306a4(1): ni// rin po che yi dbyug to dang // nr-i mgo gsum pa'i dbyug to can// gnod sbyin gdon rnams tshar gcod pa'o// mtshams bzhi'i bgegs rnams 'dul ba ni// phyogs bzhi dag gis gdul bar 'gyur// gal
306a5(1): te de yis ma dul na// byang shar mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul ba// rdo rje rtse gsum nr-i mgo gdengs// i sha nyid kyang phyag na bsnams// 'byung po de kun rab tu btul// shar lho mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul
306a6(1): pabapa// rdo rje ye shes me lce 'bar// me de nyid kyang 'tshig par byed// drang srong nyid kyang phyag rgyar bsnams// me lha gdon 'khor dbang du bsdus// lho nub mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul ba// rdo rje dang ni srin po'i
306b1(1): mgo/ rab tu rno ba'i ral gri 'bar// bden bral nyid kyang phyag na bsnams// srin po'i tshogs rnams dbang du bsdus// nub byang mtshams kyi bgegs 'dul ba// rlung gi ba dan nr-i mgo gdengs// shin tu drag
306b2(1): po glang po'i brjid// tshig srung nyid kyang phyag na bsnams// g.yeng ba thams cad dbang du bsdus// 'og tu 'jig rten bgegs 'dul phyir// phyag rgya ri rab chen po ste// phag chen po ni phyag na bsnams// 'og
306b3(1): gi bgegs rnams 'dul ba'o// gzhan yang nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor gyis// tsha dang grang ba'i sdug bsngal sel// me yi dkyil 'khor chen po yis// thams cad ma lus sreg par byed// chu yi dkyil 'khor chen po
306b4(1): yis// thams cad ma lus 'khru bar byed// rlung gi dkyil 'khor chen po yis// thams cad ma lus gtor bar byed// gzhan yang ral gri 'khor lor bcas// mda' gzhu tho chen gri chen dang // rdo rje mdung chen
306b5(1): dgra star bcas// mche gtsigs spu gri so dang ni// mda' dang mdung dang sti ra dang // gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs so// dbus kyi he ru'i phyag rgya ni// sti ra dbyug to chen po dang // 'khor lo chen po rab tu
306b6(1): 'bar// dung chen dmar gyis gang ba la// rdo rjes dkrug cing rab tu gsol// shar gyi khro bo'i phyag rgya ni// sti ra chen po'i dbyug pa dang // rdo rje chen po rab tu 'bar// nr-i mgo dmar chen bkang ba gsol// lho
307a1(1): yi phyag rgya chen po ni// sti ra chen po'i dbyug pa dang // yid bzhin nor bu'i gzhal yas su// dmar gyi ar+g+ha rab tu gsol// nub kyi khro bo'i phyag rgya ni// sti ra chen po'i dbyug pa dang // pad+ma
307a2(1): chags med rab tu 'bar// dung chen dmar gyis bkang ba gsol// byang gi khro bo'i phyag rgya ni// sti ra chen po'i dbyug pa dang // rdo rje rgya gram rab tu 'bar// dung chen dmar gyis bkang ba gsol// khro mo rnams
307a3(1): kyang khro dang mthun// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya ni// rgyud gzhan dag dang mthun par bshad// ma mo rnams kyi phyag rgya ni// 'jig rten 'das mdo che las bshad// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa sku
307a4(1): 'phrul dra ba las phyag rgya spros pa'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos de dag gi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor
307a5(1): rtsibs bzhi pa// gru chad bzhi yis rnam par brgyan// gru bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan// 'bar ba'i bar khyams gnyis kyis mdzes// thod sbrul sna tshogs nyi mas brjid// 'bar ba'i 'phro ba mang po 'khrug/ khru
307a6(1): mchog ma he gzig dang stag/ gtum pa'i dom gyis sbar bas ni// dbang phyug lha chen la sogs bzung // spug gnag sngo gnag ser gnag dang // dmar gnag ljang gnag 'jigs pa'i sku// dbu gsum phyag
307b1(1): drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// ko rlon gos ni sna tshogs gyon// rngam pa'i sgra chen 'jigs par sgrogs// sbrul dang thod phreng nyi zlar bcas// steng gi 'jig rten khor yug bcas// rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang // ral gri
307b2(1): dgra sta gshol la sogs// rang gi lag cha sna tshogs bsnams// btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang 'khril// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang // sgo bzhi phyag rgyar rab mdzes shing // slas dang byi mo tshogs kyi
307b3(1): gtso// bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad kyis mdzes// rang gi stan dang lag cha dang // ci bgyi zhes te chas te gnas// zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor kun du
307b4(1): gsal bar gyur to// de nas dgyes pa chen po bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dra ba las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung ngo // a ho// bskal par bcas shing dug tshogs 'bar
307b5(1): ba yi// nyon mongs kun g.yo dkyil 'khor 'khor lo brjod dka' ba'i// ji snyed 'jig rten rgyan gyis rdul snyed bsam yas pa// ro tshogs khrag la brkam pa dpung gnyen kun bkye nas// zhen pa'i gdug mo
307b6(1): shin tu gsal ba dka' ba yi// mi mngon dbyings nas gzugs kyi cho 'phrul bsam yas kyis// snyigs mar bcas shing mtshams sbyor kun ngam zil gyis gnon// rab tu gnon pa'i 'jigs byed bsam mi
308a1(1): khyab// de bzhin de nyid gnyen por kun byung kun tu gsal// ho/ chos rnams ji snyed 'gro drug smin byed brjod mi lang // dus mtha' rmongs la gnas pa brjod mi lang // 'dod pas zhen pa'i
308a2(1): las kyang ji snyed ji srid par// drag po bdo ba'i rlung chen bsam mi khyab// bde bar bcas pa gzhan du med par brjod mi lang // bskal par bsags pa'i dug chen rab rtogs kun tu rtog/ de rnams zil
308a3(1): gnon khrag 'thung sku gsung 'jigs byed par// rkyen du bcas nas sbu bus 'bras bu smin pa rab smin ltar// dgyes pa chen po bcom ldan 'das ni mang po'i tshogs// dpag med bsam yas lhun grub
308a4(1): pas// rab tu 'dul bar shin tu gsal// ho/ khro bo'i rang bzhin gdug par 'jigs pa ma yin zhing // zhi ba mdzes pa kun gyi yid dang 'thad par gnas rgyud yong ma yin// de nyid gnyis su min pa'i cho
308a5(1): 'phrul bsam yas thams cad kun tu khyab// rigs lnga khrag 'thung 'jigs pa'i rol pa rdul snyed rab ston pa'i// rnam dag byang chub mchog gi dbyings te gsang ba'i snying por rab bstan nges pa nyid de shin tu
308a6(1): gnas par gsal// ho/ rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste sum cu gcig pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen
308b1(1): pos nyid kyi byin brlabs dang yon tan ston pa zhes bya ba 'di ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// oM sangs rgyas rnal 'byor chen po ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// ye shes snying po'i mchog nyid
308b2(1): de// sangs rgyas kun du bzang po nyid// 'di yin gzhan na med pa ste// rol pa kun la mnga' brnyes shing // srid pa 'jig rten thams cad kun// sangs rgyas nyid de dus gsum du// ma g.yos lhun gnas snying
308b3(1): po ste// rang bzhin che ba'i yon tan las// ma rtogs rmongs pa'i 'gro ba la/ sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa// snying rje chags pa'i dam tshig gis// nga rgyal nyid kyi sku chen bstan// gdug cing gtum pa'i
308b4(1): khams gsum na// 'dul ba'i zhing du rab sbyor zhing // phrin las rnam bzhi rdzogs par mdzad// ye shes ngo mtshar tsham ngam gyis// chos bzhi rnam dag che ba'i lha// ye shes sku ste khyad par che// chags pa'i tshogs
308b5(1): kyis mtshan ma ni// 'dod chags chen po nyid kyi sku// gtum rngam gdug pas mtshan pas na// zhe sdang chen po nyid kyi sku// gdul bya zhing du rab sbyong zhing // chos nyid mnyam las bzhengs pas na// gti mug chen
308b6(1): po nyid kyi sku// snod bcud dag pa'i spyod yul ba// thugs sku gsung las 'phros pa dang // rgyal ba nga yis mtshan pas na// nga rgyal chen po nyid kyi sku// gsang ba'i snying po bzhi bcu gnyis// thig le thugs su
309a1(1): bsdus pa nyid// gzhan du mi gtong mtshan pas na// de nyid phrag dog nyid sku rdzogs// stong gsum stong gi stong chen po// 'jig rten khams mang sna tshogs pa// rdul dang bye ba la sogs
309a2(1): pa'i// bgrang ba las ni rab 'das mtshan// de nyid snang zhing srid pa nyid// 'jigs byed sku gsung thugs kyi dbyings// chos sku ye shes rang bzhin la// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i thig le mchog/ snying po thig le bsam
309a3(1): yas nyid// 'jigs byed dbu dgu bcwa brgyad phyag/ sgyu mas mtshan pa'i dra ba yin// de nyid tshogs dang dkyil 'khor sngags// gcig la gsum du mchog tu sngags// yul dang 'byung ba de nyid do// bdag rig
309a4(1): gzhan don snying po nyid// thabs dang shes rab phyag mtshan pa// gnyis med rig pa'i ye shes che// ming dang gzugs dang dbur gyur pa// phyag dang zhabs su rnam par brtags// brtags pa las ni 'phros pa'i
309a5(1): sgra// ci yang med las cir yang snang // skal bzang mchog gi sgyu 'phrul pa// dra ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs// brtags pa zil gnon chos nyid spyan// spyan ni chos nyid mnyam pa nyid// ji bzhin dbyings kyi
309a6(1): yul la sbyor// rol pa'i rtsed mor sdang mig pa// gzhan du mi gzigs yul la gzigs// pad+ma 'khyil pa nyid sku gsung // mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i dngos po 'jig/ ye shes chen po'i spyan bgrad las// khro gnyer
309b1(1): glog stong 'gyur ba yi// me yi tshogs kyi gzhan phug glog/ bdud rtsi zhing du sbyor bas na// bdud rtsi mchog gi khro bo yin// sku nyid mnyam pa rdzogs pa las// sna tshogs 'char bar rab ston pa// ye shes sku
309b2(1): 'phrul stobs chen po// mi g.yo mchog gi 'du 'phro las// gshog pa rdo rje gtams pa ni// shes rab tshogs la 'phrul pa dang // thugs rje dra ba'i byin brlabs kyis// 'khor yug ji snyed mtha' klas
309b3(1): pa// dbyings nyid bde la spyod pa ste// 'phros nas dbang du byed pa'i don// rta yi gar thabs rdzu 'phrul gyis// gcig kyang yal ba ma yin pa'o// chos dbyings mnyam dang mi mnyam pa'i// sgyu 'phrul dkyil
309b4(1): 'khor mthas klas par// rtsed mo mchog gi phyag rgya ni// brkyang dang bskum pa zhabs tshul te// thabs dang shes rab rol pa'i don// rang dbang thabs chen rgyal po yis// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung ba// thig/
309b5(1): le mchog gi gnas la rdzogs// dbang phyug lha chen la sogs la// zil gnon khros pa'i phyag mtshan pa// sna tshogs mtshon rnon mang po bsnams// nga rgyal gdug pa'i zhe sdang gcod// gti mug chos sku sgyu 'phrul
309b6(1): ba// dra ba'i thugs rje mtha' dag ni// khros pa'i dam tshig snying rje yis// mnyam pa'i thig ler dgod pa ni// gshin rje gshed por gdugs pa'i rgyal// gdug pa'i tshogs rnams mchog sgrol bden// 'gro la
310a1(1): mgon du gyur pas na// dug dang bdud rtsi khyad med pa'i// chos sku gdug pas brgyan pa'i sbrul// dbang rtags ye shes rgyan du bzhag/ dur khrod rdzas dang khrag 'thung ba'i// g.yang gzhi stag gi
310a2(1): pags chen bgos// 'jigs byed snying rje'i dam tshig ni// skye shi rtsa ba gcod mdzad pa// mi g.yo mgon zhes mchog tu bsgrags// nga rgyal lag gis 'du byed pa// nga rgyal 'phrog pa'i dam tshig ste// kun tu
310a3(1): bzang po'i spyod yul la// sngags kyi snying po de nyid pa// hUM hUM hUM gis sdud za 'thung // rdo rje thugs kyi byin brlabs kyis// hUM mdzad ches ni rnam par bsgrags// mi mched gti mug chen po ni// nyon mongs rgya
310a4(1): mtsho rngub pa'i phyir// b+han d+ha klong chen 'thung bar snang // 'jig rten 'bar ba'i sprin chen po// bskal pa las kyi zil gnon pa// rdo rje me yi 'bar ba 'byung // nyon mongs rgya mtsho skems par byed// 'jigs
310a5(1): byed thabs kyi dam tshig gis// bsam yas 'jig rten 'khor yug bcas// rang gi sku yi gzhal med bsdus// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i ye shes ni// zil gyis gnon pa dur khrod gling // tshom bu gnyis kyi lha chen
310a6(1): po// rdo rje sku yi byin brlabs kyis// thig le mi g.yo bde ba las// rang bzhin rol pa chen pos ni// rdo rje phra men pho nya'i tshogs// khams gsum 'dul bar yang dag mdzad// ha ni thig le zhi ba nyid// ha
310b1(1): ni thig le zhi khro snyoms// ha ni thig le dbang chen yin// ha ni thig le drag po nyid// ha ni thig le rol pa nyid// ha ni thig les phrin las nyid// ha ni thig les chags dbang 'dul// ha ni thig le las kun
310b2(1): rdzogs// he ni thig le ye shes thugs// he ni thig les gsung snyan pa// he ni thig les tsham ngam lce// he ni thig le rol pa nyid// he ni thig le dbang rtags yin// he ni thig les drag shul ba// he ni thig
310b3(1): las thugs chen rdzogs// de ni thig les dkyil 'khor ba// 'jigs phyed mchog gi sgyu 'phrul te// dra bas zil gnon lam 'gog go/ hUM ni ye shes thugs kyi thugs// hUM ni ye shes thugs sku nyid// hUM ni ye
310b4(1): shes thugs sku gsung // hUM ni ye shes yid bzhin las// hUM ni thig le ye shes so// phaT ni sku yi thugs kyi thugs// phaT ni gsung gi gsung gi thugs// phaT ni thugs kyi thugs kyi thugs// phaT ni chos
310b5(1): sku'i thugs kyi thugs// phaT ni chos sku'i gsung gi thugs// phaT ni chos thugs thugs kyi thugs// sgyu 'phrul dra bas dgyes pa ho// dbang phyug chags pas dgyes pa ho// gar thabs rol pas dgyes pa ho// sku
310b6(1): gsung thugs ldan dgyes pa ho// yon tan las kyis dgyes pa ho// pho nya 'du 'phros dgyes pa ho// kun la snang bas dgyes pa ho// byin gyi brlabs kyis dgyes pa ho// chos kyi sku la dgyes pa ho// ye
311a1(1): shes rol pa dgyes pa ho// ci yang min pas dgyes pa ho// gnod pa sdud pas dgyes pa ho// chos kyi dbyings nyid dgyes pa ho// des dgyes pa chen po nyid la nyid shin tu dgyes par gyur te/
311a2(1): chos thams cad gcig gi rang bzhin du gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa stong phrag brgya las dgyes pa chen po'i byin brlabs dang yon tan mchog ston pa'i le'u ste sum cu gnyis
311a3(1): pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos 'jigs byed kyi bsod nams sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// 'khor lo bar khyams sgo
311a4(1): rnams su// 'jigs byed 'khor lo rigs kyi gtso// btsun mo tshogs dang ldan par bsgom// zhi dang drag po dbang dang rgyas// 'jigs pa'i tshogs chen de dbus su// bdag nyid drag po bcos tshul du// sku
311a5(1): gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// 'khor lo bar khyams sgo rnams su// 'jigs byed rdo rje rigs kyi gtso// btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang bcas// khro mo'i tshogs dang ldan par bsgom// zhi dang drag po
311a6(1): dbang dang rgyas// 'jigs pa'i tshogs chen de dbus su// lus dang ngag yid byin brlabs nas// bdag nyid drag po bcos tshul du// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// 'khor lo bar khyams sgo rnams
311b1(1): su// 'jigs byed rin chen rigs kyi gtso// btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang bcas// khro mo'i tshogs dang ldan par bsgom// zhi dang drag po dbang dang rgyas// 'jigs pa'i tshogs chen de dbus su// lus dang
311b2(1): ngag yid byin brlabs nas// bdag nyid drag po bcos tshul du// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor sgom// yang na rigs dbang dkyil 'khor ro// 'khor lo bar khyams sgo rnams su// 'jigs pa'i phrin las
311b3(1): rigs kyi gtso// btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang bcas// khro mo'i tshogs dang ldan par bsgom// zhi dang drag po dbang dang rgyas// las bzhi dkyil 'khor rdzogs par dgod// 'jigs pa'i tshogs chen de dbus
311b4(1): su// lus dang ngag yid byin brlabs nas// bdag nyid drag por rab gnas nas// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// 'jigs byed lnga rdzogs dkyil 'khor ni// nyi shu rtsa lnga sku gsung thugs// yon
311b5(1): tan phrin las rdzogs par bsgom// rgyan dang cha lugs la sogs pa// 'jigs pa'i tshogs ni ji bzhin par// tsham ngam chen po'i cha lugs bsgom// glu dang gar dang phyag rgya dang // shes rab thabs su shes pa
311b6(1): dang // byang chub sems kyi mchod pa dang // brda la sogs pa'i yon tan dang // bza' dang bca' dang btung dang bgo/ longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad kyi// mdor na tshogs rnams mngon du bsgrub// gsang ba'i
312a1(1): snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las 'jigs byed chen po'i bsod nams sbyin pa dam tshig gi le'u ste sum cu gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos cho ga dang dkyil 'khor
312a2(1): yongs su shes par bya ba'i phyir ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs// chos dbyings rnam dag dkyil 'khor ro// gsang sngags spyi yi dkyil 'khor las// shes 'jug yum
312a3(1): gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// rgyang grags dpag tshad la sogs dang // lus gang lus do gsum gyi tshad// rang gi rig pas ci nus par// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// gnod bskrad sa gnon byin gyis
312a4(1): brlab// ljon pa lcug phran sdong gcig dang // ma reg tshon gyis ji bzhin du// goms par bya ba'i ting 'dzin dbab// 'jigs byed sku gsung dkyil 'khor bzlas// gnas dang zla dang rdzas rnams ni// tshogs
312a5(1): kyi mchog tu dmigs pas gzhag/ dang por mchod sbyin dam pas mchod// gzugs dang lugs chen dung mchog ni// ci 'dod snang bar bdag gis dgod// 'jigs byed dbang du bdag zhugs nas// khro mo
312a6(1): snyed 'khor du bya// bar chad ting 'dzin mchog gis zlog/ gsang ba'i snying por nyid bshams te/ 'das pa bdag tu mnyam sbyar zhing // thugs kyi sngags kyis spyan drangs nas// bdag gi lus la zhugs tshul
312b1(1): du// de yi gzugs gzung mchog tu bstim// dzaHzhes lan gsum brjod pas na// de nyid bsod nams lus thob cing // ye shes lnga yi dngos grub sbyin// pho nya 'du 'phro mang po rnams// de yi dgos pa byed par
312b2(1): 'gyur// yang na sa gzhi rab mnyam la// phyag rgya gzugs dang snying po rnams// lnga yi tshon gyis bri bar bya// dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri sha chen// rdo rje dung chen dmar rtsis dgang // dung dang srog shing gsar rnying
312b3(1): dang // zhing 'gyur mchog dang mchog phran dang // ji snyed pa yi rdzas rnams kun// 'jigs byed chen po'i ting 'dzin dang // nyams pa med pa'i sems kyis spyad// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la// rdeng dang
312b4(1): bcas pa'i bsam pa yis// re ba med par rab tu bsgrub// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen pa// sgrub pa dang ni sgrub chen pos// zhag ni tshang zhing rtags byung na// dkyil 'khor mthun pa nyid du sbyar// zhag ni sum
312b5(1): cu phrag drug gam// drug cu dgu bcu rtsa drug tu// 'jigs byed chen po'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// 'jigs byed tshogs la bdag lus dbul// de nyid dkyil 'khor nyid du brtag/ 'da' bar mi mdzad dam tshig
312b6(1): las// nams kyang 'da' bar mi mdzad do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dgyes pa chen po'i dkyil 'khor dam tshig gi le'u ste sum cu bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa
313a1(1): chen pos sngags kyi snying po 'di ched du brjod do// a gi du na dza la maN+Da la phaT phaT phaT/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA shri he ru ka ma hA kro d+he shwa ri hUM phaT/ ru lu ma hA sa ma ya hUM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hAM/ oM
313a2(1): ma hA badz+ra shrI he ru ka badz+ra kro d+he shwa ri sarba duSh+TAn hUM phaT/ ru lu ma hA sa ma ya hUM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ oM rat+na ma hA shrI he ru ka rat+na ma hA kro d+he shwa ri bi d+ha mu kha hUM phaT/ ru lu ru lu ma hA sa ma ya hUM b+h+yo hUM/ oM hrIHpad+ma ma
313a3(1): hashrI he ru ka pad+ma ma hA kro d+he shwa ri khA hi hUM phaT/ ru lu ma hA sa ma ya hUM ru lu ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ oM karma ma hA shrI he ru ka sarba a ga ma hA kro d+he shwa ri bi shwa rU be hUM phaT/ ru lu ma hA sa ma ya hUM/ ru lu ru lu ru lu hUM
313a4(1): b+h+yo hUM/ oM ma hA sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra rat+na pad+ma a mo g+ha ma hA badz+ra shrI he ru ka/ ma ha sa ma ya ha he hUM phaT/ ru lu ru lu ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pad+ma shrI he ru ka man+ta dza la ma hA maN+Da la ka ya ba ka/
313a5(1): tsit+ta/ oM oM oM hUM hUM hUM/ s+t+waM s+t+waM s+t+waM/ AM AM AM/ haM hUM haM/ badz+ra ma hA ka pA la khaD+ga daN+De na dza la sid d+ha/ ma hA shrI he ru ka a me du me sid d+ho da bA be/ saM ha ra Na/ hUM hUM hUM/ ma hA yo ga ad d+ha ma hA sa ma ya/ ru lu ru lu//
313a6(1): a la la hoH/ ho sems nyid thig ler rab gnas pa'i// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis nyid rdzogs// sangs rgyas rdo rje he ru ka/ tshom bu dkyil 'khor bsam yas kyi// sku gsung thugs su bdag sbyor cig/ oM
313b1(1): badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya hoH/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM aM hUM su ra stAM/ ka ma la ma ha su kha mA le ma nu sa ma na dza la ni d+ha na a ba yo ga khA hi a la a la hoH// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las 'jigs
313b2(1): byed chen po sngags kyi bzlas pa snying po 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i dam tshig chen pos phung po dang / khams dang skye mched sbyin pa'i ting nge
313b3(1): 'dzin la bzhugs te gdug pa'i tshogs byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // oM sarba ta thA ga ta pad+ma sa ma yo gi nI dzaH/ zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs
313b4(1): bcu thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gsung thugs kyi snying po kun tu pad+mar gyur te/ dbu dgu phyag bcwa brgyad pa las dbu dang phyag dang zhabs stong khams kyi rdul snyed du srid pa'i rtse mor thug par gnas
313b5(1): par gyur to// de nas yang dkyil 'khor chen po rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te// ri rab chen po brkyang bskum gyi tshul gyis 'dril zhing / oM a b+hi tsa ra pa shI na zhes brjod pas lha'i
313b6(1): tshogs dang / klu'i tshogs dang / gnod sbyin chen po dang / srin po dang / mi dang / mi ma yin pa ji snyed pa thams cad rang dbang med par zhabs 'dril ba'i 'og tu gnas par gyur to// de nas yang ha ha a bi ra
314a1(1): tsa tiSh+Tha zhes brjod pas la la ni lus shin tu brdzes te ri rab chen po'i 'og tu gnas par gyur te/ la la ni mngon sum gcan mar ri rab chen po'i 'og tu gnas par gyur to// de nas yang sa
314a2(1): 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba gdug cing zhe sdang che ba dad pa med cing rdo rje theg pa smod pa zhig yongs kyi 'jig rten na gnas par mkhyen to// mkhyen nas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs nas/ oM pad+ma sa ma yo gi ni
314a3(1): ru lu ru lu ru lu hUM zhes brjod pas kun tu sku chags pa'i bdag nyid dang / kun tu gsung chags pa'i cha lugs dang / kun tu thugs chags par gyur pa dang / kun tu rin po che chags pa chen po dang / kun tu phrin
314a4(1): las chags pa chen por gyur te/ shar dang / lho dang / nub dang / byang dang / dbus chen por khrag gi dpa' klong keng rus chen po'i ri rab chen po na dus kun dang de nyid snang bar gyur to// de yang kun tu sku lnga
314a5(1): 'jigs pa'i gzugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun tu gsung lnga'i nga ro bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / 'jigs byed bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun tu thugs lnga'i rol pa dang / zhal bsam gyis mi khyab
314a6(1): pas 'jigs pa dang / rigs lnga tshom bu chen po'i steng du gnas par gyur to// de las mchog gi snying po chen po ma hA rat+na ti la ka'i dbur gyur las rab tu sku gsung thugs spras pa'i gzhal med khang na 'jigs
314b1(1): byed chen po'i thig le snying po nyid dbu gsum phyag drug tu gnas te gnyis su med par bzhugs so// de nas de nyid du sku dang / dbu dang / phyag dang / zhabs dang / 'khor stong khams kyi rdul snyed du 'jigs
314b2(1): byed chen po bsam gyis mi khyab par khebs par mthong ngo // de nas yang bdud chen po sa 'dzin gyi rgyal pos skyes bu chen po sa 'dzin gyi bdag po// thong thong ji de lta bu byed dam zhes pa las de nas yang dgyes
314b3(1): pa chen po'i bdag nyid kyis// oM a b+hi tsa ra ba shI na hUM hUM hUM zhes brjod pas dam pa'i bstan pas dam pa'i bstan pa rdo rje theg pa smod cing 'gro ba'i rnal 'byor pa la gnod pa'i tshogs 'khor bsam gyis mi
314b4(1): khyab pa dang / g.yog dang yang g.yog tu bcas pa'i bdud chen po de dag nyid kyi yid kyis gdungs te rab tu brgyal nas ma mthong bar rmongs pa'i gnas nas rang dbang med cing dran pa med par keng rus kyi ri
314b5(1): rab chen po'i 'og zhabs kyi gnas su phyin par gyur to// de nas 'jigs byed chen pos tiSh+Tha badz+ra aM aM zhes brjod pas gdug pa'i blo dang phral/ mi mthun pa'i lus brdzes te lha chen po'i tshogs 'dul ba'i
314b6(1): 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po chen por gnas par gyur to// de nas dgyes pa chen po dpal 'jigs byed chen pos de dag gi dkyil 'khor sgyu 'phrul chen po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/
315a1(1): de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs dang yon tan dang phrin las las thugs kyi dkyil 'khor thig le chen po zhes bya ba 'di nyid kyi rdo rje thig le chen po'i dam tshig sku
315a2(1): 'phrul dra ba las phyung ngo // oM khrag mangs dpa' klong 'khyil pa yi// keng rus tshogs kyi ri rab 'bum// 'dus pa'i tshom bu lnga yi ri// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi 'bar ba'i khang // gru chad bzhis brgyan rab brjid
315a3(1): pa'i// gru bzhi sgo khyud bzhi dang ldan// 'bar ba'i bar khyams gnyis kyis mdzes// thod sbrul sna tshogs nyi zlas brjid// sta na mang po lha chen brten// dgyes pa chen po kun tu bzang // phyag dang zhabs ni brgyad
315a4(1): pa yi// thod sbrul sna tshogs nyi zlas brjid// 'jigs byed chen po khrag 'thung ba'i// rdo rje snying po thig le thugs// dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad// khro mo bzhis mchod ngos bzhir ni// dgyes pa chen
315a5(1): po'i tshul 'chang ba// phyogs bzhi gra dang bcas par ni// sprul pa'i rnal 'byor phra men rnams// ri rab zhing chen steng na gnas// 'bar bas phyag bsnams chen po ni// rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang // pad+ma'i gzhal
315a6(1): med rnge'u chung brdung // zhing gi zhags pas 'ching ba dang // kha T+wAM 'phen cing 'khril ba ste// btsun mo 'dzin pa'i tshogs dang bcas// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya dang // sgo bzhi phyag rgya rab mdzes par// bran
315b1(1): mo'i tshogs chen mang po rnams// 'jigs pa'i gzugs kyis gnas par byed// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gdug pa'i tshogs byin gyis rlob pa
315b2(1): zhes bya ba'i le'u ste sum cu drug pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs pa gcig tu gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod pa 'di brjod
315b3(1): do// byed pa rdo rje mchog nyid kyi// sgyu 'phrul lam gyi dkyil 'khor las// dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon rdzogs par// 'jug pa'i yid kyi dgongs pa yin// shin tu phra la sbyangs pa ni// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu
315b4(1): gnyis kyis mdzes// tshom bu gnyis kyi bye brag tu// spro zhing bsdu ba'ang de bzhin no// yid du 'ong ba'i sa gzhir ni// rkang mthil thig gdab dkyil 'khor bri// oM dang mAM gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// de las phra mo
315b5(1): rdo rjes dgang // phra bar sa bsdus mthil du gzung // yum gyi tshogs su shes pas brtags// gang gi yul yang dbang du gyur// mi mthun gzugs su brtags pa ni// dra ba'i 'du 'phros de lus bzhin// lugs
315b6(1): ka bzhin du haM du brtag/ de las 'od bzhin mthil du gzung // gsang nas ngag lam haM du bya// rlung zla'i steng du mkhas pas gzhag/ drag po lce yi sbyor ba yis// gling khams gzhan du shin tu gtang // bdag
316a1(1): nyid hUM gi tshogs bcas pa// ma skyes pa yi yi ge bsgom// bya ba chos khams de yi tshogs// mAM du byin brlabs yi ger bstim// brtan pa a yi 'phro 'du yis// nam mkha' bzhin du shin tu
316a2(1): bsgom// brtan 'gyur a yi snying po bzlas// nyams su lon par ma gyur tshe// 'jug pa'i yid dang nyams su sbyor// dang po'i gnas su shes pa dang // rnam pa mang por mnyam du'o// de las mi snang gzugs zhi
316a3(1): ba// rab tu blo yi thig gnas ni// gzhan du nams kyang mi bstan cing // gzhon dang spyad dang 'tshong la sogs// longs spyod rnam par sbyor ba dang // rdzas kyi nor phyir ma yin no// rmongs la 'phar dang brtson
316a4(1): 'grus zhan// nams kyang sbyin par ma gsungs te// smad pa bam gyi gter bzhin du// sus kyang phyin par ma gsungs la// srog chags khwa yi gtam bzhin du// nams kyang smra bar mi bya'o// byed pa rdo rje gsha'
316a5(1): yi tshogs// bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi gling gzhi'i lam// kun tu bzang po thabs tshul ba// tshom bu gsum gyi lha rnams bsgom// chos khams bya ba a yi tshogs// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis gleng slong ba// kun tu bzang mo shes
316a6(1): rab tshul// gsha' la ye shes thugs kyi thugs// tshom bu gsum gyi lha rnams bsgom// de ni chos khams a la bstim// chos kyi chos bya ba yi dbyings// kun tu bzang mo bde ba'i yum// de yi ngang du tshogs kun
316b1(1): brtags// sa chu me yi 'byung ba rnams// de yi dbyings nas 'byung bar ni// 'dod pa'i bdag la shin tu brtag/ mi gnas nam mkha'i mtha' klas par// goms par 'dod pa thod pa dang // chu las sa bzhin
316b2(1): 'gro ba dang // bsreg bya 'bar ba'i dbus gnas dang // tsha ba rlung gis bteg nas kyang // phyogs bcu kun tu phyin par 'gyur// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las rdo rje snying po las thams cad kyi
316b3(1): le'u ste sum cu bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos gsang ba'i snying po 'di brtan par 'dzin pa'i don ched du ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// de nyid chos dbyings mnyam sbyor
316b4(1): bas// sangs rgyas kun bdag byin gyis brlab// k+Sha lam a yi tshon bzhin du// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// lugs su blugs pa bzhin du ni// de nyid yid lam mchog grub pa'o// de nyid gsal
316b5(1): bar mnyam sbyor las// sangs rgyas kun bdag byin gyis brlab// oM lAM a yi tshon bzhin du// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// lugs su blugs pa bzhin du ni// de nyid gzugs lam mchog grub
316b6(1): pa'o// de nyid mnyam nyid mnyam sbyor las// sangs rgyas kun bdag byin gyis brlab// s+t+waM laM a yi tshon bzhin du// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// lugs su blugs pa bzhin du ni// de nyid khyad par
317a1(1): lam mchog go// chos dbyings rtogs pa mnyam sbyor las// sangs rgyas kun bdag byin gyis brlab// oM laM a yi tshon bzhin du// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// lugs su blugs pa
317a2(1): bzhin du ni// de nyid gsum lam mchog grub pa'o// chos dbyings bya ba mnyam sbyor bas// sangs rgyas kun bdag byin gyis brlab// hUM laM a yi tshogs bzhin du// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor
317a3(1): bsgom// lugs su blugs pa bzhin du ni// de ni phrin las ye shes so// de las ting 'dzin sgyu 'phrul bsgom// dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mchog nyid ni// rtse bcu rigs kyi phyag rgya bsgom// de nyid ha dang k+ShaHnyid
317a4(1): de// mAM gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom// sangs rgyas sgyu 'phrul mchog nyid las// dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon rdzogs pa// de nyid hUM lam phyag bsnams pa// rtse bcu rgyan gyis rnam par brgyan// yang na rtse
317a5(1): lnga thugs kyi thugs// dbus nas hUM gi lo tsa na// lcags kyu 'dzin par rgya bcings shing // hUM hUM hUM gis lan gsum du// rang lus dgra yid byin gyis brlab// mAM gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bskul// 'bru lnga rgya
317a6(1): bcings byin gyis brlab// bskyed pa rdzogs par gsor ba yis// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dkyil 'khor bri// zhi ba rgyas pa lan gsum gyis// de 'dod las rnams grub par 'gyur// bcu pa drag po mthing gnag
317b1(1): dpung // 'gying ba'i gar gyis gsor ba yis// gsung snyan sgra yi bro rdebs pa'i// phyag rgya brgyad du sbyor bas na// phaT phaT hUM gis gsor ba yis// snying po thugs rtags phyag bsnams pa// sku gsung thugs kyi
317b2(1): rgyal po las// bsod nams lus 'jig dbang du 'gyur// ci 'dod re ba thob par mdzad// brgyan pa skegs pa pho nya dang // tshangs pa dbang po 'dod dbang dang // mdor na bcu gnyis gling gi bdag/ drag
317b3(1): shul mthu yi dregs pa can// sngags shing brgyal te blo stor nas// bum pa bzang po 'bral bar 'gyur// lha mo klu mo brgyan pa dang // rta dang glang po bzhon pa dang // gnas dang rten dang bgo ba dang // gtsug na
317b4(1): nor bu yod pa dang // ci 'dod yid la bsam pa 'bul// de la bran bzhin byed par 'gyur// de yi dgos pa thams cad ni// ma lus kun rdzogs 'grub par 'gyur// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa
317b5(1): las sgyu 'phrul chen po brtan par gzung ba bdud rtsi 'byung ba'i le'u ste sum cu brgyad pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa sgyu 'phrul dra ba las thugs rjes 'gro ba 'dul ba bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba
317b6(1): la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o ye nas dag chos la// log rtog rnam pa gnyis su 'grub// thams cad 'byung ba lnga las skyes// thams cad gtsang zhing dri med las// rnam
318a1(1): rtog mi mthun so sor gyur// la la'i sman la la la'i dug/ sman du ma gyur gang yang med// thams cad ma lus rgyu gcig las// mi mthun khyad par so sor snang // sus kyang ma byas su byed
318a2(1): yod// rnam rtog zhags pas so sor bcing // sdug bsngal ma lus 'khrul 'khor dang // khams gsum phyin ci log bzhi dang // dus gsum 'gro lnga thams cad dang // nyon mongs sdug bsngal thams cad
318a3(1): sbyong // rnam par thar pa lta rdzogs byed// sa bcu rdzogs shing sangs rgyas sa yang rdzogs// de phyir sman 'di bsgrub par bya// kun la phan pa'i sman yin pas// de phyir nga dang bdag ma 'dzin// gtsang dang sme ba'i
318a4(1): blo rtog bor// thams cad mnyam pa nyid du spyod// rtsa ba byang chub sems nyid rtogs// thabs kyis pha rol phyin pa spyod// snying rjes chud ma zos par gyis// bdud rtsi mchog ni mnyam pa'i dbyings// bdud rtsi'i
318a5(1): don ni skye shi med// bdud rtsi gnas ni byang chub sems// bdud rtsi las ni rnam rtog sbyong // bdag dpal tshogs shing 'gro don mdzad// sman gyi byin brlabs bsam mi khyab// ngan song sbyong zhing mtho ris
318a6(1): 'grub// gser 'gyur sman dang mun sel bzhin// gzhan yang dgos pa sna tshogs 'grub// rkyen las byung ba'i dug rnams dang // rtsa ba'i dug dang sbyar ba'i dug/ klu dug sbod gtong dug la sogs// thugs rje
318b1(1): chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// dug rnams thams cad gdul ba'i phyir// dkyil 'khor ma lus tshang bar bsgom// gnas lnga dag tu 'bru lnga bstim// oM hUM trAM hrIHa// yang na yi ge AM gyis bya// yang na yi ge
318b2(1): hrIHlas gtang // dug rnams bdud rtsir bskur bar bya// mnyam pa'i dbyings su thim par bya// a hoHrdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// hUM bdag nyid zhe sdang rdo rje ste// thugs rjes rtog bdag 'dul bar byed//
318b3(1): dang bdag med dbyings sbyor zhing // byams pa'i thugs dang ldan pa'o// oM bdag nyid gti mug chen po ste// ye shes 'od zer gsal ba'i ngang // thams cad 'byung ba'i 'khor lo yi// trAM bdag nyid nga rgyal yon
318b4(1): tan te// snying rjes 'gro don 'phel bar byed// zhi ba'i blo chen dbyings su sbyor// yon tan rgya mtsho dpag med pa'o// hrIHbdag nyid 'dod chags gsung mchog ste// nyon mongs las rnams dag par byed// nyon
318b5(1): mongs sdug bsngal rnam par dag/ chags med sems ni byang chub pa'o// A bdag nyid las kyi sems dpa' ste// don rnams ma lus grub par byed// log rtog ma lus 'dul ba'i mchog/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi
318b6(1): 'phro ba'o// mAM bdag nyid shes rab 'od gsal te// le lo g.yeng ba sel bar byed// thugs rje myur ba las byung ba// rgyal ba kun tu thogs med pa'o// nyon mongs las rnams dag byed cing // dbugs chen
319a1(1): @dag kyang 'byin par byed// dug rnams sbyong ba sku gsum ste// lam lnga sbyong ba ye shes lnga// 'khor ba'i rtsad gcod shes rab mtshon// hUM du bsdus shing hoHyis g.yeng // raM gyis bsregs shing phaT
319a2(1): kyis 'phang // thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yi// thig le'i dbyings su thim par bya// de nas gnyis med dbyings gyur nas// ye shes sems dpa'i sku ru bsgom// 'bru gcig 'bru gsum 'bru lnga bsgom// bzhi
319a3(1): bcu rtsa gnyis ma lus dang // sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor tshang bar bsgom// nga med bdag med phyag rgyar gsol// de nas longs spyod lnga kun dang // ye shes lnga dang rigs lnga dang // lha mo lnga dang sman lngar
319a4(1): bsgom// oM hUM trAM hrIHaHoM badz+ra a mr-i te kuN+Da li ha na ha na hUM phaT// oM bi shud d+he a mr-i te hUM phaT/ oM d+harma a mr-i te hUM phaT/ oM AHhUM zhes brjod pas thams cad dag par gyur/ bdud rtsir gyur/ sa chu me rlung
319a5(1): mkha' rnams// rang bzhin med par gzhig pa'i phyir// gcig la lnga lngar dbye bya zhing // mAM gyi dbyings su bstim par bya// 'byung ba che rnams de dag la// lhag pa'i ting 'dzin bskyed par bya// rigs
319a6(1): pa thabs kyi phyag rgya ste// de bzhin gshegs pa lngar bsgom zhing // 'byung ba so so'i mtshan nyid de// yum lnga dag tu bsgom par bya// de rigs ye shes lnga nyid do// rgyur byas gzugs sogs bzhi bcu
319b1(1): gnyis// phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid na// de ltar gyur cing skyes pa kun// smos ci dgos te de nyid yin// a hoHe ma'o lhag pa'i byin brlabs kyis// bdag la lha
319b2(1): rnams bsdu bar bsgom// de nas lha dang gnyis med nas// bdag nyid yi ge oM dang mAM// gnyis dang bdag dang dbyings su thim// bdag nyid bdud rtsi 'khyil par bsgom// sku mdog gangs la nyi shar
319b3(1): 'dra// zla ba pad+ma gdan khri la// nyi ma stong gi gdan khri ldan// lha dang lha mo'i tshogs kyis bskor// khro bo khro mo'i dkyil 'khor bcas// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgyas mdzes// slas dang byi mo tshogs kyis
319b4(1): bskor// a ho 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas// dbus su bdud rtsi 'khyil pa ste// shar gyi rtse la rdo rje'o// lho yi rtse la rin po che// nub kyi rtse la snang mtha' yas// byang gi rtse la don yod grub// thabs dang
319b5(1): shes rab ldan par bsgom// phyag rgya rnams kyang gsal bar bsgom// snying po 'bru tshig gsal bar bzlas// de la bdud rtsi'i phyag rgya ni// bum pa gang ba yid bzhin 'bar// re ba yid bzhin skong bar
319b6(1): byed// nyon mongs sdug bsngal sel bar byed// 'dod lnga yon tan ldan par byed// dngos grub chen po bla med pa'o// bdud rtsi char bzhin 'bebs par byed// sgo bzhi phyag rgya ldan pa dang // a mr-i ta yi rgyu nyid
320a1(1): ni// byang chub sems dang sha chen dang // dri chu dri chen maM sar bcas// pad+ma rak+ta la sogs dang // gzhan yang don yod sna tshogs rnams// dbye'am yang na mi dbye bar// bdud rtsi nyid du byin gyis
320a2(1): brlab// rtog pa'i bag chags sbyang ba'i phyir// gtsang sme med par dag par bya// dbyings su yang ni bstim par bya// phyag rgya 'od zer 'bar bar bsgom// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad sel zhing // dug gsum sdug
320a3(1): bsngal med pa dang // bskal pa yun ring gnas pa dang // dngos grub chen po 'thob 'gyur te// tshogs gnyis rdzogs par yang dag gsung // bdag nyid yi ge hUM gyur nas// longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad
320a4(1): la// oM AHhUM du gyur par sgom// 'od 'phro 'bar zhing phyogs bcur spro// slar 'dus 'od 'phro bdud rtsir 'bar// shin tu gsal zhing rtse gcig sgom// gzhan yang yi ge'i tshogs pas gdab// 'thungs na ngan
320a5(1): song sgrib pa byang // tra tA/ rtag bsten dngos grub mchog kyang 'grub// bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi nad sel cing // lha la rtag tu mchod byas na// bdag dang gnyis su med par 'gyur// mi mthun phyogs la gtor byas
320a6(1): na// drag po gtum po'ang lhan ner 'gyur// gzhan yang dngos grub thams cad kyi// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// sangs rgyas go 'phang thob 'gyur na// lha srin la sogs smos ci dgos// the tshom med
320b1(1): par bsgrub par gyis// rtag tu spyod cing dbyings su thim// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las sman sgrub pa'i le'u ste sum cu dgu pa'o// // de nas dgyes pa chen
320b2(1): pos de dag gi byin gyi brlabs 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// de la mchod sbyin dam pa ni// 'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsa lnga nyid// khams dang 'byung ba nyid la gnas// de nyid smyu
320b3(1): 'phrul thabs mkhas pa// dra bas mngon rdzogs sku gsung thugs// thams cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid// chos sku mchog gi rten gyur pa// phyogs bcu gang bar gsal bar bsgom// de nyid ngag lam kun khengs
320b4(1): par// hUM gi tshogs su rnam par bsgom// lus nyid hA yi tshogs la bstim// gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung bas// kha dog nag po'i tshon phye yis// de yi snying nang bdag zhugs la// dzaHzhes bya ba'i sngags
320b5(1): bzlas nas// mgyogs su 'gro bar lcags kyis spang // dri rno lnga bas mgyogs pa dang // gang du bya ba byin par byed// de yi lus las 'byung 'dod na// zhi bas bdag gi gzugs bzung la// dal bus hUM zhes
320b6(1): bsdus pa yis// bdag gi lus la chud par 'gyur// thams cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid// chos sku mchog gi rten gyur pa// phyogs bcu gang bar gsal bar bsgom// de nyid ngag lam lus khengs par// oM gyi
321a1(1): tshogs su shin tu bsgom// lus nyid aHyi tshogs la bstim/ gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung nas// kha dog dkar po'i tshon phye yis// de yi snying nang bdag zhugs la// hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags
321a2(1): bzlas nas// mang pos bkur ba rgyal chen po// blo rno yid mdzangs bzhin bzangs dang // snga bas longs spyod 'du ba dang // gnas par dga' ba bzhin du 'gyur// de yi lus las 'byung 'dod na// zhi bas
321a3(1): bdag gi gzugs bzung la// dal bus oM zhes bsdus pa yis// bdag gi lus la gzud par 'gyur// thams cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid// chos sku mchog gi rten gyur pa// phyogs kun gang bar gsal bar
321a4(1): bsgom// de nyid ngag lam kun khengs par// s+t+waM gyi tshogs su rab tu bsgom// lus nyid s+t+waM kyi tshogs la bstim// gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung nas// kha dog ser po'i tshon phye yis// de yi snying nang bdag
321a5(1): zhugs la// s+t+waM zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas nas// nor mang blon po yid mdzangs la// blo rno snga bas longs spyod 'dud// de yi 'khor la longs spyod cing // gnas par dga' ba bzhin du 'gyur// de yi lus las
321a6(1): 'byung 'dod na// rgyas pas bdag gi gzugs bzung la// dal bus s+t+waM zhes brjod pa yis// bdag gi lus la tshud par 'gyur// thams cad ma lus phyag rgya nyid// chos sku mchog gi rten gyur pa// phyogs bcu
321b1(1): gang bas gsal 'bar bsgom// de nyid ngag la lus khengs par// AMHgyi tshogs su shin tu bsgom// lus nyid AMHgyi tshogs la bstim// gang la bya ba'i gzugs bzung nas// kha dog dmar po'i tshon phye
321b2(1): yis// de yi snying nang bdag gzhugs la// AMHzhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas nas// rgyal mo zhang blon dbang chen dang // ci 'dod yid bzhin dbang du 'gyur// de yi 'khor la longs spyod cing // gnas par dga'
321b3(1): ba bzhin du 'gyur// de yi gzugs las 'byung 'dod na// dbang gis bdag gi gzugs bzung la// dal bus AMHzhes brjod pa yin// bdag gi lus la tshud par 'gyur// thams cad ma lus phyag rgya
321b4(1): nyid// chos sku mchog gi rten gyur pa// phyogs kun gang bar gsal bar bsgom// de nyid ngag lam lus khengs par// hUM gyi tshogs su shin tu bsgom// lus nyid hUM yi tshogs la bstim// gang la bya ba'i gzugs
321b5(1): bzung nas// kha dog ljang gu'i tshon phye yis// de yi snying nang bdag zhugs la// hUM zhes bya ba'i sngags bzlas nas// las kyi rigs chen gang 'dod gzugs// dmag mang mthu dpung go mtshon bzang // zhe sdang
321b6(1): can rnams 'dul bar 'gyur// 'dod chags can rnams 'du ba dang // nga rgyal chen po 'dud par 'gyur// de yi bstan pa 'dzin par byed// de yi 'khor la longs spyod cing // gnas par dga' ba bzhin du
322a1(1): 'gyur// de yi lus las 'byung 'dod na// snyoms pas khro yi gzugs bzung la// dal bus haM zhes brjod pa yis// mi snang ba yi gzugs su 'char// bdag gi lus la chud par 'gyur// gling
322a2(1): ngam dur khrod gnas rnams su// nga yi 'dod pa chos dbang gis// sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor mchog 'dzin la// dra ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs kyis 'byung // gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las de bzhin
322a3(1): gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs 'byung ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos nyid kyi che ba'i yon tan ston pa'i phyir 'gro ba'i sems can gyi don
322a4(1): ched du de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings 'di sku gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // dpal nyid kyi mchog rigs kyi yum// dbab par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan la// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan// 'bru lngas byin
322a5(1): rlabs mAM du brtags// de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa// mAM gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom// de nyid mtha' bral mi dmigs las// de zla'i ngang tshul de bzung nas// sangs rgyas rdo rje tsa na ka/ shes rab
322a6(1): yum dang ldan par bsgom// lam du zhugs la de lus dgang // de goms blo bde gsal spro thim// de bzhin rigs rnams oM du bsgom// snod gnas bde ldan khengs gyur par// yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar
322b1(1): gnas// phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs// rigs dang mthun par rnam par bsam// brtan pa AHyi 'phro 'du ltar// rnam shes byin brlabs dang du brtags// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las// yid
322b2(1): bzhin yi ge'i sprin tshogs bsgom// phyag rgya shin tu gsal ba na// nye ba'i bsnyen pa yin par bsgrags// 'phro 'du rigs dang mthun pa'i grangs// bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na// lcags kyu mchog gi
322b3(1): phyag rgya bcing // des ni 'dod pa bzhin du 'gyur// rang bzhin sku gsung 'dus ma byas// gzhan dbang ma yin rdo rje rigs// dpal ldan rdo rje sgyu 'phrul yum// shin tu chos kyis bsgrags pa la// gsal bar
322b4(1): 'dod pa smra bya ba// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan// 'bru lngar byin brlabs lAM du brtags// de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa// lAM gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgoms// sangs rgyas spyan gyi sbyor ba las// rgyal
322b5(1): ba thams cad byin gyis rlob// de nyid mtha' bral mi dmigs las// rang bzhin mchog gi gzugs bcas nas// sangs rgyas rdo rje tsa na ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom// de las rdo rjer byin brlabs
322b6(1): te// pad+ma gsang nas 'dzum thabs yin// sbubs nas zhugs la de lus dgang // de goms blo bde gsal spro thim// rdo rje rigs rnams hUM du bsgom// snod gnas bde ldan khengs gyur par// yum gyi tshogs
323a1(1): kyang gsal bar gnas// phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs// rigs dang mthun par shin tu bsam// brtan pa hA yi 'phro 'du ltar// rnam shes byin brlabs ngang du brtags// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid
323a2(1): las// yid bzhin yi ge sprin tshogs bsgom// phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa// 'phro 'du rigs dang mthun pa'i grangs// sgom dang bzlas dang mngon sum na// lcags kyu'i stangs kyis bskul bar
323a3(1): gsungs// rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya yis// rigs dang mthun pa'i 'phro 'du bsgom// yon tan sku gsung yid bzhin gter// dpal ldan sgyu 'phrul mchog chen mo// chas shing bsgregs pa'i gzugs brnyan
323a4(1): ni// ljon pa lcug phran la sogs la// dbab pa mchog gi las bya ba// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan// 'bru lngas byin brlabs oM du brtags// de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa// oM gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams
323a5(1): bsgom// sangs rgyas me yi sbyor ba las// rgyal ba thams cad byin gyis rlob// de nyid mtha' bral mi dgyes las// yon tan gter gyi gzugs bcas na// sangs rgyas rin chen tsa na ka/ shes rab yum dang
323a6(1): ldan par bsgom// de las rdo rjer byin brlabs te// pad+ma gsang nas 'dzum thabs yin// sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang // de goms blo bde gsal sgro thim// rin chen rigs rnams s+t+waM du bsgom// snod
323b1(1): gnas bde ldan khengs gyur pa// yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas// phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs// rigs dang mthun par shin tu bsam// brtan pa s+t+waM gyi 'phro 'du ltar// rnam shes byin brlabs
323b2(1): nga du brtags// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las// yid bzhin yi ge sprin tshogs bsgom// phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa// 'phro 'du rigs dang mthun pa ni// bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na// dam
323b3(1): tshig zhags pa mchog gis bcing // rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhi// rigs dang 'du 'phro mthun par bsgom// gso dang gsad dang pham dang rgyal// gzhan du 'gro dang 'dug pa dang // ci 'dod 'ong dang smra
323b4(1): yang rung // mtshon dang 'jigs pa mang ba dang // bcings pa'i las dang mtshon las thar// dpal ldan pad+ma mchog gi yum// bde chen gar dbang gzugs 'dzin pa// dbab par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan
323b5(1): ni// ljon pa'i lcug phran la sogs la// dang por gnas lnga byin gyis brlabs// de nas gnas lnga shes rab bsgom// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan// las bzhi 'bru bzhi baM du brtags// de nyid goms las
323b6(1): gsang mtshan pa// baM gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom// sangs rgyas chu yi sbyor ba las// rdo rje gsung rnams byin gyis rlob// de nyid mtha' bral mi dmigs las// rdo rje gsung gi gzugs bcas nas// sangs
324a1(1): rgyas gsung chen tsa na ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom// de las rdo rjer byin brlabs te// pad+ma gsang nas 'dzul thabs yin// sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang // de goms blo bde
324a2(1): gsal sgro thim// ming dang snying po bcas pas dgug/ rdo rje gsung rnams oM du bsgom// snod gnas bde ldan khengs gyur par// yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas// phyag rgya snying po gzugs la
324a3(1): sogs// rigs dang mthun par shin tu bsam// brtan pa oM gyi 'phro 'du ltar// rnam shes byin brlabs dang du brtags// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las// chos dbang yi ge sprin tshogs bsgom// phyag rgya
324a4(1): gsal bar nye bsnyen pa// 'phro 'du rigs dang mthun par ni// bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na// chags pa'i lcags sgrog mchog gis bcing // chags pa chen po'i phyag rgya bzhis// rigs dang mthun pa
324a5(1): du bsgom// zhi ba dbang dang drag po rgyas// ci 'dod par ni rab tu bsngags// dpal ldan 'grub pa sgyu 'phrul ba// dbab par bya ba'i gzugs brnyan ni// ljon pa mchog dang 'bring rnams la// spyi gtsug kha
324a6(1): dang snying ga mtshan// 'bru lngas byin brlabs hUM du brtags// de ni e yi tshogs yin te// de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa// me yi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom// de nyid steng gi lha rnams te// bdag med
324b1(1): mtha' bral mi dmigs las// don yod ngang tshul de bzung nas// don yod mchog gi tsa na ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom// de las rgya gram byin brlabs te// pad+ma gsang nas 'dzul thabs
324b2(1): yin// sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang // rgya gram mtshon gyis khengs pa dang // so so'i snying pos ming yang dgug/ de goms blo bde gsal spro thim// rdo rje la la rnams hUM bsgom// snod gnas bde ldan khengs
324b3(1): gyur par// yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas// phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs// rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsgom// brtan pa hUM gyi 'phro 'du ltar// rnam shes byin brlabs ngang du brtags// gzhi rtsa
324b4(1): med pa'i sems nyid las// grub pa sgyu 'phrul sprin tshogs bsgom// phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa// 'phro 'du rigs dang mthun par ni// bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum ni// dgyes pa gar gyi gsung snyan
324b5(1): cing // rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhis// rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsgom// phyogs su 'gro dang dbrog pa dang // tshe bsnyung ba dang las rnams dang // mngon sum ci 'dod smra ba'i mchog/ rigs kyi yum
324b6(1): dang rtsen par 'gyur// srid pa las 'phags mya ngan 'das// ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur// zhes brjod pas rnam par smin pa'i tshogs de bzhin gshegs pa'i che ba'i yon tan nyid du mkhyen to// mkhyen
325a1(1): nas de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung ngo // a hoHbsam bya bsam par zin pa yi// bsam pas mi zin bsam mi khyab// bsam yas
325a2(1): lhun gnas mi g.yo dpag med bsam mi khyab// rgyu dang 'brel pa'i rkyen du shes pa'i dbyings nyid zad mi shes// ngo mtshar srid lam mtha' bral dmigs med pa// de nyid yon tan mchog gi 'khor lo lam
325a3(1): mchog yin// a hoH/ rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang po de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas che ba'i yon tan ston pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas
325a4(1): bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos che ba'i yon tan ston pa'i sgyu 'phrul chen po gsung gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba cho ga dang bcas pa 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las phyung
325a5(1): ngongo// dbab pa mchog gi dkyil 'khor rnams// kha dog grangs bcas ma brlams pas// shes pa blo che khongs yangs la// zab par spyod la mi skyo bar// zas srung gos rjes dam zas sbyin// dung chen snod du chu
325a6(1): yis bsing // rten du rung bar ting 'dzin dang // dbang dang sgrub pa mchog kyang bstan// mi smra gsang ba'i dam tshig dbog/ oM dang mAM gyi blo bstan nas// gsang bas mtshan ma lnga nas sbyang // sgyu 'phrul dkyil
325b1(1): 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis// phung po khams dang skye mched sbyar// longs spyod lnga ldan mchod sbyin bya// rdo rje ngag lam gsung chen bzlas// oM sarba ta thA ga ta dzI na oM/ oM badz+ra ku la hUM badz+ra/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta s+t+waM
325b2(1): rat+na sAM/ oM pad+ma ta thA hr-i da ya A ro li ka/ hA pradz+nyA hAM/ d+hA tI shwa ri mAM/ de Sha ra ti lAM/ mo ha ra ti AM/ rA ga ra ti pAM/ badz+ra ra ti tAM/ mAM mAM mAM/ lAM lAM lAM/ AMHAMHAMH/ pAM pAM pAM/ tAM tAM tAM/ e baM ma ya/ ba ba ba ba ba/ dz+ra
325b3(1): dza dza dza dza/ sa sa sa sa sa/ ma ma ma ma ma/ ya ya ya ya ya/ s+t+waM hoHzhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas par dam tshig thams cad kyi mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang
325b4(1): gsung dang thugs rje'i bdag nyid dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma chen mo dang / spyan chen mo dang / mA ma kI chen mo dang / gos dkar mo chen mo dang / dam tshig 'phags ma sgrol ma chen po'i rang bzhin nyid du kun tu
325b5(1): snang bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid dbab pa'i gsung gi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das
325b6(1): dpal kun tu bzang pos sgyu 'phrul chen po'i byin bsdu ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dra ba las phyung ngo // sgeg mo
326a1(1): mchod pa byin bsdu ba// gzugs ston dbab par bya ba ni// rigs dang mthun pa'i gzugs brnyan la// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan// 'bru lngas byin brlabs ya nyid sbyin// de nyid pad+ma'i
326a2(1): dkyil 'khor yin// de nyid goms la gsang mtshan pa// ya yi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom// de nyid hUM gi lha rnams te// bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs las// rang gi ngang tshul de bzung nas// sangs rgyas
326a3(1): rdo rje tsa na ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom// de las rdo rjer byin brlabs te// pad+ma gsang nas 'dzul thabs yin// sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang // rdo rje tshon gyis khengs pa dang / so so'i snying po
326a4(1): ming yang bod// de goms blo bde gsal sgro thim// ming yang snying po bcas pas dgug/ rdo rje lha rnams hUM du bsgom// snod nas sgeg mo khengs gyur par// yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas// phyag rgya snying
326a5(1): po gzugs la sogs// rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsam// brtan pa hA yi 'phro 'du ltar// rnam shes byin brlabs ngang du brtags// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las// sangs rgyas rdo rje'i sprin tshogs
326a6(1): bsgom// phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa// 'phro 'du rigs dang mthun par ni// bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na// sgo ma bzhi yi phyag rgya bcing // rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhis// rigs dang mthun pa
326b1(1): nyid du bsgom// rin chen phreng ba'i byin bsdu ba// gzugs ston dbab par bya ba ni// rigs dang mthun pa'i gzugs brnyan la// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan// 'bru lngas byin brlabs e nyid sbyin// de nyid
326b2(1): pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor yin// de nyid goms nas gsang mtshan pa// e yi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom// de nyid s+t+waM gyi lha rnams te// bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs las// rang gi ngang tshul de bzung
326b3(1): nas// sangs rgyas rin chen tsa na ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom// de las rdo rje byin brlabs te// pad+ma gsang nas 'dzul thabs yin// sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang // rin chen tshon gyis khengs
326b4(1): pa dang // so so'i snying pos mi yang dgug/ de goms blo bde gsal sgro thim// rin chen lha rnams s+t+waM du bsgom// snod gnas phreng ba khengs gyur bar// yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas// phyag rgya snying po
326b5(1): gzugs la sogs// rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsam// brtan pa s+t+waM gyi 'phro 'du ltar// rnam shes byin brlabs ngang du brtags// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las// sangs rgyas rin chen sprin tshogs
326b6(1): bsgom// phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa// 'phro 'du rigs dang mthun par ni// bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na// sgo ma bzhi yi phyag rgya bcing // rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhis// rigs dang mthun pa
327a1(1): nyid du bsgom// pad+ma'i dbyings kyi byin bsdu ba// gzugs ston dbab par bya ba ni// rigs dang mthun pa'i gzugs brnyan la// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan// 'bru lngas byin brlabs baM du
327a2(1): brtags// de nyid pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// de nyid goms la gsang mtshan pa// baM gyi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom// de nyid aM gyi lha rnams te// bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs las// rang gi ngang tshul
327a3(1): de bzung nas// sangs rgyas pad+ma tsa na ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom// de las rdo rjer byin brlabs te// pad+ma gsang nas 'dzul thabs yin// sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang // pad+ma'i tshogs kyis
327a4(1): khengs pa dang // so so'i snying pos ming nas dgug/ de goms blo bde gsal spro thim// pad+ma'i lha rnams oM du bsgom// snod gnas dbyangs ma khengs 'gyur bar// yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar gnas// phyag
327a5(1): rgya snying po gzugs la sogs// rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsgom// brtan pa hUM gyi 'phro 'du ltar// rnam shes byin brlabs dang du brtags// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las// sangs rgyas pad+ma'i sprin tshogs
327a6(1): bsgom// phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa// 'phro 'du rigs dang mthun par ni// bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na// sgo ma bzhi yi phyag rgya bcing // rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya bzhis// rigs dang mthun pa
327b1(1): nyid du bsgom// gar mkhan las kyi byin bsdu ba// gzugs ston dbab par bya ba ni// rigs dang mthun pa'i gzugs brnyan la// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan// 'bru lngas byin brlabs ma nyid sbyin// de
327b2(1): nyid pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa// ma yi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom// de nyid haM gyi lha rnams te// bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs las// rang gi ngang tshul de bzung
327b3(1): nas// sangs rgyas las rnams tsa na ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom// de las rdo rjer byin brlabs te// pad+ma gsang nas 'dzul thabs yin// sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang // las kyi tshogs kyis
327b4(1): khengs pa dang // so so'i snying pos ming nas dgug/ de goms blo bde gsal sgro thim// las kyi lha rnams hUM du bsgom// snod gnas gar mkhan khengs 'gyur bar// yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar
327b5(1): gnas// phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs// rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsgom// brtan pa hUM gyi 'phro 'du ltar// rnam shes byin brlabs dang du brtags// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las// sangs rgyas
327b6(1): las kyi sprin tshogs bsgom// phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa// 'phro 'du rigs dang mthun par ni// bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na// sgo ma bzhi yi phyag rgya bcing // rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya
328a1(1): bzhis// rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsgom// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi/ lha rnams mngon du snang ba dang // sgo bsgom mang po dang // dus bzhi'i lha mo mchog dbab dang // lha dang klu
328a2(1): yi tshogs bcas las// mngon du smra bar bya bar mthun// rgyal srid dang ni 'khor 'phrog dang // bsdu dang dbang du bya ba dang / gsad dang bskrad pa'i tshogs bcas dang // bdag 'gro myur du phyin pa dang // nor
328a3(1): 'dod pa dang ci bya ba// ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur// dus med par ni mchod dang phrad// ces brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad byin bsdu ba'i mchod pa chen por gyur to// gsang
328a4(1): ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las byin bsdu ba dang dam tshig dbab pa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i thugs rje zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas dgyes pa chen pos longs spyod chen po rdo rje snying
328a5(1): po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sgyu 'phrul chen po'i dam tshig mchod pa'i longs spyod ces bya ba 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dra ba las phyung
328a6(1): ngongo// rab 'bring tha ma'i blo rnams kyis// nges par bsgom par bya ba ni// rgyal po'i sa 'dzin mchog 'dod pas// gzugs su bri'am rten bcas la// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan// goms par dzaHnyid mdog
328b1(1): dmar bsgom// de goms gsang nas khong bsdus te// rang lus mdog dmar ngang tshul 'dzin// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan// 'bru lngas byin brlabs baM du brtags// de goms gar gyi dkyil 'khor
328b2(1): bsgom// dzaHzhes rgya bcings drang bya zhing // goms par gsang nas zhugs tshul du// lam nas ngag gi dbang por bsdu// oM las sangs rgyas tsa na ka/ snod gnas dkyil 'khor khengs par bsgom// ming dang
328b3(1): snying po goms pas dgug/ mngon sum gsal bar gyur pa na// lcags kyu la sogs mtshan pa yi// rjes su chags pa'i mchod pas bsham// yid la goms pa gsal ba na// gang la bya ba dbang du 'gyur// blo na
328b4(1): po'i sa 'dzin mchod pas bsham// yid la goms pa gsal ba na// gang la bya ba kha dang snying ga mtshan// goms par dzaHnyid mdog dmar bsgom// de goms gsang gnas khong bsdus te// rang lus mdog
328b5(1): dmar ngang tshul 'dzin// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan// 'bru lngas byin brlabs baM du brtags// de goms gar gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// dzaHzhes rgya bcings drang bya zhing // goms par gsang gnas zhugs
328b6(1): tshul du// lam nas ngag gi mchog tu bsdu// AMHnas sangs rgyas tsa na ka/ snod gnas dkyil 'khor khengs par bsgom// ming dang snying po goms par dgug/ mngon sum gsal bar gyur pa na// lcags kyu la
329a1(1): sogs mtshan pa yi// rjes su chags pa'i mchod par bsham// de la las su stsal ba na// gang la bya ba dbang du 'gyur// lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo// yud tsam rtag par 'dod sgrub rnams// ting
329a2(1): 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur// dbang phyug lha chen lha dbang po// rgyal chen phyogs skyong mang po la// chung ma bu mo la sogs mtshan// 'dod spyod dbang bar blo 'chang rnams// ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par
329a3(1): 'gyur// de yi dgos pa thams cad pa// ma lus kun rdzogs 'grub par 'gyur// ces brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad rab tu g.yos kun tu gsal bar gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i
329a4(1): longs spyod chen po kun tu snang bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las sgyu 'phrul chen po dam tshig gi mchod
329a5(1): pa'i longs spyod ces bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas thub pa chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid du snang
329a6(1): bar gyur to// gdug pa'i las klu'i tshogs 'dul bar gyur nas sgrub pa chen po la mos pa'i ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// klu'i tshogs rigs gnyis pa dang // rigs gsum pa dang // rigs tha dad pa
329b1(1): dang // phyogs gnyis pa las 'khor du byas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas khengs pa'i gnas su nyid kyi bsnyen pa che chung la ma gtogs pa yid la dga' ba ci byas kyang mi 'grub cing bar chad byed par 'gyur ba'i
329b2(1): phyir gegs bsal ba lnga pa zhes bya ba 'di 'thon par gyur pa 'di ched du gsungs so// sgrub la 'dug pa mi gnas dang // sa gzhi bdag tu dbang ba dang // sgrub pa'i rdzas rnams ci yod pa// gdug pa'i sbrul
329b3(1): rnams bsal ba dang // 'khor du gtogs pa mang nyung la// gdug pas zin par mi 'gyur zhing // ljon pa lcug phran la sogs la// gdug pas gnas par mi 'gyur phyir// lnga pa zhes ni rab tu
329b4(1): bsngags// bdag gis gdug par mchod pa'i phyir// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i ting 'dzin las// bdag nyid gdug pa'i mthing gnag mdog/ lag na zhags pa ut+pal 'dzin// mgo la gdengs ka sbrul chen bcu// nyi
329b5(1): shu brgya'am stong dang khri// bsam yas dag gi sbrul chen po// kha dog nag po lce gsum 'bar// gdug pa klu yi tshogs mangs pas// 'khor mang 'jigs brjod spyi bung bas// mchog tu phyag rgya 'di bca'
329b6(1): bya// mi bskyod rin chen yig 'bru rnams// phral te go ran byas pa na// gdug pa sbrul gyis 'og tu gding // nA ga pu kal nA ga phaT ces brjod// 'di la goms par gang brtsom pas// nga yi cha lugs 'di
330a1(1): bzung na// me lce'i tshogs la phung po bzhin// rgyal po chen po'i rgyal chen por// kun la snang bar gsal gyur nas// rang dbang med par 'bros pa dang // de la bran bzhin byed par 'gyur// sa
330a2(1): la bdag tu bya ba ni// thog mar sa gzhi rab mnyam ste// oM dang muM gyi tshogs kyis dgang // rin chen pho brang dkyil 'khor las// 'jug pa'i lha tshogs dkyil 'khor bsgom// de la gshog pa rab brkyang
330a3(1): ste// rdo rje thal mo drag tu rdab// oM badz+ra kro d+ha du na mu ne du nA gats+tsha/ de nas yig 'bru shin tu gshig/ de nas yig 'bru tha ma bsgreng // de nas yig 'bru 'phral bskyed pa// nga yi cha lugs 'di bzung ste// sa gzhi
330a4(1): mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// de la shin tu dngangs 'gyur te// phyogs bcu kun tu 'bros par 'gyur// de la bran bzhin byed par 'gyur// 'khor du gtogs pa nga yi 'khor// 'khor mang ji snyed mchog
330a5(1): byed pa// gdug pa mang pos gnod bsgrub phyir// rdzas la mes ni rab sbar nas// nga yi snying pos brjod nas 'byung // de la yig 'bru drug brjod na// de la gnod par mi nus shing // gdug pas mchod cing
330a6(1): bkur bar 'gyur// de yi nad rnams sos par 'gyur// mngon sum snang ba'i gzugs brnyan dang // mchog dang tha ma 'bring rnams la// gdug pa'i tshogs kyis zhen pa ni// snying gar aM gyi 'bru rnams te// kha
330b1(1): dog dmar po 'bar ba'i nang // gzugs su snang ba kun bzhun te// thub pa'i ngang tshul de bsgoms nas// rin chen yig 'bru yi ge bsam// de la rab tu 'jigs par brkyang // yi ge dang po tha ma mig/ aM gyi
330b2(1): tshogs su 'bar ba gzhan// mi bskyod nyid mas be con 'chang // thod pa'i dbyig par chas nas ni// lce la sngags ni dran pa yis// rgyal ba kun gyis dbang bskur zhing // gdug pa'i klu rnams 'dul 'gyur
330b3(1): te// phyogs bcu kun tu 'bros par 'gyur// de la mchod dang bran du 'gyur// oM mu ne pad+ma sa ma yo gi hUM hUM dza dza/ 'di la goms par gang brtson pas// nga yi cha lugs 'di bzung nas// bkur gnas mchod pa
330b4(1): byed pa dang // sgrub pa thams cad myur bar 'gyur// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las thub pa chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i tshogs kyi gdug pa'i las 'dul ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu lnga
330b5(1): pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos 'byung po'i tshogs zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba 'di'i ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor las// tshom bu gnyis kyi
330b6(1): lha rnams bsgom// nga nyid 'dug pa'i gnas bshams te// lo dang zla ba gsum dang lngar// rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang // rdo rje phyag bsnams dril bu la// sngags bzlas ting 'dzin goms par bsnyen// rdzas la
331a1(1): tshon gyis mdog bsgyur bzhin// rtags dang mngon du gyur par ro// sangs rgyas rdo rje phyag bsnams nas// khro bo chen po rnam par rgyal// rang gi rang bzhin der bskur nas// spyan bgrad mche
331a2(1): gtsigs sdang mig 'bar// brkyang bskum rngam pas zhing stengs bsgom// shig shig drag tu gyur pa na// de yi snying po bzlas nas ni// de bsnyen nyams su lon pa yin// de ltar 'grub pa'i rtags rnams ni// gang
331a3(1): la dmigs pa'i mdun dag tu// bzhin bzlog mig gis bltas nas ni// lce la drag tu phaT ces brjod// brgya la 'gyur aM nas dmar rtsi dbab// de las hUM zhes bya ba yid// dang po'i gnas su 'dus pa
331a4(1): na// mchongs par 'dod na langs par 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor las// tshom bu gnyis kyi lha rnams bsgom// nga nyid 'dug pa'i gnas bshams te// lo dang zla ba gsum lnga bdun// de yi dung
331a5(1): chen gang ba dang // rdo rje phyag bsnams dril bu la// sngags bzlas ting 'dzin goms par bsnyen// rdzas la tshon gyis mdog bsgyur bzhin// rtags dang mngon du gyur par ro// sangs rgyas rdo rje phyag bsnams
331a6(1): nas// khro bo chen po gshin rje rgyal// gshin rje khros pa'i rgyal mor sbyor// rang gi rang bzhin der bsgyur nas// spyan bgrad mche gtsigs sdang mig par// brkyang bskum rngam pas zhing stengs bsgom// shig shig
331b1(1): drag tu gyur pa na// de yi snying po bzlas nas kyang // oM zhes pas ni rked par gcad// des ni dbang du gyur par bsgom// sa las gser dang chu las sa// yid dang 'thad pa nyid du ni// ji bzhin ji bzhin
331b2(1): 'grub par 'gyur// de las 'dod pa bzhin du nges// de bsnyen nyams su lon pa yin// de ltar nges pa'i rtags rnams ni// ming dang gzugs dang mngon sum na// dbu gsigs sdang mig drag pos blta// au
331b3(1): gyi rtse mor phaT ces brjod// brgya la 'gyur oM las dmar rtsi dbab// ngag las aM zhes bya bas ni// bzlas brjod bcas de bdag nyid bstim// de nas 'dod pa bzhin du nges// de bsnyen nyams su len pa
331b4(1): yin// de ltar nges pa'i rtags rnams ni// ming dang gzugs dang mngon sum la// bzhin bzlog mig gis bltas nas ni// oM las drag tu phaT ces pas// brgya la 'gyur aM las dmar rtsi dbab// de las hUM
331b5(1): zhes bya ba yis// dang po'i gnas su bsdus pa na// 'tsho bar 'dod na langs par 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i mngon rdzogs pa// byang chub mchog gi kun ngo bo// phyag rgya bzhugs yun la sogs pa// gcig pu cha
331b6(1): yi ting nge 'dzin// rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang // rdo rje phyag bsnams dril bu la// sngags bzlas ting 'dzin goms par bsnyen// rdzas la tshon gyis mdog bsgyur bzhin// rtags dang mngon du gyur par
332a1(1): ro// sangs rgyas rdo rje phyag bsnams nas// khro bo chen po rta mchog dpal// rang gi rang bzhin der bsgyur nas// spyan bgrad mche gtsigs sdang mig bar// brkyang bskum rngam pas zhing stengs
332a2(1): bsgom// shig shig drag tu gyur pa na// de yi snying po bzlas nas kyang // oM zhes bya bas rked par gcad// des ni dbang du gyur par bsgom// sa las gser dang chu las sa// yid dang 'thad pa ji lta ba// ji
332a3(1): bzhin ji bzhin grub par nges// de la 'dod pa bzhin du 'gyur// de bsnyen nyams su lon pa yin// de yi grub pa'i rtags rnams ni// ming dang gzugs dang mngon sum na// dbu gsigs sdang mig drag pos
332a4(1): blta// aM las drag tu phaT ces pas// brgyal 'gyur oM las dmar rtsi dbab// de las hUM zhes bya ba yid// dang po'i gnas su bsdus pa na// mchongs par 'dod na langs par 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul chen po de
332a5(1): nyid las// sangs rgyas rdo rje phyag bsnams pa// khro bo chen po bdud rtsi 'khyil// bdag nyid rang bzhin der bsgyur nas// spyan bgrad mche gtsigs sdang mig bar// brkyang bskum rngam pas zhing stengs
332a6(1): bsgom// shig shig drag tu gyur pa las// mgyogs par phyogs su song ba na// de yi snying po mchog bzlas nas// hUM zhes pas ni bskul ba yis// dang po'i gnas su phyin par byed// des ni dbang du gyur par
332b1(1): bsgom// de las sna tshogs ci 'dod par// thams cad thams cad grub par 'gyur// de bsnyen nyams su lon pa yin// oM la drag tu phaT ces pas// gang la bya ba mngon bsam nas// se gol snol mar
332b2(1): gtogs pa yis// brgya la 'gyur oM las dmar rtsi dbab// yid la bsgoms pas langs par 'gyur// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las sgyu 'phrul chen po rab tu rgyal bar byed pa dam tshig mchod
332b3(1): bkod pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i spyan sngar dregs pa chen po dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / phyogs skyong bar gyur pa sde
332b4(1): dpon dang chung mar bcas/ bran dang g.yog dang yang g.yog gi rab tu 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i sems kyis gus par dam bcas shing // rang rang gi dkyil 'khor dang / snying po zhes bya ba 'di mgrin gcig
332b5(1): tu yang spras so// dregs pa 'khor bcas dkyil 'khor dang // lus dang ngag yid dbul ba ni// 'khor g.yog bye ba drug cu rnams// keng rus gsar rnying gnas su gyur// rlon pa sha khrag tshogs la spyod// zod
332b6(1): par 'thung za med pa'i nang // mdung thung ral gri dgra sta dang // zhags pa dbyig pa zor ba dang // lnga dang lnga ldi khrag 'thor zhing // gdug pa'i tshogs rnams kun gyis bskor// dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di
333a1(1): rnams la// ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yis// zhabs kyi mthil du 'di bsgoms te// rang gi snying po 'di brjod na// de bran bzhin du bdag cag bgyid// de yi dgos pa ci yang rung // ma
333a2(1): lus rdzogs par bdag cag bsgrub// 'dug nas snying po 'di bzhin dbul// oM khaM d+ha ha swA hA/ dbang phyug lha chen dkyil 'khor dang // lus dang ngag yid dbul ba ni// 'khor g.yog bye ba brgyad cu
333a3(1): stong // me tog sil ma bkram pa dang // ras stan 'phar ma mang po dang // rin chen bcal dang brdung ba dang // rol mo glu gar rab tu snyan// rin chen khang pa'i gnas su ni// lha mo mang por bdag spyod
333a4(1): cing // rin chen snod du bdag cag 'thung // gdugs kyis rgyas par steng nas g.yogs// gzugs mdzes pas ni gda' bar bgyid// rin chen me tog la sogs dang // lha yi me tog phyogs su 'thor// lha yi
333a5(1): tshogs mang kun gyis bskor// dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di rnams la// ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yis// zhabs kyi mthil du 'di bris te// rang gi snying po 'di brjod na// de la bran bzhin bdag cag
333a6(1): bgyid// gtsug tu bzhag nas bkur ba dang // de yi dgos pa ci yang rung // ma lus rdzogs par bdag cag bsgrub// de gzugs ston cing gda' bar bgyid// oM sarba de bA ma hA u pa ha// rgyal po rnam thos
333b1(1): yul 'khor srung // 'khor tshogs stong phrag mang po yi// lus dang ngag yid 'bul ba ni// 'khor g.yog stong phrag bye ba brgya// me tog sil mar bkram pa dang // rgyan mang byug pa gcal bkram pa// sde dpon nyi
333b2(1): shu bye ba rnams// ci legs par ni rab tu smra// rim pa che zhing sri zhu gus// mchod par byed cing lugs mchis pa'i// bdag gi 'khor dang bcas pa lags// rin chen bcal dang 'thung ba dang // rol mo glu
333b3(1): gar snyan pas brgyan// rin chen khang par bdag mchis shing // bzhon pa dmag mangs 'khor bar mchis// rin chen snod du chang 'thung ba// gdugs kyis brgyan par steng nas g.yogs// gzugs mdzes pas
333b4(1): ni gda' bar bgyid// rin chen me tog phyogs su 'thor// rgyal po'i tshogs mang kun gyis bskor// dri za med pa'i bdag po dang // dbang ldan rlung gi bdag po rnams// 'di bzhin gus par bdag cag
333b5(1): bgyid// dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di rnams la// ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yis// zhabs kyi mthil du bris nas kyang // rang gi snying po 'di brjod na// de la bran bzhin bdag cag bgyid// gtsug tu
333b6(1): bzhag nas bkur ba dang // de yi dgos pa ci yang rung // ma lus rdzogs par bdag cag bsgrub// de la gzugs ston gda' bar bgyid// oM sid d+ha d+hi d+hi d+hA ho swA hA/ rgyal po mig mi bzang dang 'phags skyes
334a1(1): po// 'khor tshogs khri khrag mang po yis// lus dang ngag yid dbul ba ni// 'khor tshogs khri phrag bye ba brgya// me tog sil ma bkram pa dang // rgyan mang byug pa gcal bkram pa// sde dpon nyi shu
334a2(1): bye ba rnams// ci legs par ni rab tu smra// rim pa che zhing sri zhu gus// mchod par byed cing lugs mchis par// bdag gi 'khor dang bcas pa lags// rin chen bcal dang btung ba dang // rol mo glu gar
334a3(1): snyan pas brgyan// rin chen khang par bdag mchis shing // bzhon pa dmag mangs 'khor bar mchis// rin chen snod du chang 'thung ba// gdugs kyis rgyas par steng nas g.yogs// gzugs mdzes pa ni gda'
334a4(1): bar bgyid// rin chen me tog phyogs su 'thor// rgyal po'i tshogs mang kun gyis bskor// gnod sbyin srin po'i tshogs rnams dang // chu bdag gshin rje'i 'khor mang rnams// de bzhin gus pas bdag cag
334a5(1): bgyid// dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di// ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yis// zhabs kyi mthil du bris nas kyang // rang gi snying po 'di brjod na// de la bran bzhin bdag cag bgyid// gtsug tu bzhag
334a6(1): nas bkur ba dang // de yi dgos pa ci yang rung // ma lus rdzogs par bdag cag bgyid// de la gzugs ston gda' bar bgyid// oM d+ha ka b+hi du b+ha bi shu pa she oM hUM/ zhes mgrin gcig tu smras pas// srid pa
334b1(1): ji srid pa rnams thugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dis 'dul bar gyur nas// bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos sku dang gsung dang thugs yon tan phrin las rdo rje las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung
334b2(1): ngongo// a ho/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsam yas snying po bsam yas par// 'bru gtor bsdu ba las ni 'das bzhin bsnyags dka' ba'i// ma nor las chen gcig gis rab tu 'dul 'gyur zhing // de yi bsngags
334b3(1): pa'i bka' las 'da' bar nges mi nus// thugs kyi thugs rjes ji srid ma nor lam nyid la// gsang ba'i snying po nges pa sgyu 'phrul mchog nyid pa// nga nyid 'dud 'gyur gzhan lta smos ci dgos// de nyid thugs
334b4(1): las sprul pa'i thugs nyid do// ho rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las shin tu 'dul bar gyur pa gnas dang / snying po dbul ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu bdun

334b6(1): gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis sems 'dun pa chen por gyur te/ ched du bstod pa'i glu 'di mgrin gcig tu smras so// e ma'o ya mtshan 'phrul chen gyi// sangs rgyas rdo rje'i rang bzhin dpal// dug dang
335a1(1): bdud rtsi khyad med par// dag pa'i rang bzhin rnal 'byor thugs// kun tu bzang po rdo rje'i sku// ye shes lnga yi khro rgyal gtso// khrag 'thung 'jigs byed he ru ka/ sangs rgyas mtha' yas 'gro ba rgya
335a2(1): mtsho 'dul// thugs rje bsam yas khro rgyal kun gyi gtso// khrag 'thung kun las ches 'phags yid bzhin mdzod// ser gnag mthing gnag ljang gnag dmar gnag dang // sngo gnag ri rab lta bur brjid pa'i
335a3(1): sku// bskal par bcas pa'i me ri'i dbus gnas pa'i// ro tshogs mang po'i dkyil nas zhal rngam pa'i// bsod nams lus bsdus rdo rje mi zad pa'i// skar tshogs mang la nyi zla'i 'od bzhin du// che btsan
335a4(1): dregs pas 'jigs pa'i tshogs kun 'joms// mtshungs med cho 'phrul khyad par rab ston cing // 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gar gyi tshul du bzhugs// za byed brkam pas thugs sku gsung gi zhal// khrag mtsho
335a5(1): mtha' med skems shing sgal tshigs 'joms// khro gnyer snying 'dren 'jigs byed glog ltar 'gyu// dur khrod 'bum gyi dbu smug 'jigs par brjid// 'khor ba'i rtog pa 'jig mdzad thod rlon phreng bas
335a6(1): bsgegs// rol phyir rtse mor snang bas a a ha las bzhad// rang nyid che bas dbang rdzogs rgyal bas dbu la brgyan// smin ris khro gnyer glog bzhin rab 'gyu bas// phyogs dang mthun pa'i khrag 'thung 'gyed
335b1(1): cing sdud// sprul pa de lta bus ni zil gnon pa// 'jigs pas mun pa'i tshogs chen rab bshams kyang // sdang mig spyan ni nyi zla rgyas 'bar bas// 'jigs pa'i tshogs phung sdug bsngal gtan nas sbyong // khros
335b2(1): pas zhal gdangs so chen gtsigs 'bar bas// srid pa'i rtse nas dmyal khams snyegs pa ltar// 'jig rten dus gcig ming mdzad lam drug gtan nas gcod// ye shes phyag bsnams phyag mtshan 'bar ba

336a1(1): rab brtan// nga rgyal 'dul ba nga rgyal kun gyi gtso// 'jigs tshogs sad nas ro tshogs mang gi gnas// zhabs bgrad mche gtsigs chog pa'i dus mtha' med// 'jigs pas phebs par dga'
