373a3(1): ba'i gter// yid bzhin nor bu rin po che// byi dor ma byas shin tu gsal// bskal pa grangs med gnas bcas kyang // sku ni shin tu gzhon pa'i tshul// skye shi med pa rdo rje yi// thams cad 'byung ba'i gter
373a4(1): yin te// yon tan phun sum tshogs dang ldan// bla med byang chub 'grub gyur nas// ye shes rdo rje lhun grub shog/ tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs gyur cig/ thams cad kun gyi ston pa po// thams cad mkhyen
373a5(1): pa'i go 'phang brnyes// sangs rgyas zhing la dbang byed shog/ de rtogs kun kyang rdo rje'i rigs// sku gsung thugs kyang grub par shog/ rnal 'byor pa thabs dang shes rab dang ldan pa rnams kyis/ dus thams
373a6(1): cad 'dod yon lnga spyod cing bro thabs bya'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las bro gar rtse 'jo'i le'u ste bdun cu gcig pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las
373b1(1): sku'i dkyil 'khor mngon du phyung ste 'di skad ces gsungs so// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings ldan las// sku dang dra ba 'brel 'gyur nas// sku mchog rdo rje 'od snang bas// mthun pa'i rdo rje rang snang ngo // rgyud drug
373b2(1): 'khor ba'i lus snang ba// rnam rtog mthun pa'i las snang ngo // de bzhin sku mchog dri bral dang // bde gshegs sku lngar mdor bsdus te// bcom ldan 'das dang byang chub gzugs// bla med gzugs dang rdo rje
373b3(1): sku// de la sogs te sku bsam yas// phyogs bcu dus bzhi sku ston pa// thabs kyis 'gro 'dul sku ston te// byang chub mchog gi rdo rje sku// chags med zhing du sku ston cing // dbyings las ma g.yos bzhin
373b4(1): du snang // sku snang de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings// rnam dag sku ston ma yin te// log 'gro rtog pa thams cad la// so sor 'dul ba'i skur yang ston// de tshe skye shi med pa'i sku// las dang ma chags pad+ma'i sku// thar
373b5(1): dang ma thar sna tshogs kyang // sna tshogs snang la gnas pa med// snang dang mi snang gnyi ga med// de ltar rtogs pa'i rigs mchog ni// badz+ra zhes ni gdags pa yin// ji snyed sku ston bsam yas pa// thams cad
373b6(1): ma lus rdo rjer bsdus// 'khor lo zhes kyang brjod pa ni// de la sogs te sku bsam yas// byang chub thabs kyi dkyil nas byung // sku ni sna tshogs thams cad kyang // 'ja' tshon chu zla 'dra shes na// dbyings nyid
374a1(1): las ni dbyings snang zad// thugs nyid gsung gi dkyil 'khor snang // gsung nyid sku yi dkyil 'khor te// dbyer med de bzhin yong gis so// dkyil 'khor bzang po 'grub 'dod pas// rtag tu
374a2(1): dus gsum thams cad du// bdag dang bdag gi dbyer med pas// ye nas dkyil 'khor yin par brtag/ 'di ni dngos grub mchog yin par// kun du rgyal gyis de skad bshad// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sku
374a3(1): 'phrul dra ba las sku'i dkyil 'khor mngon du phyung ba zhes bya ba/ le'u sku'i dkyil 'khor zab tu ni rgyud kyi rgyal po phyi ma las bshad de/ bod la ma 'gyur zhes 'byung ngo // rang bzhin sku'i dkyil 'khor du bsdu
374a4(1): ba'i le'u ste bdun cu gnyis pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las ting nge 'dzin gyi rim par sbyor zhing dngos grub myur du len pa'i thabs dra ba las 'di skad ces
374a5(1): gsungs so// dkyil 'khor bsam yas dngos grub ni// mi dmigs dbyings nas don 'byin te// ma bcos ji bzhin ngang bzhag dang // lhun gyis grub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'byung // mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil
374a6(1): 'khor las// ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur na// ye shes sprul pa sna tshogs 'grub// spyod yul thams cad maN+Da la// ye shes dkyil 'khor thar byed skyong // longs spyod sku dang sangs rgyas zhing // ji ltar 'dod
374b1(1): pa smon pas 'grub// yangs shing rgya che lhun grub ni// phyi nang snod bcud ye nas dag/ dag rtogs nyid kyang dbyings nyid yin// de nas rdo rje mnyam yin no// dngos grub myur du 'grub 'dod na// shin tu phra zhing
374b2(1): zab par bsgom// bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams ni// shin tu mi dmigs dbyings su bsgom// ting 'dzin de ni goms pa dang // thams cad sgyu ma mig yor dang // sprul pa'i tshul de shes par bya// de bzhin
374b3(1): yang nas yang goms nas// de nas phra mo'i ting 'dzin bsgom// phyi nang snod bcud hUM du bsdu// gang bsgrub yi ge so so ste// spyir ni gang bsgom kun tu 'dra// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid du 'du// yan lag lnga dang
374b4(1): rnam shes nyid// yi ge hUM du shin tu bsdu// nr-i yi mig gis bltar yod par// yang nas yang du 'dris pa dang // 'od zer mang po 'phro bar bya// phyogs bcu dus bzhi gang ba dang // slar yang hUM la bstim par
374b5(1): bya// hUM nyid mi dmigs dbyings su thim// thim 'gyur dbyings nas a dkar 'bar// shin tu 'tsher bar gsal bsgoms la// thams cad a ru gyur par bsgom// de bzhin nyid du 'dris 'gyur nas// a
374b6(1): las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor spro// e ma gsal bar 'byor 'gyur nas// nyi zla gang ba'i nyi zlar bsgom// hrI gsal pad+ma chags med bsgom// rin chen 'bar ba'i gzhal yas bsgom// nyi zla gdan dang gzhal
375a1(1): yas khang // thams cad bsdu zhing phra bar bsgom// de bzhin yi ge hUM gnas pas// mthing ga 'tsher la gnas pa yi// 'od zer 'phro ba rnam par bsgom// 'od 'phro dbyings su slar bsdus
375a2(1): nas// shin tu rdo rje 'od zer 'phro bar bsgom// rdo rje 'od 'phro gsal 'bar nas// dbyings su yang ni bstim par bya// de nyid sems dpa'i skur gyur nas// shin tu phra zhing 'dus par bsgom// de bzhin
375a3(1): gnyis med gsal 'gyur nas// sku gcig rdo rje dril bur bsgom// de bzhin nyid du gyur pa dang // dbu gsum phyag drug nyid du bsgom// gzhan yang khro 'dul sna tshogs bsgom// blo yi shes rab che chung
375a4(1): las// rim pa bzhin du bsgom par bya// yang na cig car bsgom par bya// nyi zla gza' skar dus gcig tu// chu dkyil dngas par gsal ba bzhin// de ltar goms rtogs rigs mchog des// ji ltar dbang
375a5(1): sgyur bzhin du 'grub// mkha' la 'phyo dang rig 'dzin gnas// chu rgyun bzlog dang rlung mi 'gul// ri brags la sogs thog med 'dzul// chu la mi 'bying mes mi 'tshig/ dug dang mtshon gyis 'jigs mi
375a6(1): 'gyur// mi snang ba dang mang por sprul// gzhan yang ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin// lha srin rnams la dbang sgyur zhing // tshe dang dus la bsring bsnyung dang // stong gsum yungs 'brur bskyed pa dang // ji ltar dmigs
375b1(1): pa bzhin du 'grub// sbrul dang gcan gzan gdug pa rnams// khyi bzhin phyi bzhin 'brang bar 'gyur// bdud dang gdug pa la sogs pas// tshugs par mi 'gyur bran bzhin 'gyur// lus ma spangs par rig
375b2(1): 'dzin sa// ye shes bsod nams longs spyod kyis// yi ge 'khor lo tshogs mchog brnyes// thugs rje sprul pa'i byin brlabs kyis// so sor thar pa'i lam yang ston// 'gro ba ma lus don yang byed// las
375b3(1): rnams thams cad kun byas nas// skye 'chi med pa'i g.yung drung thob// mtshan dang dpe byad kun gyis brgyan// bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen ldan// mthar phyin bya ba med pa 'grub// bsgrub med spangs med
375b4(1): chos kyi dbyings// 'gro med 'ong med de bzhin nyid// de ltar bsgrubs te bsgoms byas na// 'bras bu mngon du ma gyur kyang // tshe rabs skye ba thams cad du// las ngan kun du skye mi 'gyur// theg pa dman par
375b5(1): yong mi 'gyur// rdo rje rigs mchog 'dzin par 'gyur// zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las shin tu gsang bar bya ba rgyud dngos grub thob par bya ba'i le'u ste bdun cu
375b6(1): gsum pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las hom rnams kyi phrin las 'di gsungs so// dang por de bzhin nyid du gsal zhing 'dris par bsgom// de nas bdag gi snying
376a1(1): gar a gsal zhing 'tsher ba gcig bsgom mo// a de shin tu gsal bar gyur pa dang / phyogs bcur 'od du 'phros par bsgom/ 'od de slar a la bsdu zhing bstim/ ma dang a las nyi ma dang zla
376a2(1): ba'i dkyil 'khor bstim zhing 'tsher la gsal bar bsgom// hrI las pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar bsgom/ hUM shin tu 'od 'bar bar bsgom/ snying gi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje sems dpa' mtshon gang ba gcig
376a3(1): phyag rgya dang bcas par bsgom/ bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi sngags dang / yig 'bru dang / phyag rgya yang gsal bar bzlas/ 'bru gsum dang 'bru lnga yang bzlas/ 'dug 'bru bzhis mtshams gcad/ rtag tu hom bya/
376a4(1): tshogs dang mchod pa yang bya/ mang po mi nus pa'i don du hom gang bgyi yang rung // dkyil 'khor gyi dbus kyi gtso bor spyi ni rdo rje sems dpa'/ drag po yang rdo rje// dbang pad+ma he ru ka/ rgyas pa rat+na he ru ka/ zhi
376a5(1): ba bud+d+ha he ru ka/ spyan drang ba ni e h+ya hi ma hA kA ru NI ka zhes hom gang byed pa'i lha gtso bo nas spyan drang / mchod pa dang ar+g+ha dbul ni drag po'i mgor ni/ sngags ril hUM/ zhi ba la mgor ri la aM/ bar ma
376a6(1): rnams la yang de bzhin sbyar/ spyan drang ba ni gang mdzad pa'i gtso bo nas zhi la shAn+ti bsnan/ spyi ni la so so rang sngags rdzogs/ drag po lho/ dbang nub/ rgyas pa byang / zhi ba shar/ spyi gang yang rung gru gsum
376b1(1): dang thod pa kha gdangs so// zla gam dang / pad+ma dang / chags med de/ phyag rgya rnam pa bdun la phyag rgya chen po dang / chos nyid kyi phyag rgya dang / dam tshig gi phyag rgya dang / las kyi phyag rgya dang / thabs dang /
376b2(1): shes rab kyi phyag rgya dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang / lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las hom rnam bzhi'i le'u ste bdun cu bzhi pa'o// // de nas de bzhin
376b3(1): gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ rmad du byung ba'i dam tshig bco lnga mdo 'di ltar yang // bshad de/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis// thams cad mnyam pa'i ngang nyid du// dbyings
376b4(1): su ro gcig de bsdus te// don du mi 'gyur yong ma gsungs// yon tan mchog gi 'dod pa ni// snang srid ma lus thams cad kun// mnyam pa'i zhing du sbyor bas na// chags pa med pa'i tshul du spyod// 'di ni
376b5(1): rnam dag legs pa'i lam// byang chub mchog tu 'gro ba'i gnas// bde chen mi zad gter du 'gyur// cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje'i sgra// nyon mongs sdug bsngal 'dod chags ni// lus dang zas kyis bsgribs
376b6(1): 'gyur te// yi dwags gnas nas gnas su 'gro// sgom dang bkres pas nyon mongs 'gyur// rnag khrag ngan skyugs rtag tu mthong // bde la spyod pa'i dbang yang med// rtsub cing gdug pas bsrung bar
377a1(1): 'gyur// thugs rje chen po'i zhe sdang ni// 'khor ba'i mya ngan sgo bcad cing // bder gshegs lam du 'dzud par byed// yang dag don dang ldan par 'gyur// thugs rje tshul gyis khro ston
377a2(1): zhing // shin tu mnyam pa'i ngang du 'jog/ rdo rje sems dpa'i zhi ba yis// yang dag mchog gi bde ba 'grub// ye shes gsal ba'i bde ba ni// bdag dang bdag gi dbyer med de// rang bzhin med pa'i dbyings
377a3(1): su rol// thams cad brjod du med pa'i ngang // kun du khyab pa'i sku mnga' ba// shin tu 'od gsal rnam dag lam// byang chub sems dpa'i sgrib pa sbyong // sems can nyon mongs dug sel 'gyur// thams cad
377a4(1): zhing sbyong nga rgyal ni// yon tan bskyed pa'i mdzod yin te// nga med bdag med mi dmigs la// su zhig de la nga rgyal skyed// dpung bzhi'i tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i// shin tu rgyal ba'i khyu mchog 'grub// lha srin/
377a5(1): bdud sde tshar bcad pa'i// dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting 'dzin thob// phrag dog yangs pa'i don sbyor ba// nga dang bdag med don rtogs na// dog dang yangs pa gnyis med de// bde mchog dkyil 'khor yangs pa
377a6(1): 'grub// phrag dog dngos po mi shis shing // nga dang bdag tu 'dzin 'gyur na// lha ma yin gyi gnas su skye// de nas yi dwags gnas su 'gro// gal te yul sa rnyed gyur na// shin tu mi bde dog par
377b1(1): 'gyur// gzhan yang longs spyod thams cad la// dbang byar med cing gzhan dbang 'gyur// mdor na nyon mongs sdug bsngal 'grub// phrag dog yang dag rtogs pa ni// nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa dang // phyin ci/
377b2(1): log la phrag dog ste// thams cad gnyis su med par sbyor// bde ba mchog kyang 'grub par 'gyur// gnyis med don yang rtogs par 'grub// nga med bdag med dbyings su thim// lhun grub don mchog 'grub
377b3(1): par 'gyur// yid la lha ni rtag bsgoms na// rgyu 'bras lhun gyis grub pa yi// bdag gis kun tu dbang bsgyur te// rig 'dzin gnas su skye bar 'gyur// rdo rje'i rigs kyis bsgrub bya ba// sgrol dang sbyor bas
377b4(1): mthar phyin 'gyur// sbyor ba nyid ni sgrol ba yin// rang bzhin gyis ni sbyor sgrol dang // sgrol ba nyid na sbyor ba yin// ting nge 'dzin gyis sbyor sgrol dang // dbang po'i yul dus sbyor sgrol dang // thabs chen dag
377b5(1): gi sbyor sgrol dang // mngon du phyung ba'i sbyor sgrol lo// yang na sbyor sgrol bdag la sogs// shes rab dbyings dang bdag tu sbyor// thabs chen sprul pa bsam mi khyab// dbyings dang dbyings su thams cad
377b6(1): sgrol// rol pa'i phrin las bsam mi khyab// thugs rje sprul pa bsam mi khyab// sbyor sgrol phrin las bdag la rdzogs// byang chub sems sbrul phyogs bcur 'phro// ngan song gnas rnams stongs par byed// rig
378a1(1): 'dzin bde ldan thob par byed// bla med zhing rnams dag par byed// sku gsung lhun grub phyogs bcur 'dul// rdo rje zhes ni mtshan bsgrags te// theg dman rnams kyang rdo rjer dgod// zad mi
378a2(1): shes pa'i gter yang 'grub// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa'i sku// thams cad dbyer med mnyam pa'i sku// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mchog/ thugs rje sprul pa dpag med kyis// 'gro drug dus gnas ma lus
378a3(1): mkhyen// 'gro ba nyid na nyid kyi sku// nyon mongs byang chub lam du mkhyen// 'khor ba nyid ni bde gnas so// chos kyi dbyings dang sems can mtha'// dbyer med yang dag nyid du'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po smra
378a4(1): 'phrul dra ba las rmad du byung ba'i dam tshig bco lnga 'di ltar yang bshad pa'i le'u ste bdun cu lnga pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba las dam tshig rnam par spros pa 'di
378a5(1): nyid la nyid ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// spros pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ zhe sdang rdo rje'i thugs rje'i ngang // dmyal ba'i gnas rnams tshar gcod pa'i// brgyad gnyis bcu drug zhing du sbyor// tsha ba
378a6(1): rnams la bsil ba'i sman// grang ba rnams la dro ba'i sman// bsil dro 'jam rtsub cha snyoms pa// thugs rje'i byin brlabs de ltar ston// byin rlabs ya mtshan rmad po che// chags pa'i ye shes zhes bya ba'i dam
378b1(1): tshig ni/ chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis ni// 'dod pa kun la longs spyod bya// ji ltar bde ba'i ro myong zhing // myong tshor nyid na rang bzhin med// chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyis// yi dwags gnas rnams tshar
378b2(1): gcod cing // lus dang zas kyis bsgribs pa yi// nyon mongs gnyi ga med par ston// gti mug ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// nga dang bdag med gnyis med pa'i// shes rab chen po'i 'od gsal gyis// dran smra
378b3(1): med pa'i sdug bsngal bsal// rmongs med sgrib pa dag par byas// ye shes gsal ba'i thugs rjes yis// bya byed med par nyon mongs sgrol// byol song gnas ni stongs byed cing // thugs rje'i sgron ma de ltar
378b4(1): sgron// phrag dog ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ yangs pa chen po'i ye shes kyis// nga dang bdag 'dzin rnams la ni// thugs rjes gnyis med mnyam sbyor zhing // dog dang yangs pa gnyi ga med// rgya chen yangs pa'i
378b5(1): blo ldan pas// 'di la mi chud gang yang med// thams cad yangs pa med du sbyor// lha ma yin rnams stongs par byed// nga rgyal bde mchog ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ ye nas chos nyid mnyam pa la// nga dang khyod
378b6(1): ces bya ba med// thams cad dbyings su ro gcig ste// gnyis med mtshan nyid bsnan du med// che chung med pa'i ngang yin pas// bya ba dag ni med par bstan// nga rgyal bdag med rtogs pa yis// dregs pa'i
379a1(1): gnas rnams stongs par byed// rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ 'jig rten 'di na ci yod pa// ming dang tha snyad 'dzin pa dag/ so so'i mtshan nyid gzhig byas na// rang
379a2(1): bzhin med de yang dag nyid// rang byung chen po'i ye shes kyis// thams cad sangs rgyas zhing du sbyor// ma bcos ma byas ngang gis gsal// ye nas 'od gsal sangs rgyas zhing // nyid kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya
379a3(1): ba'i dam tshig ni/ rang bzhin nyid la gnas pa yi// sus kyang ma byas rang byung ste// thams cad de bzhin nyid du sbyor// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du thim// rang byung ye shes dkyil 'khor gyis// ma lus de
379a4(1): bzhin nyid du sdud// sdud dang mi sdud gnyi ga med// yang dag kho na nyid du'o// bde ba'i ngang nyid ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// thams cad ma lus rnam par dag/ nyid kyi dbyings las mi gzhan phyir// bde dang mi
379a5(1): bde gnyis ka med// thams cad dbyings su ro gcig ste// ji bzhin nyid kyi ngang btsan par// yang dag nyid kyis de skad gsungs// bshad dang nyan pa'ang gnyi ga med// de bzhin nyid du gnyi ga 'du// dus
379a6(1): bzhi rgyal mchog ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ gong na med pa'i ye shes mchog/ thams cad kun la dbang bsgyur te// thams cad mnyam pa nyid du sbyor// 'das dang ma 'das thams cad dang // 'byung dang 'byung
379b1(1): bar ma nges pa'i// ye shes rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis// dus bzhi snga phyi med pa yi// mnyam pa nyid du lhan ner sbyor// lhun grub ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// thams cad
379b2(1): dbyer med byang chub ste// ye nas rnam par dag pa'i chos// ma bcos lhun gyis grub pa yi// byang chub lam chen 'di yin te// thams cad dbyer med nyid du 'dus// byang chub don sgrub ye nas rdzogs// mnyam
379b3(1): pa'i zhing du thams cad thim// rdo rje skye gnas zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ theg pa che mchog rigs su nges// rigs te byang chub bstan pas gzung // thams cad mnyam pa'i dbyings shes na// rigs mchog kun
379b4(1): gyi skye gnas yin// skyes pa nyid na skyes pa med// las dang las kyi bag chags med// cis kyang ma gos thams cad 'joms// skye shi med pa'i sa yang yin// byang chub kyi zhing bkod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba
379b5(1): ni// phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i// snang grags bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i// phyi dang nang gi gnas pa dag/ de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings su thim// mdor na zhing khams ma lus par// yon tan rin chen bkod
379b6(1): pa yi// ye shes rgyan gyis spros pa rnams// zhing de yon tan bsam mi khyab// ye shes bzhugs gnas zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes ni// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gnas// gsang
380a1(1): sngags chen po grub 'dod pas// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes thob// chos kyi dbyings dang sems can ni// gnyis med de bzhin nyid du gcig/ de ltar rtogs pa'i skyes bu ni// rdo rje bzhugs
380a2(1): gnas yin par bshad// mi 'jigs pa'i rgyal mchog ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ rnam par byang dang nyon mongs gnyis// so so yod pa ma yin te// nyon mongs gnyen pos bcos su med// thams cad dbyings su
380a3(1): ro gcig pas// de la 'jigs pa'i gnyen po med// cis kyang mi tshugs gong na med// mchog tu bde ba'i zhing yang yin// nga med bdag med rgyal ba'i mchog/ gzhal yas khang brtan zhes bya ba'i dam tshig
380a4(1): ni// phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kun// rgyal ba'i zhing du sbyor ba ni// dog yangs tshad kyang dpag tu med// sangs rgyas spyi gtsug lta bu'i mtshan// ye shes rgyu las grub pa'o// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du
380a5(1): 'grub// zag pa zad las grub pa yi// nams kyang 'jigs med chos kyi dbyings// sna tshogs kun sbyor zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ gdol pa can gyi chos min pas// ci ltar bsams pa bzhin du 'grub// rig
380a6(1): pa rang dbang gyur pas na// stong par bya'am mi stong bya// thams cad dbyer med ngang yin pas// kha dog dbyibs dang rin po che// thams cad khyab par yungs 'bru'i tshul// bsam yas mtha' dbus med
380b1(1): pa'o// 'dren byed gnas stobs zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// ma rig log rtog bsam yas kyis// 'jig rten khams rnams bsam yas pa// 'khor ba'i rgyu dang 'bras bu gnyis// gzhi rtsa med pa'i skad cig
380b2(1): ma/ yang dag byang chub sems rig na// ma rig rgyu 'bras rnam par dag/ nyon mongs pa nyid byang chub ste// thams cad ma lus bde gnas so// lam lnga ston byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// ting 'dzin rnam
380b3(1): gsum bsgom byas te// nyon mongs lam lnga'i sgo bkag nas// lam lngar snang ba rnam rtog yin// rtog dang mi rtog gnyi ga med// gnyis med de ni yang dag lam// thabs dang shes rab ngang nyid du// shin tu
380b4(1): mnyam bzhag rtogs bya zhing // bla na med pa ston par bya// yang dag don ston zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ theg pa bsam yas ston pa yang // de bzhin nyid kyis ma brjod kyang // sems can blo yi rim pa
380b5(1): bzhin// so sor 'tsham par kun la gsal// 'di ni rdo rje theg mchog ste// rgya mtsho klung du chu 'bab bzhin// thams cad chu yi ngo bo nyid// theg pa thams cad rdo rje'i sa// rab tu rtogs byed ces bya ba'i dam
380b6(1): tshig ni/ shes rab blo chen rab ldan pas// don du mi 'gyur yong ma gsungs// srid gsum 'gro ba bsam yas su// thugs rje snyoms pa bsam mi khyab// don dang mthun pa 'ba' zhig ston// mi mthun zhags pa
381a1(1): 'khor ba gcod// bder gshegs zhing rnams dag par byed// thams cad dbyings su dag par 'dus// sgyur byed byang chub ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// rang rig ye shes dbang thob nas// dkar
381a2(1): po tshon gyis mdog skur bzhin// dug kyang sman du 'gyur ba dang // de bzhin byang chub dug gsum ste// 'gro lnga byang chub lam du sbyor// nyon mongs sdug bsngal thar byed lam// thar dang ma thar gnyis med
381a3(1): na// thams cad ma lus byang chub rgyu// mnyam rdzogs lhun grub ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ ye shes snga mar snang ba dang // log rtog sgyu mar snang ba gnyis// sgyu ma yin pas rang bzhin mnyam// mnyam pa nyid na mi
381a4(1): gnas pa'i// bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs te// ye shes gnyis kyi dkyil 'khor la// theg mchog rdo rje ma lus rdzogs// dpe byad bzang po dpag tu med// thams cad dbang sgyur zhes bya ba'i dam tshig
381a5(1): ni/ shin tu rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis// spyod yul thams cad smon na mkhyen// de bzhin nyid dang kun rtog la// gnyis su med pas dbang bskur te// ma lus thams cad bde ldan zhing // thams cad byang chub
381a6(1): mchog tu 'gyur// ye nas dngos po med pa la// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// rig 'dzin gnas stobs zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ shes rab rnam gsum goms byas nas// ting 'dzin mnyam pa'i don
381b1(1): rtogs te// rtag tu yangs pa chen po bsgom// rgyu 'bras dus gcig rdzogs pa yi// rang rig nyid la dbang thob ste// tshe ni bcu dang drug pa yin// brgyad rgya dag tu bsnur zhing gnas// lus ma bor bar sangs
381b2(1): rgyas pa'o// zad med gter ldan zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ shes rab chen po rnam dag pas// spyod yul thams cad dag par 'gyur// shes dang spyod yul gnyis su med// de bzhin nyid du ro gcig ste// thams
381b3(1): cad rgyal ba'i zhing sbyor bas// zad med rin chen gter du 'gyur// mi zad par ldan dam tshig mchog/ 'og min mtha' dbus bsam mi khyab// bsgrub med mnyam rdzogs zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thams cad
381b4(1): mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor la// rang byung ye shes 'phyo ba yi// dbyings dang rig pa gnyis med pa'i// de bzhin nyid de rdo rje'i rigs// thams cad gnyis su med pa la// bsgrub dang sgrub pa yod ma yin// ye nas
381b5(1): lhun gyis grub pa la// de la lam gyis bcos su med// thams cad byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams ye dag gyur pa yang // phyin ci log gi blo log nas// log rtog gnas na longs spyod
381b6(1): pa// ma rig 'khrul 'khor bsam mi khyab// 'khrul rtog ngan pa bzlog pa'i phyir// thugs rje chen po thabs mkhas pas// nyon mongs 'dren cing mtho ris gnas// byang chub lam chen rtogs par ston// gsung
382a1(1): mchog mtha' yas zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// ming dang tshig tu brtags nas ston// ji snyed mang po'i don brjod kyang // rdo rje gsung la spros pa med// spros
382a2(1): med de ni sna tshogs pa'i// kun tu brda 'jal ye shes gsung // sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das// thams cad pad+ma chags med pa'o// bsgyur ba zad med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye
382a3(1): shes kyis// snang srid ma lus thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid kyis dbang bsgyur te// thams cad ye shes dbyings su bstim// zad med ye shes gter ldan pas// thugs rje byin brlabs bsam mi
382a4(1): khyab// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// so sor don rtogs rnam par dag/ thams cad skad 'jal zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thar pa'i dkyil 'khor 'bum phrag dang // 'gro drug dus gnas ma lus
382a5(1): la// gsung gcig tshig tu ma brjod kyang // sngon gyi thugs rje byin brlabs kyis// thar dang ma thar gnyi ga la// so so ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin// chos kyi gsung mchog dam pa yis// thar pa bskul zhing ngan
382a6(1): song sbyong // rang rig dbang sgyur zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phyogs dus bsam gyis mi khyab pa// de na ji snyed yod pa yi// mtshan ma sna tshogs brtags pa yang // rang rig rnam par rtog pa nyid// sangs rgyas zhing
382b1(1): khams rab 'byam na// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // sprul pa bsam yas 'byung ba yang // ye shes sprul par dag pa'i yul// yi ge med 'jal zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// yi ge tshig dang sgra spangs
382b2(1): pa'i// brjod med ngang du gnas pa ni// gsung nyid rang bzhin med pa yi// chos rnams thams cad ye nas dag/ thams cad thugs su gyur pas na// sgra dang tshig la gnas pa min// thugs la thugs ni mi
382b3(1): gnas pa'o// bdud sde tshar gcod ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ nyon mongs pa nyid rnam par dag/ phung po lnga nyid mngon sangs rgyas// bdag nyid lha yi dkyil 'khor te// skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung gnas// bdud
382b4(1): bzhi bcom pa'i skyes mchog gis// dregs pa chen po thams cad bcom// ma rig log 'dren 'dul bcad de// chos kyi dbyings su thams cad thim// stong gsum kun grags zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thugs rje
382b5(1): chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rdul snyed du// 'gro ba'i phrin las bsam mi khyab// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // lhun gyis grub pa'i ye shes kyi// thams cad gdul bya chud ma
382b6(1): zos// ngan song sbyong zhing byang chub zhing // ye shes rdzogs chen kun tu ston// ye shes gsung mchog ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ 'das dang ma 'das thams cad kun// yang dag shes pas rab brtags na// rang
383a1(1): bzhin med la cir yang snang // snang ba nyid na dbyings nyid de// de ltar rtogs pa'i ye shes ni// kun la dbang sgyur rang dbang can// thams cad tshig gi sgra ltar snang // 'di ni ye shes gsung
383a2(1): mchog yin// bsam yas ye shes rdo rje gsung zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams bsam gyis mi khyab ste// mtha' dang dbus med kun du khyab// khyab dang khyab med rdo rje'i gsung // sgra skad sna tshogs bsgrags
383a3(1): pa dang // dngos po med la dngos po'i sgra// ji ltar pi bang lag thogs na// sgra ni sna tshogs 'byung 'gyur yang // dngos po med pa de bzhin nyid// phyogs dus dbyer med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phyogs bcu ma
383a4(1): lus thams cad dang // dus bzhir 'byung ba ma lus kun// phyogs dang snga phyi med pa yi// thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// so sor snang ba thams cad kun// rang
383a5(1): rig rgyal por yang dag 'du// rang rig de nyid thams cad yin// 'jigs med rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ 'dus ma byas nyid 'dus byas yin// 'dus byas snang dang mi snang gnyi ga min// yod dang med
383a6(1): pa'ang dbyer med de// rang bzhin ye nas dag pa yi// ma bcos ma byas ngang gis gsal// 'jig dang gzhig par bya ba min// cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje'i bdag/ ces gsungs so// de bzhin sku nyid ces bya/
383b1(1): ba'i dam tshig ni/ de bzhin zhing khams bsam yas dang // 'gro ba ma lus thams cad la// thar pa rnams la dag pa'i sku// rtog pa can la 'khor ba'i lus// so sor 'tsham par don ston cing // ston pa nyid la
383b2(1): dngos po med// chu zla'i tshul du kun la snang // kun la de ltar rtogs par byos// lhun grub bde gnas zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// byang chub snying po yod pa ltar// rang bzhin
383b3(1): ye nas 'od gsal ba'i// byang chub snying por thams cad 'dus// phyi nang ma lus thams cad kun// bdag gi ngang du gnas pas na// bdag la bdag gis dbang bsgyur nas// spyod yul thams cad smon mi
383b4(1): dgos// che mchog rnam dag ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ rig pa'i rgyal po rang gyur pas// thams cad kun la dbang bsgyur te// gong na med pa'i sa mnan pas// thams cad kun gyi gtso bo yin// thams cad ma
383b5(1): lus gnyis med pas// bsgo dang bsgo bar bya ba min// de bzhin nyid la dbang bskur bas// thams cad dbyings su ro gcig go/ chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phyi nang snod bcud
383b6(1): bdag rnams la// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ye nas gnas// chen po'i gzugs snang thams cad ni// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// sgyu ma'i rtsal rnams 'dzin 'gyur ba'i// de bzhin yum gyi
384a1(1): dkyil 'khor ro// rang rig byang chub dkyil 'khor te// thams cad kun nas 'khyil bar gnas// zad med gter chen zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// zag bcas gnod sbyin nor dang 'dra// sems
384a2(1): can 'phel 'grib zad 'gyur gyi// de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan ni// zad med 'phel 'grib med pa yi// mang po spros pas 'phro mi 'gyur// nyung ngu bsdus pas sbom po min// zad med rin chen gter yin
384a3(1): pas// thams cad kun la khyab pa'o// rnam dag byang chub ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// ye nas rnam par dag pa la// rnam rtog rkyen gyis glo bur du// khams gsum 'khor ba'i
384a4(1): btson rar gnas// rang rig sgrib med dag pa yis// mya ngan 'das dang 'khor ba gnyis// rang bzhin med par don rtogs na// sangs rgyas zhing du rnam par dag/ gzung 'dzin dril byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig
384a5(1): phyin ci log tu rnam brtags na// bdag dang bdag gir so sor snang // de la 'dzin pa gnyis zhugs nas// rang bzhin med bzhin so sor snang // yang dag rtogs pas rab brtags na// dngos po thams
384a6(1): cad stong pa yin// dngos dang dngos nyid mi gnas pa// de rtogs sdug bsngal bral byed yin// yum 'gyur dbyings phyug ma'i dam tshig ni// 'byung ba lnga la brten 'gyur na// thams cad 'byung zhing ma lus
384b1(1): gnas// skye 'khrungs ma lus gzhi yang yin// thams cad kun gyi rgyu yang yin// de bzhin shes rab rnam gsum gyis// le lo med pa'i brtson pa 'bod// de bzhin dbyings nyid rtogs gyur na// bla med byang chub
384b2(1): 'byung ba'i gnas// chos la skyon med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ bla na med pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // ngan song gnas rnams ma lus kun// rgyu nyid rang bzhin gnyi ga dag/ rang bzhin ye shes de bzhin
384b3(1): 'bras bu rnam par dag pa yi// 'jig rten brtan g.yo la sogs pa// snang ba nyid na ngo bo med// de nyid chos sku chen po yin// sems can don byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ byang chub sems su don gcig
384b4(1): pas// rtsa ba snying rje chen po 'byung // thabs kyis pha rol phyin pa spyod// nyon mongs lam nas 'gro bar byed// nyon mongs khams gsum gnas pa yang // phyin ci log nyid snang ba yin// der rtogs mtho
384b5(1): ris thar pa'o// rtogs nas don 'dzin ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thams cad lhun gyis grub pa dang // sgyu ma mig yor tshul shes pa// gnyis ga rang rig nyid du 'dus// de nyid yang dag yin par bshad// sgra
384b6(1): dang tshig tu brjod pa ni// yang dag don gyi snying po 'byin// ming tshig sgra la mi rten par// blo yi gting du go bar bya// sems la gnas bcas zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thams cad ma lus chos so cog/ sems
385a1(1): nyid las ni gzhan na med// sems dang chos su dbyer med pas// byang chub lam de ring ba min// gang nas ma 'ongs gar mi 'gro// rtog med rang rig kho na tsam// sangs rgyas sems can sems
385a2(1): la gnas// brjod med spros med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// sna tshogs ji snyed brjod pa yang // so so'i mtshan nyid ma gtogs pa// ba spu tsam yang brjod pa
385a3(1): med// bsod nams chen pos bstangs pa yi// sangs rgyas zhing nyid dag pa'o// las ngan dag gis khams gsum gnas// de nyid dbyings las spros pa med// mi 'gyur rdo rje gsung zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//
385a4(1): rnam dag sku gsung sprul pa dang // che mchog sna tshogs bstan pa yang // byang chub sems la snang 'gyur te// snang ba nyid na dbyings su 'ub// phyin ci log g.yo bsam yas kyis// khams gsum gnas dang lam
385a5(1): lngar 'khor// de nyid log rtogs sna tshogs snang // de las ma gtogs gang yang med// ye nas ma btsal zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ blo med byang chub snron mi dgos// 'gro lnga ma lus thams cad kun// ye nas
385a6(1): byang chub snying por gnas// de bzhin dbyings kyis kun tu khyab// ji lta ba yi dang gnas la// de ltar rtogs pa'i blo 'jug pas// gnyis su med par rtogs 'gyur na// su zhig bcos shing su yis rtogs// rang
385b1(1): bzhin 'od gsal zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// rang rig ye nas dag pa yi// sus kyang ma bcos ngang gis gsal// ma chags pad+ma 'dra ba yi// ye shes spyan gyi spyod yul
385b2(1): de// kun dang thun mong de ma yin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul de// skyes bu blo rtsal rab kyis rtogs// thams cad dbyings phyug ma zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ mi zad yon tan gter gyur pa// zad pa'i
385b3(1): dus med yid bzhin mdzod// bdag dang bdag gi med pa yi// shin tu zab pa'i blo las byung // chos dbyings zab mo'i don rtogs na// sku dang ye shes bsam mi khyab// rang rig ye shes don rtogs na// skye shi
385b4(1): med pa'i g.yung drung thob// byang chub sdom byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes kyis// chags med dbyings la mnyam bzhag na// thams cad de bzhin nyid kyi zhing // nyon mongs sdug
385b5(1): bsngal 'byung mi 'gyur// chos kyi rang bzhin ji lta bur// bdag gis yang dag rdzogs byas te// theg pa dman dang phyin ci log/ thams cad mnyam pa'i dbyings su dgod// phyogs dus gnyis med ces bya ba'i
385b6(1): dam tshig ni// phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kyang // rtogs pa'i mtshan ma so sor snang // snang ba nyid na dbyer med de// mtha' dang dbus med zlum po yi// de bzhin rang gis rig pa yang // mtha' dang
386a1(1): dbus med du ma min// gang du mi 'gro kun tu khyab// kun la bde sbyin mi gnas pa'o// thams cad 'byor ldan zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams so sor rtogs byas shing // thams cad gnyis
386a2(1): med dbyings shes na// mi zad par ldan rgyan thob ste// kun tu zad med rin chen gter// de bzhin nyid la gnas bcas na// nyon mongs sdug bsngal mi 'byung ste// rtag tu bde gnas byang chub nyid// mtshan
386a3(1): dang dpe byad kun dang ldan// thabs gnyis shes rab ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ ji ltar snang ba thams cad kun// thams cad thabs kyi rang bzhin te// thabs la thabs ni rnam par sbyor// sbyor dang sbyor ba
386a4(1): gnyis ka med// sna tshogs snang ba thams cad kyang // snang ba nyid na rang bzhin med// de nyid shes rab yin par bshad// rtag tu thabs nyid mi dmigs pa'o// shes rab nyid la thabs su sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i
386a5(1): dam tshig ni/ de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid las// rol pa sna tshogs cir yang 'byung // 'byung ba nyid na rang bzhin med// med pa nyid na sna tshogs snang // thabs dang shes rab dbyings las byung // mnyan
386a6(1): bsams bsgoms pa'i shes rab kyis// shes rab thabs su don rtogs byos// kun la de ltar 'byor par gyis// gnyis med byang chub sems zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thabs dang shes rab ldan 'gyur
386b1(1): na// gnyis med byang chub sems 'phros na// kun gyi 'byung gnas byed pa po// de yis ma byas gang yang min// kha dog dbyibs rigs gang yang min// shin tu brtag dka' sus mi rig/ bdag gis bdag kyang
386b2(1): mi mthong na// gzhan gyis rtogs par ga la 'gyur// thams cad sbyor byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni// ye nas lha dang lha mo yin// dkyil 'khor yang dag sbyor ba dang // dbang po yul du sbyor ba'o// phung po lnga
386b3(1): nyid de bzhin gshegs// 'byung ba lnga nyid yum du sbyor// dus bzhi'i lha mo nyid du sbyor// rtag chad mu bzhi khro mo'o// thams cad ma lus 'byung ba kun// mnyam pa'i dbyings dang rig par sbyor// yang na shes
386b4(1): rab dbyings ma la// bder gshegs dkyil 'khor kun bkod la// bdag nyid rig pa'i lhar bsgoms te// gnyis su med par ldan par bya// rdo rje dril bu ldan gyur nas// byang chub pad+ma shin tu spro// phyogs
386b5(1): dus dkyil 'khor mnyes pa dang // 'gro ba mang po bde thob nas// slar yang gnyis med dbyings su bstim// zim 'gyur dbyings nas phyag rgyar 'bar// bder gshegs thabs dang shes rab rdzogs// phyag rgya
386b6(1): drug kyang yang dag rdzogs// bsod nams tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs// thams cad dbyings su 'byor pas na// ngan 'gro mi ltung yang dag 'grub// 'di ni bsgral ba chen po yin// sgrol ba nyid ni sbyor ba
387a1(1): yin// sbyor ba nyid ni ma lus bsgral// thams cad ma lus par sgrol byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phyi nang snod cud ji snyed pa// gnas pa'i sems can ma lus kun// bdag nyid chen por rtogs
387a2(1): pa yis// dbyings su yang ni bsgral bar bya// shin tu khro bo chen po yis// thabs kyis lha chen bsgral ba ltar// chos nyid rtogs pa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ gnyis su med par thabs kyis bsgral// thugs rje chen
387a3(1): po'i byin brlabs kyis// lam lnga'i sems can kun bkug nas// thams cad ma lus bsgral bar bya// ri rab chen po'i gling bzhi la// gnas pa'i sems can ma lus kun// thugs rje chen pos byin brlabs
387a4(1): te// ye shes me chen bsgom byas na// thams cad ma lus bsreg par bya// dbyings su yang ni bstim byas te// de bzhin gshegs par byin gyis brlabs// rgyal ba'i sras su dbang yang bskur// de ltar bsgral
387a5(1): kun byas kyang // bsgral ba'i dngos po gang yang med// phung po lnga po gshig pa la// bshig nas 'byung ba bag la zha// ma bshig na yang 'byung ba yin// rnam shes med pas bsad byas na// gnas pa nyid na
387a6(1): dngos po med// sems kyi rang bzhin de la ni// dus gsum sangs rgyas dgrar langs kyang // sus kyang mi zin sod pa med// 'o na thugs rjes gang bsgral na// rnam rtog mtshan ma thams cad kun// phyin ci/
387b1(1): log las bzlog byas te// ting 'dzin sngags dang phyag rgya dang // shin tu goms pas dbang bskur te// byang chub zhing la dgod par bya// de tsam la ni bsgral zhes gdags// bsgral ba nyid na sbyor ba
387b2(1): yin// nyon mongs sdug bsngal rtsad bcad nas// byang chub gnas su bsgral bas na// gnyis med dbyings su sbyor ba yin// thabs nyid shes rab shes rab nyid thabs te// gnyis su med pa nyid byang chub kyi
387b3(1): sems so// sbyor ba ni lha dang lha mor sbyor ba'i dkyil 'khor dang / dbang po yul du sbyor ba dang / chen po lnga de bzhin gshegs pa lngar sbyor ba dang / so so rtsal sgyu ma tsam du yod pa yum du sbyor ba dang / dbang
387b4(1): po yul dus lha dang lha mor sbyor ba dang / rtag chad mu bzhi khro bo khro mor sbyor ba dang / mngon sum du sbyor ba'o// sgrol ba ni thabs kyis sgrol ba dang / 'pho bas bsgral ba dang / dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid du bsgral
387b5(1): ba dang / thams cad ma lus par dbyings su dus gcig bsgral ba dang / thams cad thugs rje chen pos gnyis su med par sgrol ba'o// 'di gnyis dus gcig tu mdzad de/ ya char ma gyur par bya'o// dngos
387b6(1): grub mchog kyang der thob ces// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bshad do// ma byin par len pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// chos rnams ma
388a1(1): lus thams cad kun// bdag dang bdag gi gzhan na med// rang bzhin rang gis bdag med pa// kun la thogs med spyad 'gyur yang // sprad dang spyod pa gnyi ga med// thams cad ye nas stong
388a2(1): pa la// gang gis len cing gang la spyod// snang srid ma lus thams cad la// thogs pa med pa'i spyod 'gyur yang // bcing bar mi 'gyur bsod nams tshogs// chags med ye shes chen po yin// ma lus thams
388a3(1): cad chos kyi dbyings// de ltar rang rig yin par bshad// gnyis su med par rtogs gyur na// blangs pa nyid na kun tu bzang // brdzun du smra ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams ma lus thams cad
388a4(1): kun// ye nas dngos po yod ma yin// rang bzhin ngang gis 'od gsal la// ming tsam tshig gis mtshon mod kyis// ming dang tshig la dngos po med// ma rig pa yi 'khrul rtog gis// nga dang bdag tu med pa
388a5(1): la// so so mtshan ma dngos por bzung // 'dzin pa'i dngos po yod med de// chos rnams thams cad ming tshig tsam// ji snyed mang po brjod pa yang // rjod par byed dang brjod pa med// chos rnams thams
388a6(1): cad brdzun du snang // brdzun nyid la ni brdzun spyod de// brdzun zhes bya ba btags pa tsam// thams cad brdzun gyi tshig yin no// rdo rje 'joms byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thog ma med nas phyin ci
388b1(1): log/ bdag dang bdag gi med pa la// rnam rtog mtshan ma so sor 'dzin// 'dzin pa'i dngos po yod ma yin// mi mthun mtshan ma gzhom pa'i phyir// rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin gyis// bdag rtog bag chags kun
388b2(1): bcom nas// rdo rje dbyings su thim par bya// chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// khams gsum nyon mongs 'khor ba rnams// gzhan gyis bcings te 'khor ba
388b3(1): min// 'dzin rtog chags pa nyid kyis 'khor// blo chen rab tu ldan pa yis// chos kyi don po mchog nyon la// 'khor ba spang med sangs rgyas zhing // thams cad ma lus chos nyid rtogs// rin chen 'byung ba zhes
388b4(1): bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ nor gyi mchog ni dkor bdun yin// 'dod pas btsal bar mi rnyed de// sku gsung thugs 'das mi dmigs pa'i// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis ni// gnyis su med par 'byor byas
388b5(1): na// nor bdun chen po 'byung bar 'gyur// mtshan dang dpe byad sna tshogs ldan// pad+ma chags med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// bsgo
388b6(1): dang bsgo bar bya ba med// pad+ma 'dam nas skyes pa 'dra// ji ltar snang ba mtha' yas kun// bdag las gud na gcig kyang med// bdag nyid shin tu mi dmigs pas// nyon mongs nyid kyang byang chub
389a1(1): zhing // don rnams bsgrub pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// rdo rje rigs kyis thams cad bcom// rin chen rigs kyis yon tan 'byin// pad+ma rigs kyis chags med 'gyur// sku gsung thugs dang
389a2(1): ye shes lnga// thams cad don rnams rdzogs par byas// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam spangs te// mnyam pa'i dbyings la sems kyis lta// skye 'chi med pa lhun gyis grub// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan dang // phrin
389a3(1): las rmad 'byung kun grags pa// gzhan na yod 'ong ma yin te// rang byung ye shes gnas med yin// mthong ba'i tshul gyis gzugs snang dang // bla med byang chub skur snang ba// me long lta bu'i tshul bzhin du// sna
389a4(1): tshogs kha dog dbyibs su snang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rnams ni// sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das// brjod med rang bzhin kun du go// nyon mongs med cing bla med sgra// ma brjod stong gsum
389a5(1): grags pa yi// gsung brjod bsam gyis mi khyab pa// brjod pa nyid na stong gsum med// de nyid sna tshogs brjod pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa'i thugs ldan pa// yang dag rtogs pas rab brtags pa// gzhi rtsa
389a6(1): med dbyings skad cig ma// mtha' dang dbus kyang brtag tu med// de nyid sna tshogs 'byung ba'i rgyu// sus kyang ma bcos ma byas pa// bdag gis bdag kyang dmigs mi 'gyur// dngos med kun la dbang sgyur
389b1(1): ba// sku gsung yang dag ldan 'gyur na// yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// mi 'gyur sangs rgyas zhing du 'ub// spyod yul ma lus thams cad la// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'byung // mi zad pa yi
389b2(1): gter chen 'grub// gzhan gyis dbrog tu med pa yi// bo de'i dkor ni rin po che// thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// bya byed med par rnam bzhi mdzad// mdzad dang mdzad par bya ba med// ye nas lhun
389b3(1): grub sangs rgyas chos// sgyu ma'i tshul du kun la spyod// spyod med ngang gis dkyil 'khor la// chags med tshul du rnam par rol// bya byed rnam pa sna tshogs kyang // byed pa nyid na chu zla'i tshul// gzung 'dzin bral
389b4(1): ba'i ye shes ni// rtsa ba lnga zhes brjod mod kyi// brjod pa nyid na yod med de// mtshan nyid med pa sna tshogs snang // de nyid thams cad mkhyen nyid yin// kun la khyab cing mi gnas pa// de ni rig pa rang dbang
389b5(1): 'gyur// bsam gyis mi khyab kun tu khyab// nam mkha' snang byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// de bzhin nyid kyis kun du khyab// snod bcud ma lus thams cad la// snang ba chen
389b6(1): pos khyab par 'gyur// nam mkha' gzung du med pa ltar// snang srid thams cad de dang 'dra// chos rnams thams cad sems yin te// sems ni nam mkha'i rang bzhin no// rten byed sa chen zhes bya ba'i dam
390a1(1): tshig ni/ ji ltar sa gzhi chen po la// sems kyis zin dang ma zin pa'i// skye 'khrungs ma lus thams cad 'byung // thams cad kun gyi gnas brten te// de bzhin theg chen bla med la// byang chub
390a2(1): sangs rgyas kun kyang gnas// theg pa mtho dman thams cad 'byung // thams cad theg chen dbyings su 'dus// sreg byed ye shes me zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ bdag med ye shes rang rig gis// dngos dang
390a3(1): dngos med bag chags bsregs// rang dang spyi yi chos rnams dang // sems kyi phrag dog thams cad kun// dngos po med par rtogs byas na// 'khor ba ma spangs rnam par dag/ mya ngan mi 'da' ye nas
390a4(1): gnas// 'gro dang gnas par bya ba min// rtog pa thams cad ye nas tshogs// thams cad 'khru byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ sems can ma lus thams cad ni// sgrib gnyis dag gis 'khor bar
390a5(1): 'gyur// mnyan bsams bsgoms pa'i shes rab kyis// bdag med gnyis ni rtogs byas na// pha rol phyin rdzogs sa bcu bsgrubs// sa gsum yang dag rdzogs byas te// mnyam pa'i zhing la thams
390a6(1): 'god// khrus kyi mchog ni 'di yin no// g.yeng byed chen po zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// sems can ye nas dag pa la// bdag 'dzin rdul snyed g.yogs par 'gyur// sems dang rdul rnams med rtogs
390b1(1): pas// ye shes rlung gis bag chags gtor// chos rnams ye nas rlung dang 'dra// de la gzung du med pa ltar// kun la de ltar 'byor par gyis// ma bcos ye nas de ltar gnas// thams cad kun la dbang sgyur
390b2(1): zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ rang rig phyin ci ma log pa'i// gzung 'dzin gnyis med rtogs pa yis// thams cad mnyam pa'i ngang 'gyur na// thams cad ma lus bdag yin pas// thams cad kun la dbang sgyur
390b3(1): te// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// ji ltar spyad kyang bsod nams tshogs// mnyam rig ye shes chen po yin// chos thams cad gzugs brnyan ltar shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thams cad 'byung ba'i
390b4(1): gnas yin te// snang ba nyid na 'ja' tshon bzhin// rang bzhin med par kun tu snang // de nyid chos sku yin par bshad// cis kyang ma gos ma spangs pa'o// so sor snang zhing mthun pa'i gzugs// bdag dang
390b5(1): bdag tu ma brtags pa// de lta bu yi ngang du snang // chos rnams sgra ltar shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ sgra rnams ji snyed brjod pa yang // dngos po med las dngos po sgra// brjod dang sgra yi dngos po min// chos
390b6(1): rnams sgra ltar shes par byos// thams cad ma lus don 'byung ba// tshig gis mtshon las gud na med// sgra nyid don gyi dngos po min// don nyid sgra las gud na med// chos rnams dri'i mtshan nyid du shes par bya/
391a1(1): ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams thams cad dngos med par// sna tshogs 'byung zhing rnam par 'phro// de bzhin dri yi dngos po yang // yod pa ma yin kun du mnam// the tshom med pa'i shes rab
391a2(1): kyis// chos kun de ltar shes par gyis// dri yis rab tu tshim 'gyur yang // dri dang dngos po gnyis su med// dngos grub thams cad de ltar ro// chos thams cad ro ltar shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams
391a3(1): ma lus thams cad kun// gzhi rtsa med las thams cad phyung // de bzhin dbang po dngos med dang // rdzas kyi dngos po med pa yi// rnam shes dbang po yul tshogs na// ro yi dbang po thams cad 'grub// ro dang ro/
391a4(1): ru rtogs pa yang // rang bzhin med pa skad cig ma// chos thams cad reg bya ltar shes par bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ gzugs rnams dbu ba rdos pa 'dra// tshor ba chu yi chu bur bzhin// mtshan 'dzin smig rgyu bzhin du
391a5(1): gnas// rnam shes sgyu mas dbang sgyur na// mtshan ma sna tshogs 'byung bar nges// bde ba'i ro mchog kun kyang myong // de nyid bsod nams tshogs chen te// bde ba chags med ye shes yin// reg gi dngos grub de
391a6(1): ltar ro// 'dus byas rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// yang dag nyid la gnas bcas na// phyi nang snod bcud rnam par dag/ rags par snang ba de bzhin gshegs// sgyu mar 'dzin pa yum gyi
391b1(1): dbyings// gzugs ni mtshan ma dngos po med// gcig la lnga lngar bshig pa dang // thams cad nam mkha'i ngang du gnas// nam mkha' de bzhin chos kyi dbyings// 'dus byas nyid kyi dngos grub po// 'dus byas
391b2(1): kun du 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ gshegs sku sgyu mar snang ba dang // log rtogs sgyu mar snang ba gnyis// gzhi rtsa med de rang bzhin stong // rigs dang rgyud du brtag tu med// rigs dang kha dog
391b3(1): dbyibs med pas// phyi nang snod bcud rnam par snang // snang ba nyid na chos kyi sku// cir yang 'gyur zhing thams cad 'grub// kun 'byung dngos grub de ltar ro// glang po brjid gnon zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//
391b4(1): sems can ma lus thams cad kun// rnam rtog 'du byed mang pos g.yengs// ji ltar bus pa shed ma bye// bya byed mang pos g.yengs par gnas// bya byed mang po bdag med pas// ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang sgyur
391b5(1): na// mtshan ma mnyam pa'i dbyings su gnas// 'du byed sna tshogs mi g.yo brtan// dbang lnga rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// chos rnams thams cad skye med pas// shin tu brtan pa'i dbang thob 'gyur// rang
391b6(1): rig ye shes 'od gsal bas// thams cad mkhyen pa'i dbang yang thob// chos rnams thams cad dbyer med pas// kun la spyod pa'i dbang thob ste// spyod cing chags pa med pa'i tshul// kun kyang rang bzhin ye nas
392a1(1): zlum// thams cad rgyas 'debs zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phyogs bzhi mtshams bzhi steng 'og bcu// rang bzhin chen pos kun du khyab// rang byung de nyid dngos med par// kun gyi phyag rgya sgyu yin
392a2(1): no// chos dbyings de nyid zab pa yi// bdag la gnas shing brtag dka' ba'o// mnyam pa'i dbyings su thams cad 'dus// ye nas bde gnas zhing du'o// chos rnams dbyer med pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ ye
392a3(1): nas dbyings su ro gcig pas// de la nga dang bdag ma rtogs// rang bzhin rnam par dag pa la// gtsang dang sme ba'i blo tsam med// thams cad bder gshegs snying po pas// rkyen gyi rdul gyis ga la 'go/ shes rab
392a4(1): mchog gis de ltar rtogs// ma lus kun 'dus dbyings shes byos// thams cad 'jigs byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ shes rab blo rtsal ldan pa yis// brtag rtog mtshan ma kun bshig nas// mtshan ma med pa'i
392a5(1): phyag rgya ru// thams cad 'dus par yang dag rtogs// rtog pa nyid kyang dngos med la// de nyid sna tshogs par snang ba'i// snang ba nyid na byang ba med// de nyid 'jig pa'i phyag rgya yin// g.yung drung tshe 'phel zhes bya/
392a6(1): ba'i dam tshig ni/ chos rnams thams cad bdag yin pas// gang du 'gro zhing gang du skye// 'jig dang skye ba'i dngos po med// dngos med de la su zhig gsod// gang zhig gnyis su 'dzin pa la// skye dang 'chi ba de la
392b1(1): yod// ye shes can gyis brtags pas na// skye 'jig nyid na dngos po med// thams cad mi 'gog pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// mchog gsum rdzogs pa man chad nas// ngan song gnas rnams yan chad du// yang
392b2(1): dag par ni dbyer med de// gang yang spang bar bya ba min// theg pa mtho dman bsam yas pa// don du mi 'gyur yong ma gsungs// ngan song gnas rnams thams cad kun// bla med byang chub rgyu yod pa'o// thams
392b3(1): cad spyod pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thams cad kun tu bzang po yi// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga rnams la// thogs pa med par spyad byas te// bsod nams tshogs chen yin par brtag/ de bzhin gshegs pa lngar
392b4(1): yang brtag/ gzhan yang stong khams thams cad ni// shes rab dbyings dang 'dod yon rnams// rab 'bring tha ma thams cad spyod// thams cad mi chud pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phyogs dus mnyam pa'i dkyil
392b5(1): 'khor du// rdo rje rigs mchog ma rtogs par// theg pa dman dang lta ba dman// des ni theg mchog rtogs mi 'gyur// mi mnyam pa yi don nyid kun khyab kyang // nyon mongs sdug bsngal nyid kyis bsgribs// de
392b6(1): yis yang dag nyid mi mthong // ma mthong ba la mi chud bya// thams cad bsrung du med ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thams cad ma lus sangs rgyas la// bsgrub cing bsrung bar bya ba med// dge dang mi dge gnyi ga/
393a1(1): med// nyon mongs spang zhing byang bsgrub med// de bzhin nyid kyi klong gyur na// bde dang mi bde dbyer med de// ye nas dag mnyam nyid du gnas// de la bsrung bya rdul tsam med// thams cad bsrung
393a2(1): ba med pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ sems can khams gsum 'khor ba yi// thog ma med nas 'khor ba yi// phyin ci log la 'jol tog spyod// gzung 'dzin don la shin tu chags// des na 'khor bar rtag tu
393a3(1): 'phyan// de bas rang sems rtogs byas te// le lo med par yongs spangs te// nga med bdag med mnyam par bsrung // thams cad 'jigs par byed pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ rdo rje sems dpas bkas bcad
393a4(1): pa// sdom pa'i rtsa ba thams cad kun// don bzhin du ni ma bsrungs na// yak+Sha khro bo med dpal gyis// snying nas drangs te khrag 'thungs nas// ngan song gsum du skye bar 'gyur// de yi sdug bsngal bzod blag
393a5(1): chad// dam tshig 'di ni rdo rje che// dam rdzas so sor spyod pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// rigs lnga so sor dbye ba yi// rdo rje sems dpa' glang po'i sha/ rin po che ni rta yi sha/ pad+ma rigs ni a ri ka yi sha/ don yod
393a6(1): nam mkha' lding gi sha/ bder gshegs rigs ni sha chen no// dbyer ba'am yang na mi dbye bar/ nges par dang du blang ba'o// yang na thams cad gcig tu bsdu// yang na mtshan nyid med par brtag/ ting 'dzin phyag
393b1(1): dam tshig ni// bder gshegs dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// ye nas rang bzhin gsal ba la// thams cad kun la yod par bshad// ye shes sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// bla na med pa'i mchog yin
393b2(1): te// rdo rje rigs mchog thams cad kyis// bar ma chad par rtag tu bsgrub// byang chub shing drung skye bar 'gyur// bla med byang chub mchog kyang 'grub// skye 'chi med pa'i bde 'grub ste// sems la dbang yang thob
393b3(1): par 'gyur// spyod yul thams cad smon na shes/ rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las dam tshig rnam par spros pa'i le'u ste bdun cu drug pa'o// // gang zhig dkyil 'khor 'di spangs na// nyon mongs ngan song
393b4(1): gnas su skye// byang chub 'bras bu thob mi 'gyur// bla med 'gro ba'i rgyu yang chad// rigs chad nyid du skye bar 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub 'dod pas// rtag tu mnyam pa'i don rtogs la// sku ni 'ja' tshon
393b5(1): tshul 'dra bar// snang la rang bzhin med par bsgom// 'khor rnams chu zla'i tshul shes par// gsal la rang bzhin med par bsgom// lha yi sku rnams gsal bsgoms na// bsod nams tshogs chen thob par
393b6(1): 'gyur// de nyid gzugs brnyan tshul shes na// ye shes tshogs chen thob par 'gyur// rnal 'byor bas ni rtag tu bsgom// yi dam lha de spangs byas na// ngan song mi bde rtag tu myong / sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi
394a1(1): gcad pa'i don ni// sngags dang phyag rgya bar mi gcad// rnal 'byor 'grub pa'i lam yang yin// mi gtong sdom zhing 'dren pa'ang yin// don mchog rdzogs pa'i gnas yin te// rtag tu mnyam gzhag
394a2(1): phyag rgya yin// dug gsum gting 'byin sngags yin te// yang dag don chen klung 'dod pas// dus mtshams med par phyag rgya sngags// yid brtan drag tu bzlas brjod bya// yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang
394a3(1): mnyam// phyag rgya bskyod dang yi ge oM// rdo rje slob dpon gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa/ bla med dkyil 'khor ston pa po// yon tan zad med sbyin pa yin// byang chub lam chen 'dren mdzad pa// chags med zhing du 'god
394a4(1): pa yin// nyon mongs sdug bsngal rtsad gcod cing // 'khor ba'i lam rnams stongs par byed// ma rig mun sel sgron ma yin// long ba rnams kyi dmigs bu mkhan// de la rtag tu mchod byas na// sangs rgyas byang
394a5(1): chub zag mi ring // rdo rje mched dang lcam dral gyi mtshan nyid bstan pa/ rdo rje rigs kyi spun yin te// thog pa med nas las mthun pas// lha spyod mthun pas 'dir skyes te// gcig la gcig ni mig dang
394a6(1): 'dra// shin tu gdung zhing brtse bar bya// dam tshig ngan sems dpya byas na// dmyal ba chen por ltung bar 'gyur// de bas dam tshig 'da' ma byed// gsang ba'i dam tshig bstan pa ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil
394b1(1): 'khor ni// srid gsum ma lus kun la khyab// phyin ci log gis rab bsgribs nas// dbul po gter dang gyad kyi nor bu 'dra// de bas rdo rje gsang mchog 'di// thams cad mkhyen pa'i thugs rje yis// chos la
394b2(1): skyon yod ma yin te// sems can don phyir shin tu gsang // theg pa dman dang phyin ci ldog/ de la gsang don bstan gyur na// rang bzhin gsang don mi shes par// 'phral gyi sgro yul de dag la// shin tu nges pa'i
394b3(1): don bzung nas// gsang don de nyid log par khrid// ma rtogs de nyid dmyal bar 'khor// de bas shin tu gsang bar bya// thugs rje chen po dang ldan pas// thar lam kun la mkhas par bya// shes rab mchog dang
394b4(1): ldan pas na// sems can snod kyi rim pa bzhin// theg pa mtho dman don nyid ni// so sor 'tsham par bstan dgos so// dang du blang dang mi spang ba// rnal 'byor pas ni rtag tu spyad// chags pa med par gyur pa
394b5(1): dang // dngos grub ya mtshan chen po ni// dam tshig mdo bshad nang nas 'byung // ma rtogs pa zhes spyad gyur na// yi dgas srin po'i nang du skye// yang na dam tshig 'di lta bur// ji ltar spyad kyang sdom pa mi 'da'
394b6(1): ste// byed spyod tshogs chen gnyis su 'gyur// 'gro dang nyal dang 'dug pa na// mnyam pa de yi dbyings na gnas// shes rab mchog gis rtag tu gyis// chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// bya lam nam mkha'
395a1(1): gcod bzhin gyis// 'dzin chags ma lus thams cad kun// mkha' la rlung chen 'phro ba bzhin// yid kyi rtog chags ma lus pa// chu la nya chen 'phyo ba ltar// rnal 'byor lta ba de ltar ltos// de ltar
395a2(1): rtogs pa'i shes rab kyis// tshig tsam ma yin blo gting spos// rdo rje theg mchog kha 'ches la// mnyam pa'i don nyid mi shes par// gsang sngags dam tshig mnyam zer zhing // thugs thub dag gis spyad byas
395a3(1): pa// dmyal khams dag tu brgyud par 'gyur// mnyam pa'i don nyid ji lta bu// mnyam dang rtogs pa gang yang med// ji la mi gnas yul la spyod// spyod par byed dang spyod pa med// de ltar rtogs pa'i rigs mchog
395a4(1): ni// rdo rje rig 'dzin skye ba na// 'jigs med kun tu bzang por sbyor// yon tan mi zad gnas pa yin// mnyam pa'i don nyid mi shes shing // kun rdzob don dam gnyis med la// chos dang gang zag gnyis med
395a5(1): na// 'di ni byang chubs pa yin// las dang nyon mongs thams cad la// mnyam pa'i don du mi shes shing // rten 'brel rgyu 'bras yod 'dzin na// 'di ni rang sangs rgyas kyi sa// chos rnams ma lus thams cad
395a6(1): la// bden bzhi'i dngos po yod lta zhing // spang dang mi spong byed 'gyur ba// 'di ni nyan thos sa pa yin// dge bcu dag la gtsor len cing // dge dang mi dge mi mnyam pas// lha dang mi yi skye gnas te// 'dod
395b1(1): khams dag tu 'khor ba'i sa// mnyam pa'i don nyid mi rtogs shing // tshad med bzhi dang bsam gtan bzhi// rim par so sor bdag 'dzin cing // gzugs tshogs dag la bdag tu rtog/ 'di ni tshangs gnas rim
395b2(1): par skye// mnyam dang gzugs med ma rtogs par// ming bzhi med par ma shes te// skye mched bzhi la gnas 'gyur bas// srid pa'i rtse mo'i sa ru skye// thams cad mnyam par ma shes na// ma lus kun la zhe sdang
395b3(1): zhing // snying rje yang dag med 'gyur na// 'di ni mi bzad chen po yi// dmyal khams bcu drug gnas pa yin// chags med dngos po mi shes nas// thams cad kun la 'dod chags shing // lus kyis bsgribs dang
395b4(1): zas kyis bsgribs// yi dwags chen po'i gnas su skye// nga dang bdag med mi shes shing // chos rnams kun la rmongs byas pas// shes rab mi gsal don med pas// dge sdig gnyis kyi don ma rtogs// 'di ni
395b5(1): byol song gnas su skye// shin tu nga rgyal cher bskyed cing // thams cad bdag gir bzung bas na// kun dang rtsod pa'i las byed pa// lha ma yin gyi gnas su skye// theg mchog mtho dman thams cad dang // 'jig
395b6(1): rten lta ba thams cad kun// ye shes chen pos rab brtags na// rang bzhin med la cir yang 'grub// rang bzhin dbyings las nyams pa med// shes rab chen po mig ldan pas// mtho dman gnas dang lam drug
396a1(1): dang // rang bzhin med la cir yang 'grub// so sor de bzhin 'khor bar gzigs// sngags mchog bla na med pas ni// mtshan ma kun dang mi brtag par// mtshan ma kun dang thams cad med// kun
396a2(1): dang mnyam pa nyid yin pas// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// so sor lta ba brjod mi bya// spyi ni log rtog bsam yas pa// ye nas yod pa ma yin te// so so'i rnam rtog bag chags kyis// gzung 'dzin dra
396a3(1): bas bsgribs 'gyur te// ci yang med la cir yang snang // snang ba nyid na rang bzhin med// de ltar rtogs na bder 'gro'i gnas// rdo rje can gyis de ltar rtogs// rnal 'byor chen po'i lta spyod ni// cir yang spyod
396a4(1): kyang rang bzhin med// mkha' la bya chen lding ba bzhin// chu la skyar chen 'phyo ba bzhin// mkha' la rlung chen 'gro ba bzhin// rnal 'byor lta ba de ltar blta// rnal 'byor spyod pa chen po ni// thams cad kun la dbyer
396a5(1): med spyod// bde ba'i ro mchog myong bar 'gyur// de la su zhig chags par byed// spyod bzhin ma chags ye shes yin// bde ba'i mchog nyid bsod nams tshogs// de lta bu yi ngang du spyod// 'di ni spyod pa rlabs chen
396a6(1): yin// lta spyod ya char ma gyur par// sngags 'chang rnams kyis rtag tu spyad// kha cig lta ba mnyam gnas kyang // spyod pa dag dang yong mi mthun// kha cig spyod pa rdzogs byed kyang // mnyam pa'i lta ba yong mi
396b1(1): shes// kha cig lta spyod gnyi ga med// yang dag skyes mchog dam pa yis// don dam kun rdzob dbyer med pas// yang dag nyid du rab tu rtogs// bla med theg chen dang gnas ni// don dam kun rdzob dbyer med
396b2(1): de// kun rdzob tsam du thams cad la// dag dang ma dag gnyi gar 'dzin// thabs kyi theg pa chen po ni// rnam par byang dang sdug bsngal dag/ kun rdzob tu'ang dbyer med de// lta ba mtho dman de tsam mo// thabs kyi
396b3(1): lta spyod chen po ni// bla med theg pa las 'phags pa// don dam du ni nor bdun no// kun rdzob tu ni mnyam rdzogs so// mnyam pa nyid las ma g.yos bzhin// thabs kyi phyag rgya chen po ston// thabs dang shes rab
396b4(1): rnam par dag/ thams cad dag ces bya ba yang // dngos po gsal dag ma yin te// snang spyod nyid na rnam par dag/ dam tshig chen po'i mdo rnams las// rigs lnga dag tu bstan pa ni// chos rnams ma lus thams
396b5(1): cad kun// rigs chen dag tu zad par 'dus// ma lus chos kun dbyer mi dmigs// cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje yin// rigs ngan 'joms pas rdo rje yin// mi dmigs dbyings nas kun 'byung ba// yon tan chen
396b6(1): po gnas yin te// zhing khams mi bzad gnas kyang yin// 'di ni rin chen rigs su gsungs// chos rnams thams cad dbyer med pas// chags dang chags par bya ba med// de bzhin nyid du gcig pa ste// nyes
397a1(1): pas mi gos pad+ma bzhin// thams cad ma lus dbyings 'dus pas// 'di la bya ba rdul tsam med// ma byas bzhin du don grub pa// skyon yon byang chub nyid du sbyor// 'di ni las rnams grub pa
397a2(1): yin// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// mtha' dang dbus med du mar bral// gang yang ma yin de bzhin nyid// dbyer med pa yi tshul rtogs te// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs// snang srid ma
397a3(1): lus thams cad la// gsal zhing dro ba'i gnas byed cing // mtshan ma bag chags sreg byed pa// 'di ni me yi rigs su bshad// chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// dngos por snang la gzung du med// bskyod
397a4(1): nan thams cad kun smra ste// 'di ni rlung chen yin par bshad// dam tshig chen po'i mdo rnams las// 'byung ba lnga rnams bshad pa ni// thams cad ma lus 'byung ba'i gnas// thams cad kun gyi mdzod skyed
397a5(1): yin// chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// sra zhing brtan pa'i gnas yod pas// dngos po med pa'i tshul rtogs te// 'di ni sa chen yin par bshad// chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// de bzhin nam mkha' chen
397a6(1): po yis// phyi dang nang gi go 'byed pa'o// thams cad gsal ba'i ngang nyid de// 'byung ba bzhi po thams cad kyang // thams cad nam mkha'i ngang du thim// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid kyi
397b1(1): dbyings su 'ub// nyon mongs lnga pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ ma rig pa ni rig par 'gyur// phyin ci log ni yang dag ste// nyon mongs lnga po de bzhin gshegs// dngos med rtogs na byang chub lam// ma rtogs ngan
397b2(1): song gsum du 'gro// de bas thos bsam bsgoms pa yis// yang dag don nyid rtogs byas te// thams cad sangs rgyas nyid du sbyor// 'dod chags rang bzhin med pas na// yang dag don la chags byed
397b3(1): de// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis gnas// ma chags pa la chags pa dang // shin tu chags mchog chen po yin// rgyal ba'i zhing khams 'byung 'gyur te// snang ba mtha' yas zhing dag yin// thams cad pad+ma brdzus
397b4(1): skyes yin// rdo rje 'dzin gyi sa ru skye// zhe sdang chen po'i mtshan nyid ni// phyin ci log la zhe sdang zhing // zhe sdang dngos po med shes na// sdang dang mi sdang mnyam shes te// cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje yin// mnyam pa chen
397b5(1): po'i ngang nyid ni// thams cad kun la dbyer med de// de ltar ma rtogs kun la snang // de bzhin phal gyis mnyam mi shes// des ni zhe sdang nyid du mthong // yang dag rtogs pas rab brtags na// zhe sdang thugs rje
397b6(1): po yin// gti mug rmongs pa zhes brjod pas// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// don dam du ni dbyer med la// kun rdzob sgyu ma mig yor tshul// snang ba nyid na dngos med pas// de la su zhig bdag tu
398a1(1): 'dzin// thams cad dbyer med mi dmigs pa// shes rab can gyi gti mug yin// de rtogs de bzhin gshegs pa'o// nga rgyal mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// mnyam pa nyid la gnas bcas nas// phyin ci
398a2(1): log dang theg dman la// shin tu nga rgyal chen por snang // nga rgyal zhi ba so so min// rang bzhin med pas dbyings su 'dus// 'di ni yon tan 'byung gnas yin// de bzhin dag par shes par byos// phrag dog
398a3(1): mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// nga dang bdag tu 'dzin pa ste// 'dzin nyid dngos po yod ma yin// mnyam mi shes la phrag dog cing // thams cad mnyam pa nyid du 'dus// mi mnyam pa la shin tu sdom// de bas phrag dog/
398a4(1): chen po yin// phyin ci log tu bdag tu bcings// gzung dang 'dzin pas shin tu dog/ gzung 'dzin bral ba'i ye shes ni// dog yangs med de thams cad mnyam// de nyid shes pas las rab 'grub// phung po lnga
398a5(1): zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ phung po lnga por snang ba yang // kun rdzob bya ba sna tshogs byed// bde ba'i yul dang mi bde'i yul// so so'i ro rnams myong byed cing // lnga po'i mtshan nyid bshig byas nas// so so'i mtshan
398a6(1): nyid dngos po med// gang gis de la dngos bzung na// ngan song gsum du skye bar 'gyur// de la gzugs kyi mtshan nyid ni// snang ba nyid ni rang bzhin med// snang med de nyid sna tshogs ston// snang dang mi snang
398b1(1): gnyis su med// de rtogs rnam par thar pa'i gnas// gzugs nyid longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku// tshor ba'i mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// kun la rnam gsum 'byung mod kyi// bde dang mi bde dngos po med// gnyi ga ma
398b2(1): yin lung ma bstan// sna tshogs tshor ba 'byung 'gyur yang // tshor dang 'byung ba gnyi ga stong // stong nyid dngos po yod ma yin// de rtogs chos kyi go bgos yin// 'du shes mtshan nyid bshad pa ni// gsum tshogs
398b3(1): mtshan mar 'dzin pa yin// so so mtshan nyid bshig pa na// dngos po med de de bzhin nyid// dngos po de ni sna tshogs pa// bya byed med par kun du 'jug/ khams gsum ma lus thams cad la// mtshan ma che chung
398b4(1): bsam mi khyab// khyab med dngos po yod ma yin// de ltar rtogs na sangs rgyas mtshan// 'du byed mtshan nyid 'di ltar gnas// rtsa ba brgyad pa'i grangs 'gyur te// lnga bcu rtsa gcig kun la 'pho// der rtogs rtsa ba
398b5(1): yod ma yin// med bzhin log g.yo rnam par 'byung // de la dngos por 'dzin pa ni// rtag tu nyon mongs g.yengs gyur nas// khams gsum btson ra kun tu 'khor// yang dag don phyir rig pas ni// 'phro ba'i
398b6(1): gzhi rtsa de bzhin de// de la rnam rig 'byung ba ni// dngos po med de skad cig ma// ye shes dbyings la rol pa mdzad// sprul pa'i tshogs chen yin par bshad// kun gyi 'byung gnas rnam shes te// de yi dngos po'i
399a1(1): rang bzhin ni// kha dog dbyibs dang rig rgyun min// gang yang ma yin nyid mi dmigs// 'di ni kun la dbang bsgyur te// mtho ris 'gro'am ngan song 'gro// rtogs dang ma rtogs khyad par ro// bzhi
399a2(1): po mnyam pa'i ngang shes na// 'di ni ye shes chen po yin// kha dog lnga yi dam tshig ni// sems can ma lus thams cad la// ye shes lnga yis kun khyab kyang // rang gi rnam rtog bsgribs byas te// ye shes lnga yi don ma
399a3(1): mthong // ma mthong rmongs pa thams cad la// ye shes mtshan nyid bstan pa'i phyir// dkar dang dmar dang ser ba dang // ljang gu la sogs nag por bstan// chos rnams bdag med rtogs byas nas// byang chub
399a4(1): sems nyid dag pa'i phyir// shin tu mdog ni dkar bstan pa// de rtogs bya phyir dag pa'i mdog/ chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// pad+ma rA ga zhes brjod de// chags dang chags par bya ba med// chags med
399a5(1): phyir yang dmar po'o// yon tan gter chen zad mi shes// thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas yin te// de bzhin nyid dbyings ma lus la// zad med rin chen gter 'gyur ba// mdog ni gser gyi mdog tu
399a6(1): bstan// chos rnams phyin ci log rnams la// thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// dbyings su yang dag bsdu dgos pas// las rnams ma lus rdzogs par byed// kun tu las ni ljang gu'i mdog/ de bzhin nyid
399b1(1): kyi dbyings nyid las// cis kyang mi tshugs bcos su med// kha dog nag po dngos po la// tshon gzhan dag gis bsgyur du med// de bzhin kun la shes par byos// phyogs lnga zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ mtha' dang
399b2(1): dbus med de bzhin du// dbyer med ngang du gnas pa la// ye shes rtogs pa'i don bya phyir// phyogs dang dbus su gnas par bya// sems can ma rig mdongs pa la// nyon mongs ma rig bsal bya'i phyir// ye
399b3(1): shes sgron ma 'od 'bar bas// ma rig mun pa sel bar byed// de phyir de la shar zhes bya// sems can ma lus thams cad la// nyon mongs sdug bsngal mi gnas shing // ma rig mun pa nub 'gyur bas// de la nub
399b4(1): kyi phyogs zhes bya// sems can kun gyi nyon mongs kun// ye shes chen po bdag med pas// sdug bsngal rab tu byang byas nas// de la byang gi phyogs zhes brjod// de ltar ma lus thams cad la// thugs rje shar
399b5(1): dang sgrib pa nub// rnam rtog mtshan nyid byung gyur na// de yi yon tan chen po rdzogs// de ltar chos rnams ma lus kun// rang bzhin nyid kyi dbyings su 'dus// phyogs rnams ma lus thams cad kun// de bzhin
399b6(1): nyid du zlum pa'i tshul// phyogs rnams kun la de ltar blta// ma rig phyin ci log rnams kyis// phyogs rnams so sor bzung 'gyur na// rtag tu nyon mongs 'khor bar 'gyur// dbang po lnga zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni//
400a1(1): yul lnga dag la dbang byed cing // phyin ci log ni dngos por 'dzin// dngos por bzung bas khams gsum 'khor// gzugs rnams ma lus thams cad la// snang zhing dngos po med pa dang // lha dang
400a2(1): lha mor dngos por brtags// bdag dang lha nyid gnyis pa'o// sgra rnams sna tshogs grags pa yang // sgra nyid dngos po med par shes// sgra brjod ma lus thams cad ni// chos kyi sgra chen sna tshogs yin// dri yi dngos
400a3(1): por snang ba yang // dri nyid rang bzhin gang yang med// dri snom chos kyi dri yin te// shes rab chen pos de ltar rtogs// ro yi dngos por snang ba yang // ro yi rang bzhin yod ma yin// ro bro de bzhin nyid kyi
400a4(1): ro// bde ba de yis tshim par byed// reg bya sna tshogs snang ba yang // reg bya'i dngos po yod med de// reg byar snang ba longs spyod yin// bde ba chen po chos kyi sku// mi shes phyin ci log rnams kyis// dbang po'i
400a5(1): la la chags 'gyur na// rtag tu 'dod dang mi 'bral zhing // ngan song gsum dang mi khom brgyad// rtsa ba sog ma'i me bzhin du// khams gsum dag tu 'khor bar 'gyur// de bas ye shes chags med
400a6(1): rtogs// byas la mi sogs bsod nams byos// kun la spyod cing mi gos pas// ye shes chen po rtag tu bsgoms// mnyam pa lnga zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ don dam par skye ba med par mnyam pa dang / kun rdzob sku
400b1(1): mar mnyam pa dang / don dam pa dang kun rdzob tu dbyer med par mnyam pa dang / chen po lnga de bzhin gshegs pa lngar mnyam pa dang / rnam par shes pa brgyad ye shes lngar mnyam pa'o// de la don dam par skye ba
400b2(1): med par mnyam pa ni/ chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid dang stong pa'i mtha'// yang dag pa dang chos kyi dbyings// mtshan nyid med cing dmigs su med// gzung du med cing smon pa med// ye
400b3(1): nas mya ngan 'das pa yin// thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// nam mkha' la yang mtshan nyid med// kun rdzob sgyur mar mnyam pa dang // 'dus byas dngos po sna tshogs ni// sgyu ma'i tshul du thams cad
400b4(1): snang // 'phral gyi bya ba kun kyang byed// rtogs pa kun gyi mtshan ma snang // 'di dag thams cad gzugs brnyan te// bya byed snang zhing dngos po med// chu zla'i tshul du thams cad gnas// thams cad snang la
400b5(1): rang bzhin med// don dam kun rdzob dbyer med ni// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// gzhi rtsa med las thams cad 'byung // yod dang med pa gnyi ga min// don dam kun rdzob dbyer med de// 'dus ma byas
400b6(1): nyid 'dus byas snang // snang ba nyid na dngos po med// dngos med de nyid sna tshogs te// de nyid sgyu ma mig yor tshul// 'byung ba chen po lnga de bzhin gshegs pa lngar mnyam pa ni// sa chu me rlung nam mkha' las// ya
401a1(1): mtshan sna tshogs 'byung 'gyur ba// gzhi rtsa yod pa ma yin te// rang bzhin ngang gis de ltar 'byung // so so'i rigs tshogs snang ba ni// thabs chen dag tu rtag tu mnyam// mtshan nyid so sor gnas pa
401a2(1): ni// shes rab dbyings kyi ngang du mnyam// rnam par shes pa brgyad ye shes lngar mnyam pa ni/ rnam rtog kun gzhi ma yin pa// rang bzhin med pa don gyi gzhi// 'di ni chos kyi dbyings zhes bya// de bzhin nyid kyi ye
401a3(1): shes so// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// nga dang bdag tu mi 'dzin cing // kun kyang dbyer med pa yin pas// thams cad me long lta bu'i tshul// thams cad kun la yud rtog cing // rtog dang brtag par bya ba
401a4(1): med// dus gsum kun tu mi dmigs pa// 'di ni mnyam nyid ye shes yin// log rtogs dbang po'i spyod yul spangs// dbang po'i yul rnams dngos med par// thams cad dbyer med de bzhin nyid// so sor rtog
401a5(1): pa'i ye shes yin// mnyam pa rnam lnga de ltar rtags// chos rnams ma lus thams cad la// ye nas rang bzhin med pa dang // thabs chen lhun gyis grub par brtags// 'di ni yang dag rtogs pa yin// tshogs kyi
401a6(1): dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni// bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs te// rang rig mtha' dbus med pa'i dkyil// ye shes bzhi 'phro 'khor lo'i tshul// yang na rdo rje sems dpa' nyid// rigs bzhi'i lha
401b1(1): dang lha mo dang // 'khor gyi khro bo khro mo dang // yang na 'das pa'i dkyil nyid de// 'jig rten sna tshogs 'khor yin no// tshogs kyi mchod pa zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur cing // byang chub
401b2(1): sems dang ma chags pa'i// gnyis su med par thim gyur na// tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par ldan// 'dod yon lnga po thams cad dang // sna tshogs spang ba thams cad kun// de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil
401b3(1): 'khor dang // gzugs mdzes lha dang lha mor brtags// thams cad ma lus sgra rnams ni// chos kyi sgra chen yin pa dang // ngan song sbyong zhing thar lam ston// stong gsum grags pa'i sgra chen dang // thams cad 'jal
401b4(1): ba'i sgra yang yin// bde ba tshim byed bsod nams te// brjod med mi gnas ye shes yin// 'di ni chags med pad+ma'i gsung // chos nyid dngos po med pa la// dri yis mchog tu tshim byed pa// bsod nams tshogs
401b5(1): chen yin par bshad de// chags med ye shes tshul yin te// de bzhin dri yis mnyes mchod na// rig 'dzin sa rnams bskul bar 'gyur// ngan song gsum du chos kyi dri// kun tu bde gnas thob par byed// bder
401b6(1): gshegs dkyil 'khor ma lus la// bde ba'i ro yis mchod par 'gyur// tshim byed bsod nams tshogs chen 'gyur// dngos por mi 'dzin bsod nams tshogs// de lta bu yi ro mchog gis// thams cad kun la
402a1(1): tshim par 'gyur// yi dgas gnas su longs spyod ldan// dkyil 'khor ma lus mchod pa yin// bde ba chen po rdzogs pa'o// rnal 'byor las su rung rnams kyis// rnam pa mang pos brgyan pa
402a2(1): dang // sbyor mchod dag gis longs spyod na// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub 'gyur// bde chen dkyil 'khor 'bar 'gyur nas// sdig pa'i mun nag sel bar byed// dpung gi tshogs kyis mi thub pa'i// mthu
402a3(1): chen dag kyang 'grub par byed// tshogs kyi phrin las zhes bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ byed pa med pa'i tshul gyis ni// kun la thogs pa med par spyad// thams cad ma lus 'dul bar byed// mi mthun phyogs nas dbang du
402a4(1): byed// yon tan chen po 'phel bar byed// khro bo gtum pa'ang zhi bar byed// thams cad kun la spyad bde ba// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyi gnas// dbyings su bsdus pa'i dkyil yin te// 'phro 'du mang po'i 'khor
402a5(1): gyis bskor// mnyam pa chen po'i ngang nyid ni// de lta bu yi tshul du gnas// 'khor gyi phra men tshim par byed ces bya ba'i dam tshig ni/ bdag nyid 'dul ba'i dbang phyug tu// rtag tu mnyam bzhag khro bo'i
402a6(1): tshul// 'khor gyi khro rnams de bzhin te// mdog dang phyag rgya thams cad dang // sngags mchog dam pa ma lus 'don// de nas phra men 'khor bsdus nas// so so'i las dang mthun byas te// so so'i gnas su gzhag
402b1(1): par bya// dbang du bsdu dang bsgom pa'i thabs// ji ltar 'tsham pa bzhin du bya// ma lus thams cad byos shig par// lhag ma byin nas dbang yang bskur// gzhan yang 'gro ba thams cad la// 'dod yon lnga yi sbyin
402b2(1): pa btang // de nas las rnams rdzogs byas nas// dbang phyug chen po'i gnas brten nas// rigs lnga ye shes lnga la sogs// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa// bdag la thams cad bsdu bar bya// de ltar bsgrub
402b3(1): pa'i ngang 'chang ba// ye shes tshogs gnyis rdzogs byas nas// rig 'dzin rig pa'i sa la gnas// theg dman spyod par yod mi 'gyur// mi khom gnas su skye mi 'gyur// skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung thob// sangs
402b4(1): rgyas zhing yang sbyong bar byed// ngan song gnas rnams stongs par byed// yang dag mchog gi snying po 'grub// dbang po yul du snang ba kun// yul rnams yod pa ma yin te// kun gzhi rnam par shes pa nyid// dngos
402b5(1): po sna tshogs par snang ste// snang ba'i dngos po rnam bshig na// so so'i mtshan nyid rnam bshig nas// gzhigs na nam mkha'i ngang du zhi// nam mkha' de nyid lngas gzhigs na// mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyings
402b6(1): su thim// thams cad kun gyi 'byung gnas so// gzhi rtsa med pa'i skad cig ma// snang ba mi 'gog thabs yin te// rang bzhin med pa shes rab nyid// nyon mongs rnam par shes pa ni// kun gzhi nyid snang spyod yul
403a1(1): la// de dang bdag tu rnam par rtog/ bde sdug mtshan ma so sor 'dzin// kun gzhi dngos po med pa la// bag chags sogs pa'i gnas med de// snang ba'i dngos po med pa la// nyon mongs blo yis
403a2(1): blang du med// bsgo dang bsgo bar bya ba med// de ltar sgo byed dngos po med// med bzhin sems kyis log brtags pa// khams gsum btson rar rtag tu 'khor// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni// snang dang mi snang
403a3(1): gnyi ga la// skad cig yud tsam rtog pa yin// rtog pa nyid kyang ma grub na// yul gyi dngos po ga la 'grub// yid kyi de bzhin rgyun nyid ni// snga ma 'das shing mi dmigs pa// phyi ma ma byung brtag tu med// de ltar
403a4(1): rang bzhin dmigs su med// rtsi shing kha na rlung 'phyo 'dra// rgyud ni yongs su ma chad pa// 'di ni kun tu 'byung ba yin// de ltar don rnams dngos po med// chu dang rlung dang rlabs 'dra ba// de gsum gcig dang so so/
403a5(1): min// de bzhin kun gzhi nyon mongs yid// gcig pa ma yin so so min// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam pa'i dbyings// thams cad ye shes dbyer med cing // gcig tu yang ni brjod pa med// de ltar ma rtogs
403a6(1): sems can yin// rtogs na sangs rgyas gud na med// byang chub sems kyi de bzhin ni// shin tu mi dmigs brtag dka' ba// yangs la rgya che gting zab pa// shes rab zab pas rtogs 'gyur te// gang nas ma
403b1(1): 'ongs gar mi 'gro// 'ong dang 'gro bar bya ba min// shin tu brtag dka' mi dmigs pa// mtha' dang dbus kyang brtag tu med// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i rang nyid ni// dmigs med tshul du de ltar snang // dbyings
403b2(1): dang dbyings kyi ye shes kyang // rang rig kho na tsam du zad// sems can ma lus thams cad kyis// de ltar khong du chud par byos// nyon mongs sdug bsngal med pa dang // bla med 'bras bu thob par 'gyur// sems
403b3(1): can ma lus thams cad la// snying rje'i thag pa ma chags par// nyon mongs lam las grol byed cing // byams pa dag gis mnyes par gyis// de bzhin 'khor ba'i btson ra la// snying rje'i zhags pa cher brkyang
403b4(1): nas// nyon mongs 'dam nas 'dren par byed// snying rje chen po skye ma byed// de bzhin skye bo phal rnams la// las kyi sgrib pas mi gos shing // thams cad mngon par sangs rgyas par// dga' ba dag la 'gyod pa
403b5(1): med// sems can nga dang bdag med la// thugs rjes gnyis rtog mi 'byed de// bu gcig 'dra bar blo gzhag bya// thams cad dri ma med par bya// chos rnams thams cad stong pa bas// de la dngos dang rtog pa
403b6(1): med// nam mkha'i ngang du gnas pa la// de la bcos shing bsgyur du med// chos rnams thams cad mtshan nyid med// snang ba thams cad dngos med pas// yod dang med pa thams cad kun// mtshan nyid med pas mi
404a1(1): dmigs so// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa// chos rnams sna tshogs snang ba yang // bdag las gzhan pa ma yin pas// kun la smon cing chags su med// byang chub sems rnams thams cad
404a2(1): shin tu brtag dka' gting zab pas// rtog ge'i spyod yul de ma yin// ma dmigs mi dmigs dmigs su med// sems nyid de nyid ji lta bu// byang chub de nyid sems yin no// sems dang byang chub dbyer
404a3(1): med pas// sems can ma lus thams cad dang // dus gsum chos rnams thams cad yin// thams cad ma lus chos so cog/ sems dang byang chub nyid du 'ub// bo d+hi chen pos de skad bshad// skyes bu blo rtsal rab
404a4(1): ldan pas// ci la'ang thogs pa med par spyad// spyad pa nyid na chags pa med// dus mtha' med par ma nyams gnas// 'di ltar snang ba thams cad la// mngon sum tshad mas rtag mthong yang // snang ba nyid na
404a5(1): dngos po med// de bzhin yang dag nyid du rtogs// gang zhig stong pa'i ngang yod ces// med pa'i rang bzhin rtogs pa de// ri bong rwa dang mo sham bu// tshig tsam gdags su rung mod kyi// thams cad ming tsam stong
404a6(1): nyid med// thams cad ma lus stong zhes te// dran med brdos pa ma yin pas// rtogs med rang bzhin 'od gsal zhing // 'di ltar snang ba thams cad kun// brdos pa tsam gyi chos med do// shes pa 'ba' zhig kho
404b1(1): na'o// thams cad gnyis med rtogs gyur na// de nyid don dam dbyings yin te// gzhan nas btsal zhing gzhag tu med// yod las btsal na sgro btags 'gyur// med las btsal na skur btab ste// yod med
404b2(1): gnyis las btsal byas na// de ni lung du ma bstan 'gyur// rnam par rtog pa mi mnga' ste// de yis mi mkhyen ci yang med// rnal 'byor lta ba de lta bu// tshig gis snga phyi yod mod kyang // don gyis cig char rdzogs
