404b3(1): par bsgom// de lta bu yi don rtogs kyang // 'gro nyal 'dug sdod longs spyad kyang // theg chen sgom las nyams pa med// gong gi don ltar ma rtogs pa'i// blo ngan mnyam par khungs phyung nas// ma rtogs le lo sgom
404b4(1): las byas// don ma 'grub par ngan song 'gro// sems kyis mnyam par ma rtogs na// tshig gis mnyam pas sangs mi rgyas// de bas don tshig ldan par byos// 'on tang the tshom med par 'grub// rnal 'byor don
404b5(1): chen rtogs pa yis// dus mtha' med par de ltar bsgom// yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// spyod yul sangs rgyas nyid du gcig/ rtag tu bsod nams tshogs chen ldan// bya byed med pa'i brtson 'grus
404b6(1): kyis// des ni byang chub snying po len// zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las dbang po dang yul du 'dus pa bstan pa'i le'u ste bdun cu bdun pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
405a1(1): gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las sngags 'chang rnams don yod par bya ba'i phyir thams cad phyag rgyar 'dus shing phyi nang snod bcud thams cad la 'di ltar brtags shing phyag rgya'i dam tshig
405a2(1): bsrung ba dang / dam tshig ni gnas yin no// phyag rgyas bsdus shing spros pa yang 'di yin te/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// gsang ba de nyid kho na las// byang chub mchog 'di bstan pa'o// mnyam pa chen po'i
405a3(1): dkyil 'khor ni// phyogs bcu dus bzhi ma lus pa'i// 'das dang ma 'das thams cad kun// ye nas dbyer med de bzhin nyid// mnyam dang mi mnyam bya ba min// de bzhin nyid kyi ngang du 'ub// 'jig rten 'das
405a4(1): dang 'jig rten pa'i// brjod pa ma lus thams cad kun// chos nyid ngang las ma rtogs pa// log rtogs nyon mongs rdul tsam med// phyag rgya sna tshogs 'od 'bar yang // de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos te// bdag
405a5(1): nyid dbyings las mi gzhan phyir// mnyam la mnyam par gnas pa yi// rnam gsum tshul gyis bsgom byas shing // phyag rgya skyed cing log 'dul ba// bya byed med pa'i tshul gyis su// las rnams ma lus rdzogs par
405a6(1): byed// de ltar rtogs shing rigs kyi mchog/ bdag nyid phyag rgya kun gyi bdag/ ye nas rang bzhin 'od gsal bas// byang chub skye 'khrungs rgyu yang yin// 'bras bu yang dag nyid du'o// rgyu 'bras dbyer med rdo rje'i
405b1(1): sa// bcu gsum don grub de gnas pa// mthar phyin gang la'ang mi gnas pa'o// rang bzhin phyag rgya chen po ni// phyi nang snod bcud thams cad kun// thams cad shes rab dang du gnas// rigs lnga bder
405b2(1): gshegs yab yum du// ma bcos ye nas de ltar gnas// thabs dang shes rab nyid la rol// bde min ma chags tshogs chen po// yang dag nyid la rab tu rdzogs// lhag pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni// nang gi rtags ni
405b3(1): phyir byung ste// mdor bsdus phyag rgya chen po dang // gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs pa// lag gi 'du 'phro bsam yas dang // yan lag stabs chen bskul bsigs kun// nyid kyi dbyings las ma g.yos kyang // rang
405b4(1): bzhin nyid kyi de ltar gnas// 'joms shing cis kyang mi tshugs pa// rang byung chen po lha yi lha// thams cad kun la 'bigs par byed// dpa' bo zhes kyang gdags par bya'o// las dang las kyis mi gos
405b5(1): pa// gnyis med dbyings kyi don rtogs shing // ma chags pa la chags pa dang // shin tu rnam par dag pa yi// de bzhin nyid dbyings dkyil 'khor la// sku gsung thugs ldan zad mi shes// yon tan mi zad gter
405b6(1): 'gyur// gzhi ni mi zad par ldan pa'o// sku gsung las rnams rdzogs byed pa'o// rnam par rtog med tshul gyis ni// thams cad kun la chags med rol// 'dul ba'i don lan bsam mi khyab// 'joms dang ma
406a1(1): chags kun 'byung dang // thams cad dbang bsdus don 'grub pa// ma lus kun 'dus rnam par dag/ kun nas zlum zhing 'od zer 'phro// rigs bzhi ma lus thams cad kun// mnyam rdzogs
406a2(1): dbyings su thams cad 'dus// rigs rnams gcig med gcig pa ste// lhun grub dkyil 'khor ngang nyid du// phyag rgya'i dam tshig mtshan nyid ni// thugs kyi rtags su bstan pa yin// dper na rgyal pos rgyas btab
406a3(1): na// sems can kun gyi yong mi 'da'// de bzhin mnyam nyid phyag rgya yin// kun la khyab cing thams cad snang // sku gsung thugs kyi rgyas btab na// bdud dang mu stegs mang po kun// mi mthun phyogs kyis dbang
406a4(1): byar med// rdo rje sems dpa'i rigs nges na// 'di lta bu la rtag tu gnas// de lta bu yi blo med na// rdo rje'i rigs su yong mi bshad// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi le'u ste/
406a5(1): bdun cu brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la gsang sngags kyi rgyal po brtan par bzung ba 'di ched du brjod do// kye kye phyogs bcu dus bzhi rang bzhin
406a6(1): 'di// de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid// gzung 'dzin spros la 'chel ba yi// rnam rtog zhags pas so sor zin// sa rnams khyad par bkod pa yang // gsang ba'i snying por 'gro ba'i lam// ye shes ngo mtshar rab
406b1(1): 'byam gyis// don du mi 'gyur yong ma gsungs// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// phyag rgya gsang chen snying po 'di// rtogs nas smra bar byed pa gang // de nyid nga yin dbang yang rdzogs// de bzhin gshegs
406b2(1): pa thams cad la// gsang ba 'di las gzhan mi mnga'// sgo dang skur pa zhi ba yi// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na// de nyid nges pa'i dbyings las phyung // de ni nges par lung bstan te// sras ni thugs las skyes pa
406b3(1): yin// sa rab rig pa 'dzin las gnas// zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbyer med par dgyes nas dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings sku dang gsung thugs kyi lhun stug po bkod pa'i rgyan nyid
406b4(1): du bzhugs so// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las yongs su gzung ba'i le'u ste bdun cu dgu pa'o// // 'phags pa'i rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i stong phrag brgya pa las mtshan nyid dang rgyud thams cad kyi
406b5(1): lung gi spyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i le'u las thams cad ma lus par spros te 'khor lo bskor ba de dag gi 'bras bu mchog/ gsang ba chen po 'di
406b6(1): yod par// me mar mur gyi dong 'bogs shing // spu gri so ni gtams las kyang // 'dzegs nas bu dag 'gro bar byos// khong na gnas pa'i yang khong du// lcags kyi sgrom bu kha bsdam mo// thams cad la yang me long
407a1(1): bzhin// bltas kyang gzugs brnyan mi snang ngo // ye shes 'phrul gyi lde mig gis// rdo rje tha ram sgom phye nas// yid bzhin rin chen gter phyung ba// skal ldan mchog gis spyad du gsol// yi ge kun
407a2(1): la mi snang zhing // bla ma'i thugs la gnas pa ni// skal ldan mchog gi spyod yul te// kun dang thun mong de ma yin// dper na seng ge'i 'o ma ni// gser gyi phyis bus 'dzin 'gyur gyi// snod gzhan dag tu blugs pa
407a3(1): ni// snod kyang 'chag la 'o ma'ang 'bo// yong gis gser gyi rang bzhin la// dbyibs kyi khyad par cir yang snang // gser las gyur pa rdul tsam med// de bzhin chos kyi mtshan nyid kyang // mtshan ma sna tshogs cir
407a4(1): snang yang // nyid las gyur pa rdul tsam med// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las chos nyid kun tu mi 'gyur bar bstan pa'i le'u ste brgyad cu pa rdzogs so// //
1a1(1): @/ thabs lam rim gyis ston pa sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho bzhugs so//
1b1(1): dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bshad pa'i dus gcig na// phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs rang
1b2(1): bzhin// rdul snyed 'dus pa'i ngo bo ni// sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs// ye shes rgya mtsho dpag med kyi// yon tan rdzogs pa'i ngo bor gnas// 'og min chen po'i gzhal
1b3(1): yas khang // rgyal ba kun gyi b+ha ga'i gnas// yon tan kun rdzogs dga' ba'i klong // tshad med ye shes chos dbyings kyi// ngo bos kun nas 'khyil ba la// tshad dpag med pa'i
1b4(1): yon tan rgyas// rnam thar bzhi yi sgo khyud mdzes// 'dod yon lnga yi phreng bas brgyan// rnam thar brgyad kyi rta babs can// zla ba'i phreng bas mdangs phyung zhing // nyi zla pad+ma'i
2a1(1): gdan steng na// lnga phung dag pa'i sangs rgyas ni// rgyal po lnga zhes rnam par bstan// 'byung ba lnga yi rgyal mo dang // zhal gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi yi// rnam par
2a2(1): 'phrul pa'i tshul du bzhugs// rnam shes dbang po yul dang dus// phyi nang sems dpa' yab yum rnams// rang rang mdog dang cha lugs rnams// bcu gsum cha lugs sgeg pa
2a3(1): yis// nyi zla 'bar ba'i gdan la bzhugs// lus kyi chos bzhi 'joms pa ni// sgo bzhir gnas pa de dag kyang // btsun mo 'jigs pa'i tshul dang bcas// 'bar zhing rngams pa'i
2a4(1): tshul gyis bzhugs// ye shes rgya mtsho 'og min gyi// yon tan rdzogs pa'i ngo bor bstan// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i lte ba la// bdag po kun bzang 'khor lo bskor// bka' sdod skyes
2b1(1): bu mdun na gnas// brjod pa med bzhin go bar mdzad// dpag med ye shes yongs rdzogs pas// zhing 'khor longs spyod phun sum tshogs// dga' bde yang dag rdzogs pa'i gnas// phyogs bcu dus bzhi
2b2(1): rdzogs pa yi// ma lus 'dus pa'i gzhal yas khang // bdag po rgyan dang bcas pa nyid// 'jig rten gnas kyi 'og min las// nyis 'gyur shin tu spags pa'i gnas// dngos po'i mtha' gsum las 'das
2b3(1): pa// ma spangs rgyan rdzogs gzhal yas khang // yon tan lnga yi bdag nyid de// gru bzhi spyi bos 'khyil snang ba// de bzhin thugs kyi khyad par las// rang snang rgyal ba sems sogs dang // dang po'i sangs rgyas
2b4(1): sar rgyal ba// sems dpa' chen po 'joms pa che// brjod kyi mi langs tshad med dang // rnam gnyis tshul du bzhugs pa'o// 'khor gyi nang nas skal mchog ldan// 'dul ba'i dus babs gsang ba'i
2b5(1): bdag/ lag na rdo rje bsdu ba mdzad// de tshe dus kyi mtha' bral phyir// ngo bo dus bzhi mnyam pa nyid// rgyal ba'i sems dpa' rnal 'byor pa// dgongs pa rig pa rna bas brgyad// gsang ba'i snying po de kho
2b6(1): na// nyid de nges pa'i dbyings nas phyung // sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i// bstan pa rgya mtsho sems kyi lung // rang byung rang snang dgongs pa nyid// byin rlabs dgongs pa rang shar ba// sems nyid rang snang
3a1(1): gzugs can te// rtog ge byis pa'i yul min pas// rgyal sras sems dpa' rang nyid la// nyid la 'chad cing nyid kyis 'grel// gsang mdzod sgyu 'phrul dra ba 'di// bstan pa kun gyi rtsa ba
3a2(1): ste// rang byung ye shes gcig pu nyid// ma lus thams cad khyab par gsal// gsal ba'i thig le chen po ni// yon tan lhun rdzogs bdag nyid de// d+harma tsakra chos kyi gnas// 'od bzhi e sogs dbyibs su
3a3(1): gnas// mi shigs thig le waM dbyibs can// rang la bde ba gsal byed bdag/ ma nu yid sogs rnam shes bzhi// ye shes myong bas bsdus par bshad// ye shes nam mkha'i gzugs skyes pa// pa ra mAn+da don
3a4(1): zab mo// bde ba'i dus nyid snga phyi bral// dus gsum kun gyi ngo bor gnas// rgyal ba'i bzhugs gnas b+ha ga nyid// las dang yon tan rdzogs pa'i gnas// thig le byang chub sems nyid de// rang byung ye shes
3a5(1): kun gyi bdag/ chags pas khyab pa'i yid can la// rtog bcas mnyam du gnas pa'i 'khor// lhan cig skyes pa'i bde chen no// brjod pa med pa'i tshul gyis myong // byed pa rlung gi mtha' bsdus pas// ma lus
3a6(1): lhan cig skyes par shar// dus la 'jug rtog med pa'i dus// bde chen btags pa zad pa'i dus// rgyal ba'i mdzad pa bsam mi khyab// gang la gang ltar der 'dul ba'i// spyod pa rgya mtsho de nyid de// dpag
3b1(1): med ye shes ngo bor shar// dus gcig yon tan lhun rdzogs pas// mnyam nyid res 'jog med par gnas// zhes nyid la nyid bshad do// sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang
3b2(1): po'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid// sangs rgyas 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid// de nyid bshad pa'i dgongs pa yis// 'jug pa'i bde ba mnyam sbyor bas// ro gcig mnyam pa'i ngo bor gyur// phyogs
3b3(1): bcu dus bzhi ma lus pa// gcig pu du mar dbyer med pas// dgongs pa'i byin rlabs nyid la nyid// brjod cing gsungs pa'i don nyid ni// phung po khams dang skye mched dang // phyi nang snod bcud ma lus
3b4(1): pa// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// lhag pa kun rdzob nyid brjod pas// rgyal mchog btsun mo rang bzhin gyis// rgyal ba'i tshogs la dbang bsgyur zhing // phyogs bcu snod bcud ma lus pa// bde
3b5(1): chen thig le'i rang bzhin te// thig le dbyibs dang mtshon las 'das// bde ba mchog gi snying por gnas// de nyid gsang ba'i dbang nyid de// rgyal ba sras bcas myong dgyes nas// thig le bde chen nyid la
3b6(1): gnas// de nas thabs dang shes rab nyid// ma lus 'dus pa'i ngo bo yis// mthong ba'i don nyid bstan bya'i phyir// gnyis med thabs kyis nyams myong ba'i// chags dang chags bral rnam par spangs// lhan
4a1(1): cig skyes pa'i ngo bo nyid// gang du skye dang 'gag pa dang // gnas dmigs 'gro 'ong las 'das pa'i// de bzhin nyid ni bstan par mdzad// nyi zla dngas pa'i rgya mtsho ltar// yongs dgyes khyab
4a2(1): par gyur pa'i ros// ma 'dres gsang ba'i snying po nyid// kun kyang gsum du gnas pa ste// rang bzhin thabs kyis mngon byas phyir// ma lus gsum gyi rang bzhin nyid// 'jug pa thabs kyi rang bzhin
4a3(1): ni// thun mong tha mal kun spangs pa'i// thabs dang cho ga las byung bas// dam pa'i rigs la 'jug par mdzad// rigs dang rigs su nges pa yis// ngo bo nyid ni gnyis su 'gyur// sems lnga skyes pa'i tshul
4a4(1): nyid ni// skye ba'i gzhi dang skyes pa yi// rigs gcig rigs bzhir gang phye ba// 'jug pa'i ngo bo stobs las ni// rigs kyi dbye bas lam dbye ba// lnga dang gcig gi rgyu 'bras 'gyur// ma nges phyi yi dbye ba
4a5(1): ste// bzhi ni nges 'byung thun mong lam// de bzhin rigs gcig thun mong min// de nyid phyi nang cha snang bas// phyi rol ltos pa'i thun mong lam// grub pa phyi nang rgyu 'bras phyir// rgyu 'bras phyi nang 'brel bar
4a6(1): 'dod// skabs 'dir bzhi gsum thun mong gnyis// phan chad sbyangs pa rgyu yi phyir// rang bzhin mngon sngon yang / du song ba dang // phyed du ched du sngon yang / mngon du sdur bas 'gro// des na thun mong mngon
4b1(1): rdzogs yul// gzhi dang skabs nas skye 'gyur ba// grol thar lam du rnam par bshad// de'ang cig car rigs 'jug pa// snod kyi rim pas rnam par snang // gang yang sems lnga bsdus pas te// g.yo ldang smon
4b2(1): 'jug mthar phyin pas// lam bzhi khyad par so sor phyed// rang bzhin gcig las mngon gyur pa'i// thabs rkyen mos pas tshul bzhin du// lam bzhi sems lngas mthar phyin pa// mos dang mthar phyin tshul
4b3(1): gyis snang // dngos por rang bzhin rtogs pa ni// bsnyen bsgrub bzhi dang sgo bzhi dang // dag mnyam rtogs pa bzhi dag gis// dus gcig rdzogs shing smin par byed// rnal 'byor lnga la rim goms
4b4(1): pas// mthar phyin lam la the tshom med// stong pa nyid la gang goms pas// snying rje sgyu ma'i tshul du bsgom// phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor mngon gsal nas// rnam par spros la the tshom med// rang rang spyod dang ldan gyur
4b5(1): nas// bdag gzhan mthar phyin 'gyur ba'i lam// gang du chags pa'i khyad par gyis// rten 'brel lus kyi bsgom pa ni// bye brag rlung las gyur pa yi// ye shes 'byung ba steng 'og sgo// dgug dang dgug
4b6(1): pa'i thabs nyid de// 'khor lo bzhi dang srog shing gsum// me rlung 'gro bas nam mkha'i ba// bzho ba steng du rnam par grags// dgug pa gsum gyis sems lnga'i rim// skyes pa bcu drug sa thob pa'i// rang
5a1(1): bzhin lhan cig skyes pa'i phyir// 'ching ba nyid kyis thar pa'i lam// yul dang dbang por sbyong nus pa'i// chags pa'i lam gyis gang rtogs pa// dug gis de nyid sel ba ltar// thabs dang ldan
5a2(1): pa'i khyad par yin// gang zag thabs dang sbyor ba yis// gang la de ltar thabs nyid kyis// 'ching ba thabs kyis bkrol ba ltar// lung dang man ngag rtogs pas 'grub// dam pa nyid la mnyes zin nas// ye
5a3(1): shes rig pa mas las kyang las gyur// dbang po rim par 'gags pa las// bden pa gnyis med 'char bar 'gyur// gsang ba ye shes chen po ni// thig le'i rgyu ba kun zad pa// de nyid sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho
5a4(1): ste// dman dang bcings dang dbang bsgyur bral// rtog ge rnams kyi spyod yul min// gang du ye shes shar ba yis// ma lus dam pa'i ye shes su// phyogs med rgyal ba nyid du 'gyur// de nas kun mkhyen rgyal ba
5a5(1): nyid// sras dang btsun mor bcas pa nyid// ma lus gcig tu mngon gzigs kyang // thabs bral byang chub snying po ma rig pas// 'gro ba lnga yi bde sdug khyad par rnams// skad cig ma 'dres gsal mkhyen
5a6(1): nas// thabs kyis so sor sgrol ba'i phyir// kun mkhyen nyid la don gyis gzigs// dgyes chen bdag pos mnyam nyid phyir// yul dang shes pa dbyings gcig phyir// mi gsung de bzhin nyid la bzhugs// de
5b1(1): bzhin nyid ni spros med kyang // thugs rje byin rlabs rgya mtsho yis// med las yod pa'i tshul gyur pa// de nyid de bzhin gshegs nyid de// 'dul ba'i dbang gis phyogs bcu yi// 'jig rten drug gi rdul rnyed
5b2(1): du// sprul pa thub pa chen po yi// gang dag tu ni rnam mdzes te// sku dang gsung thugs bsam mi khyab// 'dul ba bzhi yi khyad par gyis// rang rang las dang bsam pa dang // dbang po mos pa'i khyad par
5b3(1): gyis// gdul bya'i bsam pa sna tshogs su// sgyu 'phrul dra ba snang mdzad de// rgyud dang thabs kyis grol ba yis// 'gro ba ma lus bde ba dang // rigs dang ldan par thar pa yi// 'bras bu don la 'khod par
5b4(1): mdzad// mtha' zug med pa'i 'jig rten du// rgyal ba dus gsum mnyam bzhugs pas// de las byung ba'i sprul pa'i tshogs// rgyal ba kun kyang de bzhin no// zhes nyid la nyid bshad do// sgyu 'phrul dra ba rgya
5b5(1): mtsho'i rgyud las// sems lnga bstan pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas kun mkhyen dgyes chen pos// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor kun gzigs nas// lhan cig go phye'i 'khor rnams la// byin rlabs dam
5b6(1): ga dbang thob nas// dbang dngos rang bzhin bstan par mdzad// ma lus chos kun rang bzhin ni// byang chub snying po'i rang bzhin la// dbyer med don du kun gnas kyang // lhan cig la brten kun brtags
6a1(1): kyis// ma rig gzung 'dzin ngo bor smin// rten 'brel gnyis kyi tshul gyur pas// myong dang spyod yul so sor gyur// nam mkha' rang bzhin dbyer med ltar// ma lus de bzhin nyid 'di la// rtog
6a2(1): pa'i dbang gi phye ba la// bdag dang gzhan yang yod ma yin// gang du dman pa'i rtog ge pas// mi shes rtog pa sna tshogs kyis// rang las gzhan du thob 'dod pa'i// thabs des bskal pa bye bar
6a3(1): yang // sangs rgyas ye shes dri med pa// rmi lam nyid du mi 'byung ba// slob dpon man ngag thabs nyid kyis// sgrib pa'i rang bzhin snang bar 'gyur// kun mkhyen dbang dang man ngag can// byin rlabs thabs
6a4(1): kyis phan 'dogs pa// 'gro la yid bzhin nor bu ltar// sna tshogs bsam pa rang mdzad pa// dman pa'i sbyor ba la brten nas// sangs rgyas 'khor lo 'char byed pa// lus dang longs spyod sna tshogs
6a5(1): pas// bskal pa rdul gyi grangs mnyam par// bkur kyang drin dang bral gyur na// lan 'ga' tsam gyis ga la yin// dad dang dam tshig ldan pa yi// rang rang sbyangs ltar mngon gyur nas// dman pa'i blta ba
6a6(1): spang byed cing // brtul zhugs rigs nges gang zag la// ji snyed nam mkha'i mtha'i yun du// brtson zhing btsal bas mi rnyed de// gdung ba gsum gyis gdungs pa de// mthong ba'i thabs ni gsum du
6b1(1): bshad// lung dang man ngag cho ga yis// rtogs nas skye ba 'di yis 'grub// rnam smin bcas pas 'grub nges na// rang dbang lus kyi smos ci dgos// rgyal bas ma lus kun gzigs shing // thugs rjes the
6b2(1): tshom mi bslu bas// nges par bstan pa 'grub pa ni// dgongs pa rtogs na nges par 'grub// rang rang blo dang mos pa yis// ji ltar 'du zhing thabs mkhas pa// tshe dang bskal pa'i drangs bral zhing // lo dang zla
6b3(1): bar brtsams pas 'grub// shes rab rkyen dang thabs ldan pas// ma lus dbyer med rtogs goms na// rang la rang snang goms pa yis// rang byung rang las mngon du snang // gang du blta dang dpyad bral
6b4(1): ba// ma bcos rang rig byang chub sems// byis pa rtog ge'i spyod yul min// dam pa rnams kyis nges par mthong // chos rnams rang bzhin rkyen bral ba'i// mi rtog 'od gsal dbyer med pa'i// kun gyi ngo bo de
6b5(1): bzhin nyid// da lta nyid du snang ba'o// don dam brten pa la brten nas// rgyu ba'i phyag rgya rang snang ba// goms nas bsdus pa'i thig le nyid// ma bcos rang bzhin mya ngan 'das// phyi nang yul sems 'dres
6b6(1): pa'i rlung // rgyu ba rig pa'i thig le nyid// rang byung stong par gnas 'gyur te// phyi nang re dogs rgyu ba med// ma bcos de bzhin nyid du mthong // thabs dang shes rab rtogs pa yi// nyi zla 'dres pa'i gar thabs
7a1(1): kyis// ma skyes mnyam la gnas gyur zhing // phung sogs gnas pa'i chos rnams kun// bde chen snying po gsal gyur zhing // dgag bsgrub med pa'i thabs las byung // spyod yul ma lus thams
7a2(1): cad kun// ma skyes dbyer med mngon du snang // sgra tsam mthong ba med pa'i don// ma skyes sgra yis mi g.yo ba// ka sgras thugs rjes rnal 'byor spyod// a la dbyung ldan yang / las dbyug ldan gar sbyor ba// dran
7a3(1): pa gcig par nga nyid sgra// de sogs byed pa'i rnal 'byor kun// ma skyes dbyer med mngon du snang // de sogs byed pa'i rnal 'byor lnga// gcig la ma lus gcig la rdzogs pa'i rim par rtogs/ kyang / rdzogs
7a4(1): sam rtogs// rig pa'i khyad par rtsal gyis snang // gang du ma bcos rang snang ba// ma lus sgyu ma 'jig rten du// thabs dang ldan pas dbang bskur zhing // ma lus dbyer med tshul du snang // yab yum shi ra
7a5(1): bcud bcas sku// thabs kyis khams lnga'i ye shes gsal// bde skyed thig le ma rnams kun// sems mtha' bzlog pas gnas su thim// bcu gsum sangs rgyas bdag 'gyur ba// ngo bos gzhan nas thob pa
7a6(1): med// rtsa bcud shes pa'i ngo bo nyid// thabs kyi yab yum ye shes gsal// de nyid rten can rten lnga lngar// rang gnas thabs kyi bdag nyid du// nyon mongs sa bon kun kyang gnas// de phyir gzhan la rag ma
7b1(1): lus// dbang po yul sems gnyis med pa'i// shes rab thabs rol sgyu ma las// man ngag thabs kyis dbang bsgyur nas// rang bzhin sgyu 'phrul chen po 'char// thabs dang thabs byung 'brel pa nyid// thams
7b2(1): cad kun gyi gzhir gnas pa// rang lus thabs kyi ngo bo la// rang gi rkyen rnams mngon gyur pas// tshegs med rang log gyur pa yis// bden pa dbyer med mngon du mthong // rang bzhin ye shes mtha' bral
7b3(1): bas// thabs dang las rkyen skyes bu yis// spyod yul kun du blang bya ba// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa'i rgyu// chags pa'i dam tshig blang bar bya// kun kyang thabs dang shes rab nyid// phan tshun dgyes
7b4(1): pa'i thabs las ni// sems mtha' 'ong bas go phye nas// rang snang thabs kyis gnas sbyar bas// zung 'jug thabs chen de las byung // gnyis med ye shes rdo rje che// rgyu rkyen gzhan las byung ba min// rang
7b5(1): byung thabs kyi ngo bo nyid// lus dang rtsa dang longs spyod bcas// thams cad bde chen 'jig rten du// gsal byed thabs kyi snang ba las// rkyen gyis zlog pa mthong ba bzhin// gzhan las byung zhing snang ba
7b6(1): med// phyogs dus dkyil 'khor ngo bo nyid// bde ba chen po ma skyes pa'i// seng ge lta bu'i byin brlabs pa'i// gsung gis gnyis med gsal bar 'gyur// gsung gsang yang / gsum bzhis sgrib ye shes
8a1(1): che// khams gsum 'dus pa'i thig le nyid// 'dres pas lhun grub ye shes nyid// dkyil 'khor gsal snang brtag par dka'// ma lus thig le rang snang ba'i// ma bcos rang snang thabs rtogs
8a2(1): nas// mngon par lta ba'i don rtogs na// rang 'byung 'bras bu rang las 'char// phyogs dus rgyal ba'i ngo bo nyid// mi zad 'khor lo rang snang don// ma mthong rmongs pa'i 'khrul pa rnams// byin rlabs lha dang
8a3(1): yon tan ltar// snang 'dod res 'jog sems 'dod sogs// gzhan las 'phags 'dod nor ba'i lam// mdongs pas nam mkhar bsnyeg pa bzhin// nor bas ma nor rnyed mi 'gyur// ma bcos 'bras bu rang
8a4(1): snang don// byin rlabs dgongs rtogs goms pa yis// ma btsal thabs kyis rang 'char ba// byin rlabs gdul bya'i snang bar zad// ces nyid la nyid bshad do// sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ chos thams
8a5(1): cad gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan dgyes chen pos// sangs rgyas kun 'dus dag pa ste// gcig dang du ma las 'das pas// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten
8a6(1): pa// mngon phyung nas ni gsung bar mdzad// a/ ka kha ga g+ha nga / tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Sha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa sha Sha sa ha/ k+Sha/ i I/ u u/ e I o au/ a ka tsa Ta ta pa ya sha i
8b1(1): i/ u U/ e I/ o au/ r-i r-I/ l-i l-I/ aM aHka kha ga g+ha nga/ tsa tsha dza dz+nya nya/ Ta Sha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha/ ka kha ga g+ha nga / tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Sha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa
8b2(1): papha ba b+ha ma/ ya ra la wa/ sha Sha sa ha/ rang byung mtshan pa las 'das pa// a nyid kun gyi ngo bo ste// / brjod 'das nam mkha'i rang bzhin las// snod bcud yi ger rang bzhin shar// thams cad yi ge'i rang
8b3(1): bzhin te// mtshon pa brda yi ngo bor snang // gang du ma skyes yum nyid ni// sa dang nam mkha' can rdo rje// stobs chen lnga ni dbang po lnga// gnyis pa lnga po rim bzhin du// sgeg mo phreng thogs dbyangs dang
8b4(1): gar// ya mAn ta kr-ita nyid du bshad// gsum pa lnga ni rim pa bzhin// snang mdzad rdo rje rin chen dang // dpag med don grub nyid du bshad// bzhi pa lnga po rim bzhin du// sangs rgyas spyan dang na bza'
8b5(1): dkar// mA ma kI dang sgrol mar bshad// lnga pa lnga po rim bzhin du// byams pa sgrib sel kun bzang dpal// rta mgrin rim par 'dod pa yin// drug pa bzhi ste rim pa bzhin// bdug spos mar me me tog
8b6(1): dang // dri chab lha mo zhes su bshad// bdun pa bzhi ste rim pa bzhin// rtag chad mtshan ma dag pa dang // bdag med ma ste rim pa bzhin// mthar zad byed pa rdo rje ni// ma lus 'dus pa'i ngo bo ste// sku
9a1(1): gsung thugs ni rdo rje las// rnam par 'phrul pa'i sprul pa drug/ brgyad pa'i yi ge drug tu bshad// bcu gcig gnyis pa rnam bshad pa// sgrib pa kun bzang ye shes ni// 'chi ba gso byed yin par
9a2(1): bshad// thog ma mthar zad mthing ga ste// rdo rje dril bu nyid du 'dod// dang po lnga dang gnyis pa lnga// gtso bo yab yum bcu nyid ste// 'khor lo rdo rje rin po che// pad+ma ral gri 'dzin pa ste// dkar po mthing ga
9a3(1): ser po dang // dmar po ljang gu rim bzhin no// gsum pa lnga po rim pa bzhin// rdo rje dang ni rin chen dang // pad dkar rdo rje dkar sngo dang // dmar dang ljang gu rang bzhin gnas// rdo rjes gnon pa mthing
9a4(1): nag yin// bzhi pa lnga po rim pa bzhin// klu shing po ti rin chen ste// ut+pal dkar ser dmar ser dang // dmar ldang dkar ldang rim bzhin te// thod sbrul ser nag 'bar bar gnas// tsa la sogs pa'i lha
9a5(1): mo ni// me long phreng ba pi wang gar// gtso bo nyid dang mtshungs pa yin// gzhan yang a sogs bzhir bshad pa// bdug pa me tog mar me dang // dri yang gtso bo rjes mthun pa'o// thod sbrul 'jigs pa dmar
9a6(1): nag ste// de bzhin yi ge bzhir shes bya// rtag chad lcags kyu zhags pa dang // lcags sgrog dril bu thabs dang 'dra// sprul pa'i pi wang gseg par dang // po ti sgrom dang go cha dang // me dang chur ni shes bya
9b1(1): ste// dkar dang ser dang dmar nag dang // ser nag mthing sngo dud kha dag/ rim pa bzhin du shes par bya// rdo rje rgya gram ldang nag gis// ma lus gnon pa bdud rtsi 'khyil// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yi ge
9b2(1): yis// ma dag pa dag dag byed cing // ma mthong ba dag mthong byas nas// de nyid rnam par grol bar 'gyur// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ni// rang snang gsung gi 'khor lo las// rim bzhin rang gi gzhir
9b3(1): snang ba// dpag med yon tan lhun rdzogs pas// rang byung 'khor lo mngon par brjod// rang byung 'khor lo rgyu yi bdag/ ka sogs sum cu rtsa gnyis ni// ma lus kun gyi dngos gzhi ste// sku yi 'khor lor rang
9b4(1): snang ba'o// sgra dbyangs gsung gi 'khor lo ni// brjod pa'i sgra ni sna tshogs pa'i// ma lus par ni rang snang bas// gsung gi phyag rgya bzhir nges pa'o// rig pa thugs kyi 'khor lo ni// zag med ye shes drug ldan
9b5(1): zhing // sde tshan brgyad kyis brgyan pa ni// snying po dngas ma lngar snang ba// yon tan sprul pa'i 'byung bzhi nyid// bye brag brgyad cu kun 'dus pa'i// 'gro 'du thig le kun gyi dngos// sprul pa'i thig le rang 'char
9b6(1): ba// snang ba'i mdzad pa bsam mi khyab// gang du thabs las byung ba yi// dngas ma'i ro lnga myong 'gyur bas// rten bcas ngo bo dag gyur nas// mdzad pa'i byin rlabs bsam mi khyab// shes rab thabs rol sgyu ma
10a1(1): las// rang bzhin sgyu 'phrul chen po 'char// thabs dang thabs byung 'brel pa nyid// thams cad kun gyi gzhir gnas pa// ma skyes sems kyi rang bzhin las// sna tshogs sgyu ma'i don 'char
10a2(1): ba// thabs la brten pa'i skyes bu nyid// gnyis su med par gnyis med 'brel pa dra bar bshad/ kyang / 'brel bar bshad// gnas bzhi gar thabs sgyu ma las// nam mkha'i ye shes cir yang gsal// cir
10a3(1): yang bdag nyid reg par 'brel// drang ba'i don du nga yis bshad// gsang ba rang byung 'khor lo ni// gnas dang ngo bor ldan pa yi// thabs dang rkyen las snang ba yi// ro lnga sems la mnyam 'jug pa// steng
10a4(1): 'og thabs kyi mtshon byas pa// ye shes lnga yi ngo bor bshad// g.yas g.yon dbus dang ldan pa yi// nyi zla 'bar ba gang 'jog pa// thabs ldan gnas sems rtsi yis bzung // yon tan kun gyi ngo bor
10a5(1): gsal// ma lus pa yi byang chub sems// gnas rten byed pa'i ngo bor bcas// skad cig thabs las mngon gyur pa'i// bde ba chen po'i ngo bor snang // rang byung snang ba'i mtshan ma kun// bde ba chen po'i don
10a6(1): rtogs pas// dngas ma'i snying por gsal gyur pa// bde chen nam mkha'i mthar ltar snang // gang du mtshan rtog kun spangs pa'i// bde chen ye shes ro dang bcas// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba yi// ma lus
10b1(1): sku gsung thugs su snang // thabs ldan ye shes rgya mtsho yis// chos kun ro gcig kun gsal ba// rtog dang mi rtog cha las 'das// de nyid mtshon pa med par bstan// sangs rgyas 'khor lo kun 'dus
10b2(1): pa'i// gsung gi dkyil 'khor mi zad pa// gdul bya'i don du kun bsgrags pa'i// rang byung 'khor lo'i gsung du gsal// phyi nang gsang ba'i mthar thug pa// snod bcud ro dang bcas pa las// mi rtog gsal
10b3(1): bar rang snang ba// 'khor lo kun gyi gzhir gyur pa'o// zhes nyid la nyid bshad do// sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ gsung gi 'khor lo mngon du phyung ba'i le'u ste bzhi'o// // de nas
10b4(1): bcom ldan dgyes chen po// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin des// kun 'byung sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho che// dngos grub cho ga yang dag gsung // rang byung sgyu 'phrul dra ba ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te// gsang
10b5(1): ba'i ngo bo thabs kyi gnas// dngos grub kun gyi rtsa ba ste// sems nyid kun gyi rtsa ba yin// de nyid dngos med snying po ste// thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas mchog nyid// ma bcos sgyu 'phrul chen po las// gnyis
10b6(1): med 'brel pa dra ba'i don// ro gcig gnas kyi khyad par las// yon tan rin chen sna tshogs 'char// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus pa// bzhi bcu rtsa lngar rang bzhin gnas// de nyid grangs las 'das pa
11a1(1): ste// ma bcos rang rig byang chub sems// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// cho ga sna tshogs 'dod rnams la// rang gi mos pa ji bzhin du// cho 'phrul sna tshogs bstan par zad// rang byung
11a2(1): yo byad dag pa ni// bskyed cing sbyangs nas 'bar ba ltar// nges pa rnyed nas longs spyod na// 'tsho ba bdud rtsi'i ngo bo ltar// gang gis rang rig byang chub sems// cho 'phrul gsal bsgoms rnal 'byor
11a3(1): pas// rang byung lnga la byin brlabs te// zos pas phyi nang nad sel 'gyur// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsal goms na// rang byung gtsang sme med sbyar zhing // dang po gang yang rung ba dag/ gang ltar bsgyur ba der
11a4(1): 'grub ste// rtogs goms stobs las byung ba'o// bdag nyid gsal bar brtan byas nas// mkha' dbyings rdo rje gtams pa las// bdag nyid bgrod par nus pa na// rnal 'byor gsal ba'i don rnams
11a5(1): bya// gang gi spyan dang thugs gsal bas// mi mthun ma lus kun bsregs nas// dngos med stong pa'i ngang du tshig/ lag mthil zla ba'i chu rgyun bsam// nam mkha' sa gzhi bcas pa nyid// chu yis thams cad
11a6(1): gang byas nas// sreg pa'i bskal pa gzhil bar bya// rang gi sgrol ma'i rnal 'byor bsam// brtan zhing goms par gyur pa na// gling bzhi ri rab 'khor yug rnams// ma lus brlags shing 'thor bar
11b1(1): 'gyur// yaM gyis bud cing khaM gyis bkrus// raM gyis sbyangs pas dngos po dag/ bdag gzhan rgyud la snang ba rnams// dngos med stong par ston par nus// mi mthun phyogs kyi dgra bgegs dang // sangs rgyas
11b2(1): btsun mo gang yang rung // lha'am gnod sbyin bu mo dag/ ting 'dzin sbyor ba goms pa yis// de ma thag par dgug nas ni// bdag nyid ji ltar dga' bar byed// de nas 'dod pa'i don rdzogs nas// yid la
11b3(1): der gnas mi 'dod na// gang dga'i gnas su btang nas ni// phyis ni dam bca' bzhin du 'grub// gal te phyogs par ma gyur kyang // bdag gi bya ba ma rdzogs par// sngags dang phyag rgya ting 'dzin gyis// ji
11b4(1): srid 'dod par bcing bar bya// rang gi don ni legs grub nas// lus dang sems ni sgrol ba yis// pha rol ci bder gnas par bya// bdag dang gzhan dag phan 'dod pas// rim pa bzhin du btsun
11b5(1): par bya// bdag nyid thar lam bgrod pa yis// stong pa chen por goms gyur nas// rgyal ba'i sku tshe mi 'chi nyid// mtshan ma'i rgyun gyis tshe bsdus nas// 'dod pa yid 'ong thob par 'gyur// steng 'og rlung la
11b6(1): dbang thob nas// bar ma'i rkyen gyis bslu ba med// mtshan bzang thig le bcu drug sogs// dben pa'i gnas su zla dang bcas// zhun chen la sogs bcud kyis gso// gang rgyas bdud rtsi gsang ba'i
12a1(1): lces// bsdus nas brngubs kyang / mi 'chi nges par myang // lnga yi rtsa ba yan lag bcas// bdud rtsi rigs brgya nga gcig sbyangs// rtags phyin 'thungs na the tshom med// ra sA ya na la sogs
12a2(1): la// bsgrubs shing bsten na de bzhin no// tshe mchog las byas zla rgyas sogs// rtags ldan zos pa'ang nges par 'grub// gzhan pa tha mal las sbyar te// bdag nyid kun la nges par 'gro// sngon song pa yi snga
12a3(1): rol nyid// yang na mthar nye'i lam che'o// tshe yi rten ni gang rung la// bdag nyid stobs ldan rnal 'byor pas// phyogs bcu'i gzi byin kun bsdus nas// sngags dang phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin gyis// bstims la
12a4(1): nges par bsrung bar bya// gal te 'chi ba gso 'dod pas// rgyal rigs rje'u dang bram ze'i ro// rma med gtsang ma blangs nas ni// sbyangs shing rgyan dang ldan byas te// bdag gis gang yin bkug nas
12a5(1): ni// mngon bstim rtags dang ldan gyur nas// mgo dang lce bcad go mtshon gyis// lha min g.yul las 'joms par byed// lce bcad bltabs pas gser yin te// langs nas dam bca' chu blud nas// gang
12a6(1): 'dod las ni bcol bar bya// gal te drag po brtsams gyur na// de yi bdag nyid dag la brten// ming rus bcas pa gsal bar bya// drag po'i gnas su bzhag nas ni// gnyen pos gnas bkug bstims
12b1(1): byas nas// dug dang lan tshwa tsha bas bstims// gnas lngar phur gdab de nyid gnon// 'dis ni kun kyang brlag par 'gyur// dgra dpung 'pham pa'i las bya na// bdag nyid lha ru gsal byas la// ras sam
12b2(1): gro gar ming rus bris// chags pa'i gos kyis gril byas nas// g.yas pas legs par gnan nas kyang // nga rgyal rang gi sngags bcas pas// phyogs su 'phyos pas 'pham par byed// de yis rgyal bar 'gyur/
12b3(1): ba ste// spyi gtsug 'khor lo rtsibs bcu bzhag/ khro bo'i sngags bris byin brlabs na// ma yengs gar phyin rgyal bar 'gyur// gzhan yang thabs dang ldan pa yis// thabs dang shes rab gdan bskyed de// rgyal
12b4(1): ba'i dkyil 'khor nyi zlar langs// gnyis thim nyi zla bcud lngar 'dres// 'thungs pas bdud rtsir dag par byed// de nyid gnyis med ldan gyur nas// rtse sprad byed pa'i thabs bcas pas// dug gsum nad
12b5(1): bsal bde chen gyis// rang dga'i lus kyi stobs su gnas// rlung sems bde bas gang gyur tshe// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// 'dod pa lnga la longs spyod cing // zhing dang spyod yul dag par 'gyur// gang
12b6(1): tshe thabs dang ldan pa yis// tha mal snang ba lus bcas pa// dka' zhing gdung ba spangs pa yis// bde chen dbyer med nyid du 'gyur// rang rig 'od gsal nam mkha' ni// rdo rje pad+ma la brten pas// 'byung
13a1(1): bzhi thabs kyis 'bar ba yis// tha mal zhen pa mi gnas shing // byang chub sems kyis gang bar byed// sgrol ma rlung gi thabs ldan pas// 'bar nas rim par gnas bskyod pas// steng gi thig
13a2(1): le zhu ba'i sems// dngas ma lngar thim gsal ba'i tshe// stong nyid nam mkha'i rang mtshan nyid// dbang po yul sems zlog par 'gyur// rang byung bcud 'dus thig le nyid// thabs kyis phyag rgyas bkug byas
13a3(1): nas// thabs dang shes rab stobs kyis bcings// rang byung bde ba'i nyams shar nas// rang rang gnas su gtang ba'i tshe// rlung sems zhen 'dzin grol gyur nas// sems mtha' 'gro 'ong med pa'i tshe// ye
13a4(1): shes rgya mtsho gsal gyur nas// ma lus bde chen 'bar bar gnas// bdud bzhi ma lus 'pham pa yis// phyogs med rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor du// ting 'dzin gsal bar byed par 'gyur// bde ba'i thig le
13a5(1): rang snang bas// ming tshig tha snyad brjod bral bas// thabs dang shes rab thabs mtshon pas// bde chen rig pa'i thig ler 'gyur// thun mong khyad par yo byad kyis// sngon du bya ba kun byas nas// rang
13a6(1): gi thabs ldan rnal 'byor pas// ji ltar bsgrubs pa bzhin du 'grub// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// rang byung bde chen rgya mtsho ni// byin rlabs kun gyi bdag nyid pas// kun la 'tshams pa bzhin du
13b1(1): 'char// thig les bde ba myong gyur nas// bde ba'ang thig le'i ngo bor gsal// gnyis med rang byung snying po la// gsal bar nyams kyis goms par bya// bde chen thig le'i ngo bo ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i bdag
13b2(1): nyid de// rigs kyi bdag po kun las grol// mtha' dbus rgyu 'bras las 'das pas// thig le rang rig byang chub sems// 'gro 'ong dmigs 'dzin zhen las 'das// de bzhin nyid du gshegs pa yang // sna
13b3(1): tshogs zhen las grol bar zad// thabs dang shes rab thig le yi// nyi zla gsal ba'i sems ldan pas// dngos med nas kyang / lhan cig skye nus na// sgyu 'phrul dra bar gsal bar 'char// zhes nyid la nyid
13b4(1): gsungs pa'o// sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho'i rgyud las// phyi ma bsgrub pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan dgyes chen po// mtha' dbus med pa lhun grub pa// ye shes kun gyi bdag nyid de// sku yi
13b5(1): dkyil 'khor snang bar mdzad// gcig dang du ma bral ba yi// rang byung ye shes phyogs med pa// ye shes lnga rdzogs snying po 'di// mu khyud snying pos yongs su bkod// sangs rgyas kun gyi gzhal yas khang // ngo bo
13b6(1): ji bzhin gsal gyur pa// che ba'i yon tan lhun rdzogs pa// dkyil 'khor kun gyi rang bzhin nyid// ye shes 'khor lo dra ba gcod// mu khyud thig les yongs su bskor// che ba'i yon tan phyogs med
14a1(1): cing // thar pa'i grong khyer khyams ldan pas// rnam thar mdzes pa'i sgo dang ldan// 'dod yon lnga dang bzhugs gnas kyang // zad pa med pa'i tshul du gnas// bdud dang 'khor ba'i nyes pa
14a2(1): yis// mi 'jigs stobs dang rdzu 'phrul dang // dbang dang phrin las lhun rdzogs pas// thabs dang shes rab skyon bral bas// rgyal ba kun gyi gnas pa'i gdan// rang byung rig pa'i 'phrul pa yis// mdzad pa
14a3(1): rdzogs dang ma rdzogs pa'i// 'gro ba'i don la ma 'dres pas// lha dang gdan gyi khyad par dang // bzhugs tshul rgyan cha sna tshogs bstan// rang byung rgyal ba thams cad kyang // rang gi rtog pa der byung gi// rgyu
14a4(1): 'bras dka' thub rtsol ba yis// gzhan 'byung tha dad chos dang bral// rang rig lhun gyis grub pa la// yon tan khyad par kun rdzogs pa// thabs chen gsang ba goms rtogs na// che ba'i 'bras bur bdag
14a5(1): nyid gnas// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// kun nas rgya yang ma chad pa// phyogs bcu dus bzhi sku gsung thugs// ma lus bdag nyid byang chub sems// gdod nas dag mnyam rtogs pa yis// mi zad
14a6(1): 'khor lo rang snang ba// ma lus thams cad dag pa yis// byar med bya las 'das pa yi// rang byung sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho che// skyes bu rab la de bzhin snang // ma lus 'dod stobs khyad par gyis// thabs dang shes
14b1(1): rab 'brel ba la// rab 'bring tha ma'i stobs bzhin du// dka' thub gdung ba spangs pas 'grub// thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi// gtso 'khor dbyer med dkyil 'khor ni// 'khor ba dag byed maN+Da
14b2(1): la// bsgom pas 'bras bu mngon du 'byung // thabs chen rgya mtshos zin pa la// 'khor ba'i rgyu 'bras ngo bos stong // 'das dang ma 'das dbyer med pa'i// rang rig byang chub de bzhin nyid// rang rig byang chub
14b3(1): rkyen bral ba// mos pa'i yon tan khyad par gyis// rang rang kha dog ji bzhin du// yon tan stobs las mngon snang ba// ma 'dres gsal bar shar ba nyid// sgyu 'phrul thabs kyi ngo bo ni// dra ba shes rab ma skyes
14b4(1): dbyings// gnyis med gnas pa rtogs goms nas// 'bras bu rdzogs pa'i tshul du gnas// bskal par sbyangs dang rang gnas pa'i// blo yi bye brag ji snyed pa// thabs kyi rim pa de bzhin te// 'bras bu lhun
14b5(1): grub nyid du 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas gyur pa// gsang ba'i bzhugs gnas thig le'i rten// ngo bo mtha' bral gnyis med pa// che ba'i yon tan lhun rdzogs pa// sgo dang ldan te snying por rdzogs// thig
14b6(1): le chen po'i rang bzhin la// 'bras bu'i mtshan ma rang bzhin rdzogs// thabs chen nyi zla'i ro 'dres pas// ye shes dkyil 'khor gsal bar snang // sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus pa// sku gsung thugs kyi
15a1(1): phyag rgya nyid// ma lus nyi zla'i tshul gnas te// skal ldan thugs la 'jug par 'gyur// bde chen rig pa'i dkyil 'khor ni// ma lus 'dus pa'i byang chub sems// thig le rlung dang bral ba
15a2(1): yi// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du 'gyur// gang dang gang du zhen bzung ba// bde chen thig ler zad gyur nas// zhing dang spyod yul bcas pa dag/ ma lus rig pa bde chen po// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med
15a3(1): pa'i// gsang ba'i thig le kun gyi dngos// thams cad rang bzhin rdzogs pa'i phyir// thams cad kun gyi ngo bor gnas// steng 'og g.yas g.yon las byung ba'i// snang stong thig ler 'dres pa'i bcud// nyi
15a4(1): zla zabs dang shes rab nyid// gnyis med zabs su 'brel ba yin// brjod bya'i yon tan kun 'dus pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin nyid// ma lus kun las 'brel ba'i phyir// sems lnga'i tshul gyis
15a5(1): mngon du snang // thig le dang po nas brtsams nas// ma skyes bde chen bcu drug mtha'// 'gro 'od med cing mthar phyin pa// rang byung dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// thog med bsags las gang gyur
15a6(1): pa'i// las dang 'du byed sgrib pa rnams// bde chen sku gsung thugs gyur nas// ma bsgribs ye shes ngo bor 'char// bye brag brgyad cu sprul pa yi// thig le'i rkyen gyis 'dus gyur pas// ma lus mun pas snang
15b1(1): ba bzhin// dngos byed thabs kyi snang byed pa// rang byung rang snang ngo bo nyid// bde ba chen po'i thig le nyid// phan tshun 'brel zhing 'dres pa las// nyi zla 'khor bcas de dag kun// gsang ba'i thig le 'phro
15b2(1): 'du med// bde chen thig ler lhun rdzogs pa'i// byang chub sems la dngas snyigs med// lus ngag sems kyi bya ba rnams// gang gis 'dul bar mi nus pa// byin rlabs rten 'brel las byung ba'i// bde ba
15b3(1): chen po'i ngo bor 'gag/ snang gsum las 'das thig le ni// phyogs 'dzin dmigs pa las 'das pa// rang rig dmigs zhe na dag pa yi// 'dus byas zag pa'i bde ba med// sangs rgyas kun gyi thig le
15b4(1): ni// 'gro 'ong thig le rgyu ba dag/ mkha' ltar dag pa'i byang chub sems// rkyen bral ye shes zag med de// 'phel 'grib med pa'i tshul du gnas// rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba las// rang byung ye shes rgya mtsho
15b5(1): nyid// gdul bya mos pa'i bsam pa bzhin// thugs rje byin rlabs bsam mi khyab// ji snyed mtha' yas chos rnams ni// rgyal ba kun dang dbyer med pa'i// sku gsung thugs kyi ngo bo ste// dbyer med bde chen
15b6(1): phyag rgyar gsal// gang du snang dang mi g.yo ba'i// bya ba byed dang mi byed pa// sgyu 'phrul dra bar rdzogs pa yis// thig le mchog gi snying por gnas// rten dang brten par bcas pa yi// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil
16a1(1): 'khor ni// sna tshogs bsam pa las byung ba'i// dkyil 'khor chen por 'bar bar 'gyur// zag med ye shes lhun rdzogs pa'i// gdul bya'i bya ba kun kyang spyod// ces nyid la nyid bshad do// sku
16a2(1): 'phrul rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos gzhi ste// gsung gi 'dul ba'i don du ni// de dag 'khor
16a3(1): lo bskor bar mdzad// rtsa ba cir yang 'gyur ba'i b+h+rUM// rin chen ye shes sna tshogs pa// phyi nang mtha' dbus rgya bral ba'i// chos dbyings 'og min gzhal yas khang // rang rang sa bon bskyed pa dang // gnas
16a4(1): dang byin gyis brlabs pa yi// rdo rje 'dzin dang rgyal ba 'dzin// sangs rgyas nor bu pad+ma dang // shes rab 'dzin pa'i rim pa bzhin// 'khor lo'i tshul bzhin gnas par mdzad// rang rang sa bon ji bzhin
16a5(1): pa'i// gnas dang bskyed pa'i byin brlabs pa// nang dang sbyor ba las byung ba// lnga ste 'byung ba'i rang bzhin nyid// rang gi btsun mo spyad bya ste// bde skyed 'khril ba'i tshul du gnas// ming gi dang po las byung
16a6(1): ba// rnam shes bzhi yi mnyam nyid ni// gnas bskyed thabs kyi byin brlabs pas// rang gi gnas su de bzhin gshegs// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa// yul bzhi bde skyid btsun mo ste// sa bon gnas
16b1(1): bskyed thabs las byung // thabs dang 'brel ba'i tshul du bzhugs// skye mched gnas kyi rang bzhin las// ming gi dang po las byung ba// gnas dang skyed pa la sogs pa'o// gnas ni ji bzhin gnas par
16b2(1): 'dod// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// dus bzhi btsun mo'i rang bzhin ni// dgyes pa skyed pa'i lha mo ste// gnyis med 'khril ba'i tshul du gnas// dgug dang bsdam dang bskyod pa dang // dgyes pa chen po'i
16b3(1): rang bzhin nyid// tshim dang me tog gtor ba yis// gnyis med lhan cig gsal ba yis// ma lus khyab cing gsal bar byed// 'di dag dbye dang dbab pa dang // thim dang bde bas tshim pa dang // rim pa
16b4(1): bzhin du yang dag gnas// gang du rang gi sa bon las// gong ma ji bzhin gsal gyur pas// lus kyi chos bzhi'i ngo bo ni// ta kr-ita sgo srung tshul du gnas// gzhan dag rang gi btsun mo ni// lha mo bzhi yi dang
16b5(1): po las// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// mtshan ma 'joms shing 'khril bas 'khod// ma lus 'dus pa'i ye shes ni// dmigs pa gsum las 'das pa ste// yul gsum 'das pa'i 'dus ma byas// de nyid
16b6(1): 'dus pa'i ye shes dbyings// kun gyi rang bzhin nyid ces bshad// thabs dang shes rab la sogs pa// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// chags sogs mtshan ma drug po ni// sa bon gnas bskyed las byung
17a1(1): pa'i// sprul pa'i sku ni mngon par brjod// rang byung rten gyi thig le nyid// phyag rgya bzhi yi sbyor ba las// dga' dang chags dang bde ba dang // ye shes nyid ni gsal bar 'byung // sems lnga ye
17a2(1): shes lngar smin pa'i// ye shes thig le gnas 'phos nas// rang 'dod gnas la phog par mdzad// nyi zla rig pa'i thig ler bcas// phan tshun 'dres par gyur pa na// lnga dang lngar ni mi phyed pas// rig pa'i me
17a3(1): tog dor zhes brjod// gang gis gang la gsol btab pas// thugs rje byin brlabs sbyangs byas nas// thugs bzhugs 'dres nas dbyer med pa// sras gyur dgongs pa gcig la gnas// rang byung gnas
17a4(1): dang mi 'gal zhing // 'bras bu nyid las gzhan min pas// ma lus 'khor lo thig le rnams// bdag gi sras su bsgom par bya// lam dang 'bras bu'i khyad par dang // rtog pa ye shes 'od las byung // byin
17a5(1): rlabs 'bras bu dngos 'brel bas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sras tshogs bsgom// rang gi ma bcos dngos nyid las// rtogs pa'i ye shes byin rlabs nyid// ma lus snang bas rgya mtsho ste// dman dang rigs
17a6(1): chad spyod yul min// ma lus sku gsung thugs sbyor ba'i// de nyid thabs dang shes rab ste// dbyer med thim pas phyag rgya bzhi// gnyis med 'dres pa'i tshul du gnas// gnas lngar thim pa'i thig le ni// sangs
17b1(1): rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te// ye shes lnga yi dbang bskur phyir// dbu rgyan cod pan ldan par brjod// gnas gsum yi ge'i rang bzhin nyid// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pa// thim pas gzi byin bskyed
17b2(1): pa ste// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin no// dngas ma 'dus pa'i thig le la// ye shes lhun rdzogs lnga yi ros// ma lus kun la rgyas btab pas// ye shes lnga yi tshul du gnas// nyi zla 'dus pa'i thig le
17b3(1): nyid// rngams dang thabs kyi rang bzhin las// gsang ba'i ye shes lnga yi ros// khyab pas gnyis su med par gsal// 'khor lo gsum gyi thig le nyid// yi ge gsum du rang gnas pas// thabs kyi sbyor bas
17b4(1): gnyis su med// sku gsung thugs kyi sbyor ba'o// g.yas g.yon thig le dbus gnas pas// yab yum bde ba'i thabs dang bcas// rang lus bde chen gsal 'bar gnas// sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgyar
17b5(1): snang // gzhan yang gsung gi phyag rgya mchog/ ji ltar 'dul ba de nyid du// rtogs 'dul gnyen po thabs su snang // de nyid mtshan mar bsam mi khyab// sangs rgyas ma lus phyogs bcu rnams// thugs rje ye
17b6(1): shes sna tshogs kyis// gsung gis de ltar bstan pa'i phyir// gsung gi phyag rgya'i ngo bor shar// brjod dang brjod bya dbyer med pa'i// rang byung gsung gi dkyil 'khor nyid// ma lus 'dus pa'i gsung mchog
18a1(1): nyid// ji ltar 'tshams pa'i tshul du snang // sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung nyid ni// ma lus kun dang dbyer med pas// rtogs dang bsgom dang brjod pa yi// byin rlabs skyob pas sngags su
18a2(1): brjod// rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba las// thog mtha' med pa'i byang chub sems// gsung mchog phyag rgya mtha' yas pa// ma lus 'dus pa'i ngo bo nyid// ji snyed phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du// chos kyi phung po
18a3(1): dpag med pa// 'dul ba'i thabs su gsungs pa yang // sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i gsung du 'dus// zab mo rten cing 'brel 'byung ba'i// rin chen rgya mtsho'i rgyud chen 'di// sku gsung thugs dang bya ba dang // spyod dang
18a4(1): rnal 'byor rgyud chen rnams// ma lus 'dus pa'i snying por gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi byin brlabs pa'i// rang byung gsung nyid rang snang bas// bstan pa rgya mtsho'i rang bzhin te// thugs rjes gdul bya'i don
18a5(1): du snang // zhes nyid la nyid brjod do// sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho'i rgyud las// gsung gi dkyil 'khor mngon du phyung ba'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan dgyes chen pos// lus rtog phung por bcas pa
18a6(1): rnams// bde chen lhun grub byin brlab phyir// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bshad par mdzad// thabs dang shes rab rang bzhin ni// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i mtshan nyid do// bde chen thig ler mngon rdzogs pa// phyi nang
18b1(1): snod bcud thams cad ni// bde chen byang chub sems kyi rgya// bde chen thig les rgyas btab pas// 'da' dka' rang bzhin mi shigs pa// shes rab stong nyid nyi ma ste// rin chen gsang dkyil zla thig
18b2(1): le// sems lnga gnyis sbyor byang chub sems// ye shes lnga ru gsal ba nyid// ye shes dkyil 'khor dpag med pa// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor kun gyi rgyu// thig le 'brel cing rtse phrad pa// thabs dang shes rab
18b3(1): gnyis med pa'i// nyi zla bsnol mar drangs pa las// bde chen nyams myong gcig tu gsal// dngas ma thig ler gsang thim pas// bde ba'i thig le 'phro 'du med// rang byung bde chen 'od gsal ba// sangs
18b4(1): rgyas dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// phung sogs rtog pa ma lus kun// bde ba'i ye shes lnga ru gsal// de nyid bcu gsum sangs rgyas la/ sa yin nam// ye shes dbyings yig rang gnas pa'i// khams gsum
18b5(1): 'dus pa'i thabs las skyes// skyes pa nyid na bdag tu gsal// bcwa brgyad khams sogs btags pa kun// dngos med lhan cig ye shes che// skyon rkyen yang / bral sems lngas 'pho 'jigs pas// go phye
18b6(1): nyid na ye shes lnga// gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems// kun spangs bral bas gang med pa// snang med snang ba dam pa'o// rang byung thig le byang chub sems// rten dang brten pa dbyer med pa// gsang
19a1(1): ba'i thig le nyams dang bcas// rnam shes rlung gis mngon bsdus pa'i// khams gsum thabs kyi ye shes che// rtse mo 'bru gsum gnas mthong ba// rdzas lnga'i ye shes so sor gsal// nyi zla'i
19a2(1): khams 'dres grangs mnyam sbyor// 'phel 'grib med pa'i yon tan mdzad// tshogs drug ye shes cha lnga mnyam// thabs las bzlog pas sngon gnas shes// 'gro 'od rdzu 'phrul nges lung gsal// brjod
19a3(1): 'drar zos shing sa gsum mthong // phung khams yul gyi zag pa med// A li ka li bde ba nyid// phan tshun ma 'dres gcig par shes// bcu drug ngo gnyis mtshan dang ldan// phyogs gcig ye shes lnga ldan
19a4(1): pa// brgyad cu bzod pa'i rgyu las 'phags// thig le gnyis med bde chen nyid// rnam pa bde ba rang bzhin gcig/ thabs dang 'brel ba'i rang bzhin la/ 'og gi bde chen bla dgas sogs sh+lo ka bar 'dir
19a5(1): yod pa'ang 'dug/ phyag rgya thugs sogs gdod nas rdzogs// phyogs dus ma lus thams cad ni// bde chen phyag rgyar gsal 'bar bas// sgo gsum bya rtsol ma lus pa// mun pa snang bar gyur pa kun// bde
19a6(1): chen gsal bas rtsol ba med// steng 'og g.yas g.yon gnyis med du// bde chen 'khril ba'i rang bzhin la// bde chen phra rags yongs rdzogs pas// yul dbang rnam shes dus dang bcas// phyag rgya bzhi
19b1(1): sogs rnam pa kun// bde ba chen po'i ngo bor gnas/ rtogs kyang // khams bzhi 'dus pa'i sku gsung thugs// rang byung thugs su rang dag pa'i// gnas drug lam gsum rang gnas pa'i// thabs kyi drag po me
19b2(1): byung bas// bzhu ba'i bde ba'i lte ba yis// ar thim sprul pa'i gsang thig le// ye shes nam mkha' 'byung ba'i rgyu// bde chen rgyu las char rgyun sems// rim par gnas thim khams gsum pa// ye shes lo
19b3(1): 'dab 'bras bu bskrun// 'gro ba chags pa can mthong na// lus dang phung por bcas pa rnams/ ma spangs 'dod yon longs spyod kyis// dga' mgu chags pa'i ror bcas pas// bde chen tshim zhing gang bar
19b4(1): mdzad// phyi nang snod bcud dran rtog kun// thig le gnyis kyi sbyor thabs las// drug dug kyang 'gyur chags pa rang sel ltar// thabs chen gsang bas grol bar mdzad// phyogs bcu kun 'dus byang chub
19b5(1): sems// gnyis med rol pa'i byin rlabs kyis// rdo rje gsum gyis lam mtshon te// ma skyes don gyi snying por thim// sprul pa'i thig ler rang shar bas// bde ba chen po'i ngo bor smin// kha dog cha byad rang
19b6(1): nyams dag/ bde ba chen por kun 'gyur bas// de nas snang mdzad rdo rjer bcas// yon tan gsung mchog las su bcas// spyan dang nam mkha' lha mo lnga// dbang po yul sems dus bcas pa// rang rang bde
20a1(1): ba'i thig les rgyas// bde ba'i cho 'phrul phyogs bcur snang // la la blta zhing chags pa dang // la lar 'khyud cing rmongs mdzad de// bsdams pas bzhad dang zhal sprod dang // dgod dang sgeg
20a2(1): dang 'dzin pa dang // bskyod dang phyogs bcur bgrod pa yis// ma chags pa ni de bzhin te// chags pa smin cing rgyas par mdzad// rmongs dang brgyal bas kun bsdus te// ma lus bde ba chen por thim// bde
20a3(1): chen gsang ba'i phyag rgya yis// nam mkha'i dbyings ltar rgyas btab pas// thams cad bde ba chen po'i dbyings// rang byung gsang ba thig le'i dbyings// thams cad ma lus byang chub sems// rang snang dkyil
20a4(1): 'khor phyag rgya'i tshogs// gnyis med ye shes sna tshogs mchog/ mi dmigs mi gnas de bzhin nyid// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa// sku gsung thugs kyi de bzhin nyid// dag mnyam bde bas rgyas btab
20a5(1): cing // dus bzhi mnyam pa'i ngo bor gsal// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa// ma lus thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' dang // zhing dang 'khor lo rol mor bcas// ji
20a6(1): snyed dngos dang dngos min pa// thams cad bde ba chen po nyid// lam dang bral ba'i khyad par dang // yon tan lhun rdzogs bsam mi khyab// nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa yi// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil
20b1(1): 'khor snang // thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi// byang chub bde mchog thig le nyid// mi phyed bde chen ro gcig pa// skal ldan dag pas mngon gyur pa// sangs rgyas zhing gi rdul snyed du// che ba'i yon tan kun
20b2(1): spro zhing // mdzad pa sna tshogs rol par ston// mnyam nyid dbyings las g.yos pa med// dbang phyug rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yi// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mtha' klas pa'i// dgyes chen
20b3(1): ro yis khyab byas nas// bde ba chen po'i tshogs su snang // rdo rje slob dpon thabs ldan gyis// pha rol dag par bya ba'i phyir/ skabs gsum dag ni ma gtogs par// byang chub sems ni 'phro ba min// bde/
20b4(1): ba'i thig le yongs rdzogs pas// bcu drug rdzogs pa'i tshul du gnas// zhes nyid la nyid bshad do// sgyu 'phrul dra ba rgya mtsho'i rgyud las// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas
20b5(1): bcom ldan dgyes chen pos// rdo rje gsang ba dam tshig mchog/ nges pa las ni gyur pa yi// dkyil 'khor nyid ni nges par bshad// gang du phyi nang snod bcud dang // dbang po yul sems ma lus pa// bde chen
20b6(1): zhing du kun mnyam phyir// sa gzhi rab tu mnyam par bya// phra ba'i dam tshig la gnas pas// phyi dang nang la goms pas ni// sor bzhi mdzub gang tshad du bya// sbyangs dang dri bskyed yid 'jug pa'i// chags pa'i
21a1(1): dam tshig blang bar bya// bcu gnyis bcu drug la gnas shing // nyi shu'am nyi shu lnga yi tshad// dbang po pad+ma rab rgyas la// rang bzhin rig par thig btab la// rang rang rigs las brtags pa
21a2(1): bzhin// mtshan ma gsal bskyed byin gyis brlab// ye shes mtshon pa'i don phyir 'dod// lus dang b+ha ga'i rang bzhin dang // rang gi rig pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// dbang dang khyad par ji bzhin du// rim pa
21a3(1): bzhin du mkhas pas brtags// lus rtsa yan lag snying du bcas// dkyil 'khor rgyan du ngas bshad de// ma lus gzhan yang snying por bshad// yab yum dngos grub rang bzhin nyid// rdo rje gsum du nges
21a4(1): gsal zhing // sangs rgyas rdul snyed sku gsung thugs// mnyam sbyor ma 'dres mnyam pa nyid// gang gis gang la gsal goms pa// de dag gsal ba'i tshad ldan pa// de yis de la byin brlab phyir// lhag pa'i
21a5(1): ting 'dzin stobs kyis bri// bdag gzhan byin rlabs nus ldan phyir// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rdul snyed pa// zabs dang shes rab ngo bo yis// gang 'dod thim par byin brlabs nas// rgyan phreng mdzes pas
21a6(1): tshul bzhin bya// bdud rtsi longs spyod tshogs ldan pa// bdag nyid mnyes par bya phyir brtsam// longs spyod khams dang gsang bar bcas// me yi cho ga rab ldan pa// thabs kyi cho ga ji bzhin du// las bzhi'i
21b1(1): sbyin sreg brtsam par bya// gal te mtshan ma sbyangs pa na// tshad dpag med pa'i bag chags rnams// las dang sbyor bas byang byas nas// snga phyi rim par bar gcod pa'i// bgegs rnams khro bo'i sbyor bas
21b2(1): spang // mtshan ma bkod pa'i yam shing la// gnyen po'i sbyor bas bsregs sbyangs nas// bshags dang byin brlabs chos ldan pas// dag pa gsum la gnas bcas nas// dam tshig ye shes bskyed bsgyur
21b3(1): bstim// mchod bstod bzlas pas rtags thob cing // ting 'dzin gsal brtan goms pa dang // dbang dang dam tshig ldan gyur nas// lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan gang 'tshams par// bseg spyang cho ga rgyas par
21b4(1): brtsam// ltas brtag las kyi rim par bya// gang du chags pa'i dkyil 'khor dang // chags pa'i glu dang gar dag dang // de bzhin mnyes tshul sna tshogs pa'i// bro gar sprin tshogs rnams kyis mchod// gang du
21b5(1): gnyis med dkyil 'khor ni// nam mkha'i tshad dang mnyam sbyor bas// bde mchog sgyu 'phrul dra ba nyid// sna tshogs 'bar zhing khyab par gsal// gang zag mos pa'i don du ni// dkyil 'khor bzhir ni snang gyur
21b6(1): te// 'jug dang dam tshig ldan pa la// dbang bskur cho gas legs par smin// chags pa'i dam tshig la gnas pa'i// bde ba chen po'i man ngag 'di// dka' thub can dang rgan po dang // ma ning byis pa'i spyod
22a1(1): yul min// gang du chags pas bcings pa rnams// chags pa nyid kyis rnam grol zhing // nyon mongs rtog pa ji snyed pa// thob dang ldan pas ro myang ba'i// 'jig rten chags pa 'jig dus su// de
22a2(1): dag thang gcig rnam par grol// dbang po kun las rab 'das pa'i// bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin du// ma lus gsal bar mnyam sbyor bas// dka' thub tha mal gtsang sme dang // re dogs bag tsha rnam par
22a3(1): spangs// 'jig rten mun pa rnam bsal nas// da lta nyid du rnam grol bas// mun pa la ni mar me bzhin// phyis 'jog 'bad rtsol med par mdzad// de nyid rdo rje sems dpa' ste// btsun mo'i tshogs dang rol
22a4(1): mdzad cing // rdo rje pad+ma mnyam sbyor nas// 'o dang 'khyud pas gar mdzad cing // byang chub sems dpa' rdul snyed dang // lha mo rdul snyed bcas pa kun// spyan ni chags pas gzigs mdzad cing // snga phyi dran
22a5(1): rtog kun 'gags nas// bde ba chen por rab tu 'bar// zhing khams snod bcud bcas pa dag/ sgyu ma chu zla brag cha dang // dri za'i grong khyer bzhin du mthong // de phyir rnam dag lha mo yi// pad+mar rdo rje'i thabs
22a6(1): reg pas// bskal par bsags pa'i mun pa dngas// dngos dang dngos med rnam par spangs// 'dod chags dri med chags bral 'joms// bde chen 'dod pa bzhin du 'grub// thabs dang shes rab gnyis
22b1(1): med pa'i// gsang ba thabs kyi bde bskyod pas// bcu gnyis sa la nyi shar tshe// lus kyi chos bzhi 'dus byas pas// thig le kha bsgyur phan tshun du// dgod pa'i stobs kyis spyir gnas tshe// sku gsum mi zad
22b2(1): 'khor lo tshogs// 'bad pa med par shugs kyis 'byung // gnas kyi gzhi lnga 'bras bu yang // tha dad rgyu med dus gcig khyab// thabs kyi dam pa nga yis brjod// rang byung thog mtha' med pa yi// thabs dang
22b3(1): shes rab nyi zlar bcas// re dogs 'jigs pa spangs byas pas// tshe 'dis sangs rgyas lhun gyis 'grub// rdo rje 'dus pa'i snying po dang // ge sar bcud bcas 'brel pa yis// ji snyed kun 'byung dngos 'di
22b4(1): dag/ rang dbang med par rnam par 'jig/ pad+ma kha phye lta bu la// zla ba rgyas pa'i thabs sbyor ba// dzaHhUM baM hoHthabs ldan pas// mdzes dang chags dang bde ba yi// grong khyer gnyis med ngang du 'jig/ nyi ldan
22b5(1): hUM phaT oM dang muM// bskyod 'dres bde ba ngoms pa med// thig le 'pho ba'i rgyun bzhin du// dga' ba'i phreng bas rgyu 'bras 'byung // brjod dang bral ba kun gsal ba// rig pa'i gsung dbyangs gnyis med
22b6(1): rdzogs// nyi zla 'dres pas lhar bskyod pa// sa ya bcu gsum bcu gsum lha// phyogs ris med par kun nas ldang // dgyes pa chen po'i gar yin no// bcud 'dus thig le thabs sbyor bas// 'byung ldog bde
23a1(1): ba dgyes pa che// mAM gyi sgo phye las byung ba// puN+Da rI ka'i me tog dag/ gnas su 'phros pa'i chu skyes dga'// de nyid slar thim zabs las skyes// de tshe ye shes gnyis gsal mi// bde ba chen po
23a2(1): kun tu gsal// mtha' gnyis rab mnyam lhun rdzogs pa'i// ye shes rgyal ba kun gyi thugs// rim nas rim par bcu drug go// dang po bzhi tshogs gnyis sbyor lam// gsum pa bzhi mthong bzhi bsgoms
23a3(1): pa// tha mar thim brjod rim bzlog pa// rim pa bzhin du gsal goms pas// 'gro 'od med pa'i thig le nyid// 'bras bu'i ngo bor lhun gyis rdzogs// rang byung ye shes thig le la// 'bras bu'i ro rnams
23a4(1): rdzogs par ldan// ngo bo thabs kyis mngon gsal na// 'bras bu lhun gyis rdzogs par gnas// zhes nyid la nyid gsungs so// sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ rdo rje bkod pa byin gyis brlabs pa'i le'u ste dgu
23a5(1): pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan dgyes chen po// kun mchog dbang phyug rgyal ba yis// byin brlabs gsang ba rtogs bya'i phyir// rdo rje byin brlab mchog tu mdzad// gsang ba mchog ldan dbang phyug
23a6(1): gis// 'khor lo rim par brtags byas nas// snod dang mos pa ji bzhin du// rab 'bring tha ma'i bsam pa ltar// phyag rgya mdzes pa'i rol pa dang // thig le mchog tu 'dres pa yis// dri med dbang bskur
23b1(1): grol bar mdzad// sems kyi thig le thog mtha' med// rang rig mkhyen pa'i ye shes la// kun mchog thabs kyi dbang bsgyur bas// tshe 'dis nges par grol bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku
23b2(1): gsung thugs// rdo rje dbang phyug snang ba yis// snang dang ldan pa'i gang zag la// byin rlabs dngos po 'jug par 'gyur// de tshe stobs dang nus mthu dang // byin rlabs mngon shes la sogs pa// shes rab ting
23b3(1): 'dzin la sogs pa// 'di tshe rtags ni 'byung bar 'gyur// phyag rgya dbu rgyan cod pan dang // gdugs dang bum pa bza' btung dang // rgyal mtshan go cha snying po dang // phreng ba dag gis dbang bskur te// de nas
23b4(1): glegs bam phreng ba dang // rgya gram 'khor lo rdor dril nyid// nus pa brtan po thob pa'i phyir// ting 'dzin ldan pas sbyin par bya// de nas rgyal ba'i sku thob pas// gsung dang thugs la gnas bya'i phyir// gsang
23b5(1): ba la sogs rim pa bzhin// mos pa ji bzhin bstan par bya// gzugs dang lang tsho ldan pa dang // btsun zhing na tshod dar la bab// dul zhing blo gros mchog dang ldan// yon tan phun sum tshogs pa
23b6(1): dang // zas dang gos sogs rjes bsrungs la// dam tshig sdom phog dbang bskur nas// thabs dang shes rab byin brlabs nas// mchod bstod bzlas pa mthar phyin pa// thig le nus pa brtan phyin nas// tha
24a1(1): mal zhen pa spangs pa dang // gnas ngan len pa dag bya'i phyir// thabs dang shes rab thig le'i bcud// rtse nas rtse ru phyin pa yis// rang rig lus ngag sems su bcas// bde ba chen por 'bar
24a2(1): bar 'gyur// lus ngag sgrib pa dag byas nas// phyis ni bde chen gsal bar bya// nyi ma zla bar ldan pa yis// thig le rgyas shing brtul zhugs ldan// byin rlabs mnyes par gyur nas ni// 'dod chags thig le
24a3(1): rgyas byed pa'i// bstan bcos bye brag brtsam par bya// shes rab thabs kyis g.yas bzung ste// stod smad bkug pas kyo ba blta// dbang po yul bsdus 'khyud pa ni// gsang ba chen po'i zhags pa'o// stod smad
24a4(1): shin tu bsdams byas te// ma skyes mi stong sgrog gi las// bskyod pa ha si bde sgra sgrogs// kun tu drag tu bde myang ho// thabs dang shes rab yi ge bcus// ming dang lhan cig skyes pa brtag/ snang ba gsum las
24a5(1): 'das pa yi// rnam rtog dngas shing bde chen la// slob mas bde chen myong ba'i tshe// phyi nang zhen rtog ma lus pa// gnyis med ngang du gnas gyur nas// lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bor gsal// dbang po yul sems
24a6(1): ldan pa yis// dran rtog skye 'gag rgyu 'bras rnams// sems lngas bde ba smin pa dang // sa bcu'i khyad par rdzogs par bya// rnam rtog bya btsal yul 'das pa'i// bde chen thig le mi rtog pa// sangs rgyas kun
24b1(1): gyi thugs nyid de// gnyis med bde chen ngo bor brtag/ sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen ni// rgyu 'bras 'gro 'ong kun bral ba// thabs dang shes rab mi phyed pa// rdo rje 'chang chen gsang bar dgongs// ma lus
24b2(1): gsang bar ro gcig pas// ye shes sgyu ma bde chen po// gcig dang du ma'i sa las 'das// ye shes rtse mo mchog tu 'dod// rdo rje slob dpon byin rlabs kyis// sgyu 'phrul dra ba la brten nas// dug gis dug
24b3(1): nad sel ba ltar// skal ldan mchog la bstan pa yin// bde chen thig le mi g.yo ba// rgyu 'bras dbyer med byang chub sems// cig car dbang gis mun bsal nas// ma lus bde ba chen por skye// gang tshe zhen
24b4(1): pa kun bral ba'i// rang byung thig le gsal ba'i tshe// skye 'gag gnas dmigs 'gro 'ong chos// zhen rtag bde chen ngo bor bzlog/ rgyun chad pa dang mi 'phel dang // rang rgyud pa dang byin med pa// 'jig rten
24b5(1): log pa mthar gyur pas// 'di dag rnam par spang bar bya// de nas gang du mtshan ldan pa'i// yid 'ong phyag rgya la brten cing // rgyu ba rlung gi drod ldan pas// de ma zag par grol bar 'gyur// gsang ba'i thig
24b6(1): lele rgyun bral ba// 'gro 'od med pa'i thabs nyid kyis// rang byung thig le 'pho 'gyur med// rtogs nas goms par gnas par bya// 'dren pa'i thabs stobs las byung bas// bde ba chen po mi g.yo ba// rnam
25a1(1): shes mtshan ma'i yul las 'das// bde ba chen po thog mtha' med// bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin ni// ma skyes bden gnyis dbyer med pa'i// ngo bor ma lus kun gsal ba// mi 'gyur brtan
25a2(1): par brjod pa yin// skal dman thabs kyi bde spyod na// steng 'og thabs kyis gnas byas la// shes rab 'phrul gyi 'khor lo bskor// rgyas dang 'byongs pa'i rtags byung na// rgyu ba bcad la 'khor lo
25a3(1): spang // bde chen bar chad med 'dod na// thabs kyi rim bzhin bsgom pa dang // shes rab yum gyi de bzhin te// yang na gnyis su med pas bya// rang rang thabs dang ldan par brtsam// bar chad dag ni 'byung
25a4(1): ba na// thabs dang ldan pas bskyed par bya// lus la brten pas sems gang ste// phyi nang bde chen rgyas par bya// de nas nam mkha'i mtha' thug par// khyad par bar chad med par gnas// goms pa'i rim
25a5(1): dang byin rlabs las// mkha' 'gro gsum gyi snang thob nas// zhing khams phyogs bcu rdul snyed bcas// bde chen zag pa med par gnas// dang po byin rlabs smad thob nas// rdo rje 'dzin pa mtha' thug
25a6(1): pa// tshes nas bcu drug mthar phyin ltar// man ngag stobs kyis shes par bya// lung dang rigs pa la sogs pa'i// yid dpyod tshad ma ring spangs nas// nyams myong tshad ma la brten pas// rim spangs tshe 'di
25b1(1): nyid kyis 'grub// las dang skal ba dman pa dang // bla ma thabs la rgyab kyis phyogs// log pa'i skye bo'i dbang song ba'i// gang zag 'di dag rnam par spangs// thabs dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// mi spyad
25b2(1): pa ni gang yang med// mi bya ba yang yod min te// bza' dang mi bza' cung zad med// 'di la sdom dang mi sdom med// thams cad mnyam pa nyid sbyor bas// bya dang mi bya kun las 'das// snang srid 'dod yon
25b3(1): lngar gnas te// bde chen rigs ma kun nas dag/ ma lus yid 'phrog tshims byed pas// sgo gsum phyogs su gtad du med// bya med bya las 'das pa yi// rjes su mi dmigs de bzhin nyid// ma bcos rang
25b4(1): rig yul dang bral// gang du blo gtad gang 'dzin med// ma bcos thabs kyis bder bzhag pas// rang byung ye shes mtha' dbus med// gcig dang du ma kun bral bas// thams cad ma lus chos kyi
25b5(1): sku// bden gnyis tha snyad las 'das pa'i// ma skyes rang rig byang chub sems// yi ge tshig dang ming spangs pa'i// brjod bya ma lus rdzogs par snang // zhes nyid la nyid bshad do// sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho'i rgyud
25b6(1): las/ snod byin gyis brlabs pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid// gcig dang du ma kun bral ba'i// dgyes pa chen po'i bdag nyid kyi// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor bstan par
26a1(1): mdzad// phyogs bcu dus bzhis bsdus pa yi// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus pa// tshogs gnyis las byung bsam mi khyab// rang byung 'khor lo mngon rdzogs pa// dngos po'i 'jig rten mtha'
26a2(1): yas pa// sku gsung rdo rje gyur pa ni// dngos por snang ba thams cad nyid// rang byung sgyu 'phrul rgya mtshor bstan// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// phyi nang gsang bar 'jug pa yi// rtog pa bzhi la rtogs
26a3(1): goms nas// ma lus lhun rdzogs dbyer med snang // don dam kun rdzob dbyer med pa'i// chos nyid dbyings su tshul gcig pas// ma lus rang snang chos thams cad// ma lus byang chub sems su rtogs// sku
26a4(1): gsung thugs nyid rang snang ba'i// ma lus gsung gi rgyan du rtogs// thams cad gsung gi yi ge ste// thabs dang ldan pas rgyas btab bo// de nyid dbyer med byin rlabs las// de nyid de yi byin rlabs
26a5(1): te// gnyis med tshul gyis rang snang bas// byin rlabs ngo mtshar bsam mi khyab// rang byung rang snang chos 'di dag/ gnyis med rang rig ma skyes par// gsal bar mngon sum the tshom med// rtog pa kun gyi
26a6(1): mchog tu bshad// dngas ma las byung thig le yis// zin dang ma zin khyad par las// 'das dang ma 'das rang snang bas// bde chen nang du ro gcig pa'o// rang byung 'khor lo'i rim pa las// gsung gi
26b1(1): dkyil 'khor rang snang ba// skye dang ma skyes dbyer med pas// yig 'bru'i tshul dang nges par brjod// gang du thabs kyis byin gyis brlabs// gnas dang rtogs pa'i ngo bo yis// rim pa'i tshul gyis byin
26b2(1): brlabs pa'i// 'di dag byin gyis brlabs nyid de// gsang ba de nyid nges pa yi// rig pa'i phyag rgya mngon gsal bas// sgro dang skur pa zhi ba yi// de kho na nyid mngon du snang // thabs dang shes rab dbyer med
26b3(1): pa'i// bde ba chen po'i ro nyid ni// ma lus 'dus pa'i rang bzhin te// gnyis med gnyis las gang gyur pa// de nyid thig le'i bdag nyid do// sgra dbyangs gsung gi bstan pa rnams// gnas bzhi thig le'i
26b4(1): byang chub sems// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas// mi zad 'khor lo gsum du snang // gnas dang thabs dang sbyar ba yang // gsang ba'i byin rlabs rang snang ba// thams cad bde ba chen po ste// de yi
26b5(1): byin rlabs nyid snang ngo // sgro skur med pa'i bstan pa nyid// bde chen rlung gi sbyor thabs kyis// snang srid phyi nang chos rnams kun// bde chen sgyu mar mngon sum snang // thabs dang shes rab gnyis med
26b6(1): pa'i// yul dang dbang po rnam shes dang // dus dang mtshan mar bcas pa yi// 'dul thabs nyid kyi rang bzhin gyis// thams cad rang gi thabs bzhin du// bde ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor snang // de nyid sgrub
27a1(1): pa'i yo byad lnga// ma nyams gsal bar rab spyad na// bdag gzhan ji snyed snang ba rnams// ma lus dag pa'i ngo bor 'gyur// de tshe las kyi gzungs ma bzhi// rig pa'i rtsal las grub pa
27a2(1): ste// gnas skabs rim par sbyor ba yi// lhun grub nyid la the tshom med// bsnyen dang nye bsnyen sgrub pa dang // sgrub pa chen po'i rim pa yi// sbyor ba bzhi ni brtsam par bya// bde chen thugs kyi dkyil 'khor
27a3(1): gyis// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa// dgyes mnyam thim pa'i ro ldan pa// thabs dang ldan pas blangs spyad pas// gang 'dod 'bras bu phun sum tshogs// bdag gzhan phyi nang las byung ba'i// ma lus
27a4(1): bsgral bya thams cad ni// so so bya ba kun snang yang // kun gyi rang bzhin de bzhin nyid// bdag nyid gsal bar mngon bsgoms te// ting 'dzin thabs kyis mngon bsgral te// 'jigs pa chen po'i sa thob
27a5(1): // brtul zhugs mnyam pa'i thabs kyis ni// bde chen ma skyes sras su brlab// kun bzang thugs dang gnyis su med// phyi nang gsang ba'i rang bzhin gyis// snod bcud rgyud rnams dag pa ni// bde ba chen
27a6(1): po'i zhing khams nyid// ma lus dag pa nyid du gsal// sku gsung thugs la rab gnas shing // cho ga rdzogs par shes pa yi// gnas dang longs spyod ci 'tshams par// bde ba chen po phongs med
27b1(1): par// longs spyod ldan zhing dka' thub spangs// gnas dang longs spyod rgyan rnams dang // 'byor pa ci bder brten pa ni// gang yang 'grub ste gzhan du min// longs spyod dga' bas mi gdung zhing // yab
27b2(1): yum 'dod pa lngar ldan pas// brtson pa'i tshul bzhin rab bsgrubs na// rdo rje'i lus dang rnam smin du// tha mal 'di yis 'grub par 'gyur// sa nas sar ni mngon 'phel ba// bla ma thabs dang gzungs stobs
27b3(1): kyis// gong bzhin las skal dag pa ni// myur du bar chad med par 'grub// las dang dngos grub phra mo dag/ chu rlabs lta bur rang snang ba// byin rlabs sngags dang ting 'dzin gyis// ji ltar 'dod par 'byung
27b4(1): 'gyur te// nga rgyal zhen pa'i tshul dang bral// las dang dngos grub thams cad la// zhen chags sbyor ba kun spangs la// bdag nyid chen po'i sbyor tshul gyis// 'di ni ci bder 'grub par bya// thabs dang shes
27b5(1): rab ldan pa yis// ma chags thabs kyi sbyor ba ni// yengs pa med par rab bsgrubs na// myur du 'grub ste gzhan du med// rnal 'byor bsgrub pa thams cad la// gnyis med sbyor ba khyad par che// gang du 'di
27b6(1): yi thabs ldan pas// ji ltar spyad kyang 'grub par 'gyur// ma chags pa la chags spyad pas// chags pa nyid kyang 'grub 'gyur te// spyod lam kun tu gnas pa yi// 'di yis 'grub ste gzhan du min// bde chen
28a1(1): phyag rgya'i rnal 'byor dang // lhun grub la gnas cho ga bzhin// dus dang rang rang skal ba bzhin// le lo the tshom med brtson pas// rab 'bring tha ma ji bzhin 'thob// 'thob bya kun gyi ngo bo
28a2(1): ni// rang byung gsal ba'i snying po ste// gzung 'dzin tha dad kun gyis stongs// byang chub nam mkha'i rang bzhin no// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// dkyil 'khor sna tshogs 'bar ba nyid// bde chen sku
28a3(1): gsung thugs nyid de// rang byung nyid las gzhan ma yin// thog med dus nas rab sbyangs pa'i// skal ldan dam las ma nyams pas// rang rang cho ga bzhin bsgrubs na// sangs rgyas tshe 'dis 'grub 'gyur/
28a4(1): na// rig 'dzin sa la smos ci dgos// rang rang goms pa'i thabs nyid de// mos dang 'tshams pa'i khyad par blta// gzhan du cho ga nyams par 'gyur// dpal ldan rang gi dam tshig 'dis// bskal pa bye bar
28a5(1): mi 'grub pa// nyi shu lnga ldan lhun grub sa// skye ba 'di la the tshom med// bya ba byed la ma chags shing // gnyis med sgyu mar gsal goms na// dka' thub gdung ba kun spangs pas// 'di nyid la ni dga' bar
28a6(1): 'grub// ces nyid la nyid bshad do// sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho'i rgyud las// tshogs kyi 'khor lo gsang ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// sgyu 'phrul dra ba dgyes chen
28b1(1): pos// bskal pa brgya stong dpag med du// rnyed par dka' ba'i 'bras bu ste// sgyu 'phrul lam la brten pa yis// tshe 'dis 'bras bu thob phyir bshad// gsang sngags lam la gnas byas shing // thabs dang
28b2(1): shes rab dbyer med pas// mtshan ma'i bya ba spangs pa yis// 'di'am bar mar chos sku thob// gang du bden gnyis dbyer med pa'i// don la gnas pa'i rnal 'byor pas// byed pa sdom pa'i man ngag
28b3(1): gis// phyi nang dngas snyigs 'byed pa'i rlung // snying po a la phog pa yis// bde chen stong pa'i thig ler mnyam// snyigs ma'i bag chags sangs gyur nas// bde chen nam mkha'i mtha' ltar rgyas// thabs dang
28b4(1): shes rab nyi zla'i bcud// bsnyen bsgrub bzhi la goms pa yis// rang nyams rtags dang rtsa rlung gi/ dug gis dug nad sel ba ltar// lhan cig skyes pa mngon du 'char// de nyid bde la mi rtog pa'i// bar chad
28b5(1): spangs pas 'grub pa yis// mun pa snang bas gsal ba ltar// ma lus bde ba chen por snang // bdag gzhan bral ba'i bde chen gyis// nam mkha' 'od kyis gang ba ltar// dug gsum ma spangs nan tan
28b6(1): bya// gsal bar mngon du nan tan bya// mngon du gsal nas ma bsgoms par// dbye ba med par gsal bar bya// bde chen nam mkha'i mtha' mnyam pa// bskal pa rdul snyed 'phel 'grib dang // 'gro 'ong
29a1(1): med pa'i ngo bo ni// bde ba chen po'i rdo rje 'chang // thog ma mtha' ma med pa ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin nyid// dang por rang bzhin skye med pa'i// mi dmigs pa las 'das pa yi// de
29a2(1): bzhin nyid de ma bcos pa'i// rang bzhin nges par rtogs par bya// chos rnams rang bzhin dngos med pa'i// bdag gzhan dngos 'dzin zhen bral ba'i// de bzhin nyid ni ma bcos pa'i// rang bzhin rang gi/
29a3(1): rnam par bsgom// dngos dang dngos med zhen bral ba'i// rang bzhin ye shes kun snang 'od// nam mkha' lta bur phyogs med pa'i// sgyu ma lta bur bsam par bya// rig pa sgyu ma'i rang bzhin las// thabs dang
29a4(1): shes rab nyi zla'i gdan// hUM bcas rdo rje 'od du 'bar// phra mo rdo rje sems dpa' 'am// gang yang rung ba'i yab yum bsgom// gang rung phra mo'i rang bzhin las// tshad dang ldan pa'i phyag rgya ste// skyon dang bral
29a5(1): bas rtag bsgoms shing // de dag gsal zhing brtan par bya// gnas lnga dang ni gnas gsum dang // gnas gcig phyag rgyar gsal bar bsgom// de nas sangs rgyas rgya gcig las// thabs dang shes rab phye ba
29a6(1): yis// brgyad cu gsal bar bsgom par bya// de nas ye shes lnga sogs pas// sku gsung thugs la nan tan bya// ye shes sems dpa' goms gyur nas// rigs bzhi'i sems dpa' yab yum dang // kun
29b1(1): bzang yab yum sgo bar bcas// sbrul sku la sogs de bzhin gshegs// de nas rgyang grags dpag tshad dam// nam mkha'i dbyings ni bsam yas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sna tshogs par// 'jigs dang
29b2(1): bcas pa'i tshul bzhin bsgom// gang du gang ltar mdzes pa yi// spyod pa rim bzhin brtsam bya ste// dang po bya ba bral ba ste// de nas thugs rje chen po nyid// gsum pa rtse gcig ldan pa ste// tha ma tshogs kyi spyod
29b3(1): pa ni// rim pa bzhin du legs par spyad// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis// yid 'ong rab dben sa phyogs su// bdag dbang bar chad med pa'i gnas// dge zhing bkra shis phun sum tshogs// bza' btung
29b4(1): ro mchog ldan pa dang // glu gar rol mo tshig stabs bro// rgyan dang bgo ba phun sum tshogs// thabs dang shes rab nyi zlar ldan// glu tshig sgra dang ldan pa yis// tshe la dbang bsgyur gnas thob nas// goms nas
29b5(1): phyag rgya'i rigs su nges// lhun gyis grub pa'i sa las ni// bcu drug rgyun gyi sangs rgyas sa// dri can dman pa'i gang zag la// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i dbang bskur bas// zhing dang longs spyod ting 'dzin
29b6(1): stobs// nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa yis// 'bras bu lhun grub ngo bor 'gyur// gzhan du bsod nams chung ba yis// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// gcig tu sbyor ba'i ngo bo nyid// yab yum sbyor
30a1(1): ba gcig tu bsgom// phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i ngo bo nyid// ngo bo gcig dang tshul gcig dang // sku gsung thugs ni gcig bstan nas// byin rlabs dngos grub stsol bar mdzad// dpag tu med pa'i
30a2(1): rgyal ba rnams// sku gsung thugs su snang ba yi// mi zad 'khor lo rang snang don// ngo bo gcig tu 'dus par 'gyur// de dag nyid kyis thob 'gyur bas// khyad par gzhan nas yod ma yin// sangs rgyas zhing
30a3(1): khams dpag med pa'i// rang byung byang chub snying po ste// 'khor lo yi ge kun 'dus pa// thob pas sna tshogs 'phro bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi sku gsung thugs// til 'bru rdul phran grangs mnyam
30a4(1): par// rang byung ye shes nyid kyi gzugs// de ma zag par thob par 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i// ye shes rgya mtsho zag pa med// che ba kun rdzogs gsang ba'i don// bla med thabs chen 'bras
30a5(1): bur gnas// zhes nyid la nyid bshad do// sgyu 'phru rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ gsang ba'i theg pa'i lam bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid// gsang ba'i longs spyod
30a6(1): byang chub sems// dgyes pa chen pos tshim mdzad nas// gsang ba'i don 'di bstan par mdzad// gang du gsang ba'i rang bzhin ni// phyogs cha mtshan ma las 'das pa'i// rang rig brjod pa'i yul 'das
30b1(1): pa// dngos med dngos po kun gyi gnas// 'di nyid kun gyi yul yin pas// rang bzhin brtags dang bsgribs pa yis// la las dmus long ji bzhin du// bye brag yul du ma gyur te// tha mal zhen pa'i rang rgyud
30b2(1): pa// 'di ni 'jig rten phal pa nyid// rang bzhin ngo bo la sogs pa// byed pa med cing gnyen po med// gdod nas rang shugs kyis 'grub pa// zer zug rtag pa rang rgyud pa// gang yang med par glo bur
30b3(1): du// snang ba 'jig rten 'di dag ni// sngon med phyis med gdod nas snang // phyis snang bar yang ji ltar rung // la lar tha dad rtog pa ste// chos kyi bdag la dngos por 'dzin// la la bden gnyis rkyen byas
30b4(1): nas// rten 'brel 'khor lo 'gog par byed// la lar tha dad mi gnas te// rig pa'i rgyun ldan mi rtog 'dod// gzhan dag rig pa rnam med de// nam mkha'i dkyil ltar dmigs pa med// la lar sgyu ma'i don
30b5(1): la gnas// la lar cha shas med pa yi// mtha' yi spros pa rnam par bcad// gang la gnyen po kun dang bral// gnyen po'i don ni mtha' la gnas// la las las dang bya ba dang // dka' thub sdom pa'i tshul la
30b6(1): gnas// la las lta skrod tha dad pas// bsgom dang sprad pas 'bras bu 'dod// la las byin rlabs rnal 'byor gyis// bsgoms pas 'bras bu thob par 'dod// rang bzhin gsang ba'i mtshan ma nyid//
31a1(1): rje theg pa'i snying po ni// yi ge sgra tshig las 'das pa// gsang sngags kun gyi ngo bor 'dod// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bka' rgyud theg pa'i snying po ste// gab sbas gsang ba'i rang
31a2(1): bzhin pas// rtog ge pa yi yul ma yin// sangs rgyas sras dang bcas pa yi// thabs dang cho gas byin brlabs pa'i// slob dpon thabs kyis shes gyur te// dman pas rtogs goms yul ma yin// thog ma
31a3(1): mtha' ma med pa yi// gdod nas dbyer med gsum ldan pa'i// gang du rtogs goms gsal ba yis// sgo gsum rang lhar gsal ba la// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis dag tu bsgoms// sku gsum rdo rje gsum las
31a4(1): byung // ye shes lnga yis rgyas btab la// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis// gzhan yang de bzhin shes par bya// phung po 'byung ba rnam shes dang // yul dang dbang po dus su bcas// 'khor lo gsal
