31a5(1): bar brtags byas te// ma lus sku gsung thugs kyi ngang // zag med ye shes thig le la// ye shes 'bras bu lhan gyis rdzogs// bdag nyid rig pa rang snang ba'i// snying po rdzogs pa'i thig le la// ma lus chos
31a6(1): kun rang snang bas// ye shes sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor nyid// nam mkha'i mtha' ltar khyab par snang // gsang ba'i thig le chos kyi dbyings// dus gsum rgyal ba kun gyi dngos// phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor rgya bral
31b1(1): ba'i// sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs// rang byung snying po gsal mthong bas// 'bras bu ye shes lhun rdzogs pas// thob bya gzhan na yod ma yin// rang byung snying po'i dngas ma la// byin rlabs rtogs pa'i
31b2(1): dkyil 'khor gyis// gsal ba la ni goms byas pas// thig le dngas ma ma lus byung // ye shes lnga rdzogs dkyil 'khor nyid// zag med bde ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi// nam mkha' lta bur khyab par
31b3(1): gnas// rang byung thig le mi shigs pa// 'byung bzhi thams cad kun gyi rgyu// 'byung ba'i dngas ma kun gyi yum// chen po rgyal ba'i rang bzhin nyid// byang chub sems dang dbang po dang // yul dus yan lag
31b4(1): bcas pa nyid// rang byung rten gyi thig le yis// nam mkha'i gzugs can skye ba med// tha mal 'byung ba la brten nas// lhag pa'i ro la thugs kyis blta// snying po thig ler mnyam sbyor bas// bde ba'i dkyil
31b5(1): 'khor bsam mi khyab// rang byung thig le 'pho 'gyur med// gzhi la rang bzhin thim pa yi// zag med bde ba'i dkyil 'khor tshogs// sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor bde ba'i mchog/ gsang ba thig le kun gyi
31b6(1): dbyings// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor lhun rdzogs pa// che ba'i yon tan bsam yas pa// kun gyi ngo bor rang shar ba// ma lus zhal mthong dbang bsgyur bas// 'bras bu grangs 'das lhun gyis rdzogs// rgyan
32a1(1): dang che ba'i yon tan nyid// rang byung don goms mthar phyin pas// thugs rje rang snang dkyil 'khor nyid// phyogs med zhing khams mtha' yas par// rdzogs pa'i zhing khams sna
32a2(1): tshogs spyod// thabs dang shes rab lhun rdzogs pa'i// dbyer med gnas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi// thig le bcud 'dus rten nyid la// bcu drug lnga 'dus rnam par bsgom// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med
32a3(1): pa'i// thabs kyi cho ga las byung ba// gcig la'ang ye shes lnga rdzogs pa// zag med khyab pas mtha' dbus med// gsang ba'i thig le lhan cig skyes// bde ba'i longs spyod kun gyi dbyings// 'jug sgo bzhi yi
32a4(1): phyag rgya las// 'byung bzhi rigs kyi yum du snang // phung po bde bar rgyas btab pas// dbang po yul sems rang bzhin thabs// kun bzang rig pa'i dkyil 'khor la// lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin
32a5(1): gyis// rten dang brten par mnyam sbyor bas// ye shes lnga ni rang gsal bas// bde ba'i ye shes dgyes pa che// ma bsgoms bde ba'i longs spyod kyis// bde chen sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid gsal// bde ba'i rol mo
32a6(1): bsam yas pa// gsang ba'i thig le ma skyes pa// kun gyi rang bzhin gnyis su med// phyogs bcu dus bzhi mtha' yas pa// rgyal ba'i che ba ma lus pa// lhan cig skyes par zhal mthong zhing // thig ler rlung
32b1(1): sogs dbang bsgyur bas// ma lus ye shes bde mchog yin// rang byung ye shes dkyil 'khor la// zag med dkyil 'khor rang gnas nyid// mthong goms rdzogs pas lhun gyis grub// ma spangs rang la lhun
32b2(1): grub pas// ma lus dkyil 'khor rgyan du gnas// 'byung 'jug med pa'i dkyil 'khor la// che ba'i yon tan lhun rdzogs pas// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mtha' thug par// thugs rje'i dkyil 'khor phyogs med
32b3(1): snang // bya byed med pa'i tshul gcig pa// rang byung snying po dkyil 'khor mchog/ thun mong thun mong ma yin pa// shes rab yum la mnyam sbyar nas// rang byung 'bras bu lhun gyis grub// bskal pa rdul snyed
32b4(1): grangs 'das nas// mos dang sbyangs pa'i rang bzhin gyi// gsang ba'i don la gang zhugs pa// tshe 'dis rgyal ba nyid du 'gyur// 'das dang da ltar ma 'ongs pa'i// rgyal ba'i sku gsung thugs kyi bcud// 'dus
32b5(1): pa'i gsang chen 'di yin te// lam gyi dam pa nye lam yin// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs dag na// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rdul phran snyed// bstan pa phyi nang gsang ba kun// sgyu 'phrul dra ba las 'phros te// lam
32b6(1): gyi dam pa nye lam yin// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med dang // bya ba spyod dang rnal 'byor dang // rnal 'byor chen po bla med pa// ma lus 'dus shing 'byung ba'i phyir// dngos grub brlabs chen kun 'byung
33a1(1): ba'i// sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho'i rgyud chen 'di// mos dang mthong dang bris pa dang // bklags pa tsam gyis 'grub 'gyur na// rtogs dang goms pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'bras bu thob par smos ci
33a2(1): dgos// rang byung dkyil 'khor kun 'dus pa'i// rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste// rgyud kun gyi ni bdag po mchog/ snying po las ni snying po mchog/ ces nyid la nyid bshad do// sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho'i rgyud las//
33a3(1): gsang ba'i don bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan dgyes pa chen po// rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa des// gdul bya'i bsam pa sna tshogs phyir// 'bras bu'i cho 'phrul snang bar
33a4(1): mdzad// ji snyed rang byung dkyil 'khor rnams// bya byed med pa rang snang bas// thig le chen por lhun rdzogs pa'i// bdag gzhan dbyer med de bzhin nyid// phyogs bcu rgya yang ma chad pa'i// bde chen
33a5(1): longs spyod dpag tu med// zhing khams 'khor dang che ba nyid// rang snang 'khor lo rang snang nyid// ma lus rang snang sku yi tshogs// bsam yas rdul dang til gang bzhin// gang mos blo la snang byed pa// gdul
33a6(1): bya mos pa'i don du zad// gang du ma bcos de bzhin nyid// rang gi ngo bo gsal 'gyur pa// kun gyi rang bzhin rkyen bral ba// snga phyi med par kun mkhyen mchog/ dus gsum phyogs bcu mtha' yas
33b1(1): kun// dbyer med rdo rje nyid snang bas// phyogs med byin rlabs gnyen po bral// dus gsum 'du 'bral med par bzhugs// mi phyed rdo rje'i rang bzhin la// brjod bya'i rang bzhin lhun rdzogs pas// dbyer
33b2(1): med ngo bo kun snang bas// mi phyed gsung ni kun gyi mchog/ tshig dang yi ge kun bral bas// ma brjod dgongs pa brdas bstan pas// mnyam pa chen po'i tshul du ston// rang byung ye shes byin rlabs ni// gcig
33b3(1): dang du ma las 'das pa'i// nam mkha'i dbyings ltar gnas pa yi// dgongs pa chen por brdal ba nyid// rang rig skye ba med pa las// ji snyed chos sku rang snang ba// mtha' dbus spros pa bcad pa yi// de
33b4(1): bzhin nyid kyis gsungs pa med// thugs rje byin brlabs rang snang ba// sgra dang dbyibs la sogs pa rnams// mtshon pa thabs ni dpag med du// thugs rje byin rlabs snang bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi
33b5(1): yon tan mchog/ sku dang gsung thugs yon tan las// rgyal ba rigs lnga snang mdzad de// re re zhing khams gdan sogs snang // rang byung dmigs med byang chub sems// sangs rgyas kun gyi thugs chen
33b6(1): po// rnam dag dri med 'od gsal bas// mkhyen pa'i ye shes bzhir gsal nas// thams cad gdod nas dbyer med pas// gang dag de ltar mkhyen pa yis// bdag gzhan bya byed med pa yis// phrin las lngar
34a1(1): ni snang bar 'gyur// steng 'og brten pa las byung ba'i// ye shes brten pa de bzhin nyid// sku dang gsung dang thugs 'khor lo// yon tan kun gyi las dang sbyar// dbyibs dang yi ge rang bzhin
34a2(1): las// nam mkha' lta bu'i lnga rdzogs pa// zag med yon tan lhun rdzogs pa// byas pa med par rnam bzhi rdzogs// rang byung 'bras bu rten bral ba'i// ngo bo dbyer med de bzhin nyid// bzhon pa rlung gi stobs
34a3(1): bral bas// thig le 'gro 'ong 'du 'phro med// dbang bsgyur phung po 'jig med pas// 'byung bzhi 'du ba'i tshogs dang bral// rig pa rlung la dbang bskur bas// sdug bsngal chu bo'i 'jigs dang bral// ye
34a4(1): shes ting 'dzin las las 'grub// shes rab stobs sogs mnyam sbyor bas// 'phel 'grib thig le 'byung 'jug med// tshe dang lus dang bde ba dang // ye shes zag med zungs ldan pas// ma lus zhing sogs
34a5(1): dag pa ste// bdud bzhi skye sogs par chad med// 'byung bzhi dngas ma la brten pas// rig pa'i bde chen bar chad med// rnam rtog 'gyu ba'i rlung dngas pas// bde chen nam mkha'i mtha' ltar gnas// tha
34a6(1): ma'i dbang la rang snang bas// zhing khams rgya mtsho rdul snyed kyi// thabs dang shes rab mnyam par gnas// dri can nyid la dbang bskur bas// shes bya'i dkyil 'khor kun sad de// rmongs pa sangs ltar mngon
34b1(1): sangs rgyas// de nas nam mkha'i mtha' thug par// bde ba chen po'i sku nyid dang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor mdzad cing // bde chen mi rtog gsal ba'i thugs// zhing khams phyogs bcu'i rdul snyed du// yon
34b2(1): tan bsam yas mngon bstan nas// gdul bya'i don ni ji snyed pa// ma lus mdzad pas tshims par mdzad// lam dang mdzad pa zhing khams dag/ sa dang khams dang mthun par snang // snod bcud rgyud zhen dri ma
34b3(1): gsum// nyi zla sems mthun mtha' yang 'gro 'ong gis// gnas su 'dren pa'i lam nyid kyis// dag pa yab yum ye shes gsal// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// 'khor 'das dbyer med rang bzhin
34b4(1): la// 'bru gsum mtshams nas rang zlog pas// thabs la brten pa'i gar bskyod pas// ma skyes lhan cig skyes par gsal// rten can rlung dang thig le la// rang byung goms pa'i blo yis blta// rkyen dang bral
34b5(1): bas mngon gyur na// sems kyi thig le 'chor ba med// rang byung bde ba mngon sum ste// goms dang thugs rje rang snang ba'i// 'dod yon longs spyod sna tshogs la// lha mo rol rtsed stong gi bdag/ grangs med
34b6(1): 'khor lo'i tshul bskor bas// ma g.yos bde ba kun khyab can// phung sogs rtogs pa thams cad kun// bde chen ye shes lnga ru gsal// de nyid bcu gsum sangs rgyas sa// ye shes dbyings nyid rang gnas
35a1(1): pa'i// khams gnyis 'dus pa'i thabs las skyes// skyes pa nyid na bdag tu gsal// thabs la mkhas pa'i khyad par gyis// gang la 'dul ba'i tshul snang ba// yang dag log pa yod med
35a2(1): kyi// shes rab spyan gnyis yul gcig kyang / thabs lus kyang // sA lu phug bgrod snang med bzhin// ldog med stobs su rdzogs pa nyid// dang po 'jug pa'i rim pa nas// mtha' ma mthar phyin rdzogs par
35a3(1): du// phyi nang gsang sogs ji bzhin par// skye 'gag gnas dmigs 'gro 'ong gis// g.yo sems skyes la mos spyad kyang // zab mo bsgrags pas bskyed rim brtan// smon lam 'dod yon 'jug pa
35a4(1): yang // gnyis med don la sdang ba med// gnas pa dang ni mnyam gsum gyis// yid ches shes rab 'phel bar byed// rgyun du gnas pa'i spros bcas tshe// mthar lam nyid la sbyor ba'o// bsgrub pa'i rgyu yis mi
35a5(1): ldog pa// de goms phyi ma'i rig rigs kyang / las bstan// lhun grub phyi tshe yongs su rdzogs// thabs dang shes rab mnyam sbyor bas// bde ba thig le rdzogs skyes pa// rang bzhin med pa'i sgyu mar 'gag/
35a6(1): nyid ma skyes dbyer med gnas// gnyis med rtogs pa gang dmigs pas// 'gro 'ong med pa'i 'bras bu 'char// bslad pa'i tshig bral sgro skur med// rgyu rkyen 'bras bu bdag po dang // gnyis med don las mi
35b1(1): g.yo zhing // 'brel tshang 'khrug bsnol bka' brgyud yin// zhes nyid la nyid bshad do// sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ dngos po lnga gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan
35b2(1): dgyes chen po// 'dul ba'i bsam pa la dgongs nas// dkyil 'khor rdul snyed bcas pa dag/ khro bo dpag tu med par gyur// gang phyir gdul bya dpag med dag/ khro bos 'dul ba'i don phyir ro// kha cig
35b3(1): sdang sems ldan pa la// sku gsung thugs su ldan pa yi// thabs mkhas skyon dang bral ba yi// zhe sdang khros pas 'dul bar mdzad// kha cig chags shing zhen pa ste// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med
35b4(1): pa'i// 'dod chags rmongs par thim mdzad nas// chags pa khros pas 'dul bar mdzad// la lar blta dang cho dang las// ting 'dzin zhing khams cho 'phrul gyis// 'pham zhing nga rgyal zil mnan pa// log pa'i
35b5(1): ri bo brtas mthong nas// log pa'i ri bo tshar gcod cing // thog ma mtha' ma'i dus med pa// rang byung sgyu 'phrul 'gag pa med// thabs mkhas phan pa'i gnod byin gyis// 'jig rten sgo gsum bya ba
35b6(1): la// 'jigs dang re dogs med pa yi// mi bya ba ni gang yang med// ting 'dzin bye ba sa ya dag/ dpag med che bar kun sprul nas// mtshan ma'i che ba zil mnan nas// thabs mkhas yid 'pham 'phrog par
36a1(1): mdzad// stong gsum khrag dang dur khrod dang // dga' dang mi dga' 'jigs byed pa'i// ma lus dur khrod ro gling du// stobs kyis gdug pa zil gyis gnon// 'jig rten khams ni ma lus
36a2(1): par// g.yo zhing 'khrug dang ldeg pa yis// gdug pas spa bkong 'jigs mdzad nas// bskal pa me ltar rab 'bar zhing // 'jigs byed chen po rgyan gyis bzhugs// 'di ltar ma lus zil gnon pa// nga rgyal
36a3(1): khros pas 'dul bar mdzad// de nas sangs rgyas thams cad ni// ma lus 'dus pa'i bdag nyid des// ma lus byin rlabs gsal bya'i phyir// gnyis med sbyor ba'i thig le yis// ma lus khyab par gang mdzad
36a4(1): nas// thig le rdul phran 'phros pa yis// dag pa bde chen lhun grub par// thams cad byin rlabs gsal ba yi// ma lus dkyil 'khor chen por gnas// dpal ldan 'dus pa'i ngo bo las// rigs lnga'i tshul
36a5(1): 'di rnam par 'phrul// la lar rdo rjes sbyor mdzad cing // la lar kun gyi re ba skong // la lar ma chags skyon bral nyid// la lar cho 'phrul mtha' yas ston// ye shes phra rags gnyis su med// bde chen rig
36a6(1): pa'i stobs 'phel bas// shes pa brgyad ni rang ldog pas// bde chen rig pa kha bltas nas// rang rang las dang skal bar gnas// bde chen rol pa rang snang bas// yul rnams gnyis med 'dres pa nyid// rdo
36b1(1): rje bde chen phra man nyid// yul sems phyi nang thig ler gsal// 'khor 'das gnyis med mtshon par mdzad// thabs chen gsang ba la brten nas// rang byung gsang ba'i nyi zla'i 'od// dbab dang bzung dang
36b2(1): gnas bcing zhing // rang rang gnas su slar son pas// mi shes yul las 'das pa yi// bde chen gsal ba'i sku gsung thugs// ma lus dkyil 'khor chen por gsal// gang du yid las 'das pa yi// bde
36b3(1): chen dkyil 'khor mtha' dbus med// rten med thig le 'gro 'od spang // rang byung gnas pa'i snying por thim// phyi nang yul sems kun bral ba'i// rang byung sgyu 'phrul dra ba ste// thabs chen mi dmigs chos kyi
36b4(1): dbyings// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// rang bzhin thabs dang shes rab las// bde chen rang bzhin gsal bar 'char// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten snod bcud bcas// bde chen thig le'i dkyil 'khor
36b5(1): snang // rjes su 'dzin pa bzhi ldan zhing // yul sems lus dang dus bzhir bcas// rdo rje 'dzin par byin brlabs shing // gsang ba'i don du gnyis su med// rdo rje nyi ma nub nas ni// rang byung dpa' bo'i zla
36b6(1): ba nyid// sgrib byed med pa'i tshul du 'char// ma lus dbyer med tshul du gnas// sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa// thog mtha' med pa'i rdo rje sems// snying po gnyis med bde chen por// rang byung gnyis med
37a1(1): don du gsal// rang byung gnyis med thig le yis// ma lus stong par mdzad pa yi// rdo rje khro bo'i phrin las te// za byed ces kyang bshad pa yin// gang du rgyu ba kun zad pa'i// phyi nang gsang
37a2(1): ba'i thig le ni// rten dang brten par bcas pa ni// zag med bde chen dang du thim// rang rig dngos dang dngos bral ba'i// mtha' dbus gzung 'dzin yul 'das pas// skye med bde chen chos kyi
37a3(1): dbyings// bden pa dbyer med don du gnas// tshig dang yi ge las 'das pa'i// bde chen lhan cig skyes pa ni// gang gis mtshon pa las 'das kyang // dbang dang man ngag stobs las kyang // thabs dang
37a4(1): shes rab 'brel ba yi// rang byung ye shes bde chen ni// rang bzhin sbyangs las snod gyur pa'i// skal ldan rnams kyi spyod yul te// las ngan sgro skur dbang byas shing // rmongs sogs dman pa'i yul ma
37a5(1): yin// gsang ba zabs chen snying po'i rgyud// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang chen 'di// bde chen nam mkhar kun gsal nas// yin dang ma yin yul las 'das// phyogs bcu'i rdul snyed sangs rgyas kyi// thugs
37a6(1): kyi thugs te thugs kyi mchog/ ma lus gsang mchog rgyan gyis mdzes// de ldan rgyal sras de bzhin gshegs// zhes nyid la nyid gsungs so// sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ rdo rje khro bo rang bzhin mngon du phyung
37b1(1): ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan dgyes chen po// phyogs dus bde gshegs ngo bo nyid// za byed thabs dang shes rab kyi// gsung gi byin rlabs snang bar mdzad// de tshe phyi nang snod bcud
37b2(1): bcas// g.yo dang 'bar zhing gang ba yis// ma lus ye shes byin brlabs nas// bde ba chen por gsal bar byed// gang du rtogs goms brtan pa yis// thabs dang shes rab las byung ba'i// bde ba'i thig
37b3(1): le thug pa med// ye shes lnga zhes gang bshad pa// rgyal ba kun gyi snying po lnga// sa bon yi ge oM zhes bshad// thog mtha' med pa'i de bzhin nyid// gnyis med mi phyed 'joms pas na// thugs kyi rdo rje gang yin
37b4(1): pa// badz+ra zhes ni brjod pa yin// ma bcos de bzhin ye shes ni// re dogs 'gro 'ong med son pas// chos kyi dbyings kyi sku las gyur// ta thA ga ta zhes brjod do// ma lus rang byung rin po che// nam mkha' lta/
37b5(1): bur zag med cing // dbang bskur thogs med ye shes ni// rat+na zhes pa brjod pa yin// 'khor ba'i bag chags spong ba ni// bde ba chen po skyon med pa// 'dod chags chags bral bcom pa nyid// pad+ma nyid ni
37b6(1): yin par bshad// thogs med brtson 'grus pha rol phyin// bya byed phrin las mthar phyin pa// 'gro 'ong med pa'i thabs nyid ni// karma las kyi rang bzhin nyid// shrI gnyis med ye shes te// don grub lngar ni
38a1(1): bsngags pa yin/ ma hA chen po lnga nyid de// thig le chen po las byung ba// sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs// ma lus chen po lnga nyid do// nyon mongs lnga 'joms khro bo ni// he ru ka zhes brjod
38a2(1): pa ste// ye shes 'bar ba'i mtshan nyid ni// khrag 'thung lngar ni bshad pa yin// thabs kyi yul lnga bcom pa ni// ma hA tsaN+Da zhes brjod de// khro bas khro ba spangs pa ni// gtum po chen po de nyid do// ma rungs pa
38a3(1): dang bdud bzhi dang // dam tshig sdang ba thams cad ni// bdag dang gzhan 'tshe bar gcod dang / thams cad sarba duSh+TAn nyid// gsang ba'i thabs chen ma rungs pa// gang gis 'joms pa ha ka ste// gnyen pos
38a4(1): 'joms pa ha na nyid// gang gis da ha 'joms pa nyid// bag chags zad 'tshed yin nam/ pa pa tsa nyid// hUM ni thugs kyi rang bzhin te// zad dang sgrol dang drag po'i sgra// 'dir ni phaT zhes skul bar
38a5(1): bshad// ye shes rang bzhin skye med pa// zab mo thig le 'dus ma byas// oM zhes phra mo yum lngar brjod// rigs lnga phra bar gang brjod pa// badz+ra la sogs bshad pa lnga// mi rig spyod rten mi nus pa// yum chen
38a6(1): lnga zhes bshad pa'o// yul dang shes pa gnyis med pa// zab mo thig le 'dus ma byas// kun gyi 'byung gnas dbyings phyug ma// shwa ri dbang phyug lngar bshad pa'o// gang gis gang 'dzin mi gtong pa// de nyid d+ha
38b1(1): ra gzungs mar bshad// ha ni mtshan med 'dus ma byas// steng rgyan thugs rje chen po nyid// rA ni chags pa bde chen nyid// gsungs rab rgya mtsho sgra mtha' yas// hUM sdud phaT kyis sgrol ba ni// skye ba med pa'i
38b2(1): nga du bshad// ha brgyad dgyes pa'i thig le ste// rags pa thabs kyi khro mo ste// rgyal ba kun gyi sras mchog ste// las kyi srin mo 'dul phyir yin// dgyes pa'i thig le phra mo brgyad// he zhes zhib bur brjod pa
38b3(1): las// 'khor 'das dbyer med phra men brgyad// srin mo phra men 'dul phyir yin// 'jig rten las skye rgun zad cing // gnyis med ye shes rnam sprul pa// des ni 'jig rten spangs pa'i lha// badz+ra zhes ni bshad
38b4(1): pa yin// zhi bas dkar mo'i rang bzhin te// che ba'i yon tan mthus rku bas// ser mo rku byed yin par bshad// ma lus rmongs byed chags mdog dmar// nag mo drag pos thal byed ma// mi mtshon bag chags
38b5(1): med pa'o// che ba'i yon tan nga rgyal 'chang // spos mo rang bzhin yin par bshad// spang len rtog 'joms pha rol phyin// sme sha can ni gdol pa mo// 'bar zhing brlag pas gtum mo ste// sprul pa 'gyed pa ma
38b6(1): tshogs ma// za ba seng gdong chen mo ste// dpa' brtul spyod pa stag gi gdong // bag chags bral bas wa yi mgo// dur khrod 'joms pas sbrang mor brjod// dam tshig mthar phyin bzhad gdong ste// bdag
39a1(1): 'dzin bral ba kang ka ma// mngon zhen 'dul ba kha kha zhes// zab mo'i don rtog tu lu ma// rang sar gnas pa skyes pa la// na maHphyag 'tshal nyid du brjod// dzaHsa ni 'gugs pa'i las byed
39a2(1): de// khA his mchod pa bstab par byed// phaT kyis kun kyang las la skul// las kyi sgo bzhi 'dul ba'i phyir// 'gugs 'ching bsdams pa mi gtong ste// thal ba 'ching byed sgra snyan ma// badz+ra lhag ma zhes
39a3(1): brjod pa// dzaHhUM baM hoHbzhi las byung // thabs dang shes rab 'khril ba las// phyag rgya bzhi dang ldan par gnas// b+h+yo ni las byed bran mo ste// las kyi mkha' 'gro thig ler chags// rgyu ba las kyi thig le
39a4(1): nyid// dzaHhUM baM hoHsa spyan drangs thim// yi ger zhu bas gnyis su med// rdo rje khro bo'i dam tshig gis// gnyis med gsal bar 'dres pa las// 'bar ba'i byin rlabs rang byung ba// dngos grub rang las snang
39a5(1): bar brtag/ sku gsung thugs dang dbyer med na// bden pa gsum par mi phyed pas// lha dang bdag tu dbyer med de// bdag nyid la ni gsal bar bstim// rang rang sbyor ba'i sngags nyid kyis// chu la chu ltar
39a6(1): dbyer med pas// dag pa'i ye shes rmad byung bas// thob nas rang la brtan par gnas// zhes nyid la nyid ched du brjod do// sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ khro bo gsung gi dkyil 'khor bshad pa'i le'u ste
39b1(1): bcu drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan dgyes chen po// thog ma mtha' ma dbus med pa'i// bde ba chen po rdo rje 'chang // sku yi dkyil 'khor 'chad par mdzad// phyogs bcu mtha' dang dbus med
39b2(1): nyid// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gzhal yas khang // ye shes dkyil 'khor lhun grub pas// phyogs dus thig le chen po nyid// rang byung 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhi// rgyu 'bras thig les brgyan pa'i
39b3(1): gnas// tshad med sangs rgyas gru bzhi ste// bden pa gnyis brgyan khams kyis mdzes// rnam par thar pa'i sgo bzhi la// dur khrod rgyan chas rta babs ldan// thod phreng bla re nyid zla'i rgyan// 'jigs shing mdzes
39b4(1): pa sna tshogs rgyan// 'khor ba rmad byung 'bar ba'i gnas// khrag 'thung bzhugs pa'i gzhal yas khang // mkha' 'gro sna tshogs tshogs pa'i sa// rol pa'i lha mo sna tshogs kyang // lha dang mdzes tshul sna tshogs
39b5(1): kyis// 'khor lo'i tshul du gnas pa las// mdog dang rang chas lugs bzhin du// dga' dang mdzes dang chags pa dang // rol dang sdig par byed pa dang // rngams dang las la brtson la sogs// 'khor lo'i
39b6(1): tshul du bskor te gnas// zhing khams bye ba rdul mnyam pa// khrag 'thung so sor 'khor dang bcas// mnyam pas mnyam pa'i tshul ston cing // sku dang gsung thugs dbyer med pa'i// de bzhin nyid du dbyer
40a1(1): med thim// rgyud chen sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho yi// che ba'i yon tan bsam yas pa// nam mkha'i khams las 'das pa yi// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor sna tshogs snang // de nyid rang rig rang snang
40a2(1): bar// sku gsung thugs kyi cho ga yis// dbang bskur byin rlabs kun ldan nas// lhag pa'i ting 'dzin brtan par bsgom// mtshan ma'i cho ga kun spangs pa'i// b+ha ga gsang ba'i gzhal yas khang // theg
40a3(1): chen gsang ba'i grong khyer te// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// yon tan dpag med rdzogs par snang // chags dang rmongs dang g.yengs pa dang / btang snyoms tha mal la sogs par// 'jigs dang bag/
40a4(1): tshatshe rnam par gcod// thig le rdul phran grangs mnyam par// bde ba chen por ro gcig cing // mu mtha' med pa'i gnas su 'jug/ chags sdang la brten grong khyer dang // 'jigs dang bag tsha'i grong khyer
40a5(1): dang // thabs dang ldan pa'i khyad par gyis// de nyid rnam par gcod par byed// dbyibs kyi b+ha ga brten pa'i gnas// thig le spros med rang byung ba'i// bde ba chen po thog mtha' med// bdag po gnas dang
40a6(1): dbyer med par// thig le ma skyes spros med pas// bden pa bzhi ni rab 'bar bas// phyi nang longs spyod kun tu 'phel// dga' bzhi'i rim par brtags bcas pa'i// byang chub sems kyi thig le
40b1(1): gnyis// bde chen sna tshogs dga' bas brgyan// thig le phra rags snang ba kun// 'bab zhon snang ba'i thabs nyid kyis// chags sogs lnga po zil gnon pas// dag pa lngar ni rnam par gnas// thig le ting
40b2(1): 'dzin rol par bcas// gnas dang nyams kyi khyad par gyis// rang rang las dang mthun pa yi// mdog kyang rim par gyur pa yin// bde chen rnam par thar pa la// mi gnas ye shes drug ldan pas// phung po la
40b3(1): sogs par chod bral// thabs kyis bde chen lus rgyas pas// g.yo ba sna tshogs bcas pa yis// 'jigs dang bsdigs dang dga' ba yis// sgra rnams sna tshogs ston par byed// chags pas thig le phreng bcas
40b4(1): te// rdo rje snang bas khyab par byed// rang lus thabs dang bcas pa yis// thig le stong par bcas pa yis// gcod dang 'joms sogs sna tshogs pas// bde ba'i ro ni sna tshogs ldan// gnyis med ro ni thig
40b5(1): ler 'brel// rtsa bcud shes par bcas pa yis// thig le'i phyag rgya bzhir bcas pas// bde chen gsang ba'i thig le la// dgug cing sgrol bstim la sogs pa// bya ba'i las la dbang thob 'gyur// steng
40b6(1): 'og thabs las byung ba yi// gsang ba'i thig le chen po ni// yon tan rdzogs pa'i bdag nyid de// sna tshogs ro dang bcas pa yi// nyi zla 'khor lo ge sar bcas// gsang ba'i lus la rtag tu gnas// bye brag
41a1(1): brgyad cu kun 'dus pa'i// phyogs bzhi steng 'og bcas pa yi// bde chen 'bar bas khyab gyur cing // phyi nang bcud kyis gang bar byed// gsang ba'i de nyid nges pa yi// sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho'i
41a2(1): gsang ba'i don// ma lus khyab pa gsal 'gyur zhing // dag pa rnams la mngon gyur kyang // dbang dang man ngag dral ba yi// rang bzhin skal ba dman pa la// thabs kyi theg pa mi snang ste// rigs chad 'khor
41a3(1): ba'i rigs 'chang yin// bde chen gsang ba'i snying po 'di// ma lus rdzogs pa'i ngo bo ste// rang bzhin thabs las mngon gyur pas// thabs chen lhun grub mngon du gyur// rdo rjer thig le son pa yi// gsang
41a4(1): ba thabs kyi me long la// ji bzhin mngon du byas pa yi// rdo rje rig pa'i lung thob cing // dbang bsgyur phyag rgya lhun gyis grub// ces gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ lhun gyis grub pa'i
41a5(1): dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan dgyes chen po// ma lus mchod pa'i sprin bkod de// phyi nang gsang ba sna tshogs pa'i// dgyes pa'i mchod pa bstab par
41a6(1): mdzad// ji srid nam mkha'i mthar thug pa'i// sangs rgyas rdul snyed mtha' yas pa'i// dbang po'i grong khyer mnyes mdzad pa'i// rang gi lag cha mdzes ldan pa'i// lha mo'i tshogs ni bsam yas pa// dgyes pa'i
41b1(1): mnyes tshul sna tshogs kyis// 'khor lo bdag po mnyes par mdzad// ma lus longs spyod tshogs mchog mnyes// ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs// phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs// dbyer med dag
41b2(1): mnyam tshul brtags nas// lhun gyis grub pa'i zhing du bsgom// thabs dang ting 'dzin goms pa yis// gnas ngan drag pos tshar bcad nas// tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i rgyal sras la// skye shi med par lhun
41b3(1): gyis grub// ma lus thabs dang shes rab tu// rtogs dang goms pa'i sbyor ba yis// bde ba chen po'i thig le yis// thabs dang sbyor bas mnyes par bya// ma lus rigs lngar mnyam sbyar nas// mi 'chi lnga dang
41b4(1): sha lnga dag/ 'jigs pa med pa'i dpa' bo yis// mchod cing longs spyod chen por bya// longs spyod lnga dang mnyam sbyor bas// phyi nang gsang bar mnyam sbyor zhing // bde ba chen por gnyis med pas// dkyil
41b5(1): 'khor lnga dang mnyam par gnas// phyogs dus rgyal ba'i dkyil chen po// ma lus gcig tu mnyam nyid pas// gnyis med rang byung ngo bo nyid// rtogs goms gnas pas lhun gyis grub// 'dres dang ma 'dres
41b6(1): mnyam gnas pas// thabs dang shes rab thig le nyid// rol pa'i thabs las rang byung ba// bde chen gar gyi snying po mchog/ ma lus rang byung snying po la// 'dod pa'i stobs kyis nyer rdzogs shing // thabs kyi
42a1(1): sbyor ba gang gnas pa// yon tan lhun grub snying por gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi rmad byung ba// rang byung thabs kyis byin brlabs shing // gsang ba'i me long gsal gnas na// lhun grub 'bras
42a2(1): bu gzhan las min// phyogs bcu rdul snyed grangs mnyam pa'i// 'bras bu che ba lhun rdzogs dag/ ma lus bdag nyid lhun rdzogs pas// yon tan gzhan dag smos ci dgos// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med
42a3(1): pa'i// ma lus kun la rgyas btab cing / thabs ldan rnams la snang gyur kyang // kun la gsal bar snang ba min// gsang ba thig le chen po ni// yon tan stobs kyi bdag nyid de// rtogs goms mnyes pas
42a4(1): lhun grub cing // log dang le lo'i stobs kyis min// sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i// thig le rdzogs pa'i thabs kyis bskul// gsang ba'i rig pa thabs kyis mnan// ro gcig bde ba chen por
42a5(1): gsal// rnal 'byor thabs dang shes rab kyis// ma lus bde ba che rtogs shing // thig le gsal ba'i ros khyab na// byed spyod dkyil 'khor gsal bar 'gyur// ma lus ma bcos mnyam sbyor zhing // dkyil
42a6(1): 'khor gsum la goms pa dang // bdag dang rgyal bar mnyam sbyor bas// ma lus mchod pa'i cho gar gnas// gang du bskul dang chags pa dang // dga' dang bde bas brgyan pa yi// gsang ba'i rol mos gang
42b1(1): bskul ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi bde chen ni// phyi nang yul sems ma lus kun// bdag nyid chen po'i ros gang zhing // bde chen rdo rje gnyis su med// de nyid zag pa med par gnas// gnyis med 'dres pa'i
42b2(1): rang bzhin la// gsang ba'i ye shes rang bzhin gsal// thabs chen gsang ba las byung ba'i// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus rdzogs// ma lus bdag tu dbyer med pas// thams cad gsang ba lhun gyis
42b3(1): grub// ces nyid la nyid gsungs so// sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ mnyes pa chen po byin gyis brlabs pa'i le'u ste bco brgyad pa'o// / de nas bcom ldan dgyes chen po// ma lus bdag nyid lhun
42b4(1): grub pas// bdag nyid bde bar byin rlabs pa// dam tshig mchog gi bshad par bya// gang du don la gnas pa dag/ bdag gzhan de bzhin lhun grub phyir// rgyal ba kun gyis byin brlabs pa'i// gang mi 'da'
42b5(1): ba dam tshig mchog/ snying po phyag rgya sngags rigs rnams// gsal ba yid gnyis med pa yis// rdo rje sku gsung thugs sbyor bas// gang yang nyams med 'bras bur 'grub// don dam snying por gnyis med
42b6(1): cing // thabs kyi don la rab nges na// las dang spyod pa gang yang rung // ma bsags mi sogs tshogs 'gyur te// 'dul sdom dam tshig ma lus pa// dam tshig chen po'i rang bzhin du// ma byas rang gi ngo bor
43a1(1): rdzogs// 'dul sdom blta spyod rnam par dag/ blang dor med par byin brlabs shing / ma lus 'dus par rdzogs te gnas// thabs chen gsang ba'i rang bzhin la// mtha' dbus yod med las
43a2(1): 'das pa'i// ma lus sgyu mar mnyam sbyor bas// rlung sems stong par ye dag pas// skye shi 'gyur med nam mkha'i ngang // grub pas bdag gzhan med snang bas// dngos gcig bsgral bas ma lus bsgral// ma
43a3(1): lus bdag dang mnyam sbyor bas// thig le chen po gnyis su med// gsang ba gsang chen las byung ba'i// ma lus gnyis med dkyil 'khor mchog/ ma lus dbyer med tshul gcig pas// gnyis dang yul du mi
43a4(1): 'byed de// rang byung longs spyod gsal rtogs pas// blangs par yon tan phun sum tshogs// chos rnams sgra tshig bral ba yis// de bzhin nyid kyi rnam 'phrul ba// sgra snyan brag char byin brlabs pas// ma lus
43a5(1): bden rdzun tshig tu smra// gang du rtog dang gnyer ba yi// rang sems rdo rjer byin brlabs pas// gang du de las 'da' byed lhung // de bas spang bar su zhig sems// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam gnas shing // dri
43a6(1): med rgyud la gang 'jog pa// spangs pas 'khor ba'i mtha' mar te// rmi lam du yang spang ba min// las dang nyon mongs dag byed cing // ye shes 'khor lo 'grub byed pa// snying po sngags kyi dam tshig la// skad
43b1(1): cig tsam yang 'da' mi rung // rgyal ba kun gyi thugs 'jug cing // ye shes snying por rgyas 'debs pa// phyag rgya thugs kyi rang bzhin las// 'das na rgyal ba nyid kyang ltung // dam pa'i grong khyer 'jug pa'i
43b2(1): grogs// 'od dang snying po ji bzhin du// thog ma mtha' mar mi phyed pa// 'bral dang dbye bar bya ba min// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba'i don// gnyer gtad pas kyang gzhan la min// gnyis ka ltung 'jig
43b3(1): 'byung bas na// dam pa nyid la nges par bya// 'joms pa chen po zhe sdang che// gtum pa chen po sreg pa nyid// 'dod chags chen po bde ba che// thabs chen thar pa chen po nyid// gti mug chen po rmongs pa
43b4(1): che// gnyis med bdag nyid gsang ba che// nga rgyal chen po gnon po che// che ba'i chen por rang bzhin gnas// mi mthun spangs pa'i rang bzhin zhi// theg pa chen po dam tshig mchog/ dam pa'i rang bzhin dam
43b5(1): pa'i mchog/ gnas na dam par lhun grub cing // 'das na dam pa'ang 'tshig par 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pa'i// bsten par bya ba'i dam tshig lnga// byin rlabs bar chad sel bar
43b6(1): byed// dngos grub bsgrub pa'i dam tshig ste// dri chen dag pa'i chu nyid dang // dkar chen dmar chen 'jigs pa'i rdzas// dpa' bos re dogs med par spyad// gsang ba'i thig le dbyer med pas// thabs
44a1(1): dang brtul zhugs ldan pas blang // lhan cig gnas pa'i bde chen po// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin nyid// thabs dang nyi zla'i ros khyab cing // bde ba chen pos byin brlabs pas// rlung dang
44a2(1): phyag rgya gang bsngags pa// thugs kyi phyag rgya ye shes che// lus sems bde chen dbyer med pa'i// mi bral gzungs su bshad pa'o// rmongs dang rang bzhin ngan pa dang // skal med dbang dang mi ldan
44a3(1): par// thabs kyis mngon du mi bstan te// thig le 'byung 'jug khar dbyung min// steng 'og thig le mtshams sbyar nas// thabs ldan dpa' bo'i 'dod chags kyis// brkam chags yul dang zhen pa dang // lha
44a4(1): ngan bdag 'dzin rnam par 'joms// gnyis med rig pa rang gsal bas// ma lus bde chen ngo bor gnas// rang bzhin ched byas zhen pa dag/ seng ge lta bus zil gyis gnon// dman dang chags bral
44a5(1): dka' thub can// zad dang ma smin bde chen bral// gang du thabs dang bral ba ni// spangs shing 'jug par bya ba min// lus las byung ba'i bcud lnga ni// rnal 'byor mnyam par rtag gnas pa'i// dam tshig 'tsho
44a6(1): paba'i longs spyod pas// nam yang 'dor bar bya ba min// ma lus 'dus pa'i bcud yin pas// snying po lnga zhes de la bya// rtsa bcud shes pa'i ngo bo nyid// rang byung dag par gsal brtags shing // gnyis med
44b1(1): sbyor bas goms pa yis// thams cad bde ba chen por mnyam// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// 'da' dka' dam tshig rang bzhin te// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa las// 'das pa gang yin dmyal bar
44b2(1): 'gro// dbyer med mnyam pa'i rang bzhin la// man ngag thabs kyis mnyam sbyar na// ma lus bde ba phun sum tshogs// bdag las 'byung gi gzhan las min// gang du rtsa ba kun nyams pa// yan lag bcas
44b3(1): pa'i rang bzhin 'das// kun gyis spangs bya'i gnas yin phyir// 'grogs dang phrad na ltung bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pa'i// rtsa ba'i dam tshig gang 'das pa// rgyal ba 'khor bcas bka'
44b4(1): bcag nas// thar med sdug bsngal gnas su ltung // yan lag dam tshig rmad po che// 'das na dngos grub mi 'byung zhing // theg chen lta spyod spangs pa yis// ngan 'gro 'khor ba'i gnas su lhung // sangs rgyas
44b5(1): kun gyi sku gsung thugs// rdo rje'i dam tshig chen po ste// ma lus gsang bar mnyam sbyor bas// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin yin// rtsa ba lnga dang yan lag bcu// thabs dang shes rab sku gsung thugs// lnga yi
44b6(1): rang bzhin mnyam sbyor bas// grangs dang bye brag ma nges te// mos dang bsam pa'i khyad par snang // zhes nyid la nyid bshad do// sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ dam pas byin gyis brlabs pa'i 'da'
45a1(1): bar dka' ba'i le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan de bzhin gshegs// kun mkhyen spangs rdzogs bdag nyid can// gcig dang du bral bdag nyid de// phrin las tshul ni yang
45a2(1): dag bshad// rang bzhin thabs dang thugs rje nyid// phrin las rgya chen gang byung ba// de nyid sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bor 'dod// e ma ho ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rang byung ye shes dkyil
45a3(1): 'khor du// snang srid rang bzhin ma bcos pa// bde ba chen po'i ngo bor zhi// ma bsags lhun rdzogs dkyil 'khor du// che ba'i yon tan rang snang ba// 'phel 'grib med par gang gsal ba// bsam gyis mi
45a4(1): khyab mtha' yas mchog/ ma chags dag pa'i dkyil 'khor du// spyod yul bag chags ma lus pa// gsung mchog ma skyes byin rlabs kyis// rig pa ma bcos ngang du 'dus// rang rig ye shes rgyal po yis// skye
45a5(1): med rang bzhin ngang nyid du// mtshan ma bag chags bcom nas ni// stong pa chen po'i ngang du gnas// rang snying d+harma tsakra la// ye shes bzhi sogs gnas pa'i mthus// rang bzhin nus mthu bzhir snang ba// de
45a6(1): dag ma bcos shes par bya// ma bcos shes pa la gnas nas// mtshan ma'i stobs thob gyur pa na// rang rang 'thad pa'i sa phyogs su// las rnams brtsams nas grub par 'gyur// waM gyi dkyil 'khor rim
45b1(1): gsum du// mtshan ma rdzas dang ldan pa la// dang ba dang ldan phur btab nas// ma lus sbrang phyir mchod sbyin bya// ma yi dkyil 'khor rim gsum du// mtshan ma rdzas dang ldan pa la// dga' ba nga rgyal phur
45b2(1): btab nas// yon tan 'phel phyir mchod sbyin bya// yA yi dkyil 'khor rim gsum du// ngang gi mtshan ma rdzas ldan la// chags pa dbang byed phur btab nas// mi mthun 'du phyir mchod sbyin bya// e yi dkyil
45b3(1): 'khor rim gsum du// rang gi rdzas dang ldan pa la// khros pas drag po'i phur btab nas// thal bar brlag phyir mchod sbyin bya// rang byung pho brang snying po la// e sogs rang bzhin bzhir gnas pa// thig
45b4(1): le thabs dang bcas pa'i ros// bdag gzhan las bzhi thogs med nyid// bde chen 'bras bu rdzogs par byed// rten can snying po'i thig le la// dngas ma lnga yi bcud 'dus pa// ma skyes nam mkha'i gzugs
45b5(1): can nyid// de ma zag par snang bar byed// sangs rgyas btsun mo'i b+ha ga la// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bzhir gnas te// thabs dang las bcas phyag rgya bzhis// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes nyid// nyi zla zin
45b6(1): pa'i stobs las skyes// gsang ba las bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du// dbyings phyug chags pa'i me nyid ni// phyag rgya bzhi bcas bstan bcos bskul// rdo rje pad+ma dgang blugs bcas// byang chub sems kyis gang
46a1(1): mchod pa// las dang bag chags spyod yul bcas// bde ba chen por 'bar bar byed// lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin 'char// thugs rje'i stobs kyi las bzhi yis// rang rang dga' ba'i tshul
46a2(1): ston cing // thabs dang mos pa sna tshogs la// ci dga' bar ni ston par byed// la lar nad dang sdug bsngal dang // bag chags ma lus zhi bar byed// la lar tshe dang bsod nams dang // longs spyod ye shes
46a3(1): 'phel bar byed// la lar bgegs dang mi mthun dang // rnam par rtogs pa thabs kyis sdud// gang gis 'dul bar mi nus pa// thabs mkhas drag pos mngon du sgrol// gang du lam dang ldan
46a4(1): pa'i gzungs// ljon pa mo dang lcug phran tshal// sdong gcig ma dang me reg la// dang ba dga' ba chags pa yis// khros pas sbyor ba rab tu brtsam// rang dang rjes su mthun pa'i phyir// las brgyad glu gar ldan
46a5(1): bskul bas// rjes mthun pa yi las 'grub cing // bsgrub bya'i las dang dngos grub dag/ thogs pa med par 'grub par 'gyur// gsang ba las byung gsang chen po// rang byung thabs dang shes rab ldan// de
46a6(1): nyid sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho ste// 'gro ba'i don du rnam par 'phrul// thabs las thabs byung thabs kyi mchog/ kun la thugs chud snying po'i don// rang snang thabs kyis mngon snang gis// gzhan las mi 'byung ngo bor
46b1(1): gnas// thabs chen gsang ba'i theg pa 'di// las dang skal ldan spyod yul te// dman dang rigs chad la sogs la// khyab par gnas kyang spyod yul min// zhes nyid la nyid bshad do// sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho'i
46b2(1): rgyud las/ las lhun gyis grub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// // de nas kun mkhyen sras chen po// ma lus dgyes pas khyab gyur nas// sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs// che ba'i tshul gyis glu 'di
46b3(1): blangs// rgyal ba kun gyi sku che ba// 'bar ba 'jigs shing mdzes pa che// byin rlabs lhun grub sku dang ldan// rdo rje legs pa brjid pa che// hUM dang phaT dang tshangs pa'i gsung // zhing khams kun tu khyab mdzad
46b4(1): nas// gdul bya dga' dang 'jigs mdzad pa// gsung gi dkyil 'khor sgra mtha' yas// rang byung ye shes 'od gsal ba// mdzes dang khyab dang gsal ba yis// ye shes lnga ru gsal mdzad pa// rgyal ba kun
46b5(1): gyi thugs kyi mchog/ ma bcos rang bzhin gsal ba las// sna tshogs sku gsung thugs su gsal// bdag gzhan bya ba kun rdzogs pa// yon tan rin chen nor bu 'chang // ma lus thabs kyi cho 'phrul gyis// ma
46b6(1): rungs gdug pa kun 'dul ba// rang byung thabs kyi phrin las kyis// bdud bzhi ma lus 'dul bar mdzad// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin khyod// sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i// sku gsung thugs kyi
47a1(1): bdag nyid che// yon tan phrin las sna tshogs sbrul// 'di ni ched du brjod pa yis// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ji snyed kun// gnyis med dgyes pas khyab par 'gyur// lha dang lha mor bcas pa
47a2(1): dag/ mdzes dang dga' dang chags pa dang // bde ba chen po'i mdangs ldan pas// blta dang rgod dang 'o byed cing // 'khyud dang stegs dang 'tshir ba dang // 'jib dang 'bud pa bcas pa yis// bya ba sna tshogs
47a3(1): las btang nas// bde gshegs mchog la 'jug par mdzad// dkyil 'khor rdul snyed bcas pa dag/ gsang ba'i thig ler gnas pa ni// ye shes lnga yi ro dang ldan// dngas ma'i snying por blo zhugs
47a4(1): pas// yul dang bag chags ma lus pa// bde ba chen po'i snying por gsal// las dang spyod pa'i khyad par dag/ pad+ma la ni 'dam bzhin no// sgyu 'phrul theg pa'i snying po 'di// ma lus dngos grub rnams kyi
47a5(1): gtso// thugs mchog phyag rgyas rgyas btab pas// nam yang 'da' bar mi mdzad do// zhes nyid la nyid bshad do// sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ dgyes pa chen po'i le'u ste nyer gcig pa'o// // de nas
47a6(1): bcom ldan dgyes chen po// ma lus gsung cig 'dus pa yi// snod ldan gang zag rgyal sras la/ gsang ba'i snying po gdams par mdzad// 'das dang da ltar ma byon pa// phyogs bcu dus bzhi ma lus pa'i// de
47b1(1): bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid// kun kyang gsang ba'i snying po nyid// thabs bral zhen pa gnyis kyis bcings// bdag 'dzin zhen pas don la bsgribs// ma lus sgro bral ngo bo la// btags pa'i zhen pas
47b2(1): 'khor bar 'khyams// ji snyed theg pa gang bshad pa// thabs chen theg par brgyud pa'i lam// theg pa bsam yas bstan pa yang // gdul bya'i don la bsam sbyar nas// don du mi 'gyur gcig ma
47b3(1): gsungs// rdo rje'i gsung la spros med kyang // thugs rje thabs mkhas byin rlabs kyis// ji ltar mos pa so sor snang // chos kyi phung po bsam mi khyab// ma lus 'dus pa'i snying po 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyi
47b4(1): gsang ba ste// kun 'byung sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho'i rgyud// dbang bskur byin brlabs gsang ba'i mdzod// thog mar mtha' ma bar med dge/ sgo skur med pa thabs kyi lam// rtogs dang 'dzin pa gang byed pa// dus
47b5(1): gsum rgyal ba kun gyi sras// dam tshig dbang dang ldan pa dang // las dang smon lam dbang gis ni// snod dang bcud du 'brel pa yis// gsang mdzod 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang // thabs mkhas snying rje gtong
47b6(1): phod can// sdug bsngal gnyer zhing phongs pa med// lus dang longs spyod ma chags pa// dam pa 'di la gsang ba gtad// ces nyid la nyid bshad do// sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho'i rgyud las/ gsang ba gtad pa'i le'u
48a1(1): ste nyer gnyis pa'o// // sgyu 'phrul rgya mtsho rgyud chen po rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la mi tra dang gnyigs dz+nyA na ku mA ras bskur ba'o// bi ma la nyid la ze ma dge slong mas zhus
48a2(1): pa'o// @#// rgya gar skad du/ de bI dz+wa li ma hA mA yA tan+t+ra nA ma/ bod skad du/ lha mo sgyu 'phrul dra ba chen mo zhes bya ba'i rgyud// bcom ldan 'das gsang ba chen po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di
48a3(1): skad bdag gis gsungs pa nyid du gyur pa'i tshe na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i rnal 'byor chen po dang / rnal 'byor ma chen mo dang // shin tu mos pa chen mo dang / mos pa
48a4(1): dang bcas pa srung bar byed pa/ rab tu rnam par srung bar byed nye ba mo dang bcas pa nye bar zhi ba chen po dang zhi bar mdzad pa chen po mdzes pa dang mdog tu ldan pa/ shes pa dang skyabs su ldan pa ni 'di lta ste/
48a5(1): gtso bo rnal 'byor 'khor lo zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor chen po rdo rje nyid du 'dus pa zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor chen po btang snyoms zhes bya ba dang / rnal 'byor chen po dbang du mdzad pa zhes bya ba dang /
48a6(1): rnal 'byor shin tu rnam par rgya gram gyi tshul 'dzin pa dang bcas pa ni cir yang ston pa'i gzugs kyis kha dog bzhi dang ldan te 'dug pa'i cha lugs kyis cod pan lnga dang ldan te/ ma bsgribs mi sgrib bsgrib pa
48b1(1): mi 'gog sgrib tu med pa'i dbyings nas yang dag pa'i gzhal yas chen po na mnyam pa chen po'i tshul rdo rjes sku ma bkag pas mdzad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas bzhugs so// de yang 'di ltar so sor gsal bar
48b2(1): mnyam pa chen po dang 'khor dang bcas pa mnyam pa chen pos yo byad chen po ni kun gyi gdung 'dzin pa'i rang bzhin du gnas pa ni brten pas phyin ci ma log pa dang gnyis su du ma med pa ni gzungs rnal 'byor
48b3(1): ma chen mo ste/ byang chub chen mo nam mkha' zhes bya ba dang / byang chub chen mo nam mkha' 'dzin ma zhes bya ba dang / byang chub chen mo sa srung ma zhes bya ba dang / byang chub chen mo rlan par byed pa chen mo dang / byang
48b4(1): chub chen mo rnam par khengs pa spang ba zhes bya ba dang / byang chub chen mo las grub par mdzad ma zhes bya ba dang / byang chub chen mo rdo rje rab tu chags pa chen po 'dzin zhes bya ba dang / rab tu ma chags pa gsod
48b5(1): ces bya ba dang / byang chub chen mo rab tu rmongs sel zhes bya ba dang / byang chub chen mo gsung gi 'khor lo ma zhes bya ba ste/ de dag kyang 'di lta ste/ shin tu ut+pal lta bu'i mdog dang / shag kra dang / bai DU r+ya dang /
48b6(1): pad+ma rA ga dang / asma gar ba la sogs pa rdzas kyis sngags pas 'phags par 'tsher ba ma smin pa med par bzhugs pa ni rnal 'byor ma kun tu bzang po 'khor dang bcas pa'o// de yang gus pa chen po gsang ba
49a1(1): dang / gus pa chen po sna tshogs pa'i dri dang / gus pa chen po dbang sgyur ba ni gsang ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba dang / gsal ba 'dzin byed ma dang / rnam par dri yi gnas su gyur pa dang / rnam par sgra
49a2(1): byed pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa'o// de nyid mthong bar byed pa'i dbang po dang / nyan par byed pa'i dbang po dang / bsung byed chen po'i dbang po dang / btar ba chen po'i dbang po dang / shin tu gtong bar mdzad pa
49a3(1): dang / shin tu rtog par mdzad pa dang / shin tu 'dzin dbang chen po dang / shin tu grub par mdzad pa dang / cha lugs mi gtong ba'i btsun mo dang bcas pa'o// yod pa rnam par rtog par mdzad pa dang / med pa
49a4(1): sel bar mdzad pa dang / rnam par 'du shes rgyal ba yin par mdzad pa dang / shin tu 'gog pa rnam par 'joms pa chen mo dang / mngon spyod kyi las kyis gnyis su med par 'khril nas chos kyi dbyings mnyam
49a5(1): pa chen po'i gzhal yas na bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba chen mo'i rnal 'byor ma'i gzhal yas su dgyes nas ma skyes pa'i dbyings shes rab kyi tshogs chen mo mu khyud kun dang ldan pa/ zla
49a6(1): rgyas lta bu'i dkyil 'khor mtha' dbus med par khyab pa/ rin po che kun dang ldan pa/ grwa dang ngos dang kha dog dang dbyibs rgya khyon dpag tu med par gyur pa/ ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa cha lugs kyis rnam
49b1(1): par mdzes pa/ yid bzhin chen po'i rgyan gyis rnam par spras pa/ sna tshogs pa'i bye brag gis rgyal ba rnams kyi gdung 'dzin pa/ sgyu 'phrul chen po'i sgo bzhi dang ldan pa/ theg pa phyi'i rnal 'byor rnams kyi theg pa
49b2(1): chen po 'bab gzhol dge sdig chen po'i mchog shin tu gsang ba chen mo dang bcas pa/ pad+ma chen po'i dbus na lce kha dog bzhi'i bye brag gis mdzes par gyur pa/ phyogs bzhi bre ba rim pa gsum gyi cha lugs
49b3(1): kyis gsang ba chen po'i dkyil 'khor du gyur pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor sgrib pa mchog tu sel ba ste le'u dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das longs spyod chen po gdung ba
49b4(1): mchog tu sel ba mdzad pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ 'dzum pa chen pos rab tu chags pa chen po la dbang sgyur bar dgyes te/ gsang ba chen mo'i mkha' la pad+ma dbang gi mdog gis rgyas par
49b5(1): mdzad de/ oM su ra tA su khe zhes brjod pas rdo rje rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa btsun mo dang bcas par gyur to// de nas rab tu 'di brjod par mdzad do// bzhi pa kha dog dkar la 'tsher// btang snyoms kun
49b6(1): gyi spro bsdu yis// gsum pa rdzogs par gsal ba dang // phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog de dag las// rgyal mo dag dang mnyam du dgyes// phyag rgya rdo rje dril bu 'dzin// bcu gsum pa yi cha lugs kyis// che chung med
50a1(1): par gsal bar bsgom// dbu la gnyis pa'i yi ger ldan// gsal ba nyid kyi dus dag tu// cod pan lnga yi rin chen las// rgyan gyi rigs ni gsal ba yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
50a2(1): kyi mchog tu gsang ba rgyan dam pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// gsum pa mthing 'bar yi ge che// rigs kyi rin chen spro bsdu las// phyag rgyar gsal bas skur gsal ba// rgyal mo dag dang mnyam du dgyes// sgrib
50a3(1): pa kun spangs sdig med sdoms// gnyis pa yi ni yi ge las// cod pan lnga ldan yi ger gsal// thams cad blo sbyangs yid bzhin gter// mnyam pa 'khril ba'i tshul 'dzin pa// rin chen rigs kyi phyag rgyar
50a4(1): gsal// las thams cad kyi mchog rgyal mo rnam par rol pa'i phyag rgya'o// pad+ma rA ga 'dra ba'i mdog/ chos sku zla tshes rab ldan pa// gsal ba'i kha dog mdzes pa ni// thams cad ma lus dbang du
50a5(1): mdzad// sbyar dad bskyed dang bsdu ba yis// phyag rgyar gsal bar dbang gi sku// btsun mo dag dang mnyam du dgyes// gnyis su med par 'khril ba yis// dbu ru yi ge gnyis pa ldan// rin chen rigs kyi spro
50a6(1): bsdu las// cod pan rigs lnga kha dog ste// ji bzhin pa yi ting 'dzin gyis// phyag rgya bzhugs tshul pad+ma'i tshul// mnyam par bsam pas dkyil 'khor yin// mi 'byed pa yi ting 'dzin gyis// rdzogs pa'i
50b1(1): dkyil 'khor kun 'dus mchog/ pad+ma rigs kyi phyag rgyar gsal// mun pa sel ba'i mar me bzhin// gsal dag yid gnyis med par bsgom// chu skyes 'dzum pa'i 'od du ldan// steg dang sprod pa'i rol mo
50b2(1): yis// dgyes shing mnyam pa'i mchod par bsham// 'di ltar gsal bas dbang yang rdzogs// thams cad sdud pa zhes su bya// de bzhin dbang ste las thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes so// dus gsum pa yi
50b3(1): mdzad pa che// rigs kun 'dus pa bde gshegs las// mnyam pa ji bzhin ting 'dzin te// yi ge 'bru gcig kun gyi mchog/ bshad pas khyad par las kun rdzogs// chu skyes gsal ba'i 'dab ma
50b4(1): steng // gnyis su med par gsal ba ni// rnam pa gnyis kyi bye brag gis// 'dus pa gsal bas skur gyur pa// 'dod cing chags pa ma yin zhing // blo la yid gnyis med pa dang // phyag rgyar gsal bas rgyal
50b5(1): ba'i sgra// rgyal mo dang ni mnyam du dgyes// dbu gnyis pa yi yi ger ldan// sbyin pa rgya chen khengs pa na// rang gi 'dod pa'i gnas su bsdu// bong tshod lo grangs khyad par med// gnyis su med par 'khril bar
50b6(1): gsal// dus kun du ni mnyam ldan pas// gsang ba'i mchod pa rab tu rdzogs// zla rgyas lta bu'i gtso bo bsgom// chags pa med par 'dod sdud pa'i// yum dang lhan cig bsgom pa ni// A li kA li byed pa'i
51a1(1): don// phyag rgya las kyi bye brag gis// bde ba chen po'i tshul gnas pa// rgyal ba kun kyang de bzhin mthun// phyag lag snol mar gnas pa yi// kun kyang sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor ro// phyag
51a2(1): rgya thal mo rdo rje 'di// kun kyang yum gyi rgyab tu bsnol// zhal gnyis mdzes par rab rgyas nas// zla gam pa yi ljags gnyis mdzes// dung gi phur bus mkhur tshos la// gdab cing sdebs pa'i tshul du
51a3(1): bzhugs// bsnyen pa nye bsnyen dbang rdzogs pa// rgyal ba kun gyi sku yi mchog/ bzhad dang 'dzum pa'i gtso gzungs bsgom// rnal 'byor dka' thub chen po'i don// gsang ba spyod la shin tu dgyes// gsang ba
51a4(1): nyid du sems can 'dren// thams cad kun gyi rmongs pa sel// yum gyi las kyi khyad par ni// sa yi rim pa kun sbyong zhing // zas la bgo la dbang med pa// nyan thos 'gog pa la sogs pa// byang chub sems
51a5(1): kyi char chen gyis// dam por bcings pa tshar gcod mdzad// dam tshig chen po sdom pa ste// rgyal ba kun gyi dkyil 'khor yin// phyag rgya chen po'i tshogs mchog ni// dag pa don gyi rigs mchog yin// myur bar
51a6(1): rtag tu ma yengs na// gdon mi za bar 'grub pa ni// 'dod khams lha yi nyin phyed kyis// gsang ba kun dang mnyam par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// kun tu
51b1(1): bzang po rnal 'byor mchog/ gsang ba nyid kyi mkha' dbyings nas// yi ge a ldan tsheg drag bcas// rnal 'byor bde chen thugs kyi sras// gzugs khams la sogs byin brlabs nas// phyag mtshan 'khor
51b2(1): lor gsal ba dang // bde ba rnal 'byor de bzhin gshegs// btso ma gser gyi kha dog la// nyi ma zer gyi 'od bzhin du// gsal ba 'tsher ba bcom ldan 'das// dbu ru yi ge gnyis pa las// rin chen myu gu
51b3(1): khang pa 'bar// sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan gyis// legs par brgyan pa mtshan rnams rdzogs// rdzogs pa chen po'i bzhugs tshul dang // ting 'dzin mthun pas 'gro la dmigs// pad+ma ge sar dbus gnas
51b4(1): pa'i// thig bzhi gsang ba bzhi dang ldan// mdun du lha mo chags pa mo// lo grangs nyi shu mdzes dang ldan// ma hA su ka'i gnas la dgyes// mdzes pa'i lag pa gar dang chas// gnyis su med pa'i bzhugs tshul
51b5(1): ni// gtso la brten pa'i tshul du bzhugs// rgyab tu lha mo dgyes chen mo// sangs rgyas brten par mdzad tshul gyis// thal mos 'dzin pa sku brtan pa// sku tshe bcu drug rtsa dmar sku// sangs rgyas gdung 'dzin
51b6(1): chags pas sbyong // 'dod chags can la mthun par mdzad// g.yas su zhe sdang gdul ba mo// rdo rje pad+mor sbyor la dgyes// ma dad pa rnams dbang med par// drag por sbyor mdzad zhe sdang sel// chags pa chen
52a1(1): po bcom ldan 'das// gnyis su med par sbyor ba yis// gtong ba med par bstan pa'i tshul// sngo bsangs mdangs ldan khyad par che// khru tshad bcwa lnga chags pa can// dus mtha' med par sbyor
52a2(1): la dgyes// steg dang sgeg pa'i cha lugs kyis// sems can kun gyi sdug bsngal 'khru// rab tu skams pa 'gog pa rnams// rlang nas rgyal ba'i sras su 'gyur// at+to ma li'i phrin las kyis// thams cad byang
52a3(1): chub chen por mdzad// mig gnyis 'dzums dang sbom po yis// dbang mor ldan par byas pa na// gnyis su med par sbyor 'dod yin// sna yi rtse mor mthe'u chung 'dzin// ma btang bzhugs la brtson byos
52a4(1): pa'o// so rnams bsdams nas kha phye ba// dus la bab ces bya ba ste// ting 'dzin gsal bar rgyu ba na// dus la bab ces bya ba yin// 'di ltar brda ldan ting 'dzin la// dam can bud med mi 'dud pa// dngos
52a5(1): grub mi 'gyur dam tshig nyams// tshe rabs kun du brlag par 'gyur// 'di ltar rtsen par byed pa na// g.yan pa bslang ba rnam bzhi yis// skyes bu na chung tshul bzhin du// rdo rje pad+ma'i mtshams nyid du// dbyings
52a6(1): phyug lnga yi sbyor ldan pas// dal bus dal bus gzhug pa dang // dal bus dal bus rab tu bsgral// drag po'i yi ge spros pa na// byang chub sems kyis pad+ma dgang // sbom po dbang ngam lnga rnams kyis// yum
52b1(1): gyis blangs te gtso la mchod// nye ba'i bsnyen pa la sogs pas// bsnyen pa che chung rdzogs par bsgom// byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor las// mchod pa brgyad kyis bstod par mchod// de ltar longs spyod
52b2(1): rdzogs pa dang // gnyis su med par lung bzhin du// mnyam par 'khril ba'i tshul du bstan// dus gsum kun tu gdung 'dzin pa// g.yon phyogs brten pa'i skal dang ldan// bong tshod lo ni bcu dgu pa'i// sdong
52b3(1): po dul ba dag la dgyes// g.yas par bzur ba'i spyan gyis gzigs// dril bu sgra snyan 'khrol la brtson// rdo rje rab tu sgrogs byed ma// sangs rgyas lnga yi dbu rgyan can// mngon du sbyor la rab brtson pa// brda
52b4(1): dang bcas pa'i gar gyis ni// sangs rgyas kun la slong mdzad ma// byang chub sems kyi sprin chen gyis// mchod pa chen pos rab mchod mnyes// sprul pa bsam yas mtha' klas pa// dus gsum 'khor lo bskor
52b5(1): bar bskul// ngo sor chags pa'i mdangs kyis ni// mnyes dang bcas pa'i gar gyis mchod// gru chad bzhi yi rim pa la// zos byed gsal byed gsung ba che// dri dang ldan pa la sogs pas// btsun mo dag
52b6(1): dang thabs cig tu// gnyis su med pa'i tshul du bzhugs// bar khyams bzhi la gnas pa ni// thos byed dbang dang nyan byed dbang // dri mchog dbang du lta byed dbang // dus ni bzhi rnams lha mo bzhi// btsun
53a1(1): mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas// zhe sdang 'joms byed la sogs pas// sgo rnams kun du gnas pa ni// snying rje'i yum dang bcas par gnas// nyi ma zla ba pad+ma mchog/ rin chen dung dang bcas
53a2(1): pa ste// tshangs pa brgya byin gnyis gnyis kyis// bteg pa'i khri la rab tu bzhugs// rdzogs pa chen por kun kyang gnas// sems dpa' chen po'i bzhugs tshul du// kun kyang rab tu gnas par bstan// zhal
53a3(1): ni kun du sal le ba// thugs ni kun du lhan ne ba// sku ni kun la khyab par gsal// e ma mi skye mi 'gag mchog/ e ma mi sel mi len mchog/ e ma tsham ngam drag shul spyod// e ma gshegs pa'i stabs
53a4(1): dang bcas// e ma mtshan ma sel bar ston// e ma gsung rab rgya mtsho sgrogs// e ma byol song spro ba bskyed// e ma sprul pa bsam yas mchog/ e ma mya ngan 'das par mdzad// e ma gsang ba nges don
53a5(1): mdzad// e ma gzungs dang mnyam par sbyor// e ma ci yang mi mdzad mchog/ ngo mtshar sprin las 'di dag gis// sa yi rim pa 'byongs par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas pa nyid mngon par sangs rgyas pa la gleng
53a6(1): ste mnyes par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba rnal 'byor bde ba chos kyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das bde
53b1(1): ba chen po kun du bzang mo rnal 'byor ma la 'jug par dgyes te rab tu 'dris pa chen po dgongs pa dang / kun du bzang mo rnal 'byor mas/ zhal 'dzum pa dang bcas pa/ e ma sems dpa' thig le che// bag
53b2(1): chags kun gyi gnyen por gsungs// 'di las 'jug pa'i chos 'ga' med// zhes brjod do// de nas gsang ba chen mo dang gnyis su med par 'khril bar gyur te// g.yon pa bskyed pa rnam pa mang pos mnyes
53b3(1): pa dang pad+ma sbas pa la sogs pa 'byung ba spel bar mdzad nas rab tu dgyes te glu 'di blangs so// e ma bde ba mchog las skyes pa phyag na rdo rje can// chos kun dngos po med par gsal ba la// 'byung gnas
53b4(1): chen pos ya mtshan 'byung bar mkhyen pa e ma ngo mtshar che// rgyu nyid stong pas 'bras bu btsal med pa'i// rgyu dang 'bras bu nyid kyang rgyal bas yong mi rnyed// stong pa nyid la dga' ba'i chags pa'i cho 'phrul
53b5(1): ba// de phyir skye 'gag med ces rgyal ba rnams kyis 'di la brjod// chos kun dbyer med ma rnyings pa nyid las/ kun gyi dga' ba 'byung ba rgyal ba kun pas shin tu 'phags// zhes brjod pas gsang ba'i
53b6(1): mkha' la kun tu bzang po rnal 'byor 'jug par mdzad de shin tu rngam pa'i glu 'di blangs so// sgyu ma kun las 'phags pas dbyer med rnam par 'phrul byed pa// kun du bzang po rnal 'byor de ni bder
54a1(1): gshegs yum chen kun gyi gsos/ sdug bsngal kun sbyong bder gshegs yum la 'jug pa thugs dam yin zhes rgyal bas gsungs/ oM hUM mi 'gog ji yang mdzad pa nyid ni mi mdzad mnyam pa yin
54a2(1): zhes rgyal bas gsungs// 'di ni glu ru blangs pa yis// mya ngan 'das kun 'gro ba'i mgon// stong pa chos kyi dkyil 'khor la// dka' thub chen po thob par 'gyur// zhes gnyis su med par glengs so// de
54a3(1): nas snying po mchog gi yi ge ni// dang po'i gnas su bsgom par bya// de snying yi ge bzhi pa ste// rdo rje chen po gsal ba mchog/ yi ge a ldan thig le che// chos kun 'dus par rnam par bsgom// dang por me long
54a4(1): lta bu ste// mnyes pa'i kha dog shin tu 'bar// phyag lag 'khyud pa sprod pa yis// thams cad de dang 'dra bar gsal// oM hUM su ra ta su ke dz+nyA na da oM AM hUM/ bder gshegs rgyal mo mkha' dbyings su// gsal
54a5(1): dag las rnams 'grub par bsgom// chu skyes pad+ma 'dab ma stong // bshad pa'i sgras ni rnam par brgyan// de steng chos kyi sku ru gsal// zla rgyas lta bu'i mkha' dbyings nas// thams cad bsdu ba gsum gyis
54a6(1): bsdus// oM su ra tA su khe d+harma d+hA tu swa b+hA ba oM AHhUM/ gnyis su med pa'i yi ge mchog/ mi skye ba ni a dang ldan// byin brlabs rgyal ba kun gyi gnas// mchod pa brgyad dang gsal bar ldan// so sor gsal
54b1(1): ba'i mkha' dbyings la// hUM gi zer gyis reg par mdzad// oM su ra tA su khe na pra dz+nyA b+ha k+Sha na swa b+ha ba oM AHhUM/ byang chub sems kyi char chen ni// yi ge gnyis pa rtsa dmar sku// gnyis su med par ldan pa
54b2(1): na// bdud kun rnam par btul ba dang // dbyings kyi bde la gsal ba ni// sgo dbye ba yi tshul gyi ni// pad+ma dbye ba sna tshogs bya// spro ba dang ni bsdu ba yis// bya ba nan tan ye shes bskyed// 'di ltar rgyal ba
54b3(1): kun mdzad pa// sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab las// mchod pa mang po lha mor ldan// oM su ra tA su khe na duSh+Ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha ba oM AHhUM/ rnal 'byor skal ldan chen po ni// skal ngan kun gyi gsos su
54b4(1): gsungs// gnyis su med pa'i byang chub sems// maM sa bshang gci rdzas rnams ni// dogs pa med pa'i dngos grub ste// rgyal ba nyid la rgyal bas mchod// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i snying po
54b5(1): las bag chags gtan la 'bebs pa gnyis su med par gleng ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das gsang ba'i snying po rdo rje rnal 'byor ma dang gnyis su med pa'i phyag rgya'i mchog ni 'di
54b6(1): lta ste/ sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i phyag rgya las// mdzes par gsal ba yab yum bcu// sor mo phan tshun spel legs pa// rdo rje thal mo byang chub rgya// gsang ba rnal 'byor thugs kyi mchog/ dam tshig sdom pa 'da' bar
55a1(1): dka'// rnal 'byor pa la a lI gsal// kun du bzang la ka ra byed// lnga char zur du ldan pa ni// gcig tu gyur pas gar gyi gzhi// oM hUM traM AHhUM/ mA A kA hUM rA/ thal mo btang snyoms tshul
55a2(1): gyis ni// mdzes pa'i mtha' na gar gyis bya// snying gar bcings pas rnal 'byor don// gar gyi phyag rgya dang nyid pas// gar du byas pas thal mo bsnol// mjug tu dbul ba'i tshul gyis bstod// rdo rje gar gyi
55a3(1): phyag rgya las// g.yon pa rtse gsum g.yas pas gzung // de nyid gzhan du 'bigs par bya// rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya las// dga' ba'i mdangs dang ldan pa yis// g.yas su 'dud pa'i tshul gyis ni// g.yas pa yi
55a4(1): ni thugs kar bsgreng // g.yon pa gsung nyan 'khril ba'i tshul// rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya las// mdzes pa'i mtha' nas gar byas shing // gzhan nas bsdus nas g.yas g.yon 'jog/ rdo rje gar ni de dag
55a5(1): las// lag pa g.yas pa 'degs pa dang // dbul ba'i tshul du rnam par brtag/ rdo rje gar ni de dag las// sman dang dbu ni g.yon du 'dud// cang te'u thogs pa'i tshul gyis ni// mchod pa byed par rnam par
55a6(1): bsngags// rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya las// lus ni g.yas g.yon bsgyur ba dang // gar las lag pa phral bskyed pa'o// rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya las// g.yon pas g.yas pa'i gru mo gzung // g.yas pa nyug pa'i tshul
55b1(1): du bya'o// de nyid rdo rje gar dag las// dam tshig phyag rgya 'thor bar bstan// rdo rje gar gyi phyag rgya las// dam tshig phyag rgya steng du bsgyur// de nyid g.yon pa'i nang dag las// g.yas pa'i dam tshig phyag rgyas
55b2(1): gtor// de nyid g.yas pas drangs par ldan// de nyid gnyis pas gzung ba yin// de nyid gnyis ka mtha' mo bsdam// de nyid dril bu 'dzin par bsgom// oM sarba ta thA ga ta/ mu ka ka ra su khe na oM/ oM sarba
55b3(1): ta thA ga ta sa ma rA ga s+t+waM su khe na hUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta dza la ya nA nA ma ma hA su khe na tAM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma b+ha shra su khe na hA hA ha/ de nyid gtso bo'i phyag rgyar bcas// oM sarba ta thA ga ta sarba bud+d+ha lo tsA na
55b4(1): At+ma naM// su ra tA su khe na maN+Da la pU dza ya pU dza ya/ oM au aM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma ha d+hu dza dza/ oM su ra tA su khe na b+han+da b+han+d+ha/ pU dza ya pU dza ya/ hUM hUM hUM A/ oM su ra tA su khe na/ ma na sha mo ha/ pU dza ya pU dza ya/
55b5(1): hri hri hri/ oM su ra tA su khe na sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma dan+ta/ sA d+ha ka na da ho ho/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta shrI badz+ra lA s+ye/ badz+ra gar+b+he su khe na pU dza ya pU dza ya/ oM hUM hUM hUM a/ sarba ta thA ga ta shrI badz+ra gar+b+he su khe na pU dza ya pU dza
55b6(1): ya/ traM traM lnga a/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta shrI badz+ra gan+d+he/ badz+ra gar+b+he su khe na/ d+he pa d+he pa/ pU dza ya pU dza ya/ hriM hriM hriM a/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta shrI badz+ra ni ra te badz+ra gar+b+he ma hA ti la ka su ke na pU dza ya pU dza ya/ a a a/ oM hUM/
56a1(1): oM sarba ta thA ga ta shri badz+ra d+hU pe/ badz+ra gar+b+he su khe na pU dza ya pU dza ya// oM tang tang tang hAM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta shrI badz+ra puSh+pe badz+ra gar+b+he su khe na pA dza ya pA dza ya/ d+harbArbA ma/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta shrI badz+ra
56a2(1): a lo ka dz+nyA na maN+Da la ti la ka/ bud+d+ha su khe na pU dza ya pU dza ya/ oM hri hri hri oM AHhUM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta shrI badz+ra gan+d+he/ badz+ra gar+b+ha ma hA maN+Da la ti la ka su khe na pU dza ya pU dza ya/ a a a/ oM AHhUM/ de bzhin
56a3(1): gshegs pa thams cad mnyes pa'i mchog las gar gyi le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen mo dang bcas pa dam tshig bla na med pa'i rgyan bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
56a4(1): snyoms par zhugs so// thams cad sdom pa la gnas par mkhyen no// dam tshig chen po 'di dag gsungs// so so'i theg pa bsam yas pa// so sor nyes pa med na bde// 'jig rten pa la chad mdo
56a5(1): btsan// 'dul ba 'dzin la bsrungs na bde// gtsang sbrar spyod la gtsang sbrar spyad// mi dge bzlog na dge ba bcu// spyad pas lhag pa'i 'jig rten 'dzin// rang gi don gyi ting 'dzin gyis// byang chub sa la
56a6(1): gnas pa'i rnams// nyams pa med de ma bcol na// nyams pa med de las kyang 'grub// rnal 'byor spyad pa spyod pas 'grub// tshig cis goms pas theg pa 'joms// gtso mchog bshes gnyen mi spong
56b1(1): zhing // bkur sti rim gro mchog kyang bskyed// ting 'dzin goms par cha lugs bsgom// tshig gi bzlas pa bar mi gcad// dam tshig mched la gdung ba bskyed// sku yi dam tshig bsam mi khyab// gsung gi dam
56b2(1): tshig bsngags pa yin// thugs kyi dam tshig lhag par gsungs// rigs lnga bsrungs pa'i dam tshig rnams// nyams na shin tu bskang bar dka'// spyad pa'i dam tshig rdzas rnams ni// nyams na myur bar bskang ba
56b3(1): yin// nyams pa ma bskangs le lo yis// sangs rgyas kun dang gcugs chen te// 'khyam pa rnam pa bcu por ni// myur bar skye bar nges pa ste// de bas rigs kyi bu mchog ni// mchog dang tha ma 'bring gi
56b4(1): rnams// rab kyis bar chad med par sprad// 'bring gis lo zla dus drug ste// tha mas lo mtshams mi bzla zhes// rgyal ba rnams kyis shin tu gsungs// rdo rje dri dang byang chub sems// rak+ta dri chen tshe chen
56b5(1): po// dag pa'i snod dang rab ldan pas// byin gyis brlabs te 'thung byed pa// dam tshig sdom la gnas pa ste// 'das na brlag pa chen por 'gyur// mnyam par bzhag pa'i chos thams cad// mnyam par shes
56b6(1): pas spyad pa dang // mnyam pa nyid du gsal ba na// rnal 'byor sems dpa' yin zhes gsungs// rnal 'byor snod du bya ba gang // rdzas kyi bsngags pa yod pa rnams// rab tu bkru zhing byi dor bya// ka la ping
57a1(1): ka'i mdog bzhin du// gzhong bu phur bu snod kyi rnams// dri ma bkru zhing mdzes par bya// dus gsum du ni sman sbyar ba// dang por dngul gyi gzhong par sbyar// de nas ra gan gzhong pa ste// zangs
57a2(1): kyi gzhong par sbyar ba ni// srang re sbyar ba'i sman rnams las// zangs dang dngul dang ra gan nam// gser dang lcags su rab bsres la// rnam rtog nad la sman sbyar ba// min dA ra ba'i mdog bzhin
57a3(1): sbyar// man dA ra bar ma gyur tshe// nam yang sbyar bar ma gsungs te// nyi zla dus gcig shar ba na// de nas rdzas kyi bsngags pa las// sman gyi sbyor ba rab tu brtsam// shin tu sman rnams 'byor pa na// 'od kyi
57a4(1): dkyil 'khor bsam yas su// ka la ping ka'i mdog tu brtag/ 'di la gang zhig mi brtson pa// dam tshig mi btsun sdom pa med// rdo rje spun las dben par gdon// lha dang rdo rje slob dpon la// bag med par
57a5(1): ni brnyas pa dang // rmongs pas ma mthong g.yel ba dang // dam chos srog la mi lta ba// sangs rgyas rgyal ba bdun la brnyas// dkyil 'khor ba yi las byas pa// sems can dmyal ba chen po ste// tshe zung nad
57a6(1): kyis btab pa dang // 'dzin rten 'di ru gnod pa mang // shi nas dmyal ba ngan song skye// de bas sdom pa 'di dag las// 'da' bar mdzad pa gang yang med// 'di las 'das par mi byed pas// tshe 'di nyid la
57b1(1): rgyal ba'i sku// lhun gyis grub pa'i sa la gnas// zhes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nyid la nyid dam tshig chen po'i sdom pa 'dis shin tu bsnyengs par mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang
57b2(1): ba'i bde ba sdom pa thams cad kyi mchog gi le'u zhes bya ste lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po chen po rnal 'byor ma dang bcas pa dgongs pa gcig tu gnas par mdzad do// rnal
57b3(1): 'byor gyi dbang phyug chen po spyad pa mchog dang ldan pa'i spyod pa ma lus pa nyid dang zab mo'i don yin par mkhyen to// mkhyen nas sgyu 'phrul chen mo'i thabs 'di gsungs so// e ma chos dbyings rnam dag spyod
57b4(1): yul las// sangs rgyas sems can gnyis ston ya mtshan 'phrul chen yin// de yang ye shes tshogs las sna tshogs snang mod kyi// bud med kun gyi sgyu ma las ni rab tu sprul te 'char// bden gnyis so sor snang
57b5(1): ba nyid kyang yum gyi mkha' zhes rgyal bas gsungs// ma nor lam chen sgom na kun du bzang mo bsgoms pas lam du zhugs pa yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa kun shes rab bud med las ni mchod cing
57b6(1): bsnyen pas ye shes chen por 'grub bo// dkyil 'khor gdon pa'i las kyi dngos grub mchog gi la rdo rje glu'i don de nyid kyis gnyis su med pa'i dgongs pa la gsal bar gyur te/ de nas de bzhin gshegs
58a1(1): pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid dpal kun tu bzang pos thabs dang shes rab kyi longs spyod 'di gsungs so// mngon spyod las kyi 'jug pa ni// phan tshun du ni dga' spyod pa// rnal 'byor sdom la
58a2(1): gnas pa yin// de la mchod pa dam pa ni// sbyor ba rab tu sbyor ba ste// kun tu khyab pa kun du sbyor// rjes su chags pa dam tshig mchog/ de phyir kar sham mdog dang ldan// bcu drug bong tshod ring ba
58a3(1): las// lugs su blugs pa lta bu ste// lus legs mdzes dang ldan pa dang // dpral ba dbyes che kos ko phra// nu ma chung zhing sor mo ring // yid tsam bzur la mig dkyus ring // dkar zhing rtsa dmar mdangs
58a4(1): su chags// so dkar thags bzangs 'tshams zung zhing // skad sbom gdangs dang ldan pa ni// rdo rje sems dpa'i gnas mchog ste// 'di la rtse bar byed pa ni// rigs kyi rdo rje gdon mi za// tshe 'di nyid la
58a5(1): 'grub par 'gyur// gnas rab dben par rab brtag ste// sha dkar mdangs ldan mdog dang ldan// lus 'bring zlum pa cha byad can// so dkar thags dam mig dkyus zlum// skad phra mdog dkar spro ring
58a6(1): ba// dbral dbyes la sogs bzang gnas pa// rma dag gnas pa la sogs ni// rtag par chos la 'dud pa yin// tshangs pa dbyangs kyi rigs can te// 'di la brtson byas bsgrub pa yis// de bzhin rigs kyi
58b1(1): ting 'dzin la// phan tshun du ni dga' spyad na// tshangs pa'i snga dro gcig tsam gyis// gdon mi za bar 'grub par 'gyur// rnal 'byor sbyor ba dga' ba ni// sbyor ba brtson pas 'grub par gsungs// bud med cha
58b2(1): lugs legs pa ni/ bong tshod mi ring lus phra zhing // rkang lag chung zhing skad gsal ba// mig legs ngo zlum rtsa dmar che// lhun du chags la ming shes med// lus la mtshan gyi rma 'dras brgyan// tshig gsal rmi
58b3(1): lam nyung ba dang // so dkar mchu legs dad par ldan// chos sems pa yi ting 'dzin gyis// gsang ba'i mkha' la nyi zla'i 'od// rdo rje pad+mar ldan byas te// phan tshun du ni dga' spyad na// 'dod khams lha yi
58b4(1): skad cig gis// 'grub par 'gyur ba gdon mi za// lus zlum brtun dang nga rgyal bcas// khong na tshig rnon sems la 'dzin// bya bar dran la mi gtong ldan// bslab pa blo rtul sha rus che// mdangs bkrag pa
58b5(1): rtags na phyi phyir che// sbyin la dga' zhing chos la dad// rin chen rigs kyi ting 'dzin gyis// bag chags yi ges rtsad gcod cing // ting 'dzin blo la gsal ba na// bsgrub pa dus la bab pa ste// de tshe rab tu
58b6(1): brtson pa yis// yum gyi pad+ma kha phye ste// bde ba thugs kyi 'du 'phro yis// phan tshun du ni dga' spyad na// rigs kyi rin chen 'grub pa ni// tshe 'di nyid la thob par 'gyur// thugs rje mdzad spyod bye brag
59a1(1): gis// 'jig rten dag na dman pa'i rigs// rab tu bkug ste dga' spyod na// snying rje mchog dang thabs ldan pa// rnal 'byor spyod pa chen por gsungs// shan pa rigs ngan smad 'tshong
59a2(1): ba// ngan pa'i rigs dang longs spyod rnams// 'joms pa po yis ting 'dzin gyis// myur du spyad na 'grub par gsungs// yi dgas gnod sbyin byol song dang // khyi dang rus sbal spre'u la sogs// mi dang lha yi
59a3(1): gnas mchog kun// so sor 'tsham par dga' spyad na// dregs pa can la zhi ba che// brtson la dga' ba brtson par mdzad// thabs kyi mdzad spyod kun gyi mchog/ sems can 'di dag don gyi phyir// phyin ci
59a4(1): log tu gang spyod rnams// 'dul ba'i mdzad pa sna tshogs kyis// mi mdzad pa ni ci yang med// shin tu gtum pa'i cha lugs kyis// gtum po thams cad dbang du mdzad// shin tu zhi ba'i cha lugs kyis// dregs
59a5(1): pa can rnams dbang du mdzad// shin tu mdangs ldan cha lugs kyis// chags pa'i yid rnams dbang du mdzad// e ma shin tu ngo mtshar che// ci yang yin pas cir mi dgongs// zhes gsungs pas thams cad
59a6(1): rab tu brtson pa chen po dang ldan par gyur to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa nam mkha' dang mnyam pa rdul phra mo'i rdul snyed rab tu 'dun pa'i thugs kyis mnyan pa brtson par
59b1(1): mdzad do// rdo rje chos kyi mchog la sogs pa rigs bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu mnyan pa dang gus pa mchog dang ldan pas yongs su gzung ba'i le'u mdzad// de nas bcom ldan 'das rnal 'byor chen mos
59b2(1): rab tu brtson pa mdzad/ rab tu brtson pa'i yid kyis sprod pa dang 'khyud pa dang gyad kyi dgyes pa dang mgu ba bla na med pas phan tshun du dga' ba spyad do// de nas de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nas sku dang gsung
59b3(1): dang thugs rdo rje las 'di gsungs so// oM hUM ye shes rnal 'byor mchog ldan pas// skal bzang mchog gi dngos grub stsol// rab tu rmongs pa bsal phyir 'gog pa kun slong ba// rnal 'byor bde mchog gnyis
59b4(1): su med pa 'di dag shin tu ngo mtshar che// rin chen yid bzhin gzungs ni kun gyi dbang ldan pa// tshangs ma'i mdangs ldan gzungs ma drangs te de brtson pas// grub par 'gyur ba 'di la dga' spyod a la
59b5(1): la// shin tu srid pa 'di dag bzhin du spyad pas 'grub par gsungs pas sa la gnas pas kun pas 'phags// rgyal ba kun gyi nang na kun tu bzang po rgyal ba kun pas 'phags// de yang kun du bzang mo yin
59b6(1): zhes sngon gyi rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs// mtshan ma kun bral rab tu dga' sbyor mi gtong bas// sems dpa' rdo rje nyid kyang de yin rgyal ba kun gyis gsungs// tshangs pa mchog gi glu 'di dag/ brtson par
60a1(1): byed cing len pa ni// dka' thub rnal 'byor ting 'dzin te// tshangs pa mchog gi dro gcig gis// gdon mi za bar 'grub par gsungs// zhes brjod do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rab tu
60a2(1): brtson pa chen pos gcig gi rang bzhin du gyur par mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas dus gsum gyi ston pa thams cad
60a3(1): bde bar gshegs pa'i rang bzhin te rab tu mchod pa chen pos mnyes shing ma rig pa brgyad khri bzhi stong 'dul bar mkhyen to// mkhyen nas ma rig pa grol bar mdzad pa dang zhe sdang rnam par grol bar dgyes
60a4(1): te/ de dag mnyam pa chen po'i rang bzhin gyis 'dul ba'i thabs su sgrol ba dang / dbang gi rigs kyi sbyor bas rab tu bsrungs shing bsrung ba mdzad do// bdag gi rnal 'byor kun du bzang // mtshan nyid kun
60a5(1): brtags gnyis su med// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam sbyor na// mnyam pa'i sa la gnas pa yin// rang sems zla rgyas dbus gnas pa// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin te// don rtogs gsal bar gyur pa
60a6(1): yis// rab tu bsgral ba chen po ste// mchog gi sa la gnas rgyud yin// sku yi cho 'phrul rigs kun rdzogs// gsung gi ston pa bla na med// thugs kyi mdzad pa rtags dang ldan// ting 'dzin 'di ltar gsal ba
60b1(1): yis// blo rmongs sdug bsngal sbyang ba'i phyir// gnyis su med par gsal ba yis// dzaHhUM baM hos bsdu ba mdzad// mngon spyod las kyis sgrol ba mdzad// gnyis su med par 'grub par 'gyur// rtags dang shes
60b2(1): pa phun sum tshogs// byams pa mdzad pa rnal 'byor thugs// gzungs kyi mchod pa mnyam ldan pas// rgyal ba mnyes par sbyor shes na// mnyes pa chen pos bdag nyid mchod// bden pa'i tshul du dbyer med
60b3(1): pa'i// sems nyid rtogs pa rnam sbyang phyir// ting 'dzin shugs kyis kun bsgral te// mngon spyod las kyis sgrol bar mdzad// gsang ba'i mkha' la kun tu sbyor// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdzad spyod
60b4(1): bsam gyis mi khyab pa las mchod pa de kho na nyid de le'u bdun pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor rab tu skyong ba la dgyes te/ slob ma mchog dang 'bring dang tha mas yon gyi dbul ba mang po byas
60b5(1): te dkyil 'khor du gzud pa mdzad do// bgegs tshar gcad pa'i phyir rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis gdong bar bstan rin po ches lag sor bkang ste snying po 'di zlos su gzhug go// oM sarba ta thA ga ta
60b6(1): pA dzi d+hi d+ha tiSh+Tha hUM/ oM ma hA maN+Da la de ba ka ra pU dza ya pU dza ya hUM a/ zhes brjod de me tog 'thor du gzhug go/ gang la bab pa'i bshes gnyen bstan// sngags dang phyag rgya dam tshig bstan// de nas dam tshig chu
61a1(1): blud cing // tshig 'di rab tu go bar bsgo// sems can gyi ni gzugs chen po// las la sogs te dbang bskur ba// rgyal ba'i sras su dbang bskur yin// de ring phan chad bu khyod kyis// dam
61a2(1): tshig gnyen po 'di dag ni// srog gi phyir yang mi gtong zhing // slob dpon ma btang grogs la mchod// bka' la gus par mnyan par byos// gal te bka' las 'das gyur na// gzhom dang gzhig dang dam
61a3(1): rtsal dang // spro dang sbar dang dmyal bar skye// sems la chu 'di gnas pa ni// phrin las rnam bzhi 'tsham par bya// zhes brjod nas/ rdo rje slob dpon dkyil 'khor dang // kun tu bzang dang mched la
61a4(1): sogs// zhabs la gtugs dang gus par bya// rgyud kyi mnyan pa thams cad bya// bsgrub pa'i gzugs la brten pas 'grub// de nas rigs kyi bu mchog la// gsang ba'i ming gi dbang yang bskur// gus par
61a5(1): ldan pa'i bu mchog des// rgyal po dbang yod rgyal po srid// rang lus gnas dang 'khor yul dang // bu dang chung ma tsha rgyus dang // rin po che dang shel dang dngul// sna bdun rin chen nor gyi dbyig/ rta dang glang
61a6(1): po shing rta dang // ma he ne'u le ci yod rnams// gter dang dbyig dang yid 'thad pa// sems la the tshom med pa yis// bkur sti rim gro mchog bskyed la// phul na rgyal ba mnyes par 'gyur// de nas dbang
61b1(1): mnod theg pa'i tshad// rim pa bzhin du mnod par bya// mnyan pa grub pa la sogs dang // las dang ging dang rgyal 'theb dang // spyan dang rdo rje tshad 'dzin pa// bye brag mngag pa la sogs rnams// gsang ba'i
61b2(1): dbang rnams gang nod pa// nyi shu'am bcu gnyis lon pa la// gos dang dbu rgyan bza' btung dang // phyag rgya dril bu la sogs pa// dkyil 'khor 'di ltar gsal bsgoms te// rgyal ba kun gyis byin gyis
61b3(1): brlabs// mngon du stan bting dga' spyod cing // steng nas rgyal pos dbang bskur na// gdon mi za bar dngos grub thob// tshig gi legs pa bstod ra bya// de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des// zhabs la
61b4(1): gtugs te gtang rag gtong // rdo rje spun dang gzungs ma yis// rgyal ba'i rgyal ba yin zhes brjod// dus gsum kun gyi sras chen po// dus gsum kun gyi spyad pa spyod// khams gsum kun gyi sgrol ba
61b5(1): po// sgrol ba mchog gi spyad pa spyod// shin tu rnal 'byor skal ldan pa// dam tshig sdom la gnas pa dang // mtshan ma med pa'i chu 'thung zhing // ji ltar bsgo ba'i las byed pa// kun la khyad par rab grags
61b6(1): yin// phyi rabs 'dren pa'i gdung 'dzin pa// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i sa la gnas// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi gsang ba de// kho na nyid las mchod yon dam pa dang snying rje'i le'u ste brgyad
62a1(1): pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan ldan 'das gsang ba rdo rje bkod pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te gnas par mdzad do// mdzad nas snrel zhi dang bya byed yan man
62a2(1): mang po mi 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas yang las la ltos pa rang thad kyi sdug bsngal rnams mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis 'jog par mdzad do// de nas yang mu stegs rtag par lta ba ther zug pa
62a3(1): la rtag pa ther zug gi cha lugs kyis 'dul bar mdzad do// chad pa phyis mi 'dod ces bya ba la cha lugs des mnyam pa la 'dzud par mdzad do// mdzad nas rab tu 'gog pa'i dka' thub kyis myur ba bde ba
62a4(1): la gnas par mi ster ba rnams la dka' thub 'gyur ba chen po'i tshul gyis 'dul dbang chen po mdzad do// drag shul gyi btsan thabs la dga' ba de thags zangs ris kyi cha lugs kyis 'dul bar mdzad
62a5(1): do/ gzhan la snying rjer ma gyur pa'i phyogs gcig pa'i sa rgyal rnams la yid bzhin gyi ting nge 'dzin gyis 'dul bar mdzad do// gling bzhi'i dge sdig cha mi shes pa la 'khor los sgyur ba chen por mdzad nas
62a6(1): 'dul bar mdzad do// sbrebs pa chen po dang gtub pa chen po dang / btso ba dang rab tu so tha ma tham che chung rnams gnyen po dang zangs kha dang / gshed po chen po'i tshul gyis 'dul bar mdzad do// de dag kyang
62b1(1): chos mnyam pa chen po byang chub kyi tshul rdo rje theg pa kun gyi mchog rang bzhin gyi tshul gyis gnas pa thabs dang shes rab dbyer med de rol pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la gnas par mdzad do// thabs kyi mdzad
62b2(1): pa khro bo rnam par 'phrul pa zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das kun du bzang po chen po bdud 'dul ba zhes bya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs par mdzad do// de nas
62b3(1): bdud zhe sdang chen po zhes bya ba de bskal pa stong gi dus na sdug bsngal bsam gyis mi khyab pa blangs pas byang chub tu sems ma bskyed pa/ rab tu gdug pa/ spyi bung ba// bong che zhing tshor sang che ba// mtshon cha
62b4(1): dang khrag gi gdug pas sems can la gnod pa/ mtshon gyi mche ba dang bcas pa dpag tshad nas dri tshor te rab tu gsod gcod za 'thung byed cing me dpung gi dkyil na gdug pa'i mda' 'phen cing g.yo ba chen
62b5(1): pos bsngo ba drag po dang tsham ngam du gnas par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das cangad mi gsung bas kun du bzang mo la 'dzum pa mdzad do// yab sum gyi byang chub kyi sems kyi sprin las/ oM d+hu d+hu d+ha d+hA ra d+ha
62b6(1): ra d+ha ra ho ho/ hUM hUM hUM/ hri hri hri/ ho ho zhes brjod pas tshangs pa'i chung ma dang / dbang po'i chung ma dang / khyab 'jug gi chung ma dang / tsakra'i chung ma dang / de ba'i chung ma dang / ru tra'i chung ma dang / ga ru Da'i chung
63a1(1): ma dang / yul 'khor srung gi chung ma dang / rnam thos kyi chung ma dang / 'phags skyes kyi chung ma dang / mig mi bzang gi chung ma rnams rab tu chags pa'i 'du shes rang dbang med par skyes te 'du
63a2(1): bar mdzad do// de yang byang chub sems kyi sprin las/ sa twa badz+ra he ru ka/ ma hA sa ma ya sarba sid+d+hi/ hUM hUM hUM/ ho ho ho zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa'i gzugs mang pos mdzes pa dang ldan par gyur te
