111b6(1): khro mo'i rgyal mo chen mo mngon du phyung ste/ hi hi zhes dgyes pa'i gzi mdangs kyis pad+ma rgyas par mdzad de/ gnyis su med pa'i dgyes pa chen pos thim nas gsang ba bla ma'i sprin las/ hUM hUM hUM badz+ra dza bi Sha kro d+ha
112a1(1): badz+ra dza la maN+Da la phaT phaT ha la ha la hUM zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad dur khrod bdal ba chen po'i rang bzhin khrag gi rgya mtsho dpa' rlabs 'khrug pa'i dkyil na/ keng
112a2(1): rus chen po ri rab kyi steng na rdo rje me dpung du 'khyil ba'i dbus na 'og rdo rje rgya gram mig mangs ris su bris pa/ phyogs bzhi ngos bzhi 'bar bar khyams gsum rdo rje rin po che'i glo 'bur du mdzes pa/ sgo bzhi
112a3(1): rta babs mu khyud du bcas pa/ rdo rje rin po che rgya gram mthing ga 'bar ba'i rtsig pa dra ba ris su brtsigs pa/ steng yid bzhin gyi rin po che 'bar ba/ rdo rje rgya gram 'bar ba'i bla re mig mangs su bris pa/ rtse mo
112a4(1): dbyibs bla mas 'og min gyi gnas na srid pa'i rtse mo man chad bum pa'i tshul du dbyibs rdo rje rgya gram mig mangs gcig tu 'khyil pa/ ye shes rdo rje rgya gram gyi cho 'phrul bla ma'i 'od 'bar bas phyogs bzhir
112a5(1): 'phros shing 'khrugs pas khams gsum thams cad bdal ba/ rgyal mtshan bla ma chen po dang / ru mtshon bla ma chen pos phyogs bzhi gra bzhi nas bsgreng ba/ gsang ba bla ma'i rtsig pas phyi rim bskor ba/ rdo rje rin
112a6(1): po che'i phyi rol gyi shing ljon pa bla mas phyogs mtshams gtibs pa/ phyi dang nang med pa kun du yang bla ma chen po'i nang du gyur pa/ khams gsum thams cad rdo rje ra ba'i rtsig pa 'chor ba med pa'i gzhal yas
112b1(1): khang na khro bo dang khro mo'i rol pa'i phyag rgya stong gi 'jig rten rdul phra mo snyed 'thon par gyur to// de nas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du 'ur 'ur dang chem chem dang / shig shig dang / thor thor dang /
112b2(1): gtogs shig dang / choms shig dang / sod cig dang / drol zhig dang / sbyongs shig la sogs pas 'jig rten na dbang che zhing dpa' brtul che zhing brtul zhugs can rnams brgyal bar gyur to// de nas dgyes
112b3(1): pa chen pos ye shes rgyal po de nyid dur khrod bla ma chen por dgyes nas khrag gi rgya mtsho'i dkyil keng rus chen po'i ri rab kyi steng na rdo rje me dpung 'bar ba'i klong dkyil na rdo rje ye shes kyi 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi
112b4(1): pa la nyid kyi gsang ba'i rgyal mo dang mchod pa bla ma chen po mdzad de gnyis su med pa'i dbyings nas 'di phyung ngo // hUM badz+ra du tri nan sUr+ya tsan+d+ra pad+ma maN+Da la de ba tiSh+Tha naM zhes brjod pas ye shes rin po che'i 'khor
112b5(1): lo rtsibs bzhi pa 'od 'bar ba'i steng du dur khrod gdug pa'i tshogs seng ge la sogs pa bla ma chen po'i khri btsugs te/ gdan bla ma nyi zla dang pad+ma spel bar bting ba'o// de nas cho 'phrul bla ma chen pos btul
112b6(1): pa/ bsam gtan bla ma chen po sbags pa tshad med pa/ dmigs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i ye shes bla ma chen pos dregs pa thams cad dus gcig tu btul ba'i snam rten bla ma chen po la mtshon pa dang /
113a1(1): dmigs pa'i yul las 'das pa'i phyag rgya bla ma 'od 'bar ba bzhugs pa ni bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po chen po sku mthing nag cir yang 'gyur ba/ rdo rje ljags kyis gsung 'brug stong gi sgra
113a2(1): sgrogs pas stong khams thams cad dus gcig tu 'jig pa/ ye shes me'i thugs kyis snang srid kyi bud shing dus gcig tu bsregs pa/ steng 'og med par kun tu skyi bung zhes byed pa/ dbu dgu phyag bcwa brgyad
113a3(1): pa/ zhabs rnam pa brgyad du gtams pa/ phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa/ dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ spyan 'bar ba nyi shu rtsa bdun mnga' zhing rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rdo rje mthing ga
113a4(1): khyung gi gshog pas 'jig rten gyi khams yog par bkab pa/ khros pa'i rgyal mo mthing nag 'bar ba dang gnyis su med par bzhugs so// gnyis su med pa'i dbyings nas shar phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs
113a5(1): stengs la khri dang nyi zla'i steng du ma ha de ba dang / 'dod pa'i lha gan rkyal du brtul ba'i steng du nyid kyi gzugs kyi phung po de bcom ldan 'das bud+d+ha he ru ka/ sku mdog ser nag dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir
113a6(1): gyur pa dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o// phyag na mtshon cha sna tshogs bsnams pa'o// bder gshegs khros pa'i rgyal mo dang 'khril ba chen po'i tshul du bzhugs so// lho phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs la
113b1(1): khri dang nyi zla'i gdan stengs su gshin rje gan rkyal du bsgyel ba'i gdan la nyid kyi tshor ba'i phung po las bcom ldan 'das rat+na he ru ka sku mdog sngo nag dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur pa/ mtshon cha sna
113b2(1): tshogs 'dzin pa/ dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po che khros pa'i rgyal mo dang 'khril ba chen po'i tshul gyis bzhugs so// nub phyogs kyi 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs la khri dang nyi zla'i steng du chu bdag gi rgyal
113b3(1): po dang 'khor lo nag po b+h+r-ing gi ri ti gan rkyal du bsgyel ba'i gdan la nyid kyi 'du shes kyi phung po de bcom ldan 'das pad+ma he ru ka sku mdog dmar nag dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir gyur pa/ mtshon cha sna
113b4(1): tshogs 'dzin pa/ dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o// pad+ma khros pa'i rgyal mo dang 'khril ba'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o// byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs la khri dang nyi zla'i gdan stengs su gnod sbyin stobs
113b5(1): bzangs gan rkyal du bsgyel ba'i gdan la nyid kyi 'du byed kyi phung po de bcom ldan 'das karma he ru ka sku mdog ldang nag dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhi bgrad par gyur pa/ mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa ste/
113b6(1): dur khrod kyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ las mchog khros pa'i rgyal mo dang 'khril ba chen po'i tshul gyis bzhugs so// de nas dreg pa chen po la sogs pas gdug pa'i sems kyis gtum pa'i rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs
114a1(1): bstan pas mgrin gcig tu 'dug pa'i nga ros gtum pa'i brlang tshig tu smras pa/ zong zong snying rje'i bdag po ci 'di ltar byed dam zhes zer zhing shin tu gtum pas rngam mo// de nas bcom ldan
114a2(1): 'das dgyes pa chen pos ye shes rgyal po de nyid sku gzi brjid chen po'i mdangs su gyur te/ thugs rje chen pos 'dul ba'i thabs kyis sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i gsang sngags bla ma'i rngam pa'i gdangs skad chen po 'di
114a3(1): dag phyung ngo // hUM hUM hUM/ ha ha ha/ khA hi khA hi khA hi/ zhes brjod pas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i gdug pa'i tshogs de dag gi snying dang dbang po kun phyung nas nang grol kun drangs yan lag kun bcad
114a4(1): btubs te sha zos/ khrag 'thungs rus pa kun 'chos so// de nas 'jigs byed chen po de nyid kyis hUM hUM hUM b+h+yo e a ra li dzA dzA zhes brjod pas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nam mkha' dang bcas pa
114a5(1): yungs 'bru gcig tsam du chud par bsdus so// de nas 'byung po ma rungs pa thams cad kyi rje bo'i yang rje bo// dregs pa chen po la sogs pa'i chung ma 'byung mo thams cad kyi rje mo'i yang rje mo// srin mo chen mo
114a6(1): mi srun mo dang / tshangs ma dang / khro mo dang / dbang mo dang / 'jug sred mo dang / gzhon nu mo dang / dmar po dang / bdud rtsi mo dang / zhi ba mo dang / be chen mo dang / srin mo dang / za ba mo dang / dga' ba mo
114b1(1): dang / ra ro khrag 'thung mo dang / gcig pu spyod ma dang / yid 'phrog ma dang / grub mo dang / rlung mo dang / gsod byed mo dang / me mo dang / phag mo dang / rgan byed mo dang / sna chen mo dang / chu lha mo dang / nag
114b2(1): mo chen mo dang / ra mgo dmar ser chen mo dang / bum sna sngo nag chen mo dang / gsus 'dzin sngo nag chen mo la sogs pa dang / yang bran dang / g.yog dang / yang g.yog la sogs pa 'khor zhing gi rdul kyang
114b3(1): bsdus so// de nas yang dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal po de nyid dgyes pa bla ma'i gsang ba chen po sprin 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mngon par 'du mdzad de sku gsung thugs bla ma las 'di dag phyung
114b4(1): ngongo// oM AHhUM/ badz+ra pad+ma pra be sha pad+ma hUM a la la ho zhes brjod pas 'byung po ma rungs pa thams cad shin tu chags pa'i yid g.yos nas gsang ba rgyas par byas nas khab len gyi rdo la lcags 'du ba'i tshul du
114b5(1): bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po'i sku la mi srun mo la sogs pa brgyad 'khril lo// bcom ldan 'das ser nag chen po'i sku la tshangs ma la sogs pa lnga 'khril lo// bcom ldan 'das sngo nag chen po'i sku la
114b6(1): bdudad rtsi mo la sogs pa lnga 'khril lo// bcom ldan 'das dmar nag chen po'i sku la khrag gis myos ma la sogs pa lnga 'khril lo// bcom ldan 'das ljang nag chen po'i sku la me mo la sogs pa lnga 'khril
115a1(1): lo// de nas dgyes pa chen po de dag gis hUM zhes brjod pas pad+ma'i tshogs bsdus te shin tu bcum par gyur to// de nas dgyes te ha ha zhes brjod pas nyid kyi shes pa'i tshogs rnam par shes pa
115a2(1): brgyad las dkar po la sogs pa brgyad rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas te 'thon par gyur to// 'thon nas kyang 'khor lo 'bar ba'i phyi rol shar phyogs nas 'khor bar khro bo'i gzugs kyis snying rje
115a3(1): 'jigs tshul gyis stan la gnas so// de nas dgyes te he zhes brjod pas nyid kyi shes pa'i yul brgyad las seng gdong chen mo la sogs pa brgyad rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas te 'thon nas yang 'khor
115a4(1): lo 'bar ba'i bar khyams su snying rje 'jigs pa'i tshul gyis stan la shin tu rngam pa'i stabs kyis gnas so// de nas dgyes te phaT ces phyogs bcu'i zhing ma lus par bsgrags pas phyogs bcu'i zhing ma lus pa
115a5(1): na 'gro ba rnams kyi don ma lus par mdzad pa thub pa chen po drug bcom ldan 'das drug 'gro ba rnams kyi don mdzad cing 'gro ba drug 'dul ba dang / yid chos dbyings nas rol te sgor byed nyi zer zhags pa
115a6(1): can la sogs pa brgyad du gyur te// 'bar ba'i bar khyams gsum pa la zhing skam gsher spel ba'i gdan stengs su rang gi lag cha dang shin tu rngam pa'i stabs kyis shar phyogs nas 'khor bar gnas so// de
115b1(1): nas dgyes te phaT ces brjod pas nyid kyi phyin ci log bzhi las rdo rje srings 'gro ma la sogs pa bzhi rang rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar du chas nas dkyil 'khor 'bar ba chen po'i sgo bzhir snying rje 'jigs
115b2(1): tshul gyi stan la shin tu rngam pa'i gzugs kyis thabs dang shes rab kyi tshul du gnas so// de nas dgyes pa chen po'i sprin las/ bud+d+ha rol pa'i phyag rgya bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis dus gcig tu phaT ces brjod
115b3(1): pas thams cad khros nas 'byung mo thams cad kyang rang gi gnas su yud tsam gyis phyin par dgye'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung chen po de nyid thugs rje chen pos bdud rtsi 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i
115b4(1): dgongs pa cig char zhugs te sku gsung thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo // oM badz+ra a mr-i ta ma hA kro d+hi aM aM zhes brjod pas dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa thams cad bcom ldan 'das khrag 'thung chen po'i
115b5(1): snam logs nas 'thon to// 'dam khu blud de dran pa rnyed do// de nas khrag 'thung chen po de dag kun ya mtshan chen por gyur te cho 'phrul chen po mdzad pa mthong ngo // de dag gi dus su 'jig rten drug na gnas
115b6(1): pa'i dregs pa chen po rnams dus gcig tu btul bar mthong ste/ shin tu zhum zhing breng nas mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ 'bangs su mchi 'bangs su mchi// 'bangs su nan tan ma bgyis na// mgo dang lus kyang
116a1(1): brgyar 'gas shing // snying yang gas shing gtubs gyur cig/ rul myags tshig nas rlag pa dang // dmyal bar lhung nas 'bod par shog/ ces 'bangs su mchi bar rang rang gis dmod btsugs
116a2(1): so// de nas de dag kun dkyil 'khor gyi gdan du bzhag go/ de nas yang de thams cad kyis mgrin gcig tu smras pa/ rang rang gi chung ma dang / bu mo dang / rang rang gi ma dang / sring mo rnams dkyil 'khor du
116a3(1): phul te/ bdag cag rnams kyi mchis brang dang // ma dang sring mo bu mo rnams// dkyil 'khor chen por bzhes su gsol// dpa' bo lha rjes bzhes su gsol// bdag cag 'khor tshogs thams cad
116a4(1): kyis// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di// ming tsam 'dzin par su bgyid pa// nor bu rin chen 'bar ba ltar// de yi dgos pa rdzogs par bgyings/ ces dmod btsugs so// de nas de'i ma dang / sring mo
116a5(1): dang / chung ma dang / bu mo rnams yud tsam gyis phyin par 'ongs nas las kyi dngos grub stsol ba las// de nas khrag 'thung ye shes chen pos ming btags/ lag tu rdo rje byin nas rdo rje bran dang pho nyar dbang
116a6(1): bskur ro// de nas dkyil 'khor 'bar ba chen po'i don phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la gsal zhing 'bar bar bya ba'i phyir ye shes rgyal mo de nyid kyi gsang ba'i rgyal mo dang gnyis su
116b1(1): med par gyur nas sku gsung thugs rdo rje bla ma las 'di dag phyung ngo // e ma'o ye nas gsang ba'i chos// mkha' dbyings gnyis su med pa las// mkha' la bla ma'i dkyil 'khor shar// khri btsugs nyi dkyil
116b2(1): gdan stengs su// de la lha tshogs gdan du bting // hUM 'khor lo 'bar ba'i lte dbus su// khri bshams nyi dkyil ya bdud gdon// de yi steng du bsam bya ba// byang chub sems las sku bskyed pa// dpal chen
116b3(1): bla med he ru ka/ dbu dgu phyag kyang bcwa brgyad de// spyan yang 'bar ba nyi shu bdun// dbu la rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan gsol// zhabs kyang rnam pa brgyad du gtams// rdo rje mthing ga khyung gi gshog/ 'jig rten
116b4(1): khams kyang yog par bkab// sbrul nag 'jigs su rung ba dang // dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o// dbu gsum dang la byung ba ni// g.yas dkar g.yon dmar dbus mthing zhal// rnam par thar pa'i dbu
116b5(1): gsum gyis// khams gsum mya ngan zlo ba'i zhal// dbu gsum bar nas rngam pa ni// g.yas sngo g.yon ldang dbus mthing zhal// thabs dang shes rab sems kyi dbu// srid gsum dbyings su rdzogs pa'i
116b6(1): zhal// dbu gsum mtha' nas rngam pa ni// g.yas mthing g.yon mthing dbus mthing zhal// khams gsum re ba skong ba yi// lung dang man ngag sems kyi dbu// 'gyur ba med pa'i mthing nag zhal// skye shi rtsa ba
117a1(1): gcod pa'i tshems// dbu dgu rol pa'i byin brlabs las// g.yas gsum glog stong lce 'byin cing // g.yon gsum 'brug stong sgra sgrogs pa// dbu gsum rdo rje ser chen 'beb// spyan dgu dang
117a2(1): la gzigs pa ni// chos dbyings kun du bzang po dang // kun du bzang mo'i mkha' dbyings la// 'gyur ba med pa'i tshul gyis gzigs// spyan dgu bar nas gzigs pa ni// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes
117a3(1): kyis// srid pa'i sems can thams cad la// byams mgon snyoms pa'i spyan gyis gzigs// spyan dgu mtha' nas gzigs pa ni// g.yas gsum zhe sdang khros pa'i spyan// gzigs pas bdud dang mu stegs
117a4(1): sgrol// g.yon gsum byams mgon snyoms pa'i spyan// gzigs pas mtha' yas bde la 'jog/ dbu gsum ye shes rol pa'i spyan// gzigs pas skye 'gro gnas su stobs// dbu dgu rigs lnga'i dbu rgyan
117a5(1): dgu// lnga dgu bzhi bcu rtsa lnga yang // bud+d+ha bzhi bcu rtsa lngas brgyan// stong pa chen po'i ye shes kyis// khyab bdal chen po'i rtags su bsnams// bcwa brgyad phyag na rol pa yis// stong pa bcwa brgyad dbyings su
117a6(1): sbyor// zhabs brgyad nga rgyal dregs pa 'joms// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa yis// rdo rje mthing ga gshog pa brkyang // bcwa brgyad phyag na bsnams pa yis// rdo rje glo snying zhing chung g.yas// b+han d+ha zhing chen
117b1(1): snyir chen g.yon// nang zhags nyi ma khyung chen g.yas// zhing chen zla ba 'ug pa g.yon// me dang rgya mtsho ga'u g.yas// rlung dang rin chen ri rab g.yon// yon tan bcwa brgyad dbyings su rdzogs// dang po rdo rje dung
117b2(1): chen ni// khams gsum dbang du bsdus nas kyang // bdud dang mu stegs kun 'joms pa'o// gnyis pa stir chen glo snying ni// srid pa'i sems can thams cad kun// dam tshig sta na dbyings su sgrol// gsum
117b3(1): pa stir chung ril ming ni// dug gsum rnam par sgrol ba'i rtags// bzhi pa stir chen nang zhags ni// rgyud lnga'i sems can dbyings su 'dren// lnga pa nyi zla zung du 'dzin// byang chub sems las g.yos pa
117b4(1): med// drug pa khyung dang 'ug pa ni// mkha' 'gro thams cad 'khol ba'i rtags// bdun pa me dpung rlung gis 'thor// srid pa'i bag chags thal bar rlog/ brgyad pa ri rab rgya mtsho rnams// thams cad ma lus
117b5(1): g.yeng gnas shing // 'byung ba lnga la mnga' brnyes pa'o// dgu pa rin chen ga'u ni// dngos grub sprul pa 'byung ba'i rtags// dgu gnyis zung du ldan pa las// stong pa bcwa brgyad dbyings su rdzogs// dur khrod
117b6(1): rgyan gyi brgyan pa ni// thod skam 'bar ba phreng ba yis// zhi ba phyogs gcig mya ngan zlo// mngon par rdzogs pa'i sku brnyes pa'o// thod rlon 'bar ba'i phreng ba 'di// khams gsum dbang du bsdus nas su// sbrul
118a1(1): pa'i sku la mnga' brnyes pa'o// thod pa phyed tshal phreng bas ni// dug lnga bdud rtsir sbyor ba ste// longs spyod sku la mnga' brnyes pa'o// zhing chen rlon pa'i na bza' ni// chos dbyings mnyam pa chen
118a2(1): po ste// chos kyi sku la mnga' brnyes pa'o// stag lpags g.yang gzhi'i sham thabs ni// phrin las rnam bzhi'i rang bzhin te// rdo rje'i sku la mnga' brnyes pa'o// sbrul nag chun 'phyang mang po ni// ye shes thams cad
118a3(1): 'byung ba'i rtags// rtags chen sku la mnga' brnyes pa'o// zhabs brgyad lha brgyad brdzis pa ni// nga rgyal can rnams tshar gcod pa'o// sangs rgyas khros pa'i rgyal mo ni// kro d+hi shwa ri yum gyi gtso// mthing nag
118a4(1): 'ar ba'i ral pa can// rgyan dang cha lugs gtso dang mthun// 'khril ba chen po'i tshul gyis su// b+ha na d+ha rak+ta gtso la stobs// 'khril ba chen po'i tshul du bsam// shar phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs
118a5(1): khri dang nyi dkyil nyi zla'i gdan// de yi steng du bsam bya ba// gzugs kyi phung po gnas gyur pa// khrag 'thung bud+d+ha he ru ka/ dbu gsum phyag drag zhabs bzhir bgrad// g.yas ljang g.yon sngo dbus ser
118a6(1): zhal// phyag drug mngon par rol pa las// 'khor lo dgra sta zhags pa g.yas// b+ha na d+ha rnge'u chung kha T+wAM g.yon// ser nag dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan// bde gshegs khros pa'i rgyal mo dang // 'khril ba chen
118b1(1): po'i tshul du bsam// lho phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs na// khri dang nyi dkyil gshin rje'i gdan// de yi steng du bsam bya ba// tshor ba'i phung po gnas gyur pa// khrag 'thung rat+na he ru ka/ dbu gsum phyag drug
118b2(1): zhabs bzhir bgrad// g.yas ser g.yon dmar dbus sngo zhal// phyag drug mngon par rol pa las// rin chen gshol dang gtun shing g.yas// b+han d+ha dgra sta rde'u chung g.yon// sngo nag dur khrod rgyan gyis ba
118b3(1): rgyan// rin chen khros pa'i rgyal mo dang // 'khril ba chen po'i tshul du bsam// nub phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs stengs su// khri dang nyi dkyil klu yi gdan// de yi steng du bsam bya ba// 'du shes phung po gnas gyur
118b4(1): pa// khrag 'thung pad+ma he ru ka/ dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// g.yas sngo g.yon dmar dbus ldang zhal// phyag drug mngon par rol pa las// pad+ma rnge'u chung spu gri g.yas// b+han d+ha kha TAM so phreng
118b5(1): g.yon// dmar nag dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan// pad+ma khros pa'i rgyal mo dang // 'khril ba chen po'i tshul du bsam// byang phyogs 'khor lo'i rtsibs steng na// khri dang nyi dkyil gnod sbyin gdan// de yi steng du
118b6(1): bsam bya ba// 'du byed phung po gnas gyur pa// khrag 'thung karma he ru ka/ dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// g.yas dmar g.yon ser dbus ldang zhal// phyag drug mngon par rol pa las// ral gri
119a1(1): zhags pa rnge'u chung g.yas// b+ha na d+ha thod dbyug kha T+wAM g.yon// ljang nag dur khrod rgyan gyis brgyan// las mchog khros pa'i rgyal mo dang // 'khril ba chen po'i tshul du bzhugs// 'khor lo 'bar
119a2(1): ba'i phyi rim na// me dpung 'bar ba'i gzhal yas na// mkha' dbyings gnyis su med pa las// mkha' las skyes pa'i phra men ma// shar phyogs su ni bsam bya ba// sa bdag bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// kun
119a3(1): gzhi gnas gyur phra men ma// rnal 'byor sngo nag go'u ri ma// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil// mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gsol// spyugs par glu blangs ha has bzhad// sti ra dbyug pa g.yas pa
119a4(1): na// b+ha na d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na// skye shi ma la brkyang bskum bzhugs// lho phyogs ngos su bsam bya ba// gsod skyen bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// rnam shes gnas gyur phra men ma// rnal 'byor ser nag tso'u
119a5(1): ma// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil// mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gsol// spyugs pas gla dbyangs ha has bzhad// thabs kyi mda' drangs g.yas pa na// shes rab bzhu bdungs g.yon pa
119a6(1): na// ya ma ye la brkyang bskum bzhugs// nub kyi phyogs su bsam bya ba// nyi ma bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// nyon mongs gnas gyur phra men ma// rnal 'byor dmar nag pra mo ha// ral pa kham nag gyen du
119b1(1): 'khyil// mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon// skyugs pas glu blangs ha has bzhad// chu srin rgyal mtshan g.yas pa na// b+han d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na// sUr+ya ye la brkyang bskum bzhugs// byang gi phyogs su
119b2(1): bsam bya ba// zla ba bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// reg bya gnas gyur phra men ma// rnal 'byor mthing nag be ta li// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'khyil// mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon// spyugs
119b3(1): pas glu blangs ha has bzhad// rdo rje rtse lnga g.yas pa na// stir chung mgo gcod g.yon pa na// tsan+da ye la brkyang bskum zhugs// shar lho mtshams su bsam bya ba// me lha bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// lta byed phra
119b4(1): men gnas gyur pa// rnal 'byor dmar nag puk+ka si// skra 'bar mche gtsigs rkan brdabs shing // dur khrod g.yang gzhi skrag pa gyon// skyugs pas glu blangs ha has bzhad// sti ra chen po g.yas pa na// tshems
119b5(1): bar rgyu 'dren g.yon pa na// ag+ne ye la brkyang bskum bzhugs// lho nub mtshams su bsam bya ba// bden bral bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// nyan byed gnas gyur phra men ma// rnal 'byor mthing nag sma sha
119b6(1): ni// ska 'bar mche gtsigs rkan brdabs shing // srog chags chen po g.yang gzhi gyon// spyugs pas glu blangs ha has bzhad// sti ra chung ngu g.yon pa na// tsit+ta phyung ba g.yas pa na// ni ri ti la brkyang bskum
120a1(1): bzhugs// nub byang mtshams su bsam bya ba// rlung lha bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// snom byed gnas gyur phra men ma// rnal 'byor ser nag tsaN+Da li// skra 'bar mche gtsigs rkan brdabs
120a2(1): shing // 'jigs su rung ba'i skrag pa gsol// sprugs pas glu blangs ha has bzhad// sti ra chung ngu g.yas pa na// b+han d+ha bcad pa g.yon pa na// ba ya be la brkyang bskum bzhugs// byang shar mtshams su bsam
120a3(1): bya ba// dbang ldan bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// myong byed gnas gyur phra men ma// rnal 'byor ldang nag g+has ma ri// skra 'bar mche gtsigs rkan brdabs shing // sti ra chen po'i shun pa gsol// sprugs pas glu
120a4(1): blangs ha has bzhad// b+han d+ha rak+ta g.yas pa na// rtse gsum 'khrug pa g.yon pa na// i shwa ra la brkyang bskum bzhugs// dkyil 'khor de yi phyi rim du// smug nag 'bar ba'i bar khyams na// gsang ba'i
120a5(1): mkha' las skur bskyed pa// shar gyi phyogs su bsam bya ba// dri za bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// kun gzhi yul las gnas gyur pa// phra men thogs med seng ge'i gdong // rnal 'byor ser nag seng ge
120a6(1): ma// mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon// phyag gnyis bsnol nas shin tu 'gying // sti ra chen po sprug cing gsol// in+d+ra ye la brkyang bskum bzhugs// lho yi phyogs su bsam bya ba// grul bum
120b1(1): bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// rnam shes yul la gnas gyur pa// phra men dpa' bo stag gi gdong // rnal 'byor dmar nag byA g+h+r-i ma// mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon// phyag gnyis gyad kyi 'dor
120b2(1): tshul gyis// stir chung bsgyur nas 'bru tshugs lha// ra tri'i gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// nub kyi phyogs su bsam bya ba// yi dwags bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// nyon mongs yul la gnas gyur pa// phra men
120b3(1): rtog 'dul wa yi gdong // rnal 'byor dmar nag sri ka ma// mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon// phyag gnyis stir chen nang grol 'dru// tri 'di gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// byang gi phyogs
120b4(1): su bsam bya ba// gnod sbyin bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// reg bya yul la gnas gyur pa// phra men btang snyoms spyang mo'i gdong // rnal 'byor mthing nag shra na ma// mche gtsigs rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi
120b5(1): gyon// phyag gnyis rol pa chen po yis// sti ra phyed mar btsal nas gsol// yak+Sha'i gdan la brkyang bskum bzhugs// shar lho mtshams su bsam bya ba// srin po bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// lta byed yul la
120b6(1): gnas gyur pa// phra men gzi brjid bya rgod gdong // rnal 'byor dmar nag kri ta ma// mchu brdar rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon// zangs gri rnon po g.yas pa na// rgyu zhags drang ba g.yon pa na// rak+Sha sa la
121a1(1): brkyang bskum bzhugs// lho nub mtshams su bsam bya ba// srin po bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// nyan byed yul la gnas gyur pa// phra men gsal byed dur bya'i gdong // rnal 'byor rnal ma kang+ka
121a2(1): ma// mchu brdar rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gsol// stir chung stod smad g.yas g.yon na// rngam pa'i tshul gyis phrag la bkal// rak+Sha sa la brkyang bskum bzhugs// nub byang mtshams su bsam bya ba// srin po
121a3(1): bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// snom byed yul la gnas gyur pa// phra men sa le bya rog gdong // rnal 'byor dmar nag kha khra ma// mchu brdar rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gyon// zangs gri dmar po g.yas pa
121a4(1): b+han d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na// rak+Sha sa la brkyang bskum bzhugs// byang shar mtshams su bsam bya ba// srin po bsgyel ba'i gdan stengs su// myong byed yul la gnas gyur pa// phra men rdzogs byed 'ug pa'i
121a5(1): gdong // rnal 'byor ldang nag hu lu ma// mchu brdar rkan brdabs g.yang gzhi gsol// rdo rje lcags kyu g.yas pa na// stir chung spyi 'joms g.yon pa na// rak+Sha sa la brkyang bskum bzhugs// 'bar ba'i bar
121a6(1): khyams tha ma la// thod skam 'bar ba'i gzhal yas na// zhing chen bsnol ma'i gdan stengs su// shar gyi phyogs su bsam bya ba// nyul byed yul la gnas gyur pa// spor byed chen mo mi zad ma// sna tshogs
121b1(1): 'gyur ba'i sku mdog ma// zhing chen rol pa'i skrag pa gsol// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar// spyugs pas glu blangs srid gsum 'bar// ha ha gad mos ye shes rol// nyi zer zhags pa g.yas pa na// b+han
121b2(1): d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na// ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs// lho yi phyogs su bsam bya ba// mi mgon thub pa gnas gyur pa// spor byed chen mo mdung thung 'phen// rnal 'byor ser nag nyul chen ma// ral pa
121b3(1): kham nag gyen du 'khyil// mi yi g.yang gzhi gos su gyon// spyugs pas glu blangs srid gsum sbyangs// ha ha gad mos mi rnams spor// rdo rje mdung thung g.yas pa na// b+han d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na// ro rlon steng du
121b4(1): brkyang bskum bzhugs// nub kyi phyogs su bsam bya ba// chos kyi dbyings las gnas gyur pa// spor byed rdo rje dril 'khrol ma// rnal 'byor mtshon du med pa'i sku// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar// chos nyid
121b5(1): dbyings kyi na bza' gsol// sprugs pas glu blangs stong khams spor// ha ha'i gad mos dbyings su sbyor// gsung bsgrags dril bu g.yas pa na// b+han d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na// ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum
121b6(1): bzhugs// byang gi phyogs su bsam bya ba// lha min thub pa gnas gyur pa// spor byed thod phreng skar mda'i gdong // rnal 'byor sngo nag nyul chen ma// srog chags chen po'i g.yang gzhi gyon// ral pa kham nag
122a1(1): gyen du 'bar// spyugs pas glu blangs khams gsum sbyangs// ha ha gad mos lha min spor// rdo rje skar mda' g.yas pa na// b+han d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na// ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs// shar
122a2(1): lho mtshams su bsam bya ba// lha 'dul thub pa gnas gyur pa// spor byed khyung thogs gnod sbyin ma// rnal 'byor mthing nag nyul chen ma// 'jigs byed g.yang gzhi gos su gyon// ral pa kham nag gyen du
122a3(1): 'bar// spyugs pas glu blangs stong khams grags// ha ha gad mos lha rnams spor// rdo rje khyung chen g.yas pa na// b+han d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na// ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs// lho nub mtshams su bsam bya
122a4(1): ba// yi dwags thub pa gnas gyur pa// spor byed me khyer glog phreng 'dzin// rnal 'byor dmar nag nyul chen ma// yi dgas mgrin rings g.yang gzhi gyon// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar// spyugs pas
122a5(1): glu blangs snang srid sbyangs// ha ha'i gad mos yi dgas spor// rdo rje glog phreng g.yas pa na// b+han d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na// ro rlon steng du bkrung bskum bzhugs// nub byang mtshams su bsam bya ba// byol song thub
122a6(1): pa gnas gyur pa// spor byed 'jigs chen slog sha rdebs// rnal 'byor smug nag nyul chen ma// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar// slag chen brjid pa'i g.yang gzhi gyon// spyugs pas glu blangs stong khams
122b1(1): grags// ha ha'i gad mos byol song spor// rdo rje slag sha g.yas pa na// b+han d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na// ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs// byang shar mtshams su bsam bya ba// dmyal mgon thub pa gnas gyur
122b2(1): pa// spor byed gshin rje ral gri sgra// rnal 'byor sngo nag nyul chen ma// ral pa kham nag gyen du 'bar// gshin rje g.yang gzhi gos su gyon// sprugs pas glu blangs srid gsum sbyangs// ha ha'i gad mos dmyal
122b3(1): ba spor// rdo rje ral gri g.yas pa na// b+han d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na// ro rlon steng du brkyang bskum bzhugs// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor sgo bzhi la// phyin ci log bzhi gnas gyur pa// shar gyi sgor ni bsam bya
122b4(1): bapa// phag chen po yi gdan stengs su// rta gdongs srin mo'i g.yang gzhi gsol// rdo rje lcags kyu g.yas pa na// b+ha na d+ha rak+ta g.yon pa na// phag chen po yi gdan stengs su// stobs chen khro bo chen po
122b5(1): dang // 'khril ba chen po'i tshul du bzhugs// rngam pa'i tshul gyis phyir bltas pa'o// lho yi sgor ni bsam bya ba// ra gdong chen mo'i gdan stengs su// phag gdong chen mo'i g.yang gzhi gyon// lcags kyi dril
122b6(1): zhags g.yas pa na// b+han d+ha rlon pa g.yon pa na// ra gdong chen mo'i gdan stengs su// khro chen gshin rje gshed po dang // 'khril ba chen po'i tshul gyis su// rngam pa'i tshul gyis bltas pa'o// nub kyi sgor ni
123a1(1): bsam bya ba// bum rna chen mo'i gdan stengs su// dred gdong chen mo g.yang gzhi gyon// lcags sgrog me 'bar g.yas pa na// b+han d+ha rlon pa g.yon pa na// srin po bum rna'i gdan stengs su// khro
123a2(1): chen rta mgrin chen po dang // 'khril ba chen po'i tshul gyis su// rngam pa'i tshul gyis phyir bltas pa'o// byang gi sgor ni bsam bya ba// gsus po che yi gdan stengs su// sbrang gdong chen mo g.yang gzhi gyon// dril
123a3(1): bu thal chen g.yas pa na// b+han d+ha rlon pa g.yon pa na// gsus po che yi gdan stengs su// khro chen bdud rtsi 'khyil ba dang // 'khril ba chen po'i tshul gyis su// rngam pa'i tshul gyis phyir ltas pa'o// ho badz+ra gu h+ya
123a4(1): tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po'i de kho na nyid nges pa sgyu 'phrul bla ma chen po las bdud btul ba dang nyid kyi sku gsung thugs kyi che ba'i yon tan phyogs bcur gsal ba'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas
123a5(1): dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal po de nyid gsung gi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di yang dag par grags shing dam tshig rjes su 'dzin pa'i dgongs pa rtser chib nas sku gsung thugs rdo rje las 'di dag phyung ngo // bruM bi
123a6(1): shwa kro d+ha badz+ra dza la maN+Da la tsakra hUM/ phaT phaT phaT/ ha la ha la du tri tsakra nA na/ sUr+ya tsan+da pad+ma de ba tiSh+Tha nAn/ hUM hUM ha ha hUM hUM badz+ra ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT/ hUM badz+ra d+ha ra ma
123b1(1): hA kro d+hI shwa ri dza la ni hUM phaT/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT/ oM sarba ta thA ga to bud+d+ha/ ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dza la ni hUM phaT/ oM tAM rat+na ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da
123b2(1): sarba duSh+TAn ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT/ trAM sUr+ya rat+na ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dza la ni hUM phaT/ oM hrIHpad+ma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT/ hrI shwa pad+ma ba mu ka ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dza la ni hUM
123b3(1): phaT/ ha karma ma hA shri he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn ka ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM phaT/ karma ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dza la ni hUM phaT/ badz+ra ke'u ri ha/ badz+ra tse'u ri ha/ badz+ra pra mo hwe ha/ badz+ra be tA li ha/ badz+ra puk+ka si ha/
123b4(1): badz+ra g+hasma ri ha/ badz+ra sma sha ni ha/ badz+ra tsaN+Da li ha/ badz+ra sing ha mu kha he/ badz+ra byA g+h+r-i mu kha he/ badz+ra sri la mu kha he/ badz+ra shwa na mu kha he/ badz+ra gr-i d+ha mu kha he/ badz+ra kang+ka mu kha he/ badz+ra gA ka mu kha he/ badz+ra hu lu ka mu kha he/
123b5(1): badz+ra Ar+ya te tsa ti pa tsa/ badz+ra a mo g+ha hAM/ badz+ra A lo ka baM/ badz+ra b+ha smi pA la ya ba to ho/ e h+ye hi pri ta ar+ya ni tsa tu ra ba ya phaT/ badz+ra be yo gi pra ti Ar+ya ni tsa tu ra thA a hUM phaT// badz+ra mu a ni a pra ti Ar+ya ni pa
123b6(1): shi ka ra phaT/ badz+ra mu ni a pra ti Ar+ya pa ni shi ka ra phaT/ badz+ra mu ni a suM ba a ni ba shi ka ra phaT/ badz+ra mu ni a pra ti Ar+ya ni traM su pa shi ka ra phaT/ badz+ra mu tri ni a pra ti Ar+ya ni pa shi ka ra phaT/ badz+ra mu ni a du
124a1(1): pri ti a ni pa shi ka ra phaT/ e h+ye hi A na ya ho/ oM ru lu ru lu hUM b+h+yo hUM/ dzaHhUM baM hoHbadz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya hUM phaT ces gsung gi dkyil 'khor gyis stong gsum gyi dkyil 'khor khyab par dus gcig
124a2(1): khyab par grags pa dang / dam nod pa bka' nyan gyi tshogs ma'i srin mo la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang so so'i srog gi snying po phul lo// badz+ra ma nu rak+Sha si/ badz+ra pra ma ni/ badz+ra ro tri/ badz+ra biSh+Ta be/ badz+ra bing ga laM/
124a3(1): badz+ra ke ma ri/ badz+ra in+d+ra na/ badz+ra su ra ya tra/ badz+ra so hu mya/ badz+ra a mr-i ta/ badz+ra da na ta/ badz+ra rAk+Sha si/ badz+ra bak+Sha si/ badz+ra ra ti haM/ badz+ra ru ti haM/ badz+ra e ka tsa raM/ badz+ra ma no ha raM/ badz+ra sa na d+hi haM/ badz+ra ba ya bya/
124a4(1): badz+ra ma hA ma ra ma na/ badz+ra ag+ne ye/ badz+ra tsa mun+ti/ badz+ra pu tra na/ badz+ra ba ru Ni/ badz+ra ma hA ka la/ badz+ra tik+Sh+Na baM/ badz+ra laM po d+ha ra/ ye shes rgyal po dgongs su gsol// khro la khros pas zhi mdzad pa/ thugs rjes khro
124a5(1): dpal rngam pa'i tshogs// 'bar ba'i byin brlabs rmad po che/ de nyid du ni bdag la stsol// oM badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya hoHbadz+ra sa ma ya phaT/ a li u li ta li ta pa li daM staM kho na ro tri kha raM yo ga ni
124a6(1): kha raM hUM ha he phaT ces brjod pas/ 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu kun/ tshig cing 'phar bas thams cad khyab// gsung gi khro tshogs chen po yis// kun du khyab cing gang gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das
124b1(1): dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal po de nyid kyi de dag gi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir nges par brjod pa 'di brjod do// 'bar ba'i 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi pa// gru chad bzhis brgyan par khyams dang // gru bzhi sgo
124b2(1): khyud bzhi dang ldan// 'bar ba'i bar khyams gsum gyis mdzes// thod sbrul sna tshogs nyi mas brjid// 'bar ba'i phreng ba mang po 'khrug/ khyu mchog ma he gzig dang stag/ gtum pa dom gyi sbar bas ni// dbang
124b3(1): phyug lha chen la sogs pa// dregs pa chen po gtum tshogs mnan// gdan du byas te sku bzhugs pa// spug nag sngo nag ser nag dang // dmar nag ldang nag 'jigs pa'i gzugs// dbu dgu phyag ni bcwa
124b4(1): brgyad dang // dbu gsum phyag drug zhabs bzhir bgrad// rngam pa'i sgra chen 'jigs par sgrogs// stag lug sbrul dang nyi mar chas// sti ra che chung nang zhags dang // khyung dang yid bzhin nor bu dang // stong gi
124b5(1): 'jig rten khor yug bcas// rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang // ral gri dgra sta bshol la sogs// rang gi lag cha sna tshogs dang // btsun mo 'jigs pa'i tshogs dang bcas// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya
124b6(1): dang // sbor byed chen mo brgyad rnams dang // dbyug pa mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin// sgo bzhi'i phyag rgyar mdzes pa dang // lcags kyu la sogs thod pas mdzes// slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs// bcu gnyis dang
125a1(1): ni brgyad kyis mdzes// rang gi stan dang lag char chas// ci bgyi zhes ni chas te gnas// zhes gsungs pa dang / 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du/ sku gsung thugs bsam gyis mi
125a2(1): khyab pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis gang zhing khyab par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po de nyid don yod pa'i 'bras bu chen po dam tshig chen pos gzung ba'i phyir 'da' bar dka' ba'i dam tshig rdo rje
125a3(1): 'di gsungs so// bla med mi spong bla ma bkur// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad// yang dag lam du zhugs la byams// gsang ba'i don phyir sgra mi bya// rtsa ba'i dam tshig chen po ni// gdong chen bcu yi don
125a4(1): rtogs kyang // rtsa ba gsum po mi 'da'o// yan lag dam tshig lnga gnyis ni// gti mug 'dod chags zhe sdang dang // nga rgyal phrag dog mi spong ngo // dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri sha chu// dag pa'i snod bcud mi dor
125a5(1): ro// spyi dpal bcu yi mnga' brnyes kyang // yan lag bcu po mi dor ro// gzhan yang yan lag dam tshig rnams// 'da' bar mi mdzad rdo rje dam/ sa ma ya ni rdo rje che// mi 'da' rgyal ba nyid kyi dam// bsam
125a6(1): rdzogs lhun grub che mthar phyin// srid gsum dag pa dbang chen sgyur// mi 'jigs kun tu bzang por spyod// theg pa mtha' yas 'dul ba'i thabs// ji snyed sdom pa mtha' las pa// ma lus rnam dag lhun gyis
125b1(1): rdzogs// nyams 'gyur nyes pa brjod mi lang // tshe zung bsam pa log pa dang // mya ngan sdug bsngal chen po dang // dmyal ba nyid ni rdo rje byed// dgu rdzogs bcur ldan gsum gyis sbyangs// bskang ba la sogs
125b2(1): mtha' yas mchog/ ces gsungs pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis 'dul bar 'gyur ro// sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma chen po las 'jigs byed chen po gsung gi dkyil 'khor dang dam
125b3(1): tshig rdo rje'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal po de nyid chos thams cad man ngag bla ma chen po'i snying po byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po'i ngang du snyigs ma
125b4(1): med par byung btab pa'i phyir sku gsung thugs bla ma chen po'i thig le chen po'i dkyil 'khor nas man ngag bla ma chen po'i snying po 'di phyung ngo // byang chub sems kyi bde chen la// rgyu rkyen rten dang len bcas
125b5(1): pa'i// skyon med thig le chen po las// ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs// phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs// 'dul ba dgongs pa gsang ba dang // rang bzhin gsang ba'i don rnams ni// yi ge tshig la
125b6(1): rab brten te// khong nas gab sbas don 'byin pa// ston pa rdo rje'i thugs la gnas// dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las
126a1(1): byung ba// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog/ dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i thig le dbyings// 'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum// byed pa rigs kyi gtso bo ste// byang chub sems kyi rdo rje'i
126a2(1): tshogs// dbang po yul dus rig pa'i rnams// bdag nyid chen po lhag par rdzogs// thugs kyi ye shes lngas blta zhing // snying po thig le mnyam sbyor bas// bde ba'i ye shes chen por rol// ye shes dgyes pa
126a3(1): chog tu 'bul// zad med zag pa med pa yi// bsod nams ye shes sgyu mar rol// rol mo'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas mchog/ gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings// phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa'i
126a4(1): dbyings// sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kun// ma lus bdag gis dbang sgyur ro// dbang sgyur ye shes rol pa yis// dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor
126a5(1): rdzogs// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// rdzogs chen rtogs pa chen po yis// rgyan du dkyil 'khor ma lus thogs// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor bas// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus
126a6(1): 'byung // phyogs bcu'i dkyil 'khor 'dul ba'i mgon// sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor ma lus sgrol// bya ba med pa'i dkyil 'khor spyod// ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// thos bsam bsgom pa'i mnyam sbyor
126b1(1): bas// rang byung kun nas lhun gyis grub// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rang bzhin rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor yin// rgyu rkyen rten dang ldan pa yi// thams cad byang chub sems kyi dbyings// byang chub
126b2(1): sems kyi bde chen gyis// dkyil 'khor thams cad dbyings su thim// thig le chen po bla ma las// sgyu ma byang chub lam du bstan// skyon dang yon tan thams cad kyang // byang chub thig le nyid kyi ngang // spyod pa
126b3(1): rnam pa nyid kyi yang // thig le chen po'i lam du nges// sgyu ma rol pa'i dkyil 'khor yang // thig le chen po'i dbyings su sbyor// sdom pa rnam pa bcu gsum dang // spyi yi dam tshig mtha' yas pa// thig le chen
126b4(1): po'i ngang du gsal// snod bcud 'jig rten ma lus pa// thig le nyid kyi rol pa'i dbyings// tshogs chen rnam pa gnyis po yang // byang chub sems kyi dbyings su nges// gzhal yas khang dang rgyan rnams
126b5(1): dang // cho 'phrul byang chub sems su thim// khro tshogs bdud 'dul rol pa yang // byang chub sems su nges pa yin// 'gro drug sems can gsum po yang // ye shes drug dang sku gsum du// nges pa'i thig le chen
126b6(1): po yin// lnga yi rten dang rkyen bzhi yang // dbyings kyi ma dang dus kyi sring // thig le chen po'i ngang du 'dus// snga phyi gsum dang yod med khams// sku gsung thugs su nges bstan pa'i// thig le byang chub sems
127a1(1): su nges// phung po khams dang skye mched kyang // phyag rgya bzhi bcu gnyis po yang // thig le nyid las gzhan na med// bzhi yi las dang gcig po yang // thig le sems kyi ngang du gsal// 'gro ba'i
127a2(1): don du 'byung ba yi// dgu dang stong phrag brgya bcu bzhi// byang chub sems las gzhan na med// bde skyid sdug bsngal mang po yang // rtogs pa bde chen dbyings kyi don// ye shes ye shes rol pa yang // rdo rje
127a3(1): snying po'i dbyings su nges// kun bzang rdo rje sems dpa' dang // dus gsum rgyal ba rgya mtsho rnams// nyag gcig yab tu nges par rdzogs// thar pa'i lam mchog dbyings kyi yum// kun du bzang mo la sogs
127a4(1): kyang // thig le ma yi ngang du gsal// gzhal yas khang dang dkyil 'khor dang // bzhugs gnas khyad par mang po yang // ye shes chen po'i gnas su bsdu// mchod pa'i rgyan dang longs spyod kun// rigs pa'i
127a5(1): byang chub sems chen po// cho 'phrul chen po'i ngang du 'dus// rgyu 'bras gnyis kyi ngo bo dang // chos so cog gi rang bzhin rnams// byang chub sems su nges pas na// dkar nag las kyis ma gsungs so// byang
127a6(1): chub sems kyi bde chen ni// ci yang med las cir yang snang // cis kyang ma bcos g.yung drung sku// cir mi mdzad la thams cad sgrol// dmigs pa med par kun la khyab// ma bskos rgyal po yang dag pa// ma
127b1(1): sbyasrungs ye shes snying po che// ma bsgoms cig car don nyid rdzogs// ma bsgrubs rgyal ba kun gyi gtso// ma sbyangs skyon dang yon tan med// tshig dang yi ges mi mtshon te// sangs rgyas nyid kyis rnyed par
127b2(1): dka'// kun bzang rdo rje sems dpa' yis// rnyed nas rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor spyod// spyod pas 'gro ba sgrol ba ste// de la nyes pa'i skyon mi mnga'// zhes gsungs pas/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin
127b3(1): gshegs pa thams cad dbyer med par dgyes nas stug pos brgyan pa'i rgyan nyid du bzhugs so// sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma chen po las man ngag snying po byang chub sems bde ba chen po'i le'u ste bcu gcig
127b4(1): pa'o// // de nas yang ye shes rgyal po de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dgongs pa yang dag pa'i phrin las chen po 'di ma byon pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi ched du sku gsung thugs yon tan
127b5(1): phrin las rdo rje las phung ngo // e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'bar ba gtum chen rngam pa la// khros pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// sangs rgyas bsod nams sku yang 'jig/ bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga
127b6(1): la// mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya// bkug nas rdo rje'i phur pas gdab// rdul du byas nas tshogs la 'bul// e yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas// bcings gyur bskyod nas
128a1(1): phyogs bcur g.yos// myos 'gyur gas te tshig par 'gyur// baM gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'bar ba'i gzi brjid lhun chen la// chags pa'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// rdo rje gsum yang
128a2(1): dbang du 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga la// mtshan ma ming du bcas par bya// rdo rje chags pa'i phur pas gdab// chags pa'i tshogs la thim par dbul// baM gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud du
128a3(1): sbrel bsdams nas// ci 'dod de bzhin byed par 'gyur// ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'bar ba'i 'du 'phro'i gzi chen la// dga' ba'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang
128a4(1): mnyam// bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga la// yon tan yid bzhin gter du brtag/ nga rgyal dga' 'phro'i phur pas gdab// rdo rje gzi brjid 'phel bar brtag/ ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud du sbrel
128a5(1): bsdams nas// gzi brjid 'bar ba'i 'phrul chen spro// yid bzhin nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ gsal ba'i gzi brjid 'tsher ba la// dang ba'i yid kyis mchod sbyin
128a6(1): bya// gtum chen rngam po'ang lha ner 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga la// gtum chen 'khrug pa'i ngo bor brtag/ lhan ner gsal ba'i phur pas gdab// 'bar ba lha ne'i tshogs la 'bul// ya yi tshogs kyi
128b1(1): dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams nas// 'bar ba lha ne'i byin gyis khyab// thams cad g.yo ba med par 'gyur// a/ thams cad rdzogs pa chen po ste// las su ma gyur gcig kyang med// las kyi
128b2(1): khyad par rdzogs pa yi// srid pa gsum du bsdus pa rnams// byin gyis ma brlabs gcig kyang med// rdzogs pa chen po'i phrin las kyis// sbyangs pas bsam rdzogs lhun gyis grub// ho/ slas dang byi mo bran
128b3(1): mo'i tshogs// lhag ma kha chu 'dod pa sbyin// rang gi dam tshig rab bsgrubs te// gang 'dod las de byed par bsgo// khrag 'thung chen po la sogs te// bro gar gla tshig chen mos ni// ji ltar 'dod pa thams cad
128b4(1): kun// thams cad ma lus byed pa yin// mdzod ldan chen mo la sogs te// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// 'du bar 'dod na 'du bar byed// 'phel bar 'dod na 'phel bar byed// lbos mo chen mo la sogs
128b5(1): te// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// rmongs par 'dod na rmongs par byed// myos par 'dod na myos par byed// seng gdong chen mo la sogs te// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// thams cad kun la za bar
128b6(1): byed// rdul cha tsam yang med par byed// bzhad gdong chen mo la sogs te// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// thams cad kun la 'byin par byed// kun la rab tu nyams par byed// a/ spor byed chen mo la
129a1(1): sogs te// nyul byed chen mo brgyad rnams la// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// thams cad kun la nyul bar byed// ma lus gnas nas spor bar byed// slas dang byi mo bran ma'i tshogs// bro gar glu
129a2(1): tshig chen mos ni// sprad cing gtad par bya ba ste// thams cad ma lus byed pa yin// ljon shing dang ni lcug phran tshal// sdong gcig dang ni me reg tu// dang ba dga' ba chags pa dang // khros pas ka li rab tu
129a3(1): bya// zhes gsungs pas phrin las rnam pa bzhi sti ra'i rnga dang bcas par phyogs bcu 'jig rten gyi khams 'dul bar gyur te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das ye shes rgyal po 'jigs byed chen po de nyid dam tshig sti
129a4(1): ra'i rnga bla ma rdung zhing sti ra rngam pa'i mdangs 'di phyung ngo // e yi tshogs chen 'byam pa ru// sti ra'i rnga chen sgra bsgrags pas/ hUM ha he phaT sgra 'byin cing // yig 'bru brgyad kyi byin brlabs kyis// ru lu hUM b+h+yo'i
129a5(1): gsung sgrogs pa// khro bo rngam pa'i sgra skad kyis// srid pa gsum char bshig nas kyang // stong gsum bskal ba'i sgra 'byin pa'o// sti ra rnga chen 'di brdungs pas// gnod sbyin srin po kun bsgral te// mu stegs
129a6(1): kun gyi snying yang 'byin// sti ra'i rnga chen 'di bsgrags pas// stong gsum khro bo'i tshogs kyis bkang / kun kyang rnga brdung di ri ri// rnga sgra chen pos stong gsum bshig/ rnga sgra chen pos bdud dpung bsgral// rnga sgra
129b1(1): chen pos srid gsum sbyangs// rnga sgra chen pos dgra bgegs 'dul// rnga sgra chen pos ngan song sbyangs// rnga sgra 'brug gi sgra bsgrags pas// na rag dmyal khams stongs par byed// rnga sgra tug chem ri rab
129b2(1): rnyil// sti ra rnga chen sgra phyung bas// phyin ci log rnams snying yang 'byin// rnga chen 'brug gi sgra sgrogs shing // rnga thabs glog stong 'gyur ba bzhin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs dam bskang // ma mo mkha' 'gro'i
129b3(1): dam tshig bskang // rnal 'byor rnam lnga'i dam tshig bskul// sti ra rnga chen 'di brdungs pas// nyan thos mdo sde gnas nas sbar// rang rgyal lta ba dbyings su sgrol// sti ra'i rnga chen 'di bsgrags pas// lha dang mi
129b4(1): yi theg pa yang // bla med theg pa'i dbyings su btsud// sti ra rnga sgra 'di bsgrags pas// stong khams sti ra'i rnga sgras bkang // kun kyang rnga brdung di ri ri// rnga thabs glog stong lce 'byin cing // rnga skad 'brug stong
129b5(1): sgra sgrogs pas// byin brlabs lcags kyi ser chen 'bebs// stong gsum 'khrug cing srid gsum 'thor// rnga thabs g.yab mor bor ba dang // kha dang ka yi ru mtshon gyis// thams cad gnam lcags chen pos
129b6(1): btab// ka la chen po la sogs te// rdo rje chags 'og ldegs pa'i rnams// dus gcig tu ni tsit+ta 'byin// sti ra chen po'i rnga sgra yis// srid pa khrag gi rgya mtshor bskyil// dus gcig tu ni dbang chen rdzogs// rnga
130a1(1): sgra rin chen khang pa brtsegs// bsam rdzogs che la dbang zang thob// rnga sgras g.yo ba med par byed// chos la 'dzud pa'i sgra yang 'byin// rnga sgras ci 'dod dgongs pa rdzogs// byang chub sems
130a2(1): ltar de ma thag/ ces gsungs pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyi sbyor bar gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po ye shes rgyal po de nyid kyi dkyil 'khor bla ma chen
130a3(1): po man ngag gi snying po dang bcas pa de la shin tu rngam pa'i mdangs kyis dgyes pa chen po'i glu 'di blangs so// hUM gtum chen dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar// 'od zer nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi// khro gnyer glog stong 'grur
130a4(1): bab bzhin// mche ba zang yag za byed che// ho/ hUM rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong ldir// tug chem ri rab 'bum rnyil skad// a la la yi gad rgyangs che// sprugs pa'i 'thor rlung g.yeng ba che// ho/ hUM khro bo'i shes rab
130a5(1): 'od po che// ye shes dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal// 'bar ba'i ye shes kun du 'joms// sna tshogs ye shes thig le che// ho/ hUM/ khro bo'i rgyal po sprin chen po// khros pa'i dkyil 'khor char chen
130a6(1): 'bebs// dkyil 'khor yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gter// sna tshogs khros pa'i thig le che/ ho// hUM bdud rnams kun gyi bdud chen po// bdud kyi bdud ste bdud rnams 'joms// 'jigs pa'i tshogs kyang
130b1(1): 'jigs byed pa// 'jigs byed chen po bdal ba che// hUM rdo rje brag chen sra ba po// rdo rje chu bo sdud chen po// rdo rje me ste kun 'bar che// rdo rje rlung ste 'thor rlung che// ho/ hUM stong gsum khro bo'i dkyil 'khor
130b2(1): tshogs// 'jigs byed mtshon du med pa'i sku// sna tshogs gsung dang sna tshogs thugs// 'jigs byed rngam pa'i ye shes gter// ho zhes blangs pas stong gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jigs byed chen po
130b3(1): rnams dbyer med pas mnyes par gyur to// sgyu 'phrul dra ba bla ma chen po las lhun gyis grub pa'i phrin las dang yongs su mnyes pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // rdo rje sems dpas gsungs pa'i
130b4(1): don// gsang ba kun gyi bla ma ste// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyal po yin// nges don chos kyi snying po las// 'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon dang // dam tshig sgrub dang grub pa dang // sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud// sgyu
130b5(1): 'phrul dra ba las 'phros te/ sde snod kun dang rgyud kun yang // 'byung nas gtan la nges par 'bebs// 'gro drug sems can gsum po yang // stan chen po'i dbyings su bstan// ling ga pad+mar bcas pa
130b6(1): yang // ga na chen po'i dbyings su sbyor// snang srid kha dog mang po yang // ga na chen po'i lam du bstan// rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po 'di// rtogs nas smra bar gang byed pa// de nyid nga yin dbang yang
131a1(1): rdzogs// rtag tu byang chub sems la gnas// tshe 'di nyid kyis mngon sangs rgyas// nor bu rin chen 'bar ba ltar// bsam pa thams cad yid bzhin 'grub// ces gsungs pas phyogs bcu dus
131a2(1): gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbyer med par dgyes te/ mnyam pa nyid kyi dbyings na lhun stug po bkod pa'i rgyan nyid du bzhugs so// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa'i sgyu 'phrul bla ma chen
131a3(1): po las/ gdeng chen po'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // rtogs pa'i rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i le'u stong phrag brgya pa las/ lung gi spyi sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsang ba gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges
131a4(1): pa'i bla ma chen po'i le'u las/ thams cad ma lus par 'phros pa de dag gi 'bras bu'i mchog rdzogs so// //
131b1(1): rgya gar skad du/ shrI gu h+ya gar+b+ha ta ta bi nish+tsa ya/ bod skad du/ dpal gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid rnam par nges pa/ bcom ldan dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bshad pa'i dus
131b2(1): na// de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das longs spyod chen po phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang / thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid//
131b3(1): ma lus mi lus lus pa med pa thams cad dang so so ma yin tha mi dad dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin te/ 'og min gyi gnas mtha' dang dbus med pa na gzhi tshad med pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo gsal ba la ye shes
131b4(1): rin po che 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang / rgya phyogs bcur yongs su ma chad pa/ yon tan dpag tu med par rgyas pa'i phyir gru bzhir gyur pa/ lhag pa'i ye shes rin po che'i glo 'bur gyis mdzad pa/ rtse mo phyogs
131b5(1): bcu dus bzhi'i sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa thams cad dang / so so ma yin ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i ye shes kun tu 'khyil ba/ ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes rin po che'i dbyibs dang kha dog
131b6(1): la sogs pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i bye brag dang khyad par du gyur pa/ sbags pa/ tshad dpag tu med pa/ ye shes rin po che sna tshogs pa'i phreng ba dang / chun 'phyang dang / shar bu'i rgyan dang / gzugs sna tshogs dang /
132a1(1): sgra sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs dang / ro sna tshogs dang / reg bya sna tshogs kyis phyogs bcur 'khrigs par rang byung la mi sgrib par gsal ba'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab par bklubs pa/ rnam
132a2(1): par thar pa bzhi'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i sgo khyud can// rnam par thar pa brgyad kyi rta babs dang ldan pa/ phyi dang nang med pa/ kun tu yang nang du gyur pa na mi 'jigs pa seng ge'i khri dang / stobs glang po che'i khri
132a3(1): dang / rdzu 'phrul rta'i khri dang de/ dbang rma bya'i khri dang / thogs pa med pa nam mkha' lding gi khri dang / rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor dang // gos pa med pa pad+ma rin po che'i gdan la sku
132a4(1): mdun dang rgyab med pa thams cad du zhabs thal le bar gsal zhing mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ thams cad du sku gsung thugs sna tshogs par kun du snang ba dang / thabs dang shes
132a5(1): rab kyi zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs kyi skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa/ ye shes drug gi phyag ye shes rin po che'i phyag rgya 'bar ba can/ sku gsung thugs bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i dbu gsum dang ldan pa/
132a6(1): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa tshor ba'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'du shes kyi rgyal po
132b1(1): dang / de bzhin gshes pa 'du byed kyi rgyal po dang / de dag kun kyang mthing ga dang / dkar po dang ser po dang / le brgan dang / ljang gu'i mdog tu 'tsher ba/ btsun mo dam pa snang ba'i dbyings dang / sra ba'i
132b2(1): dbyings dang / mnyen pa'i dbyings dang / dro ba'i dbyings dang / bskyod pa'i dbyings la sogs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med par chos kyi dbyings kun du mtha' yas par khyab pa ni 'di lta ste/ dper
132b3(1): na til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang nas khyab par bzhugs so// de nas byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong ba dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje thos pa dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje snom pa dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje myong ba
132b4(1): dang / btsun mo mthong bar bya ba dang / mnyan par bya ba dang / mnam par bya ba dang / myang bar bya ba'i tshogs dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong byed dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje thos byed dang / byang chub chen
132b5(1): po rdo rje mnam byed dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje myong byed dang / btsun mo 'das pa dang / da ltar dang / 'byung ba dang / ma byon pa'i tshogs dang / 'joms pa chen po reg pa dang // 'joms pa chen po reg byed
132b6(1): dang // 'joms pa chen po reg bya dang // 'joms pa chen po reg shes dang / btsun mo rtag par ma yin pa dang / chad par ma yin pa dang / bdag tu ma yin pa dang / mtshan mar ma yin pa la la sogs pa de lta
133a1(1): bu'i tshogs brjod kyis mi lang ba dang gnyis su med par bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba
133a2(1): 'di nyid sku dang / gsung dang / thugs dang / yon tan dang / phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo // e e e ma'o// de bzhin nyid dbyings nyid dbang sgyur// ye shes dkyil 'khor thugs rje'i ngang // rang snang ba nyid
133a3(1): ting nge 'dzin// gzugs brnyan sgyu ma rnam par dag/ gsal ba ni sku gsung thugs yon tan phrin las sel med pa'i yon tan yid bzhin rin po che mi zad par ldan pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo rdo rje mchog gi gnas
133a4(1): nyid do zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das byed pa po rdo rje yid kun du bzang pos thams cad ma lus
133a5(1): pa'i rang bzhin gyi tshul rdo rje btsun mo bya ba mo chos kun du bzang mo la 'jug par gyur to// zhugs pas phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad gcig gi rang bzhin dbyer med pas
133a6(1): de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o rdo rje phung po yan lag ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags// skye mched khams rnams mang po kun// byang
133b1(1): chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// sa chu spyan dang mA ma kI// me rlung gos dkar sgrol ma ste// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// srid gsum ye nas sangs rgyas zhing // thams cad ma lus chos so
133b2(1): cog/ sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan ma yin// sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan pa'i chos// sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi brnyes so// zhes brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyur to// de nas btsun
133b3(1): mo bya ba mo chos kun tu bzang mos/ bcom ldan 'das yid kun tu bzang po dang gnyis su med par gyur nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// kye ma phyogs bcu'i stong khams ye nas dben// srid pa gsum nyid
133b4(1): dag pa'i zhing // snyigs ma lnga nyid bde ldan gnas// phung po lnga nyid rdzogs sangs rgyas// thams cad mchog gi snying po bas// gzhan du rgyal ba'i chos mi btsal// nyid las gzhan zhes bya ba'i chos// btsal
133b5(1): kyang rgyal bas mi brnyes so// zhes brjod pas/ thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas par// de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to// de nas gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid chen pos ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i sems
133b6(1): ye shes su bskyed pa 'di gsungs so// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sogs rgyas kun gyi gsang // skye ba med las thams cad skye// skyes pa nyid na'ang skye ba med// e ma ngo mtshar rmad kyi
134a1(1): chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // 'gag pa med las thams cad 'gag/ 'gag pa nyid na'ang 'gag pa med// e ma ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi
134a2(1): gsang // gnas pa med las thams cad gnas// gnas pa nyid na'ang gnas pa med// e ma ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // dmigs pa med las thams cad
134a3(1): dmigs// dmigs pa nyid na'ang dmigs pa med// e ma ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // 'gro 'od med las 'gro dang 'ong // 'gro 'ong nyid na'ang 'gro 'od med// ces
134a4(1): brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / btsun mo'i tshogs thams cad kyang mnyes pas khyab par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pas ched du brjod
134a5(1): pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o ye nas gsang ba'i chos// sna tshogs snang la rang bzhin gsang // ngo bo nyid kyis rab tu gsang // gzhan du min la shin tu gsang // zhes brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
134a6(1): cad dang / chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ngo bo nyid du gcig pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas dbyer med na'ang / 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pa ma rig pa las 'gro ba lnga'i ris bsam gyis mi khyab par smin pa
134b1(1): la thugs rje chen po sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chen po skyes nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma bde gshegs snying po las// rang gi rnam rtog las kyis sprul// sna tshogs lus dang longs spyod dang // gnas
134b2(1): dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa// bdag dang bdag gir so sor 'dzin// sus kyang ma bcings bcings med de// bcing bar bya ba yod ma yin// rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin pa yis// nan gyis mkha' la mdud pa
134b3(1): dor// bcings med rnam par grol med pa'i// ye nas lhun rdzogs sangs rgyas chos// bstan phyir spro ba sna tshogs mdzad// ces de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du gleng ngo // gsang
134b4(1): bapaba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi byang chub kyi sems ye shes su bskyed pa'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las thugs rje chen po'i byin
134b5(1): brlabs zhes bya'i rigs pa'i skyes bu thub pa drug de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las 'thon to// 'thon nas kyang las kyi dbang gis snrel zhi dang yan man gyi 'jig rten drug gi
134b6(1): phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po re re thub pa bcom ldan 'das re res 'dul ba rnam pa bzhis 'gro ba lnga'i don mdzad de// bltams pa dang / rab tu byung ba dang / dka' thub
135a1(1): mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas pa dang / bdud btul ba dang / chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / cho 'phrul chen po ston pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs par ston pa'i thub pa dus bzhi kun tu
135a2(1): mkhyen pa dang / thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud kun tu mkhyen pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi spyan gyis thams cad kun tu gzigs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi snyan gyis kun tu gsan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho gas kun tu
135a3(1): don spyod pa dang / zag pa med pas kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa rdzogs pa'i mngon par shes pa chen po drug dang // kun tu sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun tu zugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun tu zhal
135a4(1): bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun tu gsung bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i grangs med pa phyogs bcur snang bar gyur to// thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ 'dul ba'i dbang gis lha
135a5(1): dang / mi'i theg pa dang / nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang // byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang / bla na med pa'i theg pas ma rig pa'i rnam par rtog pa nyon mongs pa stong phrag brgyad
135a6(1): cu rtsa bzhi'i gnyen por chos stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi gsungs so// gsung ngo // gsung bar 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad kyang gzung ba dang // 'dzin pa'i phyi nang gi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang / 'dzin
135b1(1): pa dang / 'phrul pa las 'dogs pa dang / las dang las kyi 'bras bu chud mi za ba dang / las dang las kyi 'bras bus mi gos/ gos par mi 'gyur/ gos su med par ston pa'i mthar zug go/ de nas de bzhin
135b2(1): gshegs pa thams cad kyis ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// ji snyed 'jig rten 'khrul pa'i chos// ma rig rtog pa'i gzung 'dzin gyis// phyi nang rten 'brel gnyis su 'khor// mi mthun bde sdug myong bar
135b3(1): 'gyur// rang bzhin nyid las nyams pa med// yang dag sgyu ma'i tshul gnyis su// bdag dang bdag gi gzhan med de// rnam dag dbyings nyid tshul gcig go/ bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams ni// log par
135b4(1): rtog pa tsam nyid las// phra zhing zab pa'ang yod ma yin// log rtog nyid la nyid spyod de// gzhan du g.yo ba ci yang med// log rtog rgyu 'bras rgyun nyid kyang // gzhi rtsa med dbyings skad cig ma// rnam par dag
135b5(1): pa'i dbyings nyid tshul// nyid la dbang sgyur nyid spyod phyir// bdag dang gzhan dang rtog pa'i rgyun// rnam dag bla med theg pa'i mchog/ theg pa bzhi yis nges 'byung la// theg pa gcig gis 'bras bur
135b6(1): gnas// yang dag rtogs pas rab brtags na// rang bzhin med las cir yang 'grub// sangs rgyas mya ngan yod mi 'da'// chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te// ma rig smin mdzad 'dul ba'i phyir// byung nas mya
136a1(1): ngan 'da' bar ston// 'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon dang // dam tshig sgrub dang grub pa dang // sku dang gsung dang thugs kyi rgyud// phyogs bcu rnams su rab grags pa// gsang ba'i snying po las
136a2(1): 'phros te// rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po 'di// sde snod kun dang rgyud kun gyi// 'byung gnas gtan la nges par 'bebs// chos rnams ming du btags pa tsam// ston pas don dang mthun phyogs su// ming dang
136a3(1): tshig tu btags nas bstan// ston min tshig la dngos po med// ces ched du brjod do// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku dang / gsung
136a4(1): dang / thugs dang / yon tan dang / phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo // a ho/ srid rtsa nyes dmigs bdag tu rtog las 'phros// rgyud drug skye 'gag lus dang longs spyod dang // gnas dang sdug bsngal 'khrul 'khor
136a5(1): la sogs pa// log rtog nyid las gzhan g.yo ci yang med// stong nyid bdag med ye mkhyen rang rig zugs// dmigs bya dmigs byed med par dran dbang sgyur// ngo mtshar sku gsung thugs dang yon tan phrin
136a6(1): las zhing khams las// gzhan na med de de nyid de ltar yin// zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o zhes brjod pas// thub pa drug gi sprul pa grangs med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa
136b1(1): yang de dag tu 'dus par de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las chos thams cad gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs
136b2(1): pa thams cad dgongs pa gcig tu gyur nas mnyam pa chen po'i tshul rdo rje'i dbyings su chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin las mi g.yo bar// chos thams cad ming tsam du gnas pa'i yi
136b3(1): ge phreng ba'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'di sku dang / gsung dang / thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // a rab tu brtan gyur a dkar las// shin tu phra ba'i a rnams spro// phyogs bcu gang bar gsal gyur nas// bsdus kyang
136b4(1): 'phel 'grib med par bstan// de las ming tshogs gsal 'bar kun// spro zhing bsdu ba'ang de bzhin no// 'di ni rdo rje dngos grub kyi// brtan byung ye shes rgyu yin no// a A/ ka kha ga g+ha nga / tsa tsha dza dz+nya nya/ Ta
136b5(1): Sha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya wa ra la/ sha Sha sa ha/ k+ShaH/ i I/ u U/ e e/ o o/ 'di dag phyung bas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa rnam pa drug tu g.yos// rab tu
136b6(1): g.yos// kun du rab tu g.yos nas/ chos thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid tsam du gyur to// hoH/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// a ni stong dang mi stong gi// dbu
137a1(1): ma'ang dmigs su yod ma yin// thams cad ming tsam sangs rgyas kun// yi ge phreng ba nyid la gnas// a nyid sna tshogs par snang ba'i// ka la sogs pa bzhi bcu gnyis// sgra yi ming gis thams
137a2(1): cad bsdus// mngon rdzogs rgyal por de nyid nges// e ma ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi// 'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i ming // tshig rnams ma lus 'dzin pa'i gnas// sna tshogs don chen smra zhing ston// dngos med yi
137a3(1): ge'i rang bzhin sems// bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs kyang // dbyibs dang kha dog ming tshogs kyis// rol pa cir yang sprul cing ston// phyogs bcu dus bzhir gshegs pa yi// ye shes sems dpa' sku
137a4(1): gsung thugs// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa lnga nyid// yi ge mgo nas k+ShaHla rdzogs// sems kyi rang bzhin yi ge ste// yi ge'i dngos po yod ma yin// dmigs med de nyid sna tshogs pa'i// sku gsung thugs kyi
137a5(1): 'khor lo che// sku gsung thugs ni ngo mtshar gyi// ngo mtshar 'phrul chen rab 'gugs pa// dbyings la dbyings kyis bris pa ste// yi ge zhes ni de phyir brjod// mgo ni ma nor lam yin te// tig ni shes rab ming
137a6(1): du smra// shad ni thabs chen tshigs su gcod// a ni skye med de bzhin nyid// A ni thog mtha' stong pa nyid// tha ni sgyu 'phrul rdo rje nyid// Ta ni snang ba'i sgyu 'phrul nyid// Da ni sgyu 'phrul yid bzhin nyid// D+ha ni sku
137b1(1): 'phrul snang bdag nyid// Na ni kun du sgyu 'phrul nyid// tha ni dra bas mngon rdzogs nyid// ta ni drA bas brtan pa nyid// da ni drabs lhan ne nyid// d+ha ni dra bas 'khril ba nyid// na ni dra bas kun du 'gyur// ka
137b2(1): ni spyan gyi thugs kyi mchog/ kha ni snyan gyi thugs kyi mchog/ ga ni shangs kyi thugs kyi mchog/ g+ha ni ljags kyi thugs kyi mchog/ nga ni thugs kyang 'jig byed pa'o// tsa ni spyan gyi sku yi mchog/ tsha ni snyan gyi sku yi/
137b3(1): mchog/ dza ni shangs kyi sku yi mchog/ dz+ha ni ljags kyi sku yi mchog/ nya ni sku'ang 'jig byed pa'o// pa ni spyan gyi gsung gi mchog/ pha ni snyan gyi gsung gi mchog/ ba ni shangs kyi gsung gi mchog/ b+ha ni ljags kyi
137b4(1): gsung gi mchog/ ma ni gsung yang 'jig par byed// ya ni skye ba rnam par dag/ wa ni gnas pa dag pa yin// ra ni 'jig pa dag pa ste// la ni stong pa dag pa'o// sha ni rtag pa med pa ste// Sha ni chad pa'ang yod
137b5(1): ma yin// sa ni mtha' bral bdag med pa// ha ni mtshan ma med pa nyid// k+Sha ni ye shes thugs kyi thugs// i ni rdul snyed lha rnams su// I ni rdul snyed lha ma yin// u ni rdul snyed mi rnams su// A ni rdul snyed
137b6(1): byol song rnams// e ni rdul snyed yi dwags su// e ni rdul snyed dmyal ba rnams// oM ni thams cad 'jig par byed// oM ni thams cad zhig pa yin// yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen 'di// sku gsung thugs kyi phreng
138a1(1): pas bsdus// zhes brjod do// a hoH// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang / gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyis gsang ba 'di nyid sku dang / gsung dang / thugs
138a2(1): dang / yon tan phrin las rdo rje las byung ngo // a hoH// thabs dang shes rab dgyes sprin byang chub sems tshogs rgyu 'khor lo// 'bras bu rgyal ba smin grub ngo mtshar ming tshogs bzhi bcu gnyis// 'dus ma byas
138a3(1): nyid 'dus byas rdo rje dkyil 'khor 'byin pa'i dam/ 'da' bar mi mdzad dpang med rgyu rkyen tshogs pa'i mthu chen yin/ hoH/ rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yi ge
138a4(1): 'khor lor gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las yi ge phreng ba'i 'khor lo bkod pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas yi ge 'khor lo sprin bkod pa las sgyu 'phrul rnam par 'phro ba 'di ched
138a5(1): du brjod do// rtsa ba med pa'i sems nyid ni// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba yin// sems nyid yi ge'i rang bzhin te// yi ge yid bzhin rin chen sprin// sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis// dra ba'i dkyil
138a6(1): 'khor mngon rdzogs pas// phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa yi// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// bdud rtsi 'gyur zhing 'byung ba dang // bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi'i nad sel cing // longs spyod 'byung ba
138b1(1): ngan song sbyong // cir yang gzhan du 'gyur ba 'grub// nam mkha' rdo rje sra 'byung zhing // 'bar nas me yang 'tshig pa dang // chur 'gyur 'bab pa'ang de bzhin te// 'jig rten khams 'di 'dor ba
138b2(1): dang // thams cad stongs shing ltung bar 'gyur// dgug dang btang dang bcing dang grol// gso dang gsad dang pham dang rgyal// ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur// de nyid ye shes rang snang ba'i// ming tshig
138b3(1): gzugs sogs yid bzhin gyis// mun la snang 'byung ji bzhin du// 'gyur bas gser 'gyur sman gyi tshul// ston pa mchod brtson rtogs pa gsal// dam tshig sngags dang phyag rgya rnams// ma nyams shes shing
138b4(1): yo byad ldan// 'grub 'gyur mi ldan med cing brlag/ dus gsum rgyal bas thugs chud pa'i// dngos grub mchog gi snying po ni// zad pa'i dus med yid bzhin mdzod// 'phel 'grib med par 'byung ba
138b5(1): ste// dngos po med las dngos po sprin// sna tshogs rnam par 'byung zhing 'gyur// dngos rnams nyid na dngos med par// rtog pa'i dbang sgyur ting 'dzin yin// gang gis dmigs med mi shes pa// de yis chos
138b6(1): kyi dbyings mi shes// de phyir dngos dang dngos med pa// 'jigs pas dmigs med shes par gyis// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni// pho mo ma yin ma ning min// mtshan med ma yin rigs rgyud min// kha dog
139a1(1): ma yin dbyibs ma yin// gnas su ma yin gang yang min// de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te// thabs kyis phyag rgya kun gyi rgyu// thabs las thabs 'byung thabs bsam yas// tha dad med la tha
139a2(1): da pa'i// nang dang nang gi phyi rol gyi// dkyil 'khor bsam yas ye shes rol// 'jigs med kun bzang phyag rgya'i mchog/ gang gis glang chen myos 'dra'i sems// mnyam par bzhag pas btul nas
139a3(1): su// sngags dang phyag rgya rab brtan na// dngos grub ya mtshan chen por 'gyur// zhes brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid gzigs mos mnyes par gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las sgyu
139a4(1): 'phrul bsgrub pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gcig dang du ma med pa'i bdag nyid chen po thams cad kyis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad la
139a5(1): nyid kyi che ba'i dkyil 'khor 'byung bar bzhed nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// ye shes phyogs bzhi dbus brtags te// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub// rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor
139a6(1): pas// kun 'byung dkyil 'khor chen por spyod// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas// gru chad bzhis brgyan par khyams ldan// kun du gru bzhi sgo khyud ldan// rol mo sna tshogs sprin phung bzhin// dkyil 'khor
139b1(1): bzhi bcu gnyis kyis brgyan// seng ge glang chen rta dang khyung // nam mkha' lding gi khri chen la// nyi zla pad+ma rin po che// gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa'i tshul// 'khor lo rgyal po rgyal mo dang // g.yas na
139b2(1): mthong thos snom pa dang // myong dang btsun mo'i tshogs su bcas// gru chad la ni mthong byed dang // thos byed snom byed myong byed rnams// btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas par gnas// bar khyams la ni thub drug
139b3(1): dang // mdun dang rgyab na byed pa dang // bya ba dag ni gnas par bstan// sgo khyud bzhi la 'joms pa ni// btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas// rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che// pad+ma ral gri dril bu
139b4(1): 'bar// ut+pal klu shing la sogs mtshan// mdzes tshul mnyes pa'i yo byad 'dzin// mthing ga dkar po ser le brgan// ljang gu la sogs sna tshogs pa'i// mnyes lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul can// gsal
139b5(1): 'tsher lhun stug gzi byin 'bar// 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs chen po// 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khrigs pa ste// mtha' dbus med par khyab pa yi// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub// sku yi phyag rgya che
139b6(1): mchog ni// de bzhin dbyings las ma g.yos kyang // yang dag thar pa'i gzugs skra dang // 'gro ba ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir// mthun byas skra ni sna tshogs ston// ston nyid sgyu ma mig yor tshul// tshul nyid
140a1(1): dbyings las g.yos pa med// ma g.yos bzhin du sna tshogs pa'i// de tshe mi mthun sna tshogs la// so so 'dra bar snang ba ni// de bzhin nyid kyis ma bcos kyang // las 'phro'i dbang gis so sor
140a2(1): snang // dper na me long chu zla bzhin// de tshe 'gro drug thams cad la// sdig spong gzugs su rnam par bstan// dge tshul rnams la dgra bcom gzugs// rang rgyal rnams la bse ru'i gzugs// gzhan
140a3(1): yang theg mchog rim pa bzhin// 'og min bla med gnas mchog tu// sku ni rnam par snang mdzad tshul// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams la// de bzhin gsung mchog mi smra ste// sku yis chos rnams mjal
140a4(1): bar ston// me long bstan pa'i tshul bzhin du// dngos kyi mdog ngan thams cad sel// 'khor gyis de bzhin sku bltas na// byang chub sgrib pa gting dpag med// me long bzhin du sku la snang // de nas sa bcu
140a5(1): rim gyis 'byang // bla med byang chub yang dag 'thob// chos sku dpag med brjod du med// longs spyod zad med rin chen gter// sprul pa bye ba bsam mi khyab// mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad rdzogs// spyod
140a6(1): yul kun tu maN+Da la// tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par rol// thabs dang shes rab sa yi mchog/ de la sogs te bsam yas mchog/ skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung sku// nyon mongs kun gyi zhing du gnas// zad
140b1(1): mi shes pa'i gter du 'gyur// rdo rje 'dzin pa rig pa'i sku// thams cad dbyer med mnyam pa'i sku// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sku// de tshe sku lnga kun kyang rdzogs// zhes brjod pas/ 'jig rten drug gi

140b4(1): 'khor sna tshogs brjod mi lang // mnyam dang mi mnyam kun khyab khyab med khyab pa'i dbyings// ye nas kun gsal dkyil 'khor rnam 'phro spros pa med// ho/ rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po

140b6(1): swa bi shud+d+he/ hUM badz+ra d+hika/ au dzi na dzi ka/ sAM rat+na d+h+r-i ka/ AM A ro li ka/ haM pradz+nyA d+h+r-i ka/ mAM d+ha tI shwa rI/ lAM dwe Sha ra ti/ mAM mo ha ra ti/ pAM rA ga ra ti/ tAM badz+ra ra ti/ k+Shau hi rA dza ya/ tAM A gar+b+ha ya/ hrIM ha hUM/ pad+ma ba daM ma/
141a1(1): dzI ku ru pA Ni hriH/ hAM lA s+ye sa ma ya stAM/ tAM mA l+ye sa ma ya hoH/ hrI gi ti rA go&haM/ AM nr-i t+ya rA ga yA mye/ me d+hA ra Ne swA hA/ b+hI nisma raM b+ha ya swA hA/ hUM sa rA dzA ya swA hA/ mr-i shrI aM rA gA ya sA hA/ dzeHd+hu pa pra
141a2(1): bi sa/ hUM puSh+pa a bi sa/ baM dI ba su khI ni/ hoHgan+da tsit+taM/ hAM ya man+ta kr-ita phaT/ oM pad+man+ta kr-ita phaT/ hUM pradz+nyAn+ta kr-ita phaT/ hUM bi kAn+ta kr-ita phaT/ oM ma hA badz+ra d+ha raM ma ha kro d+he shwa rI dza la ni hUM phaT/ oM ma hA rat+na d+ha
141a3(1): raM ma hA kro d+he shwa rI dza la ni hU~M phaT/ oM ma hA pad+ma d+ha raM ma hA kro d+he shwa rI dza la ni hUM phaT/ oM ma hA kar+m+ma d+ha raM ma hA kro d+he shwa rI dza la ni hUM phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badz+ra tsit+ta oM a a a badz+ra b+ha dra sa man+ta AH/ oM mu ne hU~M swA hA/
141a4(1): oM mu ne hUM swA hA/ oM mu ne suM swA hA/ oM mu ne graM swA ha/ oM mu ne k+ShaM swA hA/ oM mu ne ya swA hA/ oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn ma hA kA ru Ni ka dr-i sh+ya hoH/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dzaHhUM baM hoHoM AMHhUM swA hA/ ba ba ba ba ba/ pa pa pa pa
141a5(1): pa/ dza dza dza dza dza/ pa pa pa pa pa/ sa sa sa sa sa/ pa pa pa pa pa/ ma ma ma ma ma/ pa pa pa pa pa/ ya ya ya ya ya/ pa pa pa pa pa/ oM AMHhUM swA hA/ ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las rmad po
141a6(1): che// de nyid du ni mnyam sbyor ba'i// phyag rgya chen por bdag sbyor cig/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya hoH/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ zhes brjod pas gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di dag gis 'jig
141b1(1): rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad du khyab par grags so// rab tu grags so// kun du grags so// de nas bcom ldan 'das byed pa po rdo rje dang / bya ba mo rdo rje gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor la thim par
141b2(1): mdzad do// de nas phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag nyid chen pos bdag nyid chen po'i ye shes dang byin bsdu ba zhes bya ba 'di sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dra ba
141b3(1): las phyung ngo // oM ma hA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM ma hA A daR+sha dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM ma hA pra t+ya bek+Sha NA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM ma hA sa ma tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA pa At+ma ko&haM/
141b4(1): oM ma hA kr-i t+ya a nuSh+Ta na dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA ka ya badz+ra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA bA ka badz+ra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba

141b6(1): ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung // sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das// sna tshogs sgra rnams gsal bar 'byung // gsung gcig dkyil 'khor yan lag ni// bsam gyis mi khyab
142a1(1): kun du khyab// sgra dang ming tshig so sor grags// thams cad gsung gi phyag rgya'i mchog/ rgyud mchog sgyu 'phrul dra ba las// bde ldan gsung gi don 'byung ba'ang // thams cad pad+ma'i ngang gyur/
142a2(1): na// grol thar lam dang 'khor ba'i sgra// ji skad brjod kyang gsung mchog yin// theg pa mtho dman thams cad dang // log 'gro ma lus thams cad skad// byang chub rdo rje'i gsung du bsdus// bsdus nyid
142a3(1): phyogs bcur rnam par grags// grags nyid ma chags ngang du gsungs// gsung ba nyid na brjod du med// brjod med de nyid sna tshogs sgra// kun la grags shing so sor 'jal// dper na de bzhin sbrid sangs
142a4(1): bzhin// gsung gcig sgra yis thams cad go/ 'di ni gsung mchog rgyal po yin// theg pa mtho dman thams cad kyang // de bzhin nyid las ma gsungs te// 'dul ba'i thabs su so sor thos// ji ltar gsung
142a5(1): kun brjod kyang // de bzhin nyid las gsungs pa med// yi ge med dang rig pa'i gsung // ljags kyi rtse mor ma phyung yang // thugs rje gsung gi byin brlabs kyis// 'gro don sna tshogs so sor
142a6(1): gsal// gsal nyid gsung gi rdo rje mchog/ de bzhin gsung gi 'gro don rnams// de bzhin ngang las ma yos kyang // dper na brag ca'i sgra bzhin no// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dkyil 'khor

143a6(1): mdzes rin chen phreng ba dang // pi wang gar mkhan mchog nyid de// me tog phreng dang spos mchog dang // mar me byug pa la sogs pa'i// las la 'khril zhing chos la brtan// dbu rnams 'byo zhing 'dud pa'i

143b2(1): gnon// lcags kyu zhags pa s+pho Ta ho// sgo bzhir gnas pa de dag kyang // 'dud tshul 'khril ba gong ma bzhin// thub drug phyag rgya sna tshogs te// mdor bsdus phyag rgya drug yin no// gseg par dang ni pi wang
143b3(1): dang // go cha po ti rin chen sgrom// me dang chu ni rab tu bstan// yum ni gnyis med chos kyi dbyings// kun bzang mnyam gzhag ye shes 'phro// yum 'gyur mnyam rdzogs pad+mo'i dkyil// gzhan yang phyag rgya sna
