186a6(1): pa'i sku gsung thugs dag la// dbyer med gsal ba'i rig pa yis// ma lus bde chen mngon du gsal// de nas bde ba chen po nyid// gar thabs rlung gis dbang bsgyur nas// ma lus bde ba'i rig pa
186b1(1): 'char// gtsang dang 'dzem pa bral gyur nas// bshung ba lnga dang 'dod pa lnga// thig le bcud dang dwangs mar bcas// thig le chen por 'dres pas na// mi 'gyur 'chi med tshe la gnas// rang rig bde ba chen po
186b2(1): nyid// thog ma tha ma med par gnas// thig le rgyu ba rlung dang bcas// zag med dwangs ma'i snying por thim// mngon shes lnga ldan zag pa med// dngas ma'i snying por lam mthar phyin// de nas gsang ba bshad bya
186b3(1): ba// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa dag/ thabs dang shes rab kha sbyor ba'i// bden gnyis nyi zla'i khyad par las// ma lus thams cad gsal bar snang // gang du thabs dang bral ba yi// gnas dag bde sdug
186b4(1): btang snyoms dang // longs spyod tshe dang kha dog dang // bdag dang bdag gir zhen bcas pa'i// gzugs dang sgra dang dri dang ro// reg dang dran pa sna tshogs kyis// zhen dang 'ching ba'i rang bzhin gyis// rang
186b5(1): bzhin bzhi ni gsal bar 'gyur// de las tha mal 'khor ba'i lam// thog ma med nas lus gnas pa'i// bde chen nam mkha'i snying po nyid// lus gnyis rtsa bcud ma lus pa// thabs dang shes rab sku
186b6(1): gsung thugs// srin bu 'khrugs pa'i yi ge ltar// dbang po gnyis dang 'brel te gnas// thabs dang man ngag ldan pa yis// rgyal rigs rje'u dang bram ze dang // dmangs rigs chos ma gar mkhan ma// rdol
187a1(1): ma nyo tshong ma nyid dang // ma dang sgyug mo sring mo dang // mthar sgeg lus 'tshong ma la sogs// dngos grub skye ba'i zhing du bshad// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug dang // bcwa brgyad bcud ldan rab
187a2(1): yin te// nyi shu la sogs 'bring du bshad// rtsa lnga tha ma'i tshad yin te// gzhan la dngos grub med par gsungs// las dang bya ba ma lus pa// cho ga'i sbyor ba rab tu brtsam// gnas pa 'byung ba'i bcud bzhi
187a3(1): la// 'byung bzhi gsal rkyen gang phrad pas// nyi zla 'dres pa'i gar thabs las// lhan cig skyes pa gsum gcig las// nyams su ye shes lnga shar ba// ma lus bde ba chen por 'gyur// gnas bzhi rtsa
187a4(1): bcud thig le las// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// phyag rgya bzhir ldan mnyam sbyor bas// drangs snyigs rlung gis ngos bzung nas// dngos po lhan cig skyes pa dag/ bdag po gdung can sbyar ba
187a5(1): yi// 'phro 'du btang dang bzung ba dang // bzlog pas nyi zla dbyer med myong // dang po 'jig pa la sogs nas// rdo rje 'chang chen gsang bdag par// lam lnga sems lnga mthar phyin pas// stobs kyi khyad par
187a6(1): gsal bar 'gyur// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// 'og min nam mkha'i shar sgo nas// nyi zla dus gcig shar ba la// dus tshod gza' yis gang bzung ba// nyin mtshan med pa'i ye shes nyid// 'phen
187b1(1): pa rlung gi sbyor bas 'byung // rnal 'byor rig par snang ba yi// khyab pa nam mkha'i 'jig rten na// bde chen mdzes pa'i me tog la// bcud kyi khyad par gang gnas pa// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa
187b2(1): yi// shel dang byu ru'i bung bsdus nas// rnal 'byor bcud kyis rgyas 'gyur nas// bcu gsum sa la lhun gyis grub// 'khyud pa'i gar thabs las byung ba'i// bde ba chen po mi rtog pa// skad cig cha las byung
187b3(1): ba yi// zag med ye shes snying po ste// ma lus dwangs ma'i blo snang ba// zhen bral stong rtog mi gnas pa// dngos po lhan cig skyes pa ste// ma lus khyab par gnas pa yin// 'du shes zad pa'i rang bzhin te// skye
187b4(1): dang 'grib pa'i thig le nyid// bco lnga rdzogs pa'i tha ma nyid// sbyor ba kun zad stong pa'i ngang // de nyid byin brlabs las gyur pa// phyogs dus snod bcud ngo bo nyid// thig le rdul bral zhen pa med// sgyu ma
187b5(1): gzugs brnyan brag ca sogs// ma lus bde chen rang bzhin du// thun mong dran rtog rang 'gags nas// bde chen sgyu ma mngon sum snang // bde ba chen po'i sku gsung thugs// bcud lnga zhu ba'i ye shes
187b6(1): ro// thams cad rtse gcig dran pa nyid// dbyer med thabs dang shes rab ste// dran pa gcig tu myong ba nyid// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yis// sa ya bcu gsum grangs med pa'i// thig le bde ba nyid snang
188a1(1): pa// rang rang ma 'dres thig le la// sku gsung thugs dang dran pa dang // ye shes lnga yi rgyas btab ste// ma lus thig le'i tshogs su snang // rang 'byung bde chen rig pa'i lha// gcig dang grangs
188a2(1): las 'das pa yang // nyi zla gnyis kyi gdan la bzhugs// khyab pa thig le'i gur nang nas// bzhugs nas bdag po rten bdag can// rtsa bcud 'brel pa'i rgyan dang bcas// ka ba gsum dang pho brang bzhi// lde
188a3(1): mig gnyis la 'byed pa bzhi// sgo bzhi phye bas gzhal yas khang // lha dang bcas pa mngon du 'gyur// dgon pa dur khrod ldan pa yi// gsang ba'i 'og min 'bar ba nyid// rim pa phyi nang par ldan par// nyi zla
188a4(1): pad+ma'i gdan stengs nas// dus gsum thig ler ro gcig pa'o// bde chen gnyis su med par bzhugs// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// tshom bu'i tshogs kyang de bzhin te// thun mong dam tshig ting
188a5(1): 'dzin dang // byang chub shes rab snying rje lnga// gzhan du thabs dang shes rab dang // spyad dang glu gar rgyan dang bcas// ma spangs rol par longs spyod pas// ye shes nyi zla rgyun 'char ba// rlung sems ye shes
188a6(1): bcas pa nyid// rgyu ba med pas zag pa bral// nam mkha'i mthar thug par nyid du// zag med bde ba rgyun mi 'chad// de nyid tshad med dkyil 'khor te// bde chen mngon du gang bar snang // de dag lam la
188b1(1): zhugs pa yi// phyi nang gsang ba ma lus pa'i// spyod pa'i khyad par thams cad kun// 'dir ni rgyas par bstan pa yin// thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas// phyi nang gsang ba la sogs pa// skabs la bab
188b2(1): pa'i rnal 'byor pa// gang yang rung bas spyod par bya// dang po rtogs nas mthar thug pa'i// phyi nang gsang ba'i lam spyod la// spyad bya yul zhes gang 'dod de// thams cad blang dor med par spyod// thabs kyi
188b3(1): lta spyod ting 'dzin gyis// pad+ma la ni 'dam bzhin nam// mun snang gser 'gyur thabs bzhin du// thabs la mkhas pas spyad par bya// skyes mchog thabs dang ldan pa yis// zhing dang spyod yul dag pa
188b4(1): la// chags bral bde bar gang spyad pas// nam mkha' dbyings kyi longs spyod la// bde ba chen por longs spyod cing // lhun gyis grub pa'i bdag por 'gyur// gang dag thabs dang mi ldan zhing // don med
188b5(1): lam la ma 'brel bar// sgra dang tshig la brten pa yis// gsang ba'i spyod pa gang brtsams pa// gang bsgrub snang bar mi 'gyur gyi// nus med g.yul du zhugs pa ltar// bdag gzhan gnyis ka brlag pa
188b6(1): dang // mthong ba'i chos la sdug bsngal zhing // ngan 'gro log pa'i gnas su 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud chen po las spyod pa rgyas par bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga
189a1(1): pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rang bzhin ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan dang // lhag gnyis ting 'dzin gzugs brnyan dang // byang chub sems dang tshogs nyid kyi// dkyil 'khor
189a2(1): don ni bshad par bya// gang phyir dbang yul rnam shes kun// gzhan snang tha dad ma yin pa'i// ma lus rang rig byang chub sems// ma bcos rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// ma lus kun gyi snying po ste// phyogs bcu
189a3(1): 'das dang ma byon pa'i// rgyal ba rnams kyi rang bzhin yin// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// sna tshogs rang bzhin dbyer med pa// de nyid rang bzhin chos sku yin// de
189a4(1): nyid 'jig rten brtan g.yo ste// ji ltar snang grags thams cad kun// nges pa'i rang bzhin bzhi bcu gnyis// rang bzhin longs spyod rdzogs skur bshad// de nyid phyag rgya sna tshogs te// kun tu sku dang gsung
189a5(1): dang thugs// yon tan phrin las bsam yas mchog/ rang bzhin sbrul sku bsam mi khyab// ji snyed 'gro ba ma lus kyi// lus can snying la gang gnas pa'i// rang 'byung zag med ye shes gzugs// mi
189a6(1): shigs thig le bde chen po// nam mkha' lta bur kun khyab pa// mi gnas chos sku'i rang bzhin yin// de nyid rtsa ba'i rang bzhin las// ma lus snod bcud rang bzhin can// rtog pa ma lus dkyil 'khor
189b1(1): te// longs spyod rdzogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid// de nyid thig le phra rags par// snang ba'i mdzad pa bsam mi khyab// de yis de 'dul snang ba'i rgyu// sprul pa rang bzhin zhes bshad do// gang 'dir phung po 'byung
189b2(1): ba dang // rnam shes dbang po yul dus dang // nyon mongs rtag chad yid chos bcas// gang la mngon par mi snang yang // rang bzhin ma bcos dkyil 'khor te// kun la khyab par snang ba yin// rang snying drangs
189b3(1): ma lngar ldan pa// drangs ma'i phung po 'byung ba dang // dbang po'i yul du bcas pa yi// rtsa bcud thig ler bcas pa nyid// sku gsung thugs su rang snang ba// ma lus kun la rgyas btab bo// bcud 'dus thig
189b4(1): le chen po nyid// nyi zla 'dres pa'i rang bzhin nyid// bde ba'i thig le rang snang ba// ma lus 'dus pa'i tshul dag gis// thabs kyis mngon du gyur na yang // gnyis med thig le bde ba'i ro// 'gro ba kun la
189b5(1): rang bzhin snang // de dag yab yum sku gsung thugs// rtsa bcud thig ler bcas pa nyid// 'du 'bral med par ye gnas pa'o// gang phyir rgyal ba thams cad kyi// zag med ye shes rang snang ba// dpag med
189b6(1): yon tan rgya mtsho nyid// ye shes 'og min pho brang ste// zag med yon tan rgyan ldan pa'i// 'khor lo 'bar ba'i pho brang dbus// mi 'jigs phung po'i gdan stengs na// bdag po kun bzang 'khor lo
190a1(1): bskor// bka' sdod skyes bu mdun na gnas// gzhan yang rgyal ba rgya mtsho'i tshogs// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las// rang rang rigs lnga gang gyur pa'i// rnam thar dbu dang ye shes phyag/ so
190a2(1): so'i bzhugs tshul ldan pa yis// mdun rgyab phyogs bcur 'khod pa nyid// yab yum 'brel pa'i tshul gyis gnas// rang 'byung ma bsgribs ye shes phyir// zag med tshogs gnyis las byung ba'i// nam mkha'i
190a3(1): khams dang rgya mnyam pa'i// 'jig rten grangs med rdul dang bcas// bkod pa phun sum tshogs par gnas// gang de zag med ye shes kyi// phyag dang zhal dang thabs ldan pas// zhal mthong rigs la dbang
190a4(1): sbyar bas// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por gyur// rgyal ba de dag ma lus pa'i// gsung mchog brjod du med pa nyid// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi mthar thug pa// brda dang don dang byin brlabs dang // gsang ba la
190a5(1): sogs ci rigs par// dam pa'i chos sgra rgya mtsho sgrogs// zag med ye shes rgya mtsho yi// byin brlabs cho 'phrul mngon shar ba// a A/ i i/ u yA/ e e/ o o/ rai raM/ l-i l-I/ aM aH/ ka kha ga g+ha nga/
190a6(1): tsatshang d+haH// ta tha da d+hA na/ Ta \u0f7fDar+Na Na/ pa pha ba b+h+ra ma/ ya ra la la/ sha Sha sa ha/ k+Sha/ 'di dag rab tu byung ba yis// phyogs bcu 'jig rten khams bcas pa'i// nam mkha'i dbyings dang rgya mtsha
190b1(1): dang // kho ra yug dang lhun po dang // 'bab chu lteng ka mtshe'u bcas// de na gnas pa'i 'gro ba rnams// rang rang longs spyod bde sdug bcas// phyi nang snod bcud bcas pa rnams// ma lus g.yo zhing ldeg par
190b2(1): byed// sgra bo che yang sgrogs par byed// de dag sbyangs nas mi gnas par// gsung gi ngo bor byin brlabs te// de dag stong nyid la thim pas// ma lus stong pa nyid du 'gyur// a ni stong dang mi stong gi// dbu ma
190b3(1): dmigs su'ang yod ma yin// ji snyed snang grags chos rnams kun// yi ge phreng ba nyid la gnas// gang phyir de yi rang bzhin yang // rang bzhin cho 'phrul ting 'dzin dang // gsang ba bris par gang snang
190b4(1): ba// rig pa'i khyad par snang ba yin// rtsa ba dang ni rgyan zhes dang // lha yi yi ge mngon snang bas// rang bzhin sku gsung thugs nyid de// khyab pa'i tshul gyis ma lus snang // gang du thugs rje byin brlabs
190b5(1): dang // ting 'dzin rig pa'i cho 'phrul te// rang rang khyad par mngon snang yin// 'di dag rang bzhin sna tshogs pa// gang du ji ltar gnas pa kun// yi ger ma gyur med par gnas// rgyal ba sangs rgyas thams
190b6(1): cad kyi// ye shes rgya mtsho'i gsang ba'i thugs// mthar thug med pa'i nam mkha' bzhin// zag med rgyas pas kun khyab can// shes bya'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas pa// gcig dang du ma med tshul gyis// ye shes
191a1(1): ma bsgribs gsal ba yis// nam mkha' dbyings ltar gsal mkhyen pa// dus gsum chos dang 'gro ba dang // zhing khams rgyal ba dpag med dang // ri dang rgya mtsho rdul bcas pa// snga phyi ma
191a2(1): bsgribs da lta nyid// me long lta bur mngon du snang // dpal ldan nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor du// ye shes lnga yis kun khyad can// kun mkhyen stobs bcu mtha' thug med// nam mkha'i dbang phyug bde chen
191a3(1): po// mngon shes rgya mtsho pha rol byon// shes bya'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kun// sad dang sangs pa'i bdag nyid can// thog ma tha ma med pa'i bdag/ bde ba chen po sgyu ma nyid// rang 'byung thugs las gzhan
191a4(1): pa min// 'di ni rgyal ba thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rang bzhin te// gdul bya gang gi ngo dag tu// sna tshogs mngon par 'phrul pa yin// gang du khro gtum gdug ldan pa'i// srid gsum dregs pa'i
191a5(1): bdag po dag/ thugs rje khros pas gdul ba'i phyir// khro bo'i de bzhin gshegs par mdzad// sku ni ri rab lta bu nyid// zhabs dang phyag ni rdul snyed de// gang de gdul ba'i khyad par gyis// zhal gsum phyag
191a6(1): drug zhabs bzhi dang // dbu dgu bcwa brgyad phyag la sogs// nyi shu rtsa gcig dbu la sogs// de bzhin g.yo rdul mi g.yo ba'i// phyag zhabs zhal yang de bskyed de// mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin pa des// ji snyed
191b1(1): phyogs bcu 'jig rten du// cho 'phrul bzhi la sogs pa yi// mdzad pa'i gar thabs sna tshogs kyis// dregs pa che dang dbang phyug dang // tshangs pa khyab 'jug brgya byin dang // dri za gshin rje gnod sbyin
191b2(1): bcas// gdug pa'i nga rgyal rgyu 'bras can// rgyu 'bras rtsad nas bcad pa'i phyir// ma lus pa dag ma btang bar// nga rgyal khro gtum zhum pa yis// ji skad smras kyang rang rang gi// nyon mongs rgya mtsho ma skams
191b3(1): par// thugs rje zhe la mnan tshul gyis// de dag mngon du btul bar mdzad// la lar dpal chen khrag 'thung ste// la lar rdo rje khrag 'thung nyid// la lar rin chen khrag 'thung ste// la lar pad+ma de bzhin
191b4(1): gshegs// la lar sna tshogs las su bcas// rang rang btsun mo tshogs dang 'khril// rigs kyi mtshon cha sna tshogs 'dzin// mdog dang cha lugs de bzhin te// de bzhin sras dang bka' nyan dang // pho nya yang
191b5(1): sprusbrul la sogs pa// rdo rje ba sbu bu ga nas// pho nya bye ba drug cu dag/ phyogs bcu kun du rgyas bkye ste// nam mkha'i khams dang mnyam pa yi// gdug pa'i tshogs ni de dag kun// ma lus dus gcig btul nas
191b6(1): ni// phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bkod// de dag gsung yang sna tshogs te// sprul pa 'gyed pas gsung gcig tu// khams gsum sgra yis gang bar mdzad/ hUM hUM hUM bi shwa kro d+ha dz+wa lA maN+Da la phaT phaT phaT/ ha la ha la
192a1(1): ha la hUM phaT/ phaT phaT phaT/ trata trata trata/ kro Ta kro Ta kro Ta/ ha la ha la ha la/ hu lu hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ da ha da ha da ha/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na/ pa tsa pa tsa pa tsa/ ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da ts+tshin+da/
192a2(1): gardza gardza gardza/ hUM hUM hUM/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ phaT dza la raM/ zhes pa'i sgra yis thams cad gang // ji srid nam mkha'i mtha' thug par// ri dang gling dang rgya mtshor bcas// 'khor yug stong gsum 'jig rten bcas// ma
192a3(1): lus g.yo zhing sgras bkang ste// gdug pa'i tshogs de 'khor bcas pa// gang gi dbang du ma btang bar// gdug pa dus gcig btul bar mdzad// de tshe de yi 'khor g.yog kyang // zhum pas smras shing gsol
192a4(1): btab nas// rang snying phul nas dam mnos te// dmod btsugs rang gi lam la bzhag/ 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag kyang // la lar gti mug rmugs par mdzad// la lar chags la chags chen po// la
192a5(1): lar g.yem la g.yem par ston// sdang la drag shul spyod pa ste// nga rgyal can la ri bos gnon// zhi las slong dang zhi ba nyid// gsal dang zhe la gnon pa dang // chags khro dang ni sdang khro dang // rmongs khro gnon
192a6(1): khro la sogs pas// bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du// rang gi mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis// gdul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs su// sgyu 'phrul dra ba mngon rdzogs pa'i// thugs kyi sprul pa snang bar mdzad// gang phyir
192b1(1): spros med goms pa nyid// de nyid ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor te// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// ji snyed phyogs bcur gnas pa kun// rang rig rgyal por gnas pa nyid// 'di nyid pho mo ma ning dang // mtshan
192b2(1): med la sogs gang yang min// dngos dang dngos med las 'das pa'i// de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te// rig pa skye ba med pa'i ngang // 'di nyid gsal bar bsgom par bya// oM d+harma d+hA tu swa b+ha ba At+ma
192b3(1): ko&haM// skyes dang ma skyes la sogs pa'i// tha snyad ming la mi gnas shing // blo yi sbyor ba las 'das pas// 'di ni de bzhin nyid ces bshad// 'di la rim pa med pa ste// skyes bu mchog gi yul du
192b4(1): gsungs// ma lus rang rig rdo rje nyid// khyab pa'i tshul gyis nam mkha' ste// rnam dag rang bzhin 'od gsal ba// dam pa'i ting 'dzin chen po nyid// gang gis ma lus mngon gsal nas// phyi nang chos
192b5(1): rnams thams cad kun// goms nas spros med de bzhin nyid// de dag ting 'dzin thun mong nyid// mi shigs thig le drangs ma'i bdag/ bzhi 'dus lnga bdag gnyis su med// rtsa bcud thig ler bcas pa
192b6(1): nyid// thabs dang bcas pa'i ting 'dzin gyis// ye shes lnga yi ro dang bcas// bde chen skye ba med pa'i don// zag med khyab pa mngon du smin// ye shes nam mkha'i gzugs can nyid// phyi nang med pa'i rang
193a1(1): 'byung ste// gsal dang bde ba'i rang bzhin can// thabs dang thig les dbang bsgyur nas// lus can kun la gsal bar skye// gnas bzhi 'byung ba'i drangs ma nyid// rten can brten par bcas
193a2(1): pa nyid// rang 'byung thig le bde ba nyid// phyogs cha med par gsal khyab pas// bde ba chen po'i lus su 'gyur// rang 'byung snying po drangs ma'i lus// 'byung ba zag med snying por thim// thig le spros pa med
193a3(1): pa ste// thams cad ma lus khyab par snang // rang lus rtsa bcud phyi nang kun// snyigs ma drangs mar smin byas te// drangs ma ye shes snying por gsal// de nyid rgyu ba med pa yi// rang 'byung thig le spros pa
193a4(1): med// dwangs ma zag med stobs las snang // gang phyir skyes dang sprul pa dang // brtags pa'i gzungs ma las byung ba// dbang po gnyis ni bsrubs pa las// skad cig bcu drug mtha' yi tshe// nyi zla 'dres pa'i
193a5(1): gar thabs las// dngos po lhan cig skyes pa gsal// sems lnga rdzogs pa'i snying po nyid// brjod med rang snang bstan pa nyid// ma lus sku gsung thugs gnas pa// 'khyud pa'i gar gsum bsdam pa
193a6(1): yis// gnas dang 'byung ba ma lus pa// rang rig ye shes gzugs su snang // thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// byang chub sems kyi thig le ste// rten dang brten par bcas pa nyid// rang nyid gsal bar
193b1(1): byin brlabs nas// ji ltar snang srid chos thams cad// lhan cig skyes pa'i ngo bor gsal// ma lus bde ba chen po'i rigs// dam pa'i sbyor ba snang bar 'gyur// 'di ni phyi nang gsang ba yi// ting 'dzin/
193b2(1): dkyil 'khor nyid du bshad// gang phyir mtshan ma'i rnal 'byor pas// dngos dang dngos med rnam spangs pa'i// rang rig skye med de bzhin nyid// ma bcos rang rig 'od gsal ba// de bzhin nyid de dang por
193b3(1): bsgom// de nas snying rje nam mkha' ltar// gsal la stong pa'i rnal 'byor bsgom// yang na sgyu ma brag ca dang // chu zla'i tshul du bsgom par bya// de nas rang nyid yi ge nyid// gsal la brtan zhing gom pa
193b4(1): yis// ma dag pa ni sbyang byas te// dag pa'i mkha' lnga bsam par bya// e yaM baM su laM// sa chu me rlung nam mkha' dag/ rig pa rang snang tshul du bsgom// de dbus rin chen khang pa dag/ mdzes pa'i tshul dang
193b5(1): ldan pa ste// rtsibs bzhi 'khor lo lte bar bcas// mu khyud zlum po thog mtha' med// gru chad glo 'bur bar khyams dang // sgo bzhi rta babs them skas dang // lnga brtsegs pha gu dra phyed dang // 'dod yon ka ba za
193b6(1): ra tshags// mi sgrib gsal ba'i rgyan dang ldan// mi 'jigs la sogs lnga dbus gdan// nyi zla pad+ma la sogs pa// lnga dang gsum dang bzhi gcig go/ rim pa 'tsham pa'i gdan stengs su// sa bon cho ga las
194a1(1): byung ba// gtso gzungs mthing ga rdo rje 'dzin// 'khril sbyor 'dzum pa'i byin brlabs te// dbang bskur cho ga lnga ldan pas// sbyor bskul sras bskyed so sor dgod// chos dbyings dkar po 'khor
194a2(1): lo 'dzin// mnyam nyid rin chen ser po lho// sor rtog pad+ma dmar po nub// bya grub ral gri ljang gu byang // btsun mo rigs mthun dril 'dzin 'khril// 'khor lo'i rtsibs mtshan shar lho nas// sa snying dkar po
194a3(1): myu gu 'dzin// sgeg mo dung mdog me long 'khril// nam snying sngon po ral gri 'dzin// phreng 'dzin mA le nam mkha' mdog/ spyan ras le brgan pad+ma dkar// gi ti pi wang dmar mo mdog/ rdor 'dzin ljang gu las
194a4(1): kyi rigs// phyag gnyis brkyang nas gar mdzad ldang // gru chad bzhi la rim pa bzhin// byams pa dkar ser klu shing 'dzin// sgrib sel dmar ser glegs bam bsnams// kun bzang dmar ldang rin chen
194a5(1): ste// 'jam dpal dkar ldang ut+pal bsnams// btsun mo rigs dang mthun pa ste// spos dang mar me me tog dri// 'khril zhing 'dud pa tshul bzhin bzhugs// sgo bzhir rim pa ji bzhin du// stobs chen gshin
194a6(1): rje gshed po dang // rta mgrin bdud rtsi 'khyil ba bzhin// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags sgrog dril// mthing nag ser nag dmar nag dang // ljang nag rdo rje thod dbyug dang // thod sbrul rdo rje rgya gram dang // yum
194b1(1): yang so so'i phyag mtshan bcas// sgo bzhir rngam tshul 'khril sbyor bzhugs// khyams kyi mdun dang rgyab tu ni// kun bzang yab yum nam mkha'i mdog/ phyag rgya ma nges sna tshogs te// mnyam bzhag ye shes
194b2(1): 'phro ba'i steng // rdo rje dril bu'i mtshan pa'o// thub drug dkar ser mthing ga dang // dmar nag ser nag dud ka ste// phyogs bzhi steng 'og shar nub tshul// pi wang go cha gseg par sgrom// pi ti me chur shes
194b3(1): par bya// mi bskyod byed po la sogs pa// rdo rje 'chang bas rnam par brgyan// gzhan dag rang rang gis yin te// ya mAn+ta kr-ita rtag pa'o// thub drug kun bzang brgyan pa nyid// sku gsung thugs 'bar byin
194b4(1): brlabs ldan// rdo rje 'phro 'du snying por ldan// cho ga'i rim pa shes par bya// drangs ma bcud ldan ye shes nyid// ma bcos de bzhin nyid yin te// ye shes nam mkha'i ngang dang 'brel// kun la khyab pa'i snying rje
194b5(1): yis// khyab byed bde ba'i snying po nyid// tha mal rtog pa gang dag nas// bde ba chen por byin gyis rlob/ 'byung lnga drangs ma'i snying po nyid// thams cad 'byung ba'i rgyu yin te// d+harma tsakra chos kyi dbyings// mi
194b6(1): shigs thig le kun gyi gnas// nus pa'i khyad par phra rags bzhi// thig le'i gzugs dang tshor ba dang // 'du shes 'du byed rnam shes nyid// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin nyid// rgyal po lnga ru bshad pa
195a1(1): yin// 'byung lnga dngas mar bcas pa ni// dgyes pa bskyed phyir btsun mo ste// mig sogs bde ba'i rnam shes dang // de yi ngo bo yul bcas ni// gnas pa rtsa bcud thig ler bcas// nang gi
195a2(1): sems dpa' yab yum nyid// so so'i rtsa bcud gnas pa'i rten// dbang po dus bzhir bcas pa nyid// phyi yi sems dpar bshad pa ni// gnas dang dus kyis phye phyir ro// gang de dwangs mas bskyed pa
195a3(1): yis// lus kyi chos bzhi rtag chad bcas// sgo bzhi yab yum shes par bya// bde chen yid chos rang rig nyid// kun bzang ro yi bde ba nyin// nyon mongs drug gi yul rnams su// sprul pa'i thig ler rang shar
195a4(1): ba'o// 'dul ba bzhi yis don mdzad pa// sprul pa'i mdzad pa bsam mi khyab// kun kyang drangs ma'i rang bzhin las// ye shes lnga yi ro ldan pa// gnas dang ngo bo lngas brgyan pa// ye shes lnga yis rgyas btab
195a5(1): pa'o// sa bon sku ste yi ge gsung // bde thugs sku gsung dkyil 'khor ldan// 'phro 'du rtsa ba'i thig ler bcas// ma lus kun la 'di gnas pas// yan lag nyid du 'di shes bya// stong nyid rdo rje la sogs
195a6(1): pa// sngon byas rang rgyud med pa yi// rigs brtags gzungs ma blang bar bya// rang rgyud sgo gsum dag byas la// lha yi rnal 'byor lus su bya// rdo rje snying po ge sar nyid// phrad pa sa dang gsher ba chu// drod me
195b1(1): bskyod pa klung nyid de// bde ba'i dwangs ma nam mkha' nyid// b+h+rUM dbyibs b+ha ga bde ba'i gnas// sna tshogs 'dus pa'i gzhal yas khang // nyi zla pad+ma nus pa'i gdan// che ba'i yon tan rdzogs par
195b2(1): ldan// thabs dang shes rab 'brel ba'i ro// lnga phung 'byung lnga dag pa yi// rang bzhin de dang mnyam sbyar bas// ye shes phra rags gnyis su med// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yi// dbang po yul dus rnam
195b3(1): shes bcas// rang rang bde bar skyes pa'i lha// lhan cig skyes pa'i ye shes nyid// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med cing // rgyu ba'i rlung la dbang thob nas// thabs lam bde ba'i gnyer dag gis// brtags pa
195b4(1): rang gi rtog pa zlog/ dngos po rnams kyi ngo bo la// bzlog bya ngas kyang mi dmigs so// bde ba'i thig le sa bon la// thabs bzhi rlung gi gar thabs kyis// dga' ba'i tshad ldan nus pa bcas// dngos
195b5(1): 'di lhan cig skyes par brtan// bde ba'i phyag rgya chen po ni// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// bde ba chen por ro gcig phyir// ma lus lhan cig skyes par gnas// bcud 'dus bde ba'i thig le ni// yon tan
195b6(1): kun gyi ngo bo bas// che ba'i yon tan kun rdzogs pas// sangs rgyas kun gyi ngo bor gnas// de nas rgyal ba rdo rje 'chang // rgyal ba kun gyi rgyal po yis// ma lus lhag pa'i lhar brlab phyir// gsung gi snying po
196a1(1): brjod par mdzad// b+h+yAM bi shra bi shud+d+he/ hUM badz+ra d+h+r-ika/ oM dzI na dzi ka/ sAM rat+na d+h+r-ika/ AMHA ro lig/ hAM pradz+nyA d+h+r-i ka/ mr-i d+hA tI shwa rI/ lAM de Sha ra ti mAM mo ha ra ti/ b+haM rA ga ra ti/ tAM badz+ra ra ti/ k+ShI ha ra dza ya/
196a2(1): tAM A gar+b+ha ya/ trI ha hUM pad+ma ba da ya// dzI ku ru pa NI d+hIH/ hUM lA s+ye sa ma ya d+h+waM/ tAM mA l+ye sa ma ya hoH/ hrI gA tI rA go&haM/ a n+ye t+ye rA ga yA s+ye/ me d+ha ra Ne swA hA/ b+h+r-i nisma raM b+hA ya swA hA/ hUM sa rA dzA ya swA hA/ mr-i shrI a
196a3(1): ga ya swA hA/ dzaHd+hU pa pra be sha/ hUM puSh+pa a be sha/ baM dI ba su khi ni/ ho gan+d+he tsit+ta/ hUM ya mAn+ta kr-ita dzaHphaT/ hUM big+h+nAn+ta kr-ita hUM phaT/ hUM pad+mAn+ta kr-ita baM phaT/ hUM pradz+nyAn+ta kr-ita hoHphaT/ oM ma hA badz+ra d+hA ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dza
196a4(1): la ni phaT/ oM maM hA rat+na d+ha ra ma hA kro d+hI shwa ri dz+wa la ni phaT/ oM ma hA pad+ma d+hA ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dz+wa la nI phaT/ oM ma hA karma d+hA ra ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri dz+wa la nI phaT/ hUM hUM hUM badz+ra tsit+ta hUM/ a a a badz+ra b+ha dra sa mahA hAM/
196a5(1): oM mu ne kr-i swA hA/ oM mu ne hUM druM swA hA/ oM mu ne sruM swA hA/ oM mu ne br-i swA hA/ oM mu ne shaM swa hA/ oM mu na ye swA hA/ oM e h+ye hi b+ha ga bAn/ ma hA ke ru NI ka tr-i sh+ya ho/ sa ma ya s+t+waM/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ oM AHhUM swA hA/ ba ba
196a6(1): ba ba ba/ dza dza dza dza dza/ sa sa sa sa sa/ ma ma ma ma ma/ ya ya ya ya ya/ oM AHhUM swA hA/ oM sgyu 'phrul dra ba gnyis med pa'i/ gsang ba zab mo sku gsung zugs// gdod nas bdag dang dbyer med pa'i// da lta
196b1(1): nyid du dbyer med shog/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya hoHdzaHhUM baM hoHzhes brjod pas/ sna tshogs dkyil 'khor mdzes pa dag/ gnyis med ro gcig 'dres nas kyang // stong
196b2(1): gsum dkyil 'khor gsal bar 'gyur// oM yaHhUM swA ha/ mr-i mAM lAM pre taM/ snAts+tsha ts+tshar+g+haM/ d+hA tA tAM tAM/ d+hI d+hI d+hI d+hI/ AHasasaHaH/ ts+tshin+na ts+tsha ts+tsha hAM ts+tshats+tsha b+hU ts+tsha ts+tsha hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ dzaHtsA baM sorab ldan pas// ga
196b3(1): bo lnga dang gtso mo lnga// 'brel ba sum cu rtsa gnyis dang // rdo rje khro bo khro mo dang // sgo bzhi rab 'byam la sogs pa// dkyil 'khor rgyas par snang bar mdzad// 'khor lo nyis brtsegs rtsibs su bcas// khyams
196b4(1): dang sgor bcas lha yi rim// rang rang phyag mtshan gdan dang bcas// bzhugs thabs tshul bzhin gnas pa'o// de nas rgyal ba de dag gis// dkyil 'khor chen po de dag la// dbang bskur byin brlabs bya
196b5(1): ba'i phyir// gsang ba'i sngags ni gsung bar mdzad// oM ma hA shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM ma hA A daR+sha dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM ma hA pra tA bek+Sha NA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM ma hA
196b6(1): sa man+ta dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM ma hA kr-i t+ya a nuSh+TA na badz+ra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA ka ya badz+ra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA wAka badz+ra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM sarba
197a1(1): ta thA ga ta ma hA tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA a nu rA ga badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pA dza badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ zhes brjod ye shes sgra
197a2(1): gsung thugs// rtse gcig thim par gsal bar 'gyur// tsit+ta 'og min 'bar ba'i gnas// rin chen 'bar ba rdzogs pa'i mdzod// mi shigs thig le za ma tog/ rgyal ba kun gyi bzhugs pa'i gnas// tsit+ta'i
197a3(1): khams lnga'i snying po la// bde ba'i thig le phra rags nyid// ye shes lnga yi bdag nyid du// gsang ba 'dzin pa'i rgyal por brjod// gang de dwangs ma ye shes lnga// gang du mi phyed rdo rjer gsal// dug lnga ye shes
197a4(1): bskyed pa dang // btsun mo dga' bde'i ngo bor brjod// khams lnga 'dus pa'i ye shes nyid// rang 'byung ye shes bde ba'i thugs// rnam shes bzhir bcas thig le nyid// thugs kyi sems dpa' nyid du
197a5(1): bshad// de yis gang la dbang sgyur ba'i// yul bzhi thig le bde ba'i bcud// sgyu ma'i bde bar gang 'char ba// yul bzhi rim par bshad pa ste// dbang sgyur gnyis med gang yin pas// yab yum 'brel ba'i
197a6(1): ngo bor bshad// rtsa bcud thig ler bcas pa'i rten// so so'i nus par bcas pa nyid// gang la de dbang de yi phyir// 'di ni phyi yi rim par bshad// gang de khams lnga'i bde ba yis// mnyes dang thig le
197b1(1): bkod pa dang // nam mkha'i ye shes gsal ba dang // de nyid khyab pa'i rang bzhin te// zag med bde ba'i rang bzhin gyis// phyogs bcu'i zhing khams mnyes par mdzad// dgug dang bcing dang mnyes dang
197b2(1): gsal// thabs lam bcud du 'brel bar gsungs// gang de thabs chen gsal byas pas// lus kyi chos bzhi rtag chad spangs// bde ba'i thig le rang snang ba// ma lus 'joms las khro bo'o// bcud las
197b3(1): 'das pa'i hUM gsum nyid// byed pa bral ba'i ngo bo nyid// yul gsum bral bas chos kyi dbyings// ma lus rnam dag kun tu bzang // dngas snyigs snying por 'brel ba yis// nyon mongs sa bon drug bcas
197b4(1): pas// thig les btul nas bstan pa 'chad// sprul pa'i sku ru bshad pa yin// kun kyang ye shes lnga yi ro// khyab par gnas pas rgyas btab cing // snang srid bde chen sku gsung thugs// dran pa rtag tu gsal
197b5(1): bzung ba'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad par bya// gsang rtse sna tshogs 'dus pa'i dbus// phyi nang rim pa'i dbu rtse can// ngo bo byin brlabs 'phags pa ste// yon tan byin brlabs kun gyi gnas// gsang ba'i
197b6(1): pad+ma'i rang bzhin du// rdo rje gnyis med thig ler blta// nyi zla zil pa'i thig le nyid// phan tshun 'dres pa rlung gis phye// gsang ba'i khams lngas ye shes rol// snyigs ma'i phung po lnga dag nas// dngas ma lnga yi
198a1(1): rang bzhin gsal// rgyal po de bzhin gshegs par gsal// gsang ba'i 'byung ba lngar bstan pa// dbang yul phrad pa'i skabs las shes// rigs mchog yum gyi phyag rgya lnga// snyigs ma bral
198a2(1): ba'i dus na blta// thig le thugs kyi bde ba rnams// rang rang thig le bde bar gsal// ye shes rnam shes dngas ma rnams// bde ba chen po gsal bar shes// dam tshig bde ba'i chas kyis skegs// sgo gsum
198a3(1): 'brel cing thig ler chags// gang du bde ba'i sgra bsgrags te// bskyod cing 'pho ba'i gar gyis mnyes// thugs gang thig le brten pa'i gnas// gang yul bde bar dbang byed pa'i// rten dang bcas pa'i bde
198a4(1): ba yis// rang rang thig le skyed par byed// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// thugs dang thig ler bcas pa nyid// dgug 'dzin 'khyud cing gnas pa dang // thig le rlung dang stod smad bsdams// bskyod
198a5(1): dang 'bebs pa'i thabs yin te// tshim dang thig le dor ba dang // ye shes gsal bas bde sems rgyas// rim pa ji bzhin gsal bar brtags// gsang yul dbang po reg pa dang // rnam shes gang yin ta krita
198a6(1): de// bde ba'i rang bzhin ma skyes pas// rtag chad mtshan ma bdag med pa// sgo ma'i rang bzhin gsang ba'i sngags// shes skyob don phyir gsang ba'i sngags// shes pa gsum 'das sgrib zad pa// rang rig byed
198b1(1): pa yid ces bya// rgyun gsum zad pa'i chos dbyings nyid// rtogs bya kun tu bzang mor bshad// 'khor ba'i sa bon nyon mongs bcas// zil pa'i thig sngon lam bzhin du// thabs sbyor thig le'i 'phro 'du
198b2(1): yis// gsang ba'i mdzad pa bcu gnyis ston// sa bon thig le ma skyes gzugs// bstan pa rim pa gsum du bstan// 'dod pa'i yan lag gsum brgya dang // drug cu rtsa bzhi la sogs pas// tha mal zhen pa
198b3(1): ral grol nas// rdo rje ze'u 'bru 'brel bskyod pas// rang 'bar thig le gzugs su chags// yab yum lnga phyi thabs kyis gzung // nyi ma zla ba shar ba'i 'od// rtse nas rtse ru phyin pa yis// 'khor ba'i mun pa
198b4(1): kun bsal nas// ma lus lhan cig skyes par gsal// de nyid gsang bar shes par bya// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pa// bzhi bcu rtsa lngar gnas pa yi// thugs kyi rang bzhin snying po nyid// rang rang
198b5(1): mtshon pa'i rtags yin te// rgyas dang bsdus pa'ang de bzhin du// rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri 'bar// dril bu pad+ma rin po che// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i rim bshad pa'o// gzhan gang gnas su rdo rje shes// dang po thugs
198b6(1): dang g.yon 'khyud pa'o// rin chen myu gu ral gri 'bar// pad+ma dkar po rdo rje che// ut+pal klu shing po ti ste// gzugs mdzes rin chen phreng ba dang // pi wang gar spu pog me dang // byug pa so sor rim shes
199a1(1): bya// nr-i mgo rdo rje thod rgya gram// lcags kyu zhags pa s+pho Ta hoH// 'od 'phro mnyam bzhag rdo rje thal// ye shes rtse lnga chos khams dril// thugs la brtan pa nyid du gsungs// thub chen nges par phyag
199a2(1): gnyis shes// gseg par go mtshon pi wang brdab// sgom stob po ti chos 'chad tshul// me dpung bum par shes par bya// gzhan yang mthun pa skabs kyis brtag/ mi mthun khyad par rgyas par bstan// rdo rje
199a3(1): rin chen pad+ma dang // rgya gram dril bu brgyad shes bya// rdo rje lcags kyu mda' se gol// rin chen nyi ma rgyal mtshan so// pad+ma 'khor lo ral gri lce// rgya gram khu tshur go cha mche// gzhan yang skabs dang mthun pa
199a4(1): ste// rang rang don nyid rtse gcig pa'i// thugs kyi rtags su shes par bya// dngas ma'i ye shes lnga 'bar bas// gcod dang mi phyed dga' ba dang // ma gos bde ba bskyed pa nyid// rnam par mi rtog rim par
199a5(1): shes// yon tan bskyed dang tha mal gcod// de bzhin ma gos ye shes nyid// so so yon tan cha las byung // rang rang rtsa bcud thig le'i dbyibs// so so nyid ltar rang gnas te// bde ba'i thig le nyid du
199a6(1): shes// rang 'byung dwangs ma'i thig le nyid// 'brel ba'i tshul gyis kun snang ba// khu ba rtsa yi dbyibs gzugs nyid// rang rang las dang rtog pa dang // snying po phyag mtshan dbyibs bzhin pas// bde chen thugs
199b1(1): su gsal brtan pa// thugs kyi dus su shes par bya// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// thig le gsal ba'i rang bzhin las// thugs mtshan che ba'i ye shes nyid// dpag tu med par rang snang ba// bde
199b2(1): ba chen po'i thig le'i 'od// ma lus de der snang ba nyid// ma lus gnyis med thig le yi// bde ba chen po'i ye shes lnga// de las phye bas mtshon pa'i sgo// thugs kyi rang rtags bsam mi khyab// bde ba'i thugs
199b3(1): las gzhan ma yin// gang phyir dkyil 'khor 'di dag kyang // thun mong gnas su bsgoms pa dang // mi shigs thig le'i snying po la// sku gsung thugs nyid gsal bar bya// don dam thig le pad rtse la// rim
199b4(1): pa ji bzhin gsal bar bya// de nas gdug pa gdul ba'i phyir// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar bshad// cho ga'i rim pa ji bzhin gyis// rang snying rgyu yi sa bon hUM// dag pas rim pas gsal ba
199b5(1): la// rang rgyud 'byung lnga nyon mongs lnga// rang 'byung lnga ru snang ba'i phyir// 'byung ba lnga nyid bsgom par bya// e yaM raM suM kai raM// so so las rnams byas nas ni// nam mkha' gru gsum zla gam rlung // khrag gi
199b6(1): dpa' klong 'khrug pa dang // gti mug ro dang nga rgyal ri// zhe sdang me nyid bsgom par bya// mdog kyang rim par shes bya ste// las dang rang bzhin shes bzhin brtag/ b+h+rUM las dur khrod gzhal yas khang // 'khor
200a1(1): lo rtsibs bzhi zod phreng dang // bar khyams gnyis ni sgo dang bcas// thod phreng sbrul gyi za ra tshags// zhing gi gdung dang ka ba ste// sprin nag dur khrod rgyan dang bcas// khro mo bdud rtsi lha mo
200a2(1): dang // thod pa lnga gsum rtsig pa can// nyi zla'i rgyan can bsam byas la// dregs pa gnod sbyin srin po dang // dri za gshin rje bzhon par bcas// de bzhin gsal bar bsgom par bya// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje
200a3(1): yi// cho ga las byung rim pa yis// gnyis med gsal bas de brtan phyir// dbang bskur byin brlabs rim bzhin bya// sbyor ba'i thig le 'phros pa yis// gdug pa ma lus btul nas ni// rang rang rim pa
200a4(1): gsal gyur nas// hUM gis phyogs phyogs gdan la bzhugs// ha brgyad sa bon las byung ba// dkar mo'i tshogs dang rkun mo'i tshogs// rmongs mo dang ni thal byed ma// spos mo dang ni gtum mo dang // sme sha
200a5(1): can dang ma tshogs ma'i// so so'i cha lugs rngam 'thon nas// sprul pa bzhi po la thim zhing // rang rang las mdzad snying po sgrogs// 'dus te phyogs phyogs gnas par bya// he brgyad sa bon las byung ba// stag
200a6(1): dang seng ge wa dang khyi// bya rgod kang ka 'ug pa dang // pho rog la sogs phra men rnams// 'phro 'du las dang phyogs mdog mtshan// rim pa ji bzhin de bzhin bsam// phaT bzhis rta dang phag gdong dang // sbrul
200b1(1): dang spre'u gdong rim pa bzhin// las dang sku mdog phyag mtshan yang // rim pa bzhin du gnas pa yin// de dag 'khor lo dbus dang lnga// yab yum phyag rgya 'brel par gnas// rtsibs mtshan gru chad bzhi dag
200b2(1): la// gnas kyi ma mo dgod par bya// bar khyams dang por phra men brgyad// phyogs mtshams rim par dgod par bya// sgo bzhir sgo ba rngam tshul gnas// bar khyams tha ma dag la ni// slas dang byi mo bran mo'i
200b3(1): tshogs// sku mdog phyag mtshan bzhugs tshul nyid// rim pa bzhin du bkod par bya// rin chen thod pa'i dbu rgyan dag/ gnas skabs dag tu 'tsham par bya// sku gsung thugs kyang de bzhin te// yan lag
200b4(1): dkyil 'khor nyid du bshad// gang phyir nam mkha'i ye shes nyid// spros med dam pa nyid du 'dod// bde ba'i thig les kun khyab la// chos nyid snying rje kun du snang // thig le rang snying sa bon rgyu// zag pa med
200b5(1): pa'i snying po yin// ma lus 'dus pa'i snying po can// thig le gong 'og kun dang 'brel// gnas pa khong stong tshul dag gis// ma lus kun la khyab pa yin// d+h+waM sgo g.yo ba'i sa sgo can// bskyod dang las kyis
200b6(1): ba byed pa// lus khyab gnas dang las dag ni// khyad par so sor snang ba yin// de steng ti la ka'i rang bzhin// 'bar ma brgyad dang ldan pa nyid// zhu dang 'bar ba'i las byed pa// drag mo zhes kyang 'dod pa
201a1(1): yin// thig le sgo nas 'dzag pa'i bcud// gsher dang 'dzag pa'i baM snying can// sdang dang bebs pa'i rang bzhin can// lus can gnas pa gsal bar bya// gang la gang rten de yi brten// thig
201a2(1): le rtsar bcas bde ba'i rten// de nyid bskyed dang gnas gyur pa// brten pas sa yi dkyil 'khor nyid// 'khor lo gzhal yas rang bzhin te// rim pa gong 'og 'brel pa can// lus la gnas pas dur khrod
201a3(1): de// kha dog rtsa dang bcud bsdus pa'i// rgyan dang gdan du ldan pa nyid// gang la rten pa'i thig le nyid// gnyis med bde ba chen po'i lha// sa bon yi ge bde ba yis// sku gsung thugs dang ldan pa
201a4(1): nyid// gcig kyang khams lnga'i bde ba'i ros// ma lus khyab pa'i tshul gyis gnas// lus la thig le chen po gnas// gnas dang bcud dang bde ba nyid// thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi// nam mkha'i ye
201a5(1): shes dpag tu med// 'jug pa bzhi dang rim pa brgyad// thig le gcig gis khyad par 'phags// nyon mongs zad pas zad byed de// dngas ma'i ye shes lnga 'bar nyid// yul dang bcas pa'i rang bzhin
201a6(1): las// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor gsal bar snang // gnas kyi thig le bde ba can// dur khrod ma brgyad gsang ba ste// gnyis med phra men nyid du bshad// thig le thabs dang bcas pa nyid// dkyil 'khor
201b1(1): 'jug pa'i sgo dang 'brel// snying po thig le nyid du sbyor// gang dang lhan cig skyes pa las// bde ba chen po skye ba med// ma lus bde ba chen po nyid// khyab pa rgya yongs ma chad pa'o// ma lus 'dus pa'i bde ba'i
201b2(1): ro// sa yang bcu gsum 'dus pa'i mkha'// rang 'byung khyab pa chen po'i gzugs// kun 'dus thig le chen por gsal// rnam thar gsum ldan e yi gzugs// bde ba bskyod dang thig le bskul// 'phro dang
201b3(1): sdud dang bsdams pa'i rlung // rdo rje pad+ma 'dus pa'i sa// rten dang bral ba bde ba'i sa// shu kra'i thig le gang gsher ba// gsang ba chu yi rang bzhin yin// de dag phyag rgyas gang sbyar bas// bde ba'i drod ni rang
201b4(1): 'bar skye// b+h+rUM las gsang ba'i gzhal yas khang // sangs rgyas rin chen za ma tog/ sna tshogs 'dus pa'i snying po can// khyad par 'phags pa'i 'og min te// yon tan rdzogs pa'i dngos gzhi can// dga' bzhi
201b5(1): 'jug pa'i sgo dang ldan// 'bab 'dzeg thig le'i skas dang ldan// bde ba nyi zla rgyal la bzhugs// thig le 'dres pa bde ba'i ro// nyi zla 'brel ba'i bde ba'i lha// 'thung dang rngub pa'i thabs chen gyis// 'khor
201b6(1): ba'i sa bon zad byed pas// za byed khro bor de bshad pa'o// dpag med thig le'i rang bzhin gang // sa ya bcu gsum pho brang na// bde ba chen po ye shes gzugs// sku gsung thugs dang lhan cig
202a1(1): bzhugs// 'du shes gsum ldan byin brlabs te// gsang ba'i ye shes lnga ldan pas// dbang thob rnams la rgyas btab po// gsang ba thig le chen po ni// rang 'byung bde ba chen po nyid// rnam
202a2(1): rtog rgyu ba chad pa yi// rdo rje pad+ma'i bar na gnas// 'og sgo snying po pad+ma ni// rgyal ba kun gyi dkyil 'khor te// gsang ba sku gsung thugs nyid du// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med gnas// ma lus 'dus
202a3(1): pa'i thig le nyid// gnyis med bcud du gyur pa na// de yi bde ba chen po nyid// khyab pa'i tshul gyis gang bar bzhugs// ye shes rgya mtsho lhan cig skyes// gsang ba'i thig le bde ba'i ro// nyi zla 'dres pa'i
202a4(1): tshul gyis snang // gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen por bshad// de nas rgyal ba thams cad kun// gdul bya'i bsam pa'i khyad par gyis// nam mkha' dbyings kyi mthas gtugs par// rdo rje khro bor snang gyur
202a5(1): te/ bskyed cing gdug pa 'dul ba yi// drag po lha yi sngags dag dang // de yi gzhal yas snang bar mdzad// b+h+rUM bi shA bi shud+d+he/ dz+nyA na ka pa la rat+na pany+tsa hUM/ ma ha de ba s+thi ra baM// sUr+ya tsan+d+ra maN+Da la hUM// de steng so
202a6(1): so'i sku nyid dag/ gsal ba'i rim pa dgod par bya// oM bud+d+ha ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/
202b1(1): oM rat+na ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM pad+ma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma hA tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn+ta ka ha na da ha pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM karma ma hA shrI he ru ka ma ha tsaN+Da sarba duSh+TAn+ta ka ha na da ha
202b2(1): pa tsa hUM hUM hUM phaT/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri sarba duSh+TAn+ta hU~M phaT/ oM ma hA badz+ra d+ha ra kro d+hi shwa ri dza la ni hUM phaT/ oM ma hA sUr+ya rat+na ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri bi da ma hUM phaT/ oM shrI sha ta sa man+ta pad+ma ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri
202b3(1): khA hi hUM phaT/ oM sarba a mo g+ha ma hA kro d+hi shwa ri bi shra hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra go rI ha/ badz+ra tsau rI ha/ badz+ra pra mo hA ha/ badz+ra bait+ta lI ha// badz+ra puk+ka sI ha/ badz+ra g+hasma rI ha// badz+ra sma shA nI ha/ badz+ra tsaN+Da lI ha/ badz+ra sa~M ha mu khI
202b4(1): he/ badz+ra byA g+hA mu khI he/ badz+ra sr-ing+ga la mu khI he/ badz+ra shra na mu khI he/ badz+ra gr-i D+ha mu khI he/ badz+ra kang+ka mu khI he/ badz+ra ka ka mu khI he/ badz+ra ul+lA kA mu khI he/ badz+ra Ar+ya te dza teng dza badz+ra a mu khA hUM/ badz+ra lo ka baM/ badz+ra
202b5(1): b+hasmai sa ma ya ba to hoH/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+ho b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+ho b+h+yo b+h+yo/ b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo b+h+yo/ badz+ra ma nu rak+ta si/ badz+ra brah+ma NI/ badz+ra ro tri/ badz+ra be ShA be/ badz+ra ko ma ri/ badz+ra in+da ye/ badz+ra
202b6(1): sUr+ya ye/ badz+ra ping+ga le/ badz+ra so me/ badz+ra a mr-i ta/ badz+ra daN+Da ni/ badz+ra rAk+Sha si/ badz+ra b+hak+Sha si/ badz+ra ra ti haM/ badz+ra ru d+hi ro ma t+yaM/ badz+ra e ka tsa raM// badz+ra ma no ha raM/ badz+ra sid+d+hi kaM/ badz+ra b+ha ya be/ badz+ra ma hA ma ra Ni/
203a1(1): badz+ra ag+na ye/ badz+ra ba rA hI/ badz+ra tsa muN+Di/ badz+ra pA ta nA/ badz+ra ba ru Ni/ badz+ra ma hA kA lA/ badz+ra tsa ka la/ badz+ra kum+b+ha kar+N+Na/ badz+ra lam+bo d+ha ra/ ru lu ru lu hUM/ e h+ye hi A na ya/ dzaHhUM baM hoHraM/ oM badz+ra kro
203a2(1): d+ha ya ma ya hUM/ oM khro la khros pas zhi mdzad pa// thugs rje khro dpal rngam pa'i tshogs// 'bar ba'i byin brlabs rmad po che// de nyid du ni bdag la stsol// oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya s+t+waM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya
203a3(1): phaT// badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ya hoH// a li u li hA li ta pA li// daMSh+Ta go na ro tri/ kha raM yo gi ni khA hi hoH/ hUM ha he phaT b+h+yo raM/ gsang sngags drag po mthu yis ni// phyogs bcu tshig cing rab tu tshig/ kun tu rab tu
203a4(1): tshig par 'gyur// 'bar dang rab 'byam kun tu 'bar// 'bar ba'i dkyil 'khor khro tshogs kyis// gang zhig rab gang kun tu gang // 'khrugs dang rab 'khrugs kun tu 'khrugs// 'thor zhing rab 'thor kun
203a5(1): tu 'thor// 'gul zhing ldeg pa de bzhin te// phyogs bcu dus bzhi gang ba yi// sgra bo che yang sgrogs par byed// phyogs bcu'i gdug pa ma lus pa// thul zhing brgyal nas myos gyur te// de dag bde bas bslang
203a6(1): byas te// bde ba chen po dgyes pa'i gar// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i mthar thug par// rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzugs kyis byed// rdo rje gsang ba rang bzhin las// thig le chen po'i dkyil 'khor bsgyur// gdod
203b1(1): nas thig le'i rang bzhin nyid// ma bcos thig ler gnas pa nyid// ma lus thig ler rgyas btab pa// nam mkha'i gzugs can de bzhin nyid// ma lus bde ba'i thig le nyid// khyab pa chen po'i rang bzhin
203b2(1): te// mtha' dbus bral ba bde ba che// snying rje chen por brjod pa yin// kun gyi rgyu ni thig le ste// ma lus sa bon rtsa ba nyid// mi shigs snying ga'i pho brang nyid// ye shes rdzogs pa'i gzhal yas khang // nam
203b3(1): mkha' lta bu'i mtshan nyid de// rgyal ba kun gyi bzhugs gnas so// nyon mongs gdug pa'i gdan khri nyid// gdul bya thub pa nyid du bstan// phung po nyon mongs lnga dag pa// rgyal po lnga yi rang bzhin te// rang
203b4(1): snying dngas mar bcas pa nyid// dbang phyug lnga ru brjod pa nyid// rnam shes yul du bcas pa nyid// rten dang brten par bcas pa yi// bde ba phra men bcu drug nyid// phyi lta nang lta dkyil 'khor nyid// dgug
203b5(1): dang 'dzin dang thig les bsdams// thig le'i rang bzhin gnyis su med// dbu ma'i thig le bcas pa'i lam// dbang phyug nam mkha'i dbang mo tshogs// dbab pa nye ba'i tshul bzung nas// thig le dbab
203b6(1): pa'i thabs bzhi yis// phab pas rang rgyud dngos po bsreg/ dran 'byung rig pa'i 'phro 'du tshogs// bde ba chen po'i don la 'jug/ gnyis med thim pas dkyil 'khor 'bar// sku gsung thugs su kun gsal
204a1(1): bas// gnyis med thim pas mnyes par mdzad// rang bzhin bde ba'i dkyil 'khor kun// rig pa nyams myong dbyings la thim// dran rtogs 'byung ba nyon mongs kun// tshigs pa gsum du shes
204a2(1): par bya// ye shes bde ba chen po nyid// 'bar ba gsum du shes par bya// byang chub sems kyi bde ba yis// ma lus gang zhing khyab par gyur// thig le gong 'og steng 'og nyid// thig le gong ma nyid 'og
204a3(1): tu// 'og ma nyid ni steng du 'bar// gcig gnyis lus kun khyab par 'thor// lus dang rtsar bcas 'gul ba dang // ldeg cing 'bar ba'i bde bas gang // bde bas dbang sgyur tshim pa'i sgra// ma lus khyab par
204a4(1): sgrogs par byed// sku gsung thugs kyi b+ha ga nyid// bde ba chen po nam mkha'i dbyings// 'byung bzhi rdo rje pad+ma nyid// reg pa 'dus pa'i bde ba nyid// re dogs rgyu ba chad pa nyid// de bzhin nyid du blta bar
204a5(1): bya// thig le 'dres pa'i bde ba yis// sa yang bcu gsum khyab pa'i yid// ma lus mkha' ltar dri med pa'i// rang 'byung phyogs med kun du snang // thabs dang shes rab bde ba yis// 'byung bzhi rim pa'i
204a6(1): dradangs ma ste// sa bon bde ba'i rgyu zhes grags// b+ha ga pad+ma'i snying po nyid// sku gsung thugs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi// bzhugs gnas bde ba chen po'i rten// sangs rgyas rin po che yi snod// phung po lnga dang nyon
204b1(1): mongs lnga// ye shes lnga yis zil gyis mnan// nyi zla pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po ni// bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin nyid// thig le phrad pa'i dus nyid na// ye shes lnga yi ro dang
204b2(1): ldan// gdul bya 'joms pa'i khro bo lnga// 'byung lnga dbang phyug rnam par bstan// myong dang yul bcas rnam shes yul// phra men nyid du shes par bya// phyag rgyar bcas pa'i sbyor ba bzhi// sgor bcas nyid du shes
204b3(1): par bya// sgal tshigs 'jug pa'i thig le nyid// dbang phyug bde bar shes par bya// gnyis ka phyogs pa'i rang bzhin nyid// bde ba chen po spyan drangs pas// rtog pa bde ba'i dkyil 'khor 'jug/ rim pa
204b4(1): gnyis med brda mjal mchog/ sku gsung thugs kyi thig le nyid// gnyis su med par thim par mdzad// rnal 'byor dbang phyug pho mo kun// bde ba chen po mnyes par gyur// sangs rgyas gab tse snying po la// ma
204b5(1): lus bde ba'i rang bzhin ldan// thig le gnyis med bde ba'i ro// ye shes lnga ldan zag pa med// phyi nang gang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid// ma lus 'dus pa'i rang bzhin te// nyi zla 'dres pa'i gar thabs
204b6(1): las// lhan cig skyes pa gsal bar 'gyur// sa ya bcu gsum gnyis 'dus pa'i// thig le rdo rje'i rang bzhin nyid// gnyis med 'khril ba zhes bya ste// rang rig bde ba chen por thim// sangs rgyas rin chen
205a1(1): de yi dbyig/ kha sbyor snying po za ma tog/ sku gsung thugs kyi pho brang las// ma lus thig le gnas par mdzad// sku gsung thugs kyi pho brang ni// bde ba chen po'i gnas nyid de// rdo rje snying po rtsa
205a2(1): dang 'brel// gnyis med bde ba'i thig ler gnas// gsang ba'i thig le chen po ni// ma lus 'dus pa'i bcud nyid de// gsang ba yon tan rdzogs pa'i mdzod// snying po'i lam la gnas par bya// rdo rje nyi ma'i
205a3(1): snying po la// rdo rje zla ba'i 'od kyis brgyan// gnyis med thig les gang ba yi// bde ba chen po'i rang bzhin 'char// brten las byung ba'i rten can nyid// gang la gang gis mnyam sbyor bas// thabs chen thabs
205a4(1): las byung ba yi// bde ba chen po 'bar bar 'gyur// de nas rdo rje khrag 'thung nyid// rang rang thugs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid// gdul bya'i ngo la dgongs mdzad de// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor snang bar mdzad// rdo rje
205a5(1): rdo rje dril bu dang // 'jig rten khor yug bcas pa 'degs// de bzhin 'khor yug bcas pa 'degs// de bzhin 'khor lo dgra sta dang // kha T+wAM rab tu 'khrol ba'o// nor bu rin chen rgyu zhags dang /
205a6(1): dgra sta rab tu rdebs// chags mchog pad+ma chen po dang // dril bu rnga yi sgra sgrogs pa'o// las ni ral gri gshol chen dang // 'jig rten rgyang mar 'phen pa ste// bar ma rdo rje dung dmar 'khrug/ sti ra chen por
205b1(1): brdebs pa'o// btsun mo khrag 'thung chen mo yang // 'khril bas pad+ma rak+ta stobs// gnas dang yul gyi phyag rgya ni// byis dbyug mda' gzhu rgyal mtshan dang // byis snying rdo rje za rdeg tshul// byis snying dung dmar
205b2(1): byis rgyu dang // mgo lus 'brel ba'i tshul du gnas// steng 'og phyi nang bsnol ba dang // byis ldag khog pa dral zhing lha// rgyu mgo zhig khur rgyu gri dang // rdo rje lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o// lcags kyu zhags pa lcags
205b3(1): sgrog dang // dril bu 'khrol bas slong bar byed// slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs// bcu gnyis dang ni brgyad kyis mdzes// rang gi stan dang lag cha dang // ci bgyi zhes ni chas te gnas// kun kyang mdzes pa'i
205b4(1): rgyan dang bcas// zhal 'dzum steg mig 'khril tshul can// dbu skra ral pa lcang lo bcings// sha da pa yi glu len cing // dmar la rdul ldem chags pa'i tshul// snam zhing che la rked pa phra// nu 'bur stod smad bye
205b5(1): zhing 'gying // dmar la klan zhing 'dud tshul can// gus dang steg pa'i ngang tshul 'chang // so so'i gdan la 'khod pa ni// srin mo smug nag thod rlon 'chang // tshangs pa dmar ser pad+ma bsnams// lha chen dkar
205b6(1): ljang tri shA la// gtogs 'dod sngon mo 'khor lo 'chang // gzhon nu dmar mo mdung thung 'phen// brgya byin dkar mo in+d+ra gdengs// rdo rje ser mo tsan+dan 'thung // bdud rtsi dmar mo pad+ma bsnams// zla ba dkar
206a1(1): mo puN+Da rI// be con ldang gnag dbyug to 'phyar// srin mo dmar mo dung khrag 'atung // za ba ljang nag pa su 'dren// dga' ba dmar mo ka tar 'chang // stobs chen dkar mo gshol 'dzin ma// rdo
206a2(1): rje ser mo spu gri gcod// 'dod pa dmar mo mda' gzhu 'gengs// nor srung dkar mo bum pa 'dzin// rlung lha sngon mo ba dan 'phyar// gsod byed dkar mo ral gri so// me mo dmar mo gsal shing
206a3(1): 'chang // phag mo nag mo mche zhags can// rgan byed dmar mo zhing chung za// sna tshogs dkar mo thod khrag 'thung // chu lha dmar ser sbrul zhags 'dzin// rdo rje nag mo lcags kyu 'dzin// rdo rje ser mo ra mgo
206a4(1): zhags// rdo rje dmar mo lcags sgrog sdom// rdo rje ldang gnag dril 'khrol 'gying // so so brjid pa'i stabs ldan pa'o// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ste// rnam par spro ba'i rgyas pa'i phyir// sku dang gsung
206a5(1): dang thugs nyid dang // yon tan phrin las khro bo'i phyir// lnga bcu brgyad ldan bye brag lnga// sngags dang phyag rgya'i ting 'dzin dang // sku mdog bzhugs tshul rim pa dag/ rigs rnams ji ltar 'gyur ba brtag/ de
206a6(1): ltar bsams dang bris pa dang // brjod dang mos pa'i sbyor ba yis// ji ltar 'tsham par bsgom par bya// de nas bcom ldan dgyes chen pos// rngam pa'i zhal gdangs spyan zlog cing // mche gtsigs phyogs
206b1(1): bcur gom pa yis// 'jigs pa'i stang stabs gar mdzad pas// 'jigs byed bcu ni rnam par 'phrul// oM oM oM moM oM moM oM oM oM oM/ ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba ba/ dza dza dza dza dza dza dza dza dza dza/ kro kro kro kro kr-i
206b2(1): kro kro kro kro kro/ d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha d+ha/ hUM ka ra bi dza ya/ ni la daN+Da/ ya man+ta ka/ ar+ya a tsa la/ ha ya gr-i ba/ a pa ra dzi ta/ a mri ta kuN+Da li trai lo kya bi dza ya/ ma hA ba la/ s+yAh+nA D+b+h+yAM n+ma tsI n+daM hAM hA hAM tAM/ phaT paT
206b3(1): phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ 'di dag mngon du phyung ba yis// ri bo sa gzhi 'gul byed cing // rgya mtsho ma lus 'khrug pa dang // sngags kyi sgra chen grag par 'gyur// hUM mdzad rnam rgyal dbyug sngon
206b4(1): can// gshed po mi g.yo rta mgrin dang // gzhan 'joms bdud rtsi khams gsum rgyal// stobs chen khro bo 'di dag gis// rang rang 'gegs kun rnam par gzir// ma lus 'jigs shing 'joms par
206b5(1): mdzad// gardza gardza/ ha na ha na/ da ha da ha/ pa tsa pa tsa/ ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/ hu lu hu lu/ tiSh+Tha tiH/ tshin+da tshin+da/ b+hin+da b+hin+da/ s+pho Ta s+pho Ta/ hUM hAM hAM hAM hUM hAM hAM hAM hUM hUM/ phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT phaT/ khro bo'i
206b6(1): rgyal po 'di dag kyang // blo dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// bskal pa'i me ri nang rol du// bri'am bsam mam dmigs bya ba// mthing ga dkar po mthing nag dang // ljang sngon dmar gnag dud ka
207a1(1): ldang // dkar ljang dung dmar mdog tu snang // kho mo lus dang grib mar gnas// 'khor lo nr-i mgo rdo rje stir// drang srong 'bar bar bcas pa dang // gshi rje'i rkang bzung zhing dbyug
207a2(1): 'phyar// ral gri bden bral stir dbyug gshog/ ba dan brgyad thogs be raM nyid// rin chen nr-i mgo gsum gyi dbyug/ rdo rje rtse gsum nr-i mgo dang // thong gshol gtun shing g.yas g.yon thogs// yang na zhal
207a3(1): gsum phyag drug ste// blo ldan rnam par bsams nas ni// bgegs dang gdug pa rnam par 'jig/ pho brang 'khor dang rnam par bsgom// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rang lus rten dang brten pa
207a4(1): yi// dkyil 'khor nyid du gsal bar brtag/ lte ba snying ste sku gsung thugs// thig gis cha chen cha chung bcas// gnas bzhi dngas ma 'byung ba ste// khog pa dur khrod gzhal yas khang // ka ba gdung dang rta/
207a5(1): babs dang // bla bre rdo rje ra ba dang // 'khor lo dra ba dra phyed dang // nyi zla skar khung rdzing bu dang // bskyed shing g.yas g.yon 'khor lo brtsegs// cod pan nyi zla pad+mar bcas// rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i gzhal
207a6(1): yas khang // rang 'byung tsit+ta'i 'khor lo na// thig le ye shes lnga bdag nyid// ma lus thig le 'dus pa'i ros// cho 'phrul bstan dang gdug pa 'dul// so sor 'khor lo dgod pa yi// ting 'dzin rdzogs pa'i
207b1(1): tshul du bsgom// 'byung bzhi dwangs ma yum nyid de// bde ba'i dngas ma nam mkha'i khams// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// rang bzhin khams lnga'i rang bzhin bcud// zla ba nyi ma gnas pa yi// shrI ra
207b2(1): tsit+ta'i thig le la// nang gi gdug pa 'joms pa dang // spyod yul bde bar sbyar ba dang // thig le so sor dgod par nus// phye bas rim pa'i 'khor lo ste// bsdus pas thig le chen po nyid// thig le ye shes
207b3(1): lngar ldan pa// thabs nyid dwangs ma yum du bshad// rnam shes thig le nyams myong nyid// tha mal 'joms pas khro mor snang // gnas kyi thig le rtsar bcas pa// phra men nyid du shes par bya// gnas bzhi 'jug
207b4(1): pa'i sgo nyid de// sgal tshigs la brten bde ba'i bcud// 'phro zhing sdud pa dbang phyug ma// gnas rten bcu yi thig le la// 'joms pa'i rang bzhin gsal bar byed// nyams myong skye dang rnam pa med// spyod
207b5(1): yul dag pas nang du bshad// zla ba nyi ma la brten te// sku gsung thugs kyi lam rgyud de// thig le g.yo dang 'bar ba dang // re dogs med dang rnam par dran// bde ba'i yan lag bzhi ru 'gyur// 'khyud pa
207b6(1): gar gyi phyag rgya bzhis// rdo rje snying po'i pad+mar 'brel// bskyod pa rlung dang mnyam sbyor bas// nyi ma zla ba dus gcig 'char// de nyid kun du khyab pa las// ma lus lhan cig skyes par 'gyur// bde ba chen po
208a1(1): gnyis med pa// kha sbyar bsrub pa'i thabs las skyes// thabs las byung ba'i gsang thig le// ma lus 'dus pa bcud kyi ro// rten la brten can nyams myong ba// lhag pa'i ye shes thabs las
208a2(1): skyes// chos dbyings la sogs ye shes lnga// thugs nyid mtshon phyir mtshan ma ste// gang la rten dang 'bar dang 'dzag/ bde ba'i rlung dang nam mkha'i khams// de bzhin btsun mo dgyes skyed pa// mi phyed gnyis
208a3(1): med lhan cig pa// gang de thabs las byung ba yi// dngos gnyis yul dang dbang po'i tshogs// lhan cig skyes pa'i thig le nyid// ma lus bde bar rang snang ba// gnyis med 'dus pa'i stobs las
208a4(1): byung // gnas yul phyag rgya'i thig ler bstan// dgug dang 'khyud dang bsdam dang 'bebs// ye shes 'jug pa'i sgo yin te// sgal tshigs brgyud pa thig le'i rgyud// dbang phyug mar ni shes par bya// ba spu thig
208a5(1): le 'brel pa nyid// phra mo bsam mi khyab snang ba// grangs las 'das pa'i phyag rgya ste// bsam byas nam mkha'i zhing du sbyar// sku bzhi las byung gsang thig le// khams gsum bcud 'dus bde chen po// yungs
208a6(1): kar lhung med brtan pa las// ma lus khyab pa'i tshul gyis snang // thig le bde chen thabs sbyor ba// thob dang gom pa'i rang bzhin las// zhen pa'i 'du shes bral 'gyur bas// rang dbang med pa'i rtags
208b1(1): 'byung ste// sbar zhing mnan pa'i cho ga bya// snang dang rig pa sna tshogs chos// bde ba chen po'i thig ler brten// nyi ma'i snying po lta ba ltar// bltas pas mthong ba med pa'i don// ma lus bde chen rgyan du
208b2(1): snang // de nas gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor bshad// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa yi// ji snyed ma lus chos bstan pa// rang 'byung ye shes chen po ste// de nyid dngos po sna tshogs mchog/ ji snyed brtan g.yo snang
208b3(1): ba'i chos// chen po rags pa gnas pa'i chos// ma lus kun la mthun snang ba// rang 'byung thabs kyi ngo bo nyid// de dag gdod nas ma skyes pa'i// rdo rje shes rab stong nyid de// gang yang dngos min ngo bo
208b4(1): nyid// shes rab yum gyi rang bzhin no// ji snyed nam mkha'i mthar thug pa// rang 'byung byang chub sems kyi gzugs// ma lus kun gyi rang bzhin nyid// dpag med mthun par snang ba ste// me long dang ba'i rang
208b5(1): bzhin nyid// sna tshogs gzugs dang 'brel pa bzhin// ma lus rig pa'i thig le las// ma lus sku yi dkyil 'khor snang // ji snyed rab 'byam ma lus pa'i// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa dang // zin dang ma
208b6(1): zin gnyis ka'i sgra// nges pa dang ni ma nges pa'i// 'khrul dang ma 'khrul sna tshogs pa// brjod dang bsam dang 'phrul pa dang // byin brlabs mtha' yas rang snang ba// byang chub sems kyi gsung mchog
209a1(1): ste// nam mkha'i sgra dang brag ca ltar// rang rgyud med pa'i rig pa nyid// bsam pa mtha' yas ji snyed par// ma lus gsung gi dkyil 'khor nyid// rang rgyud brtan po min par gnas// gang du
209a2(1): nam mkha' mtha' klas par// bskal pa mtha' thug med pa'i bar// nam mkha'i char dang chu bur dang // sprin dang chu rlabs phung po ltar// ye shes bde dang sdug bsngal dang // nges dang ma nges dam pa
209a3(1): dang // dman dang chags dang chags bral dang // zin dang zhen dang ma zhen dang // rnam pa rnam med brtags pa'i chos// dran rtog rig pa gang yang rung // ma lus rig pa rang snang ba// snga ma dran pa'i rnam
209a4(1): pa'am// rmi lam sgyu ma'i nyams myong ltar// sna tshogs snang yang rang rgyud min// gang yang rang rgud kun bral ba'i// ma lus dkyil 'khor bshad pa rnams// rang rgyud med pas gzugs brnyan te// thabs dang
209a5(1): shes rab gnyis med pa'i// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor lhun gyis grub// rang 'byung ye shes skye 'gag med// ma lus mi phyed rdo rje'i gzugs// rnam pa mthar thug med pa nyid// yon tan lhun grub rang snang
209a6(1): bas// de yi brnyan ma rang bzhin 'char// mtha' bral rang 'byung dkyil 'khor ni// cir yang snang la mi dmigs phyir// yang dag brtan par mi gnas pas// ma lus gzugs brnyan dkyil
209b1(1): 'khor shar// bde chen rang 'byung lhun grub nyid// yon tan rdzogs pa'i nor bu ltar// dpag med chos su snang ba'i phyir// bde ba chen po'i gzugs brnyan te// skye bo dag dang ma dag pa'i// gdul bya mtho
209b2(1): dman rim pa la// rig spyad spro ba bskyed pa'i phyir// dang po nas bzung mthar thug par// rang rang bsam pa de bzhin du// de dag ngo la de ltar snang // gzugs brnyan phyi yi rim pa ste// thun mong yul du gyur
209b3(1): phyir ro// ma lus tha dad med pa yi// phyi nang snod bcud rdzogs pa'i lus// bcud ldan bde ba mdzad pa'i gnas// mi shigs thig le kun gyi dngos// rang 'byung bde ba chen po'i gzugs// drangs snyigs
209b4(1): 'brel pa'i nus mthu las// zag pa yod dang med pa yi// dngos po gnyis kyi chos su snang // rgyu yi thig le'i rang bzhin la// nus pa'i khyad par so so yis// 'byung ba dang ni yum nyid dang // bde ba chen po la
209b5(1): sogs pa// thig le nus pa'i stobs las snang // ma lus 'khor lo'i snying po nyid// thig le 'bar ba bde ba'i gzugs// rtsa yig bye brag bcas pa ni// bcud 'dus thig le ros gang ba// ma lus rten can
209b6(1): dkyil 'khor nyid// ma lus snod bcud kun du snang // thabs chen gsang ba'i rim pa nyid// khams bzhi las brten thig le nyid// g.yo dang 'dzag cing gnas dang thim// bye brag gsum las rgyud pa yis// gru
210a1(1): dang sgyu ma'i 'khrul chu la// zhugs dang 'thungs pa'i spyod yul lam// me long dang po'i ri bo yi// rtser phyin ma lus bltas pa ltar// bde chen gzugs brnyan nyid du snang // rim pa bzhi yi thig le
210a2(1): nyid// bde ba'i 'du byed gang bskul ba// gnas bzhi'i thig le'i bye brag gsal// mu tig phreng ba brgyus pa ltar// 'dzag dang 'bar ba'i thig le nyid// til 'bru 'bras bu smin pa ltar// ma lus til gyi phung
210a3(1): po ltar// thig le'i lus su gnas pa yin// nyams myong gsal bar 'bar ba'i tshe// 'dar dang rdul dang ba spu ldang // 'phar dang sgra 'byin dpa' bo'i gar// rnam par rol pa'i tshogs su snang // snang srid bde
210a4(1): ba chen po nyid// tha mal nub cing brtan gyur na// thig le nam mkha'i stobs kyis sbyang // rtse gcig nam mkha'i mthong stobs kyis// thig le stong par thim pa na// ye shes nam mkha'i gzugs su nges// snang
210a5(1): srid snod bcud ma lus kun// bde chen rig pa'i gzugs brnyan du// rgya mtsho mdzings nas bltas pa ltar// ma lus de ltar snang ba yin// rig pas nyams su myong ba dang // spyod yul dag pas nang du
210a6(1): bshad// rang 'byung bde ba chen po nyid// gsang ba'i gang zag gdul ba dang // gsang ba'i nyams myong mngon bstan phyir// thabs dang shes rab 'dus pa yi// cho ga'i bya ba kun ldan cing // dbang bskur byin
210b1(1): brlabs sbyang ba dang // brgya phrag gsum dang drug cu dang // drug cu rtsa bzhi rdzogs pa yis// chu skyes snying po rdo rje can// nyi ma me shel 'od 'byung ba// rang 'byung rlung gi phyag rgyas bskyod// nor bu chu 'dzag rang
210b2(1): dbang med// ma lus rig pa'i thig ler bsdus// rgyu ba'i rlung ni chad pa na// rig pa stong pa'i thig ler thim// a ta la rten thig le'i rim// rgyu dang mi rgyu'i rang bzhin las// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das par
210b3(1): snang // gsang ba'i thig le la rten pas// ma lus bde chen 'khor lo sgyur// lus kyi thig le dang por te// de nas rig pa'i thig le yin// de nas ye shes thig le nyid// tha ma chos nyid thig ler thim// de nas
210b4(1): dus gsum 'du 'bral med// bde chen nam mkha'i khams nyid de// zab cing rgyu ba med pa yi// rang rgyud zhen chags kun bral ba'i// bde ba chen po'i gzugs brnyan shar// ma rtogs khyab pa'i gzugs brnyan
210b5(1): te// rtogs pas nyams myong gzugs brnyan nyid// mthar phyin ye shes gzugs brnyan 'di// dman dang yan lag ma tshang dang // dbang dang man ngag med pa dang // dka' thub can dang ma smin dang // skal med
210b6(1): yal ba'i yul min pas// gsang ba'i gsang chen dam pa nyid// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// lhag pa gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor nyid// tha mal brod pa bskyed pa'i phyir// cho ga rgyas par bshad par bya//
211a1(1): dkyil 'khor chen po rtogs 'od kyang // ji bzhin mngon du ma gyur la// lhag par 'di yis rtogs 'gyur bas// lhag pa zhes ni bstan pa yin// gang gis gang la gang mtshon pas// lhag par
211a2(1): mtshon par nye ba dang // gang la brten te gang bsgrubs pa// lhag par myur du 'grub pa'i phyir// 'dis ni lhag pa nyid du brjod// gang las gang de thabs 'di yis// mngon par lhag pas lhag pa'o// rgyal ba
211a3(1): kun gyi sku gsung thugs// thabs de gang gis mngon ston cing // dngos gzhi nyid ma yin pa'i phyir// gzugs brnyan nyid du bstan pa yin// gang la brten pa'i thabs nyid kyis// de nyid 'dra bar snang ba
211a4(1): ltar// ma mthong mos pa'i gdul bya la// de dang 'dra ba'i thabs nyid de// dngos min 'dra phyir gzugs brnyan no// rgyal ba kun gyi rang bzhin no// dpag med ye shes lhun rdzogs pa'i// ye shes rang 'byung lnga
211a5(1): yi gzugs// zag med gdul bya'i ngo la snang // de yi yon tan gzugs brnyan gyis// zag bcas mos pa'i gang zag la// sku gsung thugs kyi rnam pa nyid// 'dra bar mtshon phyir gzugs brnyan no// gang phyir
211a6(1): chos dbyings ngo bo la// tha dad dbye ba mi gnas kyang // mos dang drag po'i dbang gyur te// gang gis gang de mi 'dul bas// thugs rjes kun la khyab pa'i phyir// longs spyod sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor
211b1(1): bstan// zhen pa can dang nga rgyal can// thabs dang drag pos tshar bcad phyir// de ltar so sor 'tsham pa ste// lhag pa gzugs brnyan gnyis su bshad// gang du bkra shis yid 'ong ba'i// steng 'og phyogs bzhi
211b2(1): bar mtshams dang // legs pas yid 'ong bar chad med// phyi nang ri bo dgon pa'i mchog/ rang gi sa gzhi legs brtags la// pra dang nyams kyis ltas brtags la// ma dag mtshan ngan spang byas la// dag
211b3(1): cing nyams dga' blang bar bya// sa gzhi byin brlabs bkra shis pa// gal te rtsod pa gzhi bya'i phyir// snang dang mi snang bdag po la// mgu bas bar chad med par bslang // gang de dbang du bya ba'i phyir// cho
211b4(1): ga'i yan lag kun brtsams te// mchod dang mnyes pas tshim byas la// sa gzhi bdag gis dbang du bya// thun mong skyon bsal dag byas nas// mi dmigs chos la blo sbyangs shing // dngos grub myur zhing nyams
211b5(1): dga' ba'i// phyi nang dag pa chen por sbyang // rang bzhin byin brlabs kun gyi dngos// gdod nas ma bcos gnas pa la// lhag pa'i bden pa dbyer med pas// lha dang gzhal yas ngo bor brlab// gang de'i
211b6(1): bar chad bsrung ba'i phyir// sprul pa'i dkyil 'khor gsal btab la// rdo rje khro bo'i 'khor lo spro// hUM bzhi sngags dang bcas pas bsrung // de dag legs par gzung ba'i phyir// ma dag pa ni mtshams bcad
212a1(1): de// las kyi bya ba kun rdzogs nas// rgyal ba kun la gsol btab la// 'dod pa'i don rnams grub pa'i bar// dngos grub gter du ming gis gzung // gang phyir bshad pa'i cho ga yis// ma dag
212a2(1): pa dang ngan pa dag/ rtogs dang ting 'dzin cho ga yis// mnyam pas re dogs med par gnas// dkyil 'khor phyi nang bshad pa bzhin// tshad ni rjes su mthun pa ste// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// yang na
212a3(1): sor bzhi tshad du ste// yang na mdzub gang tshad du bya// yang na lus gang tshad du ste// yang na lus ni gsum bzhi nyid// yang na bcwa brgyad nyid du'am// nyi shu lnga yi tshad du bya// yang na rgyang grags dpag tshad
212a4(1): de// rang gi rig pa rjes mthun par// nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa'i tshad// tshad dang ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor te// yid 'ong byug bdug nyi shu lngas// mdzes shing legs par byas nas ni// gang dang 'brel
212a5(1): pa'i cho ga brtsam// gzhan du longs spyod ma byas pa'i// ras ba la dur khrod rgyu las byas// gsar zhing grims la 'jur mdud med// byin brlabs lnga dang sku gsung thugs// thim pas ye shes thig skud
212a6(1): de// rig pas thig ni gdab par bya// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// gsang ba'i 'phro 'du de bzhin no// dkyil 'khor yid 'ong pho brangs// ma nor gsal bas thig tu bshad// gang gis gang mtshon
212b1(1): de bzhin te// kha dog lnga dang phung po dang // khams dang skye mched rnam shes sogs// ye shes dkyil 'khor mtshon phyir ro// rtogs pas 'khor ba'i rgya dral phyir// tshon zhes kyang ni brjod pa nyid// ma mthong
212b2(1): rmongs la stan phyir tshon// kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga'am// lnga yi tshon gyis bri bar bya// gser dang dngul dang bai DUr+ya// pad+ma in+d+ra ni la nyid// rin chen lnga dang ldan pa yis// mkhas pas 'byor ldan ci bder bri// yang
212b3(1): na 'bras dang sA lu la// kha dog bsgyur bas de bzhin no// dman dang 'byor pa chung ba yis// 'byung khungs lnga yis bri bar bya// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// rgyal ba bcu nyid thim pa yis// ye shes
212b4(1): rin chen phyi nang med// dag pa'i ngo bor blta bar bya// oM aM hUM swA hA/ sarba pany+tsa rat+na sa ma ye hUM/ 'bru bcu spung zhing 'bun pa yi// sngags dang phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab// zhi ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus la// ye
212b5(1): shes rin chen rtsig pa ste// dra ba dra phyed rta babs dang // rdo rje zla phyed 'dod yon dang // rin chen sa gzhi skyed shing dang // rdzing bu dril bu g.yer khas spras// rtag tu bri zhing bsgom par bya// gdug pa 'dul ba'i
212b6(1): dkyil 'khor la// thod pa sna lnga sna gsum dang // thod skam rtsig pa'i rim pa bzhin// tshangs dang lha dbang la brten pa// mchog chen brgyad ni yin par 'dod// lhag ma rnams kyis thog phub ste// gza' brgyad
213a1(1): nyi zla'i glo skar ldan// sbrul dang zod pa'i phreng ba nyid// dra ba dra phyed rnam par spras// phyi nang rgyu 'bras gdug pa dag/ gdul phyir rta babs bzhir bshad de// sor phreng thod pa'i phreng ba
213a2(1): dang // dbang po nyi zla'i phreng bas sgras// khro mo sha lnga bdud rtsi dang // dur khrod 'dod yon ldan pa'o// dur khrod sa gzhi khrag dang bcas// skyes bu gsal shing phyogs mtshams brgyad// rak+ta'i mtsho brgyad rba
213a3(1): rlabs 'khyil// zod tshal brgyus pa dur khrod rlung // 'jigs pa'i sgra dang me 'od ldan// zhing 'phan phyogs mtshams brgyad dang bcas// lha chen thod pa sbub stengs na// tsit+ta'i tog las 'od zer 'phro// he ru ka
213a4(1): yi dkyil 'khor nyid// ma lus bri zhing sgom par bya// ma lus 'gro ba'i re skong bas// rin chen phreng dang rgyan du ldan// mi 'jigs stobs sogs kun ldan pas// stobs ldan theg par gnas pa yin// spyod la
213a5(1): skyon gyis ma gos pas// pad+ma 'bar bas mdzes par snang // thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas// nyi zla mdzes pa'i gdan la bzhugs// bde chen don las mi 'da' bas// 'khril sbyor dgyes pa'i tshul du
213a6(1): bzhugs// sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs// yongs rdzogs sku yi rgyan du gnas// lam dang byang chub yan lag rnams// rdzogs phyir phreng ba la sogs tshul// thugs rje 'khor ba mi gtong bas// chu srin klu
213b1(1): phrug bzung ba bzhin// thugs rje bar chad mi mnga' bas// 'brel ba bar chad med par gnas// brtson 'grus 'khor ba spong ba'i phyir// ri dwags dag ni mnyam par gnas// zag med spyan gyis kun gzigs
213b2(1): pas// dge sdig spyan gyis gzigs par bstan// ma lus zil gnon stobs rdzogs phyir// bya khyung dag ni gnas par bstan// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor byas shing // nyon mongs tshad pa'i gdung sel
213b3(1): bas// thugs rje gdugs kyi 'khor lo bstan// ma lus gcig tu 'dus pas na// tog stong 'od zer 'bar ba ste// gdul bya'i bsam pa'i don phyir bstan// lha rnams so so'i rnam pa ni// sku mdog sna tshogs
213b4(1): bzhugs tshul dang // gdan dang phyag mtshan rgyan du bcas// pho mo'i tshul dang bcas pa rnams// de bzhin nyid la dmigs pa dang // gdul bya gzigs pa'i tshul nyid kyis// gtso 'khor phyi nang lta tshul
213b5(1): gyis// bzhugs thabs rim pa so sor bstan// rang rang snying po gang yin pa// kha dog so sor phye nas ni// gsung gi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir// rim pa bzhin du gsal bar bya// rang rang thugs mtshan
213b6(1): gang yin pa// kha dog dbyibs dang bcas pa nyid// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor bstan pa'i phyir// rim pa ji bzhin dgod par bya// gdug pa 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor yang // dung chen ras chen la sogs pa// sku
214a1(1): gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo nyid// rim pa bzhin du gsal bar dgod// de bzhin nyid la dmigs med de// stong zhing mi dmigs rig pa nyid// gang la rtog dpyod mi gnas pa// chos dbyings de
214a2(1): bzhin nyid du bsgom// bden gnyis dbyer med mnyam pa nyid// ye nas khyab kyang ma rtogs pas// phyogs med snying rje nam mkha' ltar// rnal 'byor pas ni bsgom par bya// rang 'byung ye shes rnam pas
214a3(1): ni// yig 'bru rnam pa gsal ba las// zhen 'dzin sbyangs nas yig 'bru yi// 'phro 'dus 'byung lnga rim gyis bskyed// bruM gyis gnyis med 'od sbyangs nas// gzhal yas khang ltar yin par bsgom// rnam pa'i
214a4(1): gang yin de dag dang // rang rig sa bon gnyis med las// 'bras pas gang yin gtso bo nyid// bskyed cing dbang bskur byin brlabs nas// 'khor yang mi phyed 'dres par bsgom// yongs rdzogs smin cing
214a5(1): brtas pa la// dzaHhUM baM hos gnyis med de// 'dod pa mthar zug bar du bsam// las kyi bya ba kun zin nas// thun mong mchod pa sna tshogs dang // kun bzang mchod pa la sogs pa// lha mo brgyad dang bcu
214a6(1): drug gis// mchod pa'i rim pa brtsam par bya// rin chen sna lnga rta glang dang // 'bru dang bang mdzod khang khyim dang // bu dang chung ma bran khol dang // gnas dang zhing dang na bza' dang // rgyan phreng bza' btung
214b1(1): longs spyod dang // rdzing dang chu mig 'bab chu dang // mtshe'u dang khron pa lu ma dang // ri dang de'u dang skyed mos tshal// kho ra yug dang lhun po dang // skye bo mang po bro glu dang // nam mkha'i dbyings dang mnyam pa
214b2(1): yi// mchod pa sna tshogs rgyas par mchod// dpa' bo sha lnga bdud rtsi lnga// bcud dang rol mo snang ba dang // sna tshogs dri dang byug pa mchog/ dag cing legs par dbul bar bya// thar pa la sogs zhing gi
214b3(1): mchog/ dngos dang lha spyod ting 'dzin gyis// bsgrub bya ma lus kun bsgral te// rdo rje zhing du bskyed par bya// lha mo mi mo rig pa mo// cho ga'i sbyor ba rang rtog bzhin// dngos dang ting 'dzin sbyor ba yis// bde
214b4(1): ba chen po rol mo yis// phyi nang nam mkha'i khams bkang ste// rin chen lha mo yo byad dang // reg pa nyams myong bde ba yis// rgyal sras zhing gi rdul snyed la// gnyis med dag pa'i tshul gyis mchod// rol mo
214b5(1): glu dbyangs bcas pa yis// dkyil 'khor rim pa bstod par bya// rdo rje gsum gyi bzlas pa yis// mtshan ma legs par snang ba na// sbyang dang byin brlabs dbang bskur dang // mchod dang brtan pa'i cho ga
214b6(1): dag/ rtog pa'i cho ga rgyas par bya// dkyil 'khor de yi phyogs bzhi ru// rnam bzhi las kyi me zab la// dus bzhir rang rang rdzas dag gis// lha bzhi tshul gyis mchod par bya// de nas gnang thob dbang phyug
215a1(1): nyid// dkyil 'khor zhugs shing nus ldan nas// thugs rjes 'khor ba bsgral ba'i phyir// skal ldan slob ma gzhug par bya// dpal ldan rdo rje sems dpa' yi// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo
215a2(1): che// mngon du mthong zhugs bsod nams gang // 'dir zhugs pa nyid de bzhin no// gang du sku gsung thugs ldan pa// gang du mos pas spro bskyed phyir// rgyal ba kun kyang 'phrul mdzad de// sgo gsum byin gyis
215a3(1): rlob par mdzad// rnal 'byor cho ga rdzogs pas kyang // gdul bya zhi dang khro ba la// so so'i mtshan ma nyid bstan phyir// sku gsung thugs kyi rnam pa dag/ bris dang brdungs dang blugs pa dag/ so so'i gnas su
215a4(1): legs par dgram// ma lus sku gsung thugs dkyil 'khor// 'di las ma gtogs lha gzhan med// gang du dbang dang 'brel pa ni// bco lnga'i rim pas byin brlab phyir// bzhi dang brgyad kyi dkyil 'khor
215a5(1): la// yab yum bcwa brgyad gnas par bya// bcu gnyis bcu drug dkyil 'khor la// bzhi bcu gnyis dang ldan par bya// nyi shu'am nyi shu rtsa lnga la// rgyas pa'i cho ga rim par dgod// 'di dag lugs dang 'bur
215a6(1): dang bzo// bri dang sgom pa dag kyang rung // 'di ni phyi yi dkyil 'khor ro// zab mo'i dbang gi dkyil 'khor ni// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// sor bzhi mdzub gang la brten te// phyi rol rnam pa'i rjes
215b1(1): 'brang min// mthong dang brtan dang goms pa ni// rim pa bzhin du gsal bas 'byung // brgyud pa lam gyi rim pa yis// mthar phyin nyams su myong bar 'gyur// dbang bskur thabs kyi rim pa yis// byin
215b2(1): brlabs man ngag yid ches bya// 'di ni dbang gi dkyil 'khor te// de bzhin gnas skabs gzhan du yang // thun mong tshogs la sbyang ba'i phyir// 'byung lnga rgyu dang bdag nyid dang // mkha' dag byin brlabs so/
215b3(1): sor gdon// rang gi cho ga'i sbyor ba yis// ji ltar brtsams pa 'grub par 'gyur// bsod nams tshogs zhes bya bar bshad// gzhan yang stobs ldan rnal 'byor pas// gang 'dod mngon du bsgrub pa'i
215b4(1): phyir// 'chi med tshe yi dkyil 'khor dang // mtshan ma pra yi dkyil 'khor dang // dug 'joms bdud rtsi'i dkyil 'khor dang // cho 'phrul ro langs la sogs pa// gang bsgrub don phyir gang bshad pa// de nyid
215b5(1): bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor ro// las bzhi lha yi rnal 'byor gyis// rigs dang mthun pa'i sa gzhi la// thab khung so so'i mtshan ma can// phrin las dkyil 'khor nyid du bshad// slob dpon nus pa stobs ldan
215b6(1): pas// rdo rje lus su brtan bya'i phyir// rgyang grags dpag tshad la sogs pa// sku gsung thugs su mngon gsal ba// rnal 'byor skal ldan spyod yul te// tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor nyid du bshad// de nas gzhan
216a1(1): yang bshad bya ba// mtshan ma rtog pa'i rang bzhin gyis// mthong bya don la sgrib pas na// de dag sbyang ba'i cho ga bshad// tha mal zhen pas brtags pa'i don// lhag pa'i bden gnyis rtogs
216a2(1): bsgoms pas// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// sku gsung thugs kyi ngang du bsreg/ dkyil 'khor lha yi mtshan ma dag/ rnam pa ji snyed gnas pa dag/ rang rig rnam par 'phrul pa nyid// mtshan ma thig le'i ngang
216a3(1): du sbyangs// thig le rim pa'i snang tshul te// phyi nang med pa'i byang chub sems// dngos dang dngos med kun sbyangs te// rang rig byang chub sems kyi me// phyogs bcur 'bar zhing dbyings la sdud// rnal 'byor
216a4(1): las rung goms pa yis// gzhan don rtsom pa'i don byed na// dang por nyes byas gsum sbyang phyir// rnam gsum khrus kyi rim pa brtsam// gdug pa 'dul ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis// bar chad bgegs dang dpral
216a5(1): byas la// bkug bcings bstims la rnal du gzhag/ bsrung dang byug bdug rgyan gyis brgyan// 'khor ba'i sa bon kun bkod de// las kyi cho ga thim pa dang // dkyil 'khor 'phro 'du rim pa yis// 'khor
216a6(1): ba'i sa bon sbyang bar bya// de tshe sdong bu gnas bkod de// sdong bu re la lha rnams kyi// snying po tshang bar gdags pa dang // gsol gdab gnang byin sras su bskyed// 'jug dang dbang bskur las rdzogs
216b1(1): nas// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin te// las bzhi me yi las byas nas// rtog tshogs lha gsum dbyer med pa'i// rang rang gnas su dag pa la// sbyin sreg glu bro gar gyis mchod// las kyi bya ba kun zin
216b2(1): nas// thig le chen po dang la bsdu// de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor te// ma lus byang chub sems nyid de// de rtogs bya phyir bshad par bya// chos rnams ma lus thams cad
216b3(1): dang // dkyil 'khor ma lus thams cad kun// tha dad dbye ba mi gnas te// byang chub sems kyi dkyil 'khor nyid// rang 'byung mtho dman med pa yi// sku gsung thugs dang lus ngag yid// ma lus gzhi rtsa
216b4(1): snying po ste// rang 'byung byang chub sems la 'dus// de nyid rang rig 'od gsal ba// dngos po ma yin dngos med min// gnyis ka ma yin gnyis med min// mtha' dbus cha shas kun bral ba'i// zab cing
216b5(1): yangs la rgya che ba// de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul de// rtog ge rnams kyi yul min pas// gsang ba'i gsang ba byang chub sems// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi
216b6(1): gsang // skye ba med las thams cad skyes// skyes pa nyid las skye ba med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // 'gag pa med las thams cad 'gag/ 'gag pa nyid na
217a1(1): 'gag pa med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // gnas pa med las thams cad gnas// gnas pa nyid la gnas pa med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi
217a2(1): chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // dmigs pa med las thams cad dmigs// dmigs pa nyid na dmigs pa med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi
217a3(1): gsang // 'gro 'ong med las 'gro dang 'ong // 'gro 'ong nyid na 'gro 'od med// ma skyes rig pa'i byang chub sems// dngos med dngos po'i rang bzhin du// rdo rje sems dpa'i ngo bo nyid// g.yo dang mi g.yor
217a4(1): bcas pa yi// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus la// rang 'byung sems kyi dkyil 'khor nyid// rang bzhin gnas dang rtogs pa dang // bsams dang dmigs dang goms pa yi// sku gsung thugs kyi mtshan ma
