217a5(1): dang // lha dang lha min gsang ba dang // sha za 'byung po mi'am ci// grul bum yi dwags klu rnams dang // rgyu ba'i srogs chags ma lus dang // rtsa shing gel pa 'bras bu dang // phun sum tshogs pa ma lus pa// ma
217a6(1): bcos don gyi lha nyid de// byang chub sems su khyad par med// lha zhes gzhan du bstan pa yang // tshig gi tha snyad tsam du zad// byang chub sems la gnyis med par// rtogs pa'i don la gcig tu bstan// snying
217b1(1): rje chen po'i rang bzhin gang // gnas pa'i don dang ma phrad pas// ma lus snying rje'i gnas gyur pa// snying rje byang chub sems yin te// mi 'gal don du rab sbyor ba// kun rdzob byang chub sems su brjod// ji
217b2(1): snyed rnam par bcas pa'i chos// ma lus mtha' yas bstan pa kun// byang chub sems kyi rnam 'phrul te// nam mkha'i cho 'phrul ji bzhin du// sna tshogs snang bzhin dngos po med// de dang ji ltar gnas kyang
217b3(1): rung // byang chub sems las gzhan min yang // thun mong yul phyir phyi ru bshad// rang lus phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor la// rang 'byung 'khor lo drug gnas pa// g.yo ba yaM gis skyod byed pa// 'gro ba kun gyi lus
217b4(1): la gnas// 'phen dang sdud pa'i rang bzhin can// snyigs ma'i dus su'ang bde ba 'char// smin pa gru gsum smad na gnas// rnam thar sku gsum rtsa mdud can// 'bar zhing thig le 'bebs dang gnas// rang
217b5(1): lus bde chen smin byed pa// de la gang rten bde ba'i gnas// sangs rgyas rin chen gab tse la// zung ngu a snying lte bar gnas// 'khrul zhing 'dzag dang gnas pa'i rtsa// rdo rje dbu ma'i lam dang 'brel// khyab
217b6(1): cing rgyas pa'i snying po can// sum cu gnyis gnyis rtsa yig ldan// d+harma tsakra snying po'i gnas// rtsa bzhi yan lag brgyad kyi dngos// dngas snyigs shes pa brgyad kyi rten// rgyu ba bzhi yis shes par bya// dngas ma
218a1(1): 'dus pa'i thig le nyid// a la brten pa'i hUM gis sdud// ye shes lnga yi rang bzhin can// bde ba mngon shes chos nyid la// rim pas mthar phyin 'byung bar 'gyur// bcu drug sgra sbyor thig le
218a2(1): can// 'dab ma A li ldan pa yis// ma lus sgra skad bdag nyid can// khyab pa gsung gi bdag nyid can// sde tshan bcu dang ldan pa nyid// 'byung 'jug gnas pa'i lam yin te// thabs dang shes rab bskul ba
218a3(1): yis// bde ba 'byung 'gyur the tshom med// sum cu rtsa gnyis dkyil 'khor na// thig le de yi mnyam pa'i dbyings// ma lus 'byung ba'i rgyur gyur cing // lus can kun la khyab par gnas// kun gyi dngos yin
218a4(1): kun gyi gtso// ma lus kun 'dus gnyis su med// spyi gtsug 'dus pa'i snying po nas// rkang mthil gsang ba'i gnas yan chad// sku gsung thugs kyi ka bas bzung // snod bcud rgyud rnams rang bzhin
218a5(1): bcud// drangs snyigs 'dres pa thabs kyis 'byed// g.yo ldang smon 'jug gnas mthar phyin// skad cig rim pa skye 'gyur ba// khams lnga 'dus pa'i ro yi stobs// sems lnga rim pas shes par 'gyur// 'di
218a6(1): nyid gsum du bshad pa ste// skabs kyi rim pas sbyar ba nyid// rtsa dang thig le bde ba yis// phyi nang gsang ba'i tshul du bshad// de nas rgyal rigs rje rigs dang // bram ze gdol pa gar mkhan ma// yid 'ong
218b1(1): na tshod dar la bab// nus dang chags pa che ba dang // bka' blo bde zhing yid mi 'khrug/ lus ran sha mdangs dkar dmar phyed// skad snyan dran pas yid 'phrog ma// bcwa brgyad bcu drug bcu bzhi dang // bcu
218b2(1): gnyis ldan pa'i bu mo la// sbyor ba tshang zhing rtags byung nas// tha mal spangs pa'i sbyor ba yis// sa ya bcu gsum gnyis ldan pa'i// gsang dbang 'dus pa'i khams lnga las// gser 'gyur sman dang mun sel
218b3(1): ltar// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pa'i// nyi ma zla ba rtse phrad pa'i// ma lus 'dus pa'i rtse 'khor lo// 'byung 'jug gnas pa rlung dang 'grogs// ldang bas tha mal shes pa 'gag/ g.yo bas nyams nyid rtse
218b4(1): gcig pa// smon pas yid gcig 'dres pa ste// 'jug pa dzaHhUM baM hoHste// shes pa bde bar 'jug pa nyid// gnas pas yun ring gnas pa ste// mthar phyin 'dres pa'i gar thabs kyis// brjod bral thig le'i
218b5(1): bstan pa mtshar// tha mal zhen pa nub gyur nas// zhen pa ldog cing rig pa zim// rnam shes brgyal ba la sogs 'byung // yid 'ong gzi ldan phyag rgya ma// mthong bas lus sems bde ba dang // phrad pas sdug
218b6(1): bsngal nyams par 'gyur// 'dris pas bde ba brtan po 'byung // thabs dang ldan pas spyad gyur na// bskal par sbyangs pas mi 'byongs pa'i// rnam rtog zhen pa log gyur nas// da lta bde ba chen por
219a1(1): rnams ni// gong ma'i lha nyid yin pa ste// thugs las 'od zer 'phro ba ni// bskal pa'i me ltar nyi ma'i 'od// de nas bskal pa'i 'khor lo bskor// gdug pa'i mtshon cha char ltar dbab// gang
219a2(1): dag gang gi gzugs byas la// tshon gyi skud pas gnyis gab bcing // bka' yi bsgo ba 'di yang bya// gang dag gnas pa'i bgegs chen rnams// shin tu bcings nas nga yi bka'// bka' las byung ba'i cho ga
219a3(1): ya// rab tu khros pa'i gnas 'di ru/ su yang 'da' bar ma byed cig/ rang rang sbyor ba gzhan du btul// de skad bsgo ba byas nas ni// gdug pa'i ral gri lag thogs la// khro mo rnams kyang de bzhin de// so
219a4(1): sor gtso bos bskul ba yis// ral gri steng du dus gcig phyir// gdug pa'i mche ba gtsigs pa yis// ded dpon thams cad dred cing brgyal bar bya// gdug pas bcings pa bcad gtub bsam// gzugs
219a5(1): brnyan ku sha'i rtsa la byas// sna lnga tshon skud phyag rgya yis// gtsug phud yan lag nyid lag dang // dbang po kun ni bzung nas su// yum gyi phyag rgyas dgrol bar bya// de nas tshon skud dum bu ru// ral gris rab
219a6(1): tu gtubs byas la// ku sha grangs ni bcu gsum la// dang po snying gi phyogs nas ni// glas gang cig gis bris nas su// gzugs brnyan cig gi dbus su gzhug/ de nas yon bdag rigs gang gis// mchil
219b1(1): mas rab tu btab nas su// glas gang cig gis yang dril la// tshon gyi sku dpas bcing bar bya// de nas lag pa g.yas phyogs nas// ku sha bcu gsum pa bsog byas nas// snga ma bzhin du ral gris
219b2(1): gtub// de nas lag pa gnyis pa la// gong ma bzhin du byas nas ni// glas gang cig gis dril nas kyang // byed cing de la bsrung bar bya// de 'og gsum pa'i las bya ba// bden pa bdar ba bya nas ni// lha
219b3(1): dang bdag po thams cad la// gnod byed ma mo mkha' 'gro ma// gdon dang 'byung po'i tshogs rnams kun// de dag ral gris gcad par bya// de nas dpung pa g.yon pa la// sogs par rgas gang dril nas
219b4(1): su// gong ma'i tshul du rtswas dkris la// ral gris rab tu gcad par bya// de 'og las kyi thabs rnams la// gong bzhin las thabs byas nas su// bdag gi phun sum tshogs pa dang // dbang thang gang gis
219b5(1): phyogs pa rnams// de dag rab tu gcad par bya// de 'og las kyi bye brag gsum// gong ma bzhin du rtsa la ni// sngon dmar dag gis bcing bar bya// de bzhin ral gris bcad nas su// lag pa thal mo
219b6(1): gnyis sbyar la// mthe'u chung phyogs nas bzung nas su// gnod sbyin gdon rnams gcad par bya// gung mo phyogs nas bzung nas su// klu yi gdon rnams gcad par bya// srin lag phyogs nas bzung nas
220a1(1): mun bsal te// rig 'dzin sa nas sa ru sbyang // glu lnga tshig lnga rigs lnga yis// phyogs phyogs bltas te brjod pa ni// 'gro ba kun gyis bde thob cing // chos kyi dung chen sgra yang sgrogs// phyi nang
220a2(1): rgyan gyi yo byad ni// rin chen ze'u brog rna cha dang // lag gdub rkang gdub mgul do dang // na bza' rgyan gyis gang brgyan pas// yid 'ong ting 'dzin gsal ba dang // 'gro bas blta ba'i 'os su 'gyur// rlung
220a3(1): dang nus pa'i stobs ldan zhing // sgo gsum bag chags zad 'gyur te// byin brlabs rlung la dbang thob pas// A li kA li mnyam sbyar ba// bcu drug rdzogs pa'i dus sbyar bas// bdag po gdung can phrad pa'i
220a4(1): tshe// nyi zla dus gcig shar ba'i tshe// thun mong thun mong ma yin pa'i// spyod yul nus pa kun bzlog nas// mthong lam rang gi mtshan nyid skye// zla ba'am zla phyed dus mtshams sogs// bde chen nyams myong rgyun
220a5(1): mi 'chad// mthong ba'i don la mnyam bzhag pas// brtan zhing nges pas gdeng du gyur// sku ni phyag rgya chen po ste// bde chen zag med ting nge 'dzin// bskal pa brgya phrag stong du yang // bde ba chen po rgyun mi
220a6(1): 'chad// sprul pa'i longs spyod mdzad pa yis// 'jig rten khams mang 'gro ba dag/ de tshe 'gro ba'i dbyings su sbyor// rdo rje lus thob de phyin cad// skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung yin// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu
220b1(1): drug gis// dbang sgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub// de tshe bcu drug tshun chad kyis// ye shes thig le de nyid la// ye shes thig le nyid snang ba// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog/ gang zag rim par 'jug pa
220b2(1): rnams// dang por dngos don mthong ba yis// tshe 'dis sa la bgrod bya zhing // bsam byas lhun grub nyid thob phyir// lta spyod ting 'dzin rim 'brel bas// bar chad med pa'i lam la 'bad// gnas skabs
220b3(1): rim pa ji snyed kyang // tha mal pa dang log spyod dang // mos pa la sogs yul min te// nus dang grub pa thob pa yis// gsang ba lam dang 'brel par bya// rnal 'byor chen po lnga la gnas// rim nas rim par
220b4(1): brtan gyur te// gsal ldan mi g.yo thob pa la// nyam nga med pa'i stobs ldan pas// pad+ma la ni 'dam bzhin te// spyod pa so so gnas pa yis// rtsa ba spros bcas rnal 'byor te// bsgrub pa dus kyi tshogs la
220b5(1): gnas// yan lag tshogs kyi spyod par gsungs// gang phyir dkyil 'khor nges bstan pa// rang rig mtha' dbus med pa dkyil// ye shes bzhi 'phros 'khor lo'i tshul// 'jig rten 'das pa dkyil nyid
220b6(1): de// 'jig rten sna tshogs 'khor du bshad// rig pa'i don nyid dkyil nyid de// cho 'phrul rang 'byung 'khor du gsungs// rdo rje sems dpa' dkyil nyid de// rigs bzhi lha dang lha mo dang // khro bo khro mo 'khor
221a1(1): du bshad// lha yi ting 'dzin dkyil nyid de// spyod pa yo byad 'khor du bshad// gang la gang gis rgyas btab pa// goms dang brtas pa'i dbang gis na// ji ltar snang grags chos thams cad// de
221a2(1): dang de yi ngo bor 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud las dkyil 'khor ma lus par bshad pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// dbang bskur cho ga

222b1(1): dbang bskur bas// rnam pa dang bral dbang rnams ni// nyams myong dbang du rang shar te// thob dang brtan dang goms pa yis// 'jig rten brgya dang stong phrag bcu// 'bum sogs bdag gzhan don rdzogs

222b6(1): sems// mi ldog dang brtan tshul gyis bzhugs// dbu rgyan cod pan phreng ba dang // gdugs dang bum pa bza' btung dang // go cha phyag rgya rgyal mtshan dang // snying po lnga yis dbang bskur ba// rang bzhin ngo

223a3(1): bos gnas pa la// ji ltar chu la chu bzhag dang // thabs dang ting 'dzin dbang bskur bas// mi nus nus pa thob pa'i tshad// mi nus pa la bskur ba min// tshad ldan rnams la rim pas bskur// rig ma las kyi

223a6(1): pa gsum sbyangs te// rtsa bcud thig le'i ngo bo nyid// mar me 'od ltar gsal gyur pas// bde chen nyams dang rtags thob pa// da lta nyid 'byung the tshom med// rdo rje nyi ma rab ldan pa'i// bcu bzhi bcu drug rab
223b1(1): lon pa// phyi nang gsang ba'i yon tan nyid// byin brlabs rig ma lha mor byas// chags pa bskyed pa'i thabs rnams nyid// blo dang ldan pas mngon sum bya// de nas cho ga kun rdzogs nas// bla mas gnyis med
223b2(1): gtad bya'i phyir// byin brlabs sbyor ba byas nas yang // gnyis ka'i srin lag bzung nas ni// slob ma 'di la legs gtad la// gsang ba'i gnang ba sbyin par bya// skyes bu 'di bzung bzang ba yin// de ring
223b3(1): phan chad bu mchog khyod// sgo gsum lha ru mnyam sbyor bas// tha mal dman pa'i lta ba spongs// bde ba chen po nyams myong bas// dka' thub theg pa'i lta ba spongs// thabs dang shes rab gnyis med pas// bde
223b4(1): ba'i nyams myong brtan par byos// brtan pa bar chad med bsgoms pas// rdo rje 'chang gi sa la 'gro// de bas skal ldan rigs bzang kye// gtan du 'bral bar ma byed cig/ sbyor ba'i thabs dang ting 'dzin
223b5(1): dang // rgyu ba'i rlung la dbang thob pas// thig le'i las la thogs pa med// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor rdul phran snyed// ma lus 'dus pa'i thig le nyid// sa yang bcu gsum gnyis ldan pa// nyams myong brten cing
223b6(1): gnyis med sbyar// rlung gis brten pa'i thig le nyid// ro gcig dus mnyam tshul byung ba// drag pa ma yin dal ba min// dgongs pa nyams dang zhen chags min// A li ka li zhu ba'i sems// sangs rgyas phreng
224a1(1): pa gnyis su med// rdo rje pad+ma rab bskyod cing // 'khyud pa gar gyi phyag rgya las// nyi zla rtse phrad 'byor pa na// byed pa rlung gi thig le bzung // rgyu ba bcad cing thig le mnan// shes pa nam mkha'i
224a2(1): nga la gtad// dbang po shes rab che chung gis// lan gsum brtan par gyur pa'am// ma thob bar du sbyin par bya// rdo rje zla 'od mdzes ldan ma// dman dang rigs ngan rnam par spangs// rdo rje dbang pos ma
224a3(1): phog cing // gzhan dbang longs spyod ma byas pa// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bco lnga'am rung // thabs dang zas dang spyod lam gyis// bsnyen pa'i cho ga gzhung bzhin bya// rdo rje lce dang srin lag dang // srin lag
224a4(1): bcos ma la sogs pa// thabs dang byug pa'i yan lag gis// gsang ba'i pho brang rgyas par bya// 'khor ba zil gnon rtsa rnyed nas// bdag po gdung can rnam par sbyar// thig le myur bu la rtags byung nas// rgyu
224a5(1): ba rlung gi tshad du zung // nyi zla dus gcig shar ba la// 'khor ba zil gnon thabs chen po// myong bar chu rgyun ting 'dzin thob// gal te rtsa dang bral ba na// phaT dang ldan na 'phro bar 'gyur// dngas rlung mnyam
224a6(1): pas zin par 'gyur// bzlog pa 'dren pa'i hUM gis shes// sdud pa'i hUM gis bsdams gnas pa// thig les lus la khyab par byed// dang por sa bon 'jog pa ste// gnyis pas nus pa bskyed pa yin// gsum
224b1(1): pas nyams myong bskyed pa yin// bzhi pas de nyid brtan par byed// lnga pas brtan pas nyams blangs pas// mchog gi dngos grub tshe 'dis 'grub// rdo rje slob dpon gnang thob pa// nus ldan rab gnas cho ga
224b2(1): brtsam// de nas slob ma tshul bzhin gzhug/ sgo gsum mnyes pa kun bral ba'i// sdom pa'i dam tshig phog byas la// dbang bskur rim pa sbyin par bya// dbang gi nyams myong brtan bya'i phyir// gdams ngag
224b3(1): rjes mthun sbyin par bya// gdams ngag nyams brtan lam rim ste// lam mthar phyin pa 'bras bu nyid// drod mthar phyin dang sa brgyad dang // grags chen sangs rgyas sa dag la// rang rig rtags dang thugs rje
224b4(1): yis// 'dren stobs mkha' 'gro gsum du snang // mkha' dang sgra dang gzugs can gyi// pad+ma can zhes grags pa yi// sbyor dang glu dbyangs snang ba dang // gzugs tsam brtan pas grol bar 'gyur// dbang
224b5(1): bskur rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// ma bcos rdo rje dbyings dkyil 'khor// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor yan lag ste// bsgrub dang gdug pa gdul phyir yin// dpa la rtsa ba'i dbang thob nas// phyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
224b6(1): dbang thob bya// gdul bya mos pa'i dbang brtsan la// thun mong tsam du nges pa med// dang po gnyis pa gsum pa dag/ rdo rje sems dpa'i dbang bskur yin// bzhi pa dang ni lnga pa nyid// he ru ka yi dkyil
225a1(1): 'khor ro// dus gsum rgyal bas byin brlabs pa'i// ma nor lam ston slob dpon la// mnyes dang bkur bar mi byed cing // rang rang nus shing 'jug pa la// dbang bskur gnang ba ma byin
225a2(1): par// gsang ba bshad dang nyan pa dang // sgom dang bsgrub pa la sogs pas// bskal pa bye ba dpag med du// 'bras bu thob par mi 'gyur gyi// dmyal ba'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur// de ni dam pa kun brnyas
225a3(1): pas// nad dang sdug bsngal mang po dang // mkha' 'gro ma dang gdon gyis 'tshe// de nas nges par 'chi bar 'gyur// byin brlabs ldan pa'i bla ma yis// dad brtson brtul bzhugs rab ldan pa'i// rigs nges
225a4(1): skyes bu mchog nyid la// thabs kyis dbang bskur byin brlabs na// rgyal ba dang ni mkha' 'gro dang // rig 'dzin grub pa pho mo yis// tshe 'dir bsam pa kun skongs shing // byin brlabs dbang dang dngos
225a5(1): grub kyi// phun sum tshogs pa'i bdag por 'gyur// gang gis gang la dbang bskur bas// tha mal zhen pa dag pa dang // bde chen lam la mngon zhugs pas// dngos grub gang la thogs med de// las rnams
225a6(1): gang brtsams 'grub pa dang // 'dod pa'i don la rol ba yis// sa bcu rim pa mthar phyin nas// pad+ma spyan gyi sa thob ste// yi ge 'khor lo sa la gnas// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las// nyi shu rtsa lnga lhun
225b1(1): grub pa// dbang gi 'bras bu rang las shar// thabs chen 'di dang gang bral na// bskal pa gang gA'i bye snyed du// brtson pas 'bras bu tshol byed pa// 'dod pa'i 'bras bu stongs par 'gyur// gang phyir slob
225b2(1): dpon slob ma dang // dkyil 'khor rim pa ji bzhin du// las dang ting 'dzin byin brlabs kyis// 'jug pa'i cho ga gsum du bshad// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang chen
225b3(1): po// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i lam chen po// ma lus cho ga rgya chen po// dpal ldan rdo rje me long gi// 'jug pa'i rim pa ji bzhin du// gsang ba kun la shes par bya// rdo rje bla ma de nyid kyis// cha shas gus ldan mdzes
225b4(1): pa yis// me tog ldan pas 'khor lo nyid// mngon byas sku gsung bskul ba yis// dam tshig dran te dgongs par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor du// gsal dang rig pa'i stobs kyis ni// rdo rje slob
225b5(1): ma byin brlab phyir// slob dpon dag kyang 'jug par bya// de nas slob ma 'jug bya ste// khrus byas dri zhim gos bzang gyon// dad dang gus ldan rin chen bcas// gus bcas snyan pa'i tshig gis ni// lus
225b6(1): dbul dag pa'i sems kyis gnas// bdud rtsi 'khyil ba'i sbyor ba yis// bar chad sbyor bsal bsrung ba bya// cho ga gang yin lhar bskyed la// mtshan ma rdzogs par nan tan bya// rgyal ba kun gyi dam tshig lnga//
226a1(1): 'bru gsum sku gsung thugs ldan sbyin// snying gar rdo rje brtan byas la// dam tshig legs par dbog par bya// tsan+dan dkar dmar byin brlabs chu// lan gsum blud la snod dor ro// de nas
226a2(1): rang gis dam bsgrags te// gsang ba'i don la nges par bya// rang rang 'brel ba'i lha nyid la// rin chen dor te brtag par bya// sngags dang phyag rgyas de bkug la// bstim la dbyer med gnas pa la// rtag tu
226a3(1): byin brlabs gnas pa'i phyir// legs par brtan pa'i cho ga bya// mi shes rab rib bsal byas la// 'khor lo mngon pa'i nga rgyal bya// de nas lha dang dkyil 'khor gyi// dag pa rim gyis bstan par bya// de
226a4(1): nas bla ma sangs rgyas la// ma lus ci yod dbul bar bya// byin brlabs cho ga dag pa yi// dkyil 'khor mchod dang bsgoms pa dang // zhugs pa'i yon tan bsam mi khyab// rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid du
226a5(1): gyur// des na rigs su nges pa yis// dang por 'jug pa'i rim pa bstan// rtsa ba yan lag kun thob nas// rim pa bzhin du dbang bskur ro// de nas bla ma'i bka' mnos la// 'dod pa'i dngos
226a6(1): grub bsgrub par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud las dbang bskur ba ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// rdo rje dam tshig bla na
226b1(1): med// sdom pa brtan po dam bcas pa// 'di dag legs par bshad par bya// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// 'das dang ma byon dus gsum du// rgyal khrims tha tshig bkas bcad ltar// rim pas
226b2(1): dmod bor bkas bcas pa'i// byin brlas rang bzhin 'da' dka' ba// kun gyis bsrung bya yin par bshad// gang phyir dam pas byin brlabs pa'i// dam tshig chen po 'di nyid la// 'das dang da ltar ma byon
226b3(1): pa'i// rgyal ba sras dang bcas pa dang // rig 'dzin rnams dang mkha' 'gro dang // lha rnams dang ni mi rnams dang // klu dang mi min 'byung po'i tshogs// rdzu 'phrul ldan pa'i lha chen kyang // dam pa 'das pas
226b4(1): 'tshig par 'gyur// dam pa nyid kyi rang bzhin 'di// rgyal ba kun gyi dgongs pa la// sgra bzhin spyod pa'i gang zag rnams// log par spyad pas tshig par 'gyur// dam pa rnams kyi bkas bcad cing // byin
226b5(1): brlabs dmod bor rang bzhin grub// dam pa 'di las gang 'da' ba// rdo rje can yang tshig par 'gyur// dam pa rnams kyi dgongs pa la// dbang dang byin brlabs thob pa yis// dam pa'i tshul bzhin nges spyad
226b6(1): na// mi mthun phyogs rnams 'tshig par 'gyur// de phyir dus gsum sangs rgyas kyis// dam tshig ces ni rnam par bsgrags// bla na med pa'i dam tshig ni// ma lus rang rig byang chub sems// mtha' dbus
227a1(1): 'gro 'ong las grol ba// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid de// gang gis don rtogs gnas gyur pa// don dam byang chub sems su brjod// ma skyes byang chub sems nyid ni// skye ba'i rang bzhin nyid
227a2(1): snang ba// rang lus rgyal ba'i phyag rgya ste// ma lus der snang ngo bo gcig/ rang ltar sgo gsum gsal rtogs pa// kun rdzob byang chub sems su bshad// gsang ba bshad dang dbang bskur dang // man ngag lung
227a3(1): dang nyams chags skong // mchog dang thun mong la sogs pa// dngos grub ster zhing grol byed pa// 'di ni sangs rgyas mnyam pa'i phyir// skad cig gdung ba mnyam mi bya// rang gi lha dang gnyis med nas// phyag
227a4(1): rgya bzhir gsal rnal 'byor pas// rang gi sgo gsum ma nyams par// chu bo lta bu bar chad med// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ni// theg chen gsang ba nyid yin pas// snod med dman sogs log pa
227a5(1): la// gsang bcu la sogs brjod mi bya// dang por gsang bar srog gcig pas// byang chub snying por mi 'bral bas// rang srog rang gis gcod kyang sla// brtse gdung dam tshig bral mi bya// lam dang bsgrub pa'i
227a6(1): rtsa ba dang // dngos grub kun gyi rtsa ba dang // 'di dag nyams na kun nyams pas// rtsa ba zhes su bstan pa yin// yan lag thun mong dam tshig dang // thun mong min par bshad par bya// dang por gsang ba'i
227b1(1): lung thob nas// nus pa mngon du snang bar du// bdag dang gzhan phyir thun mong gi/ 'gal dang sgro skur kun 'das shing // kun dang bsam pa dga' byed pa// thun mong dam las mi 'gal ba// thun mong dam
227b2(1): tshig yin par bshad// thun mong ma yin gang zag gis// thabs chen thun mong ma yin pa// nyon mongs lnga dang spyod pa lnga// bdud rtsi lnga dang shes pa lnga// grub pa lnga yi chos rnams nyid// skyes bu rigs phyed spyod
227b3(1): yul te// thun mong rnal 'byor yul min pas// thun mong ma yin zhes su bshad// dang po nas bzung rtags thob par// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa yi// lus sems ma yengs rtse gcig pas// rnam pa dang bcas
227b4(1): dang du blang // sa thob goms dang mthar phyin par// ting 'dzin don la gnas pa'i tshe// 'gal ba'i sgo gsum mi 'byung bas// ting 'dzin rgyun gyi dam tshig la// rnam pa'i dam tshig ma lus 'dus// don las
227b5(1): langs tshe snying rje dang // rtsa ba yan lag shugs ldan yin// sangs rgyas sa la gnas pa na// 'da' ba med pa'i dam tshig ste// rgya mtsho rlan bzhin thob spangs med// bsrung med ye shes dam tshig ste// dam tshig
227b6(1): 'di ni rmad po che// bsnyen pa rtags dang ldan par du// spyi yi dam tshig bsrung bya zhing // bsgrub pa gang yin 'grub pa na// khyad par rang rang rtog pa yi// dam tshig med par 'grub mi 'gyur// gang zag gang la
228a1(1): dga' ba la// dam tshig dka' thub sgo nas ni// gsang ba'i don la dgod bya'i phyir// dam tshig rnam pa mtha' yas bstan// dang po las can rnal 'byor la// rtsa ba thun mong dam tshig
228a2(1): bstan// brtan nas nyams ldan gang zag la// thun mong min pa'i dam tshig bstan// rtogs pa'i 'jigs med gang zag la// 'da' nyams med pa'i dam tshig bstan// sa thob goms mthar phyin pa la// ting
228a3(1): 'dzin rgyun gyi dam tshig bstan// dngos grub rtogs pa kun dang 'brel// dam tshig 'di ni rdo rje che// sangs rgyas kun gyis byin brlabs pa'i// rtsa ba yan lag bcas pa 'di// thob nas dam par gang
228a4(1): bsrungs pa// yon tan chung yang 'grub par bshad// mchog dang thun mong la sogs pa// dngos grub rtog pa ma lus pa// cho ga gang dang ting 'dzin gang // bsgrub pa gang dang gang yang rung // ma nyams tshul du
228a5(1): rab brtson pas// myur du 'grub pa nyid du 'gyur// gal te byin gyis ma brlabs na// rdo rje 'chang nyid brlag par 'gyur// rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan nyid// dam tshig rdo rje las byung bas// dam pa 'di la gang
228a6(1): brten pas// yid bzhin nor bu lta bur gyur// dus gsum rgyal ba thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs dang yan lag gi// bsrung bya dka' thub dam pa 'di// kun gyis 'da' ba ma yin zhing // gnas pa dam pa
228b1(1): nyid yin te// las dang skal ba dman pa dang // rigs dman le lo che ba dang // rang bzhin ngan pa'i gang zag gis// blun po gang zhig 'da' byed cing // dngos grub gnyis la rgyab phyogs nas// dam pa rnams
228b2(1): la dmod byed pa// sangs rgyas kun la nyes byas pas// rdo rje 'dzin rgyal khros nas ni// bdun rgyud tshun chad brlag par mdzad// mkha' 'gro ma dang rig 'dzin dang // kha 'bar gtum 'khrug rngam pa'i
228b3(1): tshogs// de ma thag tu srog bcad nas// dmyal ba'i gnas su skye bar 'gyur// gal te 'jig par gyur na ni// 'jig rten gzhan du skye 'gyur zhing // ji srid nam mkha' 'jig pa'am// phyi yi rgya mtsho zad pa'i
228b4(1): tshe// thar te gzhan du nam yang min// dam pa'i bla ma spong ba dang // rdo rje mched la 'khu ba dang // byang chub sems nyid mi dran zhing // sngags dang phyag rgya yal ba dang // snod min gsang ba bshad pa
228b5(1): dang // gsang ba'i don la skur ba ni// 'dir yang sdug bsngal myong 'gyur zhing // skad cig 'gags pas de ma thag/ bar ma'i lus dang bral gyur pa'i// rdo rje dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur// gang du rtsa ba yan lag
228b6(1): bcas// bsrung dang dbog par bya ba'i chos// thun mong dbang dang 'brel bcas pa'i// thun mong spri yi yul gyur pa// de ni thun mong bsrung bya ste// 'di ni phyi yi dam tshig go/ thabs dang shes rab sbyar ba'i
229a1(1): sems// thig le'i sems lnga'i lam gyi rim// rig pa ma lus gsal ba'i tshe// thig le gnyis med nyams su byung // bde ba'i thig le'i bcud bskur bas// tshogs drug rang snang thig le'i
229a2(1): grogs// ma lus thig les byin brlabs pas// thams cad bde chen phyag rgyar gsal// thig le rig pa khar dbyung min// 'khor lo kha sbyor bde ba yis// tha mal bde bar dbang por bsgyur// rgyal ba'i
229a3(1): dgongs spyod thabs kyis myong // tha mal zhen pa rnam par bzlog/ thabs ldan don la gsang ba'i don// rang snying 'od kyi dkyil 'khor lnga// 'char dang nub pa'i rim pa yis// thabs chen gsang ba'i thig le
229a4(1): ltar// shes nas spang du med par gnas// rang 'byung gnas pa'i bcud lnga ni// rang lus rten gyi don snang ba// khyab par rgyu ba'i tshul dag gis// dngas snyigs gnyis kyi tshul du gnas// rang lus rtog pa
229a5(1): dadradangs snyigs dang // kha dog yan lag nyid lag gis// bde ba'i ye shes lngar shes dang // bde ba chen po nyid du gsungs// khams lnga bcud las skyes pa yi// ma lus thig le'i rang bzhin te// ye shes lnga yi ro/
229a6(1): ldan pas// rgyal ba lnga ru yang dag gsungs// thabs dang shes rab rdo rje dril// nyi zla'i rim pa'i 'od gsal ba// sems lngas mkha' la gsal ba'i tshe// rten can rten dang gnyis med pa// lhan cig skyes pa'i
229b1(1): ye shes snang // ma zin rdo rje lce yis blang // gnyis kyi rtog pa ma lus pa// bde chen ro gcig byin gyis brlabs// skad cig bral med bde ba'i sems// dus gsum mi 'bral brtan par gnas// rlung
229b2(1): dang thig le'i bzlas pa yis// thams cad bde chen phyag rgyar gsal// bde chen thabs dang nyams kyis te// brjod dang tshig gis phebs pa min// gnyis sbyor phrad pa'i bde ba yis// tha mal zad dang bde
229b3(1): chen sbyor// gang gis sbyin par mi nus pa// da ltar nus pa rang gis myong // gzhan gyi brdzun pa'i don 'di ni// thabs kyis bden par mngon du bstan// tha mal zhen pa spang ba'i phyir// kha na ma tho bag tsha
229b4(1): bral// skyes dang nus dang gnas pa'i tshe// rang bzhin lnga ni shugs kyis grub// rang gi rtsa bcud so so las// bdud rtsi bral ba med par gnas// 'byung lnga dbang po gzugs sogs bcas// thabs ldan sbyor
229b5(1): ba'i byin brlabs kyis// bde chen lhan cig skyes par shes// nyi zla rlung gis zin pa yi// mtshan ma bral ba ngo bo las// zhen pa med pa'i thabs chen pos// lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin las// ye shes lnga yi
229b6(1): ros gang bas// ma lus rgyal ba lnga ru grub// 'di ni phyi nang gsang ba yi// rang bzhin dam tshig chen po yin// dam tshig rnam pa mtha' yas pa// shin tu bsdus pa rnam pa gnyis// 'bring du rtsa ba lnga nyid
230a1(1): dang // yan lag bcu ru shes par bya// shin tu rgyas pa'i dam tshig ni// spyir ni sum brgya drug cu ste// rang bzhin 'od gsal ba nyid dang // nyid kyi dkyil 'khor snang ba dang // dus bzhi rgyal
230a2(1): mchog nyid dang ni// bsgrub med mnyam par rdzogs pa nyid// lhun grub bde gnas dam tshig dang // rnam dag byang chub gzung 'dzin bral// rtogs nas don 'dzin dam tshig dang // sems la gnas bcas dam
230a3(1): tshig dang // ye nas ma bcos dam tshig dang // 'dus byas rnam dag dam tshig dang // chos rnams dbyer med dam tshig dang // thams cad 'jigs med dam tshig dang // g.yung drung tshe 'phel dam tshig
230a4(1): dang // thams cad bsrung du med pa ste// 'di dag lta ba'i dam tshig yin// thams cad sbyor ba'i dam tshig dang // ma lus bsgral ba'i dam tshig dang // ma byin len pa'i dam tshig dang // brdzun du smra ba'i dam
230a5(1): tshig dang // thams cad spyod pa'i dam tshig dang // dam rdzas spyod pa'i dam tshig ste// 'di dag spyod pa'i dam tshig yin// bsgrub pa'i dam tshig rnam gsum ni// rdo rje skye gnas dam tshig dang // 'dren byed gnas
230a6(1): stobs dam tshig dang // lam la ston byed dam tshig dang // rab tu rtogs byed dam tshig dang // sgyur byed byang chub dam tshig dang // thams cad dbang sgyur dam tshig dang // rig 'dzin gnas stobs dam tshig
230b1(1): ste// bsgrub bya rtogs pa'i dam tshig yin// yum gyur dbyings phyug dam tshig dang // thabs nyid shes rab sbyor dam tshig/ shes rab thabs su sbyor de bzhin// glang po brjid gnon dam tshig dang // thams cad
230b2(1): mi chud dam tshig dang // thams cad bsrung ba'i dam tshig dang // ting 'dzin phyag rgya'i dam tshig ste// bsgrub pa thabs kyi dam tshig yin// tshogs kyi mchod pa'i dam tshig dang // tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor dam tshig
230b3(1): dang // tshogs kyi phrin las dam tshig dang // phra men tshim byed dam tshig ste// bsgrub pa'i phrin las dam tshig yin// yang dag don ston dam tshig dang // gsung mchog mtha' yas dam tshig dang // thams cad skad
230b4(1): mjal dam tshig dang // yi ge med mjal dam tshig dang // stong gsum kun grags dam tshig dang // ye shes gsung mchog dam tshig dang // bsam yas rdo rje gsung dam tshig/ mi 'gyur rdo rje'i dam tshig
230b5(1): ste// bdag gis shes bya'i dam tshig yin// shes bya ting 'dzin dam tshig bzhi// nam mkha' snang byed dam tshig dang // rten byed sa yi dam tshig dang // sreg byed me yi dam tshig dang // 'khrug byed chu yi dam tshig
230b6(1): dang // g.yengs byed chen po'i dam tshig ste// shes rab lnga yi dam tshig dang // phung po lnga yi dam tshig ni// thabs mchog lnga yi dam tshig yin// chos rnams gzugs brnyan dam tshig dang // sgra ltar shes pa'i dam
231a1(1): tshig dang // dri ltar shes pa'i dam tshig dang // ro ltar shes pa'i dam tshig dang // reg ltar shes pa'i dam tshig ni// gnyis su med pa'i dam tshig yin// kha dog lnga yi dam tshig dang // phyogs lnga yi
231a2(1): ni dam tshig dang // dbang lnga yi ni dam tshig ste// gsum po spyir khyab dam tshig yin// bde ba'i ngang nyid dam tshig dang // lhun grub ye shes dam tshig dang // mi 'jigs rgyal mchog dam tshig dang // mnyam
231a3(1): rdzogs lhun grub dam tshig dang // phyogs dus dbyer med dam tshig dang // nyid kyi dkyil 'khor dam tshig dang // chos la skyon med dam tshig dang // brjod med spros med dam tshig dang // phyogs dus gnyis med
231a4(1): dam tshig dang // gnyis med byang chub sems dam tshig/ 'dus ma byas pa'i dam tshig dang // thams cad rgyas 'debs dam tshig dang // thams cad mi 'gog dam tshig ste// ngo bo ting 'dzin dam tshig yin// grub
231a5(1): par bya ba lnga bstan pa// chos kyi 'khor lo'i dam tshig dang // rin chen 'byung ba'i dam tshig dang // pad+ma chags med dam tshig dang // don rnams grub pa'i dam tshig dang // 'jigs byed rdo rje dam tshig dang // de
231a6(1): bzhin sku nyid dam tshig dang // thams cad 'byor ldan dam tshig ste// sku yi dam tshig bdun du bshad// yang dag don ston la sogs pa// gsung gi dam tshig brgyad po nyid// rang la rdzogs par shes bya
231b1(1): ste// 'bras bu'i bsrung bas bsgrub bya yin// rang rig dbang sgyur dam tshig dang // che mchog rnam dag dam tshig dang // rang bzhin 'od gsal dam tshig dang // byang chub sdom byed dam tshig dang // thams cad
231b2(1): dbang sgyur dam tshig drug/ thugs kyi dam tshig nyid du bshad// byang chub zhing bkod dam tshig dang // ye shes bzhugs gnas dam tshig dang // gzhal yas khang bstan dam tshig dang // sna tshogs kun sgyur dam
231b3(1): tshig dang // zad med gter ldan dam tshig dang // bsgrub pa zad med dam tshig dang // zad med gter chen dam tshig ni// yon tan dam tshig bdun du bshad// thams cad byin rlob dam tshig dang // bdud sde
231b4(1): tshar gcod dam tshig dang // sems can don byed dam tshig ni// phrin las dam tshig gsum du bshad// spong ba rdo rje dam tshig dang // chags pa'i ye shes dam tshig dang // gti mug chen po'i dam tshig
231b5(1): dang // phrag dog chen po'i dam tshig dang // nga rgyal bde mchog dam tshig dang // nyon mongs lnga yi dam tshig ste// mi spong ba yi dam tshig yin// gtan du ma yengs bsrung ba ni// mnyam pa lnga yi dam tshig
231b6(1): dang // bden pa dbyer med dam tshig dang // sku gsung thugs sbyor dam tshig dang // lam lnga rdzogs pa'i dam tshig dang // thams cad bde sbyor dam tshig dang // rdo rje log 'joms dam tshig dang // 'khor ba
232a1(1): zil gnon dam tshig dang // ma bcos lhun grub dam tshig dang // thig le bde sbyor dam tshig ni// lta ba rgyun bsrung dam tshig yin// ting 'dzin rgyun bsgom dam tshig dang // bcing ba phyag rgya'i dam
232a2(1): tshig dang // bzlas pa sgra snyan dam tshig dang // sgo gsum mnyam pa'i dam tshig dang // shes rab bde sbyor dam tshig ni// ting 'dzin rgyun gyi dam tshig yin// tha snyad zil gnon dam tshig dang // spyod lam bde/

232a5(1): phal pa dang // yi dgas byol song srin po dang // gnod sbyin mnga' srin kha 'bar lce// lha dang lha min ru dra dang // rtsangs pa la sogs 'khor ba ste// chad pa'i skye gnas bstan pa yin// bsrung ba'i dam tshig
232a6(1): chen po yin// gal te stong pa'i don rtogs na// bskang dang nyams pa'i tshul med de// chad pa'i yul las 'das pa yin// gang zag 'ga' zhig spyod yul yin// gal te rtsa ba'i dam nyams na// bla ma grogs po
232b1(1): brgya dag la// bshags pa stong phrag brgya ru bya// bzlas pa bye ba phrag bdun bya// gtor ma 'bum phrag bdun du bya// sbyin sreg 'bum phrag bcu gcig bya// de nas slar yang blang ba'am// bla mas gnang nas
232b2(1): gnas par bya// gal te yul de mi gnas sam// lo gsum phan chad 'das pa 'am// gal te bshags pa'i tshul mthong bas// ma dad 'dod pa'i sems skyes nas// bskang ba'i tshad las 'das pa ste// bskal
232b3(1): pa chen po brgyad khri'i bar// bshags kyang dag par mi 'gyur te// rdo rje dmyal ba zhes bya bar// mi bzad sdug bsngal myong nas ni// ji srid nam mkha' gnas pa'i bar// mtshon cha'i 'khor lo bzhin du
232b4(1): 'khor// yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na// zla ba bdun du smra bcad bya// sbyin sreg stong rtsa brgyad du bya// bzlas pa bye ba tshad 'bum gcig/ gtor ma khri phrag gcig tu btang // de nas slar yang blang ba
232b5(1): dang // dag dang tshangs par bsgrags par bya// dag pa'i snod dang mi ldan par// gsang ba ston cing 'chad pa dang // dbang ma thob par bka' 'gom dang // bder gshegs bka' las 'das pa dang // tshad
232b6(1): nga ldan pa'i snod min la// gsang ba tshad du sgrogs pa dang // gsang ba nyams su mi len par// 'phyar bas kun la sbrel ba ni// tshad las 'das pa'i gang zag ste// sangs rgas kun la brnyas byed pas// dus
233a1(1): gsum sangs rgyas khros pa yis// bdun rgyud tshun chad brlag par mdzad// bla ma dang ni grogs rnams dang // pha ma gnyen bshes rgyal blon dang // rgyal 'bangs nyes med sdang ba ni// dam tshig
233a2(1): nyams pa'i rtags su bshad// zab mo dag la gegs 'byung dang // bsgrubs pas 'dod pa mi 'byung zhing // bsrung ba'i lha rnams g.yel ba dang // ma nyes ya kha 'byung ba dag dam tshig nyams pa'i rtags su

233b1(1): ga mdor bsdus bshad// rgyud kyi rgyal po ma lus las// thun mong dag la mos zhugs pas// thun mong yo byad ting 'dzin dang // sngags dang phyag rgya 'bral goms pas// rtags dang nus pa mthar phyin

234a1(1): sum tshogs// dam tshig dbang dang lta ba dag/ sngon du bya ba rdzogs pa yis// sngon du rnal 'byor gsum thob bam// dang po yid brtan gang yin kyang // gang la yid kyis dmigs pa de// cho ga ting
234a2(1): 'dzin 'brel pa nyid// rang rang rtog pa ji bzhin du// tha mal ba dang le lo dang // the tshom dad pa'i stobs kyis te// gal te de dag mi ldan na// sa thob kyis kyang ma yin na// gang zag skye bos smos ci
234a3(1): dgos// gal te dgug pa'i las bya na// bdag nyid dbang drag khro bo ste// dmar thag dud ka'i mdog 'dra ba'i// gong ltar gnas pa'i 'phro 'du ni// zhags pa lcags kyu sha stag ste// dmigs pa brtan cing
234a4(1): rtags thob nas// mngon du gyur gyi bar du ni// rang sngags brjod pa de yi mthar// che ge mo zhig dzaHhUM zhes// dgra dang bgegs dang lha dang gzungs// mthu dang rdzu 'phrul ldan yang rung // tha mal dbang med

234a6(1): bar gdon mi za// bdag nyid dbang drag gsal ba yi// lce la dbang gi 'khor lo bsam// yi ge gsum ldan dgu bkod nas// 'od kyis nam mkha'i khams bkang zhing // pad+ma rA ga zhu 'dra bas// gang thim

234b4(1): dang phyag rgya 'bar ba yis// bcings nas mdun du gnas par blta// dga' dang bsdigs pa rdzas kyi mtha'// ting 'dzin brtan pas nges par 'grub// med las dngos por nges grub cing // mi mthun brgyad
234b5(1): sogs nges 'grub na// yod dang snang ba'i 'gro ba dag/ dbang pos bsgyur ba smos ci dgos// gal te gso ba'i las byas na// las ni gnyis te brtsams pas 'grub// bdag nyid rtag par skyes nas

238b3(1): bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur// 'dis ni 'byung zhing dbang med cing // 'chi med rlung la dbang thob nas// cho 'phrul bzhi yis zil mnan nas// mngon shes gdug pa 'dul ba yis// las rnams mi 'grub
238b4(1): gcig kyang med// de nas gzhan yang chags ldan rim// skal bas dman dang sbyor bas zad// bde ba'i don 'dod dka' thub can// 'di dag don la thabs kyis dgod// thabs ldan lus kyi gong bu la// rang
238b5(1): rang cho ga'i thabs ldan na// bde chen gar thabs sna tshogs pa// rnam par 'phrul pa'i ro yis byed// bde chen longs spyod chos kyi gnas// sprul pa'i thig le bde ba'i ro// ma lus mkha' lnga'i rang bzhin
238b6(1): gyis// rang lus ma bcos gnas nyid bde// brtul zhugs thig le gsum thob nas// sgrol ma dang ni thig le dang // gnas dang thabs dang ting 'dzin gyis// bye brag brgyad cu kun 'dus pa'i// thabs kyis
239a1(1): mtshon pa las byung bas// dngos grub cho ga sna tshogs 'grub// rang brten thig ler bcas pa yis// drangs ma'i rang bzhin khyab gnas pa// bskul ba thabs kyi sbyor ba yis// ma lus bskyod cing
239a2(1): 'gugs par byed// drangs snyigs rgyu dang mi rgyu ba'i// rlung gi thig les dbang sgyur nas// 'phro zhing 'dzag pa'i thig le nyid// rlung gis 'ching ba nyid yin te// thig le snyigs mar nyams gyur pa// thabs dang
239a3(1): rlung bcud stobs ldan pas// pad+ma la ni chu bzhin no// rang 'byung thig le'i rang bzhin las// rten dang zag pa snyigs ma dang // 'khor ba'i rtsa dang sa bon dang // log rtog thig le zhen bcas pa// rang byung
239a4(1): nam mkha'i thig les 'jig/ rang lus bde chen snying po la// nam mkha' sprin ltar mi phyed cing // drangs snyigs bde ba'i rang bzhin nyid// thig le chu dang 'o ma dang // gnas pa rlung dang rten stobs
239a5(1): kyis// drangs snyigs phye la dwangs ma bstim// rang snying lus la 'od snang ba'i// phyi nang dngos rtog ma lus pa// rlung sogs 'khor lo'i 'phen stobs kyis// der mi gnas par goms par bya// gang du sa bon
239a6(1): snyigs bcas pa// nam mkha'i ye shes lnga 'bar bas// gang du rgyu bar bcas pa'i yid// de ma thag par rnam par brlag/ rlung dang rtsa dang thig ler bcas// thabs kyis bskul ba'i ro ldan pas// ma lus thig
239b1(1): le'i rang bzhin pas// mi mthun zhen pas rnam grol bas// rang sems rten bcas thig le ni// dwangs ma'i ye shes blo ldan pa// kun khyab bde 'byung snying po can// gsang ba'i rig pa'i gter kha 'byed// phyi
239b2(1): nang rgyu ba thig ler bcas// snying nang bde bar 'bar gyur nas// rang lus rtags su bde chen 'bar// mngon shes rin chen rtsa la phog/ rig pa'i mngon shes lnga ru 'char// de nas mi 'gyur stong pa'i
239b3(1): rtsa// 'gyur med kun snang rlung la thim// dman pas mi 'grub khyad par thabs// gsang ba'i thig le 'bab zhon gyis// rtsa bcud ting 'dzin 'brel ba'i stobs// bskal pa du ma'i stobs 'gags te// dwangs
239b4(1): ma'i ye shes rlung du grub// phyin pa med par mthar song ba// bde chen goms pa'i stobs las gyur// bcud lnga 'dus pa'i thig le ni// ro lnga 'dres pa'i bde chen de// sgom dang mthar phyin khyad par gyis// bde
239b5(1): ba chen po rigs mchog gnas// de nas gang yin brjod bya ba// zab mo kun rdzogs brtul zhugs can// dbang po dar zhing smin pa yi// chags can nyi zla 'dzin nus pas// spyi gtsug thig le'i 'khor lo/
239b6(1): nga / gsang ba'i 'og min nus ldan pa// 'byor pa'i rten can 'di nyid gnas// thabs dang rol pa'i khyad par dang // ting 'dzin rlung gi dbang thob ste// 'byung bzhi snyigs phye dngas dus su// nyi zla 'dres
240a1(1): pa'i gar thabs kyis// lha mo rnams dang lhan cig tu// rol pa'i thabs kyis gang rtsen pa// bye brag brgyad cu gnyis 'dus pa'i// pad+ma'i snying po kun bkug ste// thig le dpa' bo lnga yi
240a2(1): stobs// mi sdod 'phro ba'i rang bzhin nyid// thabs dang ldan pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// bcings la gzung 'dzin gnas par bya// de dang rtse phrad gnyis bzlog pas// bde ba'i myu gu gso byas pas// tha mal zhen
240a3(1): pa kun bral nas// rtog dang lhan cig gang skyes pa// dwangs snyigs phye ba'i nyams dag gis// snyigs ma bag chags zhe na bcas pa// de yi stobs kyis gnas mi 'gyur// gsang ba'i thig le stobs ldan
240a4(1): pas// rigs ngan tha mal zhen chags dang // dran rtog ma lus pham byas te// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin du// ma lus dbang btsugs rgyal bar mdzad// rdo rje pad+ma'i snying po
240a5(1): la// dga' ba'i rol pa'i bdag nyid kyis// thabs dang shes rab gsal ba'i ro// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba 'dus pa'i tshe// zag med yon tan gter chen de// gsang ba thabs kyis stobs las grub// bde chen
240a6(1): snying po thig le'i ro// dbab dang gzung bzlog 'byongs pa yis// rtsa gsum gang zhig thim pa'i tshe// bar chad med pa'i bde ba dang // thams cad mkhyen pa'i mngon shes dang // skye shi med pa'i tshe 'thob
240b1(1): cing // mi 'gyur chos sku thig le la// rgyu ba spangs pa'i tshul gyis gnas// bde chen cho 'phrul dpag med pas// gsang ba'i zhing khams dag byed cing // gsang ba chos kyi 'khor lo bskor// bde chen nyams
240b2(1): dang dga' ba'i gar// chags pa'i sgra ni sna tshogs pas// ji srid nam mkha'i mthar thug par// glu ni sna tshogs len byed cing // mdzes dang ngo tsha spangs pa'i tshul// mdog dmar rlan dang ldan pa yis// rol
240b3(1): pa'i tshul ni sna tshogs kyis// rdo rje bcud chen zlar bcas pas// nyi ma chags pa dang bcas pa'i// pad+ma'i snying po'i spongs mdzad cing // dga' ba'i 'od dang 'khyud pa'i gar// rlung gi snying po rjod byed
240b4(1): cing // srid pa'i myu gu 'gog par mdzad// rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba'i me long gi rgyud chen po las// bsgrub pa ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya
240b5(1): ba// rtag pa'i rgyal po ma lus pa// bya ba las kyi rim pa dag/ bzhir ni gsal bar gsungs pa yin// dang por zhi ba'i rang bzhin te// de 'og rgyas pas rgyas phyir ro// rgyas pas dbang du bya ba dang // dbang mi
240b6(1): 'du ba bsgral phyir te// thun mong khyad par yon tan rdzogs// bya ba'i las la ma rmongs shing // nus pa brtan pa'i rang bzhin gyis// rim pa ji bzhin brtsam par bya// gangs dkar 'dab dang yid 'dang ba//
241a1(1): zhi ba'i ljon shing me tog tshal// 'bras ldan rgyas pa'i rang bzhin no// sum mdo ngam grog gting zab pas// dbang du bsdu ba'i gnas su bshad// dur khrod mtshan gcig rgya gram gnas// 'byung
241a2(1): po 'du sar drag po shis// zhi la sa gzhi dkar ldan pa// zlum po sum rim oM dang bcas// 'khor lo 'od dkar dang bcas pa// zhi ba'i zab kyi rang bzhin no// rgyas la ser po tsan+dan bcas// gru bzhi rim
241a3(1): gsum traM dang bcas// rin chen 'od zer 'phro bcas pa// zab ni rgyas par gsungs pa yin// dbang la sa dmar chags 'od can// zla gam gzhu 'dra pad+mas mtshan// rim gsum hri dang bcas pa ni// dbang du
241a4(1): bya ba'i zab yin no// drag po sa nag dur sol can// gru gsum rdo rje rtse gsum gdeng // thod phreng 'od nag rim gsum hUM// drag po zab kyi rim pa yin// 'o ma can dang gser can dang // chags pa can dang
241a5(1): tsher ma can// phrin las bzhi ni so so yi// yam shing bsreg shing nyid du bshad// ling+ga kha dog so so ste// gnas kyang zab khung bzhi dang mtshungs// mar dkar 'bras dkar til dkar dang // nas dkar chan
241a6(1): dang 'o ma zho// dngul phye gtor ma dkar por bcas// zhi ba'i bsreg gtor rdzas su bshad// mar rnying bu ram sbrang rtsi dang // 'bras dang chan rnams ldog ros dang // me tog gser dang tsan+dan bcas// gser phye
241b1(1): gtor ma ser por bcas// 'di dag rgyas pa'i rdzas nyid de// dpal dang gzi byin rgyas par 'gyur// tsha ba'i mar dang chang skyur dang // ram bu pad+ma rak+ta dang // 'bras dmar tsan+dan zangs phye dang // gtor ma
241b2(1): dmar po dbang rdzas yin// tshil chen mar dang tsha ba gsum// klung chen sha khrag sran chen dang // dug gsum thal chen tsha ba'i mar// ske tshe phye gsum mi khrag dang // ming rus spel mar bcas gtor
241b3(1): mas// bsgral ba drag po'i rdzas su bshad// dngul lam dkar po'i shing rnams la// mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zlum po// logs la zhi ba'i lha bkod la// de bzhin gshegs par gsal bas gdab// gser ram ser
241b4(1): po'i shing rnams la// mgo rtse rgya mdud gru bzhi bcas// logs la rgyas pa'i lha bsgoms te// rin chen nga rgyal bcas pas gdab// zangs sam byu ru dmar shing rnams// mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zla gam// logs la
241b5(1): dbang gi lha bkod la// chags pa rdo rjer gsal bas gdab// lcags sam nag po'i shing rnams la// mgo bo rgya mdud rtse zur gsum// logs la drag po'i lha bkod de// zhe sdang rdo rjer gsal bas
241b6(1): gdab// oM dang traM hri hUM nyid las// 'byung lnga'i rim pa gsal stengs su// e baM ma ya b+h+rUM las bskyed// gzhal yas zlum po gru bzhi dang // zla gam gru gsum ji bzhin dbyibs// kha dog rang gi tshul bzhin
242a1(1): bskyed// rang rang sa bon gdan stengs la// 'od bzhi 'phro 'du'i cho ga yis// las bzhi gtso bo las bzhin bskyed// 'khor mang gtso bo'i cha 'dra ba// phyag mtshan rang rang thugs rtags
242a2(1): la// las bzhi rtags kyi mtshan ma ste// kha dog las kyis dbye bar bshad// dbang bskur las bzhi rigs kyis brgyan// las bzhi 'od kyi 'phro 'du can// cho gas gsal bar bskyed byas la// spyan drang bstim
242a3(1): sogs las rdzogs bya// las dang ting 'dzin bzhi nyid kyis// las bzhi rtse gcig ting 'dzin bya// gang du dmigs pa rtse gcig pas// las bzhi bya ba'i cho ga dag/ ma lus pa dag 'grub 'gyur na// phra mo'i
242a4(1): las rnams smos ci dgos// shar phyogs su ni kha bltas te// dang ba'i yid ni mi g.yo bas// rdzogs pa'i skyil krung la gnas te// ma rungs gdug pa zhi bar bya// lho phyogs su ni kha bltas te// dga' ba'i 'du
242a5(1): shes rtse gcig pas// rin chen skyil krung la gnas pas// dpal dang gzi byin 'phel bar bya// nub kyi phyogs su kha bltas te// chags dang zhen pa rtse gcig pa// pad+ma'i skyil krung la gnas te// ma lus dbang
242a6(1): du bsdu bar bya// byang phyogs nyid du kha bltas te// khros pa'i sems kyis so bca' zhing // rus sbal dang ni gyad stabs kyis// gdug pa bsgral te lam du gzhug/ so so'i sngags kyi rim pa dag/ snga dro zhi ba'i
242b1(1): las byas te// gung la rgyas pa nyid du bya// dgongs ka dbang gi dus nyid de// drag po nam gyi gung la bya// nam zla dus bzhir bsgrubs pas na// nges par las bzhi 'grub par 'gyur// oM che ge mo shAn+ti ku ru swA
242b2(1): ha/ sna che ge mo puSh+TiM ku ru swA hA/ hrI che ge pa shaM ku ru swA hA/ hUM che ge mo mA ya ra phaT/ ling+ga'i gnas kyang las bzhi'i dbyibs// dgug dang phur bu bzhi btab la// ril bu'am lhag ma gtubs pa de// so so lha yi
242b3(1): zhal du bstabs// rtse mo zhi byed yal ga rgyas// sdong po dbang la rtsa ba drag/ kha dang mngar sgyur tsha ba'i shing // ro yi mchod pa de bzhin te// rgyud bzang rgyal po smad 'tshong ma/ shan pa'i khyim nas me blangs
242b4(1): te// las dang mthun pa'i ra skyes mnan// sa bon bzhi las rim pa bzhin// ba ba ka dang dbang chen dang // gzi byin can dang 'joms byed bzhi// sku dmog las bzhis phye ba ste// gun d+he sgrom dang zhags pa
242b5(1): dang // rtse gsum g.yon pa bgrang phreng nyid// rigs bzhis las bzhi byin brlabs dbu// spyan drang mchod ston las rdzogs nas// lto bar b+h+rUM las gzhal yas su// las dang mthun pa'i lha bskyed la// rang rang
242b6(1): rtog pa'i cho ga bzhin// bsreg dang bro gar las byas pas// gang yang 'grub par the tshom med// zhe sdang can dang nga rgyal can// sdug bsngal gdug sems nad gzir ba// de 'dra zhi bar bya ba'i phyir// zhi ba'i
243a1(1): las ni rtsom pa yin// tshe zung nad mang dpal longs spyod// phongs dang nyam pa 'jigs pa dag/ dngas snyigs zad nas snying por thim// thig le mi shigs bcud 'dus pa// stong nyid thig le'i
243a2(1): nga du 'gag/ rgyu ba'i rlung la dbang thob cing // mngon shes skye 'jig thob bral bas// bde chen nam mkha'i ye shes nyid// rdo rje thig le 'gyur 'jig med// steng dang 'og las gang sbyar bas// sku
243a3(1): gsung thugs kyi pho brang dag/ bde chen til 'bru bcud bzhin du// nyi zla gnas pa'i bar du 'bar// 'bab pa thig le zla ba'i gzugs// kha bcad rlung gis gzung bya zhing // 'og gis phul zhing steng gis
243a4(1): drang // ma lus bde chen khyab par gnas// mi rtog gsal ba mthar phyin pa// seng phrug zla ba rdzogs pa ltar// thabs dang ting 'dzin sbyor ba yis// bde ba'i ye shes chen po la// ma lus yon tan rdzogs par
243a5(1): gnas// chags can brtul zhugs bral ba yi// lus dang dran rtogs bag chags bcas// rigs dang rigs min gang yang rung // sgo gsum ma lus bcas pa dag/ steng sgo'i gdul bya des 'dul yin// dang
243a6(1): por gsang ba'i rim thob pas// rlung dang thig le'i las goms nas// bde chen byang chub sems kyi ro// sems lnga'i tshul gyis gang snang ba// g.yo thob brtan pa'i nyams nyid kyis// lus dang phyi nang dran
243b1(1): rtogs bcas// nam mkha'i gzugs can nyid du skye// lus dang snang bar bcas pa yi// nam mkha'i mtha' ltar mi phyed pa// bde chen thig le a dang gnas// thig le stong pa'i ri mo can// gsal bar shes pa
243b2(1): rgyu bas mngon// 'og nas bskul zhing steng nas mnan// dwangs snyigs bsre ba'i thabs la 'jug/ bde ba'i rlung can yaM gi sgo// bskyod pa'i sbyor bas gyen du phul// rgyu ba rlung gi snying po can// dpa' bo
243b3(1): lam nas thur du 'then// rig pa'i ye shes gnas pa'i rlung // stong nyid nam mkha'i dbyings su thim// phyi nang rgyu ba chad pa dang // rig pa thig le'i ngang la gnas// bde ba'i rtags ni 'byung 'gyur te// 'dar
243b4(1): dang rdul dang ba spu ldang // sgra dang lus bde rgyug pa dang // dgod dang brgya la sogs gang byung ba// brtan dang sbyang ba'i cho ga bya// mi mthun log pa'i chos brtags na// thabs kyi rim pa'i cho ga yis// gdon
243b5(1): dang spos dang gnon pa dag/ ji ltar rigs par brtag par bya// rang lus thig le'i nyams myong la// bar chad med par gsal 'jug pa// tha mal zhen pa bsgyur ba dang // bde ba'i dbang phyug smin pa
243b6(1): dang // dran rtogs rgyud sogs zhi ba dang // bde chen rgyas pas khyab pa dang // rlung dang bde ba'i rnal 'byor gyis// thams cad dbang du sdud pa dang // dran rtog a yi ngang du gnas// 'di ni dbang gi rim pa
244a1(1): yin// de nas gsang ba bshad bya ba// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa las// gsang ba'i phrin las bzhir 'byung ba// dka' thub can dang tha mal dang // thun mong lam las bzlog phyir
244a2(1): ro// 'dod chags zhen cing dbang po smin// tshad ldan yum dang bcas pa yi// bde chen dgon pa thig le'i gnas// yon tan khyad par kun tu rdzogs// gnyis med 'khril ba'i ngo bo ni// bde ba chen po 'byung
244a3(1): ba'i gnas// gsang ba'i b+ha ga rgyas pa ni// zhi rgyas dbang drag tshul bzhin dag/ nus pa byin brlabs gang ldan pa// gsang ba'i thig le'i tshul la gnas// pad+ma gsang ba'i thab khung du// gsang ba'i sbyin sreg
244a4(1): gang phul ba// lo dang zla ba ma yin par// myur du bde chen lus su 'gyur// thabs dang shes rab las byung ba'i// dngas snyigs bcud dang bag chags dang // nyi zla khu bar bcas pa ni// bde chen gsang ba
244a5(1): mchod pa'i rdzas// gdung dang bde ba bral ba dang // zhen rtog de nyid chags pa yi// rang gi ling+ga de nyid la// gsang ba'i phur pa bzhi rdzogs pa// gsang ba'i yul la btab pa yis// lhan cig skyes pa'i ting
244a6(1): 'dzin la// las bzhi ma btsal rdzogs par ldan// rol pa'i tshul dang thig le gnyis// pad+ma rdo rje snying po'i rtsa// nyams dang sbyor tshul gang yin pa// gsang ba'i sbyor ba'i dus su blta// gnas pa rtsa yi tshul dag
244b1(1): ni// kha dog dbyibs sogs tha dad pas// mchod rdzas nyi zlar bcas kun la// gzar bu gnyis bcas thab phul bas// thig le chen por 'bab par 'gyur// gsang ba'i don la dga' ba dang // rig pa'i
244b2(1): brtul zhugs spyod pa dang // dbang po dar cing smin pa dang // thig le'i don la mos pa dang // rlung dang bcud la goms pa yis// rnal 'byor pho mor bcas pa kun// dran rtog phyi ma bcas pa'i yid// gdul
244b3(1): bya'i don du de bshad do// gang dag thabs la mkhas pa dang // dbang dang dam tshig ldan pa yis// thabs dang sbyor ba la brtson zhing // nyi zla rtse sbyor dbang thob nas// gzung zlog 'byangs pa'i gar thabs
244b4(1): kyis// dngos po lhan cig skyes pa'i don// sems lnga'i tshul gyis gsal bar skye// nyi zla zhon pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang // rgyu ba'i rlung la dbang thob pas// khams bzhi 'dus pa'i snying po las// bde chen thig le mi
244b5(1): rtog pa// thabs kyis da ltar mngon du snang // thabs dang bral ba'i slob dpon gyis// skal med las kyis dman pa la// dbang dang brgyud pa bral ba yis// tshig dang rigs pas ci bstan kyang // rigs ngan
244b6(1): rgyal sar bzhag pa ltar// bdag phung gzhan brlag 'jig par 'gyur// gang du gsang ba'i thig le nyid// gsang ba'i lam lngar nyams skyes pas// zag med bde ba'i dkyil 'khor du// mkha' 'gro gsum la
245a1(1): gang brten nas// ye shes thig le rgya dpag med// rim pas mthar zug gnas su 'gyur// gang zhig 'di la 'dris goms pas// rgyu ba thig ler thim pa dang // dran rtog nam mkhar gsal ba
245a2(1): dang // bde chen sngon du smin pa yis// 'chi med sangs rgyas sa la sbyor// 'jigs pa kun las grol ba dang // lha mo tshogs kyis byin brlabs nas// rol rtsed sna tshogs sgyur byed cing // thabs dang shes rab
245a3(1): gnyis med cing // longs spyod rdzogs pa'i zhal mthong zhing // rdo rje dbang gis mtshams sbyar nas// yi ge 'khor lo tshogs mchog mnyes// nam mkha'i mthar zug bar du ni// bde chen ye shes zag pa
245a4(1): med// ye shes rgya mtsho byin brlabs can// nam mkha' lta bur dpag med pa// rgyal ba kun gyi ngo bor 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud las phrin las mtha' yas pa bshad
245a5(1): pa'i le'u ste bcu pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// gsang ba'i lam la gang dga' bas// thun mong ma gyur gsang ba'i lam// rim pa nyid du bshad par bya// dad dang brtul zhugs che ba
245a6(1): dang // theg pa chen por rigs nges shing // snying brtse dbang dang dam tshig ldan// sgrub la brtson pa'i gang zag gis// lus dang longs spyod 'tsho ba dang // bu dang chung ma rgyal srid kyis// dang por bla ma mnyes
245b1(1): byas la// thabs la mkhas pas 'dod pa blang // phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// rang byung ye shes rang snang ba// gcig dang du ma med tshul gyis// bden pa gnyis med 'brel ba nyid// byin brlabs sgra dang
245b2(1): gtan tshigs kyi// rang 'byung ye shes mngon du snang // rang gnas 'khor lo bsam mi khyab// rtog ge'i spyod yul ma gyur pa// thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi// 'phel dang dga' bde longs spyod phyir// rgyas
245b3(1): pa'i las la 'bad par bya// dbang chen gzi byin che ba dang // rgyal rigs blon po bram ze dang // gdug pa dbang du bsdu ba'i phyir// rjes dgug dbang gi las brtsam mo// dgra dang bgegs sogs ma rungs
245b4(1): pa// gang gis 'dul bar mi nus pa// gzir zhing 'du shes bsgyur ba'i phyir// drag po bsgral ba'i phrin las brtsam// gang yang rung ba'i dngos po la// dang po mi mthun zhi bar bya// de nas yon tan rgyas par
245b5(1): bya// de nyid dbang bsdu las la sbyar// gal te dbang du ma gyur na// drag pos gzir te bsgral bar bya// gal te log par ltung srid pas// 'og min gnas su phaT kyis 'phang // nges par 'grub 'gyur gdon
245b6(1): mi za// dang por sngon bya'i las kyis ni// nus dang mi nus khyad par brtag/ de nas nus pa thob pa ste// de nas bde ba'i rtsal thob nas// thogs pa med pa'i phrin las 'grub// zag med lam la goms sbyangs
246a1(1): pas// cho 'phrul bzhi dang phrin las bzhi// gdul bya zhing dang nus mthu dang // byin brlabs rtsal gyi khyad par 'phags// mthar phyin sku lnga'i zhing thob pas// ma rtsal chu dang rlabs bzhin
246a2(1): du// dpag med yon tan ngo bo'i phyir// lhun gyis grub pa'i phrin las yin// las dang nyon mongs gdug pa dang // sdug bsngal rtog pa ji snyed pa// cho ga thabs dang ting 'dzin gyis// lhan ne lhang nger zhi bar
246a3(1): 'gyur// nga rgyal rin chen gzi brjid kyis// dpal dang longs spyod 'phel ba dang // tshe dang lang tsho stobs ldan zhing // yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// 'dod chags rdo rje ting 'dzin gyis// bdud dang
246a4(1): gdug pa rgyal po dang // lha dbang srin po mkha' 'gro ma// phyag na rdo rje'ang dbang du 'gyur// zhe sdang rdo rje ting 'dzin gyis// cho ga rdzas dang sngags ldan pas// chos sku rdo rje'ang 'jig 'gyur na// gzhan lta smos
246a5(1): kyang ci zhig dgos// rang lus bde chen kun gyi dbyings// rang lus thig le'i thabs mkhas pas// sbyor ba rlung gi goms stobs can// dkyil 'khor nang la gnas gyur pas// nyams kyis las bzhi gsal
246a6(1): gyur te// rim pa ji bzhin 'gyur ba dang // rang gi mngon par gsal gyur pa// nus pa brtan pas mngon du 'gyur// gzhan min 'khor lo pho brang nyid// gnas dang 'jug dang gzung ba dang // bstim zhing
246b1(1): gnas pa gang yin pa// de dag nyid du bshad pa yin// d+harma tsakra gzhal yas khang // rtsa bzhi yan lag brgyad dkyil na// e baM ma ya las bzhi dbyibs// kha dog las kyis gtsor gyur pa// bag chags sa bon
246b2(1): snyigs ma dang // rtog dang tha mal zhen pa'i rdzas// nyams myong 'gyur med bzhir gnas te// thig les de nyid zhi ba dang // rang lus phyi nang thig les rgyas// rlung dang thig le rtog par bcas// nus pas dbang
246b3(1): du 'dus pa dang // thig les ma bcos nam mkha'i ngang // srog dang thig ler bcas bsdus pa// a yi ngang du thim 'gyur de// rgyu ba drangs shing 'phar ba gnon// mi 'gyur dbyings la gnas par bya// rang
246b4(1): lus thabs kyi ngo bo las// 'khor lo bzhi dang me rlung dang // bskyod pa rlung gis las rung bas// nam mkha'i ye shes cir yang gsal// thig les rgyud dang lus rgyas pas// bde chen dbang thob zhen chags
246b5(1): bral// ting 'dzin sbyor bas gang bskul na// rim pa'i rtags dang nus pa byung // kha dog grangs dang snying po dang // dbyibs dang tshad dang thig le yi// khyab pa la sogs mtha' yas pa// bzhugs tshul de nyid de
246b6(1): bzhin no// 'khor lo bzhi yi thab khung du// gtum mo byin za'i las bskul bas// dngas snyigs rtog pa'i bag chags dag/ mi shigs thig ler mchod pa phul// phyi nang rgyu ba ma lus pa// rang 'byung 'khor
247a1(1): lo thig le mchog/ spyod yul thun mong ma lus pa// phyi yi rnam pa lam byed pas// thun mong phyi yi lam du bshad// de nyid nang du rtsa 'khor lo// thig les nang du nyams skyed pa// rim pa 'di ni
247a2(1): nang du bshad// dbang thob sbyangs pa ma rtogs pa// skal ngan rigs chad yul min pa// gsang bas gsang ba zhes bshad do// dang por blo ldan gang zag ni// ma lus bden pa dbyer med la// rang bzhin rig
247a3(1): pa'i gtan tshigs kyis// phung po khams dang skye mched la// thabs dang shes gnyis med pa'i don// ye nas sangs rgyas rdzogs pa nyid// de nyid dus gsum ma skyes pa// gang la brten nas rtogs pa la// lam
247a4(1): gyi yan lag kun rdzogs te// sa bcu rim par ma bkod rdzogs// ma lus yon tan rang shar bas// thams cad ma lus ma 'da' la// tshogs gnyis rdzogs pa'i 'bras bu nyid// dbang po cig car spyod yul
247a5(1): yin// gang su blo dang mos pa dang // rtogs chung mtshan ma dga' ba la// thun mong sgo mthun khyad par can// rim pa'i rnal 'byor bslab par bya// dang por phyi nang snod bcud kun// rang sa nyid na mi dmigs
247a6(1): pa// ma bcos ma btsal mi gnas pa// dngos po ci la'ang mi brtag cing // de nyid la yang mi rtog pa// 'dzin rtog zhen pa mi gnas par// bsam dang bsam bya med tshul gyis// bdag gzhan phyi nang ma lus
247b1(1): pa// gang gi ngo bor ma grub pa// ci la'ang mi gnas sbyor ba yis// rang sar mi rtog ngo bo nyid// bcos pa med pa'i tshul du bsgom// gal te mtshan ma'i rgyu ba dag/ chu las rnyog pa'i tshul byung na// ma bcos rang
247b2(1): bzhin bzhag pa yis// ma lus rtog med de bzhin nyid// rang bzhin bzhag pas dag par 'gyur// nam mkha' dag par 'gyur ba'i tshe// sprin kyang rang 'byung dag pa ltar// byung tshor dran rtog ma lus pa// chos
247b3(1): nyid stong pa'i rang bzhin no// gang du snang srid ma lus pa// phyi nang med pa'i sems nyid de// de nyid stong pa'i rang bzhin du// goms shing nus pa brtan pa'i tshe// de nyid rnal 'byor de nyid ni// stong pa chen po
247b4(1): rnal 'byor yin// sgo gsum byed spyod ma bcos pa// ma brtags mi rtog cing mi gnas// 'di ni rnal 'byor rtse gcig pas// bya ba spangs pa'i spyod pa yin// de nas de las langs pa'i tshe// sgyu ma chu zla smig rgyu
247b5(1): dang // 'ja' tshon dbu ba chu bur ltar// snang yang dngos por gnas ma yin// rig pa phyi nang ma lus pa// stong pa'i cho 'phrul snang du zad// ma lus rig pa'i ngo bo ste// de yang sgyu ma'i rang bzhin ltar// zhen
247b6(1): chags med pa'i tshul du bsgom// ye shes sgyu ma'i cho 'phrul ni// dpag med ngo bor rang snang yang // byin brlabs cho 'phrul rang snang ba// de ltar ma rtogs dman pa la// rang 'byung snying rjer 'char ba'i
248a1(1): phyir// snying rje chen po rnal 'byor yin// 'gro ba gang dang gang dag las// snying rje chen po gang gzigs pas// sna tshogs mdzad pa'i tshul nyid kyis// de snyed spyod la mtha' yas te// don dang
248a2(1): mthun pa 'ba' zhig ston// tha mal pa dang thabs nyid dang // lus ngag yid kyis ci 'tsham par// don 'gyur spyod pa bsam mi khyab// gang du byams dang snying rje yis// ma khyab ming gi rnal 'byor te// theg pa
248a3(1): chen po'i rigs chad cing // dman pa'i rigs su gyur pa yin// rtsa ba med pa'i sems nyid ni// chos rnams kun gyi rtsa ba ste// nam mkha'i ris dang dbyer med ltar// ma lus rang rgyud bral ba yi// ngo bo bden
248a4(1): min brdzun pa min// chos rnams ming tsam dngos po med// sgo gsum 'di ltar brtan pa ni// thugs rje chen po spyod pa yin// de nas sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid// rang bzhin gnyis med rig pa ni// yi ge hUM du
248a5(1): gsal bar bsgom// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// 'phro 'dus hUM du gsal bar bya// rdul phran de snyed 'dus pa las// thig le mi dmigs stong par blta// ma dang a las nyi zla'i gdan// gang bsgril hUM
248a6(1): bcas gsal bar bya// rang rang gsung yang 'gal ba med// sgril ma'i snying po phyag mtshan te// 'phro 'du phra mo'i rang bzhin sku// gsal la skyon dang bral bar bsgom// de nas rang rang tshad gyur pa// rigs
248b1(1): pa'i phyag rgya chen po nyid// zhi dang khro bo skabs nyid du// ji ltar 'thad par bsgom par bya// yang na zhal gcig phyag gnyis te// yang na zhal gsum phyag drug bsgom// gnas gcig gnas gsum gnas lngar
248b2(1): yang // yan lag lha ni tshang bar bsgom// goms nas bstims te spyod yul kun// de ltar gsal bar brtag par bya// rtsa ba gcig pa'i lha bsgom pa// phyag rgya gcig pa'i rnal 'byor yin// sgo gsum bsgom
248b3(1): la rab 'bad pas// rnam par g.yeng ba'i chos spyod 'das// ma lus rtsa ba'i spyod pa ste// phyogs gcig pa yi spyod par gsungs// de nas rtog pa'i yan lag dag/ gnyis ka thabs dang shes rab tu// brtags
248b4(1): te de ltar bsgom par bya// 'od zer 'phro ba 'bru gsum nyid// yang na ye shes lnga nyid de// gnas gcig snying por gnas par bya// de bzhin gtso bo gtso mo dang // sems dpa' dang ni sems ma dang // khro bo khro
248b5(1): mo sprul pa dang // yid chos dag la'ang shes par bya// zhal dang phyag dang lha grangs dang // tshom bu spros pas spros bcas yin// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan las// tshom bu lnga la khro bcas bsgom// yang na sku
248b6(1): gsung thugs ldan pa'i// tshom bu gsum dang bcas pa yi// khro bo khro mo 'khor du bsgom// rigs kyi gtso ste thugs kyi mchog/ khro bo tshogs dang bcas pa yi// mos pa'i tshul dang sbyor ba yis// tshom bu gcig
249a1(1): pa'i lha rnams bsgom// slob dpon mthar nye'i lam gnas pas// rgyang grags dpag tshad la sogs pa// rdo rje thig tshad bor tsam gyis// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gsal ldan pa// sna tshogs dkyil
249a2(1): 'khor mchog tu gsungs// dang po rgyang grags dkyil 'khor te// de nas dpag tshad dkyil 'khor nyid// nam mkha'i dbyings ni bsam yas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sna tshogs bsgom// de nas yo byad
249a3(1): lnga ldan pas// ting 'dzin mos pa spyod mthun pa'i// skye bo tsam du grangs mthun pas// tshom bus 'dod pa'i don bsgrub bya// thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa yi// pho mo 'dus pa'i grangs mnyam par// yo byad
249a4(1): 'dus pa'i tshogs ldan pas// dgon par 'khor khang rab brtsigs te// rang rang thabs dang shes rab tu// brtags te yo byad longs spyad cing // rdo rje glu bro gar thabs kyis// zhag ni sum cu phrag drug
249a5(1): gam// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis// tshe la dbang sgyur zag med thob// de nas brgya phrag bcu drug gis// sku lnga lhun gyis grub par 'gyur// skye bo mdza' ba kun tshogs pa// rnal 'byor 'dus pa'i
249a6(1): tshogs zhes bya// 'byor pa'i longs spyod tshang ba ni// bde ba'i longs spyod tshogs su bshad// lha dang dam can kun 'dus pas// 'dus pa chen po'i tshogs su gsungs// thams cad spyod pa mi 'dzin
249b1(1): pas// tshogs gnyis rgyun du rdzogs byed pas// tshogs chen po ru nges par bshad// bar chad med pa'i lam rdzogs pas// rig pa'i skyes bu thub pa med// lha mi cha byad 'dzin mod kyi// 'byung lnga cho 'phrul dbang
249b2(1): sguskur thob// zhing dang longs spyod dag pa yis// gong nas gong du mnyam par sbyor// rdo rje'i cha de 'dzin gyi sku// zhing khams kun la gnas par byed// gal te mtshan mar zhen dbang gis// rtogs pa'i stobs ni
249b3(1): chung gyur na// byang chub phyag rgya rdo rje sku// mtshan dang dpe byad la sogs pa// cha lugs mngon du byung na yang // zhi ba de nyid mthong ba min// gang du sbyar ba'i yum rnams kyang // thun mong lam dang skabs gnyis
249b4(1): su// nus pa'i khyad par che chung gis// phrin las bzhi ru bshad pa ni// dkar mo bong chung skad che la// bzhin lus gtsug phud g.yas su 'khyil// yan lag phra 'jam skad gsal zhing // rlung khar lci bas zhi ba
249b5(1): bya// zla dang yan lag mang ba dang // phra zhing bshan la gzangs su ring // bzhin lus ser zhing gru bzhir gnas// rnam 'phyangs sha dang nu ma rgyas// 'phel ba'i dus su 'di dag gzung // bzhin mdog bad 'dra
249b6(1): sog ka la// smin dkyus ring la stod smad phyed// lus dang chu rlung dri zhim zhing // bde ba ldan zhing yan lag med// 'di ni sdud pa'i mchog tu 'gyur// nag mo gru gsum rtsid mgo ma// khro gnyer byis pa'i lus
250a1(1): ldan zhing // gtum zhing brlang tshig 'dzem pa med// gtsang sme'i rtog bral gsod par bshad// gang du nus pa brtan thob pa// de dag sa nas sar sbyong ba// rig pa'i skyes bu dam pa nyid// rnal
250a2(1): 'byor rim pa'i lung ldan pa// ma skyes mnyam la dbang sgyur zhing // ma lus gsal bar mthar phyin pa'o// rang rig ye shes rgyud don phyir// rang snang rig pa mngon byas pa// rig 'dzin mchog ste lhun grub
250a3(1): pa'o// ting 'dzin nus pa'i mthu med kyang // sa sbyong sems dpa' bskyed du med// bder gshegs nyid dang spyod yul gcig/ rig pa'i skyes bu'i lung theb pa'o// gal te 'byung ba'i lus 'jig na// bdag nyid
250a4(1): sgo gsum lhar lta zhing // 'byung ba bsags pa'i lus las grol// ting 'dzin phyag rgya chen por smin// khyung phrug sbubs dang bral ba ltar// ma lus phyag rgya sgyu ma'i mchog/ rnam par smin ces de la brjod// zag
250a5(1): pa zad pa rdo rje lus// phyin cad 'gyur 'jig chos dang bral// bde ba chen po lung thob pas// zag bcas bslab pa'i chos dang bral// zhing la dbang sgyur sprul pa'i lus// ting 'dzin longs spyod dpag tu
250a6(1): med// bsgrubs pa'i nus pa gang brtan pa// rdo rje lus gyur 'jig pa med// 'jig pa lnga bral zag pa zad// dbang sgyur gsum la dbang thob pas// bde ba longs spyod dpag tu med// grangs med bskal par
250b1(1): don byed cing // mthong bas de bzhin gnyis med rigs// rgyal tshab skyes bu sa sbyong ba// phyi nang snod bcud ma lus pa// nam mkha' lta bur dpag med cing // mtha' dbus bsam pa'i rgyun las
250b2(1): 'das// 'jigs bral dbugs phyin mya ngan 'das// rang snang dpag med zhal mthong bas// gzhan du blta ba'i yul dang bral// ting 'dzin rig pa goms pa'i mthu// mtshan ma sdug po yul las
250b3(1): 'das// 'jig rten stong phrag dbang sgyur zhing // gnyis med phyag rgya chen po'i rigs// nam mkha' mthar zug med pa ltar// bsgoms dang nus pa'i rtsal stobs kyis// bag chags mtshan ma'i tshang tshing
250b4(1): la// ting 'dzin rig pa'i me byung bas// zhing khams rgya bral dpag med du// ting 'dzin rig pas gang sbyangs pa// bsgoms dang ting 'dzin rig pa yis// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i lung thob pa// phyag rgya chen po'i rig
250b5(1): 'dzin yin// de nas rig pa'i rtsal rdzogs shing // ye shes lha mo rol dbang gis// mthar phyin rig pa'i skyes bu ste// zhing khams bye ba'i dbang thob cing // rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid kyi sras// dbang dang cho 'phrul
250b6(1): kun thob pa// nam mkha'i mtha' ltar dgongs pas khyab// mnyam bzhag rjes thob khyad par gyis// rgyal ba'i lung mnod bka' la gnas// zhing khams dag par kun spyod kyang // rmad 'byung gsang ba'i rang
251a1(1): bzhin la// spyod kyang lta ba'i rang bzhin gyis// phyogs bral nam mkha' mi mthong bas// dbang dang dgongs pas mthar phyin 'gyur// dbang dang dam tshig brtul zhugs te// dang po bslab pa
251a2(1): mthar phyin cing // thig le rdzogs par 'dod pa yis// gsang ba nang gi don la sbyar// thun mong bya ba mthar phyin nas// lus dang spyod yul bcas pa dang // lha yi rnal 'byor ma lus pa// bde chen thig le nyid
251a3(1): du blta// lha dang bde bar mnyam sbyor bas// thig le bde bar snang ba nub// sku bzhi dkyil 'khor khams thig le// dngas ma lnga ru mnyam sbyor bas// ngo bo dang ni rkyen dag gis// thabs kyi rim pa bskul
251a4(1): las shes// bde ba'i thig le nyams myong ba// mi rtog bde ba cha shas med// mi shigs thig le kun gyi bdag/ stong nyid 'brel ba'i ri mo can// tha mal bya ba kun bral ba// spyod pa nyid du bstan pa yin// theg
251a5(1): le bzhu ba'i rang bzhin gyis// 'dzag 'dar zim gang bde ba ni// sa yang bcu gsum bde bas brgyan// lus kun khyab pa'i thig le shum// til 'bru bcud kyis khyab pa ltar// ma lus khyab pa'i ros gang
251a6(1): ba// ma lus 'od dang snying po ltar// snang srid thig le chen po nyid// bde ba chen pos khyab par gsal// ma lus 'dus pa'i thig le ni// khams lnga 'dres pa'i snying po ste// mi shigs thig le bde ba'i
251b1(1): bcud// ma lus bde ba'i rgyas btab pas// nam mkha'i ye shes cir yang gsal// dus gsum rgyal ba'i dgongs pa ste// thig le gcig gis kun khyab pas// bde chen snying rjes gcig tu 'khyil// de nyid
251b2(1): bde chen phyag rgya ste// nang gi phyag rgya gcig par bshad// de nyid nges par las rung bas// thig le bde chen dang bcas pa'i// bye brag brgyad cu ma lus par// so so'i thig ler sku 'phros shing // khams lnga ye
251b3(1): shes ro dang bcas// sa bon thig le bde bas brgyan// mi rtog thig le thugs mchog sgra// rang lus smin nas snang bar spro// gang nas gang la spros gyur pa// de srid thig le'i phyag rgya ste// bde ba'i thig le
251b4(1): grangs las 'das// ye shes lnga dang sku gsung thugs// mi phyed ro yis gang khyab pas// grangs 'das bde chen tshogs rdzogs nas// ma lus bde ba'i phyag rgyar snang // gang de de yis rgyas btab pas// de nyid
251b5(1): bde chen thig ler smin// rnam pa phyi nang snyigs mar bcas// bde chen thig le'i ngo bor smin// snyigs ma 'byung ba'i lus las 'das// snying po bar chad med pa'i lus// thig les tha ma'i snod gang bas// ma
251b6(1): lus bde ba chen por smin// de nas thabs dang ting 'dzin dang // rlung gi 'dren pa'i stobs ldan pa// rin chen lung gi thig ler zhugs// skad cig mngon shes lngar smin cing // 'gro ba ris dang thar par
252a1(1): 'gyur// mi shigs a la thig le thim// 'byung 'jug med pa'i rlung 'thob cing // 'gyur 'jig med pa'i lus la gnas// 'phel 'grib med pa'i bde ba nyid// snang ba thig le nyid du ste// thig
252a2(1): le thung ngu a ru thim// gnyis med bde ba cha shas bral// 'di nas zag med rang byung ba// rkyen dang bral ba'i bde chen nyid// dper na me dang tsha ba'am// rgya mtsho dang ni rlan bzhin no// rlung dang thig le rig pa
252a3(1): dang // tshe dang longs spyod 'byung ba dang // 'dod lnga kun la dbang sgyur thob// bde ba'i phyag rgya chen po ni// ma lus zag med thig le ste// rgya bral rig pa'i thig le nyid// snyigs ma'i zag pa rlung zad
252a4(1): pas// ting 'dzin bde chen thig ler gsal// rig pa bde chen ror gsal bas// ci mthong bde chen phyag rgya nyid// 'du bas sbyar ba'i spyod yul lam// mun 'gyur dug rtsi ji bzhin du// rgya dang bral ba'i zhing
252a5(1): khams dag/ bde chen phyag rgya chen por 'gyur// gang dag bsgoms pa'i skyes bu ni// tha mal pa dang brkam chags pa// rnam pa'i spros pa ma lus pa// bsgoms dang ched du ma byas par// bde chen thig ler lhun
252a6(1): gyis grub// dper na chu dang rlabs bzhin nam// rgya mtshor phyin pa'i 'du shes ltar// goms pas bde chen gsal mthar phyin// rkyen dang gnod pa ma lus pa// reg dang mthong zos dran pas kyang // bde
252b1(1): chen thig le nyams su 'bar// bskal pa du mar gnas gyur cing // 'byung ba lnga dang spyod yul kun// rang lus bde bar bsre ba 'grub// gsang ba'i lam la goms byed na// mtshon byed rig pa'i bde ba
252b2(1): yis// lhan cig skyes pa'i dga' ba rtogs// mthar phyin lam gyi rim pa 'grub// dbang po dar zhing chags pa dang // bde chen mos pa'i rnal 'byor pas// e dang baM la gnas pa yi// byang chub rdo rje dril las
252b3(1): 'byung // dngos po lhan cig skyes pa yis// ma lus bde bar rtogs byas la// phyi nang sbyor ba'i cho ga yis// gang zhig rtags dang ldan pa'i tshe// gsang ba'i phyag rgya bzhi ldan pas// bde chen mchog la rol par
252b4(1): bya// ye shes nyi zla mnyam ldan pas// re dogs chad pa'i thig le 'byung // lhung med gnas dang thim pa dang // bdag po gdung can phrad pa las// nyin mtshan bral ba'i snang ba ltar// dus gcig nyi zla shar ba'i
252b5(1): tshe// ma lus bde bas khyab gyur na// g.yo ba med pa'i thig le 'char// gal te nyams pa'i lhas byung na// zabs dang nyams dang rol pa yis// rim pa bzhin du bslab par bya// thabs dang shes rab gnyis
252b6(1): med pa'i// nyi zla 'dres pa'i thig le nyid// dngos bral lhan cig skyes pa nyid// rgyal ba kun gyi phyag rgya yin// lhan cig skyes la gnas pa'i tshe// ma lus bde chen ro gcig pas// bde chen phyag rgya gcig tu
253a1(1): gnas// rdo rje pad+ma'i thig le nyid// sa ya bcu gsum phrag gnyis rtsa// nyi zla 'dres pa'i gar thabs kyis// so so bde ba'i pho brang du// thig les gang bar spros pa'i tshe// sku gsung thugs dang ye
253a2(1): shes lnga// nyams myong ro yis rgyas btab bo// lus kyi bde ba mthar phyin nas// rgyu rkyen rten 'brel las 'das pa'i// rig pa'i bde ba la gnas bya// gal te nyams na bsam pa'am// blta dang mnyan pa la
253a3(1): sogs pas// bar chad med par bsgom par bya// rig pa bde bar gang smin pas// sgo gsum bde ba chen por smin// spyod yul rlung dang thig ler bcas// goms pa'i thabs la dbang skur bas// rten dang
253a4(1): brten par bcas pa yi// thig le rlung la dbang skur zhing // lha mo mi mo gnod sbyin mo// mkha' 'gro rnams la dbang byed nus// thig le dbab dang 'dzin pa dang // zlo dang sbyor la dbang sgyur te// gal te
253a5(1): mkha' la 'phros pa'i tshe// dngos grub lam dang bral ba yin// phyin cad mchod dang nus pa sbyin// rang gi skabs ni ma gtogs pa// gzhan du thig le mi lhung zhing // dbang sgyur lam la goms par bya// nyi zla
253a6(1): 'dres pa'i bde ba nyid// zag med snying por thim pa'i tshe// sems kyi bde bar rang snang zhing // sems kyi bde ba bar chad med// gsal byed stobs dang bral ba'i tshe// ma lus bde chen phyag rgya ste// lus
253b1(1): sems mnyam du gnas pa nyid// tshad dang rgya dbyings ro las 'das// dpag med bde ba'i rol mo ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi dgyes chen te// thig le sa bon zag pa bral// bde chen nyams myong rgyun mi
253b2(1): chad// rang nyid thig ler nyams myong bas// snying po'i thig le bral ba med// phra zhing rdul bral dri ma med// rdo rje thig le dril bu nyid// 'bad rtsol med par rang snang ba// bral thob med pa'i ngo bor
253b3(1): gnas// gang du yon tan tshogs kyis rab rgyas pa// bde chen chu rgyun lta bu'i rgyun las byung // tshogs gnyis yongs rdzogs bdag gzhan lhun gyis grub// gzhan na med de rang nyid snang bar zad// rang bzhin
253b4(1): gnas phyir gzhan nas 'ong ba med// zhen pa bzlog pas bdag zhal bdag gis mthong // rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud chen po las lam gyi khyad par ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste
253b5(1): bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas gzhan yang bshad bya ba// ma lus kun gyi bsgrub bya nyid// phyogs bcu ma lus rdul snyed kyi// che ba'i yon tan bshad par bya// mthar phyin lnga yi rang bzhin ni// rtogs dang
253b6(1): 'bras bur gnas mod kyi// mthong dang goms dang grub pa nyid// thun mong 'bras bur yang dag bshad// yang dag mthar phyin 'bras bur ni// thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi// yid bzhin nor bu rin po
254a1(1): che// dpag med yon tan lhun rdzogs pa// tshad dang dmigs pa las 'das pa// bsam yas lhun gyis grub pa ste// nam mkha'i mtha' ltar dpag med pa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni// ma
254a2(1): lus mchog gi gter gyur pa// zad 'phel med pa'i nor bu ste// ma lus kun la mnyam du gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin ni// rgya dbyings tshad las 'das pa yi// dag dang ma dag ci snang yang // blang
254a3(1): dor phyogs ris yongs kyis med// rang 'byung 'od gsal maN+Dal la// ma lus gcig gi rang bzhin te// thugs rje'i byin brlabs tshad med pas// ma lus bsam pa skong bar mdzad// rang byung ye shes lhun
254a4(1): grub ni// chos rnams kun gyi ngo bo bas// ma lus phyogs med rang snang yang // zhen dang ched du byas pa med// sa dang lam la sogs pa yi// theg pa kun gyi 'bras bu ni// rang rang ltos pa'i mthar zug
254a5(1): kyang // che mchog lhun grub mnyam dang bral// skad cig nyid la lhun rdzogs pa'i// sangs rgyas dpag med yon tan rnams// rigs bdag rdo rje 'chang chen gyis// ye shes lha mo rol dbang gis// nyi zla'i bde
254a6(1): ba mngon thob ste// rdo rje 'chang gi sa la bkod// dpag med rgyal ba thams cad kyi// 'gro ba'i gdul bya mtha' yas pas// sku gsung thugs kyang de bzhin te// bzhugs tshul dpag med rnam par snang // che
254b1(1): ba'i yon tan lhun rdzogs pa'i// sangs rgyas drug pa'i rang bzhin te// nam mkha'i mthas gtugs mtshan pa yis// bde chen ye shes rgyas par gnas// bcu drug zhag gis rdzogs pa ltar// ma lus rdzogs pa'i
254b2(1): ye shes nyid// sa mtha'i nyes pa kun bral ba// kun gyi yon tan bdag nyid gnas// sangs rgyas zhing khams mtha' yas pa'i// nam mkha'i mtha' thug bar du ni// gdul bya'i rdul snyed gnas kyi bar// skad
254b3(1): cig 'du 'bral med par gnas// bcud 'dus thig le chen po ni// bde ba'i zag med thig le ste// a dang bde bar 'brel ba yi// ma lus khyab pa'i tshul du bzhugs// thig le'i bye brag brgyad cu'i
254b4(1): rtsa// bcud 'dus gsang ba'i thig le'i ro// ma skyes mnyam la gnas 'gyur zhing // ma lus gang ba'i tshul gyis ni// zhing khams phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa// zag med thig ler ro gcig pas// nam mkha'i
254b5(1): gzugs can de bzhin nyid// sku bzhi 'dus pa'i khams thig le// dngas ma lnga 'dus snying po can// gsum 'dus mi 'gyur snying po ste// bdes gang bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis po// thig le ro yis gang phye ba// dpag
254b6(1): skra gsung yon tan thugs// bsam gyis mi khyab rang snang ba// thig le phyag rku bsam mi khyab// phyi nang dngas snyigs ma lus pa// rang 'byung dngas ma'i thig le nyid// gzhan med phyogs med rang snang
255a1(1): pa// phyogs med bde ba chen po nyid// gsang ba'i thig le chen po ni// yon tan rdzogs pa'i ngo bo ste// bde ba chen po'i snying po las// dpag med yon tan rnam par 'phrul// bde ba chen
255a2(1): po'i thig le ni// 'du 'phro brel bas zag pa med// phyogs ris 'das pas ma khyab med// thog mtha' med par mnyam pa yin// rgyal ba kun gyi rang bzhin te// thig le ro la mnyam bzhugs pas// nam mkha'i
255a3(1): mthas gtugs chos thams cad// bde ba chen por gsal bar myong // mtshan dang dpe byad tshad 'das pa// rang la rdzogs pa'i thig le nyid// ji snyed bde ba'i rol pa kun// rang la rdzogs pa nyid du
255a4(1): gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi bde ba ni// rang 'byung thig le chen po ste// A li ka li zhu ba las// nam mkha' khyab pa'i bde ba 'byung // gsang ba'i thig le kun gyi rgyu// nam mkha'i thig le gsang ba'i
255a5(1): nga // khyab pa chen po phyogs cha med// lus gnas rang bzhin ma skyes pa// bde ba'i dbang phyug sku gsung thugs// nam mkha' lta bur dpag tu med// thabs dang shes rab dbyer med pa'i// gsang ba'i thig
255a6(1): le bzhugs pa'i gnas// dpag med til 'bru rdul snyed kyi// rgyal ba kun dang lhan cig tu// ma lus bde ba chen po'i ro// lhan cig skyes pa'i rang bzhin gyis// ma gsungs rig pas nyams btang bas// mi
255b1(1): 'dzin longs spyod chen po'i gnas// rang 'byung nyi zla rten gyi ro// ma spangs 'dus pas 'du 'bral med// gsang ba'i thig le bcud 'dus pa// nam mkha' gang ba bde ba'i ro// gnyis med 'khril ba'i stobs
255b2(1): las byung // mkha' dbyings byang chub 'byor pa'i sems// ma btang ma spros thig le che// nam mkha' rgyas pa'i mtha' bzhin du// bde ba'i tshad kyang dpag tu med// yab yum gnas pa'i grangs tshad kyang // nam
255b3(1): mkha'i khams kyi rdul snyed de// re re'ang bde ba'i dkyil 'khor ni// rdul snyed nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// yab yum gnyis med 'brel ba yi// thabs dang shes rab bcud 'dus pa// gang yang mi sgrib thig
255b4(1): le'i ngo // snang gsum mtshan ma las 'das pa// sangs rgyas rin chen kun gyi bcud// bye ba rdul snyed grangs 'das pa'i// ma lus kun dang lhan cig tu// mos dang chags pa'i khyad par gyis// cha lugs mtha'
255b5(1): yas snang ba ni// la lar chags par lta ba'i tshul// de bzhin 'jam par smra ba dang // la lar 'khyud cing lta ba ste// la lar sen thabs zhal sbyor zhing // la lar mnye dang rdebs dang 'bud// 'gyed dang 'dud
