255b6(1): nga 'gying ba yi// dkar 'dzin ston dang lte ba ston// 'o dang 'tshir dang dgod pa dag/ sna tshogs rol pa 'di dag gis// ma chags pa dag chags byed cing // chags pa myur du nyams par byed// tha skam myur du
256a1(1): rengs byed cing // bde chen lo tog skyed par byed// bye ba rdul snyed bcas pa yi// lha dang lha mo 'khor bcas pas// steg cing 'dzum pas lhan cig tu// rol cing glu ni len par byed// e ma'o/
256a2(1): sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin bde ba che// lhan cig skyes pa mkha' ltar rdul dang bral ba ste// rdo rje pad+mar bcug bskyod pas ni brtags pa'i snang ba nub// ma lus khyab pas mkha' ltar dga' bar byas kyang
256a3(1): dbang po rlung gis rlabs// bde ba'i sa bon zag pa rnams ni slar yang ldang bar byed// rgyu ba rnam par chad pa'i kha sbyor bde chen ni// nam mkha'i rgya mnyam yun yang de srid bar du gnas pa ste// 'dod pa'i
256a4(1): yon tan lnga ni lha mo khyod la tshang ba ste// bdag ni khyod la bsten cing dga' bas mig bteg ma lus rgyal ba'i zhing du blta// gang tshe 'gro ba tha mal bder spyod yul la chags par zhugs pa na// dga' dang bde
256a5(1): dang rtse gcig yid 'ong 'dod par rab zhugs pas// dbang po gnyis rol nyi zla phrad cing bde chen mchog skyes che// skye rga na 'chi re dogs ngo tsha mi tsha grags pa'i chos brgyad tshod kyang byis pas mi shes so// gang
256a6(1): zhig thabs dang shes rab bral bas gsang ba'i don 'jug pa// rgya mtsho la ni sa bon btab bzhin 'dod pa'i 'bras bu mi 'byung ste// nyan thos rang rgyal byang chub sems dpa' tha skabs te// rgyal ba nyid
256b1(1): kyang thabs dang shes rab bral bas byang chub myu gu gtan nas skams ho// 'di ni glu ru blangs pa yis// rdul snyed bcas pa'i 'khor tshogs rnams// rang rang rgyan dang gos dor te// dpa' bo sgeg mo'i tshul
256b2(1): 'dzin cing // dkyil 'khor phyogs bcu'i rdul snyed du// glu dang gar ni sna tshogs kyis// tha mal yid rtogs bcad nas ni// bde chen yid ni 'phrog par mdzad// de bzhin dkyil 'khor bsam yas
256b3(1): dang // zhing thabs bde ba rmad 'byung ba// 'dul ba'i thabs ni sna tshogs pa// dpag med mtha' mas cir snang yang // rang byung ye shes byang chub sems// thig le gcig gi ngo bo las// mdzad pa'i gar thabs
256b4(1): sna tshogs kyis// 'dul ba'i dbang du ci yang spro// thabs la thabs kyis dbang sgyur bas// thabs chen thabs las byung ba yi// ngo mtshar ya mtshan rmad po che// sangs rgyas kun gyi rang bzhin te// thabs chen sku
256b5(1): ma rmad du byung // sgyu ma skye 'gag med pa'i dbyings// sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs// ma lus kun 'dus rnam par dag/ thams cad rang rig byang chub sems// kun nas 'khyil ba'i dkyil 'khor
256b6(1): te// kun gyi rang bzhin 'byung gnas nyid// bya ba byed la byas pa med// zad dang 'phel ba med pa yi// dngos grub gter chen bsam mi khyab// ye shes thig le rang snang ba// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas
257a1(1): mchog/ mtha' dbus med pa'i ye shes ni// gcig ces 'di zhes brjod du med// nam mkha' rang 'byung rtag pa ltar// 'pho 'gyur med pas de bzhin no// nam mkha' mtha' dbus med pa
257a2(1): bzhin// rang 'byung ye shes thog mtha' med// ma byung ma skyes byang chub sems// ye shes nyi ma'i 'od ltar gsal// sangs rgyas sems can grol thar kun// ma lus rang rig 'od gsal bas// rang byung ye
257a3(1): shes rang snang phyir// mkhyen dang bsgribs pa chung zad med// mkhyen pa'i ye shes nyag gcig la// rang gi cha shas chos phral bas// nam mkha'i mtha' thug chos rnams kun// skad cig ma 'dres tshul
257a4(1): du mkhyen// rang rig byang chub sems nyid las// mtho dman blang dor ma dmigs pas// 'khor ba'i ngo bor rang snang yang // ma chags skyon med pad+ma 'dra// dpag med yon tan ngo bo rnams// rang 'byung rig
257a5(1): pa rang snang bas// ma lus ngo mtshar rgya mtsho rnams// rang snang gzhan las thob bya med// byin brlabs cho 'phrul rmad kyi chos// rang 'byung nyid las rnam par spro// tshul ni rnam pa sna tshogs te// dag dang ma dag
257a6(1): khyad par gyis// ngo bo gcig las ma g.yos kyang // mos pas mthong tshul de bzhin no// gsung ni nam mkhas khyab par ni// phyogs bcu khyab par sgra sgrogs pa// mos pa bzhin du sna tshogs pa'i// bsam yas
257b1(1): 'dul thabs sna tshogs snang // thugs ni ma lus mkhyen pa'i thugs// phan dang bder bcas brtser ldan pa'i// mngon shes mkhyen pa'i ye shes spro// ye shes thugs la khyad par med// yon tan tshad khyad bral ba
257b2(1): ste// nam mkha'i nor bu gter 'chang ba// dpag med bsam pa bskang ba'i phyir// byin brlabs yid bzhin nor bu'i tshul// phrin las byin brlabs rang snang ba// 'gro 'od med pa'i don tshul gyis// dpag
257b3(1): bsam bum dang rin chen gyi// bya byed med par don rnams rdzogs// ma lus spros pa rnam dag cing // rang 'byung rig pa mtha' dbus med// ma lus kun gyi 'byung gnas te// bde ba chen po chos kyi sku// 'dod
257b4(1): pa'i longs spyod thams cad ni// gnyis med ngang la kun rdzogs pas// de nyid tshad bral mnga' brnyes pas// longs spyod yongs su rdzogs pa'i sku// sku gcig thig le'i ngo bo las// 'jig rten khams ni thams
257b5(1): cad du// ji ltar 'dul ba'i tshul bzhin du// rnam par 'phrul pa sprul pa'i sku// ma byung ma skyes don rtogs pas// ma lus dbyer med rdo rje nyid// mi 'jigs gnyen po kun bral ba// rdo rje sgra zhes rnam par
257b6(1): bstan// gang du mngon par byang chub pa'i// 'od gsal nam mkha'i mtha' dbus med// sku bzhi mtha' yis ma reg pa// dang po mngon par byang chub pa'o// ma lus dbyer ba mtha' spangs shing // de ltar kun
258a1(1): dang mnyam par gnas// don gyis ma lus khyab 'gyur ba// brjod med don gyi gsung nyid do// sku dang phyag rgya gzigs tshul gyis// ting 'dzin dgongs pas 'dul ba la// brjod med tshul gyis
258a2(1): gang ston pa// brda yi gsung du rnam par bstan// gang yang rung ba mthong thos tshe// dpa' bos bltas pas g.yul sel ltar// dngos pos byang chub nam mkhar rtogs// byin brlabs rtogs pa'i gsung zhes
258a3(1): bya// gang gi don du gang snang ba// gnyen po bar chad mi gnas shing // gzhan dag pham byed mi thub pa// zil gyis gnon pa'i gsung du brjod// tshig gcig brjod pas tshig mtha' yas// mos pa de rnyed rnam
258a4(1): grol cing // yon tan rgya mtsho phun sum tshogs// 'di ni brjod pa tshig gi gsung // ji snyed mang por rnam spros kyang // chos kyi dbyings la khyad par med// rtog la rnam rtog mtshan ma yang // mi rtog ye shes grol
258a5(1): ba'i thugs// gnyis med bde ba chen po yis// 'dod pa'i longs spyod lnga la rol// ma lus bde bar snang ba'i tshe// 'di ni bde ba chen po'i thugs// bdag gzhan phyi nang mi mnga' yang // rang 'byung gnyis kyi
258a6(1): phyogs bral bas// gdul bya'i bsam pa kun mkhyen pas// 'gro ba ma lus bsgral ba'i thugs// ji snyed rig pa'i don snang zhing // ma lus kun gyi ngo bo la// skye 'jig gnyen po gdod nas stong // mi 'gyur rdo/
258b1(1): rje thugs zhes bya// dpag med nam mkha'i zhing khams dang // che ba'i khyad par bstan pa'i gdan// zag pa med pa'i rgyan rnams dang // ye shes 'bar ba'i gzhal yas khang // mtha' dbus med par khyab pa
258b2(1): yi// 'od zer tshogs ni rnam par snang // gzhan yang yon tan chen po ni// mtha' dbus med pa'i nam mkha' ltar// dpag cing gzhal bar mi nus te// zag med che ba'i yon tan snang // gzhan yang mdzad pa'i
258b3(1): phrin las ni// gdul bya'i yul ni ji snyed pa// mdzad pa'i sgo ni bsam yas te// mtha' thug med par rnam par snang // 'di dag bsdus pas bshad bya na// zhi rgyas dbang drag la sogs pas// mtha' yas bzhis
258b4(1): ni rnam par bsdus// lhun gyis grub par kun kyang 'grub// mdor na 'bras bu'i rnam grangs ni// bsdus pas nyi shu rtsa lngar gnas// rdo rje sems dpa' sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud chen po
258b5(1): las// lhun gyis grub pa ma lus pa bshad pa'i le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas gsang bdag rdo rje 'dzin// dpag med rgyal bas dbang bskur ba// gsang ba'i bdag po sngags kyi mdzod// gter
258b6(1): 'dzin rgyal po stobs po che// rang gi lag gi rdo rje nyid// dga' zhing mgu bas gsor byas te// bye ba rdul snyed bcas pa yis// rab tu bskor ba byas pa yis// 'jig rten drug tu bcas pa dag/ 'khrugs shing
259a1(1): rnam par g.yo mdzad de// kun tu rab g.yo rnam par g.yo// stong gsum 'jig rten 'khor yug bcas// 'od dang sgra yis gang mdzad de// rmad 'byung sku gsung thugs rnams kyi// ngo mtshar tsho
259a2(1): 'phrul rnam par snang // ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rmad 'byung gi/ phyi nang gsang ba'i mchod pa dang // 'dod yon lnga yis khyab mdzad de// rgyal ba'i tshogs kun mnyes par byas// kun kyang dga' zhing mos pa
259a3(1): yis// zhing khams rdul dang mnyam pa yi// 'khor tshogs rnams ni bstod pa 'di// sna tshogs sgras ni glu ru blangs// oM AHhUM a la la ho// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i thugs ni mi skye ye shes bde ba'i thugs// mi rtogs
259a4(1): gsal ba'i thugs ni kun la khyab par gnas// gang yang dbyer med 'dus byas ma yin 'dus ma byas min skye 'jig med// dam pa'i thugs la byung tshor g.yo 'gog ci yang med pas bde ho// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i
259a5(1): ni sna tshogs 'od 'bar bde ba'i sku// sna tshogs mtha' yas ji ltar snang ba ngo bos dben// de nyid 'du ba'i thabs kyis de ltar yid 'phrog tshim pa'i skra// mtha' yas sna tshogs bye brag ji ltar gsal yang
259a6(1): nam mkha'i ngang du bye brag med ho// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i yon tan yid bzhin nor bu rin po che// mi zad par ldan rgyan gyi 'khor lo dpag med rgyas par snang // 'gro ba rnams ni yid 'phrog bltas pas chog shes
259b1(1): med par mdzes// rgyal ba ma lus yon tan rdzogs par snang la de dag mtha' thug med ho// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i gsung ni zab cing rgya cher nam mkha' 'dra// ma lus go zhing tshim mdzad rdo rje'i sgra 'byin snyan sgrogs
259b2(1): pa// rdo rje sgra chen mtha' yas mos dang 'thad pa de bzhin rnam par snang ho// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i phrin las sna tshogs bya ba lhun gyis grub// bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed 'gro ba ma lus kun 'dul ba// thabs dang
259b3(1): shes rab 'du 'bral med pa'i rdzu 'phrul sna tshogs 'di ni rnam par rol ho// de nas rgyal mchog skyes bu yis// rdo rje 'dzin pa la sogs pa// bye ba rdul snyed bcas pa la// gsang ba 'di ni gtad par
259b4(1): mdzad// nga yi gsang ba'i snying po 'di// dus gsum sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// bstan pa kun gyi rang bzhin te// ma lus kun gyi thabs su snang // gsang sngags rdo rje theg pa ste// dpal ldan sgyu 'phrul thugs
259b5(1): kyi rgyud// chos rnams ma lus kun snang ba// gsang ba'i me long thabs kyi rgyud// rgyal ba rdul snyed kun 'dus nas// dam pa 'di la bsngags par mdzad// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyud chen po// zab mo'i lung gi nges
259b6(1): don 'di// rigs chad dman pa'i gang zag gis// thams cad la ni me long ltar// bltas kyang gzugs brnyan mi snang bas// ston pa gnyis la rgyab phyogs shing // brtags pa'i phyi rol chos la zhe na// slob
260a1(1): dpon la ni brnyas byed dang // rdo rje spun la sdang sems che// zab mo'i don la skur byed cing // gsang rgyud don la 'phya ba dang // ser sna rang phyogs chags pa che// dad dang dam tshig mi ldan
260a2(1): zhing // rgyal srid rin chen mi gtong ba'i// phyi nang gnyis lha'i gang zag la// bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du// lus sems bral bar byed gyur kyang // gsang ba'i glegs bam mi bstan na// dbang dang dngos grub
260a3(1): nams kyang min// rmongs pas gal te byin na ni// de nyid mnar med dmyal bar ltung // dad dang dam tshig ldan pa yis// phun sum tshogs pa kun gtong zhing // dam pa'i yo byad ldan gyur pas// lus dang srog
260a4(1): la'ang mi lta na// dman pa'i longs spyod nams kyang min// theg pa che la mos pa dang // brtul zhugs snying brtser gus par ldan// rdo rje slob dpon bsnyen bkur zhing // skyon dang spro ba yongs su bzod// bskal
260a5(1): par 'grogs kyang yid mi 'khrug/ nyes dang legs pa ci la yang // ngo mtshar skyo ba'i 'du shes med// rang bzhin bzang dang tshul shes dang // 'grogs pas dug nad mi ldang ba'i// dam pa 'di la gsang ba
260a6(1): gtang // slob dpon man ngag mi ldan cing // gsang ba'i don la ma goms pas// rang rtags log pa'i tshad ma yis// gsang ba'i sbas don gtan la 'bebs// blun po mun pas chod pa rnams// log par zhen
260b1(1): pa'i rjes 'brangs nas// mthong ba'i chos la dmyal bar smin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// phyag rgya gsang chen snying po 'di// ma lus kun gyi gsang yin pas// rtogs nas gsal bar gang byed
260b2(1): pa// dbang dang dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa ste// bdag dang gzhan don lhun gyis grub// rdul snyed zhing la bsnyen bkur zhing // tshogs kyi bla ma bsten byas pa'i// 'bras bu gsang chen 'di yin te// de bas rgyal
260b3(1): sras gcig gi yul// rnyed dang bkur stis 'tsho ba yi// grags pa'i stobs ldan rnam par spangs// a ho rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba gsang ba me long gi rgyud las mthar phyin
260b4(1): pa'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // rdo rje sems dpa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba rdo rje sems dpa' gsang ba me long gi rgyud chen po rdzogs so// // rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi ma la mi tra dang // ban+de dz+nyA na ku mA ras bsgyur
260b5(1): cing zhus te gtan la phab pa// slad nas bi ma la mi tra nyid wa ze mo dge slong mas yang dang yang du zhus pa 'di gzhan la spel na dam tshig nyams so// //
261a1(1): bod skad du/ gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa/ bcom ldan 'das dpal kun du bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo// 'di skad bshad pa'i dus gcig na// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
261a2(1): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das longs spyod chen po phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid ma lus mi lus lus pa med pa thams cad
261a3(1): dang so so ma yin tha mi dad dbyer med pa'i rang bzhin te// 'og min gyi gnas mtha' dang dbus med pa na gzhi tshad med pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo khyab par gsal ba la ye shes rin po che sna tshogs 'bar ba'i
261a4(1): gzhal yas khang / rgya phyogs bcur yongs su ma chad pa/ yon tan dpag tu med par rgyas pa'i phyir gru bzhir gyur pa/ lhag pa'i ye shes rin po che'i glo 'bur gyis mdzes pa/ rtse mo phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sangs
261a5(1): rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor ma lus pa thams cad so so ma yin ngo bo nyid gcig pa'i ye shes kun du 'khyil pa/ ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che dbyibs dang kha dog la sogs te// rnam pa tha dad pa'i bye
261a6(1): brag dang khyad par du gyur pa'i tshad dpag tu med pa/ ye shes rin po che sna tshogs kyi phreng ba dang / chun 'phyang dang / shar bu'i rgyan dang / gzugs sna tshogs dang / sgra sna tshogs dang / dri sna tshogs dang / ro sna
261b1(1): tshogs dang / reg bya sna tshogs kyis phyogs bcur 'khrigs par rang byung la/ mi sgrib par gsal ba'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pas bklubs pa/ rnam par thar pa bzhi'i sgo nas 'jug pa'i sgo khyud can/ rnam
261b2(1): par thar pa brgyad kyi rta babs dang ldan pa'i phyi dang nang med par kun du yang nang du gyur pa na mi 'jigs pa seng ge'i khri dang / stobs kyi glang po'i khri dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rta'i khri dang // dbang gi rma bya'i khri
261b3(1): dang // thogs pa med pa nam mkha' lding gi khri dang // rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba nyi zla'i dkyil 'khor dang / gos pa med pa pad+ma rin po che'i gdan la sku mdun dang rgyab med pa thams cad du yang zhal thal
261b4(1): le bar gsal zhing / mtshan dang dpe byad du ldan pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad du sku gsung thugs sna tshogs par kun du snang ba/ lhun gyis grub pa'i sku gsung thugs chen po las thabs dang shes rab
261b5(1): kyi zhabs gnyis mnyam pa'i brtul zhugs kyi skyil mo krung du bzhugs pa/ ye shes drug gi phyag/ ye shes rin po che'i phyag 'bar ba can/ sku gsung thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbu gsum dang ldan pa 'di lta
261b6(1): ste/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par shes pa'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gzugs kyi rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa tshor ba'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'du shes kyi
262a1(1): rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa 'du byed kyi rgyal po dang / de dag kun kyang mthing ga dang / dkar po dang / ser po dang / le brgan dang / ljang gu'i mdog tu 'tsher ba/ btsun mo dam pa'i sdang
262a2(1): ba'i dbyings dang / sra ba'i dbyings dang / mnyen pa'i dbyings dang / dro ba'i dbyings dang / bskyod pa'i dbyings la sogs pa/ btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i chos kyi dbyings kun du mtha' yas par
262a3(1): khyab pa ni 'di lta ste/ dper na til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang nas khyab par bzhugs so// de nas byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong ba dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje thos pa dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje snom pa dang /
262a4(1): byang chub chen po rdo rje myong ba dang / btsun mo mthong bar bya ba dang / mnyan par bya ba dang / bsnam par bya ba dang / myang bar bya ba'i tshogs dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje mthong byed dang / byang chub chen po rdo
262a5(1): rje thos byed dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje snom byed dang / byang chub chen po rdo rje myong byed dang / btsun mo 'das pa dang / da ltar 'byung ba dang / ma byon pa'i tshogs dang / 'joms pa chen mo reg pa dang /
262a6(1): 'joms pa chen mo reg byed dang / 'joms pa chen mo reg shes dang / btsun mo rtag par ma yin pa dang / chad par ma yin pa dang / bdag tu ma yin pa dang / mtshan mar ma yin pa la sogs pa de lta bu'i
262b1(1): tshogs brjod kyis mi lang ba dang gnyis su med par bzhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku dang / gsung
262b2(1): dang / thugs dang / yon tan phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo // e/ e/ e ma'o// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid dang / dbang sgyur ye shes dkyil 'khor thugs dang rang snang ba nyid ting nge 'dzin gzugs brnyan sgyu
262b3(1): ma rnam dag gsal ba ni sku dang gsung dang thugs yon tan phrin las sel med pa'i yid bzhin nor bu rin po che mi zad par ldan pa rgyan gyi 'khor lo rdo rje mchog gi gnas nyid do zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig
262b4(1): tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das byed pa po rdo rje yid kun tu bzang po thams cad ma lus pa'i rang bzhin gyi tshul rdo rjes btsun
262b5(1): mo chos bya ba mo kun tu bzang mo la 'jug par gyur te ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// oM chos kyi chos nyid shes bya'i dbyings// kun tu bzang mo bde ba'i yum// ma g.yos rang bzhin dkyil 'khor ni// bdag
262b6(1): yin bdag gi spyod yul ba// phyag rgya sna tshogs so sor gsal// nub phyogs 'og min gnas mchog tu// ma chags pad+ma'i gdan gting ba// dus gsum rgyal ba bzhugs pa'i gnas// rnam par thar pa'i sgo
263a1(1): bzhi la// phyag rgya bzhi dang yang dag ldan// dbang dang skal min gsal ba'i phyir// nang dang phyi rim lcags dang ldan// rgyal ba yongs kyi sbas pa yi// sus kyang gting dpag dka' ba de// kun tu
263a2(1): bzang po nyid kyis gzigs// zhes brjod pas btsun mo bya ba mo chos kun tu bzang mo la 'jug par gyur to// zhugs nas btsun mo bya ba mo chos kun tu bzang mos bcom ldan 'das yid kun tu bzang po
263a3(1): dang // gnyis su med pa'i longs spyod bde ba la mnyam par gnas te ched du brjod pa brjod do// sems kyi sems nyid byed pa'i gtso// kun tu bzang po rdo rje yid// ye shes drug gi rang bzhin te// shar
263a4(1): phyogs mngon dga'i bsam yas na// nI la lta bu'i gter 'byin pa// gsang 'dus 'phrul gyi ldeg mig gis// rnam par thar pa'i sgo phye nas// byang chub mchog gis nang gtan dgrol// mnyam sbyor pad+ma'i gdan
263a5(1): la bzhugs// 'gro don byang chub sems bskyed nas// 'gro lnga skye bzhi dbang du bsdus// sku gsung thugs gnas dbang bskur to// zhes brjod pas thams cad mnyam pa chen po'i tshul rdo rje nyid du gsal bar
263a6(1): gyur to// zhugs pas phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa ma lus pa thams cad gcig gi rang bzhin dbyer med pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e
263b1(1): ma'o rdo rje phung po'i yan lag ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lnga ru grags// skye mched khams rnams mang po kun// byang chub sems dpa'i dkyil 'khor nyid// sa chu spyan dang mA ma kI// me rlung gos dkar sgrol ma
263b2(1): ste// nam mkha' dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma// srid gsum ye nas sangs rgyas shing // thams cad ma lus chos so cog/ sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan pa min// sangs rgyas nyid las gzhan pa'i chos// sangs rgyas
263b3(1): nyid kyis mi rnyed do// zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par gyur to// de nas btsun mo bya ba mo chos kun tu bzang mos bcom ldan 'das yid kun tu bzang po dang gnyis su med par gyur
263b4(1): nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o phyogs bcu'i stong khams ye shes dben// srid pa gsum nyid dag pa'i zhing // snyigs ma lnga nyid bde ldan nas// phung po lnga nyid mngon sangs rgyas// thams cad
263b5(1): mchog gi snying po bas// gzhan du rgyal bas chos mi 'tshal// nyid las gzhan zhes bya ba'i chos// btsal kyang rgyal bas mi rnyed do// zhes brjod pas thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas par de bzhin gshegs pa
263b6(1): nyid kyis mkhyen to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las gleng bslang ba'i le'u ste gnyis pa'o// // de nas gnyis su med pa'i bdag nyid chen pos ye shes sangs rgyas pa'i sems ye shes su bskyed
264a1(1): pa 'di gsungs so// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // skye ba med las thams cad skyes// skyes pa nyid na skye ba med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi
264a2(1): chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // 'gag pa med las thams cad 'gag/ 'gag pa nyid na 'gag pa med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // gnas pa
264a3(1): med las thams cad gnas// gnas pa nyid na gnas pa med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // dmigs pa med las thams cad dmigs// dmigs pa nyid na
264a4(1): dmigs pa med// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // 'gro 'od med las 'gro dang 'ong // 'gro 'ong nyid na 'gro 'od med// ces brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
264a5(1): cad dang btsun mo'i tshogs thams cad mnyes pas khyab par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad btsun mo'i tshogs dang bcas pas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o ye nas gsang ba'i
264a6(1): chos// sna tshogs snang la rang bzhin gsang // ngo bo nyid kyis rab tu gsang // gzhan du min yang shin tu gsang // zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ngo bo nyid du gcig
264b1(1): pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas dbyer med na/ 'gro ba'i rnam par rtog pa ma rig pa la 'gro ba lnga'i rigs bsam gyis mi khyab par smin pa la thugs rje chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chen po skyes nas ched du brjod
264b2(1): pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o bde gshegs snying po las// rang gi rnam rtog las kyis sprul// sna tshogs lus dang longs spyod dang // gnas dang sdug bsngal la sogs pa// bdag dang bdag gis so sor
264b3(1): 'dzin// sus kyang mi 'ching bcings med de// bcing bar bya ba yod ma yin// rnam rtog bdag tu 'dzin pa yin// nan gyis mkha' la mdud pa 'dor// bcings med rnam par grol med pa'i// ye nas lhun
264b4(1): rdzogs sangs rgyas chos// bstan phyir spro ba sna tshogs mdzad// ces de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du gleng ngo // gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las don dam pa dang kun rdzob kyi byang chub kyi sems ye
264b5(1): shes su bskyed pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad las thugs rje chen po byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i rig pa'i skyes bu thub pa drug de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang
264b6(1): gsung dang thugs rdo rje las bton to// bton nas kyang las kyi dbang gis snrel zhi dang / yan man gyi 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu med pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po re rer thub pa chen po
265a1(1): bcom lda 'das re res 'dul ba rnam bzhis 'gro ba lnga'i don mdzad de bltams pa dang / rab tu 'byung ba dang / dka' thub mdzad pa dang / sangs rgyas pa dang / bdud btul ba dang / chos kyi
265a2(1): 'khor lo bskor ba dang / cho 'phrul chen po ston pa dang / mya ngan las 'das pa la sogs pa ston pa'i thub pa dus bzhi kun tu mkhyen pa dang // thams cad kyi sems kyi rgyud du kun tu mkhyen pa dang / rdzu 'phrul
265a3(1): gyi spyan gyis kun tu gzigs pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi snyan gyis kun tu gsan pa dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi cho gas kun tu don spyod pa dang / zag pa med pas kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa rdzogs pa'i mngon par shes pa drug
265a4(1): dang // kun tu sku bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun tu thugs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang / kun tu zhal bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang // kun tu gsung bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa dang / bsam gyis mi khyab pa
265a5(1): grangs med par yang phyogs bcur snang bar gyur to// de ltar snang bar gyur nas ji snyed pa'i thub pa chen po snying rje'i go 'phang chen po thams cad kyang 'di lta ste/ 'dul ba'i dbang gis lha dang mi'i theg pa dang /
265a6(1): nyan thos kyi theg pa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang // byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa dang / bla na med pa'i theg pas ma rig pa'i rnam par rtog pa nyon mongs pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi'i gnyen por chos
265b1(1): kyi phung po stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi gsungs so// gsung ngo // gsung bar 'gyur ro// de dag thams cad kyang gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i phyi nang gi rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'dzin pa 'khrul pa la dgos pa
265b2(1): dang / las dang las kyi 'bras bu chud mi za ba dang / las dang las kyi 'bras bus mi gos gos par mi 'gyur ba dang / gos pa med pa'i ston pa'i mthar thug go/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/
265b3(1): 'khor ba'i skyon dang / mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan bstan pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o dkyil 'khor bsam yas par// snying po bla med ji snyed
265b4(1): pa'i// gzhan gyis mi 'phrogs rang bzhin rgyal// mtha' dang bral bas bdag med pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o ji snyed 'jig rten 'khrul pa'i
265b5(1): chos// ma rig rtog pa'i gzung 'dzin gyis// stong gi 'jig rten bsam yas par// phyi nang rten 'brel gnyis su 'khor// rtog pa'i bag chags stug po yin// mi mthun bde sdug myong bar 'gyur// de nyid ji
265b6(1): bzhin dbyings nyid dang // rang bzhin bdag med tshul gcig ste// rang bzhin nyid la nyams pa med// yang dag sgyu ma'i tshul gnyis su// bdag dang bdag gi gzhan med de// de nyid ngo bo nyid dbyings
266a1(1): pas// rnam dag dbyings nyid tshul gcig go// bdag dang bdag gi gzhan rnams ni// log par rtog pa tsam nyid las// phra zhing zab pa yod ma yin// log rtog nyid la nyid spyod de// gzhan du
266a2(1): g.yo ba ci yang med// log rtog rgyu 'bras rgyun nyid kyang // gzhi rtsa med de skad cig ma// rnam par dag pa'i dbyings nyid tshul// nyid la dbang sgyur nyid spyod phyir// bdag dang gzhan dang rtog pa'i rgyun// rnam
266a3(1): dag bla med theg pa'i mchog/ theg pa bzhi yis nges 'byung la// theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas// yang dag rtogs pas rab brtags na// rang bzhin med la cir yang 'grub// sangs rgyas mya ngan yong mi
266a4(1): 'da'// chos kyang nub par mi 'gyur te// ma rig smin mdzad gdul ba'i phyir// 'byung gnas mya ngan 'da' bar ston// 'dul ba mdo sde chos mngon dang // dam tshig sgrub dang grub pa dang // sku dang gsung
266a5(1): dang thugs kyi rgyud// ji snyed 'jig rten mtha' klas par// phyogs bcur kun du rab grags pa// gsang ba'i snying po las 'phros te// rang bzhin gsang ba'i snying po 'di// sde snod kun dang rgyud kun gyi// ston
266a6(1): pa'i thub pa bsam yas pa// 'byung gnas gtan la nges par 'bebs// chos rnams ming du btags pa tsam// ston pa'i don dang mthun phyogs su// ming nyid tshig tu btags nas bstan// ston ming tshig la
266b1(1): dngos po med// ces brjod pas chos thams cad ngo bo nyid kyis lhun gyis grub pa chen por gsal bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa lhun gyis grub pa gnyis su med pa'i dkyil 'khor de dag nyid kyi
266b2(1): gsang ba 'di nyid sku gsung thugs dang yon tan phrin las rdo rje las byung ngo // a'o srid rtse'i nyes dmigs bdag tu rtog las 'phros// rgyud drug skye 'gag lus dang longs spyod dang // gnas dag sdug bsngal
266b3(1): 'khrul 'khor la sogs pa// log rtog nyid las gzhan du ci yang med// stong nyid bdag med ye mkhyen rang rig thugs// dmigs bya dmigs med med par dran dbang sgyur// ngo mtshar sku gsung yon tan zhing
266b4(1): khams la// gzhan na med de de nyid de ltar yin// zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// thub pa drug gis sprul pa grangs med pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa yang de dag tu 'dus par de
266b5(1): bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis mkhyen to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las chos thams cad gtan la phab pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen
266b6(1): pos 'gro ba thams cad kyi rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor yod par bstan pa dang / rigs rgyud drug tu yang bshad/ de la chos nyid kyi rigs ni thams cad kun la yang yod do// nam mkhas kyang kun la khyab par
267a1(1): gnas so// de ltar chos kyi dbyings dang / nam mkhas kun la khyab kyang rnam par thar pa'i don ma rtogs na me long g.yas g.yogs pa dang 'dra ste gzugs brnyan snang ba'i bya ba byed mi nus so/
267a2(1): zhes gsungs nas yang 'di skad rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs so// mnyam nyid don rtogs rang rig rgyal po dang // rgya mtsho chen por chu klung 'bab pa ltar// bla med don rtogs thabs chen 'di dag tu// rnam
267a3(1): pa'i theg pa bsam yas ma lus 'dus// a ho// bdag med gnyis rtogs pha rol phyin rdzogs pa// sa bcu rim gyis bsgoms pa'i rnal 'byor pa// sangs rgyas sar 'gro go 'phang thob pa'i lam// bden pa
267a4(1): gnyis kyis rab tu thob par 'gyur// phyi nang rten 'brel sgyu ma mig yor tshul shes pa'i// dngos po gzugs la thogs med rab tu 'jug/ dge bshes mi slob rang gi rig pas rtogs// byang chub sar 'gro yid
267a5(1): bzhin bde ba'i mchog/ bden bzhi don rtogs rab tu spong ba yi// ye shes bcu drug cha sbyangs rab zhi ba'i// rgyun zhugs la sogs rim par sbyangs nas ni// nyon mongs dgra rnams rab tu zhi ba'i sa ru
267a6(1): 'gro// theg pa gang du bstan pa ma nges pa'i// yang na kun la mthun nas 'byam par 'jug/ yang na nges med 'di zhes brtag tu med// 'di ni ma nges rdo rje 'chang gis gsungs// dge bcu spyod cing mi dge slong
267b1(1): byed pa// 'dod khams lha dang mi ru skye ba'i rgyu// tshad med bzhi spyod mi g.yo sgom byed pa// tshangs gnas lha sogs skye ba'i rgyu yin no// chos kyi dbyings kyis kun la khyab gyur kyang // rang rig rtogs pa'i skal
267b2(1): dang mi ldan na// ji ltar dmus long mdun du mdog bstan bzhin// 'di ni skal med rigs chad sa yin no// chos kyi dbyings kyis kun la khyab pa yis// bla med theg pa bsam yas gsungs pa yang // so so
267b3(1): rang rig blo la snang bar zad// ngan song 'gro drug sna tshogs rgyu ba yang // 'khrul pa'i blo log rtog pa nyid snang ste// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings la 'gyur ba med// mi dmigs rang rig goms byas bla na med pa'i
267b4(1): mchog/ log rtog bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin gyur na// dngos med mi sdug sna tshogs snang bar 'gyur// yang dag shes pa'i rang rig blo med na// bde gshegs zhing yang ngan song gnas su mthong // theg
267b5(1): mchog mnyam pa'i don nyid rtogs pa ni// ngan song gnas nyid 'og min dga' ldan gnas// nam mkha'i dbyings ni de nyid bsam yas par// nyi zla gza' skar mtshan ma glog 'gyu dang // 'ja' tshon sprin mang
267b6(1): sna tshogs 'khrugs gyur kyang // nam mkha'i dbyings la gyur cing nyams pa med// mi dmigs chos kyi dbyings ni bsam yas par// sku gsung yon tan phrin las rmad 'byung dang // 'jig rten gtso mchog ma
268a1(1): lus thams cad dang // 'khrul 'khor sdug bsngal sna tshogs rnam mang yang // de bzhin nyid la 'phel zhing bri ba med// ces rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba
268a2(1): las/ thams cad la chos nyid kyi rgyu yod pa dang rigs rgyud chad pa dang rigs brgyad so sor dbye ba'i mdor bshad pa'i le'u ste lnga pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgongs pa gcig tu
268a3(1): gyur nas mnyam pa chen po'i tshul rdo rje'i dbyings su chos thams cad ye nas sangs rgyas pa'i ting nge 'dzin las mi g.yo bar chos thams cad ming tsam du gnas pa'i yi ge phreng ba 'khor lo zhes bya ba 'di sku
268a4(1): gsung thugs rdo rje las phyung ngo // a rab tu brtan 'gyur a dkar las/ shin tu phra ba'i a rnams spro// phyogs kun gang bar gsal gyur nas// bsdus kyang 'phel 'grib med par brtan// de las ming tshogs
268a5(1): gsal bar kun// spro zhing bsdu ba'ang de bzhin no// 'di ni rdo rje dngos grub kyi// brten 'byung ye shes rgyu yin no// a/ ka kha ga g+ha nga / tsa tsha dza dz+ha nya/ Ta Sha Da D+ha Na/ ta tha da d+ha na/ pa pha ba b+ha ma/ ya wa ra la/
268a6(1): sha Sha sa ha/ k+Sha/ i I/ u U/ e ai/ oM o/ 'di dag phyung bas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos kun du g.yos nas chos thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid du
268b1(1): gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// a ni stong dang mi stong gi/ dbu ma dmigs su yod ma yin// thams cad ming tsam sangs rgyas kun// yi ge phreng ba nyid la
268b2(1): gnas// a nyid sna tshogs par snang ba'i// ka la sogs pa bzhi bcu gnyis// sgra yi ming gis thams cad bsdus// mngon rdzogs rgyal por de nyid nges// e ma'o ngo mtshar ya mtshan gyi// 'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsa
268b3(1): lnga'i ming // tshig rnams ma lus 'dzin pa'i gnas// sna tshogs don kun smra zhing ston// dngos med yi ge rang bzhin sems// bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs kyang // dbyibs dang kha dog ming tshogs
268b4(1): kyis// rol pa cir yang sprul cing ston// phyogs bcu dus bzhi gshegs pa yi// ye shes sems dpa'i sku gsung thugs// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa lnga yi// yi ge mgo nas k+Sha la rdzogs// sems ni rang bzhin
268b5(1): yi ge ste// yi ge dngos po yod ma yin// dmigs med de nyid sna tshogs pa'i// sku gsung thugs kyi 'khor lo che// sku gsung thugs ni ngo mtshar gyi// ya mtshan 'phrul chen rab 'gugs pa// dbyings la dbyings
268b6(1): kyis bris pa ste// yi ge zhes ni de phyir brjod// mgo ni ma nor lam yin te// tshig ni shes rab ming du smras// shad ni thabs chen tshigs su gcod// a ni skye med de bzhin nyid// Tha ni sgyu 'phrul rdo rje nyid// Ta
269a1(1): ni snang ba'i sgra 'phrul nyid// ran rdzu 'phrul med bzhin med// d+han zla 'phrul rnam dag cad// Na ni kun tu rdzu 'phrul cid// ba ni d+ha bas mngon rdzogs cad// tani rna bas brtan pa cad// da na d+hA
269a2(1): bas lham me nyid// d+ha ni drA bas 'khyil pa nyid// na ni dra bas kun du 'gyur// ka ni spyan gyi thugs kyi mchog/ kha ni snyan gyi thugs kyi mchog/ ga ni shangs kyi thugs kyi mchog/ g+ha ni ljags kyi thugs kyi
269a3(1): mchog/ nga ni thugs kyang 'jig byed pa'o// tsa ni spyan gyi sku yi mchog/ tsha ni snyan gyi sku yi mchog/ dza ni shangs kyi sku yi mchog/ dz+ha ni ljags kyi sku yi mchog/ nya ni sku yang 'jig byed pa'o// pa ni spyan gyi gsung
269a4(1): gi mchog/ pha ni snyan gyi gsung mchog ste// ba ni shangs kyi gsung mchog yin// b+ha ni ljags kyi gsung gi mchog/ ma ni gsung yang 'jig par byed// ya ni skye ba rnam par dag/ wa ni gnas pa dag pa yin// ra
269a5(1): ni 'jig pa dag pa ste// la ni stong pa dag pa'o// sha ni rtag med dag pa ste// Sha ni chad pa'ang yod ma yin// sa ni mtha' bral bdag med pa// ha ni mtshan ma med pa nyid// k+Sha ni ye shes thugs kyi thugs// i
269a6(1): ni rdul snyed lha rnams su// I ni rdul snyed lha ma yin// u ni rdul snyed mi rnams su// U ni rdul snyed byol song rnams// e ni rdul snyed yi dgas su// ai ni rdul snyed dmyal ba rnams// oM ni thams cad 'jig
269b1(1): par byed// oM ni thams cad zhig pa yin// yi ge 'khor lo tshogs chen 'dis// sku gsung thugs kyi phreng ba bsdus// a ho// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i dkyil
269b2(1): 'khor de dag nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku gsung thugs dang yon tan phrin las rdo rje las byung ngo // a ho// thabs dang shes rab dgyes sprin byang chub sems tshogs rgyu 'khor lo// 'bras bu rgyal ba'i smin grub
269b3(1): ngo mtshar ming tshogs bzhi bcu gnyis// 'dus ma byas nyid 'dus byas rdo rje dkyil 'khor 'byin pa'i dam// 'da' bar mi mdzad dbang med rgyu rkyen tshogs pa'i mthu chen yin// a ho// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig
269b4(1): tu'o zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yi ge 'khor lor gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las// yi ge phreng ba 'khor lo bkod pa'i le'u ste drug pa'o// // de nas de bzhin
269b5(1): gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las shin tu gsang ba'i phyir gsang sngags kyi rgyud de'i phyi ba dang / nang pa thabs kyi rgyud gzhan la khams bcwa brgyad du bstan/ gtsug lag thams cad la yang khams
269b6(1): bcwa brgyad du bstan pa yin/ lung gi spyi 'di ni shin tu zab pa'i phyir khams nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bstan te/ lung gi spyi yang rgyud dang gsung rab thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas yin// gsang ba'i dbang po dang gsang
270a1(1): pa'i yul gnyis ka yang / skye mched dang khams thams cad 'byung ba'i gzhi yin pa'i phyir shin tu gsang bar gsungs so// dkyil 'khor de dag shin tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir nyid la nyid
270a2(1): ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// e ma'o ye nas gsang ba'i chos// thams cad kun la rang bzhin gnas// ngang gis dag mnyam ma rtogs pas// kun la yod cing rang bzhin gsang // gzhan du min la shin tu
270a3(1): gsang // don nyid kyis ni gsang ba'i rgyu// mnyam pa'i rdo rje can gyis gsung // 'di ni byang chub snying po mchog/ a ho// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// dbang po yul du snang ba'i rnams// byang chub sems dpa'i
270a4(1): dkyil 'khor nyid// phung po lnga dang 'byung ba lnga// rigs lnga yab yum bcu ru 'byor// skye mched khams rnams bcwa brgyad po// sems dpa' sems ma'i dkyil 'khor nyid// thams cad byang chub sems ma
270a5(1): yi// rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang por 'dus// rdo rje dbang po gsang ba'i thabs// dbang po yul nyid shes rab dbyings// dbang po'i thugs ni rdo rje sems// thams cad 'byung ba'i gter nyid dang // thams cad
270a6(1): 'gro ba'i gnas nyid de// de yis ma bskyed gang yang med// 'khor dang mya ngan 'das pa'i rgyu// de las thams cad skye zhing 'byung // kun gyi phyag rgya'i rgyu yin te// bde ba byang chub sgrub pa'i rdzas// de las bskyed
270b1(1): cing de las spro// dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i gnas// dbang po rdo rje pad+mor ldan// gnyis med byang chub sems 'phro na// mi dmigs bde dang longs spyod 'phro// sku gsung thugs dang ye shes lnga// gsang
270b2(1): ba'i lha mo bzhi rnams dang // mchod pa'i lha mo rdzogs ldan bzhi// 'jug dang ldang dang gnas dang smon pa'i byang chub sems// g.yo dang bskyod dang ldang dang gnas// 'gug dang 'dzin dang de bzhin te// bsdus
270b3(1): dang 'khril ba'i don bsgrub phyir// bsdams dang mi gtong dbang sbyar te// bde ba sgra snyan phyogs bcur sgrogs// shin tu sgeg pa'i gzi brjid 'bar// yid bzhin rin chen phreng bar 'bar// dbyangs snyan yid
270b4(1): 'phrog gzi ldan 'bar// gzugs mdzes bskyod pas phyogs bcur g.yo// kun du tshim byed bro bsung thim// lha mdzes rin chen phung po 'phro// 'od gsal 'phro bas kun du 'bar// bdud rtsi bsil dro 'jam
270b5(1): pa'i dbyings// a la la ho// gsang ba'i dbang po pad+mar ldan gyur nas// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis su// pha rol phyin bcu rgyu 'bras rdzogs// sa bcu rim gyis bkod med rdzogs// kun du 'od gsal
270b6(1): pad+ma spyan yang rdzogs// yi ge phreng ba 'khor lo bsam gyis mi khyab pa// yang dag rdzogs chen thabs dang ldan// thabs dang shes rab bla med sa yang rdzogs// bsod nams ye shes tshogs chen rdzogs par rol//
271a1(1): a la la ho// de bzhin nyid kyi gsang mchog las// khams ni nyi shu rtsa gcig ste// bcwa brgyad po ni rgyud gzhan bzhin// gsum ni de bzhin kun gyi bdag/ bcwa brgyad 'byung ba'i gnas yin
271a2(1): te// byang chub 'grub pa'i zhing yang yin// bde ba 'byin pa'i rgyu yang yin// gsang ba'i mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// dbang po rdo rje gsang ba'i rgyal// yul ni pad+ma bde mchog dbyings// sems ni byang chub 'byung
271a3(1): ba'i gter// dbang po yul sems ldan gyur nas// gsang ba mchog gi 'phrul chen spro// dkyil 'khor rdul snyed grangs med dang // phun sum tshogs pa'i lhun grub rnams// gsang ba mchog gis 'byin par
271a4(1): byed// 'di ni rtse gcig yin par gsungs// gsang ba'i don mchog 'di dag ni// lta ba dman la bshad byas na// dus min par ni srog zad nas// mgo 'gas snying yang tshig par 'gyur// khab len gyis ni
271a5(1): lcags sdud ltar// mi 'dod bzhin du dbang med par// ngan song mi khom bskal par brgyud par 'gyur// de bas 'di ni shin tu gsang bar bya// shes rab rgya chen blo zab yangs pa yis// blo brtan snying rje che
271a6(1): dang dad ldan ngang tshul bzang la brtan// gzhan du nams kyang sbyin mi bya zhes nyid la yang nyid brjod do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las khams nyi shu rtsa gcig tu bsdus nas// thams cad ma lus
271b1(1): par dbyings su bkod pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o// // de nas yi ge'i dkyil 'khor gyi sprin bkod pa las sgyu 'phrul rnam par spros pa 'di ched du brjod do// rtsa ba med pa'i sems nyid ni// chos rnams kun
271b2(1): gyi rtsa ba yin// sems nyid yi ge'i rang bzhin te// yi ge yid bzhin rin chen sprin// sgyu 'phrul dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu gnyis// dra ba'i dkyil 'khor mngon rdzogs pas// phyogs bcu dus bzhi rdzogs pa
271b3(1): yi// dkyil 'khor thams cad grub par 'gyur// bdud rtsir 'gyur zhing 'byung ba dang // bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi nad sel cing // longs spyod 'byung zhing ngan song sbyong // ci yang gzhan du 'gyur bar 'grub// nam
271b4(1): mkha' rdo rje sra 'byung zhing // 'bar nas me yang 'tshig pa dang // chur 'gyur 'bab pa'ang de bzhin te// 'jig rten khams ni gtor ba dang // thams cad stongs shing lhung bar 'gyur// dgug dang btang dang
271b5(1): bcing dang dgrol// gso dang bsad dang pham dang rgyal// ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur// de nyid ye shes rang snang ba'i// ming tshig gzugs tshogs yid bzhin gyis// mun la snang byung ji bzhin
271b6(1): du/ 'gyur bas gser 'gyur sman gyi tshul// ston pa mchod brtson rtogs pa gsal// dam tshig sngags dang phyag rgya rnams// ma nyams shes shing yo byad ldan// 'grub 'gyur mi ldan don med brlag/ dus gsum
272a1(1): rgyal bas thugs chud pa'i// dngos grub mchog gi snying po ni// zad pa'i dus med yid bzhin mdzod/ 'phel 'grib med par 'byung ba ste// dngos po med las dngos po'i sprin// sna tshogs rnam
272a2(1): par 'byung zhing 'gyur// dngos rnams nyid na dngos med par// rtogs pa'i dbang sgyur ting 'dzin yin// gang gis dmigs med mi shes pa// de yis chos kyi dbyings mi shes// de phyir dngos dang dngos med
272a3(1): pa// 'jigs pas dmigs med shes par gyis// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid ni// pho mo ma yin ma ning min// mtshan med ma yin rigs rgyud min// kha dog ma yin dbyibs ma yin// gnas su ma yin gang
272a4(1): yang min// de bzhin nyid dbyings ye shes te// thabs kyi phyag rgya kun gyi rgyu// thabs las thabs byung thabs bsam yas// tha dad min la tha dad pa'i// nang dang nang gi phyi rol pa// dkyil 'khor bsam yas
272a5(1): ye shes rol// 'jigs med kun bzang phyag rgya mchog/ gang gis glang chen myos 'dra'i sems// mnyam par bzhag pas btul nas su// sngags dang phyag rgyar rab brtan na// dngos grub ya mtshan chen por
272a6(1): 'gyur// zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid gzigs mos mnyes par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje las gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung ngo // e ma'o snying por lam
272b1(1): bcas pas// 'jigs med dbyings nyid kun bzang phyag rgya mchog/ rang bzhin sku gsung thugs chen po// byang chub lhun grub bdal ba'i ngang // snying po nyid ni snying por kun bcas kun tu gnas// de nyid
272b2(1): rdzogs pa'i ngang las dngos grub kun shar kun tu gnas// a ho rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las sgyu 'phrul sgrub pa'i le'u ste brgyad pa'o// // de nas de bzhin
272b3(1): gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba rang bzhin gyi dkyil 'khor las lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis sngags 'chang rnams lhar sgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di don yod par bya ba'i phyir ched du brjod pa 'di
272b4(1): brjod do// e ma'o ye nas rnam dag pa'i// thabs dang shes rab ldan par gnas// byang chub mchog tu nyi zla shar// de nyid bzhugs gnas yin par gsungs// chos rnams thams cad bdag med
272b5(1): pa'i// dbyings su thim pa'i 'od zer gsal// gcig dang spros pa thams cad med// dkyil 'khor spros med zlum po'i tshul// ye nas mya ngan 'das pa'i chos// ye shes rgyu dang 'bras bu ldan// thams cad
272b6(1): mkhyen pa'i ye shes sku// chos kyi 'khor lo yongs kyis bskor// thugs rje byin brlabs 'phros pa yis// ye shes bzhi yi dkyil 'khor spro// ye shes lnga dang sku gsung thugs// byin brlabs ya mtshan bsam mi
273a1(1): khyab// rang snang ba yi thabs las 'byung // bsod nams ye shes tshogs rdzogs pa'i// thugs rje rgyas pa'i gzhal yas khang // dbus mtha' med par rgyas par gnas// stong smon mtshan med 'od
273a2(1): gsal 'jug/ de phyir ye shes sgo bzhir bshad// der 'gro lam stegs brgyad dang ldan// rang bzhin ye nas 'od gsal phyir// nyi zla brtsegs pa'i gdan khri 'bar// ye nas rnam par dag pa'i phyir// ma
273a3(1): chags pad+mo 'bar ba'i gdan// zad med ye shes gter gyur pas// yid bzhin rin chen 'bar ba'i gdan// ye nas mnyam nyid mi 'da'i phyir// ta la'i ljon shing rang bzhin gnas// re ba yid bzhin skong
273a4(1): ba'i phyir// dpag bsam shing gi rin chen 'bar// yid bzhin rin chen rgyan gyis bskor// thams cad la ni dbang sbur phyir// 'jig rten lha chen rnams kyis bskor// gsang ba de nyid nges pa las// 'phrul
273a5(1): chen bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyis// thams cad lha nyid rtag tu sbyor// thams cad ma lus dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'di ni rang bzhin dkyil 'khor dang // gzugs brnyan lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor gsum// ting 'dzin
273a6(1): lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor dag/ byang chub sems dang tshogs mchog brten// zhes nyid la nyid bshad do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las shin tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bsdus nas/ lhag pa'i
273b1(1): gzugs brnyan bstan pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin gcig dang du ma med pa bdag nyid thams cad kyis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad la
273b2(1): nyid kyi che ba'i dkyil 'khor 'byung bar bzhed nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// ye shes phyogs bzhi dbu brtags te// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub ni// rdzogs chen rtogs pa'i rnal 'byor
273b3(1): pas// kun 'byung dkyil 'khor chen por spyod// 'khor lo rtsibs bzhi mu khyud bcas// gru chad bzhis brgyan bar khyams dang // kun tu gru bzhi sgo khyud ldan// rol mo sna tshogs sprin phung bzhin// dkyil 'khor
273b4(1): bzhi bcu gnyis kyis brgyan// seng ge glang chen rta dang khyung // nam mkha' lding gi khri chen la// nyi zla pad+ma rin po che// gdan la rdzogs dang sems dpa'i tshul// 'khor lo rgyal po rgyal mo dang // g.yas nas
273b5(1): mthong thos mnam pa dang // myong dang btsun mo'i tshogs su bcas// gru chad la ni mthong byed dang // zos byed mnam byed myong byed rnams// btsun mo dag dang bcas par gnas// bar khyams la ni thub drug
273b6(1): dang // mdun dang rgyab tu byed pa dang // bya ba bdag ni gnas par bstan// sgo khyud bzhi la 'joms pa ni// btsun mo'i tshogs dang ldan par gnas// rdo rje 'khor lo rin po che// pad+ma ral gri dril bu
274a1(1): 'bar// ut+pal klu shing la sogs mtshan// mdzes tshul mnyes pa'i yo byad 'dzin// mthing ga dkar po ser le brgan// ljang gu la sogs sna tshogs pa'i// mnyen lcug 'khril ldem gzhon tshul
274a2(1): can// gsal 'tsher lhun stug gzi byin can// 'od zer 'phro ba'i tshogs chen po// 'bar ba'i phreng bas 'khyil pa ste// dbus mtha' med par khyab pa yi// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun gyis grub// sku yi phyag
274a3(1): rgya che mchog ni// de bzhin dbyings las ma g.yos kyang // yang dag thar pa'i gzugs sku dang // 'gro ba ma lus 'dul ba'i phyir// mthun byas sku ni sna tshogs ston// ston nyid sgyu ma mig yor tshul// tshul nyid
274a4(1): dbyings las g.yos pa med// ma g.yos bzhin du sna tshogs pa'i// de'i tshe mi mthun sna tshogs la// so so 'dra bar snang ba ni// de bzhin nyid kyi ma bcos kyang // las 'phro dbang gis so sor snang // dper na
274a5(1): nga chu zla bzhin// de tshe 'gro drug thams cad la// sdig spong gzugs su rnam par bstan// dge tshul rnams la dgra bcom gzugs// rang rgyal rnams la bse ru'i tshul// gzhan yang thig mchog rim pa
274a6(1): bzhin// 'og min bla med gnas mchog tu// sku ni rnam par snang mdzad tshul// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor rnams la// de bzhin gsung mchog mi smra ste// sku yis chos rnams mjal bar ston// me long bstan
274b1(1): pa'i tshul bzhin du// dngos kyi mdog ngan thams cad sel// 'khor gyis de bzhin sku bltas na// byang chub sgrib pa gting dpag med// me long bzhin du sku la snang // de nas sa bcu rim gyis 'byung // bla med
274b2(1): byang chub yang dag 'thob// chos sku dpag med brjod du med// longs spyod zad med rin chen gter// sprul pa bye ba bsam mi khyab// mtshan dang dpe byad thams cad rdzogs// spyod yul kun tu maN+Da
274b3(1): la// tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par rol// thabs dang shes rab sa yi mchog/ de la sogs te bsam yas mchog/ skye shi med pa'i g.yung drung sku// nyon mongs kun gyi zhing du gnas// zad mi shes kyi gter
274b4(1): du gyur// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin gyi sku// thams cad dbyer med mnyam pa'i sku// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes sku// de tshe sku lnga kun kyang rdzogs// zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas mu
274b5(1): med pa thams cad du dkyil 'khor brjod kyis mi lang ba zhing gi rdul snyed du gsal bar gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang gnyis su med pa'i yon tan chen po'i dkyil 'khor de dag
274b6(1): nyid kyi gsang ba 'di nyid sku gsung thugs dang yon tan phrin las rdo rje las phyung ngo // a ho// dmigs bya dmigs med mi dmigs dpag med bsam mi khyab// ye shes rang rig dkyil 'khor sna tshogs brjod
275a1(1): mi lang // mnyam dang mi mnyam kun khyab khyab med khyab pa'i dbyings// ye nas kun gsal dkyil 'khor rnams sgro spros pa med// ye nas kun khyab dkyil 'khor bsam yas zhing gi rdul snyed
275a2(1): du// ye nas rnam spros snying po kun gnas gnas pa med// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// a'o zhes gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dkyil 'khor spros pa'i le'u ste bcu
275a3(1): pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs nas 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad kyang // nyid la nyid mnyes par mchod cing / kun tu bzang po dgyes te/ phyogs
275a4(1): bcu dus bzhi ma lus pa thams cad kyi bzhugs gnas thams cad gzhal yas khang rin po che sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ tshad dpag tu med pa/ rgyas pa/ mtha' dbus med par khyab cing 'od zer sgrib pa
275a5(1): med pa rang byung ba la bzhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// nyid kyi dbyings nyid 'phro ba dpag tshad med// kun nas dkyil 'khor yongs su ma chad pa'i// srid gsum yang dag mnyam sbyor spyod yul
275a6(1): te// mtshan 'dzin 'das pa mchog gi rgyu las byung // dbang sgyur shin tu rnam par dag pa yi// de bzhin gshegs pa 'og min gnas bzhugs nas// gzung 'dzin bral ba'i bla med rjes 'dod dang // 'jig rten
275b1(1): 'khor gyi gtsos bkur dbang phyug dang // gzhan dang 'jig rten phyogs bcu khams gnas pa// bdud rtsi ro yis dga' ba bde chen 'grub// dug gsum dri bral bdud sde tshar bcad pa'i// 'das dang ma byon de
275b2(1): bzhin nyid du sbyor// shes rab thabs ldan nges pa'i don phyung ba// rig pa'i thabs chen dbang skur nyid du bsgom// stong smon mtshan med rang bzhin 'od gsal ba'i// zad med bsod nams tshogs kyis brgyan
275b3(1): par 'gyur// b+h+rUM/ rang byung nyi zla pad+ma rin chen rgyas la bzhugs// rdo rje mnyam nyid thugs su chud pa yi// mnyam rdzogs chen po lhun la rol pa mdzad// bde gshegs dbyings nyid de bzhin nyid gnas
275b4(1): pa// dus bzhi rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par 'ub// thams cad 'od gsal dkyil 'khor thugs chud pa'i// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje 'chang las 'byung // spyod yul 'phrog med brjod kyis mi lang ba'i// dus
275b5(1): bzhi mnyam nyid nges pa'i don nyid nyon// thugs rje dbang gis 'gro drug dus gnas bzhugs// nga dang bdag med mnyam pa'i dbyings mkhyen pa// mnyam pa'i don grub rdo rje can gyis bya// rnam par rtog med
275b6(1): byang chub rdo rje can gyi sku// shes rab mchog gis ma lus yongs bsdus pa// bde gshegs mi gnas mnyam nyid ngang du byon// thabs chen ma 'dres rnam par sbas pa yi// dmigs med bde gshegs nyid
276a1(1): dbyings thugs chud pa// thabs dang shes rab dbyings nyid dam pa'i mchog/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi dbyings gnas mthas gtugs pa// shes rab mchog ldan gsal ba'i ngang 'chang ba// thugs rje
276a2(1): byin brlabs sna tshogs 'phro ba yi// bde gshegs ma lus thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// yid bzhin rin chen mi zad par ldan 'phro// rang rig rgyal po che yis rtogs par 'gyur// zhes nyid la nyid du ched du
276a3(1): brjod de rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las gzhal yas khang dbub pa thabs dra ba'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa btsun mo'i tshogs dang
276a4(1): bcas pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang / thugs rje las 'di dag phyung ngo // b+h+yAM bi shwa bi shud d+he/ hUM badz+ra d+h+r-ika/ oM dzI na dzI ka/ sA rat+na d+h+r-ika/ AM A ro lI ka/ hUM pradz+nyA d+h+r-ika/ mr-i d+hA tI shwa ri/ lAM dwe Sha ra ti/ mAM mo ha ra
276a5(1): ti/ pAM rA ga ra ti/ tAM badz+ra ra ti/ k+ShI hi rA dzA ya/ traM A ka sha gar+N+Na ya/ hrI ha hUM ba da ma/ dz+ri ku ru pA Na hI/ hUM lA s+ye sa ma ya s+t+waM/ traM mA l+ye sa ma ya hoHhri gI te rA go&haM/ a nr-i t+ya rA ga ya mI/ me d+hA ra Ni swA hA/ b+hI nis+sa
276a6(1): ra ma bA ya swA hA// hUM swa rA dza ya swA hA/ muM shrI a raM gA ya swA hA/ dzaHd+hA pa pra bi sha/ hUM puSh+pa a bi sha/ baM dI pa su khi ni/ hau ga na d+he tsit+taM/ hUM ya mAn+ta krita phaT/ pradz+nyAn+ta krita phaT/ hUM big+h+nAn+ta krita phaT/ hUM pad+mat+ta krita
276b1(1): phaT/ oM ma hA badz+ra d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he shwa ri dza la nI phaT/ oM ma hA rat+na d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he shwa ri dza la ni phaT/ oM ma hA pad+ma d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he shwa ri dza la ni phaT/ oM ma hA karma d+ha ra ma hA kro d+he shwa ri dza la nI phaT/ hUM hUM hUM
276b2(1): badz+ra tsit+ta hUM/ a a a badz+ra b+ha dra sa man+ta a/ oM mu ne kr-I swA hA/ oM mu ne tuM swA hA/ oM mu ne suM swA ha/ oM mu ne br-i swA hA/ oM mu ne k+Sha swA hA/ oM mu ne ye swA hA/ e h+ye hi/ b+ha ga bAn/ ma hA ka ru ni ka/ tri sh+ya ho/ sa ma
276b3(1): ya s+t+waM/ dzaHhUM baM hoHoM AHhUM swA hA/ ba ba ba ba ba/ dz+wa dza dza dz+wa dz+ra/ sa sa sa sa sa/ ma ma ma ma ma/ ya ya ya ya ya/ oM AHhUM swA hA/ oM ye shes rgyal po sku gsung thugs// yon tan phrin las rmad po che// de nyid du
276b4(1): ni mnyam sbyor ba'i// phyag rgya chen por bdag gyur cig/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya hUM/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ oM badz+ra sa ma ya ho zhes brjod pas// gsung gi dkyil 'khor 'di dag gis 'jig rten drug gi phyogs
276b5(1): bcu thams cad khyab par grags so// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las gsang sngags kyi le'u ste bcu gnyis pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das byed pa po rdo rje dang / bya ba mo rdo rje gnyis su med
276b6(1): pa'i dkyil 'khor la thim par mdzad do// de nas phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i bdag nyid chen po// ye shes dang byin bsdu ba zhes bya ba 'di sku gsung thugs rdo rje'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba las byung
277a1(1): ngo// oM shA n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba sat+ma kaH/ oM ma hA ya dad+hA shwA n+yat+tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba yat+ma koH/ oM ma hA pra \u0f7f bek+Sha r+N+Na shrA n+ya tad+ha na badz+ra swa b+hA ba yat+ma kaH/ oM ma hA sa mar+d+ha shwAn+yA tAdz+nyA na badz+ra
277a2(1): swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM ma hA kr-i t+ya a nuSh+TAn shU n+ya tA dz+nyA na badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA kA ya badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA bA ka badz+ra swa b+hA ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga
277a3(1): ta ma hA tsit+ta badz+ra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma ha a nu rA ga Na badz+ra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko&haM/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA pU dza badz+ra swa b+ha ba At+ma ko&haM/ zhes brjod pas thim par gyur to// gsal bar gyur
277a4(1): to// 'bar bar gyur to// e ma'o ngo mtshar rmad kyi chos// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang // sgra dang ming tshig kun las 'das// sna tshogs sgra rnams gsal bar 'byung // gsung gcig dkyil 'khor yan
277a5(1): lag ni// bsam gyis mi khyab kun tu khyab// sgra dang ming tshig so sor grags// thams cad gsung gi phyag rgya mchog/ rgyud mchog rgyud chen dra ba las// bde ldan gsung gi don 'byung ba'ang // thams cad pad+ma'i
277a6(1): ngadang gyur na// grol thar lam dang 'khor ba'i sgra// ji skad brjod kyang gsung mchog ste// theg pa mchog dman thams cad dang // log 'gro ma lus thams cad skad// byang chub rdo rje gsung du bsdus// bsdus
277b1(1): nyid phyogs bcur rnam par grags// sgra nyid ma chags ngang du gsungs// gsungs pa nyid na brjod du med// brjod med de nyid sna tshogs sgra// kun la grags shing so sor 'jal// dper na de bzhin sbrid sangs
277b2(1): bzhin// gsung gcig sgra yis thams cad go/ 'di ni gsung mchog rgyal po yin// theg pa mtho dman bsam yas kyang // de bzhin nyid las ma gsungs te// gdul ba'i thabs su so sor thos// ji ltar gsung
277b3(1): rab kun brjod kyang // de bzhin nyid kyis gsungs pa med// yi ge med dang rig pa'i gsung // ljags kyi rtse mor ma phyung yang // thugs rje gsung gi byin brlabs kyis// 'gro don sna tshogs so sor
277b4(1): gsal// gsal nyid gsung gi rdo rje mchog/ de bzhin gsung gis 'gro don rnams// de bzhin dang las ma g.yos kyang // dper na brag ca'i sgra bzhin no// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dkyil
277b5(1): 'khor bsdu ba dang gsang sngags kyi le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas nyid kyi phyag rgya ston pa'i snying po zhes bya ba 'di ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// oM hUM badz+ra
277b6(1): satwa hUM/ badz+ra pra b+ha na hUM/ mAM badz+ra gan d+ha hUM/ oM tsakra maN+Da la hUM AM/ lAM badz+ra gan b+ha Sha lAM/ swa rat+na pra b+ha na sAM/ oM badz+ra gan d+ha b+ha Sha AM/ oM pad+ma pra b+ha na AM/ paM badz+ra gan+d+ha pra b+ha na pAM/ hUM badz+ra ga tIk+Sh+Na pra b+ha na haM/ taM
278a1(1): badz+ra gan d+ha b+hA Sha pra b+hA na taM/ shi rat+na pra b+hA na shI hAM/ badz+ra gan d+ha pra b+hA na g+ho Sha hAM/ tAM khaD+ga pra b+hA na tAM/ tAM badz+ra gan d+ha b+hA Sha pra b+hA na tri/ hrIHpad+ma pra b+hA na hrIHbadz+ra gan d+ha bA Sha pra b+hA na hrIHha badz+ra gan+d+ha b+ha
278a2(1): ThaSha pra b+ha na haM/ a badz+ra gan d+ha bA Sha pra b+ha na AHme kA la pra b+ha na me/ hUM badz+ra ga na d+ha pra b+hA na b+hA Sha hUM/ thAM pra b+hA na maN+Da la thAM/ s+t+waM badz+ra gan d+ha bA Sha pra b+ha na s+t+waM/ hUM rat+na sraM sA d+ha b+ha dra pra b+ha na s+t+waM hrIHbadz+ra gan d+ha bA Sha
278a3(1): pra b+hA na hrIHmu ut+pa la nI la pra b+ha na mu/ A badz+ra gan d+ha b+hA Sha pra b+hA na AH/ phaT badz+ra a maHmuSh+ka ra pra b+hA na phaT phaT/ oM badz+ra gan+d+ha b+ha Sha pra b+hA na oM oM/ phaT ma hA badz+ra pra b+ha na phaT phaT/ hUM ma hA rat+na badz+ra gan d+ha b+hA
278a4(1): Sha pra b+hA na hUM hUM/ phaT hriHpad+ma muSh+ka ra pra b+hA na hrI hrIH/ oM ma hA badz+ra pad+ma badz+ra gan d+ha b+ha Sha pra b+ha na hrIHhrIH/ a karma mung+ga ra badz+ra pra b+hA na phaT phaT/ a karma badz+ra gan d+ha b+hA Sha pra b+hA na hUM// a a a zhes brjod pas phyag
278a5(1): rgya gsung gi dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal bar gyur to// 'bar bar gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las don dam pa dang / kun rdzob kyi byang chub kyi sems las phyag rgya gsung gi dkyil
278a6(1): 'khor rdzogs pa'i le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pas rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba bstan pa las/ chos thams cad nam mkha' dang yum gyi dbyings su 'dus par bstan nas ched
278b1(1): du brjod pa 'di brjod do// yang dag don gyi gsang mchog ni// bde ba thugs kyi dkyil 'khor la// nges pa'i don chen bzhi bcu gnyis// yid bzhin rin chen gsal 'bar thim// thams cad ma lus thig
278b2(1): le'i dbyings// sku lnga'i 'od zer mang po kun// thams cad yum 'gyur dbyings su thim// gsal 'bar sprin gyi bdag por 'gyur// byang chub sems kyi thigs pa ni// kun la khyab cing mi gnas pa// kha dog
278b3(1): gnas dang dbyibs ma yin// yon tan mchog gi snying po ni// rtog ge spyod yul yod ma yin// zab cing rgya chen rab spangs pa'i// gsal ldan brtan pa'i spyod yul te// gzhan nas btsal zhing brtag tu
278b4(1): med// thams cad nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de// sna tshogs 'jig rten brtan g.yo dang // rgyal ba mngon byung thams cad kun// nam mkha'i dbyings su ma gyur pa// dus bzhi phyogs bcu gang na med// dus gsum
278b5(1): bde gshegs nyid kyi mnga'// sngon gyi bde gshegs thugs chud pa'i// nam mkha'i dbyings su thams cad thim// thams cad shes rab dbyings nyid de// dbyings la dbyings ni rnam par sbyor// shes rab
278b6(1): dbyings nyid 'byor pa yis// byang chub rdo rje thig le yin// dkyil 'khor gzhal yas lhun grub dang // rgya dang bral ba'i bsam yas kyis// kun la khyab cing mi gnas pa// yon tan mchog gi gnas yin
279a1(1): te// ma bcos rgyun gyi skad cig ma// de yis ma zin gang yang med// rang gi rnam rtog ma yin pa// yang dag gshegs dang log rtog dang // gzhan yang sprul pa mang po'i tshogs// phyogs bcu ma
279a2(1): lus thams cad kun// de la gsad cing gzung du med// kha dog dbyibs dang gnas ma yin// skyes bu dam pa mchog 'dod pas// de la rtag 'grus gsal bar gyis// de yi 'bras bu mthar phyin ni// rgyu 'bras
279a3(1): med pa'i dus gcig ste// thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid du// yi ge 'bru gsum rdzogs par gyur// mi zad rgyan gyi 'khor los bsdus// tshogs chen gnyis kyang rdzogs par rol// skye 'jig med pa'i dbyings la
279a4(1): zhugs// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// mtha' yas 'jig rten bsam yas kun// rgyal ba yum gyi dbyings su thim// thams cad ma lus chos skur 'dus// ho/ chos thams cad ming gi mtshan nyid
279a5(1): do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las thams cad yum gyi dbyings su 'dus pa shin tu gsang ba'i le'u ste bco lnga pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ yan lag thams cad
279a6(1): dkyil 'khor du lhun gyis grub par byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pas// thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgya// gsang ba de nyid nges pa yi// snying po
279b1(1): phyag rgya 'da' bar dka'// mi bskyod nyi ma'i dkyil yi ge/ rin chen zla ba'i dkyil yi ge/ lnga gnyis zung du spros pa las// sbyar ba phyag rgya 'byung ba'i rgyu// oM dang mAM gnyis rtse sbyar te// 'bru brgyad bsnol nas
279b2(1): rtser sprad pa// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam sbyor ba'i// bde ba chen po sbyin pa'i rgya// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// hUM bsgreng rtse mor rdo rjer 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing // 'khril ba'i
279b3(1): tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// mAM kyi rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar
279b4(1): bkan// oM bsgreng rtse mor 'khor lo 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// lAM gyi rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru
279b5(1): lnga las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// s+t+waM rtser 'bar ba rin po che// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la
279b6(1): brtan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// mAM gyi rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lngas las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// AMHgyi rtse
280a1(1): mor pad+ma 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// pAM bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lnga las
280a2(1): su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// 'bru bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// haM gyi rtse mor ral gri 'bar// zla brtul 'bru sbas dril gsil zhing // 'khril ba'i tshul gyis chos la brtan// 'bru
280a3(1): bzhi sbas nas thugs kar bkan// tAM bsgreng rtse mor dril gsil 'bar// nyi ma 'bru lngas las su 'khril// btud de 'dzum pa'i mdangs kyis blta// ut+pal la sogs klu shing mtshan// rin chen myu gu ral gri
280a4(1): 'bar// pad+ma dkar po rdo rje 'bar// chos kyi 'khor lo rin chen te// gzugs mdzes rin chen phreng ba dang // pi bang gar mkhan mchog nyid de// me tog phreng ba spos mchod ma// mar me byug la sogs pa
280a5(1): yis// las la 'khril cing chos la brtan// dbu rnams byon nas 'dud pa'i tshul// gong gi phyag rgya chen po bzhin// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du thim// sgo bzhi phyag rgya chen po ni// nr-i mgo gdengs dang rdo rjes
280a6(1): gnon// thod phreng chen pos gnon pa dang // rdo rje rgya gram las kyis gnon// lcags kyu zhags pa sgo Ta hoH// sgo bzhir gnas pa de dag kyang // 'dud tshul 'khril ba gong ma bzhin// thub drug phyag rgya sna tshogs
280b1(1): te// mdor bsdus phyag rgya drug yin no// gseg par dang ni pi bang dang // go cha po ti rin chen sgrom// me dang chu ru rab tu bstan// yum ni gnyis med chos kyi dbyings// kun bzang mnyam bzhag ye shes
280b2(1): 'phro// yum 'gyur mnyam rdzogs pad+ma'i dkyil// gzhan yang phyag rgya sna tshogs te// yang na de bzhin gshegs nyid de// yang na rdo rje thal mo nyid// phyag rgya chen po tshogs mchog ni// thabs dang shes rab ldan
280b3(1): 'byor na// ma bskyod ma bskul thams cad kun// phyag rgya chen po'i ngang du gnas// yan lag bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis ldan// de nyid yan lag spros bdag ste// bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis sum 'phror 'bar// de ltar ldan
280b4(1): pa'i gtso mchog gis// rgyal ba rgya mchog de bzhin du// bcu gnyis drug gi 'od 'phro 'bar// de la sogs te bsam mi khyab// phyogs bcu dus bzhi bsam yas su// 'dul ba'i don rnams so sor ston// theg
280b5(1): pa mtho dman thams cad dang // phyin ci log rnams bsam yas dang // zhi khro tshogs chen thams cad la// so sor mthun byas kun tu snang // dper na gar mkhan nyid 'dra ba// lus las ma dgod sna tshogs
280b6(1): ston// mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni// 'di zhes gcig ces brjod du med// gnyis dang gsum du rnam par 'phro// bskyod dang spro ba de bzhin nyid// mdor na bskyod 'gul thams cad kun// phyag rgya chen po'i
281a1(1): ngang du gnas// gnas nyid mi gnas gnas pa'ang min// de skad dag mchog nyid kyis bshad// mthe bo mdzub mo rdo rje 'dzin// mthe bo gung mo rgyal ba 'dzin// srin lag mthe bo chags pa
281a2(1): che// mthe'u chung mthe bo legs pa mchog/ hUM hoH// mdzub mo gnyis sbyar rin chen mchog/ gung mo gnyis sbyar gzi brjid don// srin lag gnyis sbyar rgyal ba'i tog/ bzhad pa'i sgras ni mthe'u chung sprad// tr-i te
281a3(1): ru ha/ mdzub mo steng 'og chos kyi mchog/ gung mo steng 'og 'jam dpal mchog/ srin lag steng 'og 'khor lo mchog/ mthe'u chung steng 'og sgra gsung yin// hrIHb+haM Ta~M ha~M/ mdzub mo rgya gram las kyi mchog/ gung
281a4(1): mo rgya gram bsrung bar byos// srin lag rgya gram gnod sbyin mchog/ mthe'u chung rgya gram gnas par bshad// ha hUM a b+haM/ phyag rgya brda tshig chen po 'dis// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor mdzes par snang // rang
281a5(1): bzhin dkyil 'khor phun sum tshogs// glu gnyis phyag rgya ldan pa yis// sa ler gsal ba'i dkyil 'khor 'bebs// phyag rgya spros pa chen pos ni// gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam gnyis pa// dag par gsal bas
281a6(1): phyag rgya yin// yi ge so so gsal ba yis// gar du bsgyur bas mya ngan 'das// dzaHdang hoHla sogs pa yis// gar du bsgyur bas rdo rjer 'ching // gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las phyag rgya spros pa'i
281b1(1): le'u ste bcu drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos mtshon cha dam tshig ces bya ba'i glu 'di blangs so// hUM lus ngag yid gsum rdo rje ni// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes te// sku
281b2(1): gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni// rdo rje sems dpa' rang gnas pas// ye shes rdo rje gsor zhing spro// e ma'o rdo rje che mchog ni// nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba ni// cis kyang mi shigs mi phyed la// cis kyang ma
281b3(1): g.yos ma 'dres pas// bde chen mchog tu gyur pas na// kun kyang phyag rgya bzhi rgyas gdab// rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid la// rdo rje 'chang rgyal thams cad kyi// rang gi rtags su bstan pa'i phyir// mi phyed rdo/
281b4(1): rje 'chang zhes bya// hUM// ji ltar rgyal po rang gi rgyas// rgyal po gtsigs la btab pa ltar// bde chen snying la gnas pa dang // dbang chen dus la brtson pa yis// thams cad kun la de ltar 'debs// 'da'
281b5(1): dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pas// rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas// bdag nyid chen po mtshan ma'i gzugs// hUM phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin// nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro// rdo rje rdo rje drag chen
281b6(1): dang // rang nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang // 'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal po yis// phye zhing bshig dang bcom la sogs// dkrugs shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin// btsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du 'dis// thams cad
282a1(1): rdo rje nyid pas na// nam mkha'i khams kun gang ba yin// de las rdo rje gsung 'byung ba'o// oM badz+ra dza lA na lAka hUM phaT/ oM/ lus ngag yid gsum 'khor lo ni// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes
282a2(1): te// snang mdzad 'khor lo dpa' bo yin// snang mdzad 'khor lo rang gnas pas// ye shes 'khor lo gsor zhing spro// e ma'o 'khor lo che mchog gi/ nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba ni// cis kyang mi shigs mi phyed
282a3(1): pas// cis kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pas// bde chen mchog tu gyur pas na// kun kyang phyag rgya bzhi rgyas gdab// rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid las// 'khor lo 'chang rgyal thams cad kyi// rang gi rtags su
282a4(1): bstan pa'i phyir// mi phyed 'khor lo 'chang zhes bya// hUM/ ji ltar rgyal po rang gi rgyas// rgyal po'i gtsigs ni btab pa ltar// bde chen snying la gnas pa dang // dbang chen dus la brtson pa yis// thams cad
282a5(1): kun la de ltar 'debs// 'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pas// rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas// bdag nyid chen po mtshan ma'i gzugs// phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin// nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir
282a6(1): ro// oM/ 'khor lo 'khor lo drag chen dang // rang nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang // 'dul ba'i thabs kyi rgyal po yis// phye zhing gzhig dang bcom la sogs// dkrugs shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin// hUM/ btsan
282b1(1): zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du 'dis// thams cad 'khor lo nyid pas na// nam mkha'i khams kun bkang ba yin// de las 'khor lo gsung 'byung ba// oM tsakra dza lA na lArka hUM phaT// oM/ lus ngag yid gsum pad+ma
282b2(1): ni// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes te// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni// pad+ma sems dpa' dpa' bo yin// pad+ma sems dpar rang gnas pas// pad+ma dgra sta sor zhing spro// e ma'o pad+ma che mchog gi/ nyid kyi
282b3(1): mtshan du gsol ba ni// cis kyang mi shigs mi phyed la// cis kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pas// bde chen mchog tu gyur pas na// kun kyang phyag rgya bzhi rgyas btab// rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid las// pad+ma
282b4(1): 'chang rgyal thams cad kyis// rang gi rtags su bstan pa'i phyir// mi phyed pad+ma 'chang zhes bya// oM ji ltar rgyal po rang gi rgyas// rgyal po gtsigs ni btab pa ltar// bde chen snying la gnas pa dang // dbang
282b5(1): chen dus la brtson pa yis// thams cad kun la de ltar 'bebs// 'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pa// rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas// hUM/ bdag nyid chen po mtshan ma gzugs// phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags
282b6(1): pa yin// nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro// pad+ma dgra sta drag chen dang // rang nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang // 'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal po yis// phye zhing bshig dang bcom la sogs// dkrugs shing thal ba rdul
283a1(1): phran bzhin// btsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du 'dis// thams cad pad+ma nyid pas ni// nam mkha' khams kun bkang ba yin// de las pad+ma'i gsung phyung ba// oM pad+ma dza lA na lArka hUM phaT/ s+t+waM/
283a2(1): lus ngag yid gsum rin chen ni// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes te// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni// yon tan chen po dpa' bo yin// rin chen sems dpar nga gnas pas// ye shes dbyug pa gsor zhing
283a3(1): spro// e ma'o rdo rje rin chen che mchog gi/ nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba ni// cis kyang mi shigs mi phyed la// cis kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pas// bde chen mchog tu gyur pas na// kun kyang phyag rgya bzhi rgyas
283a4(1): gdab// s+t+waM/ rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid la// rin chen 'chang rgyal thams cad kyi// rang gi rtags su bstan pa'i phyir// mi phyed rin chen 'chang zhes bya// s+t+waM/ ji ltar rgyal po rang gi rgyas// rgyal po'i gtsigs
283a5(1): btab pa ltar// bde chen snying la gnas pa dang // dbang chen dus la brtson pa yis// thams cad kun la de ltar 'debs// 'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pas// rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas// bdag
283a6(1): nyid chen po mtshan ma'i gzugs// phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin// nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro// rin chen dbyug pa drag chen dang // rang nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang // 'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal po yis// phye
283b1(1): zhing bshig dang bcom la sogs// dkrugs shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin// btsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du yis// thams cad rin chen nyid pas na// nam mkha' khams kun bkang ba yin// de las rin chen
283b2(1): gsung 'byung ba// swai rat+na dz+wa lA na lAka s+t+waM phaT// hUM/ lus ngag yid gsum phrin las ni// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes te// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni// las kyi sems dpa' dpa' bo yin// las kyi sems
283b3(1): dang rang gnas pas// ye shes ral gri 'debs shing spro// e ma'o las kyi che mchog gi/ nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba ni// cis kyang mi shigs mi phyed la// cis kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pas// bde chen mchog tu
283b4(1): gyur pas na// kun kyang phyag rgya bzhi rgyas btab// haM/ rgyal ba rnams kyi thugs nyid las// ral gri 'chang rgyal thams cad kyi// rang gi rtags su bstan pa'i phyir// mi phyed ral gri 'chang zhes bya// haM/ ji ltar
283b5(1): rgyal po rang gi rgyas// rgyal po'i gtsigs ni btab pa bzhin// bde chen snying la gnas pa dang // dbang chen dus la brtson pa yis// thams cad kun la de ltar 'debs// 'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs
283b6(1): pas// rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas// bdag nyid chen po'i mtshan ma'i gzugs// phyag rgya zhes ni bsgrags pa yin// nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro// haM ral gri ral gri drag chen dang // rang nyid che ba'i
284a1(1): bdag nyid dang // 'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal po yis// phye zhing bshig dang bcom la sogs// dkrugs shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin// btsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'du 'gro 'dis// thams cad ral gri
284a2(1): nyid pas na// nam mkha' khams kun bkang ba yin// de las phrin las gsung byung ba'o// haM karma dza lA na larka hUM phaT/ mAM lus ngag yid gsum dril bu las// sku gsung thugs nyid gtum por
284a3(1): 'gyur// bskor thabs che ba'i mchog tshul du// rdo rje lan gsum gsor ba yis// lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo// dam can rnal 'byor dbang du 'gyur// rnal 'byor pho mo gang snang ba'i// thams cad gcig tu
284a4(1): 'dus par ni// yul la mngon du snang bar 'gyur// mi bskyod rdo rje thabs ldan pas// oM dang haM ni ma thal bar// lan gsum gsor chen gur dkar bsgom// lhan ne'i dkyil 'khor mchog tu 'gyur// oM dang
284a5(1): haM ni thal tsam du// kun tu gru bzhir bdag gnas te// lan gsum gsor la gang brtson pa// tshe dang skal ba 'phel bar 'gyur// longs spyod ci 'dod grub par 'gyur// de nas zla gam mdog dmar
284a6(1): sham// 'brel pa mnyam par lan gsum gyis// khros pas gsor la gang brtson pas// yid la dmigs dang las thams cad// dbang chen dkyil 'khor nyid du 'gyur// de las gtum pa'i mdog gnas
284b1(1): te// drag tu phaT ces brjod pas ni// kha dog nag por bdag gnas shing // bskal pa 'bar ba'i dbus gnas pa// khros te dgug pa nyid dag tu// rgyang ni ring du 'phangs pa na// ci 'dod las rnams 'grub
284b2(1): par nges// oM badz+ra da ha dza la ha na badz+ra pa tsa dza la badz+ra hUM phaT/ chos la brtan pa phyag bsnams pa// sbubs ni dril bu chos khams te// shes rab yum gyi tshogs su brtag/ skad ni gsung snyan bde ba mo// lce ni
284b3(1): gar mkhan mya ngan 'das// chos sku thugs kyi thugs nyid las// rab tu gsor la gang brtson pas// mAM la sogs pa'i yi ge bsgom// rdo rje 'khor lo pad+ma 'bar// mAM gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor ni// kun tu
284b4(1): dbang sgyur yid 'ong ba'i// 'dod pa bzhin du mthun pas 'grub// oM badz+ra g+haN+Da pA sha d+harma d+hA ra/ hUM hUM hUM zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la dgyes par gyur to// gsang ba'i
284b5(1): snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las sgyu 'phrul chen po thabs dang shes rab tu 'byung ba phyag mtshan gyi le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig
284b6(1): bkod pa la snyoms par zhugs nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// shin tu phra ba'i dam tshig mchog/ phyag rgya chen po'i phyag mthil du// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa de// sor ni bzhi yi tshad du bya// 'bru lnga
285a1(1): spos lnga rin chen lnga// snying po lnga dang sman lnga dang // bdud rtsi lnga yis rab mnyam la// rig pas thig ni gdab par bya// lte ba rtsibs dang ldan pa yi// rtse bzhi 'khor lo mu khyud bcas// gru chad
285a2(1): bzhi dang gru bzhi yi// bar khyams sgo khyud ldan par bya// sen zlum tsam gyi nyi zla la// tsa na 'bru tsam pad+mo gdan// yungs 'bru tsam gyi yi ge las// phyag rgya til 'bru tsam du bri// bcos bu'i ras ni sna tshogs
285a3(1): dang // rgyan phreng dung dang bro bas bskor// glu tshig bro gar rol mo yi// sprin phung tshogs kyis rab tu mchod// yum dang 'jom sems ma dang // ji ltar 'dod pa'i las bzhin mchod// dbyibs dang kha dog
285a4(1): tshan ldan pa'i// zhal du gyur pa'i me bos la// bza' btung bro ba'i tshogs rnams kyis// las bzhi mchod pa rab tu sbyin// khro bo'i dkyil 'khor de bzhin te// shin tu phra la sbyangs pa yis// bsam yas dag
285a5(1): de bzhin bya// rig pas dpag pa tsam du'o// mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po ni// sems kyi yid bzhin sprin tshogs kyis// phyogs bcu thams cad sangs rgyas zhing // mnyen 'jam reg na bde ba yi// sna tshogs
285a6(1): den po che yi gzhi// mdzes par bris shing spras pa dang // kun 'byung rin chen phung po 'bar// dbyibs legs rdzing bu bro mchog bsil// rin chen khang pa sna tshogs dang // rgyan dang dpag bsam ljon pa'i
285b1(1): tshal// glu dbyangs tshigs su bcad pa'i sgra// bla re rgyal mtshan na bza' gdugs// do shal dpung brgyan se mo do// bza' dang btung ba'i mchog rnams dang // rang la mdzes pas brgyan pa yi// lha dang lha mo
285b2(1): rdul snyed kyi// bro gar la sogs bsam yas kyis// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bkang nas// dkyil 'khor kun la rgyas par dbul// skal ldan gsal ba'i khyad par gyis// rim gyis yang na cig char
285b3(1): du// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam sbyor zhing // mchod pa'i phyag rgya chen po bsgom// gsal ldan ma'am byin brlabs la// stong gsum yungs 'brur 'jug tshul du// dbyings nas dkyil 'khor spyan drangs
285b4(1): mchod// mnyes nas 'grub pa'i dam tshig mchog/ bdag nyid chen po mched pa yis// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes// srid gsum 'gro ba ma lus la// dga' ba chen pos khyab par gyur// sgyu 'phrul
285b5(1): dra ba brtan pa yis// phyogs bcu dus bzhir gshegs pa yi// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor ma lus dang // khams gsum 'gro rnams mngon du gyur// lus ngag sems dang chos thams cad// gang na mi gnas mi
285b6(1): dmigs pa// rang bzhin mnyam pa'i chos nyid la// mig yor tshul du sbyor ba yis// nam mkha' la ni nam mkha' bsgom// goms pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po la// kun byas dbang phyug rig pas 'jug/ de nas
286a1(1): slob ma gzhug par bya// de nas rigs kyi bu mchog des// rgyal srid dang ni rang gi lus// bu dang chung ma nor gyi dbyig/ rab tu gces dang yid 'thad dbul// dbang phyug longs spyod lngas mchod
286a2(1): na// dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa yin// nye ba'i dkyil 'khor smos ci dgos// nyes pa thams cad dag par 'gyur// dad brtson brtul zhugs rab rtogs nas// phan pa'i dbang sbyin nus pa'i
286a3(1): dbang // rim pa bzhin du sbyin par bya// snying rjes chud ma zos par gzung // yang na thal mo rab bsnol nas// phyag chen po yi 'phang du ni// dkyil 'khor mdzub gang tshad du bya// mkhas pas cho ga bzhin du
286a4(1): bya// yang na sa gzhi mnyam pa la// dkyil 'khor khru gang tshad du bya// yang na lus gang tshad du ste// yang na lus ni gsum gyi tshad// phur bu srad bu tshon phye dang // gos rgyan mdzes ma yid 'ong grogs// thig
286a5(1): gdab cho ga phun sum tshogs// mkhas ldan chen pos bsgrims te bya// yang na khru ni bcu drug dang // nyi shu'am nyi shu rtsa lngar bya// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor lnga rnams bsgom// sku gsung thugs ldan gzugs kyang
286a6(1): dgod// yang na rgyang grags dpag tshad dam// nam mkha'i dbyings ni bsam yas par// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor sna tshogs bsgom// ma mthong rmongs pa ston phyir tshon// kha dog nyi shu rtsa lnga'am// lnga yi tshon
286b1(1): gyis bri bar bya// 'dul ba'i cho ga bzhin du dgye// ting 'dzin rol mo mtha' yas mchog/ yi ge'am gdan nam snying po 'am// phyag rgya'am sku gsung thugs ldan par// byin brlabs ya mtshan rmad po che// 'grub
286b2(1): 'gyur sangs rgyas kun gyi dam// sa la sogs pa phyag rgyar byas// rnam grol rim par thob par 'gyur// dag pa'i ye shes kyis byas pa// smos ci dgos te de nyid yin// phyogs dus dkyil 'khor bdag nyid
286b3(1): che// mi dmigs thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las// dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang ngo // rang snang dbyer med dkyil 'khor la// 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid mnyam sbyor ba// phyogs dus kun nas gshegs pa
286b4(1): yi// sku gsung thugs kyi ye shes ni// kun tu bzang mo mi bsnyengs yin// kun tu bzang mo rang gnas pas// ye shes dril bu gsil zhing spro// e ma'o sangs rgyas yum chen gyi// nyid kyi mtshan du gsol ba
286b5(1): ni// cis kyang mi shigs mi phyed la// cis kyang ma g.yos ma 'dres pas// bde chen yum du gyur pas na// kun kyang phyag rgya yum lngas btab// mAM/ kun tu bzang mo'i thugs nyid las// rdo rje yum chen thams
286b6(1): cad kyi// rang gi rtags su bstan pa'i phyir// mi phyed dril bu 'chang zhes bya// mAM ji ltar rgyal po'i gnas bshams te// rgyal pos gtsigs chen 'gyed pa ltar// bde chen yum du gnas pa dang // dbang chen dus
287a1(1): la brtson pa yis// thams cad kun la de ltar 'debs// 'da' dka' ji bzhin mi shigs pas// rgyal po phyag rgya mchog gi gnas// bdag nyid yum chen mtshan ma'i gzugs// phyag rgya zhes ni
287a2(1): bsgrags pa yin// nyid kyi lus ni brtan phyir ro// mAM dril bu dril bu grags snyan dang // yum nyid che ba'i bdag nyid dang // 'dul ba thabs kyi rgyal mo yis// phye zhing bshig dang bcom la sogs// dkrugs
