287a3(1): shing thal ba rdul phran bzhin// btsan zhing 'bar ba'i 'phro 'du 'dis// thams cad dril bu nyid pas na// nam mkha' khams kun bkang ba yin// de las chos sku gsung 'byung ba// mAM g+ha dza lA na lArka mAM zhes
287a4(1): brjod pas phyag rgya'i tshogs su snang bar gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las mtshon cha dam tshig phyag rgya glu'i le'u ste bcwa brgyad pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang
287a5(1): pos thabs dang / shes rab 'byung ba zhes bya ba 'di ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// de nas yid dang chos mthun par// thugs kyi phyag rgya rdo rje 'chang // shes rab dril bu chos la brtan// hUM dang mAM gyi snying po
287a6(1): 'bar// de las rdo rje rtse bcur 'bar// oM dang mAM gyi mchog tu brtag/ shes rab nyi zer zla rgyas thabs// 'bar ba'i phung pos chos la brten// de las gzung thabs gnyis kyis ni// 'bru lnga phyag rgya nyid du
287b1(1): ste// de las rdo rje phyag bsnams gsor// de las 'khor lo phyag bsnams gsor// de las nor bu phyag bsnams pa// de las pad+ma phyag bsnams 'dzin// de las ral gri phyag bsnams gcod// de nyid rdo rje
287b2(1): phyag bsnams pa// thabs chen drug tu yang dag gsor// de las rdo rje gzung thabs gnyis// oM dang mAM gyi mtshon bzhin du// rdo rje rtse bcu thabs chen po// thugs kar brtan pa'i tshul du 'bar// sangs rgyas rdo
287b3(1): rje sems dpa' yi// phyag na mi 'jigs thugs kar 'dzin// mAM las phyag rgya chen po ni// dril gsil 'bar bas sangs rgyas yum// mchod gnas chos la brten par 'dzin// thams cad kun tu phyag rgya
287b4(1): yi// thabs dang shes rab rdo rje 'chang // sku gsung thugs ni thams cad pa// yon tan phrin las kun tu rdzogs// sgyu 'phrul dra bas byang chub pa'i// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'chang du dmigs// de las rdo rje mchog
287b5(1): bsnams pa// de las mi bskyod nyi ma'i lam// sku gsung thugs kyi yon tan las// oM hUM s+t+waM gyi rtser 'dzin pa// nyid las yang dag bskyed tshul du// shes rab yum du shin tu brtags// rdo rje 'bar bas rab
287b6(1): brten pa// thabs chen yid ni sangs rgyas yab// gcig dang du ma yongs kyis med// de las 'gro don phrin las 'char// yid dang chos su rab brtags pa'i// rdo rje 'chang rgyal tshul chen las// rdo rje drag por
288a1(1): lan gsum gsor// gtum pa'i sngags brjod de bskyed pas// bsnyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rdzogs// nye bar gyur pa'i dam tshig mchog/ dpag bsam shing dang yid bzhin gyi// rin chen
288a2(1): dbyig dang 'byung ba kun// de dag rdzas yod ma yin te// rang sems bsod nams brtan pa yin// ngo mtshar cho 'phrul rmad kyi chos// gzhan nas yod 'ong ma yin te// thabs la brten pa'i shes rab nyid// de
288a3(1): lta bu yi ngang du 'byung // shes rab dbyings kyi de bzhin nyid// thabs kyi phyag rgyar gyur pa'i phyir// ye shes la ni ye shes rol// ye shes rol pa nyid gang gsog/ rgyal ba mngon byung skyob pa dang // byin brlabs
288a4(1): ston pa'ang de bzhin te// bya byed nus mthu'i gzi byin gyis// sgyu ma rdo rje btsan po mchog/ cho ga lnga ni rdzogs byas shing // yo byad lnga ni rdzogs par ldan// sngags kyi yan lag lnga rdzogs pas// ma nyams 'jug
288a5(1): la rab brtson pa// zhag ni sum cu phrag drug gam// bcu gnyis bcu bzhi bcu drug gis// dbang sgyur rigs kyi dam pa 'grub// de tshe bcu drug tshun chad kyis// sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs pa ni// ye shes thig le de
288a6(1): nyid la// ye shes thig le nyid snang ba// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog/ phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon rdzogs pa'i// zhing khams rnam dag bsam yas dang // rgya dang bral ba'i gzhal yas khang // 'khor
288b1(1): lo rgyan dang rol mo'i tshogs// dkyil 'khor ma lus bsam yas kun// mthong nas nye bar mnyes pa dang // rgya chen gsung las don byung ba// mthun pa'i ye shes rang snang ngo // gcig dang du mar bral ba
288b2(1): yi// mtha' dang dbus med de bzhin nyid// sangs rgyas nyid kyis mi gzigs te// rang byung ye shes gnas med snang // log par rtog brtags rnam dag cing // ye shes dbyings las mi gzhan phyir// thugs rje
288b3(1): chen pos 'brel pas na// 'gro drug dus gnas ma lus snang // bde ba chen mo'i dkyil 'khor ni// stangs dpyal gnyis sam yang na lnga// byas te dad ldan rab zhugs na// 'dod pa yid 'ong mnyam par
288b4(1): 'gyur// skal pa mnyam pa'i ye shes de// gnyer na nye bar mnyam pa yi// ya mtshan chen po 'byung bar nges// dad med nyams na phung bar 'gyur// zhes ched du brjod do// rdo rje bkod pa gsang ba dam tshig gi
288b5(1): le'u ste bcu dgu pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dngos grub blang ba'i thabs 'di gsungs so// ye nas mnyam nyid
288b6(1): kyil 'khor la// thabs dang shes rab ldan byas te// rang rig ye shes rgyal po yis// thams cad ma lus maN+Da la// de bzhin nyid kyi gzhal yas la// rig pa rang byung gyur pa yis// mnyam par mnyam la mi
289a1(1): gnas pa'i// chos sku'i phyag rgya chen por bsgom// 'jig rten brtan g.yo thams cad la// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor gnas mod kyi// gzung 'dzin rnam rtog zhags pa yis// rang rig bsgribs
289a2(1): shing bdag tu bcings// kun gyis yang dag rtogs bya'i phyir// de bzhin chos sku'i gzugs brnyan bstan// rtog dang mi rtog rang rig dang // yang dag thabs chen rdzogs pa'i don// rin chen sna tshogs la
289a3(1): sogs dang // 'byung ba bzhi las gyur rnams kun// thams cad byang chub mchog gi rgyu// gzugs sogs ri mor bris pa dag/ ye shes chen po rab 'byam gyis// don du mi 'gyur yong ma gsungs// de bzhin
289a4(1): ting 'dzin dkyil 'khor gyis// thams cad dbyings su bsdus nas ni// nyid kyi thugs la bstim byas te// thams cad chos sku'i phyag rgya che// dkyil 'khor rnam gsum dag byas pas// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi
289a5(1): dkyil 'khor du// rang rig ye shes 'du 'phro yis// thams cad chos sku phyag rgya che// yang dag rtogs pa'i khyad par gyis// ting 'dzin don rnams gsal bsgoms te// mA ma kI yi rgyun chags la// yang dag
289a6(1): chos sku phyag rgya che// de bzhin ting 'dzin gsal bsgoms nas// don mchog ma lus rdzogs pa'i phyir// mkha' la 'phro ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dri med chos sku phyag rgya gsal// dbyings dang de bzhin nyid med
289b1(1): par// ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur nas// kha dog dbyibs dang gzugs su bsgyur// sna tshogs phrin las rnam par rol// don gyi snying po mchog rnams kyang // byang chub phyogs rnams rab tu rdzogs// 'jig
289b2(1): rten gtso mchog rnams kyis bskor// a hoHchos sku phyag rgya de dag las// las lnga'i dkyil 'khor rab tu bsgrub// ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur na// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// drag po gtum po
289b3(1): gdul ba'i phyir// bdag nyid drag po bsgoms nas ni// chos sku nag po 'od 'bar gyis// bgegs kyi ling+ga mnan par bya// gtum po rngam po'ang brlag par 'gyur// mi mthun phyogs kyang rdul du rlog/ 'di
289b4(1): dang 'gro ba thams cad du// shin tu stobs drag che ldan 'gyur// thams cad gnyis med dbyings bsdu'i phyir// bdag nyid ha ya gri bar bsgom// dmar po'i chos sku gsal bsgoms te// mi mthun phyogs rnams
289b5(1): gdan du gdeng // ting 'dzin gsal bas byin brlabs na// thams cad ma lus dbang du bsdu// mthu chen dag kyang phyi bzhin 'brang // ci 'dod las rnams byed par 'gyur// thams cad yon tan 'phel bya'i
289b6(1): phyir// bdag nyid rgyal ba'i khyu mchog ste// gser gyi mdo 'dra phyag rgyar bsgom// gang 'phel chos sku gdan du gzhag/ de ltar dag pas byin brlabs na// yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// tshe dang
290a1(1): longs spyod 'phel ba dang // ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// gtum khro ma lus zhi bya'i phyir// dkar zhing 'tsher ba'i chos sku bsgom// gang zhig
290a2(1): gtum khro zhi ba'i gdan// de bzhin ting 'dzin byin brlabs na// gtum po rngam po'ang zhi bar 'gyur// gzhan yang ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin// zhi zhing dul ba nyid du 'gyur// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes
290a3(1): kyis// rnam bzhi dkyil 'khor dbyings su bsdus// bya byed med par dkyil 'khor spyod// lhun grub dkyil 'khor ye nas rdzogs// a hoH/ chos sku phyag rgya chen po ni// dngos grub gang 'dod sbyin par nges// nye
290a4(1): ba'i lha ni gang bsgrub pa// phyag rgya'i snying po bris bcug na// gang bsgoms the tshom med par 'grub// de ni rgyal ba kun dang mnyam// the tshom med de nges 'grub 'gyur// 'jig rten pa yi lha sgrub na// lha yi snying
290a5(1): po gang yang rung // bris te dkyil 'khor nang bcug na// lha de nye bar 'grub par 'gyur// chos nyid rten cing 'brel bris na// chos kyi don rnams rtogs 'gyur te// rang dag spyi yi don rtogs nas// skye rga na
290a6(1): 'chi med par rtogs// phyag rgya chen po de dag la// nyon mongs las rnams sbyong byed pa'i// snying po ma nor don bris na// ngan song sdug bsngal med par 'gyur// gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas
290b1(1): dang // dpag tshad med pa'i phyag rgya che// sku gsung thugs ni rgyun mi chad// zhing khams bye ba rdul dang mnyam// a ho// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// sgyu 'phrul dra ba las lhag pa'i gzugs brnyan gyis dngos
290b2(1): grub len pa'i thabs te mchod rten gdab pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po rgyal po dbang sbyin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa
290b3(1): 'di brjod do// shes rab thabs kyi phyag rgya las// bde ba'i 'bru tshogs gsal ba'i rgyun// rdo rje lam las pad+mor dkyil// rtse nas bstim zhing dkyil 'khor sbyar// nyan byed 'khor lo'i gzhal yas
290b4(1): su// gsal ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid// traM gi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las// rin chen dkyil 'khor gsal spro bstim// traM gsang ba'i gsang chen gsang mchog dang // gsang ba kun la mnyan par bya// gsang ba'i
290b5(1): don nyid rtogs pa las// gzhan du smra bar bya ba min// gsal ba'i 'khor lo gzhal yas su// gsal ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid// yi ge phreng ba'i tshogs mchog las// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor gsal sgro thim// oM
290b6(1): dus gsum rgyal ba'i sras chen po// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje zung // rgyal ba thams cad mnyes mchod la// rgyal ba kun dang mnyam par sbyor// lag pa'i 'khor lo gzhal yas su// gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo
291a1(1): nyid// hUM gi phyag rgya'i tshogs mchog las// las kyi dkyil 'khor gsal spro thim// oM khyod ni rdo rje las yin pas// las rnams ma lus kun byos shig/ pho nya 'du 'phro mang po kun// khyod kyi
291a2(1): dgos pa byed pa yin// smra byed 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// gsang ba'i thig le ngo bo nyid// hriHyi phyag rgya tshogs mchog las// chos kyi 'khor lo gsal sgro thim// oM chos kyi bdud rtsi bla med kyis// dad ldan
291a3(1): skyes bu ngoms par byos// rab 'bring za ma'i blo can la// mthun par gsang bsgrags gzhan du min// bskyod chen 'khor lo'i gzhal yas su// gsal ba'i thig le'i ngo bo nyid// hUM oM sraM aM haM rnams
291a4(1): las// dkyil 'khor lnga dang khro phreng bsgom// phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad kyis// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje che// dkyil 'khor kun gyi byed pa po// dkyil 'khor kun gyi sbyin pa spyod// slob dpon mnyes
291a5(1): par ma byas shing // dbang rnams thob par ma byas par// nyan pa la sogs rtsom pa rnams// 'bras bu med cing brlag par 'gyur// dbu rgyan cod pa na phreng ba dang // go cha rgyal mtshan phyag rgya dang // gdugs
291a6(1): dang bum pa bza' btung dang // snying po lnga yis dbang bskur na// dus 'di phan chad rgyal ba'i sras// ngan song thams cad med pa dang // gnyen por gyur pa'i rtsal 'chang bas// tshe ring bde ba phun sum
291b1(1): tshogs// kun tu bzang po la sogs mtshan// mtho ris thar pa'i dbang por 'gyur// lus dang phung por bcas pa'i sa// rig 'dzin sa la gnas pa yin// rig 'dzin sa la gnas pa'i sa// bla med kun tu
291b2(1): bzang por 'gyur// yum dang sgeg mo la sogs la// de nyid byin gyis rlom par 'gyur// pho nya 'du 'phro mang po rnams// sangs rgyas bka' las mi 'da' zhing // de yi dgos pa byed pa dang // sgro dang skur pa la
291b3(1): sogs pa// de ni myur du brlag par 'gyur// tshe ring bde ba phun sum tshogs// mtho ris thar pa'i bdag por 'gyur// zhes ched du brjod do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dbang sbyin pa'i le'u
291b4(1): ste nyi shu gcig pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po mnyam pa nyid la bzhugs nas lhag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis dngos grub myur bar len pa'i thabs 'di gsungs so// de bzhin nyid dang
291b5(1): mnyam sbyor phyir// dam pa'i don gyis bsgom par bya// byang chub phyogs la gzung bar gnas// mchog tu bde ba'i zhing gnas pas// mnyam rdzogs chen po lhun bsgom zhing // byang chub sems su brtan par
291b6(1): gzung // bya ba med las bya byed bya// mi gnas gnas la gnas par bsgom// b+ha ga'i dkyil du ling+ga a// shin tu 'tsher zhing gsal bsgoms nas// 'od 'phro 'bar bas thams cad khyab// dus gsum ngan
292a1(1): song gnas bsregs nas// b+ha ga'i dkyil du 'od 'phro thim// thim 'gyur dbyings nas 'od 'phro 'bar// a ma las ni zla nyi 'bar// phyogs bcur 'joms pa'i mun sel zhing // nyon mongs
292a2(1): sdug bsngal bsil ba'i sman// thugs rje'i byin brlabs bsam mi khyab// rol pa'i phyag rgya bsam mi khyab// mkha' la 'ja' tshon sprin mang yang // nam mkha'i dbyings su thams cad bsdus// thams cad mkhyen
292a3(1): nyid bsam yas kyang // chos kyi dbyings su thams cad 'dus// thams cad yi ge hUM du gyur// hUM nyid gsang ba'i thugs rje'i dkyil// 'od zer 'phros pas 'bru gsum ste// yang na 'od zer 'bru lnga yi// lnga pa'i
292a4(1): don spros bzhi bcu lnga'i// gzhan yang dkyil 'khor bsam yas mchog/ ma bcos ngang gis gnas pa la// ye shes lhag pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// sen zlum zla ba gang ba yi// thugs kyi dkyil du gnas par
292a5(1): bya// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor gang ba yi// gzhal yas 'od zer 'bar ba'i khang // pad+ma'i gdan dang rin po che// de dkyil yi ge hUM gnas pa// shin tu phra zhing yungs 'bru 'bar// gnas gcig dang ni gnas
292a6(1): gsum dang // gnas lnga dag tu rab tu bsgom// shes rab spyan la 'dris pa dang // nr-i yi mig gis bltar yod par// shin tu phra zhing gsal bar bsgom// shin tu blo gsal 'dris gyur nas// phyogs bcu'i stong
292b1(1): khams rdul snyed du// thugs rje'i byin brlabs bsam yas spro// spros kyang hUM las nyams pa med// bsdus kyang phyogs bcu bri ba med// spro med bsdu med de bzhin las// yi ge muM du thim par gyur// thim 'gyur
292b2(1): dbyings nas phyag rgya 'bar// shin tu gsal zhing 'dres pa dang // phyag rgya'i sku nyid gsal bar bsgom// sku de tshon gang 'od 'bar nas// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa'i rgya// 'od 'phro 'bar zhing don byed
292b3(1): bsgoms// yang na phyag rgya chen po ste// bdag nyid zhal gcig phyag gnyis bsam// zhal gsum phyag drug rtag tu bsgom// gzhal yas khang dang gdan khri rnams// phra ba'i tshul de snga ma bzhin// mtshan dang dpe
292b4(1): byad thams cad ldan// dbu rgyan yi ge lnga dang ldan// rdo rje 'khor lo ral gri 'bar// rin chen pad+ma dril bu 'bar// phyag rgya chen po de dag las// phyogs bcu ma lus gzhal yas khang // nyi zla gza' skar dkyil
292b5(1): 'khor gdan dang rgyan// bde gshegs dkyil 'khor ma lus bsgom// thugs rje byin brlabs 'gro don mdzad// zhi ba phyogs gcig shes bya spro// sa bcu mnyam par sbyong byed cing // bde gshegs 'khor yang
292b6(1): dag par byed// de ltar sgrub pa'i rigs mchog de// 'bras bu mngon du ma smin kyang // sdug bsngal thams cad yang mi 'byung // lha mi mtshan rdzogs yongs su 'grub// theg pa dman par yong mi skye// bde
293a1(1): gshegs 'byung dang skol mi 'gyur// byang chub gzungs la zhugs pa yin// zhes nyid la nyid gsungs so// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las rdo rje sems
293a2(1): dpa' sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i rgyal po sbyar ba zhes bya ba la snyoms par bzhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// rgyu
293a3(1): gcig dang ni yig 'bru tshul// byin gyi brlabs dang mngon sum par// rab tu rtogs pa rnam bzhi yis// thams cad mngon rdzogs rgyal po che// yan lag dbang po rnam shes kun// rnam smin oM du shes par
293a4(1): bya// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom// yang na khros pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// gzugs sgra dri ro reg la sogs// rnam smin muM du shes par bya// yum gyi dkyil 'khor nyid du bsgom// yang na khro mo'i
293a5(1): dkyil 'khor bsgom// gos rgyan bza' btung glu dang tshig/ bro gar tshogs kyi sprin phung la// hUM du shes pas rab spyad na// ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba yi// dkyil 'khor ma lus mnyes par 'gyur// lha mo klu mo
293a6(1): rigs ngan mo// dbye ba'am yang na mi dbye bar// bsnyen pa dang ni nye bsnyen pa'i// sgrub pa dang ni sgrub chen po// yum gyi pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor du// bde ba'i thugs kyi dkyil 'khor spro// sangs rgyas sprin tshogs
293b1(1): ma lus la// dgyes mnyam mchog gi sbyin pas bstim// grub pa'i nyi zla snying po de// 'gro drug dus gnas de dag nyid// mchod pa chen por mnyes sbyar zhing // dkyil 'khor rdo rje rtse yis blang // mkha' 'gro/
293b2(1): gsal 'bar tshe la sogs// yid bzhin sprin gyi bdag por 'gyur// zhing 'gyur mchog dang mchog phran rnams// nyi zla'i dkyil du mkhas pas gzhag/ nga rgyal lag gis 'du byed bsgom// hUM du gyur pas rnam
293b3(1): par dag/ dbyings su thim nas phyag rgyar 'bar// skur 'gyur 'od zer 'phro bas brjid// gtsug tor rnam par rgyal ba bsgom// ngo mtshar ngan 'gro thar pa'i thabs// ye nas skye med de bzhin nyid// sgyu ma snang
293b4(1): ba mig yor tshul// sbyor sgrol bya ba kun byas kyang // rdul cha tsam yang byas pa med// snod bcud rgyud rnams dag rtogs shing // mnyam nyid lhag pa'i mnyam nyid kyis// dkyil 'khor kun tu bzang po'i
293b5(1): zhing // byed spyod tshogs chen gnyis gyur nas// yan lag ma nyams yo byad ldan// cho ga rdzogs par shes pa yi// rnal 'byor tshogs pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// nges par legs pa'i dgos pa 'grub// lnga zhing lnga
293b6(1): dang sbyor ba yi// tshom bu lnga yi lha bkod la// khro bo bcu dang khro mo bcu// 'khor lo'i tshul du rnam par bsgom// de bzhin gshegs dang rdo rje'i rigs// pad+ma'i rigs dang sku gsung thugs// khro bo'i tshogs dang
294a1(1): ldan pa yi// tshom bu gsum gyi lha rnams bsgom// rigs kyi rigs te rigs kyi gtso// thugs kyi thugs te thugs kyi mchog/ khro bo'i tshogs dang ldan pa yi// tshom bu gcig gi lha rnams
294a2(1): bsgom// khro bo khro mo tshogs chen dang // pho nya phyag brnyan bka' nyan tshogs// ci bgyi la sogs pa rnams kyis// dngos grub las rnams rdzogs par byed// rnal 'byor sngags 'chang dngos grub na// mnyam
294a3(1): rdzogs lhun grub dang gnas shing // spyod pa ci la'ang thogs med pa'i// thams cad ye nas dbyer med pa'i// rdo rje'i rigs su thams cad dkyil// 'od 'phro 'bar ba rab tu bsgom// chags med tshul gyis
294a4(1): bstim par bya// gnyis med gyur nas phyag rgya che// yang na sku gsung thugs nyid de// thams cad ma lus sku gsung thugs// ting 'dzin gsal bar 'od zer 'phro// gnyis med dbyings kyi ngang du thim// rig
294a5(1): 'dzin dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur// dkyil 'khor ma lus 'bar ba 'grub// nyon mongs sdug bsngal sel bar byed// rdo rje rigs su bskyed pa'i gnas// sngags 'chang dngos grub yang dag ni// thabs dang
294a6(1): shes rab thams cad kyis// dkyil 'khor lnga dang khro phreng bsgom// chags pa med pa'i tshul gyis ni// 'od zer rnam pa mang po spro// gnyis su med par bstim par bya// dngos grub mchog gi snying po 'grub// rnal
294b1(1): 'byor thabs dang shes rab kyis// de bzhin gshegs dang yum du bsgom// sems dpa' sems ma nyid du bsgom// so so sngags dang phyag rgya dang // ting 'dzin yang dag so sor gsal// gnas dang longs spyod
294b2(1): ci bde dang // ma nyams blo ni rab ldan pas// dang po dam mnos bzhin du bya// le lo sgyid snyom med pa yis// the tshom med par bsgrub byas na// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje gsang
294b3(1): mchog dam pa thob// sgrub pa'i zhag dang tshes grangs ni// rgyud las smos pa bzhin du bya// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// zhes de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid ched du brjod pa 'di brjod
294b4(1): do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor gyi le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa chen po rol mo'i sprin rnam par spros te/ rgyan bkod pa'i
294b5(1): ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// sgyu 'phrul dra bas mngon rdzogs pa'i// dkyil 'khor brten pa'i ting nge 'dzin// bro ra phyag rgya'i 'du 'phro yis// 'dzul lam nam mkhar
294b6(1): 'gro bar 'gyur// gla tshig sgra yi phyag rgya yis// chos kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rgyan dang bgo ba'i phyag rgya yis// 'bar ba'i rgyal po thogs med 'grub// bza' dang btung ba'i phyag rgyas ni// yid bzhin
295a1(1): sku dang bdud rtsir 'grub// A li ka la'i phyag rgya yis// sku gsung mchog gi thugs ldan pas// thams cad thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// shes 'jug mtshan nyid 'byor pa'i gzungs// 'bras bu
295a2(1): smin byed rgyu dang rkyen// nus mthu can du gang gyur pa// rig 'dzin rgyal ba'i zhing du grags// mi dang lha dang tshangs pa yi// skye ba rnam dag 'dzin mod kyi// khyad par sa la gnas gyur yin// pha rol phyin pa kun
295a3(1): tu rdzogs// thabs dang shes rab mchog gi mchog gyur pa'i// sa yi khyad par bcu dang gsum// rgyu 'bras khyad par lhun gyis rdzogs// mkha' dbying dang ba'i dbyings nyi zla// ye shes rgyal po stangs dpyal
295a4(1): sgom// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad kun// ma lus par ni bsgoms par 'gyur// dus bzhi phyogs bcu gang nas kyang // rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnyed mi 'gyur// sems nyid rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
295a5(1): te// sangs rgyas gzhan du ma tshol cig/ dkyil 'khor kun tu rab sbyor bas// dkyil 'khor thams cad grub par 'gyur// cho ga lhag gam ma tshang na// skyon nyid dag ste nyes pa med ces ched du brjod pas rol
295a6(1): mo'i sprin gyis mnyes par gyur to// rol mo'i sprin gyis mnyes par gyur te// sku gsung thugs dang yon tan phrin las rdo rje las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung ngo // a hoH// ma mthong rmongs la chags pa
295b1(1): yis// chos rnams ming du btags pa tsam// 'gro drug dus gnas ming tshogs khyad par rab snang ba'i// zab chen spyod yul log par rtogs btags ming tsam pa// A li kA li la sogs 'dod pa'i snying po
295b2(1): nyid// phyag rgya glu tshig sku gsung thugs// thugs kyi thugs chen yon tan rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni// nyid de mnyam pa'i thugs su rab tu gsal// mnyam nyid khyab pa'i stangs dpyal yon tan mchog ste sngags
295b3(1): kyi phrin las rdzogs// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las tshogs sgrub pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bzhi pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa phyogs bcu dus bzhi'i sku
295b4(1): gsung thugs rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas dgyes pa chen pos chos thams cad ye nas rdzogs pa chen por lhun gyis grub pa'i dam tshig shin tu gsang ba'i snying po'i sprin bkod pa'i ting
295b5(1): nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// ma rtogs pa dang log par rtogs// phyogs rtogs yang dag nyid ma rtogs// 'dul ba dgongs pa gsang ba dang // rang bzhin gsang ba'i
295b6(1): don rnams ni// yi ge sgro btags ming tshogs la// brten pa'i tshig gis rab mtshon te// khong nas gab sbas don 'byin pa// ston pa rdo rje thugs la gnas// dkyil 'khor ldan pa'i dkyil 'khor gyis// dkyil
296a1(1): 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor bsgom// dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor las byung ba// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor dkyil 'khor mchog/ gsang ba'i thig le dkyil 'khor dbyings// sku gsung thugs rig
296a2(1): kun mnga' ba'i// bder gshegs kun gyi snying po rdzogs// 'byung ba shes rab rigs kyi yum// chen po rigs kyi de bzhin te// byang chub sems ni rdo rje tshogs// dbang po yul dus rig pa'i rnams// kun tu
296a3(1): bzang po'i dkyil 'khor la// bdag nyid chen po lhag pa yi// thugs kyi ye shes lngas lta zhing // snying po thig le mnyam sbyor bas// bde ba'i ye shes rol mo yis// ye shes dgyes la mnyes par 'bul// zag
296a4(1): pa med pa'i bsod nams kyis// ye shes sgyu ma rang snang ba// rol mo'i dkyil 'khor mtha' yas mchog/ gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings// de ni sangs rgyas kun gyi dngos// phyogs bcu dus bzhi mngon
296a5(1): rdzogs pa'i// sku gsung yon tan phrin las thugs// ma lus bdag nyid zhal mthong ba// dbang sgyur mchog nyid dam pa yin// dkyil 'khor la gnas dkyil 'khor nyid// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor lhun gyis
296a6(1): grub// rgyun du dkyil 'khor ma lus thogs// rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor mnyam sbyor las// thugs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs kyis 'byung // phyogs dus dkyil 'khor 'dul ba'i mgon// sgyu ma'i dkyil 'khor
296b1(1): sgrol ba yis// bya byed med par dkyil 'khor spyod// ye shes rdzogs pa'i dkyil 'khor la// thos bsam bsgom pa'i mnyam sbyor gyis// rang byung kun nas lhun gyis grub// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad
296b2(1): kyis// 'da' bar mi mdzad dam tshig mchog/ gang zhig 'di la mos gyur pa// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor thams cad kyis// phyogs dus kun nas thams cad du// dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yis// nye ba'i
296b3(1): sras su dgongs par 'gyur// bskal pa zhing gi rdul snyed du// shin tu sbyangs la rab gnas shing // dkyil 'khor ma lus bsnyen pa yi// 'bras bu gsang chen 'di yin te// 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu
296b4(1): na// 'das dang da ltar byung ba yi// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus pas// brnyes pas sku lnga lhun gyis rdzogs// 'byung dang ma 'ongs thams cad kun// 'di yis lhun gyis grub par 'gyur// 'di ni gsang chen

296b6(1): la rab sbyangs pa'i// shes rab mig ldan rnams kyis gzung // snod ldan ngang tshul bzang la brtan// lus dang longs spyod gtong la sbyin// gzhan du nam yang sbyin mi bya// rmongs la 'phyar bas gal te

298b1(1): nges dus 'di dag/ snga phyi med par mnyam yin par// nges pa med par yang dag gsungs// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// rang dang spyi ru bstan pa dang // ji snyed brtan g.yo la sogs pa// sgyu ma mig
298b2(1): yor tshul yin te// skyes bu blo rtsa la rab ldan pas// de la rtag tu mnyam sbyor zhing // sems can kun gyi zhing gyur pa// de dag gnyis med dbyings su sbyor// thams cad thabs kyi mtshan nyid de// thabs
298b3(1): la thabs ni rnam par sbyor// thabs dang thabs las byung ba yi// de ni byang chub rdo rje mchog/ ji snyed brjod pa'i kha brgyud kyang // yang dag don gyi snying po ni// gang nas btsal kyang mi rnyed de// rang rig sgrib
298b4(1): med dag pa yin// de la rtag 'grus goms pa ni// bsnyen pa'i dam pa de yin te// de ni ma nor lam yin par// a yis b+ho d+hi rab tu bsdus// de bzhin nyid kyi dbyings nyid ni// gcig gam 'di zhes brjod du

299a1(1): ba kun la rang rig gnas// bya ba med la byas pa med// zad pa'i dus med yid bzhin gter// bum pa bzang dang yid bzhin mdzod// za ma tog dang yid bzhin rgyal// gzhan nas yod 'ong ma

299b1(1): dang yi dwags ltogs pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa dang / 'dod pa'i dngos po rnams yid du mi 'ong ba dang / gdug cing rtsub pa'i dngos po sna tshogs su 'gyur ba dang / yod med par yang 'gyur zhing

300a1(1): sngon gyi rten pa'i stobs dang thams cad mkhyen pas gzigs nas thugs rjes 'dul bar gyur te thams cad kyis mtshan nyid bstan pa'i glu 'di blangs so// e ma'o 'gro ba yongs ni bder

300a3(1): 'joms// kun 'byung bde ba rdo rje sku mchog ste// rdzogs ldan mdzad pa'i phrin las bsam yas pas// thugs rje chen po'i dbang gis bdud rnams 'joms// sku mdog sna tshogs thabs mkhas bsam
300a4(1): yas la// rol pa'i rtsed mor 'gro ba'i don mdzad cing // byang chub sems kyis lam la gnas par mdzad// 'gro ba kun las bde ba gcig pu pa// a hoHdgyes pa'i mnyes pa nyid la gnas par
300a5(1): mdzad// byin brlabs kun gyis bde ba nyid la snang // zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la kun las rnam par rgyal ba nyid du mkhyen nas mnyes par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa che ba'i rdo/

300b3(1): d+ha dz+wa la na maN+Da la phaT phaT phaT ha la ha la ha la hUM zhes brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa thams cad khyab par khro bo'i dkyil 'khor gyi tshogs stong gsum gyi 'jig rten tsam phyogs bcu'i

302b6(1): sme sha can gyi tshogs dang / ma mo'i tshogs rnams rang gi lag cha dang ngo mtshar dang chas nas 'thon to// 'thon nas kyang 'bar ba chen po 'khor lo'i mtshan shar phyogs nas 'khor bar 'jigs pa'i gzugs dang
303a1(1): rang gi lag chas chas nas 'khod do// de nas shin tu dgyes nas he zhes brjod pas seng gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / stag gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / wa gdong chen mo'i tshogs dang / khyi gdong
