327b1(1): nyid du bsgom// gar mkhan las kyi byin bsdu ba// gzugs ston dbab par bya ba ni// rigs dang mthun pa'i gzugs brnyan la// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan// 'bru lngas byin brlabs ma nyid sbyin// de
327b2(1): nyid pad+ma'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// de nyid goms las gsang mtshan pa// ma yi tshogs kyi lha rnams bsgom// de nyid haM gyi lha rnams te// bdag med mtha' bral mi dmigs las// rang gi ngang tshul de bzung
327b3(1): nas// sangs rgyas las rnams tsa na ka/ shes rab yum dang ldan par bsgom// de las rdo rjer byin brlabs te// pad+ma gsang nas 'dzul thabs yin// sbubs su zhugs la de lus dgang // las kyi tshogs kyis
327b4(1): khengs pa dang // so so'i snying pos ming nas dgug/ de goms blo bde gsal sgro thim// las kyi lha rnams hUM du bsgom// snod gnas gar mkhan khengs 'gyur bar// yum gyi tshogs kyang gsal bar
327b5(1): gnas// phyag rgya snying po gzugs la sogs// rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsgom// brtan pa hUM gyi 'phro 'du ltar// rnam shes byin brlabs dang du brtags// gzhi rtsa med pa'i sems nyid las// sangs rgyas
327b6(1): las kyi sprin tshogs bsgom// phyag rgya gsal ba nye bsnyen pa// 'phro 'du rigs dang mthun par ni// bsgoms nas bzlas dang mngon sum na// sgo ma bzhi yi phyag rgya bcing // rjes su chags pa'i phyag rgya
328a1(1): bzhis// rigs dang mthun pa nyid du bsgom// dkyil 'khor bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi/ lha rnams mngon du snang ba dang // sgo bsgom mang po dang // dus bzhi'i lha mo mchog dbab dang // lha dang klu
328a2(1): yi tshogs bcas las// mngon du smra bar bya bar mthun// rgyal srid dang ni 'khor 'phrog dang // bsdu dang dbang du bya ba dang / gsad dang bskrad pa'i tshogs bcas dang // bdag 'gro myur du phyin pa dang // nor
328a3(1): 'dod pa dang ci bya ba// ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur// dus med par ni mchod dang phrad// ces brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad byin bsdu ba'i mchod pa chen por gyur to// gsang
328a4(1): ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las byin bsdu ba dang dam tshig dbab pa'i sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i thugs rje zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu gsum pa'o// // de nas dgyes pa chen pos longs spyod chen po rdo rje snying
328a5(1): po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas sgyu 'phrul chen po'i dam tshig mchod pa'i longs spyod ces bya ba 'di de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje sgyu 'phrul dra ba las phyung
328a6(1): ngongo// rab 'bring tha ma'i blo rnams kyis// nges par bsgom par bya ba ni// rgyal po'i sa 'dzin mchog 'dod pas// gzugs su bri'am rten bcas la// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan// goms par dzaHnyid mdog
328b1(1): dmar bsgom// de goms gsang nas khong bsdus te// rang lus mdog dmar ngang tshul 'dzin// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan// 'bru lngas byin brlabs baM du brtags// de goms gar gyi dkyil 'khor
328b2(1): bsgom// dzaHzhes rgya bcings drang bya zhing // goms par gsang nas zhugs tshul du// lam nas ngag gi dbang por bsdu// oM las sangs rgyas tsa na ka/ snod gnas dkyil 'khor khengs par bsgom// ming dang
328b3(1): snying po goms pas dgug/ mngon sum gsal bar gyur pa na// lcags kyu la sogs mtshan pa yi// rjes su chags pa'i mchod pas bsham// yid la goms pa gsal ba na// gang la bya ba dbang du 'gyur// blo na
328b4(1): po'i sa 'dzin mchod pas bsham// yid la goms pa gsal ba na// gang la bya ba kha dang snying ga mtshan// goms par dzaHnyid mdog dmar bsgom// de goms gsang gnas khong bsdus te// rang lus mdog
328b5(1): dmar ngang tshul 'dzin// spyi gtsug kha dang snying ga mtshan// 'bru lngas byin brlabs baM du brtags// de goms gar gyi dkyil 'khor bsgom// dzaHzhes rgya bcings drang bya zhing // goms par gsang gnas zhugs
328b6(1): tshul du// lam nas ngag gi mchog tu bsdu// AMHnas sangs rgyas tsa na ka/ snod gnas dkyil 'khor khengs par bsgom// ming dang snying po goms par dgug/ mngon sum gsal bar gyur pa na// lcags kyu la
329a1(1): sogs mtshan pa yi// rjes su chags pa'i mchod par bsham// de la las su stsal ba na// gang la bya ba dbang du 'gyur// lha mo klu mo rigs ngan mo// yud tsam rtag par 'dod sgrub rnams// ting
329a2(1): 'dzin 'di yis byed par 'gyur// dbang phyug lha chen lha dbang po// rgyal chen phyogs skyong mang po la// chung ma bu mo la sogs mtshan// 'dod spyod dbang bar blo 'chang rnams// ting 'dzin 'di yis byed par
329a3(1): 'gyur// de yi dgos pa thams cad pa// ma lus kun rdzogs 'grub par 'gyur// ces brjod pas 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad rab tu g.yos kun tu gsal bar gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i
329a4(1): longs spyod chen po kun tu snang bar gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bdag nyid gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las sgyu 'phrul chen po dam tshig gi mchod
329a5(1): pa'i longs spyod ces bya ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu bzhi pa'o// // de nas thub pa chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rgyal po chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das nyid du snang
329a6(1): bar gyur to// gdug pa'i las klu'i tshogs 'dul bar gyur nas sgrub pa chen po la mos pa'i ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// klu'i tshogs rigs gnyis pa dang // rigs gsum pa dang // rigs tha dad pa
329b1(1): dang // phyogs gnyis pa las 'khor du byas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas khengs pa'i gnas su nyid kyi bsnyen pa che chung la ma gtogs pa yid la dga' ba ci byas kyang mi 'grub cing bar chad byed par 'gyur ba'i
329b2(1): phyir gegs bsal ba lnga pa zhes bya ba 'di 'thon par gyur pa 'di ched du gsungs so// sgrub la 'dug pa mi gnas dang // sa gzhi bdag tu dbang ba dang // sgrub pa'i rdzas rnams ci yod pa// gdug pa'i sbrul
329b3(1): rnams bsal ba dang // 'khor du gtogs pa mang nyung la// gdug pas zin par mi 'gyur zhing // ljon pa lcug phran la sogs la// gdug pas gnas par mi 'gyur phyir// lnga pa zhes ni rab tu
329b4(1): bsngags// bdag gis gdug par mchod pa'i phyir// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i ting 'dzin las// bdag nyid gdug pa'i mthing gnag mdog/ lag na zhags pa ut+pal 'dzin// mgo la gdengs ka sbrul chen bcu// nyi
329b5(1): shu brgya'am stong dang khri// bsam yas dag gi sbrul chen po// kha dog nag po lce gsum 'bar// gdug pa klu yi tshogs mangs pas// 'khor mang 'jigs brjod spyi bung bas// mchog tu phyag rgya 'di bca'
329b6(1): bya// mi bskyod rin chen yig 'bru rnams// phral te go ran byas pa na// gdug pa sbrul gyis 'og tu gding // nA ga pu kal nA ga phaT ces brjod// 'di la goms par gang brtsom pas// nga yi cha lugs 'di
330a1(1): bzung na// me lce'i tshogs la phung po bzhin// rgyal po chen po'i rgyal chen por// kun la snang bar gsal gyur nas// rang dbang med par 'bros pa dang // de la bran bzhin byed par 'gyur// sa
330a2(1): la bdag tu bya ba ni// thog mar sa gzhi rab mnyam ste// oM dang muM gyi tshogs kyis dgang // rin chen pho brang dkyil 'khor las// 'jug pa'i lha tshogs dkyil 'khor bsgom// de la gshog pa rab brkyang
330a3(1): ste// rdo rje thal mo drag tu rdab// oM badz+ra kro d+ha du na mu ne du nA gats+tsha/ de nas yig 'bru shin tu gshig/ de nas yig 'bru tha ma bsgreng // de nas yig 'bru 'phral bskyed pa// nga yi cha lugs 'di bzung ste// sa gzhi
330a4(1): mnyam pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// de la shin tu dngangs 'gyur te// phyogs bcu kun tu 'bros par 'gyur// de la bran bzhin byed par 'gyur// 'khor du gtogs pa nga yi 'khor// 'khor mang ji snyed mchog
330a5(1): byed pa// gdug pa mang pos gnod bsgrub phyir// rdzas la mes ni rab sbar nas// nga yi snying pos brjod nas 'byung // de la yig 'bru drug brjod na// de la gnod par mi nus shing // gdug pas mchod cing
330a6(1): bkur bar 'gyur// de yi nad rnams sos par 'gyur// mngon sum snang ba'i gzugs brnyan dang // mchog dang tha ma 'bring rnams la// gdug pa'i tshogs kyis zhen pa ni// snying gar aM gyi 'bru rnams te// kha
330b1(1): dog dmar po 'bar ba'i nang // gzugs su snang ba kun bzhun te// thub pa'i ngang tshul de bsgoms nas// rin chen yig 'bru yi ge bsam// de la rab tu 'jigs par brkyang // yi ge dang po tha ma mig/ aM gyi
330b2(1): tshogs su 'bar ba gzhan// mi bskyod nyid mas be con 'chang // thod pa'i dbyig par chas nas ni// lce la sngags ni dran pa yis// rgyal ba kun gyis dbang bskur zhing // gdug pa'i klu rnams 'dul 'gyur
330b3(1): te// phyogs bcu kun tu 'bros par 'gyur// de la mchod dang bran du 'gyur// oM mu ne pad+ma sa ma yo gi hUM hUM dza dza/ 'di la goms par gang brtson pas// nga yi cha lugs 'di bzung nas// bkur gnas mchod pa
330b4(1): byed pa dang // sgrub pa thams cad myur bar 'gyur// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las thub pa chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis klu'i tshogs kyi gdug pa'i las 'dul ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu lnga
330b5(1): pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dpal kun tu bzang pos 'byung po'i tshogs zil gyis gnon pa zhes bya ba 'di'i ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor las// tshom bu gnyis kyi
330b6(1): lha rnams bsgom// nga nyid 'dug pa'i gnas bshams te// lo dang zla ba gsum dang lngar// rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang // rdo rje phyag bsnams dril bu la// sngags bzlas ting 'dzin goms par bsnyen// rdzas la
331a1(1): tshon gyis mdog bsgyur bzhin// rtags dang mngon du gyur par ro// sangs rgyas rdo rje phyag bsnams nas// khro bo chen po rnam par rgyal// rang gi rang bzhin der bskur nas// spyan bgrad mche
331a2(1): gtsigs sdang mig 'bar// brkyang bskum rngam pas zhing stengs bsgom// shig shig drag tu gyur pa na// de yi snying po bzlas nas ni// de bsnyen nyams su lon pa yin// de ltar 'grub pa'i rtags rnams ni// gang
331a3(1): la dmigs pa'i mdun dag tu// bzhin bzlog mig gis bltas nas ni// lce la drag tu phaT ces brjod// brgya la 'gyur aM nas dmar rtsi dbab// de las hUM zhes bya ba yid// dang po'i gnas su 'dus pa
331a4(1): na// mchongs par 'dod na langs par 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i dkyil 'khor las// tshom bu gnyis kyi lha rnams bsgom// nga nyid 'dug pa'i gnas bshams te// lo dang zla ba gsum lnga bdun// de yi dung
331a5(1): chen gang ba dang // rdo rje phyag bsnams dril bu la// sngags bzlas ting 'dzin goms par bsnyen// rdzas la tshon gyis mdog bsgyur bzhin// rtags dang mngon du gyur par ro// sangs rgyas rdo rje phyag bsnams
331a6(1): nas// khro bo chen po gshin rje rgyal// gshin rje khros pa'i rgyal mor sbyor// rang gi rang bzhin der bsgyur nas// spyan bgrad mche gtsigs sdang mig par// brkyang bskum rngam pas zhing stengs bsgom// shig shig
331b1(1): drag tu gyur pa na// de yi snying po bzlas nas kyang // oM zhes pas ni rked par gcad// des ni dbang du gyur par bsgom// sa las gser dang chu las sa// yid dang 'thad pa nyid du ni// ji bzhin ji bzhin
331b2(1): 'grub par 'gyur// de las 'dod pa bzhin du nges// de bsnyen nyams su lon pa yin// de ltar nges pa'i rtags rnams ni// ming dang gzugs dang mngon sum na// dbu gsigs sdang mig drag pos blta// au
331b3(1): gyi rtse mor phaT ces brjod// brgya la 'gyur oM las dmar rtsi dbab// ngag las aM zhes bya bas ni// bzlas brjod bcas de bdag nyid bstim// de nas 'dod pa bzhin du nges// de bsnyen nyams su len pa
331b4(1): yin// de ltar nges pa'i rtags rnams ni// ming dang gzugs dang mngon sum la// bzhin bzlog mig gis bltas nas ni// oM las drag tu phaT ces pas// brgya la 'gyur aM las dmar rtsi dbab// de las hUM
331b5(1): zhes bya ba yis// dang po'i gnas su bsdus pa na// 'tsho bar 'dod na langs par 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i mngon rdzogs pa// byang chub mchog gi kun ngo bo// phyag rgya bzhugs yun la sogs pa// gcig pu cha
331b6(1): yi ting nge 'dzin// rdo rje dung chen gang ba dang // rdo rje phyag bsnams dril bu la// sngags bzlas ting 'dzin goms par bsnyen// rdzas la tshon gyis mdog bsgyur bzhin// rtags dang mngon du gyur par
332a1(1): ro// sangs rgyas rdo rje phyag bsnams nas// khro bo chen po rta mchog dpal// rang gi rang bzhin der bsgyur nas// spyan bgrad mche gtsigs sdang mig bar// brkyang bskum rngam pas zhing stengs
332a2(1): bsgom// shig shig drag tu gyur pa na// de yi snying po bzlas nas kyang // oM zhes bya bas rked par gcad// des ni dbang du gyur par bsgom// sa las gser dang chu las sa// yid dang 'thad pa ji lta ba// ji
332a3(1): bzhin ji bzhin grub par nges// de la 'dod pa bzhin du 'gyur// de bsnyen nyams su lon pa yin// de yi grub pa'i rtags rnams ni// ming dang gzugs dang mngon sum na// dbu gsigs sdang mig drag pos
332a4(1): blta// aM las drag tu phaT ces pas// brgyal 'gyur oM las dmar rtsi dbab// de las hUM zhes bya ba yid// dang po'i gnas su bsdus pa na// mchongs par 'dod na langs par 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul chen po de
332a5(1): nyid las// sangs rgyas rdo rje phyag bsnams pa// khro bo chen po bdud rtsi 'khyil// bdag nyid rang bzhin der bsgyur nas// spyan bgrad mche gtsigs sdang mig bar// brkyang bskum rngam pas zhing stengs
332a6(1): bsgom// shig shig drag tu gyur pa las// mgyogs par phyogs su song ba na// de yi snying po mchog bzlas nas// hUM zhes pas ni bskul ba yis// dang po'i gnas su phyin par byed// des ni dbang du gyur par
332b1(1): bsgom// de las sna tshogs ci 'dod par// thams cad thams cad grub par 'gyur// de bsnyen nyams su lon pa yin// oM la drag tu phaT ces pas// gang la bya ba mngon bsam nas// se gol snol mar
332b2(1): gtogs pa yis// brgya la 'gyur oM las dmar rtsi dbab// yid la bsgoms pas langs par 'gyur// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las sgyu 'phrul chen po rab tu rgyal bar byed pa dam tshig mchod
332b3(1): bkod pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu drug pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i spyan sngar dregs pa chen po dang / dbang phyug chen po dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi dang / phyogs skyong bar gyur pa sde
332b4(1): dpon dang chung mar bcas/ bran dang g.yog dang yang g.yog gi rab tu 'jigs pa dang bcas pa'i sems kyis gus par dam bcas shing // rang rang gi dkyil 'khor dang / snying po zhes bya ba 'di mgrin gcig
332b5(1): tu yang spras so// dregs pa 'khor bcas dkyil 'khor dang // lus dang ngag yid dbul ba ni// 'khor g.yog bye ba drug cu rnams// keng rus gsar rnying gnas su gyur// rlon pa sha khrag tshogs la spyod// zod
332b6(1): par 'thung za med pa'i nang // mdung thung ral gri dgra sta dang // zhags pa dbyig pa zor ba dang // lnga dang lnga ldi khrag 'thor zhing // gdug pa'i tshogs rnams kun gyis bskor// dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di
333a1(1): rnams la// ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yis// zhabs kyi mthil du 'di bsgoms te// rang gi snying po 'di brjod na// de bran bzhin du bdag cag bgyid// de yi dgos pa ci yang rung // ma
333a2(1): lus rdzogs par bdag cag bsgrub// 'dug nas snying po 'di bzhin dbul// oM khaM d+ha ha swA hA/ dbang phyug lha chen dkyil 'khor dang // lus dang ngag yid dbul ba ni// 'khor g.yog bye ba brgyad cu
333a3(1): stong // me tog sil ma bkram pa dang // ras stan 'phar ma mang po dang // rin chen bcal dang brdung ba dang // rol mo glu gar rab tu snyan// rin chen khang pa'i gnas su ni// lha mo mang por bdag spyod
333a4(1): cing // rin chen snod du bdag cag 'thung // gdugs kyis rgyas par steng nas g.yogs// gzugs mdzes pas ni gda' bar bgyid// rin chen me tog la sogs dang // lha yi me tog phyogs su 'thor// lha yi
333a5(1): tshogs mang kun gyis bskor// dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di rnams la// ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yis// zhabs kyi mthil du 'di bris te// rang gi snying po 'di brjod na// de la bran bzhin bdag cag
333a6(1): bgyid// gtsug tu bzhag nas bkur ba dang // de yi dgos pa ci yang rung // ma lus rdzogs par bdag cag bsgrub// de gzugs ston cing gda' bar bgyid// oM sarba de bA ma hA u pa ha// rgyal po rnam thos
333b1(1): yul 'khor srung // 'khor tshogs stong phrag mang po yi// lus dang ngag yid 'bul ba ni// 'khor g.yog stong phrag bye ba brgya// me tog sil mar bkram pa dang // rgyan mang byug pa gcal bkram pa// sde dpon nyi
333b2(1): shu bye ba rnams// ci legs par ni rab tu smra// rim pa che zhing sri zhu gus// mchod par byed cing lugs mchis pa'i// bdag gi 'khor dang bcas pa lags// rin chen bcal dang 'thung ba dang // rol mo glu
333b3(1): gar snyan pas brgyan// rin chen khang par bdag mchis shing // bzhon pa dmag mangs 'khor bar mchis// rin chen snod du chang 'thung ba// gdugs kyis brgyan par steng nas g.yogs// gzugs mdzes pas
333b4(1): ni gda' bar bgyid// rin chen me tog phyogs su 'thor// rgyal po'i tshogs mang kun gyis bskor// dri za med pa'i bdag po dang // dbang ldan rlung gi bdag po rnams// 'di bzhin gus par bdag cag
333b5(1): bgyid// dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di rnams la// ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yis// zhabs kyi mthil du bris nas kyang // rang gi snying po 'di brjod na// de la bran bzhin bdag cag bgyid// gtsug tu
333b6(1): bzhag nas bkur ba dang // de yi dgos pa ci yang rung // ma lus rdzogs par bdag cag bsgrub// de la gzugs ston gda' bar bgyid// oM sid d+ha d+hi d+hi d+hA ho swA hA/ rgyal po mig mi bzang dang 'phags skyes
334a1(1): po// 'khor tshogs khri khrag mang po yis// lus dang ngag yid dbul ba ni// 'khor tshogs khri phrag bye ba brgya// me tog sil ma bkram pa dang // rgyan mang byug pa gcal bkram pa// sde dpon nyi shu
334a2(1): bye ba rnams// ci legs par ni rab tu smra// rim pa che zhing sri zhu gus// mchod par byed cing lugs mchis par// bdag gi 'khor dang bcas pa lags// rin chen bcal dang btung ba dang // rol mo glu gar
334a3(1): snyan pas brgyan// rin chen khang par bdag mchis shing // bzhon pa dmag mangs 'khor bar mchis// rin chen snod du chang 'thung ba// gdugs kyis rgyas par steng nas g.yogs// gzugs mdzes pa ni gda'
334a4(1): bar bgyid// rin chen me tog phyogs su 'thor// rgyal po'i tshogs mang kun gyis bskor// gnod sbyin srin po'i tshogs rnams dang // chu bdag gshin rje'i 'khor mang rnams// de bzhin gus pas bdag cag
334a5(1): bgyid// dgyes pa'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di// ming tsam 'dzin par byed pa yis// zhabs kyi mthil du bris nas kyang // rang gi snying po 'di brjod na// de la bran bzhin bdag cag bgyid// gtsug tu bzhag
334a6(1): nas bkur ba dang // de yi dgos pa ci yang rung // ma lus rdzogs par bdag cag bgyid// de la gzugs ston gda' bar bgyid// oM d+ha ka b+hi du b+ha bi shu pa she oM hUM/ zhes mgrin gcig tu smras pas// srid pa
334b1(1): ji srid pa rnams thugs kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dis 'dul bar gyur nas// bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos sku dang gsung dang thugs yon tan phrin las rdo rje las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di phyung
334b2(1): ngongo// a ho/ de bzhin gshegs pa bsam yas snying po bsam yas par// 'bru gtor bsdu ba las ni 'das bzhin bsnyags dka' ba'i// ma nor las chen gcig gis rab tu 'dul 'gyur zhing // de yi bsngags
334b3(1): pa'i bka' las 'da' bar nges mi nus// thugs kyi thugs rjes ji srid ma nor lam nyid la// gsang ba'i snying po nges pa sgyu 'phrul mchog nyid pa// nga nyid 'dud 'gyur gzhan lta smos ci dgos// de nyid thugs
334b4(1): las sprul pa'i thugs nyid do// ho rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las shin tu 'dul bar gyur pa gnas dang / snying po dbul ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu bdun
334b5(1): pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po'i bdag nyid dpal khrag 'thung chen po'i spyan sngar dregs pa chen po dang / dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten pa'i tshogs kyis/ de bzhin
334b6(1): gshegs pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis sems 'dun pa chen por gyur te/ ched du bstod pa'i glu 'di mgrin gcig tu smras so// e ma'o ya mtshan 'phrul chen gyi// sangs rgyas rdo rje'i rang bzhin dpal// dug dang
335a1(1): bdud rtsi khyad med par// dag pa'i rang bzhin rnal 'byor thugs// kun tu bzang po rdo rje'i sku// ye shes lnga yi khro rgyal gtso// khrag 'thung 'jigs byed he ru ka/ sangs rgyas mtha' yas 'gro ba rgya
335a2(1): mtsho 'dul// thugs rje bsam yas khro rgyal kun gyi gtso// khrag 'thung kun las ches 'phags yid bzhin mdzod// ser gnag mthing gnag ljang gnag dmar gnag dang // sngo gnag ri rab lta bur brjid pa'i
335a3(1): sku// bskal par bcas pa'i me ri'i dbus gnas pa'i// ro tshogs mang po'i dkyil nas zhal rngam pa'i// bsod nams lus bsdus rdo rje mi zad pa'i// skar tshogs mang la nyi zla'i 'od bzhin du// che btsan
335a4(1): dregs pas 'jigs pa'i tshogs kun 'joms// mtshungs med cho 'phrul khyad par rab ston cing // 'dod pa'i dbang phyug gar gyi tshul du bzhugs// za byed brkam pas thugs sku gsung gi zhal// khrag mtsho
335a5(1): mtha' med skems shing sgal tshigs 'joms// khro gnyer snying 'dren 'jigs byed glog ltar 'gyu// dur khrod 'bum gyi dbu smug 'jigs par brjid// 'khor ba'i rtog pa 'jig mdzad thod rlon phreng bas
335a6(1): bsgegs// rol phyir rtse mor snang bas a a ha las bzhad// rang nyid che bas dbang rdzogs rgyal bas dbu la brgyan// smin ris khro gnyer glog bzhin rab 'gyu bas// phyogs dang mthun pa'i khrag 'thung 'gyed
335b1(1): cing sdud// sprul pa de lta bus ni zil gnon pa// 'jigs pas mun pa'i tshogs chen rab bshams kyang // sdang mig spyan ni nyi zla rgyas 'bar bas// 'jigs pa'i tshogs phung sdug bsngal gtan nas sbyong // khros
335b2(1): pas zhal gdangs so chen gtsigs 'bar bas// srid pa'i rtse nas dmyal khams snyegs pa ltar// 'jig rten dus gcig ming mdzad lam drug gtan nas gcod// ye shes phyag bsnams phyag mtshan 'bar ba
335b3(1): yis// srid gsum ma lus rdul phran stongs par mdzad// rkan sgras rol pas 'gro la pheg brdabs bzhin// khams gsum kun la chas ston rgyas par mdzad// zas su khrag 'thung rdo rje che mchog gsol// 'jig
335b4(1): tshogs sad pa'i ko rlon g.yang gzhi bsnams// klu 'dul yon tan sbrul nag stong gis bklubs// 'jigs bcas klu yi tshogs kyang zhabs 'og mnan// 'dod chags 'dul ba 'dod chags kun gyi
335b5(1): gtso// 'dod chags chen po 'dod chags nyid kyi sku// mang po'i 'khor bcas 'jigs pa'i 'khor du byas// zhe sdang 'dul ba zhe sdang kun gyi gtso// zhe sdang gdug pa zhe sdang kun gyi sku// 'jigs pa'i tshogs
335b6(1): rnams zer gyis kun bzhu ba'i// rab tu brjid pa 'jigs pas 'jigs pa'i gzugs// gti mug 'dul ba gti mug kun gyi gtso// gti mug blo sel gti mug chen po'i sku// mi 'byed khrag 'thung sran chen ri
336a1(1): rab brtan// nga rgyal 'dul ba nga rgyal kun gyi gtso// 'jigs tshogs sad nas ro tshogs mang gi gnas// zhabs bgrad mche gtsigs chog pa'i dus mtha' med// 'jigs pas phebs par dga'
336a2(1): zhing shin tu sdang // phrag dog 'dul ba phrag dog kun gyi gtso// phrag dog che mchog phrag dog chen po'i sku// bud med kun bsdus dkyil 'khor dbus gnas shing // lam nor gdug par bcas pa phaT kyis
336a3(1): gsod// zhing gi sham thabs gdug pa 'dul bar bsnams// sku 'dra 'jigs tshogs gzugs kyis sku la brgyan// zhabs dang phyag tu gyur pa bsam thag chad// zhabs chen g.yon mang brkyang bas lha gnon
336a4(1): bdud la khyab// zhabs g.yas thabs chen mang pos dbang sdud 'dor zhing bskum// rdo rje se gol phyar brdabs gnyid cher rab sel mdzad// 'od chen dbus nas glog chen rab 'gyu ba'i// 'jigs par gong na
336a5(1): med pa'i dpa' bo khyod// zas ngan bdud rtsi sbyor ba'i sman chen bdag/ 'jigs byed khyod lta bu ni rab tu dkon// bskal par bkrus kyang slar skye dri ma la// ye shes nyi zer 'od kyi byin brlabs dang // thugs
336a6(1): rje dag pa'i char gyi cho 'phrul gyis// brda tsam yud la rmongs 'khrugs las sbyor zhing // shi ba'i lam 'gog shes rab dkyil 'khor du// skye ba gtan nas sbyong ba'i thugs rje 'char// byams sdang mi mnga' bka'
336b1(1): drin chen po'i gter// khrag 'thung sku gsung thugs la phyag 'tshal lo// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las bka' drin dran pa'i glu zhes bya ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bzhi bcu brgyad pa'o// // de nas
336b2(1): bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos/ gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di brtan zhing mi 'gyur ba dang / 'jig rten gyi khams su gnas par bya ba'i ched du 'byung po rnams kyi/ jo mo'i yang jo mo// mi srin mo chen
336b3(1): mo// mi srin mo dang / tshangs ma dang / 'khrug mo dang / dbang mo dang / 'jug sred ma dang / gzhon nu ma dang / dmar mo dang / bdud rtsi mo dang / zhi ba mo dang / be con mo dang / srin mo dang / za ba mo dang /
336b4(1): dga' ba mo dang / ra ro khrag 'thung myos dang / gcig pu spyod dang / yid 'phrog ma dang / grub mo dang / klung mo dang / gsod byed mo dang / mi mo dang / phag mo dang / rgan byed mo dang / sna chad mo dang / chu lha mo
336b5(1): dang / nag mo chen mo dang / ra mgo dmar ser chen mo dang / bum rna sngo gnag chen mo dang / gsus 'dzin ser gnag chen mo dang / rgyal mo dang / blon mo dang / sde dpon mo dang / g.yog dang yang g.yog dang /
336b6(1): bran dang / yang bran la sogs pa/ slas dang byi mo dang / bran mo rnams la ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// gsang ba'i snying po nges pa 'di// gsang sngags kun gyi rgyal po yin// thabs chen mtshon pa'i shes
337a1(1): rab ni// sgyu 'phrul dra ba'i snying po dang // gsang ba rgyud ni mang po rnams// nga yi thugs las sprul pa yin// tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang // dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa// sde dpon 'phrog
337a2(1): ma'i yul rnams dang // lus 'phags pa lang spyod pa dang // sgra mi snyan dang 'dzam gling du// nga yi thugs kyi snying po 'di// phyogs bcu kun tu spel ba dang // de yi gzugs la gtad pa ni// yid bzhin mdzod
337a3(1): 'byor bka' yi gnas// phyi nang theg pa bstan bcos dang // stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi rnams// spyod dang bsgom dang bzlas pa dang // sdom pa kun la mkhas pa yis// bsgoms pa sran dang chos phyogs
337a4(1): dang // bstan pa 'dzin par nus pa yi// gsang ba'i snying po mchog tu gtad// gzhan la bsnyad par ma yin no// mi 'khrug blo zab rkyen thub cing // yid bzhin sbyor bar mos pa la// rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig
337a5(1): bstan// zla dang bcas pas dam tshig che// sbyor ba gnyi ga mkhas pa dang // lung dang tshad du ldan thub dang // gzhan la bsnyad par mi byed cing // bstan pa mchod par byed pa'o// nye ba bsnyen pa dam tshig
337a6(1): la// bsgrub pa bsnyen pa nye bsnyen pa// ci nus par ni shin tu brtson// sems can ngang tshul kun bor nas// gang gi yid kyang mi 'khrugs shing // mchod pa tshogs la stobs la rub// bud med 'gugs pas
337b1(1): gtso la dbul// zung thub gsang la mkhas pa yis// nges pa can la shin tu gtad// gzhan du bstan par mi bya'o// thogs med phyal bar 'dod po spyod// bud med yon tan kun yod cing // 'dod chags kun
337b2(1): dang mthun spyod la// rtsa ba dang du blang ba dang // 'tsham par lha yi sku bstan te// nye bsnyen gsang ba'i man ngag rnams// nams kyang sbyin par mi bya'o// de la sbyor stangs de bstan nas// gzhan ni bstan par ma
337b3(1): gsungs so// dad ldan srun cing blo rno ba// dad pa che zhing chos la gus// chags par ran pa bka' nyan cing // gnas pa dga' zhing lung nyan pa// rtsa ba yan lag dam tshig sgrub// mchod pa'i gnas shom sdom
337b4(1): pa srung // bsnyen pa la ni byin phab nas// gsang sngags tshogs kyi mchod gnas su// nga yi gsang ba byin phab ste// thogs pa med par mngon sum la// sbyor ba'i thabs ldan mnyam sbyor ba// dkyil 'khor bzhi
337b5(1): bcu rtsa gnyis kyi// bdag nyid mnyes pa'i mnyam sbyor zhing // mnyam pa'i grub pas tshogs la mchod// dam tshig mi ldan spyod rtsing dang // gting nas bstan pa mi 'dzin la// 'dod chags spel bar mi byed
337b6(1): cing // gsang ba'i snying po de kho na// nges pa'i don ni mi ston la// nga yi dbang dang bslab pa rnams// rim pa bzhin du rab tu sbyin// rigs ngan pho mo 'dod spyod ni// sgro thung 'dod chags rab tu che// blo zhan
338a1(1): phrag dog sgro skur can// gnyid che chang dad brtson grus chung // slob la mi gus nan tan med// slob dpon mi dran spun sems chung // gal te dam la gnas na yang // nga yi gsang ba 'dzin pa
338a2(1): la// mngon du dga' bar mi nus te// lta zhan bka' las 'das pa dang // grol ba dka' zhing nus mthu zhan// mun dang lkog dang skye bo la// gar dang phreng bar 'dod spyod cing // 'dod chags 'ga' lam de
338a3(1): dag la// tshig rnams gsang ba smra byed pa// dngos kyi don dang mthun pa las// gsang ba'i snying po sbyin mi bya// bskal pa'i 'jig rten bar du yang // thugs kyi bde ba mi spro zhing // nams kyang bstan par mi
338a4(1): bya'o// 'jig rten 'dod pa dga' rnams phyir// gal te rmongs pas byin pa ni// rims dang nad kyis srog bcad de// rtsa ba yan lag spangs pa yin// bsregs dang sbubs par yun ring gnas// zhes brjod
338a5(1): pas srid pa mtha' dag gi bud med kyi tshogs rnams dam tshig 'dis 'dul bar gyur te// de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen po sku gsung thugs dang yon tan phrin las rdo rje las rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig 'di
338a6(1): phyung ngo // e e ma// e ma'o chos rnams sgyu ma yi// ngang nyid bud med gsang ba sngags pa yi// lnga drug dus btab snang srid 'byung ba'i gter// yang dag lam rnyed mngon par kun gnas kun tu gnas// chos
338b1(1): mang chos nyid mnyam pa'i phyag rgya ji snyed las// las ngan dge ba'i cho 'phrul lam chen 'di// kun gyi khyad par nyid ni bud med bde ba gcig pu yin// chos kun de nyid yin phyir dman pas mi smad 'tsham par
338b2(1): bstan// sgyu ma 'byor pa nyid ni bder gshegs nyid yin rab tu gsal// rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dam tshig chen pos bud med btul ba'i le'u ste bzhi bcu dgu
338b3(1): pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos mnyes pa'i mchod pa 'di ched du brjod do// de la mchod sbyin chen po ni// thog mar bdag nyid rtogs goms bsgral// de nas gnyis med blo yis
338b4(1): ni// blo ngan 'jig rten snying re rje// gnyis su med par bsgral bar bya// 'khril ba'i mchod chen mnyam sbyor bas// bdag nyid mnyes pas mnyes par bya// mnyam pa'i grub rdzas chen po dag/ bdag dang mnyam
338b5(1): pa'i tshogs la 'bral// bza' dang bca' dang btung dang bgo/ longs spyod lnga ldan thams cad ni// dkyil 'khor la ni dkyil 'khor thim// phyogs bcu dus bzhi gshegs pa yi// bder gshegs yon tan rmad
338b6(1): po che// gzhan na yod pa ma yin na// lha srin la sogs smos ci dgos// rnal 'byor las su rung rnams kyis// phyag rgya chen po rdzogs gyur cing // gsal ba'i yid gnyis med pa ni// dkyil 'khor chen po
339a1(1): 'bar bar 'gyur// zhes brjod pas/ mnyes pa chen pos 'jig rten drug gi phyogs bcu thams cad khyab par gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las mchod sbyin gyi le'u ste lnga bcu
339a2(1): pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos don yod par bya ba'i phyir// dam tshig chen po ched du brjod do// bla med theg par nges gyur pas// nyon mongs las rnams kun spyod kyang // byas la
339a3(1): mi sogs tshogs gyur te// tshul khrims sdom pa phun sum tshogs// bla med mchog gi dam tshig tu// 'dul ba'i dbang du tshul khrims dang // ji snyed sdom pa bsam yas pa// ma lus kun 'dus rnam par
339a4(1): dag/ yod med dbu ma'ang mi dmigs shing // sgyu ma mig yor lta bu'i tshul// srog med srog gcad gcad du med// srog dang skyes bu log rtogs tsam// bden pa gnyi gar dbyer med pas// 'phrul dga'i tshul
339a5(1): te tha dad min// gzhan dang ma byin med pa'i phyir// blangs med thams cad nyid kyi dbyings// chos rnams sgyu ma lta bu dang // ming dang tshig tu btags pa brdzun// brdzun nyid la ni brdzun spyod pa// brdzun zhes
339a6(1): btags tsam yod ma yin// ma chags pa la chags pa dang // chags pa nyid na chags med pa// de ni tshangs mchog rgyal po ste// shin tu chags pa chen po yin// bla med mi spang bla ma bkur// sngags dang phyag rgya
339b1(1): rgyun mi gcad// yang dag lam du zhugs la byams// gsang ba'i don phyir sgra mi bya// 'di ni rtsa ba lnga rnams te// bsgrub dang bsrung ba'i dam tshig mchog/ gti mug chags dang zhe sdang dang // nga rgyal phrag dog mi
339b2(1): spang ngo // dkar rtsi dmar rtsi dri sha chen// dag pa'i snod du mi dor ro// yan lag bcu yi dam tshig mchog/ ye nas dag mnyam rtog pas spyad// bsrung zhing bsgrub pa'i dam tshig lnga// rtsa ba yin te rigs med
339b3(1): 'gyur// mi spang mi dor lnga gnyis ni// yan lag dam tshig 'da' dka' ba'o// mnyam la mnyam par sbyor ba yi// mnyam pa'i dam tshig la gnas na// mnyam rdzogs chen po thob par 'gyur// 'das na sangs
339b4(1): rgyas ma yin no// rtsa ba nyams pa'i phyal pa dag/ gso la nye bar mi brtson dang // skad cig yud tsam smra ma byed// nyams 'gyur nyes pa brjod mi lang // rtsa ba'i dam tshig nyams gyur na// bsgrub pa thams cad
339b5(1): log par 'gyur// yid du mi 'ong sna tshogs pa'i// 'bras bu mi 'dod bzhin du 'du// yan lag dam tshig nyams gyur na// 'bras bu med cing ngan 'gror ltung // dam tshig rnams ni rdo rje che// sangs rgyas kun gyi
339b6(1): bdag nyid yin// rtsa ba'i dam tshig lnga la ni// gcig la'ang gnyis dang bcu phrag gsum// yan lag dam tshig lnga gnyis la// gcig la bcu phrag gnyis su dbye// dam tshig 'di ni rmad po che// 'jig rten drug
340a1(1): gi phyogs bcu na// srid gsum 'gro ba ji snyed pa'i// rtog 'dul dam tshig de snyed spro// gzhan yang rgyal mchog kun bzang gi/ thams cad ma lus phyag rgya yi// bsgrub med dam pa ma lus
340a2(1): 'grub// de la sogs pa mtha' yas mchog/ rgyal ba'i rigs mchog 'dzin pa ste// 'jig rten gtso dang 'khor gyis bkur// dam pa'i mchog dang dam pa yis// sras dang spun dgongs byin gyis rlob// bder
340a3(1): gshegs nyid kyi yul la bzhugs// 'jigs med kun tu bzang por sbyor// ji bzhin nyid dang 'dul ba'i thabs// ji snyed sdom pa bsam yas pa// ma lus rnam dag lhun gyis 'grub// nyams na bskangs pas
340a4(1): rdzogs pa dang // de la sogs pa bsam yas mchog/ ces brjod pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la 'dul bar gyur to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las dam tshig gi le'u
340a5(1): ste lnga bcu gcig pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las/ sngags 'chang rnams don yod par bya ba'i phyir// dam tshig sum brgya pa'i rtsa ba mdor bsdus nas// sngags 'chang
340a6(1): rnams kyi don ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rdul snyed du// log rtogs mi bzad rdul phran snyed// rtog 'dul gnyen po bsam mi khyab// 'dul ba sdom pa bsam yas dang // rdo
340b1(1): rje theg mchog mang po kun// nyid las g.yos shing spros med kyang // rang rig 'khrul pa'i rtog pa yis// lta ba mtho dman bsam mi khyab// de 'dul don phyir 'tsham par bstan// yang dag nyid dang log rtogs
340b2(1): gnyis// ngo bo nyid kyis gnas gyur nas// de la bcos shing bsgyur du med// ye nas ngo bo nyid med na// nyon mongs spangs shing don bsgrub med// thams cad ma lus ro gcig 'gyur// kun rdzob chu zla ltar
340b3(1): yin pas// cir yang 'gyur zhing cir yang 'grub// rnal 'byor de nyid rtogs pa yis// don dam skye 'gag med pa ste// kun rdzob sgyu ma cir yang 'grub// ces rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// sgyu 'phrul dra ba las

346b2(1): gal te tshig par 'gyur// baM gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'bar ba gzi brjid lhun chen la// chags pa yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// rdo rje gsung yang dbang du 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga la// mtshan
346b3(1): ma ming du bcas par bya// rdo rje chags pa'i phur pas gdab// chags pa'i tshogs la thim par dbul// baM gyi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud du sbrel nas bsdams// 'gugs 'gyur ci yang phyi bzhin
346b4(1): 'brang // ci 'dod de bzhin 'ong bar 'gyur// ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ 'bar ba 'du 'phro gzi chen la// dga' ba'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// yon tan nam mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam// bdud rtsi
346b5(1): lnga'am zas lnga la// yon tan yid bzhin gter du brtags// nga rgyal dga' 'phro'i phur pas gdab// rdo rje gzi brjid 'phel bar dbul// ma yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud du sbrel bsdams
346b6(1): na// gzi brjid 'bar ba'i 'phrul chen spro// yid bzhin nam mkha' gang bar 'gyur// ya yi tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ gsal ba'i gzi brjid 'tsher ba la// dang ba'i yid kyis mchod sbyin bya// gtum
347a1(1): chen rngam po'ang lhan ner 'gyur// bdud rtsi lnga'am zas lnga la// gtum rngam 'khrugs pa'i ngo bor brtag/ lhan ne gsal ba'i phur pas gdab// 'bar ba lhan ne'i tshogs la dbul// ya yi tshogs
347a2(1): kyi dkyil 'khor du// lu gu rgyud du sbrel nas bsdams// 'bar ba lhan ner byin gyis brlabs// thams cad g.yo ba med par 'gyur// slas dang byi mo bran mo'i tshogs// lhag ma'i mchod sbyin 'dod pa
347a3(1): sbyin// gang gi dam tshig rab bsgrags nas// gang 'dod las de byed par bsgom// sngon tshe dpal chen he ru ka/ shin tu gdug cing gtum bag can// thams cad ma lus 'dul mdzad pa'i// dbang dang byin
347a4(1): brlabs rmad po che// lha chen la sogs dbang bsdus nas// 'khor rnams dbang phyug slas su byas// so so'i las rnams bskos pa de// ji ltar khas blangs dam bcas pa'i// ma thogs myur du mngon par
347a5(1): phyung // dam bcas bzhin du ma byas na// ji ltar rang gis mna' bor ba'i// sdom bcas de las 'da' ma byed// dam tshig de las 'das gyur na// mgo lus snying yang tshal pa bdun// yak+Sha khro bos gtubs par
347a6(1): 'gyur// de bas rnal 'byor sngags 'chang gis// ji ltar bcol ba bzhin du byos// las de mngon du ma byas na// rang gis mna' bor khas blangs bzhin// rul myags tshig nas dmyal bar 'gro// rnal 'byor
347b1(1): dam la gnas gyur pa'i// las rnams yongs su bya ba dang // 'khor rnams bu gcig bzhin du skyongs// phra men ma yang dngos grub 'thob// bcol ba'i las rnams mngon du byos// zhes bsgo'o// khro bo bsgrub
347b2(1): pa'i las kyi gtso bo ni 'di yin no// khrag 'thung chen po la sogs pa'i// bro gar glu tshig chen pos ni// thams cad thams cad byed pa yin// mdzod ldan chen mo la sogs pa'i// bro gar glu tshig chen mos
347b3(1): ni// 'du bar 'dod na 'du bar byed// 'phel bar 'dod na 'phel bar byed// sbos mo chen mo la sogs pa'i// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// lhan ner 'dod na thim par byed// rmugs par 'dod na myos par
347b4(1): byed// seng gdong chen mo la sogs pa'i// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// thams cad kun tu za bar byed// rdul cha tsam yang med par byed// bzhad gdong chen mo la sogs pa'i// bro gar glu tshig chen mos
347b5(1): ni// thams cad kun la za bar byed// kun la rab tu nyams par byed// slas dang byi mo bran mo yi// bro gar glu tshig chen mos ni// skrod cing gtong bar byed pa ste// thams cad thams cad byed pa yin// ljon pa
347b6(1): dang ni lcug phran tshal// sdong gcig dang ni me reg tu// dang ba dga' ba chags pa dang // khros pas ka li rab tu bya// zhes brjod pas de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la de bzhin gshegs pa nyid sbyong bar gyur
348a1(1): to// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las lhun gyis grub pa'i phrin las byin gyis rlob pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste drug cu pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra
348a2(1): ba las chos thams cad yid dang / chos su 'dus par bstan pa dang / shes rab thams cad ni yum bzhir 'dus/ yum bzhi yang gcig tu 'dus so// thabs thams cad ni rigs bzhir 'dus/ rigs bzhi
348a3(1): yang gcig tu 'dus te/ thams cad dbyings dang / dbyings kyi ye shes su 'dus par bstan nas/ tshig mgo mjug gi don bsdus nas yang 'di skad brjod de// don gyi rtsa ba'i mchog yin no// thams cad ma
348a4(1): lus mi lus shing // mi dmigs ma chags chos nyid de// de bzhin dbyings nyid mang po sna tshogs thabs su snang // thabs nyid sgyu ma mig yor chu zla gzugs brnyan yin// de nyid rang rig ye shes chags med sna
348a5(1): gas snang // thabs dang shes rab ldan pas mchog gi gnas gyur pas// ji ltar smad kyang zad med gnyis med sgrib mi 'gyur// shes rab thabs chen mchog la ye nas rol pa yin// de nyid phyag rgya sna tshogs
348a6(1): sprul pa rang rig ste// rgyu 'bras ye nas dbyer med snga phyi ma yin pas// 'bras bu lam du gyur nas dus gcig mnyam par sbyor// 'di ni yid bzhin rin chen thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas// thams cad 'du
348b1(1): ba'i gter dang yid bzhin mdzod// gnyis bral mnyam dang mi mnyam thams cad nyid kyi dbyings// nga dang bdag med mtshan ma sna tshogs dbyer med pa// stong dang mi stong mi gnas de bzhin nyid du
348b2(1): 'dus// rang byung rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zad med dkyil 'khor spro// 'das dang ma 'das dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub dang // mi zad par ldan rgyan gyi 'khor lo drug rdzogs pa// skye med dbyings kyi rang
348b3(1): byung 'od gsal phreng ldan mchog/ ye nas ma bcos ma byas rang rig ngang gis gsal// thams cad 'byung 'jug rang rig gter chen dang du bsdus// phyogs bcu ma lus mi lus thams cad kun 'dus
348b4(1): dang // zhing khams gzhal yas bsam yas rin chen mchog chen kun// skye med dbyings dang rang gi gnyis su yang dag 'ub// mos spyod stong nyid rgyu 'bras yang nas yang sbyangs mi dmigs pa// ye nas 'od
348b5(1): gsal chags med ma chags dkon mchog gnas// ming tsam mchog rol thabs dang shes rab mchog gis rdzogs// lam stegs nyid du pha rol phyin bcu rdzogs par rgyu 'bras spyod// mnyam nyid pa yi rdo
348b6(1): bas chen yang dag ldan// 'gro med 'ong med mi gnas kun khyab khyab med nyid kyis bshad// a ho// rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las pha rol tu phyin pa dang // sa bcu gnyis dang / thabs kyis mchog
349a1(1): dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing ma lus par yid dang / chos su 'dus par bstan pa'i le'u ste drug cu gcig pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes lnga'i dkyil 'khor la mnyam par bzhugs
349a2(1): nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// lnga phung yan lag thams cad kyang // 'bru lnga gnas pa'i byang chub ste// oM dang mAM du 'brel ba yi// byang chub rdo rje nyid las byung // spyir na brjod pa thams cad
349a3(1): nga / kun kyang ming tsam yi ge a// ske 'jig nyid kyang yi ge lnga// de ni byang chub sems yin te// dmigs med byang chub mchog 'byung ba// gsum shar lnga 'bar bcu 'byor pa// zad med rin chen gter yin
349a4(1): te// mngon shes drug ldan mtshan bzang spags// e las 'phro zhing ar 'dus pa// gsang ba'i thig le nyid kyi dbyings// nam mkha'i dbyings nas sprin byung ba// kun la khyab cing sna tshogs sprin// bzhi bcu rtsa
349a5(1): lnga'i khong nas bsam mi khyab// byin brlabs ya mtshan rmad po che// yon tan mi zad gter du gyur// ho/ ye nas mnyam nyid gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dbyings// dbyings las mi gzhan ye nas thig le'i
349a6(1): ngadang // ye shes dbyings nyid gzugs brnyan sgyu ma'i tshul// snang byed nyid na bya byed med par gnas// ye shes 'phrul chen bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i don// dkyil 'khor bsam yas lhun grub dam pa ni// thabs dang
349b1(1): shes rab gnyis med mnyam par gnas// dag mnyam rnam gsum don rtogs bsgom byas shing // mnyam pa rnam bzhis don rtogs mchog gi gnas// rgyu 'bras lhun grub phun sum tshogs bzhir 'dus// ye shes
349b2(1): lnga rdzogs sku gsung thugs kyis bsdus// chags med zhi ba'i lam nas thig ler 'jug/ ye shes lnga rdzogs spyod yul mi 'da' la// ma chags 'od gsal dkyil 'khor rdzogs par ldan// thams cad ma lus
349b3(1): rang rig rgyal po yis// dkyil 'khor dag mnyam khro bo khro mor sbyor// chos rnams rang bzhin nyid kyis stong // nang dang nang gi phyi rol gyi// rnam rtog sna tshogs 'dzin pa yang // dngos po med dbyings skad cig
349b4(1): ma// de nyid rnam par dag pa'i lam// phyin ci log nyid yang dag ste// ma rig pa ni ye shes gsal// nyon mongs sdug bsngal byang chub mchog/ thams cad yon tan mchog gi gnas// a ho// phyogs bcu'i
349b5(1): rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor ma lus kun// nges pa'i don dgrol bzhi bcu rtsa lngar 'dus// bsdus pa'i don nyid yi ge 'bru lngar bsdus// lnga po'i don nyid 'bru gsum nang du 'dus// gsum po de nyid yi ge ar
349b6(1): 'dus te// a nyid ma skyes mnyam rdzogs dbyings su thim// a ho// mi dmigs stong pa nyid kyang brjod mi lang // mi dmigs de bzhin gshegs kyang bsam mi khyab// ma skyes mchog gi dbyings kyang bsam mi
350a1(1): khyab// ma 'gags byang chub sems ni skye 'jig med// 'gro med 'ong med mi gnas pa'i// thugs rje byin brlabs rnam par 'phro// zhes nyid la nyid gsung ngo // dbyings las dbyings byung thabs
350a2(1): kyi phyag rgyar gsal// thabs las dbyings byung yum gyi phyag rgyar gsal// dbyings su dbyings kyis ye shes 'byor pas na// byang chub sems tshogs dkyil 'khor brjod mi lang // de bzhin gshegs pa'i
350a3(1): dkyil 'khor nges pa'i don ma lus par mtshan nyid med pa'i phyag rgyar thim pa'i le'u ste drug cu gnyis pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pas rgyal po tshe mtha' yas su sprul nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod
350a4(1): do// sgyu 'phrul dra ba bstan bsdus te// b+h+rUM dang bi shwa'i dkyil 'khor du// ma dang a yi dkyil 'khor la// rdo rje 'khor lo rab bsgoms nas// bzhi bcu rtsa lnga'i don bsgoms te// de yis phyogs bcur gang bar
350a5(1): bsgom// b+h+rUM dang dzaHhUM baM hos dgug/ sku gsung thugs kyi snying po mchog/ lus ngag sems la thim par bya// nr-i nyid dngos sam yid bzhin mdzod// bum pa mchog ni bzang po yi// tshe gzhag gnas ni 'di yin
350a6(1): te// yang nas yang du dgug bya ste// mngon sum smin par gyur pa dang // dbyings su yang ni sba bar bya// rdo rje go cha bsrung ba yis// brtan zhing 'khor los dgag par bya// snying po 'bru lnga'i nang du
350b1(1): bstim// sangs rgyas thams cad ma lus kun/ rgyal po tshe dpag med pa bsgom// sku mdog gangs ri 'tsher ba la// rgyal phreng sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan// yid bzhin rin chen phreng ba dang // yid bzhin rin
350b2(1): chen za ma tog/ rin chen rgyan dang bum pa bzang // gzhan yang 'gro ba'i don bya ba// bsam gyis mi khyab mtha' yas mchog/ bgegs kyis nr-i rnams mi ster na// tshe dpag med dang khro bo ste// phyogs bcu nam
350b3(1): mkha'i khams bkang nas// skra skad drag po bton nas ni// thams cad ma lus thul bar bya// dbang du tshe dpag med pa bskur// tshe bsnyen dang ni nye bsnyen dang // tshe sgrub dang ni sgrub chen dang // thabs dang
350b4(1): shes rab 'byor pa yis// ci 'dod las rnams grub par byed// tshe dbang mo ni rgyud 'phel ma// dkar mo'i mdog la 'od 'phro 'bar// phyag na rin chen gang ba yi// phyag rgya sna tshogs cir yang bsgyur// 'jig
350b5(1): rten drug gi phyogs bcu na// gnas pa'i 'gro drug ma lus la// phan pa'i tshe dbang 'di sbyin no// de las lhag pa'i rgyud 'phel med// yi ge bzlas pa 'phrul chen 'di// rnam gsum tshul gyis ma 'khrul
350b6(1): bar// sngags bzlas cho ga ba ra ma gcod// 'dris gsal brtan pa mchog gis bya// oM oM oM oM oM/ hUM hUM hUM hUM hUM/ s+t+waM sAM s+t+waM s+t+waM sAM/ AMHAMHAMHAMHAMH/ hUM haM haM haM hUM/ b+h+rUM b+h+rUM b+h+rUM b+h+rUM b+h+rUM/ bA bA bA bA bA/ dza dza dza dza dza/
351a1(1): a a a a ya/ lu lu lu yu wa/ shaSha shaSha shaSha shaSha shaH/ ts+tshan+nan+na r+b+ha thA/ a a a a a/ ma/ tshe rnams dbang du ma gyur na// bder gshegs la yang cha dpag med// sku gsung thugs kyi gzugs
351a2(1): kyis ni// phyogs bcu nam mkha'i khams bkang nas// phyag rgya mtshon cha sna tshogs kyis// 'jig rten phyogs bcu'i bdud bcom nas// 'gro lnga tshe rnams dbang du bsdu// phyag rgya gshol la sogs pa yis// 'og
351a3(1): gi 'jig rten khams dkrugs nas// gshin rje'i gnas nas tshe bkug ste// snying po lnga la bstim par bya// phyag rgya 'khor lo chen po yis// steng gi 'jig rten khams dkrugs te// dbang phyug lha chen la sogs
351a4(1): dang // bar snang bgegs rnams rgyu ba las// nr-i tshe rab tu dgug par bya// 'khor lo'i 'bru la bstim nas ni// de nas yi ge 'bru lnga de// nr-i yi gnas lngar bstim par bya// oM oM badz+ra ka pa tsa badz+ra rak+Sha hUM/ oM
351a5(1): sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra a d+hi tiSh+Tha badz+ra swA ha/ phyag rgya bsrung ba'i cho ga ste// 'bru lnga'i yi ge 'bru gcig ste// 'bru gcig mi dmigs dbyings su thim// oM/ yid bzhin bum pa'i rin po che// rgyan dang rin chen phreng
351a6(1): bas brgyan// rin chen lnga dang sman lnga dang // 'bru lnga spos lnga yungs kar lnga// sngags mkhan rab brtan blo ldan pas// yan lag ma nyams sngags bzlas bsgom// rgyan chas lnga dang ldan byas nas// dkyil
351b1(1): 'khor thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// de nas rigs kyi bu de yis// yo byad ma lus ldan byas nas// mchod yon rnam pa sna tshogs kyis// mnyes mchod dngos grub thob par 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul dra ba las tshe'i cho
351b2(1): ga dbang dam pa shin tu gsang ba'i le'u ste drug cu gsum pa'o// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sdud pa pos 'gro ba lnga dbang med par smra zhes bya bar yang bsdus nas ched du brjod pa 'di brjod
351b3(1): do// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid kyi dbyings// kun tu bzang po thugs rje'i ngang // sku gsung thugs ldan yon tan rdzogs// mnyam pa'i zhing du sbyar bar bya// rdo rje rab tu gsang ba yis// rdo rje rab tu kun

351b6(1): shes 'od 'phros nas// a las zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du// dzaHlas lcags kyu grangs med pas// de yis snying du zhugs par bya// ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du// dzaHlas lcags kyu mang po yis// gang dgug
352a1(1): de yi snying ga nas// drangs te de yi khar gzhug bya// ma las nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor du// dzaHlas lcags kyu mang po yis// gang dgug de yi snying ga nas// drangs te de yi khar gzhug bya// sngags 'di
352a2(1): rab tu brjod par bya// oM dzan+d+ha baM ho/ a nr-i pra du/ ming pra be sha/ ci 'dod las de bzlas par bya// lag gnyis sor mo spyir bsnol te// khu tshur dam du bcangs nas ni// srin lag mthe'u chung mthe bong
352a3(1): gnyis// bar du mthe bo de drangs te// oM ming pra be sha A A// thal ba yungs kar drag tu rdeg/ ming de khong du zhugs par bya// babs nas rdo rje lcags sgrog zhags pas bcing // gang yin zhes ni dris nas
352a4(1): ni// lha 'dre la sogs gang yin pa// lha zhig na ni mchod par bya// gdon zhig na ni tsan+dan gur gum bsres nas ni// de blud sngags 'di rab tu brjod par bya// oM badz+ra d+ha ka kro d+ha sa ma ya hUM phaT/ gal te sgra ru
352a5(1): mi btub na// lag gnyis sor mo phyir bsnol te// khu tshur bcangs nas mthe'u chung sbyar// gyen bsgreng dbab pa'i kha ru gtug/ sngags oM badz+ra b+hA Sha bi dze pra pe sha hUM hUM zhes lan mang du bzlas pas// ye
352a6(1): shes thogs med sgrib mi mnga'// bden pa'i tshig der zhugs par bsam// lce yi zor to a dkar po// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de steng du// oM dzaHd+hIHdmar po bsgom byas na// gdon mi za bar smra bar
352b1(1): 'gyur// bdag nyid Tak+ki hUM bsgoms la// a dang nr-i la sogs pa yi// lam lnga'i sems can gang yang rung // oM Tak+ki hUM dang rang sngags kyis// lan 'bum bzlas shing dgug par bya// pra be shas kyang bzlas
352b2(1): par bya// gzhan yang dzaHhUM baM hoHste// gzhag cing dbab pa'i sa de ni// byis pa lo grangs bcu gnyis pa// gcig dang lnga la dbab par bya// thig le bum pa me long 'bar// gzhan yang gnas rnams thams cad
352b3(1): ni// smra ba'i cho ga phun sum tshogs// phyags rgya rdo rje sbar mo sder// dgug pa'i phyag rgya kun gyis dgug/ dzaHhUM/ dbang phyug lha chen la sogs bsdu// bcol cing bya ba de bzhin no// Tak+ki hUM dzaHsa mi btub
352b4(1): na// ha ya gri ba gnas dang yul// zur phyin mgo mjug mnan nas ni// drag tu bzlas shing lcags kyus dgug/ srog gi snying po ma nor bar// gzir cing drag tu drang bar bya// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten
352b5(1): pa'i// dgug pa'i thabs yod ci yang rung // nem nur med par dgug par bya// bya ba sna tshogs las zin na// sngar byas bum pa lnga po la// sman lnga 'bru lnga rin chen lnga// rigs kyi yum dang bdud rtsi
352b6(1): 'khyil// ci 'dod las rnams thams cad dang // gzhan yang dgos pa ci yang rung // oM badz+ra a mr-i ta a a a/ oM ma hA badz+ra a mr-i te phaT/ dza gad dza gad dza zhes kyang brjod do// oM bud d+ha lo tsa ni swA hA zhes
353a1(1): bzlas// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa der// ye shes lnga rdzogs nyid la brjod// ye shes snying po khyod nyon cig/ yang nas yang du mngon gsal du// byang chub mchog gis rtag sgoms shig/ de
353a2(1): ltar byas pa'i dngos grub ni// 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig rten pa'i// brda phrad skad kyis dngos grub thob// ces rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// 'gro ba'i don gyi phyir yang ched du brjod do// pra dbab pa'i le'u
353a3(1): ste drug cu bzhi pa'o// // dpal shrI he ru kas yum kro d+hi shwa ri dang gnyis su med par 'du ba mdzad nas/ byang chub sems kyi rdo rje las khro bo'i dkyil 'khor mang po spros nas// 'jig rten pa'i dbang mo chen
353a4(1): po dang / dbang po dang / rgyal po dang // rgyal po'i yang rgyal po dang / blon po dang / sde dpon dang / 'khor 'bum phrag bsam gyis mi khyab pa la sogs pa thams cad ma lus par dbang du bsdus te/ 'jigs
353a5(1): byed chen mo rnams da ltar dang / dus phyi ma'i dus su la la ni tshe 'phel ba'i las su bskos// la la ni longs spyod 'phel bar bskos/ la la ni 'byung ba chen mo la thogs pa med par 'gro bar bskos// la la ni
353a6(1): gzugs mi snang bar 'gro bar bskos/ la la ni gzugs sna tshogs cir yang 'gyur bar bskos/ la la ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs dbang du sdud par bskos/ la la ni nyams shing rmongs par bskos/ la la ni bskam
353b1(1): shing 'phro bar bskos// gzhan yang bya ba sna tshogs pa ci 'dod par bskos nas// ched du brjod pa 'di brjod do// mnyam nyid rig pa'i rdo rje yis// 'jig rten gtso mchog dbang du sdud// thugs rje chen po'i
353b2(1): byin brlabs kyis// 'gro ba'i don rnams sna tshogs bstan// thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas// ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// 'di ni rang byung lha yi lha// byams dang snying rje ldan par rol// thugs
353b3(1): rje chen po thabs mkhas pas// thams cad kun la sbyor 'gyur yang // bag chags sogs par mi 'gyur te// bsod nams ye shes tshogs 'gyur rdzogs// thabs mkhas spyod pa ma gtogs par// gzung 'dzin
353b4(1): 'khrul rtog rdul tsam med// de bzhin nyid dang dbyer med phyir// rtag tu rang bzhin 'od gsal gnas// de nas bdag nyid rgyud don gong nas 'byung ba bzhin lha khro bo dang zhi ba de dag gang la goms par
353b5(1): bsgom/ ting nge 'dzin las su rung ba lha gsal bar gyur pa dang / rang gi lha'i bzlas pa 'bum 'bum gdon to// lha chen po ni dgug pa'i phyir lcags kyu zhags pa s+phoT baM/ ma hA de bA hUM dzaHdzaHhUM baM hoH/ lha yi
353b6(1): dbang po'i snying ga nas// yang nas yang du rnam par drang // ma ma trag sha ma hA de ba gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hUM hUM/ lha'i gzugs mdog ni 'tsher la dkar// lus ni rin chen kun gyis brgyan// gtsug na yid bzhin rin chen
354a1(1): 'bar// lag pa g.yas na thogs pa ni// yid bzhin rin chen bum chu gsol// yon tan rin chen sna lnga ste// lha rnams kun gyi re ba skong // btsun mo ut+pa ta gnas pa// rtag tu 'dod yon lnga
354a2(1): dang ldan// bdag nyid snang mdzad gzhal yas khang // lha yi gzugs ni snga ma'i tshul// lha yi sa bon 'bum phrag tu// srog dang ldan par bzlas brjod bya// mdun nas dzaHhUM baM hoHsa drang // rgyab nas rdo rje can
354a3(1): gyis phul// je nye je nye gnyis med par// lha chen po ni gsal gyur nas// ci 'dod las de byed du gzhug/ lha chen 'khor bcas thams cad kyang // de grub dbang byed 'du bar 'gyur// gang 'dod las rnams
354a4(1): byed par 'gyur// de nas rgyal po chen po sde bzhi bsgrub pa'i las 'di gsungs so// byang chub sems mchog ting 'dzin gyis// phyogs bzhi ma lus thams cad kun// rigs sngags 'chang gi dngos grub
354a5(1): tu/ rgyal chen bzhi yang dbang du bsdus// bdag nyid rigs bzhi'i he ru ka/ gong don byung ba bzhin du bsgom// lha nyid rtag tu gsal gyur cing // lha yi gzugs tshul gsal bar bsgom// bdag nyid lha dang
354a6(1): gnyis med par// yang dag don du gsal bar bsgom// de nas rgyal po yul 'khor srung // gzugs ni gangs ri nyi shar 'dra// mchod sbyin 'od zer brgya dang ldan// lag g.yas rdo rje tri shul la// lag g.yon
354b1(1): bdud rtsi bum pa gsol// in tra swa ya swA hA/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ tra mi ta hUM hUM su ra ta bag tra dzAHdzA dzA hUM hUM/ zhes lan 'bum bzlas nas// bdag nyid rdo rje he ru ka/ 'dren pa'i phyag rgya de dag gis// lha yi dbang
354b2(1): po'i snying nas drang // rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis phul// de nyid lha yi dbang gyur nas// las gang 'dod pa byed du gzhug/ thams cad thams cad grub par byed// kun la 'byin cing kun la za// lha yi 'khor
354b3(1): rnams thams cad kun// ma lus par ni yang dag 'du// bran bzhin du ni thams cad 'brang // rgyal po 'phags skyes bsgrub pa ni// bdag nyid rin chen he ru ka/ sku mdog rgyud nas 'byung ba bzhin// phyag rgya
354b4(1): rnams kyang de bzhin te// 'od kyi 'phro 'du byin brlabs kyis// 'phags skyes po ni dbang du bsdus/ d+h+r-i ta d+h+r-i ta swA ha/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ grih+Na gr-ih+Na dur+thid swA ha/ haM haM haM/ rat+na dzaHhUM baM hoHzhes snying po lan 'bum
354b5(1): du bzlas te// srog dang ldan par ting 'dzin bya// bdag nyid rat+na he ru ka/ 'phags skyes po yi snying ga nas// dzaHyi rab tu bzung nas ni// bdag gis mdun du dgug par bya// rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis
354b6(1): phul// de nas mngon sum gyur pa dang // gang 'dod las de byed du gzhug/ mdog ni gser gyi mdog tu 'bar// 'khor rnams thams cad bdag la bsdu// yid bzhin rin chen gzhal yas 'grub// rgyal po
355a1(1): mig ngan bsgrub pa ni// bdag nyid pad+ma he ru ka/ sku mdog gong ga snga ma bzhin// phyag rgya'i tshul yang de bzhin te// snying po 'bum phrag gsal bzlas nas// ting 'dzin phyag rgya bsgyur rung
355a2(1): zhing // lha nyid du ni gsal gyur nas// rgyal po de yi gzugs mdog ni// shin tu dmar zhing 'tsher ba ste// lag g.yas bdud rtsi bum pa gsol// lag g.yon bdud rtsi lnga yi tshul// nub phyogs klu rnams re ba
355a3(1): skoslong // sbrul mgo dgu yi gdengs ka can// de ni rab tu dbang bsdu phyir// bi rU D+ha ka swA hA/ dzaHhUM baM hoH/ nA ga shi ni bi ya phag sha phag dzaHhUM baM hoH// 'bum phrag du ma bzlas nas ni// de ni bdag gi dbang du
355a4(1): bsdu// bdag nyid lha ru gsal bsgoms nas// mig mi bzang gi snying ga nas// dza yis rab tu bzung nas drang // rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis phul// de nas bdag dang gnyis med pa'i// dbyer med par ni gyur pa
355a5(1): dang // ci 'dod las de byed du gzhug/ mig ngan 'khor rnams ma lus par// dbang gi las rnams grub par byed// rgyal po rnam thos bsgrub pa ni// bdag nyid khro bo bdud rtsi 'khyil// sku mdog phyag mtshan snga
355a6(1): ma bzhin// gsal zhing 'od 'phro rab bsgoms shing // rang sngags snying po 'bum phrag bzlas// ting 'dzin bsgyur du rung ba dang // rnam thos dag ni rab tu 'grub// gzugs ni rin chen bai DUr+ya// yang na mdog
355b1(1): ni sngo zhing 'tsher// phyag g.yas rin chen dbyig to thogs// g.yon na 'dod yon bum pa gsol// dbu la rin chen sna tshogs mdzes// bai shra ba Na ye swA hA/ dzaHhUM baM hoHku be ra/ kang kang // yang yang / dzaHhUM baM
355b2(1): hoH/ 'bum du bzlas shing srog yod par// yang dang yang du bzlas par bya// bdag nyid bdud rtsi he ru ka/ dza yis rnam thos snying nas drangs// dbang du yang dag bsdu bar bya// rgyab nas rdo rje can gyis
355b3(1): phul// yid bzhin rin chen dbang du 'gyur// gnod sbyin 'khor rnams bran bzhin bsdu// rin chen spros shing las rnams bsgrubs// ci 'dod las rnams byed par 'gyur// sgyu 'phrul dra ba las lha chen po
355b4(1): bsgrub pa dang / rgyal po chen po bzhi po dkyil 'khor bkod cing bsgrub pa'i le'u ste drug cu lnga pa'o// // de nas bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor la shin tu rngam pa'i gdangs
355b5(1): kyis glu 'di blangs so// hUM/ gtum chen dus mtha'i me ltar 'bar// 'od zer nyi ma 'bum gyi gzi// khro gnyer glog stong 'gyu ba bzhin// mche ba zang yag za byed che ho// hUM/ rngam pa'i nga ro 'brug stong
355b6(1): ldir// thug chen ri rab 'bum bsnyil skad// a a ha la'i gad rgyangs che// dbyug pa'i 'thor rlung g.yeng ba che ho// hUM/ khros pa'i shes rab 'od po che// ye shes dkyil 'khor kun tu gsal// 'bar ba'i ye
356a1(1): shes kun tu 'joms// sna tshogs ye shes thig le che ho// hUM/ khros pa'i rgyal po sprin chen po// khros pa'i dkyil 'khor char chen 'bebs// dkyil 'khor yid bzhin 'byung ba'i gter// sna tshogs
356a2(1): khros pa'i thig le che ho// hUM/ bdud kun gyi ni bdud chen po// bdud kyi bdud de bdud rnams 'joms// 'jigs pa'i tshogs kyang 'jigs byed pa// 'jigs byed chen po thig le ho// hUM/ rdo rje brag chen sra ba
356a3(1): po// rdo rje chu bo sdud pa po// rdo rje me ste kun 'bar che// rdo rje rlung ste 'thor rlung che ho// zhes ched du blangs so// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las mnyes pa'i le'u ste drug cu drug pa'o// // de nas
356a4(1): bcom ldan 'das dgyes pa chen pos de bzhin gshegs pa nyid la gsang sngags kyi rgyal po// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gsang ba'i snying po de kho nyid nges pa las bdag dang rdo rje sems dpar dbyer med
356a5(1): par yang yang dag pa'i dbyings su 'dus shing bdag gis rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal mngon sum du mthong ba'i don bstan pa'i phyir ched du brjod pa 'di gsungs so// kun rdzob sgyu mar zhal mthong ba'i// thams
356a6(1): cad mig yor sgyu ma'i tshul// snang srid ma lus thams cad kun// chu zla'i tshul du 'drar shes shing // yul dang rtog pa gnyis med par// gang gis de ltar rig pa de// gzhi rtsa med dbyings skad cig ma// snga phyi
356b1(1): med dbyings de bzhin nyid// cis kyang mi tshugs rdo rje yin// rdo rje sems dpa' de la gnas// lha spyod mthun pas zhal mthong yin// rang bzhin dkyil 'khor yang dag ni// chos dbyings bdag dang dbyer med
356b2(1): pa'i// mnyam par sbyor zhing dag pa'o// thams cad byang chub lhun grub pa'i// de ltar gang gis rtogs 'gyur ba// de ni ye shes gnyis can te// de yis yang dag snying po mthong // de nyid cis kyang mi tshugs
356b3(1): pa// shin tu sra zhing brtan pa yin// rang bzhin dbyings nas 'od gsal ba// sems dpa' mchog tu yang dag gsungs// de ltar rtogs na zhal mthong yin// de bzhin mnyam rdzogs lhun grub yin// de bzhin
356b4(1): gshegs dang ye shes lnga// rang byung chen po'i dkyil 'khor bsgom// rtogs nyid bral ba'i thabs mkhas kyis// lha gsal dngos po med bsgoms na// mthong thos la sogs med pa'i tshul// rang gi ye shes
356b5(1): gsal bsgoms na// rang bzhin med la ci yang 'grub// 'grub 'gyur nyid na dngos po med// ji ltar bcom ldan de bzhin gyis// bdud dpung dkyil du ta la btsugs// thams cad byang chub shing bsdus
356b6(1): te// gdug pa ngang gis mi dga' nas// ta la bcad skams yong mi gcod// rdo rje sems dpa' de nyid yin// bdag dang ting 'dzin mthong gyur pa// de nyid rdo rje zhal mthong yin// rdo rje sems dpa' nyid
357a1(1): bsgoms te/ ting 'dzin shin tu 'dres gsal na// thams cad rnga rje nyid du 'gyur// kun la dbang sgyur ces mi tshugs// bdag dang sems dpa' dbyer med de// las mthun ji ltar snang ba
357a2(1): bzhin// bdag dang sems dpa' lta spyod gcig/ de nyid rdo rje zhal mthong yin// gzugs brnyan dkyil 'khor yang dag ni// chen po rags pa thabs kyis rtogs// so so'i mtshan 'dzin shes rab rtog/ gnyis
357a3(1): med 'brel ba thabs chen yin// kun kyang shes rab dang du gnas// snang dang gnas pa thams cad kun// de bzhin nyid las ma g.yos phyir// g.yo dang med pa gnyi ga med// gnas dang mi gnas dbye ru
357a4(1): med// mnyam pa'i dbyings su thams cad 'dus// 'dus nyid gnas su thibs pa yi// thams cad de lta bu yi dang // mnyam gnyis dbyer med sus mi tshugs// de nyid sems dpa' bzhugs gnas yin// de
357a5(1): ltar rtogs pa'i rigs mchog de// sems dpa' nyid dang rigs mthun pas// de nyid rdo rje zhal mthong yin// rgyur byas phung po khams rnams la// gzhi rtsa de bzhin nyid du gcig/ sgyu mar snang ba gzugs
357a6(1): brnyan tshul// snang ba nyid ni dngos po med// dngos nyid de nyid sna tshogs ston// phung po lnga nyid de bzhin gshegs// dbang po rnams sems byang chub sems// yul dus po de chen po yin// bdag rtog rnam pa
357b1(1): khro bo yin// rtag chad mu bzhi khro mo yin// de sems rang rig nyid ces bya// thams cad dbyings 'gyur kun tu bzang // de nyid rdo rje sems dpa' yin// gang gis de ltar rtogs gyur na// sems dpa' nyid
357b2(1): dang dgongs mthun pas// de nyid rdo rje zhal mthong yin// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// ming dang tshig dang yi ge dang // sgra yis mtshon nas don bstan pa// kun kyang yi ge ming gcig bzhin// gang yang
357b3(1): dngos po ma yin te// dngos med de nyid sna tshogs snang // snang ba nyid na gang yang med// bya byed sna tshogs kun byed kyang // dngos po med de yang dag nyid// de ni cis kyang mi tshugs pa'i// sa rdo dran med ma
357b4(1): yin te// de nyid shin tu 'od gsal yin// rdo rje sems dpa' de ltar gnas// gang gis de ltar rtogs pa ni// rigs mchog dam pa rgyu yin te// rdo rje'i rigs dang dbyer med phyir// de nyid rdo rje zhal mthong
357b5(1): yin// skyes bu blo rtsal rab ldan pas// kun dang dbyer med don rtogs te// 'bras bu mngon du ma gyur kyang // byang chub sems la gnas bcas pas// dper na mngal dang sgo nga yis// mngon du ma gyur
357b6(1): bsgribs gyur kyang // rtsal chen 'dus pa 'byung ba bzhin// rnam rtog gzugs ni bor ma thag/ thams cad kun la dbang sgyur zhing // rigs mchog dam pa 'dzin par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dang mnyam pa
358a1(1): yi// dngos grub mchog rnams yongs su rdzogs// bde ba can gyi zhing yang thob// byang chub mchog la rol par 'gyur// lha mi rnams kyi ston pa po// lus ngag sems la dbang thob nas// ji ltar
358a2(1): dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// tshad med bzhi la dbang byed 'gyur// bde ba'i ro mchog kun la spyod// tha mar skye rga na 'chi la sogs pa'i// sdug bsngal zad pa'i go 'phang thob// rdo rje rigs mchog 'dzin
358a3(1): 'gyur te// thugs rje chen po'i byin brlabs kyis// 'gro ba ma lus thams cad kun// rdo rje rigs su 'dren par byed// bdud sde tshar gcod nyon mongs 'dul// chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag bskor// 'gro ba ma
358a4(1): lus thams cad la// mi rtag pa yi tshul yang ston// nyan thos rnams la dgra bcom tshul// byang chub rnams la rang byung tshul// bla med theg pa sangs rgyas tshul// lhun grub rnams la rdo rje dbyings// kun la
358a5(1): mthun pa'i tshul yang ston// rang bzhin dbyings las g.yos pa med// ma g.yos bzhin du kun tu ston// chos rnams ma lus thams cad kun// de lta bu yi ngang du gnas// zhes rdo rje gsang ba'i tshig tu'o// nyid
358a6(1): la nyid de skad ces brjod do// gsang ba'i snying po de kho na nyid nges pa las skyes bu dam pa blo rtsal rab gcig gis rdo rje sems dpa'i zhal mthong ba'i le'u ste drug cu bdun pa'o// // de nas de bzhin
358b1(1): gshegs pa rgyud kyi rgyal po sgyu 'phrul dra ba las sngags 'chang rnams don yod par bya ba'i phyir/ dam tshig sum brgya'i rtsa ba mdor bsdus nas sngags 'chang rnams kyi don du ched du brjod pa 'di brjod
358b2(1): do// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rdul snyed du// log rtog mi bzad rdul phran snyed// rtog 'dul gnyen po bsam mi khyab// 'dul ba sdom pa bsam yas dang // rdo rje theg mchog mang po kun// nyid las g.yos
358b3(1): shing spros med kyang // rang rig 'khrul pa'i rtog pa yis// lta ba mtho dman bsam mi khyab// de 'dul don phyir 'tsham par bstan// yang dag nyid dang log rtog nyid// ngo bo nyid kyis gnas gyur na// de la
358b4(1): bcos shing bsgyur du med// ye nas ngo bo yod yin na// nyon mongs spangs shing byang bsgrub med// thams cad ma lus ro gcig 'gyur// kun rdzob chu zla lta yin pas// cir yang 'gyur zhing cir yang
358b5(1): 'grub// rnal 'byor de nyid rtogs pa yis// don dam skye 'gag med pa ste// kun rdzob sgyu ma cir yang 'grub// gnas ngan dus na log rtog nyid// gzung 'dzin bral ba nyid rtogs na// bdag med ye shes rang
358b6(1): bzhin nyid// snying rje thabs mkhas ting 'dzin gyis// cir yang dmigs pa bzhin du 'grub// so so rang bzhin nges zhe na// yang dag lam nyid bcos su med// de bas yang dag blo chen gyis// thams cad dngos
359a1(1): po med par bshad// dper na dug gi rigs shes pas// dug gis mi tshugs bzhin du snang // ha la ha la'i dug rnams kyang // bsgrub na ra sa ya na'i sman// bdud rtsir 'gyur la tshe ring
359a2(1): 'grub// nyon mongs rang dang spyi bstan pa// mtshan nyid ma nor rtogs pas na// rnam par byang ba'i lam du 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi dngos grub kyang // gang na med de de yin te// nang gi chen po lnga nyid
359a3(1): kyang // rang dang spyi yi don brtags na// mtshan nyid med pas rnam par dag/ so so'i rtsal rnams 'dzin gyur pas// thabs chen du ni rnam par spro// mtshan rnams rang bzhin mi gnas pas// shes rab dbyings
359a4(1): su rnam par sbyor// gti mug ces ni brjod pa ni// ma rig ming gi rnam grangs te// gnyis med don gcig yin par bshad// rang gi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// chos dang bdag dang dngos po rnams// ngo bo nyid
359a5(1): la sogs brtags pa// rtog nyid sgyu ma klung gyur te// log rtogs spros pa'i rgyun yin la// thams cad chos dbyings ro gcig ste// bzod pa'i chos nyid mig gcig yin// spyi yi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// mi
359a6(1): rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med// ma rig pa ni spang du med// rig pa yang dag bsgrub tu med// thams cad dbyings su ro gcig thim// sgyu ma dngos por rtog pa ni// sgyu ma rtog nyid mi dmigs pa// mi
359b1(1): dmigs de nyid sna tshogs snang // skyes pa nyid na chos nyid gcig/ dbyings nyid mi dmigs de bzhin nyid// de nyid chos sku phyag rgya che// mi dmigs sgyu mar dngos po la/ rtog pa'i yul gyi dngos nyid
359b2(1): kyang // chos nyid mi dmigs ye nas dag/ sgyu ma mi dmigs dbyer med phyir// yod med gnyi ga dbyer med pas// ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bskur na// thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po yin// chos nyid dmigs su
359b3(1): med pa ste// mi dmigs bzhin du sgyu mar spros// gdul bya'i bya ba bsam mi khyab// gsung gi phyag rgya chen po'o// de ltar gti mug spang du med// rnam par snang mdzad rgya chen yin// zhe sdang rang dang spyir bstan
359b4(1): pa// kun nas mnar sems rtog pa yi// sgyu ma'i dngos po thams cad kun// 'jig par mos pa'i rang bzhin can// spyi yi mtshan nyid brjod pa ni// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med// zhe sdang snying rje spangs
359b5(1): bsgrub med// chos kyi dbyings su ro gcig phyir// sgyu ma rang bzhin mnar sems pa// dngos po thams cad 'jig rtogs na// sgyu mar snang ba thams cad kyang // chos kyi dbyings las mi gzhan te// mi dmigs
359b6(1): pa nyid sgyu mar skyes// chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin ni// bdag srog gso ba'i rang bzhin med// snang ba thams cad chos kyi dbyings// mnar sems sgyu ma chos nyid do// thams cad mi dmigs de bzhin
360a1(1): yin// kun kyang dbyer med chos phyag rgya// mi dmigs sgyu ma kun nas mnar// rtog pa kun nas mnar sems te// chos nyid sgyu ma mi dmigs te// chos nyid sgyu ma mi dmigs phyir// don dam
360a2(1): kun rdzob ro gcig ste// ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur na// thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po yin// mi dmigs kun nas mnar sems pa// 'dul ba'i bya ba bsam mi khyab// gsung gi phyag rgya chen po'o// zhe sdang spyi
360a3(1): yi mtshan nyid ni// yang dag nyid kyis rab brtags na// rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid de// gnyis med zhe sdang spang du med// nga rgyal mtshan nyid bshad pa ni// khong nas 'gying zhing khengs sems pa// pha rol
360a4(1): zil gyis gnon par byed// spyi yi mtshan nyid bshad pa ni// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med// nga rgyal spangs nas zhi bsgrub med// chos kyi dbyings su ro gcig pas// kun rdzob sgyu mar khong 'gying
360a5(1): nyid// de bzhin nyid las mi gzhan te// chos nyid mi dmigs 'gying bar skyes// skye 'gying nyid na chos nyid de// 'gying ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs dag/ 'gying dang mi 'gying dbyer med phyir// chos sku phyag rgya
360a6(1): chen po yin// mi dmigs pa nyid sgyu ma 'gying // 'gying bas zil gyis gnon pa nyid// chos kyi dbyings las mi gzhan te// sgyu ma chos nyid dbyer med phyir// don dam kun rdzob gnyi ga gcig/ ting nge 'dzin
360b1(1): gyis dbang sgyur na// thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po yin// mi dmigs sgyu mar 'gying ba ni// nga rgyal 'dul ba bsam mi khyab// gsung gi phyag rgya chen po yin// nga rgyal rang spyi'i mtshan nyid ni// rnam par byang ba'i
360b2(1): mtshan nyid yin// zhi bsgrub nga rgyal spang du med// 'dod chags rang spyi'i mtshan nyid ni// sred pa kun la zhen pa ste// spyi yi mtshan nyid bshad pa ni// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med// chags spangs ma
360b3(1): chags bsgrub tu med// chos kyi dbyings su ro gcig phyir// kun rdzob sgyu ma'i rang bzhin du// 'dod cing chags pa sgyu ma sred// mi dmigs pa las mi gzhan phyir// mi dmigs de nyid sgyu mar skyes// chos rnams
360b4(1): bdag las mi gzhan phyir// mi dmigs de nyid sgyu mar skyes// spyod pa sgyu mar ro gcig phyir// chos nyid chos can dmigs su med// rgyal ba kun dang dbyer med pa'i// chos kyi sku yi phyag rgya yin// mi dmigs
360b5(1): sgyu mar 'dod cing chags// 'dod chags chos nyid mi dmigs te// sgyu ma mi dmigs dbyer med phyir// bden pa gnyi gar dbyer med gcig/ ting nge 'dzin gyis dbang bsgyur na// thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po
360b6(1): yin// mi dmigs dbyings nyid 'dod chags spros pa ni// 'dul ba bsam gyis mi khyab ste// gsung gi phyag rgya chen po yin// 'dod chags rang dang spyi yi mtshan// rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid yin// chags
361a1(1): dang ma chags gnyis med pas// 'dod chags mtshan nyid spang du med// phrag dog kun gyi mtshan nyid ni// gzhan gyi phun sum tshogs pa la// sems dog rtog pa sgyu ma gzhan// thabs kyis sbyor ba
361a2(1): sgyu ma'i rang bzhin can// phrag dog spyi mtshan bshad pa ni// mi rtag sdug bsngal stong bdag med// phrag dog spang zhing yangs bsgrub med// chos nyid du ni ro gcig phyir// kun rdzob sgyu ma gzhan gyi phun sum
361a3(1): la// phrag dog rtog pa sgyu ma'i rang bzhin nyid// mi dmigs pa las mi gzhan te// mi dmigs pa nyid sgyu mar skyes// phun sum tshogs pa'i lhag par sbyor ba yi// thabs kyi rtogs pa sgyu ma'i chos nyid de// dus
361a4(1): gsum rgyal ba kun dang dbyer med pas// chos sku phyag rgya chen po yin// mi dmigs sgyu ma gzhan gyi phun sum la// phrag dog rtog par 'dzin pa dang // rtog dang phrag dog mi dmigs te// sgyu ma mi dmigs
361a5(1): dbyer med pa'i// bden pa gnyi gar ro gcig pas// ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang bsgyur na// thugs kyi phyag rgya chen po yin// mi dmigs gzhan gyi phun sum la// phrag dog rnam par spros pa ni// gdul ba'i bya ba
361a6(1): bsam mi khyab// gsung gi phyag rgya chen po yin// phrag dog rang dang spyi bstan pa// rnam par byang ba'i mtshan nyid yin// dog pa spang zhing yangs bsgrub med// sems can rnam pa mang po kun// nang gi chen po lnga
361b1(1): sogs bstan// rang spyi'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya// thabs dang shes rab ma rtogs pas// ma grol khams gsum 'khor ba yin// de ltar nges par ci mthong na// sngags kyis yongs su zin pa'i nad// kun la
361b2(1): gnod par byed mi nus// de bzhin thabs dang shes rab rtogs// dug gsum sdug bsngal gnod mi 'gyur// thabs la mkhas pas ma zin na// lam gyi dge spyang stegs bcas kyang // mtho ris lha dang mi ru
361b3(1): skyes// skye shi med pa'i sa mi thob// thabs mkhas snying rjes zin pa ni// mtshams med sems can ma lus kun// byang chub sems dpa'i snying rjes bsad// bsod nams dpag tu med pa thob// ma bsad na yang
361b4(1): sems can yal bor te// snying rje med de sdig yod 'gyur// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang // nga rgyal phrag dog chen po dag/ gang phyir byang chub sems de ni// rdo rje de bzhin gshegs par gsal// nyon
361b5(1): mongs pa nyid de bzhin gshegs// ngo bo yin par gsal por gsungs// chos kun rang bzhin dag pa'i phyir// 'khor ba yongs su dag par 'gyur// thabs dang shes rab ldan pa la// nyon mongs thams cad
361b6(1): byang chub rgyu// 'khor ba'i rang bzhin bdag med pas// de phyir de bzhin gshegs bsam yas// thabs dang shes rab ldan gyur pas// phyin ci log nyid byang chub lam// 'khor ba'i rang bzhin mi dmigs
362a1(1): phyir// mya ngan 'das pa yod ma yin// gsang sngags bla na med pa yi// thabs kyis ji ltar zin bzhin 'grub// bsam gyis mi khyab nges pa med// don dam cir yang ma grub la// sgyu ma'i sprul pa
362a2(1): bsam mi khyab// thabs chen dag gis zin pa ni// nyon mongs lam yang rnam par grol// thabs chen dag gis ma zin na// dge ba spyad kyang grol mi 'gyur// rnal 'byor don dam ldan pa yis// nyon mongs
362a3(1): 'ching ba'i chos spyad kyang // rnam par grol bar 'gyur ba yin// 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das// gnyi ga yod pa ma yin pas// 'khor ba yongs su shes pas na// de ni mya ngan 'das pa'i mtha'// nyon mongs
362a4(1): phyin ci log rnams dag/ thabs la mkhas pas zin 'gyur yang // grol la thar par mi 'gyur na// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni// 'dul ba'i dbang gis bya byed kun// rngon dang smad 'tshong ston pa'ang
362a5(1): ltung // byang chub sems dpa'i spyod tshul bzang // phal la med pas mi rung na// sngags mchog shin tu zab pa yi// skye bo kun gyis bya bar 'byung // bdud rtsi dang du blang bar gsungs// mnyam dang mi mnyam
362a6(1): dbyer med na// sku gsung rdo rje dbang thob 'gyur// grub pa'i rdzas su de phyir gsungs// shes rab mnyam pa ma rtogs na// byol song la la chos dang ldan 'gyur yang // drang srong 'tsho dang rtag mthun dang // ji
362b1(1): srid 'tsho yi bar du 'dod pa spong byed pa// de dag grol bar ngas ma bshad// chos rnams thams cad yongs su dag pa yi// rnam bzhi tshul gyis don rtogs mngon// rgyu rnams rang bzhin dag pa dang // 'bras bu
362b2(1): yongs su dag 'gyur te// rgyu yi mtshan nyid rnam par dag/ phyi rol chen po lnga rnams te// sems nyid gzung 'dzin gnyis snang ba// gzung ba'i yul nyid 'byung ba che// rgyud nyid rang gi sems yin pas// 'byung
362b3(1): ba chen po rgyu las dag/ 'bras bu yongs su dag pa ni// sems can kun gyi rus pa ste// rdo rje byang chub sems yin te// sha ni pad+ma rak+ta yin// dri chen dri chu gur gum chu// so so'i lus la gnas pas dag/ don
362b4(1): dam dmigs med dag pas ni// phyi nang chos rnams thams cad kyang // gang gi ngo bo ma yin te// skye 'gag med pas ye nas dag/ kun rdzob ye nas dag pa ni// sgyu ma'i rang bzhin thams cad snang // chu zla'i
362b5(1): tshul du mi dmigs gnas// mi dmigs pa nyid sna tshogs snang // de bzhin gshegs par ye nas mnyam// de bas gtsang sme med par spyod// sems can rtog pa bzlog phyir smad// gtso ru dang du blang bar
362b6(1): bya// de bas sems can phyin ci log/ chos rnams thams cad dag par ma shes te// thabs dang shes rab don ma rtogs// kha cig gis ni 'tsho ba'i bar du zos// kha cig gis ni drang srong ji bzhin du// sha
363a1(1): spangs rtsa dang tshul zos// zos kyang ma grub don ma rtogs// rnal 'byor thabs ldan rnams kyis ni// rang bzhin yongs kyis dag pa'i phyir// mnyam pa'i dbyings kyis rab rtogs pas// thabs
363a2(1): dang shes rab 'brel pa yi// the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur// dngos dang dngos med rtogs pa mtshan// gtsang dang mi gtsang rtogs pa mtshan// mtshan ma nyid kyang rnam spangs te// mkhyen pas dbul la
363a3(1): gnas mi 'gyur// bsgrub pa'i rdzas su yang dag gsungs// byang chub sems dang sha chen dang // dri chen dri chu rak+ta dag/ sgrub pa pos ni nan tan bya// dngos grub ya mtshan chen po 'grub// tshe la dbang dang rig
363a4(1): pa 'dzin// mkha' la 'phyo dang thogs med 'grub// mthar ni skye med rdo rje yis// gzhan yang ji ltar dmigs pa bzhin// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// gsang ba'i snying po'i don nyid kyis// yi dam mi
363a5(1): spang rtag bsgom zhing // ye nas lha yi mtshan nyid ni// dus gsum gshegs pa thams cad kyi// lha spangs dge spyad don med 'gyur// lha ni mi spang don nyid ni// lhun grub ye shes thams cad kyi// bdag dang
363a6(1): gnyis med so so ma yin pa'i// dus gsum bder gshegs dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje bdag po ste// yongs su rdzogs par bsgom pa'i don// dkon mchog gsum spangs tshangs
363b1(1): par spyad pa'i don med 'gyur// bdag nyid lha dang mnyam sbyor na// yon tan chung yang 'grub par 'gyur// ye nas mnyam nyid sbyor nas su// lha nyid du ni rtag tu bsgom// bder gshegs kun dang mnyam par
363b2(1): 'gyur// sku gsung ye shes lnga rdzogs grub// rdo rje slob dpon smad mi bya// byang chub ston pa 'dren pa po// long ba dmigs bu 'dren dang 'dra// nyon mongs sdug bsngal mtsho skems yin// slob dpon de la smod pa
363b3(1): ni// dper na mun khung sgron bsad na// mthong ba'i don ni mi rtogs bzhin// sdug bsngal nyam zag yun rings su// bskal pa mang por myong bar mngon// de bas de la gus pa rtag tu gyis// lus la dbang ba'i
363b4(1): rgyal po bas// shin tu gtso bor blang bar bya// drin chags bskyed pa'i pha ma bas// shin tu lhag pa'i ri mo bya// rdo rje mched dang lcam dral ni// bla med byang chub zhing 'gro ba'i// chos nyid dam tshig smon lam
363b5(1): mthus// byang chub rin chen sar nges pas// de la ldog cing 'khu ba ni// rang la rang gis mtshon btab na// rang srog tshe rabs lnga brgya'i bar// rang gis srog gcod phung bar 'gyur// tshe 'di mi bde sna tshogs
363b6(1): pa// mi bde bzhin du 'byung bar 'gyur// 'jig rten pha rol dag tu yang // ngan song gsum dang mi khom pa'i// sdug bsngal kha brgyud myong bar 'gyur// yun ring rtag tu mi thar ba'i// shin tu nyam thag myong bar
364a1(1): 'gyur// grub pa gcig bzhin lhan cig spyod// gnyis med dad pas rjes spyod spun// bder gshegs dkyil 'khor bla med yin// shes rab gsal bas rtag tu gdung // zhes gsungs/ gsang
364a2(1): ba gzhan la mi bsgrags shing // sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig rnams// rnal 'byor mnyam pa rnam gnyis kyis// thabs dang shes rab 'brel rtogs nas// mnyam pa'i spyod pas la dor te// phul dang mi 'dra yang
364a3(1): dag rtogs// ma rtogs pa yi phyogs rnams dang // skye bo kun la rab tu gsang // gsang ba'i brda ngag sna tshogs gsungs// zabs la mkhas pas byas pa yin// gsang sngags skyon yod ma yin te// thugs rje
364a4(1): chen po thabs mkhas kyis// snod ma yin dang blo rtul rnams// las 'phro ngan pa'i don phyir gsang // brgya la gang zhig gsang don 'di// las 'phro ngan la bsgrags 'gyur na// dper na gtsub shing mes
364a5(1): gtsubs nas// gtsub shing nyid kyang 'tshig par snang // gzhan yang tshig par gyur pa bzhin// chos don bzang po me dang 'dra// skal ba chung zhing shes rab dman// blo ngan rgyu 'bras rmongs pa rnams// mnyam pa
364a6(1): nyid la skur 'debs pas// ngan song gsum du 'phangs par 'gyur// gsang don ma rtogs sdug bsngal myong 'gyur na// gsang ba 'phel bar byed pa yang // smra byed lce la zhing rmo zhing // sdug bsngal chen po myong
364b1(1): bar 'gyur// de phyir sems can don phyir gsang // rlung phyogs tsam du'ang brjod mi bya// sngags dang phyag rgya rgyun mi gcad// sngags zhes rab tu bsgrags pa ni// don dam kun rdzob dbyer med pa'i// mnyam pa
364b2(1): chen po'i dkyil 'khor chen po ru// sku gsung thugs kyi yi ge oM// de la sogs pa bzhi bcu gnyis// phyag rgya chen pos mtshan nyid ni// phyogs bcu dus bzhi gshegs pa yi// sku gsung thugs dang ye shes
364b3(1): lnga// bdag dang dbyer med phyag rgya che// gsal la brtson pa'i yon tan ldan// yid bzhin ma chags dbang bskur te// goms shing brtan par bya ba yin// de bas bar chad brtson med na// dper na sa bon
364b4(1): tshig pa las// 'bras bu 'dod pa dang 'dra ste// bsgrub pa 'bras bu med par 'gyur// mi khoms 'khor bar gnas 'gyur te// rnal 'byor chen po la zhugs pas// phyi nang chos rnams thams cad la// dmigs
364b5(1): med gcig dang du mar bral// mtha' dbus gang yang ma yin pa'i// ngo bo nyid med mtshan nyid med// mnyam pa'i phyag rgya chen po yis// phyogs bcu dus bzhi thams cad dang // 'jig rten 'das dang 'jig
364b6(1): na pa'i// yon tan skyon rnams skye 'gag med// gang gi ngo bor ma grub mnyam// kun rdzob chos rnams skye 'gag med// mi dmigs gang gi ngo bo min// chu zla'i tshul du sna tshogs par// snang zhing bya ba byed nus
365a1(1): pa'i// phyag rgya chen po'i phyogs bcu dang // dus gsum khams gsum thams cad dang // 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten 'das// yon tan skyon rnams thams cad dang // sgyu mar mnyam par ye nas
365a2(1): gnas// sngags 'chang rgyal por rtogs byas nas// bdag nyid chos nyid skye 'gag med// ngang las ma g.yos par gnas na// phyag rgya chen po thams cad kyang // rdzogs par phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi// de
